[\[1b.1\]{D4346}]@##/_/na mo b+ha ga ba te shAkya mu na ye ta thA ga tA yAR+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+ha ya/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang sku dang che ba nyid kyi rnam grangs kyi ming la/_bud+d+haH_b+ha ga bAna?_/
[\[1b.2\]]@##/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas/_bcom ldan 'das/_
[\[1b.3\]]ta thA ga taH_ar+hana?/_samyak+saM bud+d+haH_bid+yA tsa ra Na sam+pan+naH_su ga taH_lo ka bitra/_a nut+ta ra pu ru Sha da mya sA ra thiH
[\[1b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa/_dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]shA stA/_dzi naH/_lo ka dz+yeSh+ThaH/_sarba dz+nyaH/_tA yi/_de bA ti de baH/_ma hAR+ShiH/_d+har+m+ma swA mI/_r-i Sha b+haH/_nA ya kaH/_pa ri NA ya kaH/_bi nA ya kaH/_a dwa ya
[\[2a.2\]]ston pa/_rgyal ba/_'jig rten gyi gtso bo/_thams cad mkhyen nam kun mkhyen/_skyob pa/_lha yi yang lha/_drang srong chen po/_chos kyi rje/_khyu mchog_/'dren pa/_yongs su 'dren pa/_rnam par 'dren pa/_gnyis su med
[\[2a.3\]]pA dI/_sau d+hau da niH/_da sha ba laH/_mA radzitra/_shAkya pung+ga baH/_gop+tA/_ma hAt+mA/_bi dza yI/_bi b+huH/_bi shwan+ta raH/_sarba d+harme shwa raH/_bi rATa?/_d+hI raH/_
[\[2a.4\]]par gsung ba/_zas gtsang gi sras/_stobs bcu/_bdud thul/_shAkya skyes mchog_/srung mdzad/_bdag nyid chen po/_rnam par rgyal ba mnga'/_khyab bdag//thams cad sgrol/_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug_/rnam par mdzes/_brtan pa/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]guN sA ga raH/_sha ra N+yaH/_sha ra Nama?/_bA di siM haH/_na rot+ta maH/_mA rA b+hi b+hUH/_a pra ti pung+ga laH/_bAn+ta do ShaH/_ha ta bi ShaH/_a nang+ga dzita?/_Sha Da b+hi dz+nyaH/_b+ha bAn+ta kr-ita?/_ag+ha han+taH/_sid+d+hAr+thaH/_shA kya siM haH/_ba rAr+haH/_ba ra
[\[2b.2\]]yon tan rgya mtsho/_skyabs 'os/_skyabs/_smra ba'i seng ge_/mi mchog_/bdud zil gyis gnon/_gang zag zla med pa/_skyon bsal ba/_dug bcom pa/_lus med thul/_mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/_srid mthar byed/_sdig 'joms/_don grub/_shAkya seng ge/_mchog don 'os/_mchog
[\[2b.3\]]daH/_bI raH/_sha mi tA/_shAn+ta pA paH/_shI tI b+hU taH/_shi baM ka raH/_nir+d+wan+d+waH/_nirma maH/_ne tA/_ni ra ba d+yaH/_nir+b+ha yaH/_bI ta tr-iSh+NA/_ni rA dA naH/_bi shru taH/_shu b+ha d+harmA ka raH/_shu tsiH/_a nu pa maH/_
[\[2b.4\]]sbyin/_dpa' ba/_zhi bar mdzad pa/_sdig pa zhi ba/_bsil bar gyur pa/_shis mdzad/_rtsod med/_bdag gi ba med pa/_mtshon pa/_kha na ma tho ba mi mnga' ba/_bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba/_sred pa dang bral ba/_len pa mi mnga' ba/_rnam par grags pa/_dge ba'i chos kyi 'byung gnas/_gtsang ba/_dpe med pa/_
[\[2b.5\]]tri kA la dz+nyaH/_bA dI/_tri do Sho pa hA/_tri prA ti hAR+Ya sam+pan+naH/_nirma laH/_triskan+d+ha ba tha de shi kaH/_nir+dz+wa raH/_sUR+Ya baM shaH/_Ang+gI ra saH gau ta maH/_i k+Shu ku la nan+da naH/_pra b+huH/_de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i mtshan la/_bai ro tsa naH/_
[\[2b.6\]]dus gsum mkhyen pa/_gsung ldan/_nyes gsum 'joms/_cho 'phrul gsum dang ldan pa/_dri ma med pa/_phung po gsum gyi lam ston pa/_nad mi mnga' ba/_nyi ma'i rigs/_nyi ma'i rgyud/_gau ta ma/_bu ram shing pa'i rigs dga' ba/_mnga' bdag_/rnam par snang mdzad/_
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]ak+Sho b+h+yaH/_a mi tA b+haH/_rat+na sam+b+ha baH/_a mo g+ha sid+d+hiH/_bi pa sh+yI/_si khI/_bi shwa b+hukra/_kra kuts+tshan+daH/_kra kutshun+daH/_ka na ka mu niH/_kA sh+ya paH/_shAkya mu niH/_dI paM ka raH/_pad+ma ne traH/_pra ha si ta ne traH/_rat+na
[\[3a.2\]]mi 'khrugs pa/_'od dpag med/_rin chen 'byung ldan/_don yod grub pa/_rnam par gzigs/_gtsug tor can/_thams cad skyob/_log dad sel/_'khor ba 'jig_/gser thub/_'od srungs/_shAkya thub pa/_mar me mdzad/_pad+ma'i spyan/_spyan gsal rgyas/_rin chen
[\[3a.3\]]shi khI/_me g+ha swa raH/_sa lI la ga dza gA mI/_lo kA b+hi lA ShI/_sangs rgyas kyis dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i phung po lnga dang /_ye shes bzhi dang /_sku gsum la/_sa man+ta pra b+hA bud+d+ha b+hU miH/_shI la skan+d+haH/_sa mA d+hi skan+d+haH/_pra dz+nyA skan+d+haH/_bi muk+ti skan+d+haH/_bi muk+ti dz+nyA na daR+sha na
[\[3a.4\]]gtsug tor can/_'brug sgra/_glang po che ltar 'gying zhing bzhud pa/_'jig rten mos pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sa kun du 'od/_tshul khrims kyi phung po/_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po/_shes rab kyi phung po/_rnam par grol ba'i phung po/_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
[\[3a.5\]]skan+d+haH/_d+har+m+ma d+hA tu bi shud+d+hiH/_A daR+sha dz+nyA nama?/_sa ma tA dz+nyA nama?/_pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA nama?/_kr-i t+yAnuSh+ThA na dz+nyA nama?/_d+har+m+ma kA yaH/_sam+b+ho ga kA yaH/_nirmA Na kA yaH/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i ming la/_s+thA nA s+thA na dz+nyA na ba lama?/_
[\[3a.6\]]mthong ba'i phung po/_chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag ba/_me long lta bu'i ye shes/_mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/_bya ba nan tan du grub pa'i ye shes/_chos kyi sku/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku/_sprul pa'i sku/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]karma pi pA ka dz+nyA na ba lama?/_nA nA bi muk+ti dz+nyA na ba lama?/_nA nA d+hA tu dz+nyA na ba lama?/_in+d+ri ya pa rA pa ra dz+nyA na ba lama?/_sarba tra gA mi nI pra ti pan+tha dz+nyA na ba lama?/_sarba d+h+yA na bi mo k+Sha sa mA d+hi sa mA pat+ti
[\[3b.2\]]las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_mos pa sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_khams sna tshogs pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs/_bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms
[\[3b.3\]]saM kle sha bya ba dA na byut+thA na dz+nyA na ba lama?/_pUrba ni bA sA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA na ba lama?/_ts+yu t+yu pa pat+ti dz+nyA na ba lama?/_A sra bak+Sha ya dz+nyA na ba lama?/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming la/_sarba d+har+m+mA b+hi sam+bo d+hi bai shA ra d+yamra/_
[\[3b.4\]]par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba dang ldang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_shi 'pho ba dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs/_zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs/_chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa/_
[\[3b.5\]]sarbA sra bak+Sha ya dz+nyA na bai shA ra d+yama?/_an+ta rA yi ka d+har+m+mA na n+ya thA twa nish+tsi ta byA ka ra Na bai shA ra d+yama?/_sarba sam+ba da d+hi ga mA ya naiR+Ya Ni ka pra ti pat+tA thA twa bai shA ra d+yama?/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming la/_
[\[3b.6\]]zag pa thams cad zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa/_bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa/_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa/_
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]nA sti ta thA ga ta s+yas+kha li tama?/_nAsti ra bi tama?/_nAsti mu Shi ta smr-i ti tA/_nAs+t+ya sa mA hi ta tsit+taM/_nAsti nA nA twa saM dz+nyA/_nAs+t+ya pra ti saM khyA yo pek+ShA/_nAsti ts+tshan+da s+ya hA niH/_nAsti bIR+Ya s+ya hA niH/_nAsti smr-i ti hA niH/_
[\[4a.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa/_ca co med pa/_bsnyel ba med pa/_sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa/_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa/_so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa/_'dun pa nyams pa med pa/_brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa/_dran pa nyams pa med pa/_
[\[4a.3\]]nAsti sa mA d+her+hA niH/_nAsti pra dz+nyA yAr+hA niH/_nAsti pi muk+ter+hA niH/_sarba kA ya karma dz+nyA na pUrbaM ga maM dz+nyA nA nu pa ri bar+t+tI/_sarba bAk+karma dz+nyA na pUrbaM ga maM dz+nyA nA nu pa ri bar+t+tI/_sarba ma na skarmA dz+nyA na pUrbaM ga maM dz+nyA nA
[\[4a.4\]]ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa/_shes rab nyams pa med pa/_rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa/_lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing
[\[4a.5\]]nu pa ri bar+t+tI/_a tI te d+h+ya nA saM ga ma pra ti ha taM dz+nyA na daR+sha naM pra brta te/_a nA ga te d+h+wa n+ya saM ga ma pra ti ha traM dz+nyA na daR+sha naM pra brta te/_pra t+yut+pan+na d+h+wa n+ya saM ga ma pra ti ha taM dz+nyA na daR+sha naM pra bar+t+ta te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ming la/_
[\[4a.6\]]ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa/_da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa/
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]ni rAt+mA na s+sarba d+harmAHsatwA sh+tsa nai rAt+m+yAM nA d+hi muts+yan+te a tasta thA ga ta s+ya sa twe Shu ma hA ka ru No t+pa d+ya te/_niH satwAH sarba d+har+m+mAH/_ni dzI bAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_niSh+pung+ga lAH sarba d+har+m+mAH/_a b+hA bAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_
[\[4b.2\]]chos thams cad ni bdag med pa yin na sems can rnams bdag med par ma mos pas de'i phyir sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/chos thams cad ni sems can med pa/_chos thams cad ni srog med pa/_chos thams cad ni gang zag med pa/_chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med
[\[4b.3\]]a ni ke tAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a nA la yAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a ma mAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a shwA mi kAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a ba stu kAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a dzA tAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a ts+yu tA a nu t+pan+nAH sarba d+har+m+mAH/_a saM kliSh+TAH sarba
[\[4b.4\]]pa/_chos thams cad ni gnas med pa/_chos thams cad ni gzhi med pa/_chos thams cad ni nga yi bar byar med pa/_chos thams cad ni bdag po med pa/_chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa/_chos thams cad ni ma skyes pa/_chos thams cad ni shi 'pho med cing ma skyes pa/_chos thams cad ni kun nas nyon
[\[4b.5\]]d+har+m+mAH/_pi ga ta rA gAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_bi ga ta dwe ShAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_bi ga ta mo hAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a nA ga ti kAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a ga ti kAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a na b+hi saM skA raHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a pra
[\[4b.6\]]mongs pa can ma yin pa/_chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba/_chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba/_chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba/_chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa/_chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa/_chos thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa med pa/_chos thams
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pany+tsAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_shU n+yAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a ni mit+tAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a pra Ni hi tAHsarba d+har+m+mAH/_a n+yo\u0f85n+ya bi bA da saM gr-i hi to ba tA yaM lo ka san+ni pe sho byA bA da khi la dwe Sha pra ti ban+na i ti saM pa sh+yatra/_bi par+YAs saM pra
[\[5a.2\]]cad ni spros pa med pa/_chos thams cad ni stong pa/_chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa/_chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa/_kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni phan tshun rtsod pas yongs su zin cing gnod sems kyi tha ba dang zhe sdang la zhugs par gzigs/_kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa
[\[5a.3\]]yuk+to ba tA yaM lo ka san+ni be sho bi Sha ma mArga pra yA taHut+pa tha mArgas+thA yI/_lub+d+ho lA sA b+hi b+hU to ba tA yaM lo ka san+ni be shaH/_a trip+taH pa ra tsi du pa hA rI/_d+ha na d+hA n+ya gr-i ha pu tra b+hAR+YA tr-iSh+NA dA sA ba te me satwA a sA re sA ra
[\[5a.4\]]'di ni phyin ci log dang ldan zhing lam nyam nga bar zhugs pa lam gol ba la gnas pa/_kye ma 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni brkam zhing 'dod pas zil gyis non pa ste chog mi shes shing gzhan gyi nor la 'phrog pa/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni nor dang 'bru dang khyim dang bu dang chung ma la sred pas 'khol ba ste snying po
[\[5a.5\]]saM dz+nyi naH/_bi Sha mA dzI bA ba te me satwA a n+yonyan+ya pa ri bany+tsa no pas+thi tAH/_a tr-ip+tA pa te me sa twA lA b+ha sat+kA ra sh+lo ko pa tsa ri tAH/_tr-ip+tA sma i ti pra ti dzA na te/_na t+yA b+hi ra tA ba te me
[\[5a.6\]]med pa la snying por 'du shes pa/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni mi rigs pas 'tsho ba ste gcig la gcig 'drid pas gnas pa/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni chog mi shes pa ste rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa la spyod kyang /_bdag ni chog shes pa'o snyam du 'dzin/_kye ma sems can 'di dag ni khyim
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]satwA e kAn+tA kl-iSh+Ta duHkha b+hA dza ne gr-i hA bA se kA ra No pa gaHpu naHsarba d+har+m+mA bi Tha pa na pra t+yu pas+thA na lak+Sha NAH/_i daM pu na ra gra ma saM ga dz+nyA na mu t+s+r-i dz+ya bi shiSh+Ta pa ri nirbA Na/_taM sa trA hI na yA naM prAr+tha yan+te ya di daM
[\[5b.2\]]gyi gnas sdug bsngal gyi snod kun nas nyon mongs pa can la rtag tu dga' ba chos thams cad ni rgyus nye bar 'gro ba ste sgrub pas nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid/_sems can rnams ni chags pa med pa'i ye shes dam pa khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su/_mya ngan las 'das pa 'di btang zhing gang 'di nyan
[\[5b.3\]]shrA ba ka pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha yA nAM te b+h+ya u dA re ma ti ro tsa yiSh+yA mI ti ya di daM bud+d+haM dz+nyA nA d+h+yA laM ba na tA yai i twi ta thA ga ta s+ya sa twe Shu ma hA ka ru Not+pad+ya te/_ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gyi ming la/_shu shrUSha mA Ne Shu sa ma tsit+ta tA/_a shu
[\[5b.4\]]thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dman pa tshol ba yin gyi de dag la gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la dmigs par bya ba'i phyir rgya chen po la blo mos par bya'o zhes sems can rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po skye'o/_/gus par nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa/_gus par
[\[5b.5\]]shrUSha mA Ne Shu sa ma tsit+ta tA/_shu shrUSha mA Na shu shrUSha mA Ne Shu sa ma tsit+ta tA/_bsrung ba med pa bzhi'i ming la/_pa ri shud+d+ha kA ya sa mu dA tsA rasta thA ga taH/_nAsti ta thA ga ta s+yA ba ri shud+d+ha kA ya sa mu dA tsA ra tA/_ba ri shud+d+ha bAk+sa mu dA tsA rasta
[\[5b.6\]]mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa/_gus par nyan pa dang gus par mi nyan pa rnams la sems snyoms pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i phrin las yongs su ma dag pa med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi phrin las kyi
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]thA ga taH/_nAsti ta thA ga ta s+yA pa ri shud+d+ha bAk+sa mu dA tsA ra tA/_pa ri shud+d+ha ma naHsa mu dA tsA rasta thA ga taH/_nAsti ta thA ga ta s+yA ba ri shud+d+ha ma naHsa mu dA tsA ra tA/_pa ri
[\[6a.2\]]spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi phrin las kyi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa med do/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[6a.3\]]shud+d+ha dzI bsta thA ga taH/_nAsti ta thA ga ta s+yA pa ri shud+d+ha dzI ba tA/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i ming la/_d+harma pra ti sam+pita?/_ar+tha pra ti sam+bita?/_ni ruk+ti pra ti sam+bita?/_pra ti b+hA na pra ti sam+bita?/_/mngon par shes pa lnga'i ming la/_di byaM tsak+ShuH/_
[\[6a.4\]]ba la 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'tsho ba yongs su ma dag pa med do/_/chos so so yang dag par rig pa/_don so so yang dag par rig pa/_nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/_spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa/_lha'i spyan/_
[\[6a.5\]]di byaM shro trama?/_pa ra tsit+ta dz+nyA naM/_tse taHpar+YA ya dz+nyA naM/_pUrba ni bA sA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA nam/_r-i d+d+hi bi d+hi dz+nyA naM/_A sra bak+Sha ya dz+nyA naM/_mngon par shes pa drug gi skabs nas 'byung ba'i ming la/_ya thA sa mA hi te tsit+te swa ye A sa nenyan+ta r+hi taH/_bi hA
[\[6a.6\]]lha'i snyan/_pha rol gyi sems shes pa/_sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa/_rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa/_zag pa zad pa shes pa/_ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa bzhin du bdag gi stan gyi steng du mi snang bar 'gyur/_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]ya s+ya b+h+yung+ga mya tsa turbi d+ha mIR+YA pa thaM kalpa ya ti/_u pa ri maHkA yaHpra dz+wa la ti/_a d+haHkA yAta shI ta lA bA ri d+hA rAHs+yan+dan+te/_a ne ka bi d+ha mr-id+d+hi bi Sha yaM pra t+ya nu b+ha ba ti/_e ko b+hU twA ba hu d+hA b+ha ba ti/_ba hu d+hA b+hU twA e ko b+ha ba ti/_d+yu tir+d+ha ba ti
[\[6b.2\]]nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te spyod lam rnam pa bzhi byed/_lus kyi stod nas me 'bar/_lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'bab/_rdzu 'phrul gyi yul rnam pa mang po myong bar byed pa yin/_gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyur/_mang por gyur nas gcig tu 'gyur/_snang bar 'gyur
[\[6b.3\]]ti ro d+hA na ma pi pra t+ya nu b+ha ba ti/_ti raHku T+yaM/_ti raHprA kA raMH/_parba ta ma pya sang+ga ma no gats+tsha ti/_A kA she pi kra ma te tad+ya thA pak+ShI sha ku niH/_pr-i thi byA mun+madz+dzA ni naM ka ro ti tad+ya thA pi nA mo da ke/_u da ke pya b+hi d+ya mA no gats+tsha
[\[6b.4\]]zhing mi snang bar yang 'gyur/_rtsig pa la yang thad kar 'gro/_ra ba la yang thad kar 'gro/_ri la yang mi thogs par 'gro/_nam mkha' la yang 'gro ste dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/_/sa la yang steng du 'byung ba dang byi'u zul byed de dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no/_/chu la yang mi nub par 'gro ste
[\[6b.5\]]ti tad+ya thA pi nA ma ma hA pr-i thi byAM/_d+hU mA ya t+ya pi pra dz+wa la t+ya pi nA ma ma hAg+ni skan+d+haH/_swa kA yA da pi ma hA bA ri d+hA rA ut+s+r-i dza ti tad+ya thA pi nA ma ma hA me g+haH/_yA b+hirbA ri d+hA rA b+hi ra yaM tri sA ha sra ma hA sA ha sro lo ka d+hA tu rA dIp+taH
[\[6b.6\]]dper nas chen po la bya ba bzhin no/_/du ba 'thul bar yang byed 'bar bar yang byed de dper na me'i phung po bzhin no/_/bdag gi lus las kyang chu'i rgyun chen po 'byin te dper na sprin chen po bzhin no/_/chu'i rgyun de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sreg cing tshig
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]pra dIp+taH/_sam+p+ra dz+wa li to\u0f85g+ni nA e ka dz+wa li b+hU to ni rbA pya te/_i mA ba pi tsan+d+ra sUR+Ya e baM ma hAr+d+hi ka e baM ma hA nu b+hA bau e baM ma hau dza skau pA Ni nA pa rA mr-i sha ti pa ri mardza ya ti/_yA bad+p+ra h+ma lo kA da pi satwAM kA ye na ba she
[\[7a.2\]]ste/_mes rab tu 'bar zhing 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa zhi bar byed do/_/zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che ba 'di ltar mthu che ba 'di ltar gzi brjid che ba la'ang lag pas 'dzin cing kun du nyug par byed do/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sems can rnams la lus
[\[7a.3\]]bar+t+ta ya ti/_sA kA raM/_sod+de shaM/_sa ni dA naM/_pUr+b+ba ni bA sa ma nusma ra tisma/_dzA ti sma raH/_a mu trA ha mA sa mai ban+nA ma/_e baM dzA tiH/_e baM go traH/_e baM mA hA raH/_e baM su kha duH
[\[7a.4\]]kyis dbang bsgyur ro/_/rnam pa dang bcas/_yul phyogs dang bcas/_gzhi ci las gyur pa dang bcas/_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa/_tshe rabs dran pa/_che ge mo zhig na bdag ming 'di zhes bya bar gyur/_rigs 'di zhes bya/_rus 'di zhes bya/_zas 'di lta bu zhig za/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal
[\[7a.5\]]kha pra ti saM be dI/_e baM tsi ras+thi ti kaH/_e ba mA yuHpar+Yan+taH/_ta tash+ts+yu taHa mu tro pa pan+naH/_ta tash+ts+yuta i hA pyu pa pan+naH/_/cho 'phrul gsum gyi ming la/_r-id+d+hi prA ti hAr+YaM/_A de sha na prA ti hAr+YaM/_a nu sA sa nI prA ti hAr+YaM/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi ming la/_uSh+NI
[\[7a.6\]]'di lta bu zhig myong /_yun 'di srid cig gnas/_tshe ni 'di tsam zhig thub/_de nas shi 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes/_de nas tshe 'phos nas yang 'dir skyes/_rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul/_kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul/_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul/_dbu gtsug
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]Sha shi raska tA/_pra dak+Shi NA bar+t+ta ke shaH/_sa ma la lA TaH/_Ur+NA ko shA/_a b+hi ni la ne tra go pak+Sh+mA/_tsa twA riM shad+dan+taH/_sa ma dan+taH/_a bi ra la dan+taH/_su shukla dan+taH/_ra sa ra sA gra tA/_siM ha ha
[\[7b.2\]]tor dang ldan pa/_dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil ba/_dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa/_mdzod spu/_spyan mthon mthing la ba'i rdzi ma lta bu/_tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba/_tshems mnyam pa/_tshems thags bzang ba/_tshems shin tu dkar ba/_ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa/_'gram pa seng ge'i
[\[7b.3\]]nuH/_pra b+hU ta ta nu dzi hwaH/_bra h+ma swa raH/_su saM br-it+ta skan+d+haH/_sap+tot+sa daH/_tsi tAn+ta rAM saH/_sU k+Sh+ma su par+N+Nats+tsha biH/_s+thi tA na ba na ta pra lam+ba bA hu tA/_siM ha bUrbAr+d+ha kA yaH/_n+ya gro d+ha pa ri maN+DalaH/_
[\[7b.4\]]'dra ba/_ljags shin tu ring zhing srab pa/_tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_dpung 'go shin tu zlum pa/_bdun mtho ba/_thal gong rgyas pa/_pags pa srab cing mdog gser mdog 'dra ba/_bzhengs bzhin du ma btud par phyag pus mor sleb pa/_ro stod seng ge'i 'dra ba/_shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa/_
[\[7b.5\]]e kai ka ro ma pra dak+Shi NA bar+t+taH/_Ur+d+hAng+ga ro mAH/_ko sho ga ta bsti gu h+yaH/_su bar+t+ti to ruH/_uts+tshaM kha pA daH/_mr-i du ta ru na hasta pA da ta laH/_dzA lA ban d+d+ha hasta pA daH/_dIr+g+hAM gu liH/_
[\[7b.6\]]spu re re nas skyes shing g.yas su 'khyil ba/_sku'i spu gyen du phyogs pa/_mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa/_brla legs par zlum pa/_zhabs kyi long mo'i tshigs mi mngon pa/_phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa/_phyag dang zhabs gnyis dra bas 'brel ba/_sor mo ring ba/_
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]tsa krAM ki ta hasta pA da ta la/_su pra tiSh+Thi ta pA daH/_A ya ta bA da pAR+Sh+NiH/_e Ne ya dzaM g+haH/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'i ming la/_A tA mra na khaH/_snig+d+ha na khaH/_tuM ga na khaH/_br-it+tAM gu liH/_
[\[8a.2\]]phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_zhabs shin tu gnas pa/_zhabs kyi rting pa yangs pa/_byin pa ri dgas e na ya'i lta bu/_sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bu/_sen mo'i mdog snum pa/_sen mo mtho ba/_sor mo rnams zlum pa/_
[\[8a.3\]]tsi tAM gu liH/_a nu pUrbAM gu liH/_ni gUT+ha shi rAH/_nir+g+rAn+thi shi rAH/_gUD+ha gul+phaH/_a bi Sha ma pA daH/_siM ha bi krAn+ta gA mI/_nA ga bi krAn+ta gA mI/_haM sa bi krAn+ta gA mI/_br-i Sha b+ha bi krAn+ta gA mI/_pra
[\[8a.4\]]sor mo rnams rgyas pa/_sor mo rnams byin gyis phra ba/_rtsa mi mngon pa/_rtsa mdud med pa/_long bu mi mngon pa/_zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa/_seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa/_glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa/_ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs pa/_khyu mchog gi stabs su gshegs pa/_g.yas
[\[8a.5\]]dak+Shi NA bar+t+ta gA mI/_tsA ru gA mI/_a ba kra gA mI/_br-it+ta gA traH/_mr-iSh+TA gA traH/_a nu pUr+b+ba gA traH/_su tsi gA traH/_mr-i du gA traH/_bi shud+d+ha gA traH/_pa ri pUr+N+Na byany+dza naH/_pr-i thu tsA ru maN+Dal gA traH/_
[\[8a.6\]]phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang /_mdzes par gshegs pa/_mi g.yo bar gshegs pa/_sku 'khril bag chags pa/_sku byi dor byas pa lta bu/_sku rim par 'tsham pa/_sku gtsang ba/_sku 'jam pa/_sku rnam par dag pa/_mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa/_sku kho lag yangs shing bzang ba/_
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]sa ma kra maH/_su ku mA ra gA traH/_a dI na gA traH/_ut+sad gA traH/_su saM ha ta gA traH/_su bi b+hak+tAM ga pra t+yaM gaH/_bi ti mi ra bi shud+d+hA lo kaH/_br-it+ta ku k+ShiH/_mr-iSh+TA ku k+ShiH/_a b+hug+na ku k+ShiH/_k+ShA mo da raH/_gaM b+hI ra nA b+hiH/_pra dak+Shi
[\[8b.2\]]gom pa snyoms pa/_sku shin tu gzhon mdog can/_sku zhum pa med pa/_sku rgyas pa/_sku shin tu grims pa/_yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes ba/_gzigs pa rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa/_dku zlum pa/_dku skabs phyin pa/_dku ma rnyongs pa/_phyal phyang nge ba/_lte ba zab pa/_lte ba g.yas
[\[8b.3\]]NA bar+t+ta nA b+hiH/_sa man+ta prA sA di kaH/_shu tsi sa mA tsA raH/_bya pa ga ta ti la ka kA la gA traH/_tu la sa dr-i sha su ku mA ra pA NiH/_snig+d+ha pA Ni le khaH/_gaM b+hI ra pA Ni le khaH/_A ya ta pA Ni le khaH/_nA t+yA ya ta ba da naH/_bim+pa pra ti bim+pa daR+sha na ba da naH/_mr-i du
[\[8b.4\]]phyogs su 'khyil ba/_kun nas mdzes pa/_kun spyod gtsang ba/_sku la sme ba dang gnag bag med pa/_phyag shing bal ltar shin tu 'jam pa/_phyag gi ri mo mdangs yod pa/_phyag gi ri mo zab pa/_phyag gi ri mo ring ba/_zhal ha cang yang mi ring ba/_zhal la gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba/_ljags
[\[8b.5\]]dzi hwaH/_ta nu dzi hwaH/_rak+tadzi hwaH/_ga dza gardzi ta dzI mU ta g+ho ShaH/_ma d+hu ra tsA ru many+dzu swa raH/_br-it+ta daM Sh+TA/_tIk+Sh+Na daM Sh+TA/_shukla daM Sh+TA/_sa ma daM Sh+TA/_u nu pUrba daM Sh+TA/_tuM ga nA saH/_shu tsi nA saH/_bi shud+d+ha ne traH/_

[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]bi shA la ne traH/_tsi ta pak+Sh+mA/_si tA si ta ka ma la dal sa ka la na ya naH/_A ya ta b+h+rUH/_sh+lak+Sh+Na b+h+rUH/_sa ma ro ma b+h+rUH/_snig+d+ha b+h+rUH/_pI nA ya ta kar+N+NaH/_sa ma kar+N+NaH/_a nu ba ha ta kar+N+Nen+d+ri yaH/_su pa ri Na
[\[9a.2\]]spyan yangs pa/_rdzi ma stug pa/_spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma rangs pa lta bu/_smin tshugs ring ba/_smin ma 'jam pa/_smin ma'i spu mnyam pa/_smin ma snum pa/_snyan shal stug cing ring ba/_snyan mnyam pa/_snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa/_dpral ba legs
[\[9a.3\]]ta la lA TaH/_pr-i thu la lA TaH/_su pa ri pUr+N+Not+ta mAM gaH/_b+h+ra ma ra sa dr-i sha ke shaH/_tsi ta ke shaH/_sh+lak+Sh+Na ke shaH/_a saM lu li ta ke shaH/_a pa ru Sha ke shaH/_su ra b+hi ke shaH/_shrI bat+sa swasti ka nan+d+yA bar+t+ta la li ta pA Ni pA daH/_bar+d+ha mA naH/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[9a.4\]]par 'byes pa/_dpral ba dbyes che ba/_dbu shin tu rgyas pa/_dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag pa/_dbu skra stug pa/_dbu skra 'jam pa/_dbu skra ma 'dzings pa/_dbu skra mi gshor ba/_dbu skra dri zhim pa/_phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang bkra shis dang g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa/_sdong ris/_
[\[9a.5\]]pa'i che ba mdo sde las byung ba'i ming la/_su bi shud+d+ha bud+d+hiH/_a dwa ya sa mu dA tsA raH/_a lak+Sha Na d+har+m+ma pa rA ya NaH/_bud+d+ha bi hA re Na bi ha raM/_sar+b+ba bud+d+ha sa ma tA prA p+taH/_a nA ba ra Na ga tiM ga taH/_a pra t+yu dA bar+t+yad+har+m+maH/_
