[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]a saM haR+Ya go tsa raH/_a tsin+t+ya bya bas+thA na/_t+r+ya d+h+wa sa ma tA ni r+YA taH/_sarba lo ka d+hA tu pra b+hU ta kA yaH/_sarba d+har+m+ma niH saM sha ya dz+nyA naH/_sarba tsaR+YA sa ma n+bA ga ta bud+d+hiH/_niSh+kAM k+Sho d+har+m+ma dz+nyA ne/_
[\[9b.2\]]spyod yul gyis mi 'phrog pa/_rnam par gzhag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_dus gsum mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa/_sku 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa/_chos thams cad la the tshom med pa'i ye shes mnga' ba/_blo spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa/_chos mkhyen pa la nem nur med pa/_
[\[9b.3\]]a bi kalpi ta sha rI raMH/_sarba bo d+hi satwa saM pra tIts+tsha dz+nyA naH/_a dwa ya bud+d+ha bi hA ra pa ra ma pA ra mi ta prAp+taH/_a saM b+hin+na ta thA ga ta bi mo k+Sha dz+nyA na niSh+ThA ga taH/_a nan+ta ma d+h+ya
[\[9b.4\]]rnam par ma brtag pa'i sku mnga' ba/_ye shes byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par mnos pa/_sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa brnyes pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa'i rnam par mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/_mtha' dang dbus med pa'i
[\[9b.5\]]bud+d+ha b+hU mi sa ma tA d+hi ga taH/_d+har+m+ma d+hA tu paR+Yan+taH/_A kA sha d+hA tu paR+Ya ba sA naH/_a pa rAn+ta ko Ti niSh+ThaH/_ni Sh+yan+daHsa ta thA ga taHpu N+yA nAM/_a bi pra NA shaH ku sha la mU lA nAM/_a laM kr-i taHk+ShAn+t+yA/_A la yaHpu N+ya ni
[\[9b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyi gtugs pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa de bsod nams dag gi rgyu mthun pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams chud mi za ba/_bzod pas brgyan pa/_bsod nams kyi gter
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]d+hA nAnAM/_tsi tri to\u0f85nu byany+dza naiH/_ku su mi to lak+Sha NaiH/_pra tI rU po go tsa re Na/_sa pra ti kU lo daR+sha ni na/_a b+hi ra tiH shrAd+d+hA d+hi muk+tA nAM/_an b+hi b+hU taHpra dz+nya yA/_a na ba mard nI yo ba laiH/_shAstA
[\[10a.2\]]rnams kyi gzhi/_dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis spras pa/_mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pa/_spyod yul ran par mthun pa/_mthong na mi mthun pa med pa/_dad pas mos pa rnams mngon par dga' ba/_shes rab zil gyis mi non pa/_stobs rnams la rdzi ba med pa/_sems can
[\[10a.3\]]sarba satwA nAM/_pi tA bo d+hi satwA nAM/_rA dzA A r+YA pung+ga lA nAM/_sAr+thA bA ha A di karmi kA nAM/_a pra me yo dz+nyA ne na/_a nan+taHpra ti b+hA ni na/_bi shud+d+has+s+wa re Na/_/sA swA da nI yo g+ho She Na/_a se tsa na ko rU pe Na/_a pra ti sa maHkA
[\[10a.4\]]thams cad kyi ston pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/_'phags pa'i gang zag rnams kyi rgyal po/_las dang po pa rnams kyi ded dpon/_ye shes dpag tu med pa/_spongs pa mtha' yas pa/_gsung rnam par dag pa/_dbyangs snyan pa/_sku byad lta bas chog mi shes pa/_sku mtshungs pa
[\[10a.5\]]ye na/_a lip+taH kA maiH/_a nu pa lip+to rU paiH/_a saM sr-iSh+Ta A rU pyaiH/_bi pra muk+taHskan+d+he b+h+yaH/_bi saM yuk+to d+hA tu b+hiH/_saM br-it+ta A ya ta naiH/_prats+tshin+no gran+thaiH/_bi muk+taHba ri dA g+haiH/_pa ri
[\[10a.6\]]med pa/_'dod pa dag gis mgos pa/_gzugs dag gis nye bar mgos pa/_gzugs med pa dag dang ma 'dres pa/_phung po dag las rab tu rnam par grol ba/_khams rnams dang mi ldan pa/_skye mched rnams bsdams pa/_mdud pa rnams shin tu bcad pa/_yongs su gdung ba dag las rnam par grol ba/_
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]muk+ta tr-iSh+Na yA/_au g+hA dut+tIr+N+NaH_pa ri pUr+N+No dz+nyA ne na/_pra tiSh+Thi to\u0f85 tI tA nA ga ta pra t+yut+pan+nAM bud+d+hA nAM b+ha ga ba tAM dz+nyA ne/_a pra tiSh+Thi to nirbA Ne/_s+thi to b+hU ta ko T+yAM/_s+thi taHsarba sa twol+lo ka nI
[\[10b.2\]]sred pa las yongs su grol ba/_chu bo las brgal ba/_ye shes yongs su rdzogs pa/_'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes la gnas pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa/_yang dag pa nyid kyi mtha' la gnas pa/_sems can thams cad la
[\[10b.3\]]yA yAM b+hU mau/_a nan+ta shi Sh+ya ga Na su bi nI taH/_sarba satwA sha ya su bi d+hi dz+nyAH/_a nA b+ho ga bud+d+ha kAR+Ya pra ti pra srab+d+haH/_muk+to muk+ta ba ri bA raH/_pA ra ga taH/_s+tha la ga taH
[\[10b.4\]]gzigs pa'i sa la bzhugs pa/_slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs mnga' ba/_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa legs par bsgrub pa shes pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa/_skam la phyi nang /_
[\[10b.5\]]tIr+N+NaH/_tA ra kaH/_A shwastaH/_sho tri yaH/_b+hin+na kle shaH/_bA hi ta pA ba d+har+m+mA/_be da kaH/_bi nI ba ra NaH/_bi pra san+na ma naH/_Sha DaM ga sa ma n+wA ga taH/_a na nu rod+d+ha bi rod+d+ha bi bra muk+taH/_pra Nan+ta pra t+ya ka sa t+yaiH/_sa mut+s+r-iSh+Tai Sha NaH/_
[\[10b.6\]]brgal ba/_sgrol ba po/_dbugs 'byin pa/_bram ze gtsang sbra can/_nyon mongs pa bcom pa/_sdig pa bsal ba'i chos can/_rig pa po/_sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba/_yid rnam par dang ba/_yan lag drug dang ldan pa/_bsnyen bsring dang bral ba/_so so'i bden pa bstsal ba/_btsal ba spangs pa/_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]e ka rak+ShaH/_smr-i ti dau bA ri ka sam+pan+naH/_tsa tu rA prA shra ya NaH/_par+Ya ba si tAr+thaH/_b+hA bi tAt+mA/_a pa ga ta shA khA pa tra pa lA sha pra pA Ti kA twa g+palguH/_a nA pi la saM
[\[11a.2\]]bsrung ba gcig pa/_dran pa'i sgo bsrungs phun sum tshogs pa/_rten pa bzhi dang ldan pa/_don gyi mthar gtugs pa/_bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid can nam bdag nyid sgom pa/_yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma dang 'khri shing dang shun pags kyi skyon dang bral ba/_kun du rtog pa'i rnyog
[\[11a.3\]]kalpaH/_pra srab+d+ha kA ya saM skA raH/_a pra mA Na ga ta bud+d+ha mA hAt+m+yaH/_a pra tiSh+Tha d+h+yAn bar+t+ta nI/_ka la prAp+to bud+d+hot+pA daH/_mAr+g+ga pa ri NA ya kaH/_mAr+g+ga dz+nyaH/_mAr+g+ga bi tra/_mAr+g+ga dai shi kaH/_mAr+g+ga khyA yI/_/dbyangs kyi yan lag drug cu'i ming la/_
[\[11a.4\]]pa med pa/_lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid tshad med pa brnyes pa/_bsam gtan gyi 'jug pa la gnas pa mi mnga' ba/_dus la bab par sangs rgyas 'byung ba/_lam yongs su 'dren pa/_lam thugs su chud pa/_lam mkhyen pa/_lam ston pa/_lam gsung ba/_
[\[11a.5\]]tsit+toD+D+hi l+ya ka rI/_snig+d+hA/_mr-i du kA/_ma no dz+nyA/_ma no ra mA/_shud+d+hA/_bi ma lA/_pra b+hA swa rA/_balguH/_shra bA NI yA/_a ne lA/_ka lA/_bi nI tA/_a karka shA/_a pa ru ShA/_su bi nI tA/_kar+N+Na su khA/_kA ya pra h+la dA na ka rI/_tsit+tod+d+hi l+ya ka rI/_hr-i da
[\[11a.6\]]sems tshim par byed pa/_mnyen pa/_'jam pa/_yid du 'ong ba/_yid du 'thad pa/_dag pa/_dri ma med pa/_gsal dbyangs/_snyen cing 'jebs pa/_mnyan par 'os pa/_mi tshugs pa/_snyan pa/_dul ba/_mi rtsub pa/_mi brlang ba/_rab tu dul ba/_rna bar snyan pa/_lus sim par byed pa/_sems tshim par byed pa/_snying
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]ya san+tuSh+Ti ka rI/_prI ti su kha dzAn nI/_niSh+pa ri dA hA/_A dz+nye yA/_bi dz+nye yA/_biSh+paSh+TA/_pre ma NI yA/_a b+hi nan+da nI yA/_A dz+nyA ba nI yA/_bi dz+nyA pa nI ya/_yuk+tA sa hi tA/_bun ruk+ta doSha dza hA/_siM ha swa ra be gA/_nA ga swa ra
[\[11b.2\]]dga' bar byed pa/_dga' ba dang bde ba bskyed pa/_yongs su gdung ba med pa/_kun du shes par bya ba/_rnam par rig par bya ba/_rnam par gsal ba/_dga' bar byed pa/_mngon par dga' bar byed pa/_kun shes par byed pa/_rnam par rig par byed pa/_rigs pa 'brel ba/_zlos pa'i skyon med pa/_seng ge'i sgra shugs/_glang po che'i
[\[11b.3\]]shab+dA/_me g+ha swa ra g+ho ShA/_nA gen+d+ra ru tA/_gan+d+har+b+b+ha saM gI ti g+ho ShA/_ka la biM ka swa ra ru tA/_bra h+ma swa ra ru ta ra bi tA/_dzI baM dzI ba ka swar ru ta ra bi tA/_de ben+d+ra mad+d+hu ra nir+g+ho ShA/_dun+du b+hi swa rA/_a nun+na tA/_a na ba na tA/_sarba shab+dA nu pra biSh+TA/_
[\[11b.4\]]sgra skad/_'brug gi sgra skad/_klu yi dbang po'i sgra/_dri za'i glu dbyangs/_ka la ping ka'i dbyangs/_tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/_shang shang te'u'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/_lha'i dbang po'i dbyangs ltar snyan pa/_rnga'i sgra/_ma khengs pa/_mi dma' ba/_sgra thams cad kyi rjes su zhugs pa/_
[\[11b.5\]]a pa shab+da bi ga tA/_a bi ka lA/_a lI nA/_a dI nA/_pra mu di tA/_pra sr-i tA/_sa khi lA/_sa ri tA/_la li tA/_sarba swa ra pU ra NA/_sarben+d+ri ya san+to ShaNI/_a nin+di tA/_a tsany+tsa lA/_a tsa pa lA/_sarba paR+Sha da nu ra bitA/_sarbA kA ra ba ro pe tA/_/
[\[11b.6\]]tshig zur chag med pa/_ma tshang ba med pa/_ma zhum pa/_mi zhan pa/_rab tu dga' ba/_khyab pa/_chub pa/_rgyun chags pa/_'bel ba/_sgra thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/_dbang po thams cad tshim par byed pa/_ma smad pa/_mi 'gyur ba/_ma rtabs pa/_'khor kun du grags pa/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/_
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang nas 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming la/_shU raM ga mo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_rat+na mu drA nA ma sa mAd+hiH/_su tsan+d+ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_siM ha bi krI Di to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_tsan+d+ra d+h+wa dza ke turnA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+mong+ga to
[\[12a.2\]]dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad las shin tu
[\[12a.3\]]nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+ma mu drA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi lo ki ta mUr+d+ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_d+har+m+ma d+hA tu ni ya to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ni ya to d+h+wa dza ke tu nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_badzro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+ma
[\[12a.4\]]'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad
[\[12a.5\]]pra be sha mu drA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sa mA d+hi rA dza su pra tiSh+Thi to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_rasmi pra muk+to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ba la byu ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sa mung+ga to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ni ruk+ti ni ya ta pra be sho nA
[\[12a.6\]]la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]mas mA d+hiH/_a d+hi ba tsa na pra be sho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_dig+di lo ki to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_A d+hA ra mu drA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a saM pra mo Sho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+mas ma ba sha ra Na sA ga ra mu drA nA ma
[\[12b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_phyogs la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya
[\[12b.3\]]sa mA d+hiH/_A kA sha s+pha ra No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_badzra maN+Da lo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_in+d+ra ke tu nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sro to\u0f85nu ga tA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_siM ha bi dzriM b+hi to nA
[\[12b.4\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa
[\[12b.5\]]ma sa mA d+hiH/_bya t+yasto nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ra Na dza ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bai ro tsa no nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a ni mi Sho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a ni ke ta s+thi to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_nish+tsit+to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi ma la pra dI po nA ma
[\[12b.6\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_gnas la brten med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sa mA d+hiH/_a nan+ta pra b+ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_pra d+hA ka ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_shud+d+ha sA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi ma la pra b+ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ra ti ka ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi d+yu ta pra dI po nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_
[\[13a.2\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_
[\[13a.3\]]a k+Sha yo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a dze yo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_te dzo ba tI nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_k+Sha yA pa ga to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_tsan+d+ra bi ma lo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sUr+Ya pra dI po nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a bai bar+t+to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a niM dz+yo
[\[13a.4\]]zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_gzi brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mi g.yo
[\[13a.5\]]nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_pradz+nyA pra dI po nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_shud+d+ha pra ti b+hA so nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_A lo ka ka ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_kA ra kA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_dz+nyA na ke turnA ma sa mA d+hiH/_badzro pa mo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_tsit+ta s+thi to nA ma
[\[13a.6\]]ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_sems gnas pa zhes bya
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]sa mA d+hiH/_sa man+tA lo ko nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_su pra tiSh+Thi to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_rat+na ko Ti rnA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ba ra d+har+m+ma mu drA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+ma sa ma tA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ra ti dza ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_d+har+m+mong+ga to nA ma
[\[13b.2\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_kun du snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos kyi 'phags pa zhes
[\[13b.3\]]sa mA d+hiH/_bi ki ra No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+ma pa da pra b+he do nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sa mA k+Sha rA ba kA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a k+Sha rA pa ga to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_A ram+ba Nats+tshed no nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a bi kA ro nA
[\[13b.4\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam pa med pa zhes bya
[\[13b.5\]]ma sa mA d+hiH/_a pra kA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_nA ma ni ya ta pra be+e sho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a ni ke ta tsA rI nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ti mi rA pa ga to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_tsA ri tra ba tI nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a tsa lo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi Sha ya
[\[13b.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yul las
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]tIr+N+No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba gu Na sany+tsa ya ga to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_s+thi ta nish+tsit+to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_shu b+ha puSh+pi ta shud+d+hirnA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a nan+ta pra ti b+hA no nA ma sa mA
[\[14a.2\]]brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
[\[14a.3\]]d+hiH/_bo d+h+yaM ga ba tI nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a sa ma sa mA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba d+har+m+mA ti kra ma No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_pa rits+tshe da ka ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi ma ti bi ki ra No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ni ra ba d+hiSh+ThA
[\[14a.4\]]'dzin/_byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_gnas su bya ba
[\[14a.5\]]no nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_e ka byU ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_A kA rA b+hi ni hA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_e kA kA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_A kA rA na ba kA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_nairbe d+hi ka sarba b+ha ba ta mo pa ga to nA ma
[\[14a.6\]]med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam par mngon par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]sa mA d+hiH/_saM ke ta ru ta pra be sho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_nir+g+ho ShA k+Sha ra bi muk+to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_dz+wa la nolka nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_lak+Sha Na pa ri sho d+ha no nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a na b+hi lak+Shi to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarbA
[\[14b.2\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam
[\[14b.3\]]kA ra pa ro pe to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a k+Sha ya ka raN+Do nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_d+hA ra NI ma tirnA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sa myak+t+wa mi th+yA twa sarba saM gra sa no nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarba ro d+ha bi ro d+ha saM pra sha ma no nA ma sa
[\[14b.4\]]pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes
[\[14b.5\]]mA d+hiH/_sarba su kha duHkha ni ra b+hi nan+di nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a nu ro d+ha pra ti ro d+ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi ma la pra b+ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sA ra ba tI nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_pa ri pUr+N+Na tsan+d+ra bi ma la pra b+ho nA
[\[14b.6\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_mthun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]ma sa mA d+hiH/_bi d+yut+p+ra b+ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ma hA byu ho nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sarbA kA ra pra b+hA kA ro nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_sa mA d+hi sa ma tA nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a ra dzo bi ra dzo na ya yuk+to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_
[\[15a.2\]]nge 'dzin/_glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_
[\[15a.3\]]a ra Na sa ma ba sa ra No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a ra Na sa ra Na sar+b+ba sa ma ba sa ra No nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_a ni laM b+ha ni ke ta ni ka to nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_ta tha tA s+thi ta nish+tsit+to nA ma sa
[\[15a.4\]]nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nyon mongs pa med pa dang nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_gnas la brten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya
[\[15a.5\]]mA d+hiH/_kA ya ka li saM pra mar+tha no nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_bAk+ka laM bi d+h+waM sa na ga ga na kalpo nA ma sa mA d+hiH/_A kA shA saM ga bi muk+ti ni ru pa le po nA ma sa mA d+hiH//_byang chub sems dpa' spyi'i mtshan la sogs pa'i ming la/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[15a.6\]]ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin/_/
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]spyi'i mtshan la/_bo d+hi satwaH/_ma hA satwaH/_d+hI mAna?/_ut+ta ma d+yu tiH/_dzi na pu traH/_dzi nA d+hA raH/_bi dze tA/_dzi nAM ku raH/_bi krAn+taH/_pa ra mA r+YaH/_sAr+tha bA haH/_ma hA ya shAH/_kr-i pA luH/_ma hA puN+yaH/_I shwa raH/_
[\[15b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'/_sems dpa' chen po/_/blo ldan/_gsal mchog_/rgyal ba'i sras/_rgyal ba'i gzhi/_rnam par rgyal byed/_rgyal ba'i myu gu/_rtsal ldan/_'phags mchog ded dpon/_grags chen/_snying rje can/_bsod nams che/_dbang phyug_/
[\[15b.3\]]d+har+m+mi kaH/_dze no ra saH/_d+har+m+ma to nirga taH/_nirdzi taH/_mu kha to dzA taH/_byang chub sems dpa' so so'i mtshan la/_a ba lo ki te shwa raH/_mai tre yaH/_A kA sha gar+b+haH/_sa man+ta b+ha draH/_badzra pA NiH/_many+dzu shrI ku mA ra b+hU taH/_sarba ni ba ra Na
[\[15b.4\]]chos dang ldan pa/_rgyal ba'i thugs kyi sras/_chos las byung ba/_nges par rgyal ba/_zhal nas skyes pa/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug_/byams pa/_nam mkha'i snying po/_/kun du bzang po/_lag na rdo rje/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/_sgrib pa thams cad rnam
[\[15b.5\]]biskam+b+hiH/_k+Shi ti gar+b+haH/_ma hA s+thA ma prAp+taH/_rat+na ke tuH/_rat+na pA NiH/_rat+na mu drA hastaH/_rat+na mu ku TaH/_rat+na tsU DaH/_rat+na ku TaH/_rat+nA ka raH/_rat+na shi kha raH/_rat+na d+h+wa dzaH/_badzra gar+b+haH/_su bar+N+Na
[\[15b.6\]]par sel ba/_sa'i snying po/_mthu chen thob/_rin po che'i tog lag na rin chen/_lag na phyag rgya rin po che/_cod pan rin po che/_gtsug na rin po che/_rin chen brtseg pa/_dkon mchog 'byung gnas/_rin po che'i rtse mo/_rin chen rgyal mtshan/_rdo rje'i snying po/_gser gyi
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]gar+b+haH/_rat+na gar+b+haH/_shrI gar+b+haH/_shu b+ha gar+b+haH/_shu b+ha bi ma la gar+b+haH/_ta thA ga ta gar+b+haH/_dz+nyA na gar+b+haH/_sUR+Ya gar+b+haH/_sa mA d+hi gar+b+haH/_pad+ma gar+b+haH/_bi muk+ti tsan+d+raH/_sa man+ta ni traH/_
[\[16a.2\]]snying po/_rin po che'i snying po/_dpal gyi snying po/_dge ba'i snying po/_dge ba dri ma med pa'i snying po/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po/_ye shes kyi snying po/_nyi ma'i snying po/_ting nge 'dzin gyi snying po/_pad+ma'i snying po/_rnam par grol ba'i zla ba/_kun du mig_/
[\[16a.3\]]pad+ma ne traH/_bi ma la ne traH/_bi shA la ne traH/_sa man+teR+YA pa thaH/_sa man+ta prA sA di kaH/_dz+nyA na ba tIH/_sa man+ta tsA ri tra ma tiH/_dza ya ma tiH/_siM ha bi krI Di taH/_ma hA g+ho Sha swa ra rA dzA/_siM ha nA da nA diH/_gaM b+hI ra g+ho Sha swa nA di taH/_a nu pa
[\[16a.4\]]pad+ma'i mig_/dri ma med pa'i mig_/yangs pa'i mig_/kun du spyod lam/_kun nas mdzes/_ye shes ldan pa/_kun du spyod pa'i blo gros/_rgyal ba'i blo gros/_seng ge rnam par rol pa/_sgra chen po'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po/_/seng ge'i sgra sgrogs/_zab mo'i dbyangs kyi nga ro sgrogs pa/_gos
[\[16a.5\]]lip+taH/_sarba ma lA pa ga taH/_tsan+d+ra pra b+haH/_sUr+Ya pra b+haH/_dz+nyA na pra b+haH/_b+ha dra pA laH/_me ru shi kha ra d+hA ra ku mA ra b+hU taH/_ba ru Na ma ti ku mA ra b+hU taH/_su ma ti ku mA ra b+hU taH/_ni t+yo d+yuk+taH/_su sAr+tha bA haH/_dz+yo tiSh+ma ti ku mA ra b+hU taH/_dur+d+haR+Sha
[\[16a.6\]]pa med pa/_dri ma kun dang bral ba/_zla 'od/_nyi ma'i 'od/_ye shes 'od/_bzang skyong /_lhun po rtse 'dzin gzhon nur gyur pa/_chu lha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa/_bzang po'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa/_rtag tu brtson/_ded dpon bzang po/_'od can gzhon nur gyur ba/_thub dka'
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]ku mA rab+hU taH/_ga ga na gany+dzaH/_shU raM ga maH/_a k+Sha ya ma tiH/_pra ti b+hA na ku TaH/_gan+d+ha ha stiH/_dzA li nI pra b+haH/_bar+d+d+ha mA na ma tiH/_sa man+ta bra b+haH/_A di t+ya gar+b+haH/_sarba bi Sha yA ba b+hA sA laM kA ra pra ti b+hA na daR+sha na gar+b+haH/_
[\[16b.2\]]gzhon nur gyur pa/_nam mkha' mdzod/_dpa' bar 'gro ba/_blo gros mi zad pa/_spobs pa brtsegs pa/_spos kyi glang po/_dra ba can gyi 'od/_'phel ba'i blo gros/_kun du 'od/_sUr+ya dang ma 'dom na nyi ma'i snying po 'od ma na nyi gdugs snying po/_yul thams cad snang ba'i rgyan spobs pas ston pa'i snying
[\[16b.3\]]a ma la gar+b+haH/_bi ma la gar+b+haH/_dz+yo ti dz+wa la nAr+ts+tsi shrI gar+b+haH/_badzra sA raH/_ni t+ya pra b+haH/_A shug+gan+d+haH/_gu ha gup+taH/_a mo g+ha daR+shI/_su saM pros+thi taH/_a ni k+Ship+ta d+hu raH/_a nu pa ha ta ma tiH/_ni t+yot+k+Ship+ta hastaH/_
[\[16b.4\]]po/_dri ma med pa'i snying po/_dri ma dang bral ba'i snying po/_'od 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i dpal gyi snying po/_rdo rje snying po/_rtag tu 'od/_dri mgyogs/_phug sbas/_mthong ba don yod/_legs par yang dag bzhugs/_brtson pa mi gtong /_blo gros ma nyams pa/_rtag tu lag brkyang /_
[\[16b.5\]]na dI dat+tA/_bi dza ya bi krA mI/_dza ya dat+taH/_bi ga ta sho kaH/_b+ha dra kalpi ka bo d+hi satwaH/_a n+ye tsa ma ho dzaska bo d+hi satwaH/_dza ga tin+d+ha raH/_dz+yo tiH pra b+haH/_e ka kAn+ta rA dzA/_b+hU mi ba la bai shA ra d+ya
[\[16b.6\]]chu bo byin/_rnam par rgyal bar gnon pa/_rgyal bas byin/_mya ngan bral/_bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid che ba gzhan dag kyang /_'gro ba 'dzin/_skar ma'i 'od dam me'i 'od/_gcig tu mdzes pa'i rgyal po/_/sa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]d+hA ri/_su tsan+d+raH/_a pa rA dzi ta te dzaH/_a tsin+ti ka ma d+h+ya bud+d+hi bi krI Di taH/_dz+nyA na bi b+hU ti gar+b+haH/_bud+d+ha badzra san+d+hA ra Na san+d+hiH/_/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming la/_rat+na sa mung+ga taH/_su pra tiSh+ThaH/_a kam+b+yaH/_a/_
[\[17a.2\]]'chang ba/_zla mdzes/_gzi brjid gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil la blos rnam par rol ba/_ye shes 'byor pa'i snying po/_sangs rgyas kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mtshams sbyor ba/_rin chen kun du 'phags/_shin tu gnas pa/_mi bskul pa/_phyir
[\[17a.3\]]bi ni bar+t+ta nI yaH/_rat+nA ka raH/_sUR+Ya pra b+ha te dzaH/_sarbAr+tha sid+d+haH/_dz+nyA nolkaH/_pra t+yut+pan+na bud+d+haHsaM mu khAbas+thi taH/_/byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs bcu gnyis kyi ming la/_a b+hi She tsa ba tIH bi shud+d+ha swa ra ni g+ho ShA/_a k+Sha ya ka raN+DA/_a nan+tA bar+t+tA/_sA ga ra mu drA/_
[\[17a.4\]]mi ldog pa/_dkon mchog 'byung gnas/_nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid/_don thams cad grub pa/_ye shes sgron ma/_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum bzhugs pa/_dbang bskur ldan/_sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa/_mi zad pa'i za ma tog_/'khyil pa mtha' yas pa/_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya/_
[\[17a.5\]]pad+ma byU hA/_a saM ga mu kha pra be shA/_pra ti saM bin+nish+tsa yA ba tA rA/_bud+d+hA laM kA rA d+hiSh+Thi tA/_a nan+ta bar+N+NA/_bud+d+ha kA ya bar+N+Na pa ri niSh+pa t+yA b+hi nir+hA rA/_/byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i ming la/_A sha ya ba laM/_a d+h+yA sha ya ba laM/_
[\[17a.6\]]pad+ma bkod pa/_chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa nges pa la 'jug pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan byin gyis brlabs pa/_kha dog mtha' yas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa mngon par bsgrub pa/_bsam pa'i stobs/_lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs/
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]pra yo ga ba laM/_dz+nyA na ba laM/_pra Ni d+hA na ba laM/_yA na ba laM/_tsar+Ya ba laM/_bi kur+b+baN ba laM/_bo d+hi ba laM/_d+harma tsakra pra bar+t+ta na ba laM/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu'i ming la/_A yurba shi tA/_tsit+ta ba shi tA/_pa riskA ra ba shi tA/_kar+m+ma ba shi tA/_u pa
[\[17b.2\]]sbyor ba'i stobs/_ye shes kyi stobs/_smon lam gyi stobs/_theg pa'i stobs/_spyod pa'i stobs/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i stobs/_byang chub kyi stobs/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i stobs/_tshe la dbang ba/_sems la dbang ba/_yo byad la dbang ba/_las la dbang ba/_skye ba la
[\[17b.3\]]pat+ti ba shi tA/_a d+hi muk+ti ba shi tA/_d+har+m+ma ba shi tA/_pra Ni d+hA na ba shi tA/_r-id+d+hi ba shi tA/_dz+nyA na ba shi tA/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i ming la/_d+hA ra NI shru tong+g+ra ha NAr+tha ni rde sha bai shA ra d+yaM/_nai rat+m+yA d+hi ga mAt+pa ra bi he Tha nA ni mit+ta sa mu dA tsA ra sa ha dzA na d+hi
[\[17b.4\]]dbang pa/_mos pa la dbang ba/_chos la dbang ba/_smon lam la dbang ba/_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba/_ye shes la dbang ba/_gzungs kyi thos pa 'dzin cing don bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa/_bdag med pa khong du chud pas gzhan gyis gtse ba'i mtshan ma mi 'byung zhing rang bzhin gyis spyod
[\[17b.5\]]gi teR+YA pa tha tri kar+m+ma/_pa ri shud+d+ha ma hA rak+Sha saM pan+na bai shA rad+yaM/_sa dota gr-i hi ta d+harmA bi sma ra Na pra dz+nyo pA ya niSh+ThA ga ta satwa nistA ra Na pra sA da san+daR+sha na shu b+hA nan+ta rA yi ka bai shA ra d+yaM/_sarba dz+nyA tA tsit+tA saM
[\[17b.6\]]lam smad du med pa'i las gsum yongs su dag pa'i bsrung ba chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i mi 'jigs pa/_chos gzung ba yun du mi brjed pa dang thabs dang shes rab mthar phyin pas sems can sgrol zhing dad pa ston pa dang dge ba'i bar chad du mi 'gyur ba'i mi 'jigs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]pra mo ShA n+ya yA nA niR+YA Na saM pUr+Na ba si tA sarba bra kA ra satwAr+tha saM prA pa Na bai shA ra d+yaM/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ming la/_a nu pa diSh+Ta dA nAH/_a nu pa diSh+Ta shI lAH/_a nu pa diSh+Ta
[\[18a.2\]]sems ma nyams shing theg pa gzhan gyis mi 'byung bar dbang yongs su rdzogs pa dang sems can gyi don rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par thob par bya ba la mi 'jigs pa/_ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa can rnams/_ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims can rnams/_ma bstan pa'i bzod
[\[18a.3\]]k+ShAn+ta yaH/_a nu pa diSh+Ta bIR+YAH/_a nu pa diSh+Ta d+h+yA nAH/_a nu pa diSh+Ta pra dz+nyAH/_saM gra ha bstu sarba satwa saM grA ha kAH/_pa ri NA ma na bi d+hi dz+nyAH/_u pA ya kau sha l+ya sarba satwa tsa ri tA
[\[18a.4\]]pa can rnams/_ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus can rnams/_ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan can rnams/_ma bstan pa'i shes rab can rnams/_bsdu ba'i dngos pos sems can thams cad sdud pa can rnams/_yongs su bsngo ba'i cho ga shes pa rnams/_thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod
[\[18a.5\]]ba shi ta pa ra ma yA na niR+YA Na san+daR+sha kAH/_ma hA yA nA ts+yu tAH/_saM sA ra ni rbA Na mu kha san+daR+sha kAH/_ya ma ka bya t+yastA hA ra ku sha lAH/_dz+nyA na bUrbaM ga ma nA b+hi saM skA ra nir ba d+yaM sarba dzan+mA b+hi mu kha bra
[\[18a.6\]]ba'i dbang gis theg pa'i mchog gis 'byung ba rnams/_theg pa chen po las ma nyams pa rnams/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo ston pa rnams/_zung dang snrel zhi'i rgyud la mkhas pa rnams/_ye shes sngon du 'gro bas mngon par 'du mi byed cing kha na ma tho ba med par tshe rabs thams cad du mngon du
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]br-it+tAH/_da sha ku sha lo pe ta kA ya bAg+man skarmAn+tAH/_sarba duHkha skan+d+ha sa hA nAt+mo pA dA na sarba satwa d+hA twa pa ri t+yA gi naH/_sarba dza gad b+hi ru tsi ta saM daR+sha kAH/_ki ya t+k+r-its+tsha bA
[\[18b.2\]]zhugs pa rnams/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dge ba bcu dang ldan pa rnams/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad bzod pa'i lus len pas sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba rnams/_'gro ba thams cad mngon par dga' bar ston pa rnams/_byis pa dang nyan thos mi
[\[18b.3\]]la shrA bka ma d+h+ya shu b+ha byU ha rat+na kalpa br-ik+Sha dr-i D+ha sarba dz+nya tA tsit+tA saM pra mu Shi tAH/_sarba d+harma paT+TA bad+d+hA b+hi She ka prAp+ti bud+d+ha d+har+m+ma par+Ye Sh+Ti san+daR+sha nA ni br-it+tAH/_/mdo sde las byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thog
[\[18b.4\]]bzad pa ji snyed cig gi nang na yang dge ba mang po'i rin po che'i shing dpag bsam ltar brtan pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems yongs su ma nyams pa rnams/_chos thams cad thabs sbyin pas dbang bskur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal ba bstan pa la phyir mi ldog pa rnams/_
[\[18b.5\]]thog smos pa'i ming la/_e ka dzA ti pra ti bad+d+haH/_sarba dz+nyA tA b+hi mu khaH/_sarba dz+nyA tA ni m+naH/_sarba dz+nyA tA pra ba NaH/_sarba dz+nyA tA prAg+b+hA raH/_a saM ga d+hA ra NI sa mA d+hi pra ti laba? d+haH/_shU raM ga ma sa mA d+hi sa ma n+wA ga taH/_
[\[18b.6\]]skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'bab pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bab pa/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]ma hA b+hi dz+nyA bi kr-I Di taH/_sarbA ba ra Na paR+Yut+thA na bi ga taH/_a pra ti pra srab+d+ha mArgaH/_ma hA mai trI ma hA ka ru NA da sha di glo ka d+hA tu s+pha ra NaH/_a nan+ta bud+d+ha k+She trA kra ma Na ku sha laH/_shU
[\[19a.2\]]mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/_sgrib pa dang chod pa dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/_lam gyi rgyun ma chad pa/_byams pa dang snying rje chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su khyab pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/_stong pa
[\[19a.3\]]n+ya tA go tsa raH/_a ni mit+ta bi hA riH/_sarba pra Ni d+hA na ni shra ya bi ga taH/_sarba satwa hi tA b+h+yu d+ya taH/_sarba bud+d+ha bi Sha ya ku sha laH/_anan+ta dz+nyA naH/_A kA sha sa ma tsit+taH/_sA ga ra bang+gam+b+hI ra tsi t+taH/_su me
[\[19a.4\]]nyid kyi spyod yul ba/_mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa/_smon lam la gnas pa thams cad dang bral ba/_sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa/_sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad la mkhas pa/_ye shes mtha' yas pa/_sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/_sems rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/_sems ri'i
[\[19a.5\]]ru barba ta rA dza ba da kam+p+ya tsit+taH/_pad+ma ba da nu pa lip+ta tsit+taH/_rat+na bat+su pa ri shud+d+ha tsit+taH/_su bar+N+Na bat+su paR+Yab dA ta tsit+taH/_a pa ri mi ta dz+nyA na saM b+hA ra paR+Ye ShaN ku sha laH/_pa ra pra bA d+yan b+hi d+hU taH/_sarba d+harmA nA ba ra Na dz+nyA nI/_
[\[19a.6\]]rgyal po ri rab ltar mi sgul ba/_sems pad+ma ltar mgos pa/_sems rin po che ltar shin tu yongs su dag pa/_sems gser ltar shin tu yongs su byang ba/_ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa yongs su tshol ba la mkhas pa/_pha rol gyi rgol bas zil gyis mi non pa/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes can/_
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]sarba satwa sa ma tsit+taH/_sarba mA ra bi Sha ya sa ma ti krAn+taH/_sarba ta thA ga ta ba Sha yA ba tA ra dz+nyA na ku sha laH/_ma hA mai trI ma hA ka ru NA sa man+bA ga taH/_u bA ya dz+nyA na ku sha laH/_d+hA ra NI pra ti lab+d+haH/_pra Ni b+hA nA kalpi taH/_k+ShAn+ti
[\[19b.2\]]sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/_bdud kyi yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa/_thabs shes pa la mkhas pa/_gzungs thob pa/_smon lam ma brtags pa/_bzod
[\[19b.3\]]sa ma tA pra ti lab+d+haH/_a ts+yu tA b+hi dz+nyaH/_ni rA mi Sha d+harma de sha kaH/_gaM b+hI ra d+harma k+ShAn+ti pA ra miM ga taH/_mA ra kar+m+ma sa ma ti krAn+taH/_karmA ba ra Na pra ti pra srab+d+haH/_d+har+m+ma bra bi tsa ya bi b+hak+ti nirde sha ku sha laH/_a saM
[\[19b.4\]]pas mnyam pa nyid thob pa/_mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa/_zang zing med par chos ston pa/_chos zab mo la bzod pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyun bcad pa/_chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pas rnam par dbye ba bstan pa la mkhas pa/_bskal ba grangs
[\[19b.5\]]khye ya kalpa pra Ni d+hA na su sa mA ram+b+haH/_smi ta mu kha pUrbA b+hi lA piH/_gA thA b+hi gI tA b+hi lA pa naH/_a pa ga ta lI na tsit+taH/_a nAts+tshe d+ya pra ti b+hA naH/_a nan+ta ba ri Sha da b+hi b+ha ba naH/_a nan+ta kalpa ko TI niH/_sa ra Na ku sha laH/_mA yA
[\[19b.6\]]med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/_bzhin 'dzum zhing gsong por smra ba/_tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba/_sems zhum pa med pa/_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/_bskal ba bye ba mtha' yas pa las 'byung ba la mkhas pa/_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]ma rI tsi ko da ka tsan+d+ra swap+na pra ti shrUt+kA pra ti b+hA sa pra ti bim+ba nir+m+mA No pa ma d+har+m+mA d+hi muk+taH/_a pra ti ha ta tsit+taH/_satwa tsit+ta tsa ri ta sU k+Sh+madz+nyA nA d+hi muk+t+ya ba tA ra ku sha laH/_a d+hi mA tra k+ShAn+ti sa ma n+wA ga taH/_ya thAt+m+yA ba tA ra ku sha laH/_
[\[20a.2\]]chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_brag ca dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i chos la mos pa/_sems thogs pa med pa/_sems can kyi sems dang spyod pa shes pa phra mo la mos shing 'jug mkhas pa/_bzod pa chen po dang ldan pa/_bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du 'jug mkhas pa/_
[\[20a.3\]]bud+d+ha k+She tra byU hA nan+ta pra Ni d+hA na pras+thA na pa ri gr-i hI taH/_a saM khye ya lo ka d+hA tu bud+d+hA nu smr-i ti sa mA d+hi sa ta ta sa mi ta a b+hi mu khI b+hU taH/_a pa ri mi ta bud+d+hA d+h+ye Sha Na ku sha laH/_nA nA dr-iSh+T+yA nu sha ya
[\[20a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa mtha' yas par smon pa la 'jug pas yongs su gzung ba/_'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun du mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs mkhas pa/_lta ba tha dad pa dang bag la nyal dang
[\[20a.5\]]par+YA ba s+thA na kle sha pra sha ma na ku sha laH/_sa mA d+hi bi krI Di ta sha ta sa ha sra nir+hA ra ku sha laH/_sarba dz+nya tA ni rlA taH/_trai d+hA tu kA sak+taH/_ga tiM ga taH/_sarbA shA pa ri pU ra kaH/_a pra mA Na sa mA d+hi
[\[20a.6\]]kun nas dkris pa'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par rol ba brgya stong bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung ba/_khams gsum la ma chags pa/_rtogs par khong du chud pa/_re ba thams cad yongs su skong ba/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]sa mA pat+tiHsa ma n+wA ga taH/_a mo g+ha kA ya bAg+mA naskar+m+mAn+tA b+hi yuk+taH/_a pra mA Na sa mA d+hi tsaR+YA d+hiSh+Thi taH/_na pu nar+b+bo d+hi satwa ma hA satwaH kA ma gu Nai rlip+taH/_sarba sa mA d+hi ba shi tA pA ra miM ga taH/_a nu
[\[20b.2\]]'jug pa tshad med pa dang ldan pa/_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' don yod pa la brtson pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod pa tshad med pas byin gyis brlabs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa'i yon tan gyis ma gos pa/_ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang gi pha rol tu son pa/_'jig rten
[\[20b.3\]]pa li p+to lo ka d+harmaiH/_yuk+ta pra ti b+hA naH/_muk+ta pra ti b+hA naH/_mai t+r+yAt+ma kaH/_ka ru NAt+ma kaH/_mu di tA bi hA rI/_u pe k+ShA bi hA rI/_a ts+yu ta shI laH/_a ts+yu tas mA d+hiH/_a b+hi dz+nyA bi krI Di taH/_te tsa bo d+hi satwa ma hA
[\[20b.4\]]gyi chos rnams kyis ma gos pa/_rig par spobs pa/_spobs pa grol ba/_byams pa'i bdag nyid can/_snying rje'i bdag nyid can/_dga' ba la gnas pa/_btang snyoms la gnas pa/_tshul khrims nyams pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin med pa/_mngon par shes pas rnam par rol ba/_byang chub sems dpa' sems
[\[20b.5\]]satwa b+hU yaste na sarba ku mA ra b+hU tAH/_b+ha dra kalpi ka bo d+hi satwaH/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i ming la/_bra mu di tA/_bi ma lA/_pra b+hA kA rI/_artsiSh+ma tI/_su dur+dz+dza yA/_a d+hi mu khI/_dU raM ga mA/_a tsa lA/_sA d+hu ma tI/_d+har+m+ma me g+hA/_/mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i ming la/_a d+hi muk+ti
[\[20b.6\]]dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_bskal ba bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa'/_rab tu dga' ba/_dri ma med pa/_'od byed pa/_'od 'phro can/_shin tu sbyang dka' ba/_mngon du gyur pa/_ring du song ba/_mi g.yo ba/_legs pa'i blo gros/_chos kyi sprin/_mos pa spyod
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]tsaR+YA b+hU miH/_A lo ka lab+d+haH/_A lo ka br-i d+hiH/_ta twAr+thai ka de shA nu pra be shaH/_a nan+tar+Yas mA d+hiH//_mos pas spyod pa'i sa la chos spyod bcu'i ming la/_le kha nA/_bU dza nA/_dA naM/_shra ba NaM/_bA tsa nA/_ung+g+ra ha NaM/_pra kA shanA/_swA d+h+yA yaH/_tsin+ta nA/_
[\[21a.2\]]pa'i sa/_snang ba thob pa/_snang ba mched pa/_de kho na'i don gyi phyogs gcig la rjes su zhugs pa/_bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_yi ger bri ba/_mchod pa/_sbyin pa/_nyan pa/_klog pa/_'dzin pa/_rab tu ston pa/_kha ton byed pa/_sems pa/_
[\[21a.3\]]b+hA ba nA/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i ming la/_dA na pA ra mi tA/_shI la pA ra mi tA/_k+ShAn+ti pA ra mi tA/_bIr+Ya pA ra mi tA/_d+h+yA na pA ra mi tA/_pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_u pA ya bA ra mi tA/_pra Ni d+hA na pA ra mi tA/_ba la pA ra
[\[21a.4\]]sgom pa/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_stobs kyi pha rol
[\[21a.5\]]mi tA/_dz+nyA na pA ra mi tA/_/bsdu ba'i dngos bo bzhi'i ming la/_dA naM/_pri ya bA di tA/_ar+tha tsa r+YA/_sa mA nAr+tha/_/bslab pa gsum gyi ming la/_a d+hi shI laM/_a d+hi tsit+taM/_a d+hi pra dz+nyaM/_/stong pa nyid bco brgyad kyi ming la/_a d+h+yAt+ma shU n+ya tA/_ba hir+d+hA shU n+ya tA/_a d+h+yAt+ma ba hir+d+hA shU n+ya tA/_shU n+ya tA shU n+ya tA/_
[\[21a.6\]]tu phyin pa/_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_sbyin pa/_snyan par smra ba/_don spyod pa/_don mthun pa/_lhag pa'i tshul khrims/_lhag pa'i sems/_lhag pa'i shes rab/_nang stong pa nyid/_phyi stong pa nyid/_phyi nang stong pa nyid/_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid/_
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]ma hA shU n+ya tA/_pa ra mAr+tha shU n+ya tA/_saM skr-i ta shU n+ya tA/_a saM skr-i ta shU n+ya tA/_a t+yan+ta shU n+ya tA/_a na ba rA gra shU n+ya tA/_a na ba kA ra shU n+ya tA/_pra kr-i ti shU n+ya tA/_sarba d+har+m+ma shU n+ya tA/_swa lak+Sha Na shU n+ya tA/_a nu
[\[21b.2\]]chen po stong pa nyid/_don dam pa stong pa nyid/_'dus byas stong pa nyid/_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid/_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid/_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid/_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid/_rang bzhin stong ba nyid/_chos thams cad stong pa nyid/_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/_mi
[\[21b.3\]]pa laM ba shU n+ya tA/_a b+hA ba shU n+ya tA/_swa b+hA ba shU n+ya tA/_a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba shU n+ya tA/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi'i ming la/_kA ya smr-i t+yu bas+thA nam/_be dan smr-i t+yu bas+thA naM/_tsit+ta smr-i t+yu bas+thA naM/_d+har+m+ma smr-i t+yu bas+thA naM/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi'i ming la/_a nut+pa n+nA nAM pA pa kA
[\[21b.4\]]dmigs pa stong pa nyid/_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid/_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid/_lus dran pa nye bar bzhag pa/_tshor ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa/_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
[\[21b.5\]]nA ma ku sha lA nAn+d+har+m+mA NA ma nut+pA dA yats+tshan+daM dzA na ya ti/_ut+pan+nA nAm+pA pa kA nA ma ku sha lA nAM d+har+m+mA NAM pra hA NA yats+tshan+daM dzA na ya ti/_a nu t+pan+nA nAM ku sha lA nAn+d+har+m+mA NA mut+pA dA yats+tshan+daM dzA na ya ti/_ut+pan+nA nAm+ku sha lA nAn+d+har+m+mA NAM s+thi tA ya b+hU yo b+hA ba tA yai a saM pra mo ShA ya pa ri pU ra yets+tshan+daM dzA
[\[21b.6\]]ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams gnas pa dang phyir zhing 'byung ba dang nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang yongs su rdzogs par
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]na ya ti/_/byA yats+tsha te/_bIR+Ya mA ra b+ha te/_tsit+taM pra gr-ih+nA ti/_saM myak+p+ra da d+hA ti/_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba bzhi'i ming la/_ts+tshan+da sa mA d+hi pra hA Na saM skA ra sa mn+wA ga to r-id+d+hi pA daH/_tsit+ta sa mA d+hi pra hA Na saM skA ra sa ma n+wA ga to r-id+d+hi
[\[22a.2\]]bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa skyed do/_/'bad do/_/brtson 'grus rtsom mo/_/sems rab tu 'dzin to/_/yang dag par rab tu 'jog go/_'dun pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/_sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
[\[22a.3\]]pA daH/_bIr+Ya sa mA d+hi pra hA Na saM skA ra sa ma n+wA ga to r-id+d+hi pA daH/_mI mAM sa sa mA d+hi pra hA Na saM skA ra sa ma n+wA ga to r-id+d+hi pA daH/_a nu pa laM b+ha yo ge na b+hA ba ti/_bi be ka ni shri taM/_bi rA ga ni shri taM/_ni ro d+ha ni shri
[\[22a.4\]]'phrul gyi rkang pa/_brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/_dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo/_/dben pa la gnas pa/_'dod chags dang bral ba la gnas pa/_'gog pa la gnas
[\[22a.5\]]taM/_/bya ba sarga pa ri Na taM/_/dbang po lnga'i ming la/_shrad+d+hen+d+ri yaM/_bIr+Ya n+d+ri yaM/_smr-i tIn+d+ri yaM/_sa mA d+hIn+d+ri yaM/_pradz+nyen+d+ri yaM/_/stobs lnga'i ming la/_shrad+d+hA ba laM/_bIr+Ya ba laM/_smr-i ti ba laM/_sa mA d+hi ba laM/_pra dz+nyA ba laM/_/byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi ming la/_smr-i
[\[22a.6\]]pa/_rnam par spong bas yongs su bsgyur ba/_dad pa'i dbang po/_brtson 'grus kyi dbang po/_dran pa'i dbang po/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po/_shes rab kyi dbang po/_dad pa'i dbang po/_brtson 'grus kyi stobs/_dran pa'i stobs/_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs/_shes rab kyi stobs/_dran pa
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]ti saM bo d+h+yaM ga_/d+har+m+ma pra bi tsa ya saM bo d+h+yaM ga_/bIr+Ya saM bo d+h+yaM gaM_/prI ti saM bo d+h+yaM gaM/_/pra srab+d+hisaM bo d+h+yaM gaM_/sa mA d+hi saM bo d+h+yaM gaM_/u pe k+Sha
[\[22b.2\]]yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag_/chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag/_brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag_/dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag_/shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag_/ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag_/btang snyoms yang
[\[22b.3\]]saM bo d+h+yaM gaM/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad kyi ming la/_saM myag+d+r-iSh+TiH/_saM myak+saM kalpaH/_saM myagwAkra/_saM myak+kar+m+mAn+taH/_saM myaka? dzI baH/_saM myaka? byA yA maH/_samyaka? smr-i tiH/_samyaka? sa mA d+hiH/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi rim pa'i ming la/_khang+ga bi ShA Na kalpaH/_bar+g+ga tsA rI/_
[\[22b.4\]]dag byang chub kyi yan lag/_yang dag pa'i lta ba/_yang dag pa'i rtog pa/_yang dag pa'i ngag_/yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha'/_yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba/_yang dag pa'i rtsol ba/_yang dag pa'i dran pa/_yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_bse ru lta bu/_tshogs dang spyod pa/_
[\[22b.5\]]nyan thos kyi gang zag gi rim pa'i ming la/_shro tA pan+naH/_sap+ta kr-it+b+ha ba pa ra maH/_ku laM ku laH/_sa kr-i dA gA mI/_e ka bI tsi kaH/_a nA gA mI/_an+ta ra pa ri nirbA yI/_u pa pa d+ya pa ri nirbA yI/_sA b+hi saM skA ra pa ri nirbA
[\[22b.6\]]rgyun du zhugs pa/_re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa/_rigs nas rigs su skye ba/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba/_bar chad gcig pa/_phyir mi 'ong ba/_bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba/_skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba/_mngon par 'du byed dang bcas pas
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]yI/_a na b+hi saM skA ra pa ri nirbA yI/_Ur+d+ha shro tA/_kA ya sA k+ShI/_shrad+d+hA nu sA rI/_d+har+m+mA nu sA rI/_shrad+d+hA d+hi muk+taH/_dr-iSh+Ti prAp+taH/_sa ma ya bi muk+taH/_a sa
[\[23a.2\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba/_mngon par 'du byed med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba/_gong du 'pho ba/_lus kyis mngon sum du byed pa/_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba/_chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_dad pas mos pa/_mthong bas thob pa/_dus kyis rnam par grol ba/_dus dang mi
[\[23a.3\]]ma ya bi muk+taH/_pra dz+nyA bi muk+taH/_u b+ha ya to b+hA ga bi muk+taH/_/nyan thos so so'i ming la/_A dz+nyA ta kauN+Di n+yaH/_kA sh+ya paH/_shA ri pu traH/_maung+ga l+yA naH/_ma hA kA t+yA ya naH/_su b+hU tiH/_pUr+N+No mai tre ya NI pu traH/_a shwa dzitra/_a ni rud+d+haH/_rA hu laH/_A nan+daH/_nan+daH/_nan+da kaH/_
[\[23a.4\]]sbyor bar rnam par grol ba/_shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba/_gnyi ga'i cha las rnam par grol ba/_kun shes kauN+Di n+ya/_'od srungs/_shA ri'i bu/_maud gal gyi bu/_ka t+ya'i bu chen po/_rab 'byor/_byams ma'i bu gang po/_rta thul/_ma 'gags pa/_sgra gcan 'dzin/_kun dga' bo/_dga' bo/_dga' byed/_
[\[23a.5\]]nan+di kaH/_ma hA nA maH/_tsun+daH/_ti Sh+yaH/_u pa tiSh+yaH/_ko li taH/_u ru bi lwA kA sh+ya baH/_na dI kA sh+ya paH/_ga yA kA sh+ya paH/_ga bAm+pa tiH/_bA sh+yaH/_u ba se naH/_tsU ta pan+tha kaH/_ma hA pan+tha kaH/_shro Na ko TI bIM shaH/_u dA yI/_sund ra nan+daH/_shro Na ko
[\[23a.6\]]dga' yod/_ming chen/_skul byed/_'od ldan puSh+ya dang ma 'dom na skar rgyal/_nye rgyal/_bang nas skyes/_lteng rgyas 'od srungs/_chu klung 'od srungs/_ga ya 'od srungs/_ba lang bdag_/rlangs pa/_nye sde/_lam phran stan/_lam chen stan/_gro bzhin skyes bye ba nyi shu ba/_'char ka/_mdzes dga'/_gro bzhin skyes
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]TI kar+N+NaH/_su bA huH/_u drA ya NaH/_lab na b+ha dri kaH/_u pA liH/_ma hA koSh+Thi laH/_bak+ku laH/_kha dir ba Ni kaH/_swA ga taH/_ma hA pra dzA pa ti gau ta mI/_mA yA de bI/_ya sho d+ha rA/_go bA/_ut+pal bar+N+NA/_d+harma din+nA/_/nyan thos kyi yon tan gyi ming la/_k+ShI N+ya
[\[23b.2\]]rna ba bye ba ri/_lag bzang /_lhag spyod kyi bu/_mdzes bzang /_nye ba 'khor/_gsus po che/_ba ku la'am ngos su gzhag_/seng ldeng nags pa/_legs 'ongs/_skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta mi/_lha mo sgyu 'phrul/_grags 'dzin/_sa 'tsho ma/_ut+pa la'i mdog_/chos kyis byin/_zag pa
[\[23b.3\]]shra baH/_niHkle shaH/_ba shI b+hU taH/_su bi muk+ta tsit+taH/_su bi muk+ta pra dz+nyA/_A dz+nyA ne yaH/_ma hA nA gaH/_kr-i ta kr-i t+yaH/_kr-i ta ka ra NI yaH/_a pa hr-i ta b+hA raH/_ba ri k+ShI Na b+ha ba saM yo dza naH/_a nu prAp+ta swa kAr+thaH/_saM mya gA dz+nyA
[\[23b.4\]]zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed ba byas pa/_khur bor ba/_srid par kun du sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_yang dag pa'i shes
[\[23b.5\]]su bi muk+ta tsit+taH/_sarba tse to ba shi pa ra ma pA ra mi ta prAp+taH/_d+harma d+hA tu ku sha laH/_d+harma rA dza pu traH/_a pa ga ta sarba lA b+ha sat+kA ra tsit+taH/_su pra bra dzi taH/_sU pa sam+ban+naH/_pa ri pUr+Na saM
[\[23b.6\]]pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa thob pa/_chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pa/_chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/_sems rnyed pa dang bkur sti thams cad dang bral ba/_legs par rab tu byung ba/_legs par bsnyen par rdzogs pa/_brnag pa yongs su
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]kalpaH/_nirbA Na mArkA bas+thi taH/_ba hu shru taH/_shru ta d+hA raH/_shru ta san+ni tsa yaH/_su tsin+ti ta tsin+tI/_su b+hA Shi ta b+ha ShI/_su kr-i ta kar+m+ma kA rI/_A shu pra dz+nyA/_dza ba na pra dz+nyA/_tIk+Sh+Na pra dz+nyA/_niH
[\[24a.2\]]rdzogs pa/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam la gnas pa/_mang du thos pa/_thos pa 'dzin pa/_thos pa bsags pa/_legs par bsam pa sems pa/_legs par smra ba brjod pa/_legs par bya ba'i las byed pa/_shes rab myur ba/_shes rab mgyogs pa/_shes rab rno ba/_'byung
[\[24a.3\]]sa ra Na pra dz+nyA/_nai pe d+hi ka pra dz+nyA/_ma hA pra dz+nyA/_pr-i thu pra dz+nyA/_gam+b+hI ra pra dz+nyA/_a sa ma pra dz+nyA/_pra dz+nyA rat+na sa ma n+wA ga taH/_pa ra ma dr-iSh+Ta d+har+m+ma su kha bi hA ra prA p+taH/_ma hA dak+Shi Na ba ri sho d+ha kaH/_pra shA n+ter+Ya pa tha
[\[24a.4\]]ba'i shes rab can/_nges par 'byed pa'i shes rab can/_shes rab che ba/_shes rab yangs pa/_shes rab zab pa/_shes rab mnyam pa med pa/_shes rab rin po che dang ldan pa/_mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i mchog thob pa/_yon yongs su sbyong ba chen po/_spyod lam rab tu zhi ba phun
[\[24a.5\]]sam+pan+naH/_ma hA k+ShAn+ti sau ra t+ya sa ma n+wA ga taH/_ta thA ga tA dz+nyA su pra ti pan+naH/_pa ri pUr+N+Na shukla d+har+m+maH/_dr-iSh+Ta d+har+m+maH/_su pra ti pan+no b+ha ga ba taH/_shA ba ka saM g+haH/_n+yA ya bra ti pan+naH/_r-i dzu pra ti pan+naH/_sa mI tsi pra ti
[\[24a.6\]]sum tshogs pa/_bzod pa dang des pa chen po dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa/_chos dkar po yongs su rdzogs pa/_chos mthong ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun legs par zhugs pa/_rigs par zhugs pa/_drang por zhugs pa/_mthun par zhugs
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]pan+naH/_a nu d+har+m+ma tsA rI/_d+har+m+mA nu d+har+m+ma pra ti pan+naH/_a ra Na sa mA d+hiH/_pra Ni d+hi dz+nyA naM/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis kyi ming la/_pAM suk+ku li kaH/_trai tsI ba ri kaH/_nA ma tsi kaH/_baiN+Da pA ti kaH/_e kA sa ni kaH/_kha lu bash+tsA d+b+hak+ti kaH/_A ra nya kaH/_
[\[24b.2\]]pa/_chos dang rjes su mthun par spyod pa/_chos dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin/_smon gnas shes pa/_phyag dang khrod pa/_chos gos gsum pa/_'phying pa pa/_bsod snyoms pa/_stan gcig pa/_zas phyis mi len pa/_dgon pa pa/_
[\[24b.3\]]br-ik+Sha mU li kaH/_a b+h+ya ba kA si kaH/_sh+mAsA ni kaH/_nai Shad+di kaH/_yA thA saM sta ri kaH/_/nyan thos kyi sa'i ming la/_shukla bi daR+sha na b+hU miH/_go tra b+hU miH/_aSh+Ta ma ka b+hU miH/_daR+sha na b+hU miH/_ta nU b+hU miH/_bi ga ta rA ga b+hU miH/_kr-i tA bi b+hU miH/_/rjes su dran pa drug gi ming la/_bud+d+hA nu smr-i
[\[24b.4\]]shing drung pa/_bla gab med pa/_dur khrod pa/_cog pu pa/_gzhi ji bzhin pa/_dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa/_rigs kyi sa/_brgyad pa'i sa/_mthong ba'i sa/_bsrabs pa'i sa/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa/_byas pa rtogs pa'i sa/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran
[\[24b.5\]]tiH/_d+har+m+mA nusmr-i tiH/_saM g+hA nusmr-i tiH/_shI lA nusmr-i tiH/_t+yA gA nu smr-i tiH/_de ba tA nusmr-i tiH/_bi nI la ka saM dz+nyA/_bi bU ti ka saM dz+nyA/_bi pa du ma ka saM dz+nyA/_byAd+h+mA ta ka saM dz+nyA/_bi lo hi ta saM dz+nyA/_bi khA
[\[24b.6\]]pa/_chos rjes su dran pa/_dge 'dun rjes su dran pa/_tshul khrims rjes su dran pa/_gtong ba rjes su dran pa/_lha rjes su dran pa/_rnam par sdos pa'i 'du shes/_rnam par gnag pa'i 'du shes/_rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes/_rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes/_rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes/_rnam
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]di ta ka saM dz+nyA/_bi k+Ship+ta ka saM dz+nyA/_bi dag+d+ha ka saM dz+nyA/_a s+thi saM dz+nyA/_/dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba bgrang ba'i rim pa'i ming la/_A nA pA na smr-i tiH/_ga Na nA/_a nu ga maH/_s+thA naM/_u pa lak+Sha NA/_bi bar+t+ta nA/_ba ri shud+d+hiH/_hra swa mA
[\[25a.2\]]par zos pa'i 'du shes/_rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes/_rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes/_rus gong gi 'du shes/_dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba dran pa/_bgrang ba/_nang du zhugs pa/_gnas pa/_nye bar mtshon pa/_sgyur ba/_yongs su dag pa/_dbugs thung du rngub pa
[\[25a.3\]]swa saM hra swa mA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_hra swaM pra shwa saM hra swa pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_dI r+g+ha mA shwa saM dIrga mA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_dIr+g+haM pra swa saM dI r+g+haM
[\[25a.4\]]na yang thung ngu rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_dbugs thung ngu phyung na yang dbugs thung ngu phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_dbugs ring du rngubs na dbugs ring du rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/dbugs ring du phyung na dbugs
[\[25a.5\]]pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_sarba kA ya pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sa na sarba kA ya pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_sarba kA ya pra ti sam+be dI pra shwa sa na sarba kA
[\[25a.6\]]ring du phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_lus kyi las las zhes pa'i skad dod ma byung /_thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs na lus kyi las thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_lus kyi las thams cad yang dag bar myong zhing dbugs
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]ya pra ti saM be dI pra shwa swa mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_pra srab+d+h+ya kA ya saM skA ra nA shwa sam+p+ra srab+d+h+ya kA ya saM skA ra nA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_bra sra b+d+h+ya kA
[\[25b.2\]]phyung na lus kyi las thams cad yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs na lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_lus kyi 'du byed
[\[25b.3\]]ya saM skA rAna? pra shwa sana? pra srab+d+h+ya kA ya saM skA rAna? pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_prI ti pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sana? prI ti pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM bra dzA nA ti/_prI ti
[\[25b.4\]]shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na lus kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_dga' ba yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs na dga' ba yang dag par myong zhing dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_dga' ba
[\[25b.5\]]pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sana? prI ti pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sana? tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_
[\[25b.6\]]yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung na dga' ba yang dag par myong zhing dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs na sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be dI pra shwA sanra?tsit+ta saM skA ra pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_pra sab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rA nA shwa sana? pra srab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rA nA shwa sA
[\[26a.2\]]tu shes/_sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung na sems kyi 'du byed yang dag par myong nas dbugs [(]phyud [,]phyung [)]ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs rngubs na sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas
[\[26a.3\]]mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_pra srab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rAna? pra shwa saM pra srab+d+h+ya tsit+ta saM skA rAna? pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_tsit+ta pra ti saM be d+yA shwa sana? tsit+ta pra ti saM be d+yA
[\[26a.4\]]dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung na sems kyi 'du byed shin tu sbyangs nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_sems yang dag par myong nas dbugs rngubs na sems yang dag
[\[26a.5\]]shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_tsit+ta pra ti saM be+e dI pra swa san+tsIt+ta pra ti saM be dI pra shwa sA mI ti ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti/_/'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam pa bcu drug tu phye ba'i ming la/_tsa twA r+YAr+Ya sat+yA ni/_duHkhaM/_a ni t+yaM/_shU n+yaM/_
[\[26a.6\]]par myong nas dbugs rngubs so snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_sems yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung na sems yang dag par myong nas dbugs phyung ngo snyam du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes/_'phags pa'i bden ba bzhi/_sdug bsngal ba/_mi rtag ba/_stong ba/_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]a nAt+ma kaM/_sa mu dayaH/_pra b+ha baH/_he tuH/_pra t+ya yaH/_ni ro d+haH/_shAn+taH/_pra NI taH/_niHsa ra NaM/_mArgaH/_n+yA yaH/_pra ti bat+tiH/_nai r+YA Ni kaH/_A nan+tar+Ya mAr+g+gaH/_bi mug+ti mAr+g+gaH/_a b+hi sa ma yAn+ti kaM ku sha la mU laM/_k+Sha ya dz+nyA naM lA
[\[26b.2\]]bdag med pa/_kun 'byung ba/_rab tu skye ba/_rgyu/_rkyen/_'gog pa/_zhi ba/_gya nom pa/_nges bar 'byung ba/_lam/_rigs pa/_sgrub pa/_nges par 'byin pa/_bar chad med pa'i lam/_rnam par grol ba'i lam/_mngon par rtogs pa'i mjug la 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/_zad pa shes pas
[\[26b.3\]]b+hi kaM ku sha la mU laM/_nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rim pa'i ming la/_nirbe d+ha b+hA gI yaH/_uSh+ma ga taH/_mUr+d+hA naH/_k+ShAn+tiH/_lau ki kA gra d+har+m+maH/_/sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug gi ming la/_duH khe d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/_duHkhe d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/_duHkhe\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA nak+ShAn+tiH/_
[\[26b.4\]]thob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/_nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa/_dro bar gyur ba/_rtse mo/_bzod ba/_'jig rten pa'i chos mchog/_sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/_sdug bsngal la chos shes pa/_sdug bsngal la rjes su rtog par shes pa'i bzod ba/_
[\[26b.5\]]duH khe\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/_sa mu da ye d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/_sa mu da ya d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/_sa mu da ye\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/_sa mu da ye\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM ni ro d+he d+har+m+ma dz+nyA nak+ShAn+tiH/_ni ro d+he d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/_ni ro d+he\u0f85n+wa
[\[26b.6\]]sdug bsngal la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/_kun 'byung la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/_kun 'byung la chos shes pa/_kun 'byung la rjes su rtog par shes pa'i bzod pa/_kun 'byung la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/_'gog pa la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/_'gog pa la chos shes pa/_'gog pa la rjes su rtog
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]ya dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/_ni ro d+he\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/_mArge d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/_mArge d+har+m+ma dz+nyA naM/_mArge\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA na k+ShAn+tiH/_mArge\u0f85n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/_/shes pa bcu'i ming la/_d+har+m+madz+nyA naM/_pa ra tsit+ta dz+nyA naM/_a n+wa ya dz+nyA naM/_saM
[\[27a.2\]]par shes pa'i bzod pa/_'gog pa la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/_lam la chos shes pa'i bzod pa/_lam la chos shes pa/_lam la rjes su rtog par shes pa'i bzod pa/_lam la rjes su rtog pa'i shes pa/_chos shes pa/_pha rol gyi sems shes pa/_rjes su rtog par shes pa/_kun
[\[27a.3\]]br-i ti dz+nyA naM/_duHkha dz+nyA naM/_sa mud ya dz+nyA naM/_ni ro d+ha dz+nyA naM/_mArga dz+nyA naM/_k+Sha ya dz+nyA naM/_a nut+pA da dz+nyA naM/_lam bzhi'i ming la/_duHkhA pra ti pa dwa n+wA b+hi dz+nyA/_duHkhA pra ti pat+k+Shi prA b+hi dz+nyA/_su khA pra ti pa dwa n+wA b+hi dz+nyA/_su khA pra ti pat+k+Shi prA b+hi dz+nyA/_/
[\[27a.4\]]rdzob shes pa/_sdug bsngal shes pa/_kun 'byung shes pa/_'gog pa shes pa/_lam shes pa/_zad pa shes pa/_mi skye ba shes pa/_mngon par shes ba bul la dka' ba'i lam/_mngon par shes pa myur la dka' ba'i lam/_mngon par shes pa bul la sla ba'i lam/_mngon par shes ba myur la sla ba'i
[\[27a.5\]]theg pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/_ma hA yA nama?/_pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha yA nama?/_shrA ba ka yA nama?/_hI na yA nama?/_pra de shi ka yA nama?/_e ka yA nama?/_/dbang po'i rim pa'i ming la/_in+d+ri ya bai mAtra tA/_mr-i dwin+d+ri yaH/_ma d+h+yen+d+ri yaH/_tIk+Sh+Nen+d+ri yaH/_/rigs lnga'i ming la/_shrA ba ka yA nA b+hi sa ma ya go traH/_pra
[\[27a.6\]]lam/_theg pa chen po/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/_nyan thos kyi theg pa/_theg pa dman pa/_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa/_theg pa gcig pa/_dbang po'i rim pa/_dbang po rtul po/_dbang po 'bring po/_dbang po rnon po/_nyan thos kyi theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs/_rang
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]t+ye ka bud+d+ha yA nA b+hi sa ma ya go traH/_ta thA ga ta yA nA b+hi sa ma ya go traH/_a ni ya ta go traH/_a go tra kaH//_/dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ming la/_sU traM/_ge yama?/_byA ka ra NaM/_gA thA/_u dA naM/_ni dA nama?/_a ba
[\[27b.2\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa mngon par rtogs pa'i rigs/_ma nges ba'i rigs/_rigs med pa/_mdo'i sde/_dbyangs kyis bsnyad ba'i sde/_lung du bstan pa'i sde/_tshigs su bcad pa'i sde/_ched du brjod ba'i sde/_gleng gzhi'i sde/_rtogs pa
[\[27b.3\]]dA nama?/_i ti br-it+ta kama?/_dzA ta kama?/_bai pu l+yaM/_ad+b+hu ta d+har+m+maH/_u pa de shaH/_bra h+ma tsa r+YaM/_A dau ka l+yA NaM/_ma d+h+ye ka l+yA NaM/_baR+Ya ba sA ne ka l+yA NaM/_swar+thaM/_su byany+dza naM/_ke ba laM/_pa ri
[\[27b.4\]]brjod ba'i sde/_de lta bu byung ba'i sde/_skyes pa rabs kyi sde/_shin tu rgyas pa'i sde/_rmad du byung pa'i sde/_gtan la dbab pa'i sde/_tshangs par spyod pa/_thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba/_tha mar dge ba/_don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa skabs gzhan du 'ba' zhig tu 'ang gdags/_yongs su
[\[27b.5\]]pUr+NaM/_pa ri shud+d+haM/_par+Ya ba dA taM/_a b+hi ba da mA nA a b+hi ba dan+ti/_swA khyA to b+ha ga ba to d+har+m+maH saM dr-iSh+Ti kaH/_nir+dz+wa raH/_A kA li kaH/_u pa nA yi kaH/_e hi pa sh+yi kaH/_pra t+yAt+ma be da nI yo bi dz+nyaiH/_
[\[27b.6\]]rdzogs pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba/_mngon par brjod pas mngon par brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_yang dag par mthong ba/_nad med pa/_dus chad pa med pa/_nye bar gtod pa/_'di mthong ba la don yod pa/_mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba/_
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]swA khyA to b+ha ga ba to d+har+m+ma bi na yaH su pra be di taH/_nai r+YA Ni kaHsaM bo d+hi gA mI/_a b+hin+naHsastU paH/_sa pra ti sha ra NaH/_shAstA tsA s+ya ta thA ga to\u0f85r+hana?samyak+saM
[\[28a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni legs par bstan pa/_nges par 'byung ba rdzogs ba'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa/_mi mthun pa med cing 'dus pa dang ldan pa/_brten pa yod pa/_'di ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[28a.3\]]bud+d+haH/_swA khyA to me b+hi k+Sha bo d+har+m+maH/_ut+tAnaH/_bi br-i taH/_ts+tshin+na p+lo ti kaH/_yA bad+de ba ma nu Sh+ye b+h+yaHsamyak+su pra kA shi taH/_/chos kyi 'khor lo'i ming la/_tri pa ri bar+t+ta dwA da shA kA ra d+har+m+ma tsakra bar+t+ta naM/_Ar+Ya sat+yA nAM pra tha ma
[\[28a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/_dge slong dag nga'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa/_gsal ba/_phye ba/_rgyu ba bcad pa/_lha dang mi'i bar dag la yang dag par shin tu bstan pa/_lan gsum du bzlas te chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor pa/_'phags nga'i bden pa rnams bzlas
[\[28a.5\]]pa ri bar+t+to daR+sha na margaH/_i dma? duHkhama?/_a yaM sa mu da yaH/_a yan+ni ro d+haH/_i yaM duHkha ni ro d+ha gA mi nI pra ti pata?/_sat+yA nAM dwi tI ya pa ri bar+t+to b+hA ba na mAr+g+gaH/_duHkha mAR+Ya sa t+yaM pa ri dz+nye yaM/_duHkha sa mu da yaHpra hA ta
[\[28a.6\]]pa dang po ste mthong ba'i lam/_'di ni sdug bsngal/_'di ni kun 'byung ba/_'di ni 'gog pa/_'di ni sdug bsngal 'gog pa'i lam/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bzlas pa gnyis pa ste bsgom pa'i lam/_sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa yongs su shes par bya/_sdug bsngal kun 'byung ba spang
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]byaM/_duHkha ni ro d+haHsA k+ShAt+kar+t+ta byaM/_duHkha ni ro d+ha gA mi nI pra ti pata? b+hA yi ta byaM/_Ar+Ya sa t+yA nAM tri tI ya pa ri bar+t+to\u0f85shaik+Sha mArgaH/_duHkhaM pa ri dz+nyA taM/_sa mu da yaHpra dI NaH/_ni ro d+haHsA k+ShA tra kr-i taH/_duHkha ni ro d+ha gA mi nI pra ti
[\[28b.2\]]bar bya/_sdug bsngal 'gog pa mngon du bya/_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam bsgom par bya/_'phags pa'i bden pa rnams bzlas pa gsum pa ste mi slob pa'i lam/_sdug bsngal yongs su shes/_kun 'byung ba spangs/_'gog pa mngon du byas/_sdug bsngal 'gog par 'gyur pa'i lam
[\[28b.3\]]bad+b+hA bi tA/_/dam pa'i chos kyi ming la/_sha ta sA ta sri kA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_pany+tsa biM sha ti sA ha sri kA/_aSh+Ta sA ha sri kA/_bud+d+hA ba taM sa kaM/_bo d+hi satwa pi Ta kaM/_la li ta bi sta raH/_sa mA d+hi rA dzA/_pi tA pu tra sa mA ga maH/_lo kot+ta ra pa ri bar+t+taH/_sada? d+har+m+ma
[\[28b.4\]]bsgoms/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/_nyi khri lnga stong pa/_brgyad stong pa/_sangs rgyas phal po che/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod/_rgya cher rol pa/_ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po/_yab sras mjal ba/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u/_dam pa'i
[\[28b.5\]]puN+Da rI kama?/_ga ga na gany+dzaH/_rat+na me g+haH/_laM kA ba tA rama?/_su bar+N+Na pra b+hA sot+ta maM/_bi ma la kIr+t+ti ni rde shaH/_gaN+Da byU haH/_g+ha na byU haH/_A kA sha gar+b+haH/_a k+Sha ya ma ti ni rde shaH/_u pA ya kau sha l+yaM/_d+har+m+ma saM
