[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]gI tiH/_su bi krAn+ta bi krA mI/_ma hA ka ru NA puN+Da rI kama?/_rat+na ke tuH/_da sha b+hU mi kaH/_ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ru NA ni rde shaH/_dru ma kin+na ra rA dza ba ri pr-its+tshaH/_a dzA ta sha tru kau kr-i t+ya bi no da naH/_san+d+hi nirmo tsa naM/_bud+d+ha
[\[29a.2\]]par sdud pa/_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/_snying rje chen po pad+ma dkar po/_rin po che'i tog_/sa bcu pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa/_ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba/_dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa/_sangs
[\[29a.3\]]saM gI tiH/_rASh+Ta pA la ba ri pr-its+tshA/_sarba d+har+m+mA pra br-it+ti ni rde shaH/_rat+na tsU Da pa ri pr-its+tshA/_rat+na kU TaH/_ma hA yA na pra sA da b+hA ba nama?/_sUr+Ya gar+b+haH/_bud+d+ha b+hU miH/_ta thA ga tA tsin+t+ya gu h+ya
[\[29a.4\]]rgyas yang dag par sdud pa/_yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa/_chos thams cad 'byung ba med par bstan pa/_gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa/_dkon mchog brtsegs pa/_theg pa chen po la dad pa rab tu sgom pa/_nyi ma'i snying po/_sangs rgyas kyi sa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis mi
[\[29a.5\]]nirde shaH/_sU raM ga ma sa mA d+hi nirde shaH/_sA ga ra nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA/_shA listam+ba kama?/_ma hA yA no pa de shaH/_brah+ma bi she Sha tsin+ti pa ri pr-its+tshA/_pa ra mAr+tha saM br-i ti sa t+ya nir+d+de shaH/_many+dzu shrI bi hA raH/_ma hA pa ri nirbA NaM/_
[\[29a.6\]]khyab pa bstan pa/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa/_sA lu ljang pa/_theg pa chen po'i man ngag_/tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa/_don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pa/_'jam dpal gnas pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po/_
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]a bai bar+t+ta tsakrama?/_kar+m+ma bi b+haM gaH/_pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA bany+tsa sha ti kA/_tri sha ti kA pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_ra t+nolkA/_go tsa ra pa ri shu d+d+haM/_pra shAn+ta bi ni sh+tsa ya prA ti hAr+Ya nirde shaH/_ta thA ga tot+pat+ti saM b+ha ba nirde shaH/_b+ha ba saM krAn+tiH/_
[\[29b.2\]]phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo/_las rnam par 'byed pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sum brgya pa/_dkon mchog ta la la/_spyod yul yongs su dag pa/_rab tu zhi ba rnam par gdon mi za ba'i cho 'phrul bstan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa/_srid pa 'pho
[\[29b.3\]]pa ra mAr+tha d+har+m+ma bi dza yaH/_many+dzu shrI bud+d+ha k+She tra gu Na byU haH/_bo d+hi bak+Sh+ya nirde shaH/_kar+m+mA ba ra Na pra ti pra srab+d+hiH/_tri skan+d+ha kama?/_sarba bai da l+ya saM gra haH/_saM g+hA Ta sU traM/_ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na mu drA sa mA
[\[29b.4\]]ba/_don dam pa'i chos kyis rnam par rgyal ba/_'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/_byang chub kyi phyogs nges par bstan pa/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa/_phung po gsum pa/_rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa/_zung gi mdo/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i
[\[29b.5\]]d+hiH/_badzra me ru shi kha ra kU TA gA re d+hA ra NI/_a na ba tap+ta nA ga rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA/_sarba bud+d+ha bi Sha yA ba tA ra dz+nyA nA lo kA laM kA raH/_sab+ta sha ti ka pra dz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_byA sa pa ri pr-its+tshA/_su bA hu pa ri pr-its+tshA/_siM ha pa ri br-its+tshA/_ma hA
[\[29b.6\]]ting nge 'dzin/_rdo rje ri rab kyi rtse mo'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzungs/_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pas zhus pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye shes snang pa'i rgyan/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya ba/_drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa/_lag bzang gis zhus pa/_seng ges zhus pa/_stong chen
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]sA ha sra pra mard nama?/_u gra pa ri pr-its+tshA/_shrad+d+hA ba lA d+hA nama?/_aM gu li mA lI yaM/_hasti ka k+Sh+yaM/_ak+Sha ya ma ti pa ri br-its+tshA/_b+hai Sha dz+yA gu ru bai DUR+Ya pra b+haH/_ar+tha bi nish+tsa yaH/_ma tA ba la sU traH/_bI ra dat+ta gr-i ha pa ti pa ri
[\[30a.2\]]mos rab tu 'joms pa/_drag shul can gyis zhus pa/_dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa/_sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa/_glang po'i rtsal/_blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa/_sman gyi bla bai DUR+Ya 'od/_don rnam par nges pa/_stobs po che'i mdo/_khyim bdag dpas byin gyis
[\[30a.3\]]pr-its+tshA/_rat+na ka raN+Da kama?/_bi kurba Na rA dza pa ri pr-its+tshA/_d+h+wa dzA gra ke yU rA/_tri pi Ta kaH/_sU traM/_a b+hi d+har+m+maH/_bi na yaH/_pra dz+nyAp+ti shAs+t+rama?/_saM gI ti pA r+YA yaH/_d+har+m+maskan+d+haH/_d+hA tu kA yaH/_dz+nyA na pras+thA
[\[30a.4\]]zhus pa/_dkon mchog za ma tog_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa/_rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan/_sde snod gsum/_mdo sde/_chos mngon pa/_'dul ba/_gdags pa'i gtsug lag gam bstan bcos/_bgro pa'i rnam grangs/_chos kyi phung po/_khams kyi tshogs/_ye shes la
[\[30a.5\]]nama?/_pra ka ra Na pA daH/_e kot+ta ri kA ga maH/_ma d+h+ya mA ga maH/_dIr+g+hA ga maH/_saM yuk+tA ga maH/_bi na ya bi b+ha gaH/_bi na ya bstu/_bi na yak+Shu dra kama?/_ut+ta ra gran+thaH/_rA dzA ba bA da kama?/_zhal nas gsungs pa dang tshig le'ur byas ba la sogs ba'i ming la/_kaN+Thok+taH/_A ga maH/_
[\[30a.6\]]'jug pa/_rab tu byed pa'i rkang pa/_gcig las 'phros pa'i lung /_lung bar ma/_lung ring po/_yang dag par ldan pa'i lung /_'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/_'dul ba'i gzhi/_'dul ba phran tshegs/_gzhung bla ma/_rgyal po la gdams pa/_zhal nas gsungs pa/_lung /_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]AR+ShaH/_pra ba tsa naM/_shA sa nama?/_sU trAn+ta/_sU trama?/_sid+d+hAn+taH/_sa ma yaH/_a nu shA sa nA/_a ba bA daH/_daR+sha kaM/_ma taM/_shAs+t+raM/_pra ka ra NaM/_pra kr-i yA/_sU trama?/_kA ri kA/_Tip+pi Ta
[\[30b.2\]]gtsug lag_/gsung rab/_bstan pa'am bcos pa/_mdo sde/_mdo/_grub pa'i mtha'/_gzhung lugs sam sngags kyi skabs su dam tshig_/rjes su bstan pa/_gdams pa/_lta ba/_lugs/_bstan bcos/_rab tu byed pa/_lo rgyus/_mdor byas pa/_tshig le'ur byas pa/_mdor bshad pa'am
[\[30b.3\]]kaH/_br-it+tiH/_bi ba ra NaM/_pany+dzi kA/_b+hA ShaM/_byA khyA naM/_bAr+t+ti kaM/_bad+d+ha ti/_mi shra kaM/_TI kA/_TI kA TI kA/_sh+lo kaHgA thA/_ga d+yaM/_ba d+yaM/_pr-it+taM/_ts+tshan+daH/_daN+Da kaM/_gran+thaH/_pa ri
[\[30b.4\]]sa bcad/_'grel pa/_rnam par 'grel pa/_dka' 'grel/_bshad pa/_rnam par bshad pa/_rnam 'grel/_gzhung 'grel/_spel ma/_'grel bshad/_'grel bshad kyi bshad pa/_tshigs su bcad pa/_rkyang pa/_tshigs su sbyar ba/_sbyar ba/_sdeb sbyor/_rgyun chags/_tshig gam gzhung ngam le'u grangs/_
[\[30b.5\]]bar+t+taH/_A shwA sa kaH/_pa ri ts+tshe daH/_sar+g+gaH/_ba Ta laH/_A d+h+yA yaH/_ts+tshan+do bi tsi tiH/_biN+Do d+dA naM/_an+ta rod+dA naM/_ud+dA naM/_/bsam gtan bzhi la sogs ba'i ming la/_bi bik+taM kA mair+b+bi bik+taM pA pa kai ra ku sha le d+har+m+maiHsa bi tarkaM sa bi tsA raM bi be ka dzaM
[\[30b.6\]]le'u/_tshigs/_le 'ur bcad pa/_le 'ur phye ba/_rim bar phye ba/_brjod le'u/_sdeb sbyor bsdus pa/_bsdus pa'i sdom/_bar sdom/_sdom skabs kha cig tu mdor yang gdags/_'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dbyod pa dang
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]prI ti su khaM pra tha maM d+h+yA na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_sa bi tarka bi tsA rA NAM byu pa sha mA dad+h+yAt+maM saM pra sA dA ts+tse ta sa e ko tI b+hA bA da bi tarka ma bi tsA raM sa mA d+hi dzaM prI ti su khaM dwi
[\[31a.2\]]bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
[\[31a.3\]]tI yan+d+h+yA na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_sa prI te rbi rA gA du be k+Sha ko bi ha ra ti smr-i tis+saM pra dzA naM su khaM tsa kA ye na bra ti saM be da ya ti yat+ta dA r+YA A bak+Sha te u be k+Sha kaHsmr-i ti mAM su kha pi hA rI ti niSh+p+rI ti kaM
[\[31a.4\]]ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin te bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa
[\[31a.5\]]tri tI ya d+h+yA na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_sa su kha s+ya tsa bra hA NAd+duHkha s+ya tsa pra hA nAt+pUrba me ba tsa sau ma na s+ya daurmA na s+ya yo ra staM ga mA ta a duH khA su kha mu be k+ShA smr-i ti pa ri shud+d+haM tsa tur+tha d+h+yA na mu ba saM pa d+ya bi ha
[\[31a.6\]]ste dga' ba med pa bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba yang nub bas bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]ra ti/_/prAn+ta ko Ti ka d+h+yA nama?/_a nA ga myaM/_d+h+yA nAn+ta rama?/_sA man+ta kaM/_mau laM/_A s+pha ra Na ka sa mA d+hiH/_bra ti saM la yanaH/_sa mA hi taH/_sa ta ta sa mi ta sa mA hi ta tsit+taH/_/snyoms par 'jug pa'i ming la/_sarba so rU ba saM
[\[31b.2\]]bar byas te gnas so/_/rab kyi mthar phyin pa'i bsam gtan/_mi lcogs pa med pa/_bsam gtan gyi khyad par can/_nyer bsdogs/_dngos gzhi/_mkha' khyab ting nge 'dzin/_nang du yang dag 'jog_/mnyam par gzhag_/rtag par rgyun mi 'chad par sems mnyam par gzhag ba/_de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi
[\[31b.3\]]dz+nyA nAM sa ma ti kra mAt+p+ra ti g+ha saM dz+nyA nA ma staM ga mAtu nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mi t+yA kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_sa sarba sha A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta nama? sa ma ti
[\[31b.4\]]'du shes rnams las yang dag bar 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las
[\[31b.5\]]kra myA nan+taM bi dz+nyA nA mi ti bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_sa sarba sho bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya nAsti kiny+tsi di t+yA kiny+tsi t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_sa sarba
[\[31b.6\]]yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de rnam
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]sha A kiM tsi t+yA ya ta na sa ma ti kra mya nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_byu ta krAn+ta sa mA pat+tiH/_byA skand ka sa mA pa t+tiH/_na bA nu bUrba bi hA ra sa mA pat+tiH/_ni ro d+ha sa
[\[32a.2\]]pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa/_thod rgal du snyoms par 'jug pa/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu/_'gog pa'i snyoms
[\[32a.3\]]mA pat+tiH/_ma hA b+hU ta sa ma sA d+ha naM/_a saM dz+nyA sa mA pat+tiH/_tshad med bzhi'i rgyud kyi ming la/_mai trI/_ka ru NA/_mu di tA/_u pe k+ShA/_sa mai trI sa ha ga te na tsit+te nA be re NA saM sam bat+ta rtsod par 'jug pa de yin nam slar brtag_/pan+ne nA byA bA d+he na bi pu le na ma hang+ga te nA pra mA Ne nA dwa ye na su b+hA bi te
[\[32a.4\]]par 'jug pa/_'byung ba chen po mthun par sgrub pa/_'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/_byams pa/_snying rje/_dga' ba/_btang snyoms/_de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khon med pa 'gran zla med pa gnod pa med pa yangs pa chen por gyur pa tshad med pa mi gnyis ba shin tu bsgoms pas
[\[32a.5\]]nai kaM di sha ma d+hi mu ts+ya s+pha ri twa pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra ti/_ta thA dwi tI ya ta thA tr-i tI yan+ta thA tsa tur+tha mi t+yUr+d+d+ha ma d+ha stir+Ya kra sarba saH sar+b+ba ban+ta mi maM lo kaM/_/rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi ming la/_rU pI rU pA Ni ba sh+yaM t+ya yaM bra tha mo bi
[\[32a.6\]]phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bzhin du gnyis pa dang de bzhin du gsum pa dang de bzhin du bzhi pa dang bla dang 'og dang thad kar rnam pa thams cad du thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]mo k+ShaH/_a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hi r+d+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yaM t+ya yaM dwi tI yo bi mo k+ShaH/_shu b+haM bi mo k+ShaM kA ye na sA k+ShA t+k+r-i two pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM tri tI yo bi mo k+ShaH/_sa sar+b+ba sho rU pa saM dz+nyA nAM sa ma ti
[\[32b.2\]]dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/_/sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te rdzogs par byas nas gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag
[\[32b.3\]]kra mAt+p+ra ti g+ha saM dz+nyA nA ma staM ga mAta? nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mi t+yA kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yany+tsa tu rar+tho bi mo k+ShaH/_sa sarba sha A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti
[\[32b.4\]]par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
[\[32b.5\]]kra myA nan+taM bi dz+nyA nA mi ti bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta na sa mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM pany+tsa mo bi mo k+ShaH/_sa sarba sho bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya nA sti kiM tsi di t+yA kiM tsi t+yA ya ta na mu pa
[\[32b.6\]]mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM ShaSh+Tho bi mo k+ShaH/_sa sarba sha A kiM tsi t+yA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra t+ya yaM sap+ta mo bi mok+ShaH/_sa sarba
[\[33a.2\]]skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa
[\[33a.3\]]sho nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta naM sa ma ti kra mya saM dz+nyA be di ta ni ro d+haM kA ye na sA k+ShAta kr-i two ba saM ba d+ya bi ha ra t+ya ya maSh+Tha mo bi mo k+ShaH/_/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad kyi ming la/_a d+h+yAt+maM rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hi r+d+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti pa rit+tA ni su
[\[33a.4\]]thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o/_/nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chung ngu kha dog bzang po dang kha dog
[\[33a.5\]]bar+N+Na durbar+N+NA ni tA ni kha lu rU pA nya b+hi b+hU ya dzA nAn+t+ya b+hi b+hU ya ba sh+yan+t+ye baM saM dz+nyI tsa b+ha ba tI daM pra tha ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hir+d+hA rU bA Ni ba sh+yan+ti ma had+ga tA ni su bar+N+Na durbar+N+NA ni tA ni kha lu rU
[\[33a.6\]]ngan pa rnams la lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bur 'du shes bar 'gyur ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs chen por gyur pa kha dog bzang po dang kha dog ngan pa rnams la
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]pA N+ya b+hi b+hU ya dzA nAn+t+ya b+hi b+hU ya pa sh+yan+t+ye baM saM dz+nyI tsa b+ha ba tI daM dwi tI ya ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyA ba hir+d+hA rU bA Ni ba sh+yan+ti nI lA ni nI la bar+N+NA ni nI la ni daR+sha nA ni nI la nir+b+hA sA ni tad+ya thA
[\[33b.2\]]lta zhing gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan nas shes zil gyis mnan nas mthong ste de lta bur 'du shes par gyur pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la
[\[33b.3\]]u ma kA puSh+paM sam+pan+naM bA bA rA Na se yaM bas+t+raM nI laM nI la bar+N+NaM nI la ni daR+sha naM nI la nir+b+hA sa me ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti nI lA ni nI la bar+N+NA ni nI la ni daR+sha nA ni nI la nir+b+hA sA nI daM tri tI ya ma b+hi b+h+wA
[\[33b.4\]]lta ste dper na zar ma'i me tog gam yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis
[\[33b.5\]]ya ta nama?/_a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti pI tA ni pI ta bar+N+NA ni pI ta ni daR+Sha nA ni pI ta nir+b+hA sA ni tad+ya thA kar+N+Ni kA ra puSh+paM samAn+naM bA pA rA Na se yaM bas+t+raM pI taM pI ta bar+N+NaM pI ta ni
[\[33b.6\]]gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na dong ka'i mdog gam yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]daR+sha naM pI ta nir+b+hA sa me ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa si dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+ti bI tA ni bI ta bar+N+NA ni pI ta ni daR+sha nA ni pI ta nir+b+hA sA nI daM tsa tur+tha ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU ba saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA bA Ni pa sh+yan+ti
[\[34a.2\]]'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog
[\[34a.3\]]lo hi tA ni lo hi ta bar+N+NA ni lo hi ta ni daR+sha nA ni lo hi ta nir+b+hA sA ni tad+ya thA ban+du dzI ba ka puSh+pa sam pan+naM bA bA rAn se yaM bas+t+raM lo hi taM lo hi ta bar+N+NaM lo hi ta ni d+haR+Sha naM lo hi ta nir+b+hA sa me ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+ti lo hi tA
[\[34a.4\]]dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na ban bu 'dzi bka'i me tog gam yul bA rA Na sI'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po
[\[34a.5\]]ni lo hi ta bar+N+NA ni lo hi ta ni daR+sha nA ni lo hi ta nir+b+hA sA nI daM pany+tsam ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_a d+h+yAt+ma ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni ba sh+yan+t+ya ba dA tA ni a ba dA ta bar+N+NA ni a ba dA ta ni daR+sha nA n+ya a ba dA ta nir+b+hA saM ni tad+ya thA u sha na stA ra kA yA bar+N+Na
[\[34a.6\]]dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ste dper na skar ma pa bsangs kyi mdog dkar po kha
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]a ba dA to\u0f85ba dA ta bar+N+Nonyab dA ta ni daR+sha nonyab dA ta nir+b+hA sa e ba me bA d+h+yAt+ma rU pa saM dz+nyI ba hir+d+hA rU pA Ni pa sh+yan+t+ya ba dA tA n+ya ba dA ta bar+N+NA n+ya ba dA ta ni daR+sha nA ni a ba dA ta nir+b+ha sA nI daM ShaSh+Tha ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_sa sarba sho rU ba saM dz+nyA nAM sa ma
[\[34b.2\]]dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes
[\[34b.3\]]ti kra mAt+p+ra ti g+ha saM dz+nyA nA mastaM ga maM nA nA twa saM dz+nyA nA ma ma na si kA rA da nan+ta mA kA sha mi t+yA kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM pa d+ya bi ha ra tI daM sab+ta ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_sa sarba sa kA shA nan+t+yA
[\[34b.4\]]rnams las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad
[\[34b.5\]]ya ta naM sa ma ti kra myA nan+ta bi dz+nyA nA mi ti bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta na mu pa saM ba d+ya bi ha ra tI da maSh+Tha ma ma b+hi b+h+wA ya ta naM/_/zad bar gyi skye mched bcu'i ming la/_nI la kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_pIta kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_lo hi ta kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_
[\[34b.6\]]du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/_/zad par sngon po'i skye mched/_zad par ser po'i skye mched/_zad bar dmar po'i skye mched/_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]a ba dA ta kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_pr-i thi bI kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_A pa kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_te dzaHkr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_bA yu kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_A kA sha kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_bi dz+nyA na kr-it+s+nA ya ta naM/_pr-i thi bI kr-it+s+nA mi t+ye ke saM dzA na te i d+yur+d+ha ma d+ha stir+Ya ga dwa
[\[35a.2\]]zad par dkar po'i skye mched/_zad par sa'i skye mched/_zad par chu'i skye mched/_zad par me'i skye mched/_zad par rlung gi skye mched/_zad par nam mkha'i skye mched/_zad par rnam par shes pa'i skye mched/_la lar zad par sa'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing
[\[35a.3\]]ya ma pra mA NaM/_apa? te dzo bA yu nI la pI ta lo hi tA ba dA ta kr-it+s+nA mi t+ye ke saM dzA na te i t+yUr+d+ha ma d+ha stiR+Ya ga dwa ya ma pra mA NaM/_rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyi ming la/_shU n+ya tA/_a ni mit+taM/_a pra Ni hi taM/_rton pa bzhi'i ming la/_ar+tha pra ti sa ra Ne na b+ha pi ta byaM na byany+dza na pra ti sar Ne
[\[35a.4\]]tshad med par 'du shes su byed/_la lar zad par chu dang me dang rlung dang sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang dkar po'o zhes steng dang 'og dang thad kar gnyis su med cing tshad med bar 'du shes su byed/_stong pa nyid/_mtshan ma med pa/_smon pa med pa/_don la rton par bya'i tshig 'bru la rton par mi bya/_
[\[35a.5\]]na/_d+harma pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta byaM na pung+ga la pra ti sar Ne na/_dz+nyA na pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta byaM na bi dz+nyAn pra ti sar Ne na/_nI tAr+tha sU traM pra ti sar Ne na b+ha bi ta b+h+yan+na ne yAr+tha sU tra bra ti sar Ne na/_/shes rab rnam pa gsum gyi ming la/_shru tA ma yI pra dz+nyA/_tsin+tA ma yI pra dz+nyA/_b+hA ba nA ma yI pra dz+nyA/_/rig pa'i gnas
[\[35a.6\]]chos la rton par bya'i gang zag la rton bar mi bya/_ye shes la rton par bya'i rnam shes la rton bar mi bya/_nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton bar bya'i drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde la rton par mi bya/_thos pa las byung ba'i shes rab/_bsam pa las byung ba'i shes rab/_bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab/
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]lnga'i ming la/_shab+da bi d+yA/_he tu bi d+yA/_A d+h+yA Na bi d+yA/_tsi kit+sa bi d+yA/_shi lpa kar+m+mas+thA bi d+yA/_/chos yang dag par len pa bzhi'i ming la/_tsa twA ri d+har+m+mas mA dA nA ni/_bra t+yut+pan+na su kha mA ya t+yAM duHkha bi pA kaM/_pra t+yu t+pan+na duHkha mA ya t+yAM su kha bi pA kaM/_pra
[\[35b.2\]]sgra'i rig pa/_gtan tshigs kyi rig pa/_nang gi rig pa/_gso ba'i rig pa/_bzo'i gnas kyi rig pa/_chos yang dag par len pa bzhi/_da ltar byung ba la bde la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba/_da ltar byung ba la sdug bsngal la phyi ma la rnam par smin pa bde ba/_da ltar byung ba
[\[35b.3\]]t+yut+pan+na su kha mA ya t+yAM su kha bi pA kaM/_pra t+yut+pan+na duHkha mA ya t+yAM duHkha bi pA ka/_/nor bdun gyi ming la/_shra d+hA d+ha naM/_shI la d+ha naM/_hrI d+ha naM/_a ba tA bya d+ha naM/_shru ta d+ha naM/_t+yA ga d+ha naM/_pra dz+nyA d+ha naM/_/bla na med pa drug gi ming la/_daR+sha nA nu t+ta r+YaM/_shra ba
[\[35b.4\]]la'ang bde la phyi ma la'ang rnam par smin pa bde ba/_da ltar byung ba la'ang sdug bsngal la phyi ma la'ang rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal ba/_dad pa'i nor/_tshul khrims kyi nor/_ngo tsha shes pa'i nor/_khrel yod pa'i nor/_thos pa'i nor/_gtong ba'i nor/_shes rab kyi nor/_mthong ba bla na med pa/_thos pa
[\[35b.5\]]NA nu t+ta r+YaM/_lA b+hA nu t+ta r+YaM/_shi k+ShA nut+ta r+YaM/_pa ri tsaR+YA nu t+ta r+YaM/_a nu smr-i t+ya nu t+ta r+YaM/_/byin gyis brlabs pa bzhi'i ming la/_sa t+yA d+hiSh+ThA naM/_t+yA gA d+hiSh+ThA naM/_u pa sha mA d+hiSh+ThA naM/_pra dz+nyA d+hiSh+ThA naM/_mchog tu dga' ba sngon du 'gro ba'i chos dgu'i ming la/_na ba bra mo d+ya pUrba kA
[\[35b.6\]]bla na med pa/_rnyed pa bla na med pa/_bslab pa bla na med pa/_rim gro bya ba bla na med pa/_rjes su dran pa bla na med pa/_bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs/_gtong ba'i byin gyis brlabs/_nye bar zhi ba'i byin gyis brlabs/_shes rab kyi byin gyis brlabs/_mchog tu dga' ba sngon du 'gro
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]d+har+m+mAH/_bra mu di ta s+ya prI ti dzA ya te/_prI ti ma na saHkA yaHpra srab+d+h+ya te/_pra srab+d+ha kA yaHsu kha be da ya ti/_su khi ta tsit+taM sa mA d+hI ya te/_sa mA hi ta tsit+to ya thA b+hU taM pra dzA nA ti ya thA b+hU taM
[\[36a.2\]]ba'i chos dgu/_rab tu dga' ba la dga' ba skye'o/_/yid dga' ba'i lus shin tu sbyangs par gyur to/_/lus shin tu sbyangs pa bde ba myong bar byed do/_/bde bar gyur pa'i sems mnyam par 'jog go/_/sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so yang dag pa ji lta ba
[\[36a.3\]]pa sh+ya ti/_ya thA b+hU ta daR+shI nirbi d+ya te/_ni bir+N+No bi ra dz+ya te/_bi rak+to bi mu ts+ya te/_bi muk+ta s+ya bi muk+to\u0f85smI ti dz+nyA na daR+sha naM b+ha ba ti/_/'byung bar 'os pa'i khams drug gi ming la/_Sha?T ni s+sa ra NI ya d+hA ta paH/_byA pA da
[\[36a.4\]]bzhin du mthong ngo /_/yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba skyo bar 'gyur ro/_/skyon 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chags dang bral nas rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par grol na bdag rnam pa grol lo snyam pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'byung ngo /_/'byung bar 'os pa'i khams drug_/gnod sems
[\[36a.5\]]s+yA byA pA do niHsa ra NaM mai trI/_bi hiM sA s+sa ra NaM ka ru NA/_a ra ti nis+sa ra NaM mu di tA/_kA ma niHsa ra Na mu pe k+ShA/_bi tsi ki t+sA nis+sa ra Na masmi mA na sa mut+g+hA taH/_ni mit+ta naMHsa ra Na ma ni mit+taM/_/lha dang mi rnams kyi 'khor lo bzhi'i ming la/_
[\[36a.6\]]las 'byin pa ni gnod sems med pa ste byams pa/_rnam par 'tshe ba las 'byin pa ni snying rje/_mi dga' ba las 'byin pa ni dga' ba/_'dod pa las 'byin pa ni btang snyoms/_the tshom las 'byin pa ni nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal yang dag par 'joms pa/_mtshan ma las 'byin pa ni mtshan ma med pa/
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]pra ti rU pa de sha bA saH/_sat+pu ru ShA shra yaM/_At+ma nas+sa myak+p+ra Ni d+hA naM/_bUr+b+be tsa kr-i ta pu N+ya tA/_/dka' thub la gnas pa dang sdom pa 'dzin cing spyod pa la sogs pa'i ming la/_e ka de sha kA rI/_pra de shakA rI/_yad+b+hU yaskA rI/_a ba ri bUr+N+Na kA rI/_ba ri pur+N+Na kA rI/_saM ya maH/_da maH/_su bi nI taH/_

[\[36b.5\]]nye ba san+ti/_tsA ri tra sam+ban+naH/_bA ri trA saM pa n+naH/_A ya t+yAM saM ba ra mA pa h+ya te/_sa mA dA ya bar+t+taM te/_sA d+hu da maH/_sA d+hu sha maH/_sA d+hu saM yA maH/_/rnal 'byor spyod pa dang rnal 'byor gyi yan lag gi ming la/_yo gA tsA raH/_yo gI/_yo gaH/_yo ni sho ma na si kA raH/_pra

[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]ti saM la ya naM/_dr-iSh+Ta d+har+m+ma su kha bi hA raH/_A swA da na saM pra yuk+ta d+h+yA naM/_b+hA ba nA rA ma tA/_a b+hi Sh+yan+da ya ti/_ba ri Sh+yan+da ya ti/_ba ri prI Na ya ti/_ba ri sba ra ti/_e kA ki no ra ho ga tA/_s+thU la b+hit+ti ka tA/_
[\[37a.2\]]du yang dag 'jog_/mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas/_myong ba dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan/_sgom pa la dga' ba/_mnyen par byed/_yongs su mnyen par byed/_yongs su tshim par byed/_kun du rgyas par byed/_gcig pu dben pa'am lkog tu song ste/_rtsig pa stug po lta bur/_
[\[37a.3\]]o dA ri ka tA/_duHkha li tA/_a mo g+hA/_a ban+d+h+yaM/_sa pha laM/_e ko tI b+hA baH/_/lung bstan pa bzhi'i ming la/_e kAM sha byA ka ra Na ma?/_bi b+ha dz+ya byA ka ra NaM/_ba ri pr-its+tsha byA ka ra NaM/_s+thA pa nI ya byA ka ra NaM/_/mtshan nyid gsum gyi ming la/_pa ri ka lpi ta lak+Sha NaM/_pa ra tan+t+ra

[\[37a.6\]]gi mtshan nyid/_yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid/_mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa/_dus gzhan la dgongs pa/_don gzhan la dgongs pa/_gang zag gzhan la dgongs pa/_gzhug pa la ldem por dgongs pa/_mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa/_gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa/_bsgyur ba la
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]nA b+hi san+d+hiH/_/zhi gnas lhag mthong la sogs pa'i ming la/_sha ma thaH/_bi ba sh+ya nA/_yo ga/_yo ni sho ma na skA raH/_/mi dge ba bcu'i ming la/_trI Ni kA ya dush+tsa ri tA ni/_tsa twA ri bAg+dush+tsa ri tA ni/_trI Ni ma no dush+tsa ri tA ni/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi ming la/_kA ya su tsa ri ta ma?/_brA NA ti g+hA tA dwi ra tiH/_a dAt+tA dA nA dwi ra tiH/_
[\[37b.2\]]ldem por dgongs pa/_zhi gnas/_lhag mthong /_rnal 'byor/_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa/_lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum/_ngag gi nyes par spyod pa bzhi/_yid kyi nyes par spyod pa gsum/_lus kyis legs par spyod pa/_srog gcod pa spong ba/_ma byin par len pa spong
[\[37b.3\]]kA ma mi th+yA tsA rA dwi ra tiH/_bAk+su tsa ri taM/_mr-iSha bA dAt+p+ra ti bi ra tiH/_bA ru ShAt+p+ra ti bi ra tiH/_ba shU n+yAt+p+ra ti bi ra tiH/_saM b+hin+na pra lA bAt+b+ra ti bi ra tiH/_ma na su tsa ri taM/_a b+hi d+h+yA yAHpra ti bi ra tiH/_byA bA dAta? pra ti bi ra tiH/_mi th+yA dr-iSh+TeHpra ti bir tiH/_/bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bzhi'i ming la/_bu nya kr-i
[\[37b.4\]]ba/_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spong ba/_ngag gi legs par spyod pa/_brdzun du smra ba spong ba/_tshig rtsub por smra ba spong ba/_phra mar smra ba spong ba/_tshig bkyal spong ba/_yid kyis legs par spyod pa/_brnab sems spong ba/_gnod sems spong ba/_log par lta ba spong ba/_bsod nams
[\[37b.5\]]yA bstuH/_dA na ma yaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/_shI la ma yaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/_b+hA ba nA ma yaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/_au ba d+hi kaM puN+ya kr-i yA bstuH/_gu NAH/_/don dam pa'i ming la/_ba ra mar+thaH/_tatwaM/_b+hU ta ko TiH/_ta tha
[\[37b.6\]]bya ba'i dngos po/_sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/_bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/_rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/_yon tan/_don dam pa/_de kho na/_yang dag pa'i mtha'/_de bzhin
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]tA/_a bi ta tha tA/_a na n+ya ta tha tA/_shU n+ya tA/_d+harma d+hA tuH/_d+harma ni yA ma tA/_a tsin+t+ya d+hA tuH/_a bi pa r+YA sa ta tha tA/_a dwa yaM/_a dwau d+hI kA raM/_d+har+m+ma s+thi ti tA/_s+thi tai ba d+har+m+ma d+hA tu s+thi ti
[\[38a.2\]]nyid/_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/_stong pa nyid/_chos kyi dbyings/_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings/_phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid/_gnyis su med/_gnyis su byar med/_chos gnas pa nyid/_chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul ni gnas
[\[38a.3\]]tA/_ai kai bai ShA ta thA tA/_d+har+m+ma d+hA twa sam+b+he daH/_a dwa ya me ta da dwau d+hA kA ra ma b+hin+na ma ts+tshin+naM/_/mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa'i ming la/_ni rbA NaM/_sau pa d+hi she Sha nir+b+bA NaM/_ni ru ba d+hi she Sha ni rbA
[\[38a.4\]]pa nyid do/_/de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig pa nyid do/_/chos kyi dbyings 'dres pa med pa'am dbyer med pa/_'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med cing tha mi dad de bcad du med/_mya ngan las 'das pa/_phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las
[\[38a.5\]]nama?/_a pra tiSh+Thi ta nir+b+bA Nama?/_ni shri ya saH/_a pa brgaH/_a b+hi sa ma yaH/_shai k+ShaH/_a shai k+ShaH/_nai ba shai k+Sha na shai k+ShaH/_samyak+t+wa ni ya ta rA shiH/_mi th+yA twa ni ya ta rA shiH/_a ni ya ta rA shiH/_/skyabs rnams kyi ming la/_sha ra NaM/_nA thaH/_pa rA

[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]ya NaM/_trA NaM/_pa ri trA naM/_tA yI/_la ya NaM/_ga ti/_dwI paH/_tA ra kaH/_ut+tA ra NaM/_pa ri trA tA/_ri mor bya ba'i rnam pa'i ming la/_ban+da naM/_pU dza nA/_mA na nA/_artsa nA/_a btsA ya nA/_tsit+ti kA raH/_sat+kA raH/_gu ru kA raH/_

[\[38b.5\]]shru ShA/_sa bra tI shaH/_sa gau ra baH/_se ba naM/_b+ha dza naM/_bar+Yu bA sa naM/_u pA sa naM/_saM se ba naM/_u pa se ba naM/_ba hu mA naH/_pra Ni pa t+yaM/_a b+hi pA da naM/_pUr+b+bA b+hi lA bI/_/spro zhing brtson pa la sogs pa'i ming la/_ut+s+r-i tsi taH/_ut+sA haH/_

[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]A ram+b+haH/_a tan+d+ri taH/_sat+k+r-i t+ya kA rI/_sA tan+t+ya kA rI/_ni ya kaH/_pra ti dz+nyot+ta ra kaH/_As+thi ti kr-i yA/_a b+hi yo gaH/_u d+yo gaH/_yo ga mA pan+ta byaM/_d+harmA

[\[39a.4\]]chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan/_mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu/_spro ba'am brtson pa skabs dang sbyar/_brtul ba'am pha rol gnon pa'am dpa' ba/_rtun pa/_brtun cing byed pa/_brtson pa'am zhugs pa/_'bad pa'am brtson pa/_ru shing ltar 'dzin pa'am ched cher 'dzin pa/_nan tan snying
[\[39a.5\]]pat+ti sA raH/_na byA hA ra ru ta bAk+pa ra maH/_byab sA yaH/_a b+h+yut+sA haH/_san+nA ha san+nad+d+haH/_dr-i D+ha sA raM/_ut+tap+taH/_ud+ya maH/_mi 'dzem pa'i ming la/_a b+hI ru tA bi sA ra daH/_ats+tsha b+hI/_nir+b+ha yaH/_a bi ShA daH/_
[\[39a.6\]]por byed pa/_brjod pa'i sgra dang smra ba lhur byed pa ma yin/_'bad pa'am rtsol ba/_mngon par spro ba/_go cha bgos/_sra zhing brtan pa/_'bar ba'am gsal ba'am sbyangs pa'am skabs dang sbyar/_nan tan nam 'bad pa/_mi 'jigs pa/_bag tsha ba med pa/_'jigs pa med pa/_zhum pa med pa/_mi
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]no trA sa ti na san+t+rA sa ti/_na san+t+rA sa mA pa d+ya ti/_na lI ya te/_na saM lI ya te/_na dze hrI ya te/_nArti ya te/_phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i ming la/_pany+tso pA dA na skan+d+hAH/_rU pa skan+d+haH/_be da na skan+d+haH/_saM dz+nyA skan+d+haH/_saM skA ra skan+d+haH/_bi dz+nyA na skan+d+haH/_/gzugs kyi phung po so sor phye ba'i ming la/_tsatwA ri ma hA d+hU tA ni/_
[\[39b.2\]]skrag mi dngangs/_dngangs par mi 'gyur/_mi zhum/_mi 'gong /_mi 'dzem/_mi ldog_/nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga/_gzugs kyi phung po/_chor ba'i phung po/_'du shes kyi phung po/_'du byed kyi phung po/_rnam par shes pa'i phung po/_'byung ba chen po bzhi/_
[\[39b.3\]]pr-i thi bI d+hA tuH/_ap+d+hA tuH/_te dzo d+hA tuH/_bA yu d+hA tuH/_kak+kha Ta twaM/_dra ba twaM/_uSh+Na twaM/_lag+hu sa mu dI ra Na twaM/_u pA dA ya rU paM/_dza na naM/_ni shre yaH/_s+thA naMH/_u pastam+b+haH/_u nga br-i ha NaM/_tsak+Shu rin+d+ri yaM/_shro ten+d+ri yaM/_g+h+rA Ne n+d+ri yaM/_dzi hwen+d+ri yaM/_kA
[\[39b.4\]]sa'i khams/_chu'i khams/_me'i khams/_rlung gi khams/_srab nyid/_gsher ba nyid/_tsha ba nyid/_yang zhing g.yo ba nyid/_rgyur byas pa'i gzugs/_skyed pa/_rten gnas/_rton pa/_'phel bar byed pa/_mig gi dbang po/_rna ba'i dbang po/_/sna'i dbang po/_/lce'i dbang po/_lus
[\[39b.5\]]yen+d+ri yaM/_rU pa pra sA daH rU paM/_shab+daH/_gan+d+haH/_rasaH/_spraSh+Ta byaM/_bar+N+Na rU paM/_nI laM/_bI taM/_lo hi taM/_a ba dA taM/_aphAM/_d+hU maH/_ra dzaH/_ma hi kA/_ts+tsha yA/_A tA baH/_A lo kaH an+d+ha kA raH/_saM s+thA na rU paM/_dIr+g+haM/_hra swaM/_prit+taM/_pa ri maN+Da laM/_
[\[39b.6\]]kyi dbang po/_/gzugs dang ba/_gzugs/_sgra/_dri/_ro/_reg bya/_kha dog gi gzugs/_sngon po/_ser po/_dmar po/_dkar po/_sprin/_du ba/_rdul/_khug rna/_grib ma/_nyi ma/_snang ba/_mun pa/_dbyibs kyi gzugs/_ring po/_/thung ngu /_lham ba/_zlum po/_phya le
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]shA taM/_bi shA taM/_b+hau ti ka rU baM/_un+na taM/_a ba na taM/_tsa tu ra sraM/_bi dz+nyA pra tI/_sa ni daR+sha naM/_a ni darga naM/_sa pra hi g+haH/_a pra ti g+haH/_a nu pAt+ta ma hA b+hU ta he tu kaH/_satwA
[\[40a.2\]]ba'am mnyam pa/_phya le ba ma yin pa'am mi mnyam pa/_'byung ba las gyur pa'i gzugs/_mthon po/_/dma' ba/_gru bzhi/_rnam par rig byed/_bstan du yod pa/_bstan du med pa/_thogs pa dang bcas pa/_thogs pa med pa/_ma zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba/_sems can
[\[40a.3\]]khyo\u0f85sa twA khyaH/_ma no dz+nyA ma no dz+nyAsh+tsa/_u bAt+ta ma hA b+hU ta he tu kaH/_satwA khyo satwA khyaH/_ma no dz+nyA ma no dz+nyAsh+tsaH/_su gan+d+haH/_durgan+d+haH/_sa ma gan+d+haH/_bi Sha ma gan+d+haH/_ma d+hUraH/_am+laH/_la ba NaH/_ka Tu kaH/_tik+taH/_
[\[40a.4\]]ston pa dang sems can du mi ston pa/_yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba/_zin pa'i 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba/_sems can du ston pa dang sems can du mi ston pa/_yid du 'ong ba dang yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_dri zhim pa/_dring ba/_dri mnyam pa/_dri mi mnyam pa/_mngar ba/_skyur ba/_lan tshwa/_tsha ba/_kha ba/_
[\[40a.5\]]ka ShA yaH/_sh+lak+Sh+Na twaM/_karka sha twaM/_gu ru twaM/_lag+hu twaM/_shI taM/_bu b+huk+ShA/_dzi g+hat+sA/_bi bA sA/_a bi dz+nyAp+tiH/_tshor ba'i phung po so sor byed pa'i ming la/_su khA/_duHkhA/_a duHkhA su khA/_/'du shes kyi phung po so sor bye ba'i ming la/_pa rIt+tA/_ma hAd+b+hu tA/_a pra mA nA/_/sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'du
[\[40a.6\]]bska ba/_'jam pa/_rtsub ba/_lci ba/_yang ba/_grang ba/_bkres pa/_bkres pa'am ltogs pa/_skom pa/_rnam par rig byed ma yin/_bde ba/_sdug bsngal/_bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin/_chung ngu /_chen por gyur pa/_tshad med pa/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]byed dang /_sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i 'du byad kyi ming la/_tsai ta si kA d+harmAH/_spaR+shaH/_saM dz+nyA/_be da nA/_ma na skA raH/_tse ta nA/_ts+tshan+daH/_a d+hi mo k+ShaH/_smr-i tiH/_pra dz+nyA/_sa mA d+hiH/_shrad+d+hA/_hrIH/_a ba trA byam/_a lo b+haHku sha la mU laM/_a dwe ShaHku sha la mU laM/_a mo haH
[\[40b.2\]]sems las byung ba'i chos rnams/_reg pa/_'du shes/_tshor ba/_yid la byed pa/_sems pa/_'dun pa/_mos pa/_dran pa/_shes rab/_ting 'dzin/_dad pa/_ngo tsha shes pa/_khrel yod pa/_ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/_zhe sdang med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/_gti mug
[\[40b.3\]]ku sha la mU laM/_bI r+YaM/_pra sab+d+hiH/_a bra mA daH/_u pek+ShA/_a hiM sA/_rA gaH/_bra ti g+haH/_mA naH/_a d+hi mA naH/_mA nA ti mA naH/_asmi mA naH/_a b+hi mA naH/_U na mA naH/_mi th+yA mA naH/_a bi d+yA/_dr-iSh+TiH
[\[40b.4\]]med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba/_brtson 'grus/_shin tu sbyangs pa/_bag yod pa/_btang snyoms/_mi 'tshe ba/_'dod chags/_khong khro ba/_nga rgyal/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal/_nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal/_nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal/_cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal/_log pa'i nga rgyal/_ma rig pa/_lta ba/_
[\[40b.5\]]sat+kA ya dr-iSh+TiH/_an+ta grA ha dr-iSh+TiH/_mi th+yA dr-iSh+TiH/_dr-iSh+Ti pa rA maR+shaH/_shI la bra ta pa rA maR+shaH/_bi tsi kit+sA/_kro d+haH/_u pa nA haH/_mrak+ShaH/_pra dA saH/_iR+ShA/_mat+ma r+YaM/_mA yA/_shA d+h+yaM/_ma daH/_bi hiM sA/_a hrI kyaM/_a na pa trA byaM/_a
[\[40b.6\]]'jig tshogs la lta ba/_mthar 'dzin par lta ba/_log par lta ba/_lta ba mchog tu 'dzin pa/_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa/_the tshom/_khro ba/_khon du 'dzin pa/_'chab pa/_'tshig pa/_phrag dog_/ser sna/_sgyu/_g.yo/_rgyags pa/_rnam par 'tshe ba/_ngo tsha med pa/_khrel med pa/_ma
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]shrad+d+h+yaM/_kau shI d+yaM/_pra mAdaH/_mu Shi ta smr-i ti tA/_bi k+ShepaH/_a sam+p+ra dza n+yaM/_aud+d+ha t+yaM/_kau kr-i t+yaM/_s+t+yA naM/_mi d+d+haM/_bi tarkaH/_bi tsA raH/_prAp+tiH/_a prAp+tiH/_a saM dz+nyAM sa mA bat+tiH/_ni ro d+ha sa mA pat+ti/_a saM dz+nyi kaM/_

[\[41a.3\]]dzA+e bi ten+d+ri yaM/_ni kA ya sa b+hA gaH/_dzA tiH/_dza rA/_s+thi tiH/_a ni t+ya tA/_nA makA yaH/_pa da ka yaH/_byany+dza na kA yaH/_e baM b+hA gI yA/_bra br-it+tiH/_pra ti ni ya maH/_yo gaH/_dzA baH/_a nu kra maH/_kA laH/_de shaH/_saM khyA/_b+he daH/_sA ma grI/_pra ban+d+haH/_

[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]bi dz+nyA naM/_/skye mched bcu gnyis kyi ming la/_tsak+Shu rA ya ta naM/_rU pA ya ta naM/_shro trA ya ta naM/_shab+dA ya ta naM/_g+h+rA NA ya ta naM/_gan+d+hA ya ta naM/_dzi hwA ya ta naM/_ra sA ya ta naM/_kA yA ya ta naM/_sbraSh+Ta byA ya ta naM/_ma na A ya ta naM/_d+harmA ya ta naM/_/khams bco brgyad kyi ming la/_tsak+Shu r+b+hA tuH/_rU pa

[\[41b.3\]]d+hA tuH/_tsak+Shurbi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/_shro tra d+hA tuH/_shab+da d+hA tuH/_shro tra bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/_g+h+rA Na d+hA tuH/_gan+d+ha d+hA tuH/_g+h+rA Na bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/_dzi hwa d+hA tuH/_ra sa d+hA tuH/_dzi hwa bi dz+nyA na d+hA tuH/_kA ya d+hA tuH/_spraSh+Ta bya d+hA tuH/_kA ya bi dz+nyA na d+hA
[\[41b.4\]]kyi khams/_mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams/_rna ba'i khams/_sgra'i khams/_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/_sna'i khams/_dri'i khams/_sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/_lce'i khams/_ro'i khams/_lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/_lus kyi khams/_reg bya'i khams/_lus kyi rnam par shes

[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]na s+yan+d+ri yaM/_u pe k+Shen+d+ri yaM/_shrad+d+hen+d+ri yaM/_bI r+Ye n+d+raM yaM/_smr-i tIn+d+raM yaM/_sa mA d+hIn+d+ri yaM/_bradz+nyen+d+ri yaM/_a nA dz+nyA ta mA dz+nyA s+yA mIn+d+ri yaM/_A dz+nyen+d+ri yaM/_A dz+nyA tA bIn+d+ri yaM/_dzI bi ten+d+ri yaM/_/phung po khams dang

[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bi shaSh+TaH/_a pa kA raH/_bai rA nu ban+d+haH/_tsaN+Da ba tso dA shi tA/_byA ro ShaH/_A gra haH/_bany+tsa nA/_pa r+YA dA naM/_bi he Tha nA/_bi bra ti sA raH/_ma no dzalpa/_ma hAb+hU mi kaH/_sa ha dzaH/_ba ri kalpi haM/_At+ma mo haH/_
[\[42b.2\]]'phags pa/_gnod par byed pa/_mdud par 'dzin pa/_tshig brlang pos zher 'debs pa/_khong nas 'khrug pa/_kun du 'dzin pa/_slu pa/_yongs su gtugs pa'am 'phyos pa/_tho 'tshams pa/_yid la bcags pa/_yid la brjod pa'am rtog pa/_sa chen po pa/_lhan cig skyes pa/_kun du brtag pa/_bdag tu rmongs pa/_
[\[42b.3\]]At+ma dr-iSh+TiH/_At+ma mA naH/_At+ma sne haH/_san+tA nA nu br-it+tiH/_e ka dzA tI ya bi dz+nyA naM/_sa b+hA gaH/_tat+sa b+hA gaH/_nirbitra/_kAM k+ShaH/_bi ma tiH/_a nu na yaH/_kA ma rA gaH/_b+ha ba rA gaH/_saM yo dza naM/_

[\[42b.5\]]ban+d+ha naM/_a nu sha yaH/_par+Yu N+th+'a naM/_u pa kle shaH/_par+Ya bas+thA naM/_par+Ya ba na d+d+haM/_A shra baH/_o g+haH/_yo gaH/_u pA dA naM/_gran+thaH/_ni ba ra NaM/_kA ma pra ti saM yuk+taM/_rU pa bra ti saM yuk+taM/_ArU bya bra ti saM yuk+taM/_daR+sha na pra hA ta byaM/_

[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]b+hA ba na pra hA ta byaM/_kA mAp+taH/_kA ma d+hA tu par+YA pan+naH/_kA mA ba tsa raH/_ur+d+ha b+hA gI yaH/_a pa ra b+hA gI yaH/_ang+ga NaM/_sa ra NaM/_a haM kA raH/_ma ma kA raH/_dIr+g+hA
[\[43a.2\]]sgom pas spang bar bya ba/_'dod par bsdus pa/_'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa/_'dod pa na spyod pa/_gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa/_tha ma'i cha dang mthun pa/_nyon mongs pa'i ming ste 'od man skor ba/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa/_ngar 'dzin pa'am nga rgyal/_bdag gir 'dzin pa/_ring du
[\[43a.3\]]nu pa ri bar+t+tI/_sa dA nu bad+d+ho b+ha ba ti/_pra ti san+d+hiH/_saM sA raH/_san+d+him+bA p+no ti/_sa ma nu ban+d+haH/_tsit+tA nu pa ri bar+t+tI/_a nu sa hi taMH/_sa ma gra sA ma grI/_pra ti sa m+ba d+hA ti/_a pra ti san+d+hiH/_a nu bar+t+ta naM/_san+tA na
[\[43a.4\]]rjes su 'brang ba/_rtag tu rjes su 'brang par 'gyur/_nying mtshams sbyor ba/_'khor ba/_'brel par byed pa/_rjes su 'brang ba/_sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_rjes su 'brel pa/_'du ba tshogs pa/_nying mtshams sbyor ba'am 'brel bar byed pa/_mtshams sbyor ba med pa/_rjes su 'jug pa/_rgyu la 'bras bu
[\[43a.5\]]bar+t+tI/_A nuts+tsha bi kaH/_a nu san+d+hiH/_sA nu tsA raH/_pra bA haH/_a nu ban+d+haH/_a dza srama?/_a nu ga taH/_a b+hU twAb+hA baH/_ya thA yo gaM/_a saM skr-i taM/_pra ti saM khyA ni ro d+haH/_a pra ti saM khyA
[\[43a.6\]]rgyud la yod pa skad dod dang 'di 'grig kyang don thob kyis dkyus bzhin 'gyur bcos pa'ang mchad/_yod pa/_'phrod pa'am 'byor pa/_mtshams sbyor ba/_'khor dang bcas pa/_rgyun/_rgyun chags pa/_rgyun mi 'chad pa'am khor mor/_rjes su song ba'am rjes su zhugs pa'am rjes su mthun pa/_ma byung ba las byung ba/_ci rigs par/_'dus ma byas/_so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa/_so sor brtags pa ma
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]ni ro d+haH/_suM skr-i taH/_sA sa baH/_a nA sra baH/_/chags pa dang zhen pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/_rak+taH/_sak+taH/_gr-id+d+haH/_graM thi taM/_mU r+ts+tshi taM/_ad+h+ya ba si taH/_ad+h+ya ba sA na mA pan+naH/_a bya ba sA naM/_bi ni ban+d+hAM/_pa ri gred+haH/_saM rA gaH/_lo lu paH/_
[\[43b.2\]]yin pa'i 'gog pa/_'dus byas/_zag pa dang bcas pa/_zag pa med pa/_chags pa/_zhen pa/_chums pa'am mkhron pa/_mdud pa bor ba/_brgyal ba/_lhag par chags pa/_lhag par chags par gyur pa/_lhag par zhen pa/_rnam par bcings pa/_yongs su zhen pa/_kun du 'dod chags/_bskam pa/_
[\[43b.3\]]g+hasma raH/_lam+pa TaH/_lub+d+haH/_saM rak+taH/_rany+dza nI yaH/_b+hU ya skA ma tA/_yA dr-its+tshi kaH/_its+tshan+ti kaH/_b+hU yats+tshan+di kaH/_b+hU yo ru tsitA/_b+hU yo\u0f85b+hi prA yaH/_swA
[\[43b.4\]]lto che ba'am za phod pa/_dad che ba'am lto che ba/_brkam chags/_kun du chags/_chags pa 'gyur ba/_yang 'dod pa'am phyir zhing 'dod pa'am mang du 'dod pa'am 'dod pa/_'dod rgyal/_'dod chen/_phyir zhing sred pa'am phyir zhing 'dun pa/_phyir zhing dad che ba/_phyir zhing sems pa'am mang du sems pa/_myang bar
[\[43b.5\]]du kA ma tA/_bi tsi tA hA ra tA/_ne ta re ta re Na san+tuSh+TiH/_nan+dI rA gaH/_kA mats+tshan+daH/_a b+hi ni be shaH/_As+thA/_spr-i hA/_ro tsa naH/_its+tsha n+ti kaH/_ya' dr-its+tshi kaH/_tIpre Nats+tshan+de na/_A hA re gr-id+d+hir+b+ha ba tiH/_
[\[43b.6\]]'dod pa'am zhim por 'dod pa/_zas 'dam pa/_ngan ngon gyis chog mi shes pa/_dga' ba'i 'dod chags/_'dod pa la 'dun pa/_mngon par zhen ba/_chags pa'am zhen pa/_'dod pa'am re ba'am dga' ba/_'dod pa'am sred pa/_'dod chen pa/_'dod rgyal ba/_'dun pa drag pos/_kha zas la brkam par 'gyur/_
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]gAr+d+d+hama?/_/sdug bsngal gsum gyi ming la/_duHkha duH kha tA/_saM skA ra duHkha tA/_bi ba ri NA ma duHkha tA/_/sdug bsngal brgyad kyi ming la/_dzA ti duHkhaM/_dza rA duHkhaM/_byA d+hi duHkhaM/_ma ra Na duHkhaM/_pri ya bi bra yo go duHkhaM/_a pri ya saM pra yo
[\[44a.2\]]zhen pa/_sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal/_'du byed kyi sdug bsngal/_'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal/_skye ba'i sdug bsngal/_rga ba'i sdug bsngal/_na ba'i sdug bsngal/_'chi ba'i sdug bsngal/_sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal/_mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug
[\[44a.3\]]go duHkhaM/_ya da pIts+tsha paR+Ye Sha mA No na la b+ha te ta da pi duHkhaM/_saM k+She pe Na pany+tso pA dA na skan+d+ha duHkhaM/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi ming la/_a bi d+yA/_saM skA raH/_bi dz+nyA naM/_nA ma rU paM/_Sha DA ya ta naM/_spaR+shaH/_be da nA/_triSh+NA/_u bA dA naM/_b+ha baH/_dzA tiH/_dza rA ma ra NaM/_sho
[\[44a.4\]]bsngal/_gang 'dod pa btsal te ma rnyed par de yang sdug bsngal/_mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal/_/ma rig pa/_'du byed/_rnam par shes pa/_ming dang gzugs/_skye mched drug/_reg pa/_tshor ba/_sred pa/_len pa/_srid pa/_skye pa/_rga shi/_mya
[\[44a.5\]]kaH/_pa ri de baH/_duHkhaM/_daurman s+yaM/_u bA yA saH/_/rgyu drug gi ming la/_kA ra Na he tuH/_sa hA b+hU he tuH/_bi pA ka he tuH/_sam+p+ra yuk+ta ka he tuH/_sarba tra ga he tuH/_sa ma b+hA ga he tuH/_/rkyen bzhi'i ming la/_he tu pra t+ya yaH/_sa man n+ta ra pra t+ya yaH/_A laM ba na pra t+ya yaH/_a d+hi pa
[\[44a.6\]]ngan/_smre sngags 'don pa/_sdug bsngal ba/_yid mi bde ba/_'khrug pa/_byed pa'i rgyu/_lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu/_rnam par smin pa'i rgyu/_mtshungs par ldan pa'i rgyu/_kun du 'gro ba'i rgyu/_skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu/_rgyu'i rkyen/_de ma thag pa'i rkyen/_dmigs pa'i rkyen/_bdag
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]te prat+ya yaH/_/'bras bu lnga'i ming la/_ni Sh+yan+da pha laM/_a d+hi pa ti pha laM/_pu ru Sha kA ra pha laM/_bi pA ka pha laM/_bi saM yo ga pha laM/_/skye gnas bzhi'i ming la/_dzA rA yu dzA/_aN+Da dzA/_saM swe da dzA/_u ba bA du kA/_/zas bzhi'i ming la/_
[\[44b.2\]]po'i rkyen/_rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu/_bdag po'i 'bras bu/_skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu skabs gzhan du skyes bu'i mthur yang gdags/_rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu/_bral ba'i 'bras bu/_mngal nas skye ba/_sgo nga las skye ba/_drod gsher las skye ba/_rdzus te skye ba/_
[\[44b.3\]]ka ba ti kA hA raH/_spaR+ShA hA raH/_ma na saM tse ta nA hA raH/_bi dz+nyA na mA hA raH/_/sems can gyi gnas dgu'i ming la/_na ba sa twA bA sAH/_nA nA twa kA yAH/_nA nA twa saM dz+nyi naH/_tad+ya thA ma nuSh+yA e ka t+yush+tsa de bAH/_nA nA twa ka yAH/_e ka twa saM dz+nyi naH/_tad+ya thA de ba brah+ma kA yi kAHbra tha mA b+hi nir+b+r-it+tA/_e ka
[\[44b.4\]]kham gyi zas/_reg pa'i zas/_yid la sems pa'i zas/_rnam par shes pa'i zas/_sems can gyi gnas dgu/_lus tha dad cing /_'du shes tha dad ba dag/_dper na mi rnams dang lha kha cig go_/lus tha dad la/_'du shes gcig pa dag/_dper na tshangs ris kyi lha dag dang por 'byung pa'o/_/lus
[\[44b.5\]]twa kA yAH/_nA nA twa saM dz+nyinaH/_tad+ya thA A b+hA swa rAH/_e ka twa kA yAH/_e ka twa saM dz+nyi naH/_tad+ya thA de bA shu b+ha kr-it+s+nAH/_A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta naM/_bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya naM/_A kiny+tsa n+yA ya ta naM/_nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta naM/_a saM
[\[44b.6\]]gcig la/_'du shes tha dad pa dag_/dper na 'od gsal ba rnams so/_/lus gcig la/_'du shes gcig pa dag_/dper na dge rgyas kyi lha rnams so/_/nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched/_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched/_'du shes med
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]dz+nyi sa twA/_/mi khom pa brgyad kyi ming la/_aSh+TA bak+ShaNAH/_na ra kA/_tir+Ya ny+tsaH/_pre tA/_dIr+g+hA yu Sho de bA/_bra t+yan+ta dza na pa daM/_in+d+ri ya bai ka l+yaM/_me th+yA da R+sha naM/_ta thA ga tA nA ma nu t+pA daM/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa la sogs pa'i ming la/_dr-iSh+Ti d+ha rma pe da nI yaM/_u pa
[\[45a.2\]]pa'i sems can/_mi khom brgyad/_sems can dmyal ba/_dud 'gro/_yi dgas/_lha tshe ring po/_/mtha' 'khob kyi mi/_dbang po mtshang ba/_log par lta ga de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung ba/_mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba/_skyes
[\[45a.3\]]pa d+ya be da nI yaM/_a pa ra par+YA ya be da nI yaM/_ni ya ta be da nI yaM/_a ni ya ta be da nI yaM/_karma swa kaH/_karma dA ya daH/_kar+m+ma yo niH/_karma pra ti sa ra Na ma?/_pra yo gaH/_mo laM/_pr-iSh+TaM/_A se bi taM/_b+hA
[\[45a.4\]]nas myong bar 'gyur ba/_lan grangs gzhan la myong bar 'gyur ba/_myong bar 'gyur bar nges pa/_myong bar 'gyur bar ma nges pa/_las bdag gir bya ba/_las kyi bgo skal spyod pa/_las kyi skye gnas pa/_las brten par bya ba/_sbyor ba/_dngos gzhi/_'jug_/bsten pa'am bsnyen ba/_bsgom pa'am goms
[\[45a.5\]]bi taM/_ba hu lI kr-i taM/_/mtshams med lnga'i ming la/_mA tr-i g+hA taH/_a r+had+ba d+haH/_pi tr-i g+hA taH/_sang+g+ha b+he daH/_ta thA ga ta s+yAn+ti ke duSh+Ta tsit+ta ru d+hi ro t+bA da naM/_/mtshams med pa dag nye ba lnga'i ming la/_mA tu rar+haMn+t+yA du Sha NaM/_ni ya ta b+hu mi s+thi ta s+ya bo d+hi satwa s+ya nA ra NaM/_
[\[45a.6\]]par byas pa/_lan mang du byas pa/_ma bsad pa/_dgra bcom pa bsad pa/_pha bsad pa/_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba/_ma dgra bcom ma sun phyung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' nges pa'i sa la gnas pa bsad pa/
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]shai k+Sha s+ya mAr NaM/_saM g+hA ya dwAR+Ya ha ra NaM/_stU pa b+he da naM/_/snyigs ma lnga'i ming la/_A yu ska ShA yaH/_dr-iSh+Ti ka ShA yaH/_kle sha ka ShA saH/_sa twa ka ShA yaH/_kalpa ka ShA yaH/_/'jig rten chos brgyad gyi ming la/_lA b+haH/_a lA b+haH/_ya shaH/_a ya shaH/_nin+dA/_pra shaM saH/_su khaM/_duH khaM/_
[\[45b.2\]]slob pa bsad pa/_dge 'dun gyi 'du ba'i sgo phrog pa/_mchod rten 'jig pa/_tshe'i snyigs ma/_lta ba'i snyigs ma/_nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma/_sems can gyi snyigs ma/_dus kyi snyigs ma/_rnyed pa/_ma rnyed pa/_snyan pa/_mi snyan pa/_smad pa/_bstod pa/_bde ba/_sdug bsngal/_
[\[45b.3\]]yon tan sna tshogs kyi ming la/_d+harmAr+thi kaH/_bo d+hi tsit+tA sam+p+ro mo ShaH/_a ni shri taH/_u dA rA d+hi muk+ti kaH/_A tsA ra shI laH/_A tsA ra s+thaH/_kr-i ta be dI/_kr-i ta dz+nyaH/_A dz+nyA ka raH/_su kha saM bA saH/_sU ra haH/_bai sa laH/_r-i dzu tsit+taH/_
[\[45b.4\]]chos don du gnyer ba'am chos 'dod pa/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa/_mi gnas pa'am mi brten pa/_rgya chen po la mos pa/_cho ga'i ngang tshul can/_cho ga la gnas pa/_byas pa tshor ba/_byas pa gzo ba/_bka' bzhin byed pa/_'grogs na bde ba/_nges pa/_nges pa'am gya nom pa/_sems drang po/_/
[\[45b.5\]]Ardza baH/_mArda baH/_pra dak+Shi Na grA hI/_su ba tsA/_bra tits+tshan+da ka l+yA NaH/_alba ka ra NI yaH/_a lba kr-it+YaH/_a lwets+tshaH/_Ar+Ya baM sha san+tuSh+TaH/_d+harma lA b+ha san+tuSh+TaH/_tsI ba ra san+tuSh+TaH/_biN+Da pA tra san+tuSh+TaH/_sha la nA sa na san+tuSh+TaH/_su po
[\[45b.6\]]gnas po/_/mnyen pa/_mthun par 'dzin pa/_bka' blo bde ba/_dge ba mi choms pa/_byed pa nyung ba/_bya ba nyung ba/_'dod pa chung ba/_'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog shes pa/_chos kyi rnyed pas chog par 'dzin pa/_gos kyis chog bar 'dzin pa/_bsod snyoms kyis chog shes pa/_mal stan gyis chog shes pa/_gso
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]Sha tA/_su b+ha ra tA/_nan+da b+hA Sh+yo b+ha ba ti/_na tsa pa re ShAM do ShAn+ta ras+kha li ta ga be ShI/_ka l+yA Na mi tre Na pa ri gr-i hI taH/_ba hu shru taH/_iM gi ta dz+nyaH/_su bra bud+d+haH/_ut+g+haT+Ti ta dz+nyaH/_bi
[\[46a.2\]]sla ba/_dgang sla ba/_nyung du smra ba yin/_gzhan dag nyes pa'i skabs dang 'khrul pa mi tshol/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa/_mang du thos pa/_zur tsam gyis go ba/_legs par sad pa'am legs par khong du chud pa/_mgo smos bas go ba/_rnam par spros pas go
[\[46a.3\]]pany+tsi ta dz+nyaH/_su shru taH/_de sha dz+nyaH/_lo ka dz+nyaH/_At+ma dz+nyaH/_kA la dz+nyaH/_be la dz+nyaH/_sa ma ya dz+nyaH/_mA tra dz+nyaH/_A rA ga ya ti/_na bi rA ga ya ti/_a pa ra pra t+ya yaH/_a pa rA d+hI naH/_a pa ra
[\[46a.4\]]ba'am zhib tu bshad na go ba/_legs par mnyan pa/_yul shes pa/_'jig rten shes pa/_bdag shes pa/_dus shes pa/_tshod shes pa/_dus man shes ba/_drod rig pa'am tshod shes pa/_mnyes par byed/_thugs dbyung par mi byed/_gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog ba/_gzhan lar gam las pa/_gzhan gyi dring la
[\[46a.5\]]pra Ne yaH/_a na n+ya ne yaH/_bi kra mI/_bI raH/_shU raH/_bi hA ya sa gA mI/_prA sA di kaH/_a pag ta b+h+r-i ku Ti kaH/_ats+tshi dro pa tsA raH/_a mA ya bI/_ya thA bA dI ta thA kA rI/_dr-i D+ha sa mA dA naH/_b+ha ya
[\[46a.6\]]mi 'jog pa/_gzhan gyis mi dkri ba'am gzhan gyis kha drang du mi rung ba/_rtsal chen po/_dpa' ba'am rtul phod pa/_dpa' bo/_nam mkha' 'gro ba/_tshul du shis pa'am mdzes pa/_khro gnyer med pa/_nye bar spyod pa la skyon med pa/_sgyu med pa/_ji skad smras pa bzhin du byed pa/_yi dam la brtan pa/_'jigs
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]daR+shI/_ba tsa sA pa ri dzi taH/_pa ri dzi taH/_su sa mAp+taH/_su sa mA rab+d+haH/_ma na sAnyan+wI k+Shi taH/_dr-iSh+T+yA su pra ti bid+d+haH/_bI ta tr-iSh+Na m+b+ha bA b+ha be/_yA nI kr-i taH/_bstu kr-i taH/_a nuSh+Thi taH/_
[\[46b.2\]]par lta ba/_kha ton byang ba/_legs par byang ba/_shin tu rdzogs par byas pa/_legs par brtsams pa/_yid kyis brtag pa/_mthong bas shin tu rtogs pa/_'byung ba dang 'jig pa la sred pa dang bral ba/_lam du byas pa'am bgrod bar byas pa/_dngos por byas pa'am rten du byas pa/_nan tan du byas pa/_
[\[46b.3\]]sa ma ba han+ti/_A d+hu nA ti/_sarba ka ShaT+TaM shA Da ya ti/_shushrU Sha mA NaH/_a nu bi d+hI ya mA naH/_a nu sU yA/_a nu pA laM b+ha pre k+Shi NaH/_a ba hi ta sro traH/_A ba dzi ta mA na saH/_d+harmo d+harma lab+d+haH/_ni kA ma lA
[\[46b.4\]]yang dag par 'dzom pa'am sel ba/_sprug pa/_snyigs ma thams cad sel ba/_nyan 'dod pa'am gus ba/_bsgo ba bzhin nyan pa'am rjes su 'jug pa/_ma rangs pa med pa'am mi bzod pa med pa/_klan ka mi tshol ba/_rna blags pa/_sems btud pa'am sems bsdus pa/_chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis thob ba/_ci 'dod pa bzhin thob
[\[46b.5\]]b+hI/_a kr-its+tsha lA b+hI/_a ki sa ra lA b+hI/_ku la dz+yeSh+Tho pa tsA ya kaH/_shAstuHshA sa na ka raH/_a ni rA kr-i to d+h+yA yI/_br-iM ha yi tA shU n+yA b+hA rA NAM/_swa kAr+tha yo gam nu yuk+taH/_a mo g+ha rASh+Ta piN+DaM ba ri
[\[46b.6\]]pa/_dka' ba med par thob pa/_tshegs med par thob pa'am ngan ngon ma yin par thob pa/_rigs kyi nang nas rgan rabs la ri mor byed pa/_ston pa'i bstan pa spyod pa/_mi gtong bar bsgom pa/_khyim stong pa rgyas par byed pa/_rang gi don sbyor ba la rjes su brtson pa/_yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]b+huk+taM/_u pa ro d+ha shI laH/_/skyon du brtsi ba'i ming la/_bi Sha ma lo b+haH/_mi th+yA d+harma pa rI taH/_At+mot+kaR+Sha/_pa ra paM se kaH/_A b+hi mA ni kaH/_ku Ti la tsit+taH/_hI nA d+hi muk+ti kaH/_gra hi kaH/_kha Tung+kaH/_ud+d+ha taH/_un+na taH/_
[\[47a.2\]]'bras bu yod par za ba/_ngo mi chod pa'am ngo mi zlog pa/_mi rigs par chags pa/_chos log pas dkris pa/_bdag la bstod pa/_gzhan la smod pa/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can/_sems gya gyu can/_dman pa la mos pa/_dus po che/_dmu rgod/_rgod pa/_pho che ba'am khengs pa/_
[\[47a.3\]]karka shaH/_pa ru ShaH/_nI tsa br-it+tiH/_lA b+he na lA b+ha niSh+tsi kIR+ShA/_a b+hA dza na b+hu ta satwaH/_alpa shru taH/_a brA h+ma N+yaM/_a shram N+yaM/_a pi tr-i dz+nyA/_a mA tr-i dz+nyA/_a d+harma ka maH/_pA pa d+harmaH/_dz+nyA tra kA maH/_ba hu
[\[47a.4\]]brlangs pa'am rtsub pa/_zhe gcod pa'am rtsub pa/_dman pa la 'jug pa/_rnyed pas rnyed par byed 'dod pa/_sems can snod du ma gyur pa/_thos pa nyung ba/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_phar mi 'dzin pa/_mar mi 'dzin pa/_chos ma yin pa 'dod pa/_sdig pa'i chos can/_shes kyi khe 'dod pa/_bya ba
[\[47a.5\]]kr-it+yaM/_ba hu ka ra NI yaH/_pradz+nyA daurba l+yaM/_duHshI laH/_duSh+p+ra dz+nyA/_mnad pra dz+nyA/_duSh+po Sha tA/_dur+b+ha ra tA/_saM kIr+No bi ha ra ti/_A mi Sha kiM tsing+ka he toH/_duHshru taM/_pa da pa ra maH/_a saM pra ka? khyA naM/_a b+hA bi ta kA yaH/_pra gal+b+haH
[\[47a.6\]]mang ba/_byed pa mang ba/_shes rab zhan pa/_tshul khrims 'chal pa/_shes rab 'chal pa/_shes rab zhan pa/_gso dka' ba/_dgang dka' ba/_'dres par gnas pa/_zang zing cung zad kyi phyir/_mnyan nyes pa/_tshig la 'chel pa/_mi gsal ba/_lus ma bsgoms pa'am lus ma sbyangs pa/_spyis brtsan pa'am spyi
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]d+hAr+Sh+T+rA/_mu kha raH/_a k+Sha d+hUr+t+taH/_g+hasma raH/_mAt+sa raH/_ka da yaM/_kha laH/_sha ThaH/_d+hUr+t+taH bi TaH/_mA yA bI/_ku ra ku tsiHdam+b+haHku ha naM/_la ba naM/_nai mit+ti ka twaM/_nai Sh+ye shi ka twaM/_lA b+he na lA b+ha ni Sh+pa da nA/_satwa bi kra yaH/_shas+t+ra bi kra
[\[47b.2\]]rtol che ba/_mu cor smra ba'am kha drag pa/_rgyan po la dor ba/_lto che ba/_ser sna can/_'jungs pa/_mi srun pa/_g.yo sgyu can/_g.yo can/_sgyu byed pa/_ngan g.yo'am tshul 'chos ba ngan pa/_kha gsag gzhogs slongs/_thob kyis 'jal ba/_rnyed pa las rnyed pa sgrub pa/_sems can 'tshong ba/_mtshon cha 'tshong
[\[47b.3\]]yaH/_bi Sha bi kra yaH/_maM sa bi kra yaH/_ma d+ya bi kra yaH/_durman+kuH/_Shad+b+ho gA nA ma pA yas+thA nA ni/_ma d+ya pA naM/_d+yU taM/_bi kA la tsar+Ya/_pA ba mi tra tA/_sa ma dzA daR+sha naM/_A la s+yaM/_/bla na med pa dang mchog tu brtsi ba'i rnam grangs dang dag pa dang grol ba la sogs pa'i ming las/_a nut+ta raH/_ni rut+ta raH/_
[\[47b.4\]]ba/_dug 'tshong ba/_sha 'tshong ba/_chang 'tshong ba/_gnong mi bskur ba/_longs spyod bri ba'i gnas drug_/chang 'thung ba/_rgyan po/_mtshan mo 'phyan pa/_sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pa/_'dus pa la lta ba/_le lo/_bla na med pa dang mchog tu brtsi ba'i rnam grangs kyi ming la/_bla na med pa/_gong na med pa/_
[\[47b.5\]]a nut+ta maH/_ut+ta raH/_ut+ta maH/_dz+yeSh+ThaH/_shreSh+ThaH/_ba raH pra ba raH/_a graH/_bi shiSh+TaH/_pra d+hA naM/_pa ra maH/_utra kr-iSh+TaH pra kr-iSh+TaH/_pra NI taH/_a sa maH/_a sa ma sa maH/_a pra ti sa maH/_suSh+ThuH/_a t+yan+taM/_sarbA kA
[\[47b.6\]]ltag na med pa/_bla ma/_dam pa/_thu bo'am rgan rabs/_gtso bo/_rab/_rab mchog_/mchog_/khyad par du 'phags pa/_gtso bo'am gces pa/_dam pa'am dbyig_/mchog tu byung ba/_gya nom pa/_mnyam pa med pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_zla med pa/_rab tu/_mchog tu/_rnam pa thams cad kyi
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]ra ba ro be taM/_praSh+Tha/_/dag pa dang grol ba la sogs pa'i ming la/_su ba ri shud+d+haM/_tr-i maN+Da la pa ri shud+haM/_a nu bA dA ya A shra be b+t+yaHtsit+tA ni bi muk+tA ni/_pa ri mo tsa yi ta byaM/_pi mu ts+ya te/_shrI tI b+ha ba ti/_
[\[48a.2\]]mchog dang ldan pa/_mchog gam gtso bo/_shin tu yongs su dag pa/_'khor gsum yongs su dag pa/_len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol ba/_yongs su thar bar bya ba'am yongs su grol ba/_rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_bsil bar gyur pa/_
[\[48a.3\]]kr-i ta pa ri karmA/_ni r+YA NaM/_ni r+YA taH/_ni r+YA ti/_/spangs pa dang dor ba la sogs pa'i ming la/_pra ti ni sr-i dz+nyaM/_bAn+tI kr-i taM/_sarbo pa d+hi pra ti ni sargaH/_bya n+tI kr-i tama?/_bi skaM b+ha NaM/_riny+tsa ti/_ts+tsho ri tA/_bA hi
[\[48a.4\]]yongs su sbyang ba byas pa'am byi dor byas pa/_nges par 'byung ba/_nges par byung ba/_mthar phyin pa'am nges par byung ba/_spangs te/_bsal ba'am sbyangs pa/_phung po kun spangs pa/_mtha' med par byas pa/_rnam par gnon pa'am rnam par sel ba/_'dor ba'am spong ba/_bor ba'am btang ba/_sdig pa
[\[48a.5\]]tA pA paH/_bya ti br-it+taH/_pra ti ni sr-i dza ti/_pra ti bi ni sr-i dza ti/_ut+s+ra dz+ya ti/_pa ri t+yA gaH/_dzA hA ti/_pra ti k+She paH/_a pra kaR+Sha NaM/_pra ti krAn+taH/_a pa kaR+Sha/_U na twaM/_a yo gaH/_bi yo gaH/_bi saM yo gaH/_bi
[\[48a.6\]]spangs ba'am sbyangs pa/_shin tu 'das pa/_'dor ba/_'or cig gam thong zhig/_gtong ba'am 'dor ba/_yongs su gtong ba'am 'dor ba/_spong ba'am 'dor ba/_spong ba/_bsal ba/_phyir log pa'am spangs pa 'bri ba'am 'grib pa/_'grib pa/_mi ldan pa/_bral ba/_mi ldan pa'am bral ba/_bye
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]sh+le ShaM/_bi gats+tsheta/_bi b+hU taM/_an+tar+d+d+ha naM/_a pa krAn+taH/_be pa ri Na taM/_A shra ya ba rA br-it+taM/_pa ri Na taM/_ba ri N+ya maH/_dzI bi tAt+b+ya ba ro pa ye tra/_par+YA dA naM gats+tsha tiH/_bi hI naM/_
[\[48b.2\]]ba'am bral ba'am gyed pa/_bral bar 'gyur ram med par 'gyur/_bral ba'am zhig pa/_nub pa'am mi snang ba/_phyir byung ba'am med par gyur pa/_rnam par gyur pa/_gnas gyur pa/_yongs su gyur pa/_gyur pa/_srog dang phral/_ma lus pa'am gtan nas sam rim gyis zad par 'gyur/_nyams pa'am ma tshang
[\[48b.3\]]pa ri b+huk+taM/_astaM gats+tsha ti/_bi d+ha ma ti/_a pa ri bi dwaM/_ga rA ni sU da naM/_bar+Yud staH/_s+thi te ra n+ya thA twaM/_na rA shi b+hA baH/_pra b+haM gu raM/_pr-iSh+ThI b+ha ba ti/_ko lA
[\[48b.4\]]ba/_yongs su spyad pa'am zos pa/_nub pa'am med pa'am zhig par gyur pa/_sel ba'am 'joms pa/_bor ba/_'dod chags sel ba/_bstsal ba/_gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa/_spungs pa'i dngos po med pa'am phung por gyur pa ma yin pa/_rab tu 'jig pa/_rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur/_bstsal ba'am
[\[48b.5\]]yi ta byaM/_uts+tshet+s+ya ti/_bi ti mi ra ka raM/_a nu na yA\u0f85sam+bu k+Sha Na tA/_ni rli khi taM/_sa ma bA han+ti/_su pra k+ShA li taM/_su d+ho taM/_nir+d+hAn+taM/_bAn+tI b+hA baH/_pa ri t+ya k+taM/_
[\[48b.6\]]bcos pa/_chad par 'gyur/_rab rib med par byed pa/_rjes su chags pa bdo bar ma byas pa/_shin tu phyis pa'am bsrabs pa'am bzhar ba/_yang dag par 'joms pa'am spong pa/_legs par bkrus pa'am bshal ba/_sbyangs pa'am dul ba/_btso ma/_bstsal pa'am skyugs pa/_yongs su spangs pa/_
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]ut+s+r-iSh+TaM/_bra t+yA khyA taM/_ut+sardza naM/_sho ka bi no da naM/_pra bi dza h+yaM/_a naM ga NaH/_ni ha taH/_/bstod pa dang smad ba dang grags pa'i rnam grangs kyi ming la/_kIr+t+tiH/_pra shaM sA/_ya shaH/_stu ti/_sto Shi taM/_
[\[49a.2\]]btang ba'am spangs pa'am bor ba/_phul ba/_gtang ba/_mya ngan bsal ba/_rab tu spangs pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_bcom pa/_grags pa'am brjod pa/_rab tu bsngags pa/_snyan pa'am grags pa/_bstod pa/_bkur ba ma 'dom na bstod
[\[49a.3\]]pra shaM si taH/_bar+Ni taH/_shab+daH/_sh+lo kaH/_bar+N+NaH/_pan+ni taH/_a b+hi nan+di ta ya shaH/_b+hU ta bar+N+Na nish+tsA ra ya ti/_pra sid+d+haH/_pra thi taH/_pra tI taH/_a nu
[\[49a.4\]]pa/_rab tu bstod pa/_bsngags pa/_sgra/_tshigs su bcad pa/_bsngags pa'am snyan par brjod pa/_bsngags pa/_mngon par bstod pa'i grags pa/_yang dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa/_rab tu grub pa'am grags pa/_gsal bar grags pa/_kun la grags pa/_sra sid+ha dang ma 'dom na grags par gdags/_
[\[49a.5\]]shaM sA/_a bar+N+NA/_do ShaH/_b+haN+Da naM/_paM sa naM/_nin+bA/_dzu gup+sA/_bi gar+hA/_kut+sa naM/_a ba sA daH/_a ba saM s+ya ti/_bi mA na ya ti/_pa rA b+ha baH/_kut+sa nI yaM/_a ba d+h+yA yan+ti/_k+Shi pan+ti/_bi bA tsa yaM ti/_pa ri b+hA ShA/_/
[\[49a.6\]]phan yon/_mi snyan par brjod pa/_skyon nam nyes pa/_'tshang 'bru ba/_bshung ba'am smad pa/_smad pa/_skyon du bgrang ba/_dgongs pa'am smad pa/_ngan par rtsi ba/_smad pa'am spyo ba/_smod par byed/_khyad du gsod par byad/_brnyas pa/_smad par bya ba/_smod pa'am 'phya ba/_gzhog 'phyas zer/_kha zer/_spyo ba'am brgyad pa/_
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]mthun pa dang mi mthun pa la sogs pa'i ming la/_a nu kU laH/_pra ti kU laM/_pra ti lo maH/_a nu lo maH/_a nu sro to gA mI/_pra te sro to gA mI/_bya staM/_sa ma staM/_A yaH/_durla b+haH/_su

[\[54b.1\]]i ti lo kaH/_lo kAn+ta ri kaH/_sarba lo ka d+hA tu pra sa raH/_bud+d+ha bi Sha yaH/_bud+d+ha k+She traM/_sa hA lo ka d+hA tuH/_a ba mUr+d+haH/_bya ba tastaH/_tir+Ya glo ka d+hA tuH/_/khams gsum pa'i rim pa'i ming la/_kA ma d+hA tuH/_rU pa d+hA tuH/_
[\[54b.2\]]pas na 'jig rten/_'jig rten gyi bar/_'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad/_sangs rgyas kyi yul/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing /_mi mjed gyi 'jig rten gyi khams/_spyi'u tshugs/_snrel gzhi/_thad ka ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams/_'dod pa'i khams/_gzugs kyi khams/_
[\[54b.3\]]a rU pa d+hA tuH/_'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ming la/_b+hau mAH/_an+ta rik+Sha bA si naH/_tsa turma hA rA dza kA yi kAH/_tra yas+t+riM shAH/_yA mAH/_tu Shi tAH/_nirmA Na ra ta yaH/_pa ra nirmi ta ba sha brti naH/_/bsam gtan dang po'i sa'i ming la/_brah+ma kA yi kAH/_brah+ma pA ri Sha d+yAH/_brah+ma bu ro hi tAH/_ma hA
[\[54b.4\]]gzugs med pa'i khams/_sa bla/_bar snang la gnas pa/_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris/_sum cu tsa gsum pa/_'thab bral/_dga' ldan/_'phrul dga'/_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed/_tshangs ris/_tshangs 'khor/_tshangs ba mdun na 'don/_tshangs
[\[54b.5\]]brah+ma NaH/_/bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa'i ming la/_pa rIt+tA b+hAH/_apra mA NA b+hAH/_a b+ha swa rAH/_/bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa'i ming la/_pa rI ta shu b+hAH/_a pra mA Na shu b+hAH/_shu b+ha kr-it+s+nAH/_/bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa'i ming la/_an b+h+ra kAH/_pu N+ya pra sa bAH/_br-i hat+pha laH/_/gnas gtsang ma'i sa'i ming la/_a br-i hAH/_a ta pAH/_su dr-i shAH/_su daR+sha
[\[54b.6\]]pa chen po/_'od chung /_tshad med 'od/_'od gsal/_dge chung /_tshad med dge/_dge rgyas/_sprin med/_bsod nams skyes/_'bras bu che/_mi che/_mi gdung /_gya nom snang /_shin
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]nAH/_a ka niSh+ThAH/_a g+ha niSh+ThAH/_ma hA ma he shwa rA ya ta nama?/_/gzugs med pa'i sa'i ming la/_A kA shA nan+t+yA ya ta nama?/_bi dz+nyA nA nan+t+yA ya ta nama?/_A kiny+tsa n+yA ya ta nama?/_nai ba saM dz+nyA nA saM dz+nyA ya ta nama?/_/'jig rten ba'i lha'i ming la/_brah+mA/_

[\[55a.3\]]ha ra n+ya gar+b+haH/_bra h+mA sa hA m+pa tiH/_a shwi ni ku mA rau/_ma he shwa raH/_ma hA de baH/_sham+b+huH/_pa shu pa tiH/_tr-i pu ra bid+d+h+waM sa kaH/_shU la pA NiH/_t+r+ya m+wa kaH/_shaM ka raH/_sma ra sha truH/_sharbaH/_ru daH/_I shwa raH/_biSh+NuH/_
[\[55a.4\]]dbyig gi snying po/_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa/_tha skar gzhon nu/_dbang phyug chen po/_lha chen po/_bde 'byung /_phyugs bdag/_sum brtsegs 'jig byed/_lag na mdung thogs/_chung ma gsum yod pa/_bde byed/_'dod dran dgra/_'tsho byed/_drag po/_dbang phyug_/khyab 'jug/_
[\[55a.5\]]kr-iSh+NaH/_bA su de baH/_kA ma de baH/_mA raH/_su nirma na ra ti de ba pu traH/_su sI ma de ba pu traH/_san+tu Shi ta de ba bu traH/_su yA ma de ba pu traH/_sha kro de ben+d+raH/_da sha sha ta na ya naH/_sha kraH/_
[\[55a.6\]]khyab 'jug gi ming ste 'dom na nag po/_nor lha'i bu ste khyab 'jug gi ming /_'dod pa'i lha/_bdud/_lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga'/_lha'i bu mtshams bzang /_lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan/_lha'i bu rab 'thab bral/_lha'i dbang po brgya byin/_brgya byin 'dom na mig stong pa/_brgya byin/_
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]kau shi kaH/_sha ta kra tuH/_bur nA raH/_lo ka bA laH/_bi shra ba NaH/_b+h+r-i ta rASh+TaH/_bi rU D+hakaH/_bi rU pA k+ShaH/_ka ro Ta bAN yo de bAH/_mA lA d+hA rAH/_sa dA ma dAH/_i shA naH/_in+d+raH/_ya maH/_ni r-i tiH/_pa ru NaH/_bA yuH/_ku be raH/_
[\[55b.2\]]brgya byin/_mchod sbyin brgya ba/_brgya byin na mkhyer 'jig_/'jig rten skyong /_rnam thos kyi bu/_yul 'khor srung /_'phags skyes po/_mig mi bzang lag na gzhong thogs/_phreng thogs/_rtag tu myos/_dbang bdag_/dbang po/_gshin rje/_bden bral/_chu lha/_rlung /_lus ngan/_
[\[55b.3\]]bai shwA na raH/_kAr+t+ti ke yaH/_ma hA kA laH/_nan+di ke shwa raH/_b+h+r-iM gi ri tiH/_bi nA ya kaH/_d+ha na daH/_de bI/_sur ba d+hU/_a bsA rA/_de bka n+yA/_du rgA de bI/_u mA/_gi ri su tA/_sha tsI/_pig+h+naH/_/gza' dgu'i ming la/_A di t+yaH/_sau maH/_aM gA ra kaH/_bu d+haH/_br-i haspa tiH/_shu kraH/_sha naish+tsa raH/_
[\[55b.4\]]pa/_mi/_smin drug bu/_nag po chen po/_dga' byed dbang phyug_/b+h+r-ing gi ri ti/_log 'dren/_nor sbyin/_lha mo/_lha'i bu mo/_lha'i bu mo/_lha'i bu mo/_rdzong gi lha mo/_dka' bzlog/_ri'i sras mo/_bde sogs/_bgegs/_nyi ma/_zla ba/_mig dmar/_gza' lhag_/phur bu/_pa ba sangs/_spen pa/_
[\[55b.5\]]rA huH/_ke tuH//_/rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi ming la/_kr-it+ti kA/_ro hi NI/_mr-i ga si rA/_A r+d+rA/_pu narba suH/_pu Sh+yaH/_a sh+le ShA/_ma g+hA/_pUrba pa lgu nI/_ut+tar pha lgu nI/_ha stA/_tsitrA/_swA ti/_bi shA khA/_a nu rA d+hA/_dz+yeSh+ThA/_mU laM/_pU bA ShA D+hA/_ut+ta ra ShA D+hA/_shra ba nA/_a b+hi dzi ta/_sha ta b+hi ShA/_d+ha niSh+ThA/_pu rba b+ha dra ba dA/_

[\[56a.1\]]ut+ta ra b+ha dra pa dA/_re ba tI/_a shwi nI/_b+ha ra NI/_/lha dang klu la sogs pa'i ming la/_de baH/_nA gaH/_yak+ShaH/_gan+d+harbaH/_a su raH/_dai t+yaH/_ga ru DaH/_kin+na raH/_ma ho ra gaH/_kum+b+hAN+Da/_//klu'i rgyal po'i ming la/_shaM kha bA lo nA ga rA dzA/_karka Ta ko nA
[\[56a.2\]]khrums smad/_nam gru/_tha skar/_bra nye/_lha/_klu/_gnod sbyin/_dri za/_lha ma yin/_lha ma yin 'dom na sbyin byed ma'i bu/_nam mkha' lding /_mi'am ci/_lto 'phye chen po/_grul bum/_klu'i rgyal po dung skyong /_klu'i rgyal po

[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]pra b+haH/_su bar+N+Na ke shaH/_sUr+Ya pra b+haH/_u da ya naH/_gadza shIR+ShaH/_shwe ta ka_kA la kaH/_ya maH/_shra ma NaH/_maN+DU kaH/_ma Ni tsU DaH/_a mo g+ha daR+sha naH/_i shA d+hA raH/_tsi tra se naH/_ma hA pA shaH/_k+She maM ka raH/_ma hA pha Na kaH/_gam+b+hI ra ni r+g+ho ShaH/_
[\[57b.2\]]'od/_gseng mdog ska/_nyi ma'i 'od/_'char ba/_ba lang mgo/_/dkar po/_nag po/_gshin rje/_dge sbyong /_sbal pa/_gtsug na nor bu/_don yod mthong /_gshol mda' 'dzin/_sna tshogs sde/_zhags pa chen po/_bde byed/_gdengs ka chen po/_dbyangs zab/_

[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]bai shra ba NaH/_ma hA g+ho She shwa raH/_d+ha ra Ni su ro drA yu d+haH/_ma hA ma tiH/_ar+ts+tsi ne trA d+hi pa tiH/_badzra dr-i D+ha ne traH/_a gra bI ra bA huH/_ma hA se na byU ha pa rA kra maH/_me ru ba la pra mardI/_d+hA ra NI su b+ha kA yaH/_
[\[58a.2\]]rnam thos bu/_sgra chen po'i dbang phyug_/sa steng mtshon cha mchog tu mi zad pa/_blo gros chen po/_'od 'phro mig bdag_/rdo rje ltar sra ba'i mig_/mchog tu dpa' ba'i lag pa/_dmag chen po'i g.yul gnon pa/_lhun po'i stobs 'joms/_lus sa ltar bzang ba/_
[\[58a.3\]]A Ta ba ka yak+ShaH/_rA ba NaH/_pA ny+tsi kaH/_/dri za'i dbang po'i ming la/_d+h+r-i ta rASh+TaH/_dru ma kin+na ra pra b+haH/_shu tsi ne tra ra ti sam+b+ha baH/_puSh+ba dru ma ku su mi ta ma ku TaM/_ra ti tsa ra Na sa man+ta swa raH/_pra mu di ta pralam+ba su na ya naH/_ma no dz+nya ru ta siM ha d+h+wa dzA/_
[\[58a.4\]]gnod sbyin 'brog gnas/_sgra sgrog gi bu/_lngas rtsen/_yul 'khor srung /_mi'am ci ljon pa'i 'od/_mig gtsang dga' 'byung /_me tog sdong po rgyas pa'i cod pa na can/_dga' bas 'gro ba kun du dbyangs/_mig bzang ring dga'/_yid du 'ong ba'i sgra seng ge'i rgyal mtshan/_
[\[58a.5\]]sa man+ta rat+na ki ra Na muk+ta pra b+haH/_badzra dru ma ke sa ra d+h+wa dzA/_sarba byU ha ra ti swa b+hA ba na ya san+daR+sha naH/_/lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i ming la/_rA huH/_be ma tsi traH/_sham+ba raH/_ban+d+hiH/_bai ro tsa naH/_dr-i D+ha badzraH/_su tsi trAM gaH/_br-i hA dA raH/_ba la
[\[58a.6\]]rin chen 'od bzhin du kun du gzer gtong /_rdo rje ljon pa'i ze ba'i rgyal mtshan/_bkod pa kun la dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyi tshul ston pa/_sgra gcan/_thags bzangs ris/_bde ba'i mchog_/'ching ba/_rnam par snang byed/_rdo rje sra ba/_lus shin tu dgra ba/_rtsibs chen/_stobs
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]bi pu la he tu ma tiH/_bat+sa shI sam+ba baH/_su bra ta swa raH/_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i ming la/_ma hA be ga lab+d+ha s+thA mA/_a b+he d+ya rat+na tsU DaH/_bem la beg shrIH/_a ni bar+t+ta nI ya tsit+ta b+hU Sha NaH/_ma hA sA ga ra pra b+hA rtogs pa dang 'dom gar snang gum+b+hi ra [\[]b+hArnyaH[\]]/_d+harma dri D+hA b+he d+ya su
[\[58b.2\]]yangs rgyu'i blo gros/_gzhon nu dpal 'byung /_brtul zhugs rab kyi dbyangs/_shugs chen mthu thob/_mi phyed gtsug na rin po che/_dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi dpal/_mi bzlog pa'i sems kyi rgyan/_rgya mtsho chen po lta bu'i 'od zab mo 'chang ba/_chos la brtan zhing mi phyed
[\[58b.3\]]ni lam+b+haH/_bi tsit+ta mau li shrI tsU DaH/_sa man+ta s+pha ra NaM mu kha daR+sha naH/_sa man+ta byU ha sA ga ra tsaR+YA bya ba lo ka naH/_/mi'am ci'i dbang po'i ming la/_dru ma kin+na ra rA dzA/_de ba ma ti pra b+haH/_ku su ma ke tu maN+Da lI/_bi tsit+t+ra b+hU Sha naH/_ma no dz+nya ni rnA
[\[58b.4\]]par shin tu ston pa/_cod paN sna tshogs dpal gyi gtsug_/bzhin kun du khyab par ston pa/_kun du bkod ba rgya mtsho'i spyod ba la rnam par lta ba/_mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po ljon pa/_lha'i blo gros 'od/_me tog rtog gi dkyil 'khor can/_rgyan sna tshogs can/_sgra dbyangs
[\[58b.5\]]da swa raH/_dru ma rat+na shA khA pra b+haH/_su daR+sha na prI ti ka raH/_b+hU Sha Nen+d+ra pra b+haH/_su re Nu puSh+pa d+h+wa dzA/_d+ha ra NI ta la shrIH/_u ra gA d+hi pa tiH/_/lto 'phyo sin po'i dbang po'i ming la/_su ma ti re NuH/_bi ra dza ste dzaHswa raH/_a gra ma ti tsi tra tsU DaH/_su ne trA d+hi pa tiH/_
[\[58b.6\]]yid du 'ong /_rin chen yal ga'i ljon pa'i 'od/_legs mthong dga' byed/_rgyan gyi dbang po 'od/_rdul mdzes me tog rgyal [(]mtshen[,]mtshan[)]/_sa steng dpal/_lto 'phye bdag po/_blo gros zhi ba mchog_/gzi brjid rdul med dbyangs/_blo mchog sna tshogs gtsug_/mig bzang bdag po/_
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]pra dI pa sha ra Na d+h+wa dzA/_A lo ka su be ga d+h+wa dzA/_siM ha ba t+saH pi tsi t+t+rA laM kA swa raH/_su me ru ba t+saH/_ru tsi ra bra b+ha sa saM b+ha baH/_/grul bum gyi dbang po'i ming la/_bi rU D+ha kaH/_nA gA d+hi pa tiH/_su tsIr+N+Na b+d+d+wa dzA/_hi ta tsa ra na saM kra maH/_b+hI mot+ta
[\[59a.2\]]skyabs sgron rgyal mtshan/_snang ba shugs mchog rgyal mtshan/_bu seng ge sna tshogs rgyan gyi dbyangs/_bu ri rab/_snang ba mdzes 'byung /_'phags skyes bo/_klu bdag_/shin tu spyad pa'i rgyal mtshan/_phan par spyad pa la zhugs pa/_'jigs su rung
[\[59a.3\]]raH/_shA la su tsin+t+raH/_me ru su saM b+ha baH/_bI ra ba huH/_a nan+ta shu b+ha na ya na ke sa rI/_a nan+ta mu kha de bA su ra ne trA su raH/_drang srong chen po'i ming la/_su shru taH/_hA rI taH/_ha ri sh+tsan+d+raH/_b+h+r-i guH/_d+han+dan+ta riH/_dzA dr-i kar+N+NaH/_b+he
[\[59a.4\]]ba'i bla ma/_legs pas shin tu bkra ba/_lhun po shin tu 'byung ba/_dpa' ba'i lag pa/_dge ba mtha' yas pa'i mig gam gser/_lha dang lha ma yin gyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'dren pa'i lha ma yin/_legs thos/_ljang sngo'i bu/_seng ge zla ba/_ngan spong /_thang la bar/_rgya skyegs rna/_gzings
[\[59a.5\]]DaH/_kA sh+ya paH/_a ga stiH/_sa na ta naH/_sa natra ku mA raH/_khA ra nA dI/_A tre yaH/_pra dzA pa tiH/_pa rA sha raH/_ka pi la ma hAR+SheH/_ka nA da ma hA riShaH/_a k+Sha pA daH/_byA saH/_b+hA ra d+h+wa dzaH/_ba siSh+ThaH/_nA ra daH/_
[\[59a.6\]]can/_'dro ba skyong bu/_ri byi/_g.yung drung /_kun 'gyed gzhon nu/_sgra drag gi bu/_rgyun shes kyi gu/_skye dgu bdag_/rtsib logs skyes/_drang srong chen po ser skya/_drang srong chen po gzegs zan/_rkang mig can/_rgyas pa/_b+hA ra rgyal mtshan/_gnas 'jog/_/mis byin gyi bu
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]ag+ni bi shaH/_a ra ni miH/_/sngon gyi ma ban bo'i ming la/_nA gA rdzu naH/_nA gA hwa yaH/_A r+YA de baH/_A r+YA saM gaH/_bsu ban+d+huH/_A r+YA shU raH/_a shwag+ho ShaH/_di g+mA gaH/_d+harma pA laH/_d+harma kI r+t+tiH/_s+thi ra ma ti/_saM g+ha b+ha draH/_gu na pra b+haH/_bsu mi traH/_

[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]t+yaH/_ban+d+han pA la kaH/_ba d+h+ya g+hA ta kaH/_kA ra N+ya kA ra kaH/_ba d+ha kaH/_ha na naM/_kalbi kA raH ka pyA riH/_u d+yA na pA laH/_A rA mi kaH/_gr-i hI/_gr-i ha s+thaH/_mA Na ba kaH/_na ga ra g+hA ta kaH/_grA ma g+hA ta kaH/_dza na pa da g+hA ta kaH/_

[\[63b.4\]]gru pa/_snyod cing stob pa/_sel pa/_gdos pa 'dzin pa'am rlung g.yor thogs pa/_ru skya 'dzin pa/_rkyal chen nam nya pa/_rigs bzhi/_bram ze/_rgyal rigs/_rje'u rigs/_dmangs rigs/_rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu/_bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu/_
[\[63b.5\]]gr-i ha pa ti ma hA sA la ku la ma?/_uts+tsha ku laM/_a b+hi dzA taM/_nI tsa ku laMH/_tsaN+DA laH mA taM gaH/_sha pa raH bu lin+daH/_pu ka saH/_DoM baH/_m+lets+tshaH/_bra t+yan+ta dza na pa dma?/_/pha ma la sogs pa gnyen pa shes kyi ming la/_pI tA/_mA tA/_dza na pi trI/_pi tA ma haH/_

[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]pra pi tA ma haH/_pi tA ma hI/_pra bi tA ma hI/_pu traH/_du haM tA/_dz+yeSh+Tha b+h+rA tA/_ka nI yaM b+h+rA tA/_b+h+rA tA/_b+ha gi nI/_nap+ta/_nap+tI/_shwa shu raH/_shwa sA/_mA tu laH/_b+hAR+YA ba t+nI dA rAH ka la traM/_mA tr-i shwa sA/_pi tr-i shwa sA/_sa pat+nI/_an+ta pu raM/_ba d+hU/_dzam+pa

[\[64b.1\]]kraM/_la lA TaH/_b+h+rUH/_pa k+Sh+mA/_tA ra kaH/_mu khaM/_sr-i kwaNI/_tsi pu kaM/_grI bA/_ka po laM/_gaN+DaH/_ha nuH/_shaM khaH/_dzam+b+hiH/_dan+taH/_tA luH/_oSh+ThaH/_daMSh+TA/_sham shruH/_gaN+ThaH/_kaN+Tha nA li kA/_kaN+Tha ma NiH/_hr-i da yaM/_kr-i kA T-i kA

[\[65b.1\]]ta ru NaH/_yo ba naM/_yu bA/_da hraH/_yu ba ti/_ku mA ri/_/rgas pa dang na pa'i rnam pa'i ming la/_gup+dzaH/_dzIr+N+Na tA/_ba lI bra tsu ra tA/_pA li t+yaM/_daN+Da a baSh+TaM lha na tA/_khA li t+yaM/_kA saH/_khu ru khu rA ba sak+ta kaN+ThaH/_prA g+b+hA re Na kA ye na daN+Da ma baSh+Ta b+d+haH/_d+ha ma

[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]ba tI/_lum+bi nI/_in+d+ra shai la gu hA/_ku sha na ga raM/_u shI ra gi riH/_udz+dzA ya nI na ga rI/_ka ling+gaH/_mr-i ga dA baH/_r-i Shi ba da naM/_r-i shi pa ta naM/_ko sa lA/_sA ke tama?/_a ban+tiH/_tsam+pA/_pany+tsA laH/_a Ta ka ba tI/_

[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]b+hilbaM/_ut+saH/_hra daH/_ku l+yaH/_ut+b+hi daH/_A li/_puSh+ka ri NI/_uSh+NA+o da gama?/_kU paH/_u da pA nama?/_Ur+m+miH/_man+dA ki nI/_pA ram+pA a pA ra m+pA/_ni sa ra d+hA rA/_u da ka d+hA rA/_kAny+tsa na bA lu ka stIr+N+NaH/_tI raM/_

[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]pAN+Du pa lA shaH/_shI Na pa lA shaH/_kaN+Da kaH/_tA laH/_la tA bal+lI/_ka rI raH/_/sngags kyi rgyud du 'byung ba'i ming la/_tan+t+raM/_ut+tar tan+t+raM/_man+t+raM/_bi d+yA/_d+hA ra NI/_maN+Da lama?/_shAn+ti kaM/_A kaR+Sha NaM/_pauSh+Ti kaH/_A b+hi tsa ru kaH/_ba shI

[\[67a.3\]]ka ra NaH/_ho maH/_u pa tsA raH/_bi d+hiH/_bi d+hA naMH/_kalpaH/_dzA paH/_ho mo pa ka ra NaMH/_A hu ti dra byaM/_ho tA/_ha ba naM/_dzu ha yAtra/_a b+hi She kaH/_a b+hi Shik+taH/_a bA ha naM/_A kaR+Sha NaM/_
