[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]Ta kaH/_bud+d+ha lo tsa nA/_paN+Da ra bA si nI/_tA rA/_badzra b+h+r-i ku TiH/_Ar+Ya b+h+r-i ku TiH/_badzrA m+bu dzA/_badzrAng+ku shI/_o dzaH pra t+yA hA ri NI/_hA sa ba tI/_rat+nolkA/_A d+hA ra NI/_sa man+ta b+ha drA/_ra ti rA gA/_badzra d+hA twI shwa rI/_
[\[67b.2\]]spyod/_sangs rgyas kyi spyan/_gos dkar can/_sgrol ma/_khro gnyer can/_'phags ma khro gnyer can/_rdo rje pad+ma/_rdo rje lcags kyu/_so sor ma dngas 'phrog ma/_bzhad ldan ma/_rin chen sgron ma/_kun 'dzin ma/_kun du bzang mo/_dga' ba'i 'dod chags ma/_rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma/_
[\[67b.3\]]sarba tsakrA/_rat+not+ta mA/_sA ha srA bar+t+tA/_sA d+hu ma tI/_sid+d+hot+ta mA/_d+hA ra NI mu drA/_badzra sa twa dz+nyA na mu drA/_ma hA tuSh+Ti dz+nyA na mu drA/_ma hA bra b+hA maN+Da la byU ha dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba d+har+m+ma
[\[67b.4\]]'khor lo thams cad ma/_mchog gi rin chen ma/_stong 'khyil ma/_legs pa'i blo gros ma/_grub mchog ma/_gzungs kyi phyag rgya ma/_rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_dgyes ba chen po'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_'od chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_chos thams cad
[\[67b.5\]]sa ma tA dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na dz+nyA na mu drA/_ma hA prI ti be ga sam+b+ha ba dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga tA shA pa ri pU ra Na dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma
[\[67b.6\]]mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_dga' ba'i shugs chen po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]yA d+d+hiSh+ShA na dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga ta badzrA b+hi She ka dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga ta pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma bAg+niSh+p+ra pany+tsa dz+nyA
[\[68a.2\]]thams cad 'dus pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig spros pa med
[\[68a.3\]]na mu drA/_ma hA tsakra pra be sha dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga ta bi shwa kar+m+ma dz+nyA na mu drA/_du ra yo d+ha na bIR+Ya dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba mA ra maN+Da la bi d+h+wan+sa na dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta
[\[68a.4\]]pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_'khor lo chen por 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_'thab dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[68a.5\]]thA ga ta ban+d+ha na dz+nyA na mu drA/_sarba ta thA ga ta su ra ta su khA/_sarba ta thA ga tA kaR+Sha NI/_sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga NI/_sarba ta thA ga ta san+to Sha NI/_ma hA d+hi pa tI/_ma hA d+yo
[\[68a.6\]]pa thams cad bsdams pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa mchog gi bde ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes byed ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes byed ma/_bdag mo chen mo/_gsal byed chen
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]tA/_ma hA rat+na baR+ShA/_ma hA brI ti haR+ShA/_ma hA dz+nyA na gI tA/_ma hA g+ho ShA nu gA/_gan+d+ha pa tI/_ma hA po d+h+yang+ga ba tI/_tsa k+ShuSh+ma tI/_satwa ba tI/_sum+b+haH/_ni sum+b+haH/_a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/_dzam+b+ha laH/_uts+tshuSh+maM/_Ar+Ya ya mAn+ta
[\[68b.2\]]mo/_rin chen char 'beb sam/_dga' ba chen po sa tshim pa/_ye shes chen po'i glu dbyangs/_sgra chen po'i rjes su 'jug ma/_spos ldan ma/_byang chub yan lag che ldan/_mig ldan ma/_snying stobs ldan/_gnod mdzes/_nges par gnod mdzes/_bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor/_rmug 'dzin/_'chol ba/_'phags pa gshin rje

[\[83b.1\]]bal+laH/_ka raN+Da baH/_ko dra baH/_/dus ston gyi ming la/_ma hA ma haH/_dzA ti ma haH/_dzA Ta ma haH/_tsU DA ma haH/_pany+tsa baR+Shi ka ma haH/_Sha?T paR+Shi ka ma haH/_ku TI ma haH/_ut+sa baH/_barbaH/_/zho mar dang zas skom gyi ming la/_g+h+r-i taM/_

[\[87b.1\]]bra ha ra NaM sha s+t+ri/_/mchod pa'i yo byad kyi ming la/_ts+tsha traM/_d+h+wa dzaH/_pa tA kA/_tsUr+N+NaM/_puSh+pa pu TaM/_gan+d+haH/_bi le pa naM/_u pa le pa naM/_mA l+yaM/_dI paH/_bi tA naM/_bi tA na bi ta taM/_sa muts+tshi tats+tsha tra d+d+h+wa dza pa tA kA/_kiM ka NI dzA laM mu kha rA/_he ma dA maM/_muk+tA

[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]tsam+pa kaH/_ku ra ba kaH/_pAR+Shi kI/_ma hA pAR+Shi kI/_mal+li kA/_na ba mAl+li kA/_dzA ti ku su maM/_su ma nA/_yU thi kA/_d+hA nu skA rI/_kun+daM/_pA ru Sha kaM_/ma hA pA ru Sha kaM_/many+dzu Sha kaM_/mahA many+dzu Sha kaM_/a sho kaM_/mu tsi lin+daM/_
[\[88a.2\]]tsam pa ka/_ku ra ba ka/_bar shi ki/_bar shi ki chen po/_/ma li kA/_na ba ma li ka_/sna ma'i me tog_/sna ma'i me tog_/yug ti ka_/d+ha nu kA ri/_kun dam/_pa ru sha ka_/pa ru sha ka chen po/_many+dzu sha ka/_many+dzu sha ka chen po/_mya ngan 'tshang /_btang bzung /_
[\[88a.3\]]ma hA mu tsi lin+daM/_mu tsu kun+daH/_ba ku laH/_a sa naH/_pr-i yaM guH/_pun+nA gaH/_ka dam+baH/_d+ha nu ke ta kI/_kar+Ni kA ra puSh+paM/_e DA k+Shi puSh+paM/_ta ga raH/_ke sha raH/_ta mA la pa traM/_laM ga lI puSh+paM/_staM ba kaM_/ro tsaH/_ma hA ro tsaH/_s+thA laM/_ma hA
[\[88a.4\]]btang bzung chen po/_mu tsu kun+da/_ba ku la/_a sa na/_pr-i yang+ku/_pun+na ga_/ka dam pa/_d+ha nu ke ta ki/_dong ka'i me tog_/me tog lug mig_/ta ga ra/_ke shar/_tam la'i lo ma/_laM ga li'i me tog_/me tog gi dog pa_/me tog mdog mdzes/_mdog mdzes chen po/_s+tha la/_s+tha la chen
[\[88a.5\]]s+thA laM/_tsakra bi ma laMH/_tsakra sha ta pa traM/_sa ha shra pa traM/_sha ta sa ha sra pa traM/_sa man+ta pra b+hA/_sa man+ta gan+d+haM/_sa man+tas+thu lA ba lo ka na/_na ya nA b+hi rA maH/_muk+ta pha la kaM/_dz+yo tiHpra b+haH/_dz+yo tiHka raH/_a ti muk+ta kaM_/pA Ta laM/_ma hA pA Ta laM/_tsi tra pA Ta laM/_ma hA tsi tra pA Ta laM/_
[\[88a.6\]]po/_'khor lo dri med/_'khor lo 'dab brgya/_'dab stong /_'dab 'bum/_kun tu 'od/_kun tu bsung /_kun tu cher snang /_mig tu sdug_/mu tig 'bru/_skar 'od/_'od byed/_a ti mug ta ka_/skya snar/_skya snar chen po/_skya snar khra bo/_/skya snar bkra chen/
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]man+dA ra baH/_ma hA man+dA ra baH/_karka ra baH/_ma hA karka ra baH/_de ba su ma nA/_ta ra NiH/_go ta ra NiH/_ba li/_tin+tu kaH/_kiM shU kaH/_bal+laH/_ba ka buSh+paM/_ka dam+ba ka puSh+paM/_ku ba la puSh+paM/_a dza dzI puSh+paM/_arka puSh+paM/_/me tog gi rtsa ba la sogs pa'i
[\[88b.2\]]man dA ra ba/_man dA ra ba chen po/_mdog dkar/_mdog dkar chen po/_lha yid dga'/_ta ra Ni/_go ta ra Ni/_ba li/_tin du ka_/kim shu ka_/ba la/_pra ba'i me tog_/ka dam pa'i me tog_/ma 'dom na me tog ut+pal 'dom na ku ba la/_go snyod kyi me tog_/arka'i me tog/_

[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]sA ri tsan+nga naM/_kar+pU raH/_kum+ku mama?/_gug+gu luH/_kun+du ruH/_sardza ra saH/_/skad go 'dud gyi ming la/_d+harma paR+YA yaH/_ar+d+ha tra yo da sha sha tA ni/_nA nA bud+d+ha k+She tra sa ni pa ti tAH/_ma hA tA tsabo d+hi sa twa ga Ne na sAr+d+ha ma/_saM ba hu laH/_
[\[89a.2\]]su 'brang ba'i tsan+dan/_ga pur/_gur kum/_gu gul/_sog_/sra rtsi bog/_chos kyi rnam grangs/_stong nyis brgya lnga bcu/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig_/rab tu mang po/_/
[\[89a.3\]]e bam+p+ra mu khAH/_gaN pra mu khaH/_pUrbang+ga maH/_sAr+d+haM/_bi bi d+ha sam+mo da na ka thA mu pa sa kr-it+t+ya/_ba ri br-i taH/_pu ra skr-i taH/_triHpra dak+Shi NI kr-i t+ya/_e kaM sa mut+ta rA saM gaM kr-i twA/_da k+Shi NaM dza nu maN+Da laM
[\[89a.4\]]de la sogs pa/_tshogs kyi gtso bo/_sngon du 'gro ba la sogs pa/_thabs cig gam lhan cig_/kun dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas/_yongs su bskor/_mdun du bdar ba'am mdun gyis bltas pa/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_bla gos phrag pa cig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i
[\[89a.5\]]pr-i thi byAM pra tiSh+ThA pya/_ye na b+ha ga bAM ste nAn+dza lim+p+ra Na mya/_tasmi n+paR+Shat+san+ni pA te sAn+ni ShaN+NaH/_n+ya ShI data/_ten kha lu pu naHsa ma ye na/_siM hA sa naM pradz+nyAb+tiH/_n+ya shi da t+par+Ya ng+ka mA b+hu dz+ya/_alpA bA d+ha tAM/_alpA taM ka tAM/_yA trAM/_
[\[89a.6\]]lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud/_'khor 'dus pa der bzhugs sam 'dug/_yang de'i tshe zhe'am de'i tshe/_seng ge'i khri bshams pa/_skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so/_/gnod pa chung ngam/_nyam nga ba nyung ngam/_'tsho'am/_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]la g+hUt+thA na tAM/_ba laM su khAspaR+sha bi hA ra tAM tsa/_b+hA sa te/_ta pa ti/_bi ro tsa te/_pu na re ba smi ta ma ka rota/_uSh+NI Sha bi ba rAn+ta rAta/_rasmirni sh+tsar ti/_sa rasmi ni sh+tsar+Ya/_A b+ha yA/_pa ri s+phu To\u0f85b+huta?/_a ba b+hA si taH/_te na rasmya ba b+hA se na spr-i Sh+TaH/_
[\[89b.2\]]bskyod pa yang ngam/_stobs dang bde ba la reg par gnas sam/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge /_yang 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/dbu'i gtsug tor gyi gseb nas/_'od zer byung /_'od de byung nas/_'od kyis/_yongs su khyab pa'am rgyas par gyur pa/_snang bar byas/_'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas /
[\[89b.3\]]ya tra sUr+Ya tsan+d+ra ma sAM pra b+hA yA ga tirnAsti/_ko he tuH/_kaHpra t+ya yaH/_pu na ra pyA ga t+ya/_uSh+NI Sha bi ba re Shu pra bi sha ti/_mu kha dwA re NA nu pra bi sha tisma/_na tsa b+ha ga ba to mu kha dwA ra s+yon+mi dzi tam+bA ni mi ny+dzi tam+bA pra dz+nyA ya tesma/_a ba b+hA saH/_sa man+tA ba b+hA saH/_dzi g+ha t+si tAHpUr+Na
[\[89b.4\]]gang na nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od mi 'bab pa/_rgyu gang /_rkyen gang /_slar log nas/_gtsug tor gyi gseb tu zhugs/_zhal gyi sgo nas zhugs/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo phye ba'am btsum bar yang mi mngon no/_/snang ba/_kun tu snang ba/_bkres pa rnams ni 'grangs par gyur ce'am
[\[89b.5\]]gA trAb+ha ban+ti sma/_tr-iShi tA bi ga ta pi pA sA b+ha ban+tisma/_ro gaspr-iSh+TA bi ga ta ro gA b+ha ban+tisma/_bi ka len+d+ri yAHba ri pUr+N+Ne n+d+ri yA b+ha ban+tisma/_sa tset+p+r-iSh+TaHprash+na byA ka ra NA ya/_a ba kA shaM kuR+YAta kany+tsi de ba bra de shaM/_a man+t+ra ya
[\[89b.6\]]ltogs pa rnams ni lus rgyas par gyur/_skom pa rnams ni ngoms par gyur/_nad kyis btab pa rnams ni nad dang bral bar gyur/_dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni dbang po tshang bar gyur/_gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_skabs phye na phyogs 'gal zhig_/bka' stsal pa'am smras
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]tesma/_sA d+hu kA ra ma dAtra/_sA d+hu sA d+hu/_te na hi shr-i Nu sA d+hu tsa suSh+Thu tsa sa ma na si ku ru/_b+hA Shi Sh+ye\u0f85han+te/_b+ha ga ba taHpra ti shru t+ya/_tsit+ta mA rA d+ha yi Sh+ye/_tiSh+Tha ti/_d+h+r-i ya te/_yA ba ya ti/_d+harmany+tsa de
[\[90a.2\]]pa'am bod pa/_legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig_/ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/_sems rangs par bya'o/_/bzhugs/_'tsho'o/_/gzhes so/_/chos kyang ston
[\[90a.3\]]sha ya ti/_ya s+ye dA nIM kA laM ma n+ya se/_ya du ta/_bud+d+ha ne trI/_tat+kim+ma n+ya se/_no hI dma?/_sarba ban+taM paR+Shad+maN+Da laM/_a b+he d+ya pa ri bA ra/_b+ha ga ba tA nu dz+nyA taH/_an+ta shohAs+ya pre k+Sha N+ya pi/_dzI bi ta
[\[90a.4\]]to/_/de'i dus la bab par shes na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi tshul lam lugs/_/'di ji snyam du sems/_de ma lags sam de ma yin nam/_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor/_mi phyed pa'i 'khor/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba/_tha na bzhad gad bya bar bsam ste/_'tsho ba'i
[\[90a.5\]]he to ra pi/_ad+hi ba tsa naM/_ma no ra thA shA pa ri pU ri/_bi na ya ti ni be sha ya ti/_pra tiSh+ThA ba ya ti/_pras+thA pa ya ti/_au ba yi kama?/_a bya ti kra ma Nama?/_A ga ta pha laM/_saM gu ha yama?/_

[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]gup+taH/_pra bi be ka dzA/_dzu Shi tu kA maH/_uSh+NI Sha bi ba ramUr+d+h+nA san+d+hiH/_pra be shaH/_a ba tA raH/_bra gu NI ka ra Nama?/_pra gu NaH/_e kA ma bi tsa tu Sh+pA di kaM gA thA mu gr-i h+ya/_ma hA yA na pa ri grA ha kaH/_

[\[90b.3\]]sad+d+har+m+ma pa ri grA ha kaH/_sad+d+har+m+ma br-iSh+TiH/_sad+d+har+m+mash+tsa tsi ras+thi ti ko b+ha ba ti/_a nut+ta rA yAM sa myak+saM bo d+hA b+hi saM bud+d+haH/_tsUDi kA ba bud+d+haH/_a nut+k+She pA pra k+She baH/_nA ti shI taM/_nA t+yuSh+Nama?/_
[\[90b.4\]]dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa/_dam pa'i chos kyi char/_dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par 'gyur/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/_byur bur gyur pa/_gdegs pa med pa dang bzhag pa med pa/_ha cang mi grang /_ha cang mi dro/_rnam
[\[90b.5\]]bi b+hA ba nA/_sa tAM/_u pa lab+d+hiH/_u pa lam+b+haH/_niSh+ThA ga taH/_a biSh+ThA nama?/_a sraM sa nama?/_a graHa ra NA bi hA ri NAM/_rak+ShA ba ra Na gup+tiM saM bi d+hA s+yA ma he/_ma hA br-i thi bIn+ni shrA yas ma grI ba she na sarba
[\[90b.6\]]par 'jug pa'am rnam par bsgom pa/_dam pa rnams kyi'am mkhas pa rnams kyi/_dmigs/_dmigs pa/_mthar phyin pa/_rgyun mi 'chad pa/_ma btang ba/_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog_/bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang sba bar bya'o/_/sa chen po la brten nas tshogs pa'i dbang gis
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pI dzA ni bi ro han+ti/_tso k+Sha sa mu drA tsA raH/_alpa kr-its+tshe Na/_nA gA ba lo ki te na ba lo kya/_b+ha ga bAM i ma me bAr+thaM b+hU ya s+yA mA tra yA a b+hi d+yota ya mA na gA thA b+hi gI ten sam+p+ra kA sa ya ti sma/_ya thA shru tama?/_ya thA
[\[91a.2\]]sa bon thams cad rnam par skye'o/_/gtsang sbra spyod pa/_tshegs chung ngus/_glang po che'i lta stangs kyis bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das don 'di nyid rgyas par gsung zhing tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bstan pa/_ji ltar thob pa bzhin nam thos pa bzhin/_so so
[\[91a.3\]]pra t+yar+hama?/_bi sta re Na sam+p+ra kA shi tama?/_bi sta re Na sam+p+ra kA sha yi Sh+ya ti/_a d+h+yA pa yA mA sa/_ya dA tsa b+ha ga bA nA dz+nyA sIt+sa de ba kaM lo kaM san+ni pa ti taM/_a sa ma sa maH/_tas+ye ya mI dr-i sho\u0f85nu b+hA baH/_pra b+hA Sh+ya te/_pra
[\[91a.4\]]ji rigs par/_rgya cher rab tu bstan/_rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur/_klog tu bcug pa'am slob tu bcug pa/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten tshogs par mkhyen pa/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/_de'i mthu 'di 'dra/_phye ba'am rab tu bzhag pa/_re bar
[\[91a.5\]]ti kAM k+Shi ta byaH/_tr-iSh+NA pau nar+b+ha bi kI/_nan+dI rA ga sa ha ga tA/_pu N+yo pa gaH/_a pu N+yo pa gaH/_A ni dz+yaM/_a b+h+yung+ga taH/_sa mung+ga taH/_ShaSh+Th+yaM ga sa ha sro be ta swa raH/_
[\[91a.6\]]bya'am 'dod par bya ba'am shes bar bya ba/_yang 'byung ba'i srid pa/_dga' ba'i 'dod chags kyis mod la skyes pa/_bsod nams su nye bar 'gro ba/_bsod nams ma yin par nye bar 'gro ba/_mi g.yo ba/_mngon par 'phags pa/_yang dag par 'phags pa/_dbyangs yan lag drug stong dang ldan ba/_
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]ba ta mAR+ShAH/_ba ta hA tA kaSh+Tama?/_a nun+na to na ba na taH/_u pa saM hA raH/_mA ra d+haR+Sha nama?/_ta s+yai ba m+b+ha ba ti/_ma hA to dza na kA ya s+ya/_hi tama?/_su khaM/_yo ga k+She maH/_an+ta rI k+Sha pra de shaH/_na
[\[91b.2\]]kyi ma grogs po dag/_/kye ma'am kyi hud dam e ma kyi hud/_ma khengs sam ma dud dam me mtho mi dma'/_btul ba'am nye bar sbyor ba'am nye bar bsgrub pa/_bdud gdul ba/_de 'di snyam du sems/_skye bo phal po che'i/_phan pa/_bde ba/_grub pa dang bde ba/_par snang gi phyogs/_shes pa yang med
[\[91b.3\]]pra dz+nyA ya te/_bi krI D-i tama?/_sarbe Na sarbaM/_sarba thA sarba/_sarba thA/_pra s+thA pa nama?/_o dzaH/_ma ho dzaSh+kaM ma ho dzaSh+kaH/_ma he sA khya ma he sA khyaH/_alpe shA khyaH/_r-id+d+haH/_s+phI taM/_k+She maM/_su b+hi k+ShaH/_
[\[91b.4\]]dam mi mngon pa'am mi snang pa/_rnam par rol pa/_thams cad kyi thams cad/_rnam pa thams cad du thams cad/_rnam pa thams cad dam ye/_rab tu bzhag pa/_mdangs sam gzi brjid/_gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba/_dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa/_dbang chung bar grags pa/_'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_bde ba/_lo legs pa/_
[\[91b.5\]]AkIr+Na ba hu dza na ma nu Sh+ya/_e kA yA maH/_A dz+nyA byA ka ra Nama?_u dA hA ra Na yo ge na/_ka biH/_kA byama?/_sa mA ra kaM_/sa bra h+ma kaM_/sa sra ma Na brA h+ma Ni kAHpra dzA yA a b+hi b+hU ya ni r+YA s+ya ti/_bya ba sA yaH/_A bad+d+ha pa ri
[\[91b.6\]]skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/_bgrod pa gcig pa/_shes pa brda sprod pa/_dper brjod pa'i tshul gyis/_snyan dngags mkhan/_snyan dngags/_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu zil gyis mnan te nges par 'byung /_btsal bar bya ba'am 'bad par bya ba/_ci la yang ma reg par
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]ka raH/_d+har+m+ma d+hA tu pa ra maH/_A kA shad+hA tu paR+Ya ba sA naH/_as+thA na me tata?/_ut+thA pu nama?/_sa d+hA ma d+h+ya ga to pA/_rA dza ku la ma d+h+ya ga to bA/_paR+Sham+ma d+h+ya ga to bA/_yuk+ta ku lam d+h+ya ga
[\[92a.2\]]ches pa/_chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_de ni gnas ma yin/_bslang ba'am drang ba'am bskyed pa/_'dus pa'i nang na 'dug kyang rung /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gyi nang na 'dug kyang rung /_'khor gyi nang na 'dug kyang rung /_rigs tshogs pa'i nang na 'dug
[\[92a.3\]]to bA/_dz+nyA ti ma d+h+ya ga to bA/_a tI tAM sha ga tA/_na ke na tsi dwi d+hI ya te/_a ba kA shaHprastA baHa ba saraH/_ba nAd+ni rba na mA ga taH/_kA me ShunaiSh+k+ra myama?/_shai la muk+ti mi ba kAny+tsa naM/_ni se bi taH/_dzihwen+d+ri yaM ni rnA ma yA mA sa/_a b+ha ya
[\[92a.4\]]kyang rung /_nye du'i nang na 'dug kyang rung /_'das pa'i char gyur pa/_gang gis kyang mi bya'o/_/go skabs sam par ram par skabs/_nags tshal nas nags tshal med par gshegs par/_'dod pa las spags pa/_ri las thal ba'i nyi ma bzhin/_bsnyen pa/_ljags kyi dbang po phyung ste/_'jigs pa'i dbang
[\[92a.5\]]ba sha bar+t+ti tA/_sarba satwA nAM kiM kA ra NI ya tA/_ba hu dza n+yama?/_pa ram+pa ra yA/_tuSh+NIm+b+hA benA d+hi bA sa ya ti/_samul+lo ki ta mu khaH/_samyak+p+ra t+yAt+maM dz+nyA na daR+sha ni pra bar+t+ta te/_A yuHsaM skA rA nut+s+r-i dza ti/_uSh+ma hA niH/_ma nu Sh+yA NAM sa b+hA ga tA yA
[\[92a.6\]]du gyur ba ma yin pa/_sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yong snyam pa/_skye bo mang po pa/_gcig nas gcig tu/_cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang /_zhal du bltas ba/_bdag nyid kyis yang dag par shes pa mthong ba 'jug pa/_tshe'i 'du byed 'dor ba/_drod yal ba/_mi dang skal ba mnyam par
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]mu pa pan+naH/_bi k+Sho b+ha NA bA ta maN+Da lI/_pa ra ma nu bi d+hA ya/_na shra ba Na pa tha mArga mi Sh+ya ti/_kA yi kaM ba la/_kA yi kaM daurba l+yaM/_kA yi kaM kle shaH/_a k+Shu Na byA ka ra Nama?/_su nish+tsi taM/_bi br-i tama?/_phye ba'am gdangs ba/_
[\[92b.2\]]skyes/_rnam par 'khrug par byed pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor/_pha rol gyi mda' dang mthun par byas te/_rna lam du grags par mi 'gyur/_lus kyi stobs/_lus nyam chung ba/_lus kyi ngal ba/_phyad par lung ston pa/_shin tu nges pa'am shin tu gtan la phab pa'am shin tu brtags pa/_
[\[92b.3\]]a pA braM tama?/_s+yAta?/_sam+bA d+haH/_bi b+ha baH/_saM tsin+t+yaM/_a mu kaH/_tu la nA/_mA pa ya ti/_nir+m+mA tA/_sraSh+TA/_rat+nama?/_dkon mchog gam rin po che/_rat+na
[\[92b.4\]]phye ba/_'gyur ba'am yod pa/_dogs pa'am nyam nga ba/_'byor pa'am 'jig pa/_bsam pa bzhin/_che ge mo zhig_/gzhal ba/_gzhal ba'am byed pa/_'phrul ba po'am 'phrul byed/_'byin ba po'am 'byin byed/_gzhi rin po che'am rin po che las grub pa'am rin po che las
[\[92b.5\]]ma yaH/_siM ha bi kra maH/_shu tsiH/_a nan+tA par+Ya n+taH/_a n+ya ta mA n+ya tama?/_sa mA dA nama?/_no ba gats+tsha ti/_sa ha ga tama?/_bra ti ban+naH/_lo ka yA trA/_

[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]dzA tI yaH/_bA lA graH/_bA lA gra ko TiH/_bA la ba thaH/_s+pha ra Nama?/_s+phu TaM/_pA ri sA man+taH/_sa man+taH/_pra dz+nyA pa nama? pra dz+nyAp+ti/_b+hU ya s+yA mA tra yA/_kra maH/_u
[\[93a.2\]]rang bzhin can/_skra'i rtse mo/_/skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'a'am cha shas/_skra'i khyon nam byis pa'i lam/_khyab pa'am rgyas pa/_rgyas pa'am gsal ba/_khor yug gam nye 'khor/_kun nas sam khor khor yug_/gdags pa'am bca' ba/_rgyas par/_rim/_phung po'i rdzas
[\[93a.3\]]pa d+hiH/_ni ya maH/_ni yA maH/_n+yA maH/_n+yA mA ba krAn+taH/_pra ti bad+d+haH/_bi ban+d+haH/_pra ti ban+d+haH/_pra t+ya bas+thA nama?/_aM shaH/_pra t+yaM shaH/_b+hA gaH/_
[\[93a.4\]]sam nyon mongs pa/_mi 'gyur ba/_nges par gyur pa/_skyon med pa/_skyon med par zhugs pa/_rag lus pa'am 'brel ba'am bgegs su gyur pa/_/bgegs sam gegs/_phyir 'jil ba'am bgegs byed pa'am bar chad byed ba/_phyir gzhil ba'am so sor bzhag pa/_cha/_bgo skal la ma so so'i cha/_skal ba'am
[\[93a.5\]]ni ba ra Nama?/_A ba ra Nama?/_se tuH/_kau laH/_nau nA baH/_ga tiH/_a laM/_nir+dz+wa raH/_a ro gaH/_de hI/_swA pa te yaH/_sa mut+thAnama?/_pa li
[\[93a.6\]]cha/_chod pa'am sgrib pa/_sgrib pa/_stegs sam zam pa/_gzings/_gru_/'gro ba'am rnam pa'am rtogs pa'am rten/_rgyan nam nus pa'am chog pa/_rims nad med pa'am nad med pa/_nad med pa/_lus can/_bdag dbang ba/_kun nas slong ba'am kun nas ldang byed/_kun nas sbrags pa'am ma byi ba'am
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]go d+haH/_A tsAr+Ya muSh+TiH/_d+har+m+mAn+ta rA yaH/_bits+tshan+da ya ti/_bi tsak+ShuH ka ra NA ya/_bre Shi tA/_pra kIr+NaH/_bi pra kIr+NaH/_pa ri dzA yaH/_a
[\[93b.2\]]ma bkrus pa'am tshigs pa'am 'bral pa/_slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud/_chos kyi bar du gcod pa/_mos pa bzlog pa/_mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir/_skur ram btang /_bkram ba'am 'thor ba/_rnam par 'thor ba'am rnam pa bkram pa/_yongs su byang bar bya ba'am 'dris par bya ba/_mngon du'am
[\[93b.3\]]b+hi mu khaM/_a ba bA daH/_saM sargaH/_dA ho bi gats+tsha ti/_b+ha smai naM ku r+YA tra/_rA dz+yama?/_rA dz+ye shwa r+YA d+hi ba t+yaM kA ra ya ti/_sam+m+rA dz+yaM/_sArba b+hau maH/_tsa tu ran+taM bi dzi ta bAM/_
[\[93b.4\]]phyogs pa/_gdams pa/_'du 'dzi/_tsha ba med pa'am gdung ba med par 'gyur/_'di thal bar blags pa'am rlog pa'am rlog par 'gyur/_rgyal po'i srid dam thabs/_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la dbang byed par 'gyur/_rgyal srid rgyas pa/_sa kun la dbang ba'i rgyal po/_mtha' bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/_
[\[93b.5\]]a d+h+yA ba sa ti/_pa ra mar+tha sa t+yama?/_sam+d+r-i ti sa t+yama?/_bya ba hA raH/_sAM ke ti kaM_/ma hA t+m+yama?/_pUrbi kA/_ma d+h+ya pa da lo paM kr-i twA/_e ka tra sa me t+ya sam+b+hU ya/_e ka b+hU twA/_tadz+dza tI ya/_ta
[\[93b.6\]]rnal du bkod/_don dam pa'i bden pa/_kun rdzob kyi bden pa/_tha snyad/_brdar btags pa/_che ba'am bdag nyid che ba/_sngar byas pa'am sngar drangs pa'am sngon 'dren pa/_bar gyi tshigs mi smos par byas te/_gcig tu 'dus sam phrad nas/_gcig tu 'dus nas/_de dang 'dra bar/_de la rag lus
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]dwi d+he ya twA/_a n+war+thaH/_yu gaM_/yu ga pU ta/_lo ka saM dz+nyA/_A shu ta ra br-it+tiH/_i ta re tarAn+ta r+b+hA baH/_kA dA tsit+ka pa
[\[94a.2\]]zhe'am bskos pa bzhin byed ba/_don dang mthun pa/_zung ngam phrugs/_cig car zhe'am lan cig ce'am mnyam ba/_'jig rten gyi ming du btags pa'am 'jig rten gyi tha snyad/_shin tu myur par 'jug pa/_gcig gi nang du gcig bsdu ba/_res 'ga' 'byung ba zhe'am lan 'ga' 'byung
[\[94a.3\]]twAta/_pra ti pA d+yaM/_saM pra d+hAr+Ya mra/_ya thA yo gama?/_a g+haH/_a ba d+hA ra Nama?/_nir+d+hA ra Nam/_a thi ni r+b+hA ga bar+t+tiH/_sang+kA shaH/_A nu lo mi kI k+ShAn+tiH/_
[\[94a.4\]]ba'i phyir/_gos par bya ba'am bsgrub par bya ba'am bstan par bya ba/_legs par 'gro ba'am legs par dpyad pa/_ji ltar rigs pa'am ji ltar 'byor ba/_bsags pa'am sdig pa/_nges par gzung ba/_dmigs kyis dbye ba/_tha dad du mi 'jug pa'am mi gnas pa/_'dra ba/_rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa/_
[\[94a.5\]]pr-iSh+Tha lab+d+haH a ba gA h+ya/_duSh+p+ra sa haH/_du rA ba sa daH/_iSh+TaH/_a niSh+TaH/_A kA raH/_pra kA raH/_nai ka shaH/_b+ha gi no b+ha ban+ti/_ka than+nI ya te/_a b+hi sam+ba d+h+ya te/_
[\[94a.6\]]rjes la thob pa/_zhugs nas sam rtogs nas/_bzod par dka' ba/_bsnyen par dka' ba/_'dod ba'am sdug pa/_mi 'dod pa'am mi sdug pa/_rnam ba'am byad bzhin nam tshul/_rnam ba/_re rel sam yin nam rnam pa gcig tu ma yin/_skal ba can du 'gyur/_ji ltar drang ngam ji ltar bshad/_sbyar ro/_/
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]a b+hiSh+yan+ti taH/_bi sa dr-i shaHpA ko bi pA kaH/_u dA ra bi pA kaH/_a drAk+ShI ta/_pre k+ShAn+tesma/_pa ri hA raH/_bi sardza ya ti/_bi sardza nama?/_bi sardzi taH/_pra ti bi d+hA nama?/_bA sa nA/_pa ri bA si taH/_nirga taH/_
[\[94b.2\]]brlan pa'am sbangs pa/_mi 'dra bar smin pas na rnam par smin pa/_rnam par smin pa rgya che ba/_mthong ngo /_/bltas so/_/lan/_lan ldon/_lan ldon pa'am gtong ba/_slar btang ba'am lan btab ba/_phyir bcos pa'am lan gdab pa/_bag chags/_yongs su bskos/_byung ba'am 'das pa/_
[\[94b.3\]]sau ra t+yama?/_nA bA d+ha ya tisma/_saM tsAr+Ya/_saM tsAr ya tisma/_nirbi kA raH/_u pa gr-i TaH/_pra ti be da ya swa/_sha lo dwa ra Nama?/_bra ma tha naM/_bra ti han+ti/_pra ti ba ha nama?/_nir+g+hA ti taH/_ku ga Na pra tA pa naH/_dz+yo
[\[94b.4\]]des pa/_gnod par ma gyur to/_/bskyod nas sam spos nas/_spos so/_/mi 'gyur ba/_bskor ba'am dkris pa/_mkhyen par mdzod cig sbron cig_/zug rngu 'byin pa/_rab tu 'joms pa/_phyir ba cil/_slar bzlog pa/_bcom pa/_tshogs ngan pa rab tu gdung bar byed pa/_skar ma'i tshogs sam
[\[94b.5\]]ti rga NaH/_tsit+ta mA k+Ship+ta ma?/_A ga ma ya swa/_A ga ma ya mA naM tiSh+Tha ti/_tiSh+Tha ti pra tI k+Sha mA NaH/_u pa dza gA ma/_a b+hi mu kha mu pa ga tama?/_pra tI k+Sha ti/_u pa bi ba sha/_prA tiSh+Tha na?/_sa ma nudz+nyA/_a sh+le ShaH/_a g+ni kha dA/_be Sha/_b+h+yA mI
[\[94b.6\]]snang bar byed ba'i tshogs/_sems khrid/_sdong cing /_sdod cing 'dag_/nye bar song /_mngon du nye bar song /_sdod/_'dug go_/'khod do/_/gnang ba'am 'brang ba'am mthun par gnang gam chags ba'am ma 'byar ba/_me ma mur gyi 'obs sam dong /_cha byad/_mog mog
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]ka ra NaM/_d+h+yA mI kri tama?/_b+ha ba kAn+tA raH/_b+ha ba tsA ra kaH/_saM sa rit+tA/_a b+haT+Ti taH/_prA kr-i taH/_d+hika?/_saM khyAM gats+tsha ti/_A lo ki taH/_bi lo ki taH/_
[\[95a.2\]]por bya ba/_mog mog por byas pa/_srid pa'i dgon pa/_srid pa'i btson ra/_'khor nas/_ma bcad pa'am ma phye ba'am ma bkrol ba'am ma brdungs pa/_bal ba/_ngan ba 'di/_grangs su 'gro'o/_/kun tu lta ba'am mdun du lta ba/_rnam par lta ba'am g.yas g.yon du lta ba/_
[\[95a.3\]]ul+lo ki taH/_ut+ta rot+ta raM/_a b+hI k+Sh+Na ma?/_ni rud+d+haM a ba swA ba nama?/_swa p+nAn+ta ra ga tama?/_ut+tiSh+Tha/_ut+tiSh+Tha ti/_ut+thA s+ya ti/_us+thi taH/_ut+s+Tha ya/_e ta yU yaM/_gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_A nI ya tAM/_ki

[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]kama?/_A ha ra NaM/_sa ha sA/_a kasmAta/_bi kr-i taH/_bi saM s+thi taH/_bI b+hAt+sA/_le paH/_ni ru pa le paH/_e ka taHpiN+DI kr-i t+ya/_saM k+Shi bya piN+Da yi twA/_dwa yo sh+tsit+ta yosas ma ba d+hA naM nA sti/_
[\[95b.2\]]bzhin/_len pa'am 'dzin pa/_ba bcol lam bab bab pa'am 'phral/_glo bur/_cha lugs ngan pa/_tshul mi sdug par 'dug pa/_mi sdug pa/_rnyong ngam byug pa'am skyang nul/_chags pa med pa'am gas pa med pa/_gcig tu bsdus nas/_bsdus te bsdongs nas/_sems gnyis phrad ba med pa/_
[\[95b.3\]]nirbi she ShaH/_bya sa nama?/_duSh+ka ra kA ra kaH/_duSh+ka ra tsar+YA/_ki yats+tsi raM tsa ri tama?/_na tsI rA yi ta kA yaH/_a gA ra ma d+h+yA ba saM/_nA mo pa de she na/_nA ma d+he ya ma nu bi tarki taM/_i ma mar+tha ba shaM sam+ba sh+ya mA naH/_
[\[95b.4\]]bye brag med pa'am khyad par med pa/_zhugs pa'am zhen pa'am phongs pa'am nyon mongs pa/_dka' ba byed pa/_dka' ba spyad pa/_yun ji srid nas spyad/_lus ma dral ba'am ma gshegs pa/_khyim na gnas shing /_ming bstan pas/_ming rjes su brtags pa/_don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas/_cung

[\[95b.6\]]zad kyang mi nus sam ci yang mi nus/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcos pa/_dge spyod ltar btsos pa/_lam ltar bcos pa/_spu zing zhes byed pa/_cha med ba/_sems gzhan/_yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas/_spyod pa mi gsal ba/_bar chad med pa/_byed pa/_
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]a bi nA b+hA baH/_puSh+ka lama?/_piM pama?/_sha ka li kaH/_pa rit+ta sha ka li gA g+niH/_ut+l+lu b+h+ya/_saM dz+nyA ga taH/_nAm+nA ya te/_A liM gi taH/_a ba lam+b+ha nama?/_ung+ku nu kA sa nama?/_med+h+yaH/_pa ta ti/_

[\[96a.3\]]bi sha ti/_mU D+haH/_ba ri b+hA bi taH/_ta ru Na bra NaH/_tri kAN+Da kaM_/sA ha tsar+Ya mra/_A b+hi prA yig/_A bi lama?/_shAb+di kaH/_kA ra Na sro taH/_b+hin+na kra maH/_kr-i tA ba d+hiH/_pra ba ti taH/_mAb+haiSh+Ta/_abika laH/_pA ra

[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]a re/_ma b+hU ya e baM ka ri Sh+ya tha/_e kad+d+h+yam b+hi saM k+Shi pya/_A kaR+Sha ya ti/_pa rA kaR+Sha ya ti/_su dzuSh+TaH/_a be k+Sha bAna?/_sa ha b+ha bya tA/_sA mi ShA/_ni rA mi ShA/_A mi ShA/_u pa yAn+ti/_k+ShI raM s+yaM da ti/_ut+saM gaH
[\[96b.2\]]kwa'i/_phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig_/gcig tu bsdus te/_tshur 'dren/_phar 'dren/_shin tu bstan/_lta ba dang ldan pa/_skal ba dang bcas pa'am skal ba mnyam ba/_zang zing dang bcas pa/_zang zing med pa/_zang zing ngam sha'am zas/_'bab bam nye bar 'gro/_'o ma 'dzag_/pang pa/_

[\[96b.5\]]b+h+r-i sama?/_bA Tama?/_d+yu tiH/_d+hAriH/_pa ri marda naM/_sam+bA ha nam sna ba nama?/_ut+sa da nama?/_ni rA ma gan+d+haM/_pa dma?/_sam+ba da nama?/_sam+mA rdza nama?/_pra t+yung+ga mnaM/_pra t+yung+ga mya/_dwi dzaH/_

[\[97a.1\]]brgaH/_gu h+yama?/_ra ha s+yam/_sa ma yo\u0f85s+ya ni be shan d+harma kar+t+taM/_bat+sa laH/_bra ti rU paH/_gr-i hAM ga NaH/_ba Da
[\[97a.2\]]ze/_sde'am chan/_gsang ba/_gsang chen/_'di'i khyim dbub pa'i dus la bab/_byams pa'am sdug par sems pa'am mnyes gshin pa/_thab rir bab pa'am 'tsham pa/_lha khang dam mchod rten gyi skabs su ni ang ga na 'khor sa'am nye 'khor du gdags khyim gyi dgar/_
[\[97a.3\]]bA mu khaMH/_ku la shulkaM/_/rash+miHpra gra haH/_a ba mUr+b+ha kA/_pAta kI/_br-i shalI/_li bi phal kaH/_ni mit+taM/_ta paspI/_dusas ma ti kra maH/_ba Di shaH/_ud+d+hig+na mA na saH/_saM be gaH/_nirbitra/_

[\[97a.6\]]skyo ba/_yongs su skyo ba'am mi dga' ba/_yongs su yi mi chad pa/_ngo tsha ba/_'jug pa'am 'gro ba'am skem pa/_'dris pa/_'khrug ba/_dkrugs pa'am glongs pa/_dus 'gyur/_mi 'gyur ram mi thogs sam mi sdod dam rgyun mi 'chad pa/_ngan ngon tsam gyis dad pa/_shes nas dad
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]daH/_a b+he d+ya pra sA daH/_sI mA bad+d+haH/_ma nonyanu kU lama?/_ma na A paH/_ka l+yA Na mi trA rA ga NaH/_dak+Shi NI yaH/_mi th+yA twa ni ya taH/_sam+p+ra haR+Shamra/_san+to Sha ya ti/_sa mA dA pa ya ti/_sa mu te

[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]pra sa b+haM/_Am+nA taH/_goSh+ThI/_pa ri tsa yaH/_gran+thaH/_la lA maH/_an+ti ma mA tri grA ma b+hA baH/_A NI bra t+yA NI ni r+hA ra yo ge na/_shU raH/_
[\[98a.2\]]nan gyis sam ngo mthon/_grags ba'am brjod pa/_dge 'dun nam tshogs zhing 'du ba/_'dris ba/_mdud pa'am gos/_rgyal mtshan nam grags pa/_bud med kyi lus kyi tha mar gyur pa/_khye'us khye'u 'byung ba'i tshul du/_/bI ra dang ma 'dom na dba' ba 'dom na rtul po dpa' mnyam rtsal che ba/_
[\[98a.3\]]pa ri s+phu TaM/_A bar+t+ta nama?_pa ri bar+t+ta nama?/_bi tsa ra Nama?/_b+hUmyA kra ma Nama?/_b+hU mair+b+hU myAn+ta ra saM kra ma NaM/_bA saM ka lpa ya ti/_a sam+b+hin+naH/_sam+b+hin+naH/_ta lama?/_sa mA d+hi maN+Da
[\[98a.4\]]yongs su rgyas par 'gengs ba'am yongs su khyab/_yongs su bskor ba'am bsgyur ba/_rnam par rgyu ba/_sa gnon pa/_sa nas sa gzhan du 'phar ba/_gnas 'cha'/_ma 'dres ba'am dbyer med pa/_'dres par ma tha dad ba/_ngos sam steng ngam gzhir ma mthil/_ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil
[\[98a.5\]]lama?/_ka ra ta lama?/_br-i k+Sha ta lama?/_kra ma ta lama?/_b+hU mi ta lama?/_A kA sha ta lama?/_sa man+ta ta lama?/_skad go 'dun la/_ut+sargaH/_a pa bA daH/_sa mu dA yAr+thaH/_tsA tuSh+ko Ti kaH/_praSh+Na ni r+N+Na yaH/_ni br-i tA byA kr-i tAH/_
[\[98a.6\]]'khor/_lag mthil/_shing drung ngam ljon ba'am 'og_/zhabs kyi mthil/_sa'i steng ngam sa'i gzhi/_nam mkha'i dkyil/_kun gyi dkyil/_spyir btang /_dmigs kyis bsal ba/_spyi'i don/_mu bzhi'am mtha' bzhi/_dris pa gtan la dbab pa/_bsgribs pa'i lung du mi ston pa/_
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]a ni pr-i tA byA kr-i tAH/_a b+hi sa ma yAn+ti kaH/_kiM nA nA ka ra NaM/_a sam+p+ra dz+nyA naM/_ni rA swA daH/_kA mA ba tsa raH/_rU bA pa tsa raH/_o mi t+yA ha/_dI baH/_ulkA/_ulkA
[\[98b.2\]]ma bsgribs pa'i lung du mi ston pa/_mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' las byung ba/_tha dad du bya ba ci yod/_shes bzhin ma yin pa/_ro bro ba med pa/_'dod pa na spyod ba/_gzugs na spyod pa/_de bzhin no zhes smras so zhe'am smras pa de bzhin no/_/mar me/_skar ma'am sgron ma'am tal la/_skang mda'i
[\[98b.3\]]mu khama?/_pra dI paH/_sa mu di taH/_sh+li Shok+tiH/_pra br-id+d+haM/_a b+hi saM b+hot+s+ya te/_bo d+hi ma b+hi sam+bud+d+haH/_a b+hi sam+bud+d+h+ya ti/_bud+d+ha twa ma bA b+no ti/_bi d+yo ti
[\[98b.4\]]gdong ngam sna/_sgron ma'am mar me/_shar ba'am 'dus pa'am spyi/_tshig zur gnyis su sbyar ba/_'phel ba'am skyes pa/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba/_sangs rgyas nyid 'thob bo/_/rnam par snang bar
[\[98b.5\]]taH/_pa ri dz+nyA/_sam+b+ha pa ti/_a sam+b+ha baH/_A kra ma Nama?/_A kra ma ya ti/_a ba kra ma ti/_A ya taH/_pra b+hA ba nA/_bya bas+thA nama?/_bIb+sA/_k+Sha Ni kaH/_A lam+ba te/_
[\[98b.6\]]byas/_yongs su shes pa/_'byung ngam srid pa/_mi srid pa'am mi 'byung ba/_gnon pa/_gnon par byed pa/_'gro ba'am 'jug pa/_yun ring po'am rgya che ba'am yangs pa/_brjod pa/_rab tu phye ba'am rab tu bzhag pa'am rnam par bzhag pa/_zlos pa/_skad cig pa/_grib so babs/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]a d+h+yA lam+b+ha te/_a b+hi pra lam+ba te/_kr-it+t+r-i mama?/_sup+taH/_pra ro da nama?/_a d+ha raH/_sha y+YA/_A san+diH/_A bA shra yaM/_kha T+wAng+gaH/_mung+ga raH/_bra to daH/_pra t+ya graH/_pU ti pI dza ma?/_A
[\[99a.2\]]grib so cher babs/_grib so mngon par rab tu babs pa/_bcos ma/_nyal ba'am gnyid log pa/_du ba/_'og ma/_mal/_khri'u/_rgyab rten/_khri shing /_tho ba/_gzugs ba btsugs pa gdab ba/_sar ba'am khye'u tshang /_sa bon rul pa/_glo bur du
[\[99a.3\]]gan+tu kaH/_luny+tsa te/_kr-i shaH/_sa ma ba d+hA nama?/_bishwa kar+m+mA/_An+wA hiN+Da yi twA/_a karmA ra kr-i tra/_pA Ta nama?/_ku TA ya ti/_bi ta ta ba li kA/_bra ti bub+dzi taH/_a b+hi rU TaH/_
[\[99a.4\]]'ongs sam glo skyes sam thor bu/_'bal lam thog_/skem pa/_'grogs pa pa'am phrad pa/_las sna tshogs can nam bzo sna tshogs can/_bskor nas/_mkhan bzos ma byas pa/_gzal ba'am bkas ba/_brdungs ba'am 'thub pa/_gnyer ma rangs/_bskor ba'am gang ba/_'dzegs sam zhon/_
[\[99a.5\]]pa ri Sh+yan+daH/_pra mA das+thA nama?_k+Ship+ta tsit+toH/_un+mu kha dzA taH/_un+mA daH/_bi hwa lI b+hU taH/_sAM ka raH/_d+har+m+ma bya sa na sam+par+t+ta nI ya/_bi Sha mA ba ri hA raH/_a ba mA na naM mA na naM/_dzi dz+nyA sA/_bi Da m+ba nA
[\[99a.6\]]brlan pa'am gsher ba/_bag med pa'i gnas/_sems khral khrul du gyur ba/_han tang gis btab pa'am blong bar gyur ba/_myos pa/_rmugs shes song ba'am blong ba/_'dres pa/_chos kyis 'phongs bar 'gyur ba/_yang ba mi spongs pa/_brnyas pa'am khyad du gsod pa/_sad pa'am bgam pa/_co 'dri ba/_
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]byA DaH/_a bi d+yAN+Da ko Sha pa Ta laM/_duHkhAM tI brAM kha rAM ka Tu kAM/_nA da ti/_mI TaHbi TaH/_prag+g+ha ra ti/_ki yan+taH/_lU naH/_khA NuH/_dzi bu sA hwa yaH/_ud+dA yA daH/_d+harmA lo ka mu
[\[99b.2\]]ma rungs pa'am gdug ba'am sbrul/_ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i spubs kyi sgrib pa/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rtsub pa tsha ba/_grag ba'am sgra 'byin pa/_mi gtsang ba'am phyis/_rab tu zag_/ji snyed dam ji tsam/_brdas/_bcad 'phro'am khyi'u kha/_'dzam bu zhes bya ba/_rabs chad pa/_chos snang ba'i
[\[99b.3\]]khaM/_brah+ma pa tha ko bi daH/_lak+Sh+yaM/_lak+Sha NaM/_kA ra Ne kA r+Yo pa tsA raH/_kA r+Ye kA ra No pa tsA raH/_u pa pat+ti pra ti lam+b+hi kaH/_d+har+m+ma tA pra ti lam+b+haH/_d+har+m+ma tA pra ti lA b+hi kaM_/bi d+hA nama?/_sA khi l+yaM/_pra t+ya yi taH/_a bra byA
[\[99b.4\]]sgo/_tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa/_mtshan gyi gzhi/_mtshan nyid/_rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa/_'bras bu la rgyu btags pa/_skye bas thob pa/_chos nyid kyis thob pa/_chos nyid kyis rnyed pa/_gcad pa'am dgag pa/_bshes pa'i tshig_/yid ches pa'am yid brtan pa/_shin tu brjod
[\[99b.5\]]hA raH/_s+tha lam/_d+ha n+wa ni/_ra Na shauN+DaH/_di na ka raH/_a d+yA lam+b+ha nama?/_sA k+Shi bya ba diSh+TA/_sA k+Shi pr-iSh+Ta smAna?/_a dzi nama?/_a nA swa stAM sa twa nA shwA sa ye maH/_br-i thi byA ma pa
[\[99b.6\]]tu med pa/_thang ngam skam/_skam la'am thang la/_g.yul ngor 'dor ba'am brtul ba/_nyi ma'am nyin byed/_lhag par dmigs pa/_dbang por phul ba/_dbang por 'dris pa'am che bzhi rmas ba/_g.yang gzhi'am pags ba/_sems can dbugs ma byung ba rnams dbugs dbyung ngo /_/sa la mi ltung
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]ta nA ya/_A gA Ti ka ri Sh+ya ti/_na ba yA na sam+p+ra s+thi taH/_stU paHtsai t+yama?/_tsai t+yAng+ga NaH/_ba suH/_tsa ra ma b+ha bi kaH_/ni kA ya sa b+hA ga s+yA be d+haH/_u pa bA saH/_A hA re pra ti kU la saM dz+nyA/_sarba lo
[\[100a.2\]]bar bya ba'i phyir/_dam por byed pa'am sra bar byed pa/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa/_mchod rten/_mchod rten gyi 'khor sa/_dbyig gam nor/_srid pa tha ma pa/_ris mthun par 'phen pa/_za gcig gam smyung ba/_zas la mi 'phrod pa'i 'du shes/_'jig rten
[\[100a.3\]]ke a na b+hi ra ti saM dz+nyA/_si k+ShA pa dma?/_shI lama?/_sam+ba raH/_d+hu ta gu NaH/_saM le khaH/_saM ya maH/_a ya spra pA Ti kaH/_sh+yA mi kaH/_yuk+taiHpad byany+dza naiH/_sa hi taiH/_A nu lo mi kaiH/_A nuts+tsha bi kaiH/_au
[\[100a.4\]]thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes/_bslab ba'i gzhi/_tshul khrims sam ngang tshul/_sdom pa/_sbyangs pa'i yon tan/_yo byad bsnyungs pa/_yang dag par sdom pa/_lcags kyi tsha tsha/_g.ya'/_tshig 'bru 'byor pa/_'brel pa/_rjes su mthun pa/_rjes su 'phrod pa/_thabs
[\[100a.5\]]pa yi kaiH/_pra ti rU paiH/_pra dak+Shi NaiH/_ni pa ka s+yAng+ga sam+b+hA raiH/_nA ti dzalpeta?s/_nA ti sa retra/_e ba mA r+YA NAM man+t+ra NA/_lab+h+yA mi th+yA dr-iSh+TiH pra hA tuM/_mA pung+ga laHpung+ga lam+p+ra mi no tu/_pung+ga
[\[100a.6\]]dang ldan pa/_'tsham pa/_mthun pa/_'grus skyong gi yan lag gi tshogs/_ha cang smra ba mang du mi bya/_ha cang 'phro bar mi byed/_de ltar na 'phags pa rnams kyi smra ba'am 'gro ba'am brjod pa/_log bar lta ba spong bar nus pa'am spang par rung ba/_gang zag gis gang zag la tshod ma gzung
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]le bA mA pra mA Na mung+g+r-ih+nA tuH/_k+Sha N+ya tai/_pa rA mr-iSh+TaH/_a pa rA mr-iSh+TaH/_a b+h+ya ba hA raHka ba laH/_a tAR+ShI ts+tsakuShuHsa mu draM/_sau rmi kaM_/sA bar+t+taM/_sa grA haM/_sa ma yA pA
[\[100b.2\]]zhig/_/gang zag la tshad kyang ma 'dzin cig_/nyams par 'gyur/_phyis pa'am nogs pa/_ma 'bags pa'am ma phyis pa'am ma nogs pa/_m+za' ba'am mid pa'am bdeg pa/_kham des mig gi rgya mtsho las rgal/_dba' rlabs dang bcas pa/_glong dang bcas pa/_'dzin khri dang bcas ba/_pho ba'i drod
[\[100b.3\]]tsan+yA gra ha N+yA sa man+bA ga taH/_a si ta pI ta khA di tA swA di tA nis+samyak+Shu khe na pa ri pA kaM gats+tsha ti/_nA d+hi bA sa ya ti/_byan+tI b+ha pa ti/_a byan+tI kr-i ta na byan+tI ka ro ti/_na de sha ya ti/_kA ya s+ya b+he dAtra/_ban+b+h+yaH/_
[\[100b.4\]]snyoms shing 'ju bar byed pa dang ldan pa/_zos pa dang 'thungs pa dang 'chos pa dang myangs pa rnams legs par bde bar 'ju/_dang du mi len/_mthar byed pa'am byang bar 'gyur/_byang bar ma byas pa byang bar mi byed/_mi 'chags/_lus zhig nas/_'bras bu med pa'am myig long ba'am
[\[100b.5\]]i Shi kA mA pi tA b+ha ban+ti/_su ni khA tA/_A rAtra/_da bI yatra/_su kha s+yA d+hA raH/_a t+ya yaH/_swa bA hu ba lo pArdzi tama?/_swe da ma lA bak+Ship+taH/_d+h+r-i tiH/_b+haT+TA ra kaH/_d+har+m+ma paT+TA ba bad+d+haH/_

[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]sA mut+kaR+Shi kaH/_kA ma d+he nu/_ru tsi raH/_ba hu ka raH/_ka l+ya tA/_yaSh+TiH/_yU paH/_u pA dA na he tuH/_bra d+hA na he tuH/_sa ha kA ri pra t+ya yaH/_a pak+ShA laH/_dauSh+p+ra dz+nyA/_dauH shI l+yaM/_
[\[101a.2\]]yang dag phul/_'dod bzho/_mdzes pa'am 'od chags pa/_gces spras byed pa/_nyams bde ba/_srog shing ngam yu ba/_mchod sdong /_len ba'i rgyu/_rgyu'i gtso bo/_grogs byed pa'i rkyen/_skyon/_'chal ba'i shes rab/_'chal ba'i tshul khrims/_

[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]kr-iShi kar+m+mAn+taH/_sU tsi karmA/_mr-i ta gr-i haM/_ka Ta sI/_gartA/_ts+tshi traM/_ha rita shA dwa laM/_pu li naH/_uts+tshiSh+TaH/_s+tha ba raH/_ji ga maH/_ya thA kra mama?/_ma d+hUts+tshiSh+TaH/_sik+tha kama?/_a d+h+yA sha yaH/_A sha yaH/_A shA/_A

[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]pr-i tama?/_bI dzaM bA pa ya ti/_bi Shama?/_hA lA ha laM/_pra t+yA pa rAr+thaH/_ga No nA sa ma ti kran+taH/_sa mu dra tI rI ya kA nAM/_u pa lama?/_a k+Sha mA trA b+hir+d+hA rA b+hiH/_pr-i tha g+dzA naH/_gar+b+hA ba krAn+ti/_

[\[102a.3\]]su kha saM spaR+shaH/_nA nA byA d+hi pa ri ga taM/_na lal+lau b+ha ba ti/_daN+DaH/_ma hi kA/_nI hA raH/_dza lam+bi gA h+ya/_kwa thi tama?/_kwa tha yi twA/_a b+hi bisma yaH/_ad+b+hu taM/_/bya pa kr-iSh+TaH/_a

[\[102a.5\]]na ba kr-iSh+TaH/_kA l+ya me ba/_a ra NiH/_ma tha naH/_At+mo pa kra maH/_pra skan+naHsu khal+li kA/_u d+yo dzi taH/_ka TA k+ShaH/_ni kr-in+tan+ti/_b+hai ra bama?/_b+ho gaH/_pha NA/_
[\[102a.6\]]dben pa'am 'du 'dzi can/_nang par kho na'am nang bar sngar/_gtsub shing /_btsubs ba'am bsrubs pa/_bdag la gnod pa/_rab tu zhugs pa'am bying ba bsod nyams/_char bcug gam byed du bcug_/mig zur/_gcod pa/_'jigs 'jigs lta/_sbrul gyi lus bskyil ba/_sbrul gyi gdengs ka/_
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]ko Ta raH/_ya ba saH/_ba th+ya da nama?/_nir+b+han+si taH/_bi dzIM b+ha NaH/_kAN+Da na ma hIn+d+hi li kha ti/_durdi naM/_paN+yama?/_do ha naH/_bi hA ya sA/_arbAbra/_/A bi laH/_a d+hi pa te yaH/_saM
[\[102b.2\]]khong stong /_rtsa/_lam rgyags/_spyos ba'am brgyad pa'am tshar bcad pa/_bya rmyangs sam bsgyings pa'am glal/_mdas sa rko/_yul ngan nam rmus pa/_tshang zong /_bzho bzho pa/_nam mkha'/_tshu rol lam tshun chad/_skyon nam rnyog pa/_dbang du 'gyur ba'am dbang du bya ba/_tshogs
[\[102b.3\]]b+h+ya/_a saM b+h+ya/_sa mA sa taH/_saM k+She pa taH/_par+Ya nu yo gaH/_kAr+Ya mra/_kA ra Nama?/_he yo bA de yama?/_ut+mi ShaH/_ni mi ShaH/_ki ta baH/_ke ta bama?/_kA ra NI yama?/_a kA ra NI yama?/_bar+d+ha te/_bai mA tra ma ni sta
[\[102b.4\]]bar dbyung /_tshogs bar mi dbyung ba/_mdor bsdu na/_mdor na/_brgal zhing brtag pa/_'bras bu'am bya ba/_rgyu'am byed pa/_blang ba dang dor ba/_phye ba/_btsum pa/_rgyan 'gyed pa/_rgyan la rtseg pa/_bya ba/_bya ba ma yin pa/_'phel ba/_bye brag gam rim pa zin ba'am mthar phyin pa'am nges
[\[102b.5\]]raH/_dur b+hi saM b+ha baH/_su mu dA na ya naM/_a rdza nama?/_d+hU raH/_a ni ke taH/_u pa ro d+ha bA saH/_a br-i Ta shA l+yama?/_san+d+hu k+Sh+Nama?/_iny+dzi tama?/_gyan+di tama?/_sa muts+tsh+ra yaH/_sa muts+tsh+ri taH/_ni k+She paH/_

[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]lup+taH prAn+taH/_be da nA d+h+yA pa ya ti/_san+ni shri taH/_pra h+lA daH/_ba lA d+hA na ma?/_A kA k+ShaM mA NaH/_uts+tsha li taH/_bya yaH/_bi ni bad+d+haH/_bi Tha pa na pra t+yu pa s+thA na lak+Sha NaM/_

[\[103a.3\]]m+lA nama?/_shIr+NaH/_a bya ba kIr+N+NaM/_sA ba d+yama?/_a na ba d+yaM/_nirga taH/_bra b+h+raSh+TaH/_pra d+h+yA yan+taH/_dak+Sho mA yA kA ro mA yA kA rAn+te bA sI bA/_pra bar+t+ta kaM_/a nu bar+t+ta kaM saM ro d+haH/_
[\[103a.4\]]rnyis pa/_dengs pa'am rnyis pa'am lhag pa/_ma 'dres pa/_kha na ma thob dang bcas pa/_kha na ma tho ba med/_byung /_lhung ba'am bo ba/_sems ba'am sems khong du chud pa/_sgyu ma byed pa'am sgyu ma byed pa'i slob ma mkhas pa/_'jug par byed pa/_rjes su 'jug pa/_yongs su 'gog
[\[103a.5\]]bi kan+thi taM/_ling+gaM/_bra ti k+She pa Na sA ba d+yaM/_ni rA ka ra NaM/_kA ri traM/_tseSh+Ti taM/_dr-ig+g+he yaM/_b+hA ba nA he yaM/_a s+yAM/_A s+yaM/_pa TuH/_prAp+t+ya nu Shang+gaH/_pu N+yA b+hi Sh+yan+daH/_

[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]A dz+nyA tsit+te na/_sarba tse ta sA man+tsA hri t+ya/_pra ti bra tA/_sa ta ta sa mi taM/_kle sha ba hu laH/_tA bra rA gaH/_tI pra dwe ShaH/_tI bra mo haH/_dI naH/_
[\[103b.2\]]shes par bya bar sems pa/_sems kun gyis bsams te/_khyim thab las mi 'phro ba/_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa/_nyon mongs pa che ba'am mang ba/_'dod chags che ba'am bdo ba/_zhe sdang bdo ba'am zhe sdang shas che ba/_gti mug bdo ba'am shas che ba'am mi bzad pa'am tsha ba/_zhan pa/_
[\[103b.3\]]hI naH/_lI naH/_bi ShA daH/_a ba sA da mA pa d+ya te/_bi ShaN+Na ma na saH/_tsit+ta nA ba lI ya te na saM lI ya te/_na bi pr-iSh+ThI b+ha ba ti a s+ya mA na saM/_e Sha NA/_Sha NA/_a n+we Sha NA/_sa ma n+we Sha NA/_mr-i ga ya te/_

[\[118a.1\]]k+She paH/_tuSh+Ni be kra ma NaM/_a nA da ra br-it+tama?/_su rA mai re yA ma d+ya pA naM/_a kA la tsar+YA/_ku la tsar+YA/_rA dza ku la rA tri tsar+YA/_shik+Sha pa da dra bya tA d+h+ya ba tsA raH/_sU tsi gr-i ha ka sum+pA da naM/_pA da ka saM pA da naM/_a ba

[\[122b.1\]]noSh+Tha kaH/_tsi trAng+gaH/_a ti br-id+d+haH/_a ti bA la kaH/_khaN+dzaH/_khe laH/_kAN+Da ri kaH kA NaH/_kU NiH/_kub+dzaH/_bA ma NaH/_ma la gaN+DaH/_mU kaH/_ba d+hi raH/_pI Tha sarbI/_sh+lI pa dI/_s+t+rI ts+tshin+naH/_b+hA ra ts+tshin+naH/_mArgats+tshin+naH/_tA la muk+taH/_kan+da lits+tshan+naH/_

[\[131b.1\]{D4347}]@#/_sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa bzhugs/_/@##/_/na mo bud+d+hA ya/_bam po dang po/_rta'i lo la btsad po khri lde srong btsan pho brang gi'i 'on cang rngon bzhugs/_stod smad kyi dmag rnying rjed dang rkun chen btul/_gar log gi pho nyas phyag btsal/_blon chen po zhang khri zur ram
[\[131b.2\]]shag dang /_mang rje lha 'od la sogs pas rgyal sa gnang mang po bcad de/_rnga rta dang ba mar phal mo che phyag tu phul/_zhang blon man chad so sor bya dga' stsal ba'i lan la/_nyi 'og gi mkhan po A tsAr+ya dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_dA na shI la dang /_bo d+hi mi tra dang /_bod
[\[131b.3\]]kyi mkhan po rat+na rak+Shi ta dang /_d+har+m+ma tA shI la dang /_lo tsA ba mkhas par chud pa dz+nyA na se na dang /_dza ya rak+Shi ta dang /_many+dzu shrI war+m+ma dang /_rat+nen+d+ra shI la la sogs pas theg pa che chung las 'byung ba'i rgya gar gyi skad las bod kyi skad du bsgyur zhing ming du btags pa rnams dkar chag tu bris te/_nam du
[\[131b.4\]]yang gzhung lugs de las mi bsgyur zhing kun gyis bslab du rung bar gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas/_sngon lha sras yab kyi ring la/_A tsAr+ya bo d+hi sa twa dang /_ye shes dbang po dang /_zhang rgyal nyen nya bzang dang /_blon khri gzher sang shi dang /_lo tsA ba dz+nyA na de ba ko Sha dang /_lce khyi 'brug
[\[131b.5\]]dang /_bram ze A nan+da la sogs pas chos kyi skad bod la ma grags pa las ming du btags pa mang dag cig mchis pa'i nang nas kha cig chos kyi gzhung dang /_byA ka ra Na'i lugs dang mi mthun te/_mi bcos su mi rung ba rnams kyang bcos/_skad kyi ming gces so 'tshal gyis kyang
[\[131b.6\]]bsnan nas theg pa che chung gi gzhung las ji ltar 'byung ba dang /_gna'i mkhan po chen po nA gA rdzu na dang /_ba su ban+d+hu la sogs pas ji ltar bshad pa dang /_byA ka ra Na'i sgra'i lugs las ji skad du 'dren pa dang yang bstun te/_mjal dka' ba rnams kyang tshig so sor phral nas gtan
