[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]sngar ban+de chen po dpal gyi yon tan dang /_ban+de chen po ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa yang 'tshogs te/_rje blon gdan 'dzom pa la zhus nas d+har+m+ma bsgyur ba'i thabs dang /_rgya gar gyi skad la bod kyi skad du ming btags pa rnams gtan la phab ste/_bkas bcad pa/_dam pa'i chos bsgyur ba'i
[\[132a.2\]]lugs ni don dang yang mi 'gal la bod skad la yang gar bde bar gyis shig_/d+har+m+ma bsgyur ba la rgya gar gyi skad kyi go rims las mi bsnor ba bod kyi skad du bsgyur na don dang tshig tu 'brel zhing bden ma bsnor bar sgyur cig bsnor na bde zhing go ba bskyed pa cig yod na/_tshigs bcad la ni rtsa ba bzhi
[\[132a.3\]]pa'am/_drug pa 'ang rung ste/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig gi nang na gang bde ba bsnor zhing sgyur cig_/rkyang pa la ni don gang bsnyegs pa yan chad kyi tshig dang don gnyis ka la gar bde bar bsnor zhing sgyur cig_/skad gcig la ming du mar 'dren pa ni ltag 'og dang bstun la gar snyegs pa bzhin du ming
[\[132a.4\]]thogs shig_/gau ta mya lta bu gau'i sgra las tshig dang /_phyogs dang /_sa dang /_'od dang /_rdo rje dang /_ba lang dang /_mtho ris la sogs pa rnam pa du mar snyegs pa dang /_kau shi ka lta bu'i rtswa ku sha thogs pa dang /_mkhas pa dang /_pad+ma la dga' ba dang /_'ug ba dang /_mdzod ldan la sogs pa'i sgra'i
[\[132a.5\]]lugs las drangs shing bsgyur na sna grangs mang po zhig tu snyegs la/_bsgyur ba rnams gcig gi nang du ni sna grangs de kun 'dur yang mi btu ba ste/_gcig tu chad par byar yang gtan tshigs chen po med pa rnams ni mi bsgyur bar rgya gar skad so na zhog cig_/gar yang drang du rung ba'i tshig byung na/_phyogs
[\[132a.6\]]gcig tu chad par mi bsgyur bar spyir snyegs su rung bar gyis shig_/yul dang /_sems can dang /_me tog dang /_rtsi shing la sogs pa'i ming bsgyur na yid gol zhing tshig mi bde ba dang /_'ol phyir bsgyur du rung ba don du de ltar yin nam ma yin gtol med pa rnams la/_mgo la yul zhe'am/_me tog
[\[132a.7\]]ces pa la sogs pa gang la bya ba'i ming gcig bla thabs su snon la rgya gar skad so na zhog cig_/grangs la rgya gar skad bzhin du bsgyur na dge slong brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum zhes 'byung ba la sogs pa ni stong nyis brgya lnga bcu zhes tha mal par bod kyi skad bzhin bsgyur na don dang yang mi 'gal ba bod kyi skad
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]la yang bde bas grangs bsdom du rung ba rnams bod skad kyi lugs bzhin du thogs shig_/pa ri dang /_sam dang /_u pa lta bu la sogs te/_tshig gi phrad dang rgyan lta bur 'byung ba rnams bsgyur na don dang mthun zhing 'byor ba'i thabs ni/_yongs su zhe'am/_yang dag pa zhe'am/_nye ba zhes sgra bzhin
[\[132b.2\]]du sgyur cig_/don lhag par snyegs pa med pa rnams ni tshig gi lhad kyis bsnan mi dgos kyis don bzhin du thogs shig_/rnam grangs su gtogs pa'i tshig rnams ni ma 'doms na ming gang bod skad du spyir grags shing tshig tu gar bde bar gdags so/_/'doms na so sor btags pa bzhin
[\[132b.3\]]du thogs shig_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos la sogs pa zhes dang sko long gi tshig gi rim pa ni sangs rgyas la zhe sa'i tshig tu bsgyur/_gzhan la tshig 'bring po man tshad tsam du byas te/_sngon lha sras yab kyi spyan sngar mkhan po dang lo tsA ba mkhas pa 'tshogs pas/_d+har+m+ma dkon mchog
[\[132b.4\]]sprin dang /_lang+kar gshegs pa bsgyur te/_gtan la phab pa'i lugs bzhin du sgyur cig_/skad kyi lugs 'di ltar bkas bcad pa las so so nas su yang 'chos shing 'og tu ming gsar du 'dogs su mi gnang gis/_bsgyur ba dang 'chad pa'i grwa so so nas skad gsar du ming gdags dgos pa zhig yod
[\[132b.5\]]na yang /_so so'i grwa grwar ming chad par ma gdags par chos kyi gzhung dang sgra'i lugs las ji skad du 'byung ba'i gtan tshigs dang /_chos la ji skad du gdags pa dpyad de/_pho brang du bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs kyi 'dun sa dang /_d+har+m+ma zhu chen 'tshal ba'i grwar phul la/_snyan du zhus te bkas bcad
[\[132b.6\]]nas skad kyi dkar chag gi dkyus su bsnan no/_/gsang sngags kyi rgyud rnams gzhung gis gsang bar bya ba yin te/_snod du ma gyur pa rnams la bshad cing bstan du yang mi rung la/_bar du bsgyur zhing spyod du gnang gis kyang /_ldem po dag tu bshad pa ma khrol nas sgra ji bzhin du 'dzin cing log par spyod pa
[\[132b.7\]]dag kyang byung /_sngags kyi rgyud kyi nang nas thu zhing bod skad du bsgyur ba dag kyang byung zhes gdags kyi/_phyin chad gzungs sngags dang rgyud bla nas bka' stsal te/_sgyur du bcug pa ma gtogs pa/_sngags kyi rgyud dang /_sngags kyi tshig thu zhing bsgyur du mi gnang ngo /_/skad kyi ming sngon gtan la ma phab pa
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]dang ming du ma thogs pa las theg pa che chung gi gzhung dang sgra'i gzhung las 'byung ba dang sbyar te bshad pa'i dang po'o//_//sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dad yon tan gyi ming la sogs ba skad dka' ba rnams thog thog bshad pa sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi rnam grangs la/_bud+d+haHzhes bya ba'i sgra las drangs
[\[133a.2\]]na gcig tu na/_mo ha ni drA pra mat+ta pra bud+d+ha pu ru Sha ces bya ste/_gti mug gi gnyid sangs pas na mi gnyid sangs ba bzhin te/_sangs pa la snyegs/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_bud+d+hai ti kA sha nA da bud+d+ha bi bud+d+ha pad+ma bta/_blo bye zhing rgyas bas na pad+ma kha bye zhing rgyas pa dang 'dra bar yang bshad de sangs rgyas zhes
[\[133a.3\]]bya'o/_tshig gi don spyir na chos thams cad thugs su chud cing ma lus par byang chub pa la bya/_b+ha ga bA na zhes bya ba gcig tu na/_b+ha ga na mA ra tsa tuSh+Ta pa twa dwa b+ha ga bAn/_zhes bya ste bdud bzhi bcom pas na bcom pa la bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na b+hag ni legs pa rnam pa drug gi ming ste/_gzugs dang /_
[\[133a.4\]]grags pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dpal dang /_shes rab dang /_brtson pa ste 'di drug gi spyi la bya/_bAn zhes 'byung ba ni b+hag s+yA stI ti b+ha ga bAn zhes ldan bar bshad de/_de rnam grangs 'di skad du bya ba las sngar bsgyur ba'i tshig grags pa btsan bar bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni mdo sde dag las
[\[133a.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la mtshan 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/zhes kyang 'byung bas na/_'jig rten pa'i b+ha ga bAn las khyad bar du 'das zhes bla thabs su bsnan te/_bcom ldan 'das zhes btags/_'jig rten ba'i b+ha ga bAn zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten ba'i gzhung nyid las kyang bcom par mi 'chad de/_legs
[\[133a.6\]]pa dang ldan pa zhes 'chad bas 'jig rten ba'i b+ha ga bAn ni legs ldan zhes gdags/_ta thA ga ta zhes bya ba ta thA ni de bzhin ga ta ni gshegs ba'am byon ba'am mkhyen ba'am gsungs pa la bya ste/_tshig gi don spyir na sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams ji ltar gshegs shing phyin pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang
[\[133a.7\]]bzhin de bzhin nyid ji lta ba mkhyen zhing gsungs ba la bya mod kyi/_sngar grags ba bzhin de bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gdags/_ar+han zhes bya ba gcig tu na/_pU dza mar ha tI ti ar+han zhes bya ste/_lha dang mi la sogs pa kun gyis mchod par 'os pas na mchod 'os zhes kyang bya/_yang gcig tu na/_kle sha a ri
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]ha da bAn ar+han zhes bya ste/_nyon mongs pa'i dgra bcom pa zhes kyang bya ste/_rnam pa 'di las 'dir ni don btsan par bya ste dgra bcom pa zhes btags/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha zhes pa samyaka ni yang dag pa/_sam ni sa man+tAm/_sam pUr+N+Na ste ma lus pa'am rdzogs pa/_bud+d+ha ni sangs rgyas pa la bya ste/_spyir na chos
[\[133b.2\]]thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid ma nor bar thugs su chud cing mngon par byang chub pa'i mtshan te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya/_bid+yA tsa ra Na saM pan+na zhes pa bi d+yA ni rig pa/_tsa ra Na ni rkang pa/_saM ban+na ni ldan pa'am phun sum tshogs pa la bya ste/_bslab pa gsum dang sbyar na lhag pa'i shes rab ni rig pa/_
[\[133b.3\]]lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i khrims ni rkang pa/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang sbyar na/_yang dag pa'i lta ba ni rig pa/_lhag ma bdun ni rkang pa ste/_rig pa mig dang 'dra bas mtshon nas rkang pas phyin cing thob par 'gyur bas na rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya/_su ga ta ces bya ba gcig
[\[133b.4\]]tu na/_sho b+ha na ga ta su ga ta su rU pa bta ces bya ste/_legs par gshegs pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/_gzugs legs pa bzhin/_a pu nar prat+yA ga ta su naSh+Ta dz+war bta ces bya ste/_phyir mi ldog ba gshegs pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/_rims nad legs par byang ba
[\[133b.5\]]bzhin/_yA bang+ga ta byag ma nA ta su ga ta/_su pUr+Na g+haT ba ta ces bya ste/_ji tsam du 'gro bar bya ba ma lus par phyin pas na legs par gshegs pa ste/_bum pa legs par gang bzhin pa zhes 'byung /_yang na gcig tu na/_d+har+m+ma skan+d+ha las 'byung ba su ga ta i ti su khi to b+ha ga bAn/_swarga ta a bya thi ta/_d+har+m+ma
[\[133b.6\]]sa ma n+wA ga ta/_ta du ts+ya te su ga ta ces 'byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das bde bar gyur cing mtho ris kyi bde ba dang ldan la/_gnod ba mi mnga' zhing gnod pa med pa'i chos dang ldan pas na bde bar gshegs pa'am bde ba brnyes pa la yang bya ste/_'dir sngar grags ba dang /_d+har+m+ma skan+d+ha las 'byung ba dang
[\[133b.7\]]sbyar te bde bar gshegs pa zhes btags/_lo ka bid ces bya ba lo ka ni 'jig rten/_bid ni bid dz+nyA na ste de bzhin gshegs pas nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du gdul ba'i sems can gyi khams la gzigs shing /_skal ba yod ba dang med pa rtogs par mkhyen pas na 'jig rten
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]mkhyen pa zhes bya/_a nu t+ta ra pu ru Sha da mya sA ra thi zhes bya ba/_a nut+ta ra ni bla na med pa/_pu ru Sha da mya sA ra thi ni skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba ste/_sor mo'i phreng ba la sogs ba zhe sdang che ba dang /_dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod chags che ba dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srungs
[\[134a.2\]]la sogs pa gti mug che ba'i 'dul ba'i sems can rta rgod dang 'dra ba 'dul dka' ba rnams 'jam pos 'dul ba yang 'jam pos btul/_drag pos 'dul ba yang drag pos btul/_gnyi gas 'dul ba yang gnyi gas btul te/_thabs bzang zhing sla bas thabs thabs bzhin du btul nas
[\[134a.3\]]don sgrub pa'i mchog mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas par kha lo sgyur zhing 'jog pas na/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa zhes bya/_shA sta zhes bya ba shA su a nu Shi Sh+To zhes bya ste/_phyir tshig gi don du na ston zhing slob pa la bya/_ta ni tshig gi don du bya bar zad de/_spyir na lha dang mi la sogs
[\[134a.4\]]pa thams cad kyi ston par gyur bas na ston pa zhes bya/_dzin zhes bya ba dzi ta pA pa ka a ku sha la d+har+m+ma zhes bya ste/_sdig pa dang mi dge ba'i chos las rgyal bas na rgyal ba zhes bya/_tA yi zhes bya ba tA yi ni san+tA na pa la na yoHzhes bya ste/_'phags pa'i lam thugs su chud pa bstan zhing bshad de/_
[\[134a.5\]]rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_skyob cing skyong ba la bya ste/_pA la skyong ba zhes btags pa zhig kyang gud na yod pa dang ma 'dom par bya ste skyob bar btags/_ma hA r-iShi zhes bya ba ma hA chen po/_r-i Shi ni r-i Shi ga tau zhes bya ste/_shes pa dang ldan pa la'ang bya/_yang gcig tu na/_r-i d+h+ye ti pra Ni d+hA nan zhes bya ba
[\[134a.6\]]ste/_smon pa rnams 'byor zhing 'grub pa la'ang bya/_yang gcig tu na/_kA ya bAg+ma no b+hi r-i dzu she te i ti r-i Shi zhes bya ste/_lus dang ngag dang yid drang por gnas shing srong bas na drang srong chen po zhes pa tags/_aM gi ras zhes bya ba thog ma drang srong nyid kyi lus las byung bas na bdag lus skyes zhes
[\[134a.7\]]bshad pa dang /_aM gi ras ni nyi ma ste/_nyi ma'i rigs yin pas na nyi rgyud ces kyang bshad du rung bar 'dul ba'i dngos po dang /_bshad pa las 'byung la/_mdo sde dag las sku'i kha dog nyi ma bzhin du lham me lhang nger bzhugs pa'i yon tan lta bur yang bshad pas nyi ma'i rgyud ces btags/_de
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa so so'i mtshan la/_bi shwa b+hu ga zhes bya ba/_bi shwa ni thams cad/_b+hu dza pA lan a b+h+ya ba ha ra yo zhes 'byung ste/_longs par kun la spyod pa'am sems can thams cad skyob pa la bya ste/_skabs 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yin pas na thams cad skyob ces btags/_kra kuts+tshun+da ces
[\[134b.2\]]bya ba/_kra ni kra ma ste 'khor ba/_kuts+tshun+da ni/_ti kung sa ya ti zhes bya ste/_'khor ba 'joms pa'am/_sel ba la bya ste/_'khor ba 'jig ces bya/_yang yi ge kha cig gi nang nas kra kuts+tshun+da ces kyang 'byung ste/_kutshi ta tshan+do/_a ti kran+do smA di ti zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan cing bshad pas mi dge ba
[\[134b.3\]]dang log pa la dad pa bsal zhing med par byas pa'i mtshan te/_log dad sel zhes bya/_kA sh+ya pa zhes bya ba/_ka sh+ya ga te zhes bya ste/_chad pas bcad pa'am gnod par bya ba'i rigs pa yin/_pa ni pA la ni skyob ba'am skyong ba'i drang srong gi rigs su skyes pa la bya ste/_chad pas bcad cing gnod par bya ba
[\[134b.4\]]las skyob pas na gnod skyob ces kyang bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_kA sh+ya dI pa to zhes kyang bya ste/_skal ba yod pa'i sems can chos bshad pa'i 'od kyis snang bar bya ba'i rigs ba rnams gcig tu na kA sh+ya dI pa to zhes kyang bya ste/_skal pa yod pa'i sems can chos bshad pa'i 'od kyis snang bar bya ba'i
[\[134b.5\]]rigs pa rnams srung zhing skyob pas na 'od srungs zhes kyang byar rung ste/_sngan chad ming du btags te grags pa bzhin du 'od srungs zhes btags/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi ming la mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phung po dang /_ye shes dang sku gsum la/_a sa ma sa ma pany+tsa skan+d+ha zhes bya ba a sa ma ni mi mnyam
[\[134b.6\]]pa ste/_sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bya/_sa ma ni mnyam pa ste sngon gyi sangs rgyas de dag nyid dang mtshungs par gyur ba la bya/_pany+tsa skan+d+ha ni phung po lnga ste zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po ste/_sangs rgyas
[\[134b.7\]]rnams la mnga' ba'i phung po 'di dag phal pa la med pas na mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i phung po lnga zhes bya/_d+har+m+ma d+hA tu bi shud+d+ha zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yin te/_stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i chos rnams skye zhing 'byung ba dang dbyings su gyur pas na chos kyi dbyings de bzhin
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]nyid la glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa sprin dang 'dra ba dngas shing byang ste/_nam mkha'i dbyings dag pa dang 'dra ba san chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa zhes bya/_A daR+sha dz+nyA na zhes bya ba me long lta bu'i ye shes yin te chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la dmigs
[\[135a.2\]]pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur bas/_me long phyis pa'i nang du ci yang snang ba bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba la bya ste/_me long lta bu'i ye shes zhes bya/_sa ma tA dz+nyAn zhes bya ba thog mas dang po la de kho na nyid
[\[135a.3\]]mngon bar rtogs pa'i tshe/_bdag dang gzhan du mi 'byed cing mnyam pa nyid du rtogs bas gong nas gong du sbyangs ba'i sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi gnas ba'i mya ngan las 'das par gyur ba'i tshe/_nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gnas 'phos te/_ye shes su gnas gyur ba la mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes
[\[135a.4\]]bya/_pra t+ya be k+Sha Na dz+nyA na zhes bya ba so sor rtog pa'i ye shes yin te/_yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pas gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyi gzhir gyur ba/_shes bya thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i ye shes 'jug bas chos kyi char chen po 'bebs
[\[135a.5\]]shing the tshom sna tshogs gcod pa dang /_sku bai DU R+Ya la sogs pa rin po che'i mdog tu ston pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin te/_so sor rtog pa'i ye shes zhes bya/_kr-i t+yA nuSh+Tha na dz+nyAn zhes bya ba bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yin te/_mig la sogs pa dbang po lnga'i rnam par shes pa gnas gyur pas 'jig rten gyi
[\[135a.6\]]khams thams cad du thabs sna tshogs dbag tu med bas sems can mang po'i don mdzod pa'i gzhir gyur pa yin te/_bya ba sgrub ba'i ye shes zhes bya/_d+har+m+ma kA ya zhes bya ba chos kyi sku yin te/_sangs rgyas kyi sa dang sbyar na chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa dang /_me long lta bu'i ye shes ni de bzhin nyid
[\[135a.7\]]kyi rang bzhin te chos kyi sku zhes bya/_sam+b+ho ga kA ya zhes bya ba longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin te/_mnyam ba nyid kyi ye shes dang so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyis kyis chos kyi longs spyod dang skyid ba chen po ma lus pa myong bar mdzad ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku la bya ste/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya/
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]nir+m+mA Na kA ya zhes bya ba sprul pa'i sku yin te/_bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis sems can so so cis 'dul ba bzhin du thabs thabs su sku dang gsung dang thugs sprul te/_sna tshogs su ston pa la bya bas na/_sprul pa'i sku zhes bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la/_da sha ta thA ga ta ba laM zhes pa de bzhin
[\[135b.2\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pas shes bya'i dngos po gang la yang thogs pa med de mkhyen pa 'di bcu'i mthu nyan thos la sogs pa gzhan las 'phags pas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu zhes bya/_s+thA nA s+thA na dz+nyAn ba lan zhes bya ba gnas dang gnas ma
[\[135b.3\]]yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_gnas ni legs par spyad pas 'bras bu yid du 'ong ba 'grub pa dang /_nyes par spyad pas 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong ba smin par 'gyur ba la sogs pa la bya/_gnas ma yin pa ni legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bu yid du mi 'ong bar gyur ba dang /_nyes par spyad pa'i
[\[135b.4\]]'bras bu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ba la bya ste/_srid pa dang mi srid pa ma nor bar mkhyen pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_kar+m+ma bi pA ka dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_bla na med pa'i ye shes kyis 'das pa
[\[135b.5\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da lta byung ba'i las yang dag par blangs pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa las kyi rgyu gang gis/_gnas gang du 'bras bu smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_nA nA d+hi muk+ti dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa dang
[\[135b.6\]]khams gsum la dga' zhing mos pa rnam pa sna tshogs mkhyen pas na mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_nA nA d+hA tu dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_khams zhes bya ba ni sngon gyi bag chags kyis grub pa'i bsam pa'i khams dang /_kun nas nyon
[\[135b.7\]]mongs pa'i khams dang /_rnam par byang ba'i khams la sogs pa la bya ste/_khams tha dad pa mang po'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ma nor bar thugs su chud pas na khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_in+d+ri ya pa rA pa ra dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_dad pa la sogs pa'i dbang po rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma'i rim pa dang rnam grangs ma lus par mkhyen pa'i dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_sarba tra gA mi nI bra ti ban+tha ba lan zhes bya ba thams cad du 'gro ba'i
[\[136a.2\]]lam mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_'gro ba lngar skye ba'i lam dang /_mya ngan las 'das bar 'gro ba'i lam la sogs pa lam mo cog chub par mkhyen pas thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_sarba d+h+yA na bi mok+Sha sa mA d+hi sa mA pat+ti saM kla sha bya ba dAn dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba bsam
[\[136a.3\]]gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyom par 'jug pa'i kun nas nyon mongs ba dang /_rnam par byang ba dang ldang pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_bsam gtan dang po la sogs pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar ba brgyad dang /_stong pa nyid la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mang po
[\[136a.4\]]dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la sogs pa la bya/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ni lta ba dang dmigs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs par gyur ba la bya/_rnam par byang ba ni 'khor ba la chags pa med pa dang mi dmigs pa dang ldan pas rnam par dag pa la bya/_/
[\[136a.5\]]ldan pa ni lugs dang mthun pa'am mi mthun pa dang thod rgal la sogs pa'i tshul gyis ldan pa mkhyen pa la bya/_pUrba ni bA sA nu smr-i ti dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyi sngon gyi tshe rabs grangs med pa tshun chad gnas
[\[136a.6\]]gar skyes pa dang /_byad gzugs kyi rnam pa ci 'dra ba dang /_mtshan ma dang rtags ci yod pa dang las kyi rgyu cis skyes pa mkhyen pas na sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_ts+yu t+yu pa pat+tI dz+nyAn ba lan zhes bya ba shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_lha'i spyan gyis sems can
[\[136a.7\]]rnams gang nas shi 'phos nas gang du skyes ba ma lus bar gzigs pas na shi 'pho dang skye ba mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_A shra bak+Sha ya dz+nyA na ba lan zhes bya ba zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs yin te/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad bag chags yan chad zad cing byang bar gzigs
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]pas na zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs zhes bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi la tsa twa ri ta thA ga ta bai shA ra d+yaM zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi yin te/_mi 'jigs ba bzhi dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa phal pa mang bo'i nang du byon nas khyu mchog gi gnas
[\[136b.2\]]rlabs po che zhal gyis 'che ste/_tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor zhing yang dag par seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pas na mi 'jigs ba zhes bya/_de la mngon par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs pa dang zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs ba gnyis ni sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyud la mnga' ba'i yon tan yin pas na rang gi don phun
[\[136b.3\]]sum tshogs pa yin la/_bar du gcod ba'i chos des par bstan pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba'i lam bstan ba la mi 'jigs pa gnyis ni gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir bshad pa yin pas na gzhan gyi don te/_bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par bstan pa'ang yin no/_/sarba d+har+m+mA b+hi saM
[\[136b.4\]]bo d+hi bai shA ra d+yan zhes bya ba chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub ba la mi 'jigs pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad phyag mthil du skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu bzhag pa dang 'dra bar thugs su chud de/_mngon par byang chub pa la shes rab brnyes pas dge sbyong ngam bram ze'ang
[\[136b.5\]]rung /_lha'i mig dang pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa lha'am bdud kyang rung rdzu 'phrul dang ldan zhing mthu che ba'i tshangs pas kyang chos dang mthun pas mngon par sangs rgyas pa ma yin par brgal ba'i gzhi dang gtan tshigs med de brgal gyis dogs pa med pas na chos
[\[136b.6\]]thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la mi 'jigs ba zhes bya ste/_mi 'jigs pa 'og ma gsum gyi mjug kyang 'di dang 'dra bar bshad/_sarbA shra pak+Sha ya dz+nyA na bai shA ra d+yan zhes bya ba zag pa thams cad pa mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs ba yin te/_zag pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i ming
[\[136b.7\]]ste/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ma bral na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyang slar 'dzag cing ltung bas na zag pa zhes bya/_nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te zad par mkhyen pa la zag pa ma zad par sun dbyung zhing don rtags kyis brgal du med de/_mi dogs pas na zag pa thams
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]zad par mkhyen pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/_an+ta ra yika d+har+m+mA na n+ya tha tA ni sh+tsi ta byA kar Na bai shA ra d+yan zhes bya ba bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa yin te/_bar du gcod pa'i chos zhes bya ba bag med pa dang ngo tsha mi shes
[\[137a.2\]]pa dang khrel med pa la sogs pa 'phags pa'i lam dang /_dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar du gcod pa rnams bar chad kyi chos yin no zhes lung bstan cing bshad pa la thog tu ma bab pa med pas na bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams gzhan du mi 'gyur bar nges pa'i lung bstan pa la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/_sarba
[\[137a.3\]]si pa dA d+hi ga mA yi nair+ya Ni ka pra ti pat+ta thA twa bai shA ra d+yan zhes bya ba phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la nges par 'byung ba'i lam mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba phun sum tshogs
[\[137a.4\]]pa thob par 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa bshad pa la nges par 'byung ba'i lam ma yin no zhes dge sbyong ngam bram ze sus kyang brgal zhing gzhan du bsgyur du med pas na phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin du 'gyur ba la mi 'jigs pa zhes bya/_sangs
[\[137a.5\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la/_aSh+Ta da sha be Ni ka bud+d+ha d+har+m+mA zhes bya ba sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yin te/_chos 'di rnams nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang mi mnga' ste/_phal dang thun mong du gyur pa ma yin la/_sangs rgyas nyag
[\[137a.6\]]gcig la yon tan 'di rnams mnga' bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa zhes bya/_nA sti ta thA ga ta s+ya s+kha li tan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul ba mi mnga' ba yin te/_sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi phrin las la nor zhing thog tu ma bab pa med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa
[\[137a.7\]]med pa zhes bya/_nA sti ra bi tan zhes bya ba ca co med pa yin te/_dgra bcom pa kha cig la ma nor nas ku co 'don pa dang /_sngon gyi bag chags ma byang bas ca co che zhing tshig la 'khral 'khrul yod pa lta bu ma yin pas ca co med pa zhes bya/_nA sti mu Shi ta smr-i ti tA zhes bya ba bsnyel ba med pa
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]yin te/_dgra bcom pa la ma da gongs pa'i ye shes mi mnga' ste/_bsnyel nas sems can gyi don bya ba la sogs pa shor ba dang /_dus las yol ba lta bu ma yin pas na bsnyel ba med pa zhes bya/_nA sti sa mA hi ta tsit+taM zhes bya ba sems mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa yin te/_dgra
[\[137b.2\]]bcom pa dag nam ting nge 'dzin gang la zhugs pa de'i tshe/_ting nge 'dzin de la mnyam par gzhag pa lta bu ma yin gyi/_de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin mchog brnyes pas na ting nge 'dzin la zhugs kyang rung ma zhugs kyang rung ste/_mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pas na sems mnyam
[\[137b.3\]]par ma bzhag pa med pa zhes bya/_nAsti nA nA tA saM dz+nyA zhes bya ba/_tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa yin te/_dgra bcom pa dag 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis la bye brag tu 'dzin cing nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i chos la sogs pa la tha dad du 'byed pa lta bu mi mnga' ste/_sems
[\[137b.4\]]mnyam pa nyid dang chos mnyam pa nyid du gzigs pas na tha dad pa'i 'du shes med pa zhes bya/_nAs+t+ya pra ti saM khyA yo pek+Sha zhes bya ba so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med pa yin te/_dgra bcom pa dag sems can gyi don la ma brtags par yal bar 'dor ba lta bu ma yin gyi/_
[\[137b.5\]]skal ba yang med dang dus la bab ma bab gzigs nas dus dang sbyor ba ma gtogs par yal bar 'dor ba med pas na so sor ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms med ba zhes bya/_nA sti ts+tshan+da s+ya hA ni zhes bya ba 'dun pa nyams pa med pa yin te/_dgra bcom pa dag spyod yul dman bas de bzhin
[\[137b.6\]]gshegs pa'i sa la mos shing 'dun ba med de nyan thos kyi bya ba la mos pa lta bu ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas sems can gyi don mdzod pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba la sogs pa la rtag tu 'dun par 'jug pas na 'dun pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya/_nAsti bI R+Ya s+ya
[\[137b.7\]]hA ni zhes bya ba brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gcig gi phyir bskal bar chos bshad kyang sku dang gsung dang thugs bsnyel bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gcig gi phyir yang 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med ba 'das te gshegs pas na
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa zhes bya/_nasti smr-i ti hA ni zhes bya ba dran pa nyams pa med pa yin te/_sems can thams cad kyi sems dang /_spyod pa dang /_bsam pa dang /_mos pa la sogs pa sems can 'dul ba'i thabs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad dang /_
[\[138a.2\]]chos thams cad ji ltar gzigs shing dgongs pa la phyis ye shes kyis brtag mi dgos te/_nyams pa med pas na dran pa nyams pa med pa zhes bya/_nAsti sa mA d+her+hA ni zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa yin te/_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid la snyoms par 'jug cing de
[\[138a.3\]]las mi g.yo bar 'dzin pas na ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa zhes bya/_nAsti pra dz+nyA yArtA ni zhes bya ba shes rab nyams pa med pa yin te/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa mkhyen pa mi zad pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin pa mkhyen pa mi zad pa dang /_so sor yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa
[\[138a.4\]]mnga' bas na shes rab nyams pa med pa zhes bya/_nAsti bi muk+ter+ha ni zhes bya ba rnam par grol ba nyams pa med pa yin te/_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad las grol bas na rnam par grol ba nyams ba med pa zhes bya/_sarba kA ya karma dz+nyA na burbaM ga maM dz+nyA nA nu pa ri
[\[138a.5\]]bar+t+tI zhes bya ba lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_dgra bcom ba kha cig lus kyi las bsam bzhin ma yin bar byed de/_'jig rten gyi yid dang 'gal ba lta bu ma yin gyi/_spyod lam bzhi po kun gyis kyang sems can 'dul te/_ye shes
[\[138a.6\]]sngar 'byung ba'i rgyu las byung bas na ye shes sngon du 'gro ba yin/_ye shes dang lhan cig 'byung zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'jug pas na ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_bsdus na lus kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya/_ngag dang yid
[\[138a.7\]]kyi skabs su yang ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba 'di bzhin du bshad/_sarba wAk+kar+m+ma dz+nyAn bUrbaM ga maM dz+nyAnA nu pa ri bar+t+ti zhes bya ba ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad cing chos bstan pa la don
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]med cing chung za bar mi 'gyur la/_gsung gi yan lag drug cu dang ldan pas na ngag gi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya/_sarba mnaHkar+m+ma dz+nyA na pUrbaM ga maM dz+nyA nA nu pa ri bar+t+ti zhes bya ba yid kyi las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba
[\[138b.2\]]yin te/_nyon mongs ba dang spros pa'i bag chags thams cad dang bral te/_yang dag pa'i mtha' don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang ma bral bas na yid kyi las thams cad ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang pa zhes bya/_a tI te d+h+wa n+ya saM ga mA pra ti ha ta dz+nyA na daR+sha naM pa ri ba r+t+ta te zhes bya ba 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma
[\[138b.3\]]thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa yin te/_dgra bcom pa ltar 'das pa'i dus kyi dngos po ci la brtags pa sna gcig mkhyen gyi gzhan la thogs shing mi mkhyen pa lta bu ma yin gyis/_'das pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang /_sa chu me rlung gi rdul phra mo'i grangs dang /_sems can gyi
[\[138b.4\]]bsam pa dang spyod pa la sogs pa ma lus pa mnyam par gzhag pa dang /_ma bzhag pa'i dus dang sbyar ba med cing cil yang thags thogs med pa thugs su chud pas na/_'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes mthong ba 'jug pa zhes bya/_ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dus kyi skabs su
[\[138b.5\]]yang 'di bzhin du sbyar zhing bshad/_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la/_tsa tuSh+ThA pra ti saM bid ces bya ba so so yang dag bar rig pa bzhi yin te/_chos dang don dang des pa'i tshig dang spobs ba bzhi la mkhas pas so so yang dag par rig pa zhes bya/_cho 'phrul gsum la tri Ni prA ti hAR+YA ni zhes bya
[\[138b.6\]]ba cho 'phrul gsum yin te/_A de sha na prA ti hAR+Ya zhes bya ba pha rol gyi snying la ci sems pa mkhyen pas ji sems pa kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_r-i d+d+hi prA ti tA R+Ya nam mkha' la gshegs pa dang /_sku lus mang por sprul pa la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang /_a nu shA sa shA sa nI prA ti
[\[138b.7\]]hAR+Ya bden pa gnyis kyi sgo nas chos thams cad gtan la phab bar bkrol te phan zhing rjes su mthun par bshad pas na rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di gsum ngo mtshar che ba'i rmad du byung bas sems can mang po dad cing 'dun par mdzad pas na cho 'phrul gsum zhes bya/_byang chub sems
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dpa'i sgra bshad pa la bo d+hi sa twa zhes bya bas twa na ye ShAM ste bo d+hi satwa zhes pa bo d+hi byang chub/_satwa ni sems dpa'a'am sems stobs che ba la bya/_bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa la gcig tu brtul zhing me nur bas na byang chub sems dpa'/_mahA satwa zhes bya ba
[\[139a.2\]]ma hA ni chen po/_satwa ni sems dpa' ste nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa lta bu ma yin gyi/_sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa'i byang chub la zhugs pas na sems dpa' chen po zhes bya/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
[\[139a.3\]]dpa' dang nyan thos kyi sa'i rim pa'i ming la da sha b+hU mi zhes bya ba sa bcu yin te/_sa gong ma'i yon tan thob par bya ba'i rten du 'gyur zhing /_sa de nyid yon tan gyi gzhi yin pas nas zhes bya/_sa dang po pra mu di ta ces bya ba ni don chen po sngon 'dris pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten las
[\[139a.4\]]'das pa'i sems thob pa dang /_byang chub dang nye zhing sems can mang po'i don sgrub ba gzigs nas dga' ba rlabs po che skye bas rab tu dga' ba zhes bya/_sa gnyis pa ni bi ma la zhes bya ba ni/_tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ltung ba phra mo yan chad kyang byang bas na dri ma med pa zhes bya/_
[\[139a.5\]]sa gsum pa pra btA ka ri zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su dag pa ye shes kyi snang ba chen po'i gnas su gyur pa thob pas na 'od byed pa zhes bya/_sa bzhi pa artsi Sh+ma ti zhes bya ba ni/_nyon mongs pa sreg pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi me'i
[\[139a.6\]]'od 'phro ba can zhes bya/_sa lnga pa su du rdza ya zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la sgom zhing 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis ka la mi gnas pa'i shes rab yongs su dag par sbyang zhing sgom pa shin tu dka' bas na sa de non par
[\[139a.7\]]dka' ba'am bsgrub par dka' ba la bya ste/_shin tu sbyang dka' ba zhes bya/_sa drug pa a b+hi mu khi zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis ka la mi gnas shing mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing mtshan ma med pa la rang gi ngang gis
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]'jug pa'i ye shes la mang du gnas shing mngon du gzigs pas na mngon du gyur pa zhes bya/_sa bdun pa dU raM ga ma zhes bya ba mtshan ma med pa la bgrod pa gcig tu gyur pa'i lam dang nye zhing ring du phyin pas na ring du song ba zhes bya/_sa brgyad pa a tsal zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma'i 'du shes
[\[139b.2\]]dang mtshan ma med par rtsol ba'i 'du shes gnyi gas bskyod par mi nus pas mi g.yo ba zhes bya/_sa dgu pa sA d+hu ma ti zhes bya ba ni/_sa dgu pa la so so yang dag par rig pa brnyes pas na blo gros gzhan las 'phags pa yin te legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya/_sa bcu pa
[\[139b.3\]]d+har+m+ma me g+ha zhes bya ba ni gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin kun la yang sprin dang 'dra bar khyab cing thos pa'i chos nam mkha' dang 'dra ba la sprin bzhin du khyab pas na chos kyi sprin zhes bya/_sangs rgyas kyis sa man+ta pra b+hA bud+d+ha b+hU mi zhes bya ba ni 'od zer mang po bkye bas 'dul ba'i sems can
[\[139b.4\]]smin par mdzad cing chos kyi snang ba 'od dang 'dra bas thams cad la gsal bar byas pas na sangs rgyas kyis kun du 'od ces bya/_shukla bi daR+sha na b+hU miHzhes bya ba ni mos pas spyod pa'i drod la dang po rnam par byang ba dkar po mthong bas dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa zhes bya/_go tra b+hU miH
[\[139b.5\]]zhes bya ba ni dad pa shin tu che ba'i sa 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog la chos dang gang zag la bdag med par bzod pas na byang chub thob pa'i rigs dang ldan pas na rigs kyi sa zhes bya/_aSh+Ta mi ka b+hU mi zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa la bya ste/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gral dang po nas
[\[139b.6\]]yas bgrangs na/_rgyun du zhugs pa la 'jug pa grangs brgyad pa la bab pas na brgyad pa'i sa zhes bya/_daR+sha na b+hU mi zhes bya ba ni dr-i sh+yAta prek+Sha Na zhes bya ste/_dr-i sha ni mthong ba/_b+hU mi ni sa ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pas de khon nyid rtag par mthong bas na mthong pa'i sa
[\[139b.7\]]zhes bya/_ta nU b+hU mi zhes bya ba ni lan cig phyir 'ong bas 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod chags sra ba mor byas pas na bsrabs pa'i sa zhes bya/_bI ta rA ga b+hU mi zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i sa la bya ste/_sa 'di la gnas pas 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang /_gnod sems spangs pas na 'dod pa'i
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'dod chags dang bral ba yin te/_'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa zhes bya/_kr-i tA b+hi b+hU mi zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa'i sa la bya ste/_kr-i ta ni byas pa/_a b+hi ni a b+hi du ma shI la zhes bya ste/_bsrung ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas na/_sngar byas te grub pa'i don mi nyams par
[\[140a.2\]]bsrung ba'i phyir byas pa srung ba'i sa zhes bya ste/_dngos su na dgra bcom pa'i sa la bya/_mos pas spyod pa dang nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i rim pa'i ming la a d+hi muk+ti tsaR+Ya b+hU mi zhes bya ba/_bskal pa grangs med ba gcig gi bar du byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings la mos pa
[\[140a.3\]]bsgoms te/_da dung de bzhin nyid ma mthong pas na mos pas spyod pa'i sa zhes bya/_A lo ka lab+d+ha zhes bya ba chos kyi dbyings la mos pas bsgoms pa'i bye brag gis rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid du brtags pa'i chos thams cad dngos po med de brjod pa tsam du rig la/_chos la nges par rtog
[\[140a.4\]]pa'i bzod pa'i snang ba dang po thob pas na snang ba thob pa zhes bya/_A lo ka br-id+d+hi zhes bya ba chos kyi snang ba de nyid rgyas par bya ba'i brtson pa brtan par rtsom pas na snang ba mched pa zhes bya/_ta twA r+thaika de shA nu pra be sha zhes bya ba chos kyi snang ba mched pas phyi rol gyi yul med cing sems
[\[140a.5\]]tsam du rtogs te/_gzung ba'i g.yeng ba dang bral bas na de kho na'i don gyi phyogs gcig zhugs pa zhes bya/_a nan+taR+Ya sa mA d+hi zhes bya ba dad pa rab kyis sa 'di la 'dzin pa'i g.yeng ba spangs nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa de ma thag tu thob par 'gyur
[\[140a.6\]]bas na bar chad med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya/_nir+b+he d+ha b+ha gI ya zhes bya ba ni ni sh+ci tu b+hi d+ha ni b+he d+ha phA gI ya zhes bya ste/_nir ni nges pa'am gdon mi za ba/_be d+ha ni rtogs pa'am 'byed pa/_b+ha ga ni cha'am skal ba/_I ya ni phan pa'am mthun pa lta bu la bya ste/_dngos su na 'phags pa'i sa
[\[140a.7\]]ni ma thob la/_so so'i skye bo'i sa las ni 'das pa yin te/_'phags pa'i lam mthong ba dang sgom pa rnam pa gnyis yod pa'i nang nas mthong ba'i lam gyi cha gcig bo dang nye bas na nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa zhes bya/_uSh+ma ga ta zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i tshe
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa'i shing thams cad sreg pa'i me dang 'dra ba'i drod sngar byung bas na dro bar gyur pa zhes bya/_mUr+d+ha zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma mi brtan pa g.yo ba'i rtse mor phyin pas na rtse mo zhes bya/_k+ShaM ti zhes bya ba ni bden pa la bzod pa rab 'bring du mar phye ba'i nang
[\[140b.2\]]nas bzod pa rab dang ldan pa ste/_de las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing /_ngan song du mi ltung bas na bzod pa zhes bya/_lo ki kA gra d+har+m+ma zhes bya ba sa 'di 'jig rten pa'i chos kyang yin la/_sngan chad ma mthong bas 'phags pa'i lam lta bu 'jig rten pa'i chos dang mi mthun pa yang 'jig
[\[140b.3\]]rten ba'i chos kyi mchog 'dis cha mnyam pa'i rgyu med par 'thob par nus te/_'jig rten pa'i chos kyi phul du byung bas na 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi mchog ces bya/_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos kyi gang zag gi rim pa'i ming la/_pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha zhes bya ba e ka brga nA ma pra ti bud+d+ha
[\[140b.4\]]bo d+hi pra t+ye ka bud+d+ha zhes bya ste/_sems can mang pos don mi mdzad kyi/_bdag gcig pu byang chub pa dang mya ngan las 'das par sgrub pas na rang sangs rgyas zhes bya/_khaD+ga bi ShA Na kalpa zhes bya ba khaD+ga bi ShA Na tu l+ya twA ta/_khaD+ga bi ShA Na kalpa zhes bya ste/_rang sangs rgyas bskal pa
[\[140b.5\]]brgya'i bar du tshogs bsags pas dbang po rnon po phal dang mi 'dre bar bse ru dang 'dra ba gcig tu bzhugs pas na rang sangs rgyas bse ru lta bu zhes bya/_bar+g+ga tsA ri zhes bya ba bar+g+ga ni sde'am tshogs sam mang bo gcig tu 'dus pa la bya/_tsA ri tsA ra ga t+yar+tha zhes bya ste/_'gro ba
[\[140b.6\]]yin pas rang sangs rgyas phal dang thabs cig tu gshegs shing ba zhugs pa dang spyod pa la bya ste/_tshogs dang spyod pa zhes bya ste/_shrA ba ka zhes pa gcig tu na shr-i nA na t-I ti shrA ba ka zhes bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa las chos kyi lung ma mnos par bdag nyid kyis rtogs par
[\[140b.7\]]mi nus te nyan pa la yang bya/_yang gcig tu na samyaka dz+nyA na pha lan shrA ba sin+tA ti shrA ba ka zhes bya ste/_yang dag pa'i shes pas rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa gzhan la sgrogs shing thos par byed pas na nyan thos zhes bya/_sro tA pan+na zhes bya ba sro ta ni chu'i rgyun lta
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]bu la bya/_A pan+na ni nang du zhugs pa la bya ste/_spyir na mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshor 'bab pa'i 'phags pa'i lam gyi chu bo'i rgyun du zhugs pa la bya ste/_rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya/_sap+ta kr-id+b+ha ba pa ra ma zhes bya ba rgyun du zhugs pa bsgoms pas spangs
[\[141a.2\]]pa'i nyon mongs pa ma zad la/_'bras bu thob pas mi'i nang du yang lan bdun skye/_lha'i nang du yang lan bdun skye ba la bya ste/_mir skye ba'i srid pa bar ma bdun dang /_lhar skye ba'i srid pa bar ma bdun gyis bsnan na skye ba bdun bzhi nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du 'khor ba'i nang na bzhugs
[\[141a.3\]]pas na re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa zhes bya/_ku li ku la zhes bya ba rgyun du zhugs pa 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa gsum dang bzhi man chad las grol ba/_skye ba gnyis sam gsum gyi bar du 'khor ba na gnas shing lha dang mi'i rigs bzang por skye bas na rigs su skye ba
[\[141a.4\]]zhes bya/_sa kr-i dA ga mi zhes bya bas kr-ita ni lan cig A ga mi ni 'ong ba ste/_tshe de nyid la mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_lan cig slar 'jig rten 'dir skye bas na lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya/_e ka bi tsi ka zhes bya ba lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'dod pa'i khams kyi nyon mongs pa bdun pa
[\[141a.5\]]dang brgyad pa spangs pa/_skye ba gcig gis mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu'am/_phyir mi 'ong ba'i sa thob pa'i bar du chod pas na bar chad gcig pa zhes bya/_a nA gA mi zhes bya ba tha ma'i skal ba can gyi chos rnam pa lnga spangs pas slar 'dod pa'i khams su mi skye bas phyir mi 'ong
[\[141a.6\]]ba zhes bya/_an+ta ra pa ri nir+b+bA Ni zhes bya ba phyir mi 'ong ba srid pa gcig nas 'phos pa pha rol tu yang ma skyes par srid pa bar mdo'i tshe dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas mya ngan las 'da' bas na bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya/_u pa bad+ya pa rir+b+bA Ni zhes bya ba
[\[141a.7\]]phyir mi 'ong ba lam la zhugs shing brtson pa tshe 'phos nas pha rol tu skyes ma thag tu nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te/_lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du byed pas na skyes nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya/_a b+hi saM skA ra pa ri nir+b+bA Ni zhes bya ba phyir mi 'ong ba
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]'khor bas rgyun ma bcad pa pha rol tu skyes nas brtson ni brtson la lam ma byang ba rtsol ba dang bcas pas mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pas na mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya/_an b+hi saM skAr pa ri nir+b+bA yi zhes bya ba phyir mi 'ong ba lam la brtson
[\[141b.2\]]zhing 'grus par zhugs pa ma yin gyi nam bsam pa'i rgyud smin pa'i tshe dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob cing mya ngan las 'da' bas na mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba zhes bya/_Ur+d+ha sro ta zhes bya ba phyir mi 'ong ba thog ma gzhi gar skyes pa de nyid du mya ngan las mi
[\[141b.3\]]'da' ba'i steng du lha'i khams su skyes nas gdod mya ngan las 'da' bas na gong du 'pho ba zhes bya/_kA ya sAk+Shi zhes bya ba nirbAN sa dr-i sh+ya ni ro d+ha sa mA pat+te/_kA ye na sAk+Sha ka ra Na kA ya sAk+Shi zhes bya ste phyir mi 'ong ba 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'dra bar sems dang
[\[141b.4\]]sems las byung ba 'gags kyis kyang lus kyis mngon du byed pa zhes bya/_shrad+d+hA nu sa ri zhes bya ba/_shrad+d+ha zhes bya ba ni dad pa/_a nu sa ri ni rjes su 'brang ba ste/_bdag nyid kyi shes pas rtogs pa med kyi/_lung las thos pa bzhin du dad pas 'phags pa'i lam gyi rjes su 'jug
[\[141b.5\]]pas na dad pas rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya/_d+har+m+mA nu sa ri zhes bya ba/_d+har+m+ma a nu sa ri dun shI lan ya s+ya zhes bya ste/_dbang po rnon po gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing chos kyi tshul dang mthun par rigs par sbyor bas chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba zhes bya/_shrad+d+hA d+hi muk+ta zhes bya ba shrad+d+ha yA
[\[141b.6\]]mar+g+ga ma d+hi muk+ta shrad+d+hA d+hi muk+ta zhes bya ste/_dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dbang po rtul pos lam bsgoms nas 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob pas na dgra bcom pa la zhugs pa man chad gang zag chen po bdun gyi bye brag gi ming ste dad pas mos pa zhes bya/_dr-iSh+Ti prAp+ta zhes bya ba dr-iSh+Ti
[\[141b.7\]]ni mthong ba/_prAp+ta ni thob pa ste/_dbang po rnon po chos kyi rjes su 'brang bas lam gzigs shing 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob pas na dgra bcom pa la zhugs pa man chad gang zag chen po bdun gyi bye brag gi ming ste mthong bas thob pa zhes bya/_sa ma ya bi muk+ta zhes bya ba
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dgra bcom pa dbang po rtul po dus dang yo byad la sogs pa dang ldan na nyon mongs pa las grol zhing 'bras bu 'thob kyi/_mi ldan na thar pa thob par mi nus pas na dus kyi rnam par grol ba zhes bya/_a sa ma ya bi muk+ta

[\[142a.3\]]snyoms par 'jug pa ma bsgrubs par shes rab kyis zag pa nyi tshe las grol bar byas pas na shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba zhes bya/_u b+ha ya to b+hA ga bi muk+ti zhes bya ba u b+ha ya ni gnyis ka_/b+hA ga ni cha/_bi muk+ta ni rnam par grol ba'i sde/_dgra bcom pa nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
[\[142a.4\]]pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgrib pa gnyis ka las grol bas na/_gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba zhes bya/_su pra ti pan+no b+ha ga ba ta shra ba ka saM g+ha zhes bya ba shra ma N+yAr+than+nirbA NaM pra ti pan+na zhes bya ste/_dge sbyong gi don mya ngan las 'das pa la zhugs pas na bcom ldan
[\[142a.5\]]'das kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni legs par zhugs pa zhes bya/_n+yA ya pra ti pan+na zhes bya ba dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang drod dang rtse mo la sogs pa'i rigs pa'i rim pas zhugs pas na/_rigs par zhugs pa zhes bya/_r-i dzu pra ti pan+na zhes bya ba r-i dzu mAR+Ya mar+g+ga zhes 'byung ste/_
[\[142a.6\]]'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma 'khrugs shing drang la/_de la zhugs pas na drang por zhugs pa zhes bya/_saM pra ti pan+na zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams tshul khrims dang lta ba mthun pas na mthun par zhugs pa zhes bya/_a nu d+d+har+m+matsa ri zhes bya ba dge ba'i chos ji skad bstan
[\[142a.7\]]pa bzhin du mthun par spyod pas na rjes su mthun pa'i chos la spyod pa zhes bya/_d+har+m+mA nu d+har+m+ma pra ti pan+na zhes bya ba d+har+m+ma ni chos te mya ngan las 'das pa la bya/_a nu d+har+m+ma ni de'i rjes su mthun par spyod pa'i chos te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yin te/_de la zhugs pas
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa zhes bya/_dam pa'i chos kyi ming gi rnam grangs la/_sU tra zhes bya ba ar+tha su tsan da sU tra zhes bya ste/_sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'ang rung sangs rgyas kyis gnang ste nyan thos kyis bshad pa yang rung /_don mdo tsam du ston zhing smos pas na
[\[142b.2\]]mdo'i sde zhes bya/_ge yaM zhes bya ba gai kai shap+da zhes bya ste/_mdo sde bshad pa'i don dbyangs kyis brjod pas na dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa zhes bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na gA ta byA na ge ya zhes bya ste/_mdo sde las 'byung ba'i tshig nyid gzu bor ma gsungs te drang ba'i don du gsungs
[\[142b.3\]]pa la/_da dung bshad cing shes par bya ba gzhan yod pas na brtag par bya bar yang drang du ni rung mod kyis dbyangs kyis bsnyad par nye bas na dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde zhes bya/_byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos la sogs pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da
[\[142b.4\]]ltar gyi cir gyur pa dang 'gyur ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa bye brag tu lung ston pas na lung du bstan pa'i sde zhes bya/_gA thA zhes bya ba ni tshigs su bcad pa rtsa ba gnyis pa dang /_gsum pa dang /_bzhi pa dang /_lnga pa dang /_drug par sbyar te bshad pas na tshigs su bcad
[\[142b.5\]]pa'i sde zhes bya/_u dA na zhes bya ba a ser+ya d+ha na u dA na zhes bya ste/_gang zag 'ga' zhig gi phyir bshad pa ma yin gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yun ring du gzhag pa'i phyir gzhan gyis ma bskul ma gsol bar ched du brjod cing gsungs pa la bya ste/_dper na phyi dro'i dus kyi
[\[142b.6\]]tshe bcom ldan 'das nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs te gdan la bzhugs nas dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do zhes mdo las gsungs pa lta bu ste ched du brjod pa'i sde zhes bya/_ni dA nan zhes bya ba ni mdo sde dang 'dul ba la sogs pa thog ma
[\[142b.7\]]ji las glengs te bshad pa dang /_gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di dang byung ba 'di'i tshe bslab pa bcas pa lta bu la bya ste/_gleng gzhi'i sde zhes bya/_a ba dA na zhes bya ba/_ya tra ba ga mar+tha ma n+ya s+ya da naM dr-iSh+TAn+ta bistA ra s+ya zhes bya ste/_chos nyan pa rnams kyis go zhing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]sngon btags par byung ba gzhan las drangs te/_dpe rgyas par bstan pas na rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde zhes bya/_i ti br-it+ta ka zhes bya ba ni i ti e bi ste de lta bu/_br-it+ti ka zhes bya ba ni byung ba'am 'byung 'gyur la bya ste/_sngon byung ba'i gtam bzlas shing bshad
[\[143a.2\]]pa yin pas na de lta bu byung ba'i sde zhes bya/_dzA ta ka zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe gang dang gang du skyes pa dang /_dka' ba ci dad ci mdzad pa bshad pa yin pas skyes pa'i rabs kyi sde zhes bya/_be pu l+ya zhes bya ba ni bi pu l+ya s+yA ba bai
[\[143a.3\]]pu l+ya zhes bya ste/_shin tu rgyas par bshad pas sam/_mdo sde rgya chen po'i nang nas sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa shin tu rgya che zhing yangs par bshad pa yin pas na shin tu rgyas pa'i sde zhes bya/_a d+b+hu ta d+har+m+ma zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[143a.4\]]dang nyan thos rnams kyi mkhyen pa dang rdzu 'phrul dang byin gyis rlabs ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba bshad pa yin pas na rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde zhes bya/_u pa de sha zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i don de kho na nyid mthong ba gzhan gyis zhib mor bshad cing gtan la bab pa rjes su mthun pa'i
[\[143a.5\]]chos bshad pa'i ma mo lta bu chos mngon pa la bya bas na gtan la phab pa'i sde zhes bya/_brah+ma tsAR+Ya zhes bya ba brah+ma b+hU ta shI ta b+hU ta zhes bya ste/_tshangs pa'am bsil bar gyur pas te don du na mya ngan las 'das pa la bya/_tsAr+ya ta ra ga tau zhes bya ste gang gis thob par 'gyur zhing /_
[\[143a.6\]]spyod pa la bya bas na mya ngan las 'das par bya ba'i phyir spyod pas na tshangs par spyod pa zhes bya/_A dau ka l+yA Na zhes bya ba A dau ni dang po yin te tshangs par spyod pa'i dang po la bya/_kal+yA Na ni gser bzang po cir yang bcos shing brdung du rung ba dang 'dra bar yon tan gyi rim pa gong ma
[\[143a.7\]]kun gyi snod du rung bar 'gyur bas na dge ba la bya ste/_spyir na dang po lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pas dge ba thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pas na thog mar dge ba zhes bya/_ma d+h+ye kal+yA Na zhes bya ba tshangs par spyod pa'i bar ma ni bsam gtan bzhi la sogs pa sems mnyam par
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]gzhag pa'i ming ste/_lhag pa'i sems la bya bas na bar du dge ba zhes bya/_paR+Ya ba sA ne ka l+yA Na zhes bya ba tshangs par spyod pa'i tha ma ni 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis don dam pa'i bden pa rtogs pas na lhag pa shes rab la tha mar dge bar zhes bya/_swar+thaM zhes bya ba su ni bzang po/_ar+tha ni don
[\[143b.2\]]te don ma log par bstan pas na don bzang po zhes bya/_su byany+dza na zhes bya ba su ni bzang po/_byany+dza na ni tshig 'bru ste/_tshangs par spyod pa bshad pa'i tshig 'bru go zhing brda phrad par sla ste/_brjod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir tshig 'bru bzang po zhes bya/_ke ba laM zhes bya ba a sA d+hA ra Na twAd
[\[143b.3\]]ke ba laM zhes bya ste/_mu stegs can la sogs pa phal dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ma 'dres pa zhes bya/_ba ri pUr+N+NaM zhes bya ba sarba kle sha pra ti bak+Sha twAd pa ri pUr+N+NaM zhes bya ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo man chad kyi nyon mongs pa ma lus par rdzogs par spong nus pas na yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya/_
[\[143b.4\]]ba ri shud+d+ha zhes bya ba swa b+hA ba bi muk+t+yA bi muk+ta twAta pa ri shud+d+ha zhes bya ste/_'phags pa'i lam zag pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol te gtsang bas na yongs su dag pa zhes bya/_paR+Ya ba dA taM zhes bya ba/_san+ta na bi muk+t+yA bi muk+ta twAta paR+Ya ba dA tan zhes bya ste/_zag pa zad pa rnams kyi
[\[143b.5\]]sems kyi rgyun la/_'phags pa'i lam 'byung ste/_gang zag so so'i sems kyi rgyud rnam par grol zhing byang bas na yongs su byang ba zhes bya/_swA khyA to b+ha ga ba to d+har+m+ma zhes bya ba/_a bi paR+Ya ti sa mA khyA na swA khyA ta zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas kyi chos phyin ci ma log par bstan pas na bcom
[\[143b.6\]]ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs pa zhes bya/_saM dr-iSh+Ti ka zhes bya ba dr-iSh+Ta ar+tha twAd saM dr-iSh+Ti ka zhes bya ste/_dad pa tsam gyis rtogs pa ma yin gyi/_yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma nor bar mthong bas na yang dag par mthong ba zhes bya/_nir+dz+war
[\[143b.7\]]zhes bya ba/_kle sha a nu sha ya bra ti b+hak+Sha twAd nir+dz+wa ra zhes bya ste/_nyon mongs pa bag la nyal gyi gnyen po yin pas nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rims nad bsal zhing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur bas na nad med pa zhes bya/_a kA li ka zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]tu na kA la ni ya mA b+hA bAd a kA li kA zhes bya ste/_skabs gang du yang sgom du rung ste/_dus nges pa med pa'i phyir dus chad pa med pa zhes bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na sarba kA la su kha tsa twA ra a kA li kA zhes bya ste/_spyod lam bzhi po'i dus kun tu bya bar sla
[\[144a.2\]]bas dus chad pa med pa zhes bya/_au pa na yi kA zhes bya ba a she Sha duHkha niR+YA Na u pa na ya nAd au pa na yi kA zhes bya ste/_sdug bsngal ma lus pa las 'byung ba nye bar spyod pa'i phyir nye bar gtod pa zhes bya/_ai hi ba sh+yi ka zhes bya ba a sA d+hA ra Na twAd ai ha ba sh+yi ka i ha pa sh+yeSh+Ta
[\[144a.3\]]b+ha ba zhes bya ste/_chos 'di mthong ba rnams la yod pas mu stegs can dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir 'di mthong ba la yod pa zhes bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_A tsAr+ya muSh+Ti ra hi ta twAd i ha pa sh+ya ti pra bA ra Na yo gAd ces bya ste/_slob dpon 'chab pa med pas 'di la
[\[144a.4\]]ltos shig ces skabs 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i phyir 'di ltos ldan zhes kyang bya ste/_tshig rnam pa gnyis su drang du rung gis kyang don sngon ma dang sbyar te bshad na bzang zhing tshig kyang bde ste/_'di mthong ba la yod pa zhes btags/_pra t+yAt+ma be da nI yo bidz+nya zhes bya ba a tarkya twAd pra t+yAt+ma be
[\[144a.5\]]da bi dz+nyai zhes bya ste/_rnam pa gcig tu na rtog ge'i yul ma yin te/_shes rab can rnams kyis rtogs par bya ba yin pa dang /_yang rnam pa gcig tu na a na b+hi la pya twAd prA t+yAt+ma be da nI ya zhes bya ste/_brjod du med pa'i phyir so sor rang gi rig par zad pas mkhas pa rnams kyis rig
[\[144a.6\]]par bya ba zhes bya/_swA khyA to b+ha ga ba to d+har+m+ma bi na ya su pra be di na ta zhes pa n+yA ya twAd a bi pa rI tar+tha twe na d+har+m+ma kle sha bi na ya zhes bya ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba gzhan phyi rol pa dang mi 'dra bar legs par bstan cing go bar byas te/_rigs pa dang
[\[144a.7\]]ldan pas na chos/_nyon mongs pa zhi zhing dul bar byed pas na 'dul ba ste tshig bsdus na bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa zhes bya/_naiR+YA Ni ka saM bo d+hi gA mI zhes bya ba/_saM bo d+hi gA mI twe na nair+yaNi ka zhes bya ba ste/_tshig 'di gnyis ni 'og mas
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]gong ma bshad pa yin te/_rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pas mya ngan las 'das par nges par 'byung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa zhes bya/_a b+hin+na sa stU ba zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la nyan thos rnams lta ba mi mthun pa med de/_
[\[144b.2\]]gcig tu 'dus pas na mi mthun pa med cing 'dus pa dang ldan pa zhes bya/_sa pra ti shar Na zhes bya ba sa ni bcas pa'am yod pa la bya/_pra ti sha ra Na ni skyabs sam dpung gnyen nam rten du rung ba la bya ste/_mu stegs can gyi chos lta bu khungs ngan par 'byin pa ma yin gyi/_de bzhin
[\[144b.3\]]gshegs pas gsungs pa yin pas na rten pa yod pa zhes bya/_tshin+d+ha p+lo ti ka zhes bya ba tshin+d+ha ni chad pa/_p+lo ti ka ni p+luM ga tau zhes bya ste/_'gro ba'am chus ded cing khyer ba lta bu'i tshig yin/_spyir na 'khor bar skye zhing 'pho ba'i rgyu rgyu ba bcad pa la bya ste rgyu ba bcad pa zhes bya/_'jig rten pa'i lha'i ming
[\[144b.4\]]la brah+ma zhes bya ba/_br-i had ku sha la mU la nirdzata tad brah+ma zhes bya ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po las skyes pas chen po par yang drang du rung /_yang rnam pa gcig tu na mu stegs can gyi gzhung las tshangs pa ni bden pa'o/_/tshangs pa ni dka' thub po/_tshangs pa ni dbang po thub pa'o zhes 'byung
[\[144b.5\]]byA ka ra Na las ni br-i ha NAd brah+ma zhes bya ste/_tshe dang byad gzugs dang gnas dang longs spyod la sogs pa 'og ma bas 'phel zhing khyad par du gyur pas 'phel ba'am rgyas pa zhes drang du yang rung /_yang rnam pa gcig tu na byA khyA yuk+ti las brah+ma b+hU ta shi ta b+hU ta zhes 'byung ste/_/
[\[144b.6\]]'dod khams kyi nyon mongs pa'i tsha ba dang bral nas bsam gtan dang po'i sar phyin pas nyon mongs pa 'og ma las thar zhing bsil bar gyur pa yin te/_rnam pa 'di snyed du drang du rung gis kyang don dang yang sbyar/_sngar grags pa yang btsan par byas nas tshangs pa zhes btags
[\[144b.7\]]biSh+Nu zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig tu na bi sh+lo byap+tau zhes bya ste khyab par yang 'dren/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na bi sha phra be sha zhes bya ste kun du 'jug pa la yang bya/_spyir na 'jig rten yod do cog kyang biSh+Nu'i rang bzhin yin te/_kun la khyab bar 'jug pas na khyab 'jug ces bya/_ma he shwar
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]zhes bya ba ma hA ni chen po I shwa ra ni I sha ai shwaR+Ya zhes bya ste/_spyir na dbang che zhing phyug btsan pa la bya/_dngos su na mu stegs can gyi lha gu lang yin te dbang phyug chen po zhes bya/_mA ra zhes bya ba mr-ing prA Na t+ya ge zhes bya ste/_dge ba'i chos kyi srog dang bral bar
[\[145a.2\]]byed pas na bdud ces bya/_shakra zhes bya ba/_shakl-i shak+tau shak+to de ba rA dzA rA ga pra t+yan zhes bya ste/_lha'i srid thub cing lha ma yin las rgyal bar nus pas na/_srid thub cing nus pa la yang bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na/_mchod sbyin rnam pa brgya byas pas lha'i rgyal po'i go 'phang thob
[\[145a.3\]]pas na brgya byin zhes kyang bya/_tshig 'di gnyis ka yang drang du rung mod kyi/_sngar ming du btags pa btsan par byas te brgya byin zhes btags/_in+d+ra zhes bya ba/_i di pa ra me shwar+ya zhes bya ba ste/_ri rab kyi steng na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal po mdzad pas na brgya byin gyi ming
[\[145a.4\]]gi rnam grangs te dbang po zhes bya/_lo ka pA la zhes bya ba lo ka ni lu dz+ya ti i ti lo ka zhes bya ste/_'jig rten pA la rak+Sha Na zhes bya ste/_'jig rten srung zhing skyong ba zhes bya/_bai shra ba Na zhes bya ba ni bi shra ba Na s+ya A pat+t+ya bai shra ma Na zhes bya ste/_rnam thos kyi bu zhes bya'o/_/d+h+r-i ta rASh+Ta
[\[145a.5\]]zhes bya ba ni/_d+h+r-i ta ni srung ba'am 'dzin pa/_rASh+Ta ni yul 'khor te yul 'khor srung zhes bya/_bi ru D+hA ka zhes bya ba bi ni bi she Sha Na ste/_bye brag tu gyur pa'am 'phags pa la bya/_ru D+ha ni ru ha dzan+ma ni zhes bya ste skyes pa la bya/_ka ni saM bi dz+nyA yA na ka na zhes bya ba/_ming gcig gi
[\[145a.6\]]mjug la byA ka ra Na'i gzhung gis kas gdags pa yod pas tshig gi rkyen du btags par zad de/_'phags skyes po zhes bya/_bi rU pAk+Shi zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig tu na bi rU pa zhes pa ni spyan gzhan dang mi 'dra ba gsum mnga' bas mi mthun pa la bya/_ak+Shi zhes bya ba ni mig la bya ste mig
[\[145a.7\]]mi 'dra ba'am/_rnam pa gcig tu na bi rU pa ni klu'i rgyal po yin pas na spyan la gdug pa mnga' ste gzigs so 'tshal la gnod par 'gyur bas mig mi bzang zhes bya//_//bam po gnyis pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]pa'i ming la/_pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang /_da sha pa ra mi tA zhes bya ba/_da sha ni bcu/_pa ra mi tA ni pa ra i ta pa ra mi tA zhes bya ste/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab dang /_thabs dang /_smon lam dang /_stobs dang /_ye shes
[\[145b.2\]]dang /_'di bcu la spyad cing bsgom pa'i mthar phyin te/_phyi na ma lus pas na pha rol tu phyin pa bcu zhes bya/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sogs pa'i ming la sap+ta triM shad+bo d+hi pak+Sha zhes bya ba bod+hi ra nu gu ru Na twAd+bo d+hi pak+Sha zhes bya ste/_bod+hi ni byang chub/_pak+Sha ni de'i rjes su mthun
[\[145b.3\]]pa'am phyogs su gyur pa la bya ste/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar du sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa 'di byang chub gsum po'i phyogs su gyur pas na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun zhes bya ba/_tsa twA ri smr-i t+yu pas+thA na zhes bya ba pra dz+nyA ya smr-i ti rU pa
[\[145b.4\]]tiSh+Tha te zhes bya ste/_smr-i ti dran pa/_u pa ni nye ba/_s+thA na ni gzhag pa la bya/_spyir na lus dang sems dang tshor ba dang chos bzhi'i rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyis brtags ti mthong ba rnams dran pas gsal bar 'dzin te/_dran pa shas che bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi zhes bya/_
[\[145b.5\]]tsa twA ri samyak+p+ra ha Na zhes bya ba/_tsa twA ri ni bzhi/_samyaka ni yang dag pa/_pra ha Na ni spong ba ste/_brtson 'grus kyis dge ba skyed cing sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams spong bas na yang dag par spong ba bzhi zhes bya/_tsa twA ri r-i d+hi pA da zhes bya ba r-i d+hi ni rdzu 'phrul pA da ni rkang pa ste 'dun pa dang sems
[\[145b.6\]]dang brtson 'grus dang dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin bzhi nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rten dang rgyur gyur pas na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi zhes bya/_pany+tsen+d+ri ya ni zhes bya ba pany+tsa ni lnga/_in+d+ri ya ni i di pa ra me shwaR+Ya zhes bya ba dbang che ba la bya bas dad pa dang /_brtson
[\[145b.7\]]'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang 'di lnga'i dbang gis sems las su rung ba'i rgyu da la thar pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skye bas na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skye ba la dbang ba'i phyir dbang po lnga zhes bya/_pany+tsa ba la zhes bya ba pany+tsa ni lnga/_ba la ni stobs te/_dad pa la
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]sogs pa lnga po 'di nyid rgyun ring du bsgoms pas/_ma dad pa dang /_le lo dang /_dran pa nyams pa dang /_g.yeng ba dang /_shes bzhin ma yin pa dang /_mi mthun pa'i phyogs lnga po 'dis bar chad bya mi nus pas na dad pa la sogs pa'i mthu skyes pa'i phyir stobs
[\[146a.2\]]lnga zhes bya/_sap+ta bo d+h+yaM ga zhes bya ba sap+ta ni bdun/_bo d+hi ni byang chub/_aM ga ni yan lag ste/_dran pa dang /_chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dga' ba dang /_shin tu sbyangs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_btang snyoms dang /_'di bdun mthong ba'i lam la de kho na nyid byang
[\[146a.3\]]chub pa'i rgyur gyur pas na/_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na bi b+hA Sha las 'byung ba ming du bgrangs pa'i grangs kyis rim pa bzhin bshad pa tsam du zad de/_byang chub gsum du 'grub pa'i nye ba'i rgyu de bdun yin pas sgom pa'i lam la byang chub kyi yan
[\[146a.4\]]lag ces bshad/_AR+YASh+TAM ga mAr+g+ga zhes bya ba AR+Ya ni 'phags pa/_aSh+TAM ga ni yan lag brgyad/_mAr+g+ga ni lam ste/_yang dag pa'i lta ba dang /_rtog pa dang /_ngag dang /_las kyi mtha' dang /_'tsho ba dang /_rtsol ba dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_'phags pa'i sgom pa'i
[\[146a.5\]]lam 'di brgyad ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya/_yang rnam pa gcig tu na bi b+hA Sha las 'byung ba 'phags pa'i 'bras bu dang de kho na nyid sngon ma mthong ba mthong bar bya ba'i lam yin pas na mthong ba'i lam du bshad/_tshad med pa bzhi
[\[146a.6\]]la tsa twAR+Ya pra mA Na zhes tshad med pa bzhi yin te/_sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa la byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyis khyab par sgom pas tshad med pa bzhi zhes bya/_bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs pa'i ming la d+h+yA na zhes bya ba d+h+yai tsit+ta yan zhes
[\[146a.7\]]bya ste/_sems pa la bya/_mi rtag pa'am stong pa la sogs pa lta bu gcig pa la bsam pa'i gtan pa bcas te bsgoms pas na bsam gtan zhes bya/_a nA gA mya zhes bya ba na s+ya A gA mya zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug pa'i sems kyis khams gsum gyi nyon
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]mongs pa thams cad spong mi nus pa med pas na mi lcogs pa med ba zhes bya/_d+h+yA nAn+ta ra zhes bya ba d+h+yA na ni bsam gtan/_an+ta ri bye brag gam khyad par te/_bsam gtan dang po rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa yin pa'i nang na/_bsam gtan khyad par can ni rtog pa ni med dpyod pa tsam du
[\[146b.2\]]zad de bye brag tu 'phags pas tshangs pa chen po'i go 'phang thob pa'i phyir bsam gtan khyad par can zhes bya/_sa man+ta ka zhes bya ba sa man+ta b+ha ba twAt+sa man+ta ka zhes bya ste/_sa man+ta na nye ba/_b+ha ba ni 'byung ba'am gnas pa lta bu la bya ste/_spyir na bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
[\[146b.3\]]'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag pa'i phyir sngar nas shom pa'i sems kyi ming ste nyer bsdogs zhes bya'o/_/mau la zhes bya ba/_mU le b+ha ba twAd+mau la zhes bya ste/_mU la rtsa ba'am/_gzhi'am dngos/_b+ha ba ni 'byung ba'am gnas pa ste don dang sbyar na/_bsam gtan dang snyoms par
[\[146b.4\]]'jug pa dngos la bya bas dngos gzhi zhes bya/_sa mA pat+ti zhes bya ba sems dang sems las byung ba'i tshogs dmigs pa gcig la 'du zhing gnyis mnyam par byed pa'i ming ste snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya/_sa mA d+hi zhes pa sa mA d+hi yan te a ne na zhes bya ste/_ting nge 'dzin gyi
[\[146b.5\]]mthus sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud dmigs pa gcig la sdud cing mi g.yo bar ting nge 'dzin 'jog pas na ting nge 'dzin zhes bya/_ni ro d+ha sa mA pat+ti zhes bya ba 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog cing lus rdo rje la sogs pa cis kyang mi shigs par 'byung ba chen po rnams
[\[146b.6\]]mthun par sgrub pa la yang bya/_zhi ba la gnas par 'jug pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes 'gog pa snyoms par 'jug pa la yang bya bas na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya/_a saM dz+nyA sa mA pat+ti zhes bya ba 'du shes med pa'i sems kyis snyoms par 'jug pa yin pas
[\[146b.7\]]na 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zhes kyang bya/_yang gcig tu na snyoms par 'jug pa de 'du shes med pas na 'du shes med pa'i snyoms pa'i 'jug pa zhes bya/_aSh+Tau bi mok+Sha zhes bya ba gzugs can gyis gzugs mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa mi sdug pa sgom pa la
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]sogs pas gzugs las skyo zhing chags pa las grol bar byed pas na rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya/_aSh+TA b+hi b+ha bA ya ta na zhes bya ba nang gzugs su 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs kha dog bzang po dang /_ngan pa la sogs pa mthong nas gzugs de dag
[\[147a.2\]]zil gyis mnan te shes par byed pas na zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad ces bya/_da sha kr-i t+s+nA ya ta na zhes bya ba phyogs bcu ma lus par sa la sogs par mos shing yid la byed pa'i bsam gtan gyi ming ste/_zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya/_na bA nu pUrba bi ha ra sa mA pat+ti
[\[147a.3\]]zhes bya ba/_bsam gtan bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang dgu la mthar gyis gnas shing 'jug pa'i ming ste/_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang gzungs dang mngon par
[\[147a.4\]]shes pa'i ming la/_tri Ni bi mok+Sha mu kha zhes bya ba rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yin te/_stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa gsum gyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing 'khor ba las thar pa'i sgo yin pas na rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum zhes bya/_d+hA ra Na zhes bya
[\[147a.5\]]ba gzungs yin te/_dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis chos kyi tshig dang don mi rjed par 'dzin pas na gzungs zhes bya/_Sha Da b+hi dz+nyA zhes bya ba mngon par shes pa drug yin te a b+hi ni a b+hi ta ste mngon pa/_dz+nyA ni shes pa la bya ste/_lha'i mig dang /_lha'i rna ba dang /_pha rol gyi
[\[147a.6\]]sems shes pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi bya ba shes pa dang /_zag pa zad pa shes pa dang drug mngon sum du mdzad pas na mngon par shes pa drug ces bya/_stong pa nyid bco brgyad la/_a d+h+yAt+ma shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba a d+h+yAt+ma ni nang /_shU n+ya tA ni
[\[147a.7\]]stong pa nyid yin te/_nang gi chos mig dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid rnams ther zug tu gnas pa'ang ma yin/_'jig par 'gyur ba'ang ma yin pa'i phyir don dam par na mig la sogs pa la dngos po med pas na nang stong pa nyid ces bya/_ba hir+d+hA shU n+ya tA zhes bya
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]ba phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba yin te/_phyi'i chos gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg dang /_chos rnams ther zug tu gnas pa'ang ma yin/_'jig par 'gyur ba yang ma yin pa'i phyir don dam par na gzugs la sogs pa la dngos po med pas na phyi stong pa nyid ces bya/_ad+h+yAt+ma
[\[147b.2\]]ba hir+d+hA shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba phyi nang stong pa nyid yin te/_phyi nang gi skye mched bcu gnyis don dam par na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis ka med de/_yul dang yul gyi tshul dang bral bas na phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya/_shUn+ya tA shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yin te/_chos thams cad
[\[147b.3\]]kyi stong pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid stong pa ste/_gzhan gyis stong par byar med pas na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya/_ma hA shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba chen po stong pa nyid yin te/_snod kyi 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bcur stong pas na chen po stong pa nyid ces bya/_pa ra mAr+tha shU n+ya tA
[\[147b.4\]]zhes bya ba don dam pa stong pa nyid yin te/_don dam pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bya/_don dam pa nyid la yang stong pa nyid ces bya/_saM skr-i ta shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya ba yin te/_'dus byas ni khams gsum du gtogs so cog la bya/_khams gsum du gtogs
[\[147b.5\]]pa yang sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/_skye ba dang gnas pa dang 'gag pa dang bral zhing stong pas na 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya/_a saM skr-i ta shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yin te/_'dus ma byas ni nam mkha' dang de bzhin nyid dang 'gog pa rnam pa gnyis rgyu dang rkyen gyis grub pa ma yin pa
[\[147b.6\]]'dus ma byas ni gzhi rang bzhin gyis stong bas na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya/_a t+yan+ta shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yin te/_rtag pa dang chad pa dang yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i mtha' dang bral bas na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya/_a na ba rA
[\[147b.7\]]grA shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yin te/_'khor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa la dbus kyang stong pas thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya/_a na ba kA ra shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba a ba ta ka ra Na ni dor ba ste dor ba med pas na a na ba ka ra zhes bya ste/_bum pa'i nang du chu
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]blugs pa las/_chu pho nas stong par gyur pa lta bu ma yin gyis/_chos thams cad ye nas rang bzhin gyis stong ste/_dor zhing bsal ba med pas na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya/_pra kr-i ti shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid de chos thams cad nyan thos
[\[148a.2\]]dang rang sangs rgyas dang de bzhin gshegs pas kyang ma mdzad de/_rang bzhin gyis 'dus byas kyang ma yin/_'dus ma byas kyang ma yin pas na rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces bya/_sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin te/_chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang
[\[148a.3\]]khams dang skye mched la sogs pa 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad la bya/_de thams cad stong pas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya/_swa lak+Sha Na shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yin te/_rang gi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung bas na gzugs myong
[\[148a.4\]]ba'i mtshan nyid pas na tshor ba/_mtshan mar 'dzin pas na 'du shes zhes bya ba la sogs pa chos so so rang gi mtshan nyid kyang brtag pa tsam du zad de yongs su grub pa med pas na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya/_a nu pa lam+b+ha shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yin te/_'das
[\[148a.5\]]pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi chos dus gsum du gtogs pa'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa la yang dngos po gud na med pas na mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya/_a b+hA ba shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yin te/_dngos po med pa las yang dngos por gzung du rung ba'i rang bzhin
[\[148a.6\]]med pas na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya/_swa b+hA ba shU n+ya tA zhes bya ba ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin te/_'du 'phrod las byung ba'i chos rnams rang dbang du mi skye ste/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba yin pas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya/_a b+hA ba swa b+hA ba shU n+ya tA zhes bya
[\[148a.7\]]ba/_dngos po med pa ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin te/_dngos po med par rtogs pa'i mthong ba dang shes pa ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya/_mthong ba dang shes pa 'di gnyis ka yang mthong bas kyang ma byas shes pas kyang ma byas te rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]nyid stong pa nyid ces bya/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong la sogs pa'i ming la/_sha ma s+tha zhes bya ba sha me bsti ti sha ma s+tha zhes bya ste/_sha ma ni zhi ba dang /_s+tha ni gnas pa ste/_gzugs la sogs pa yul gyis sems g.yeng bzhi bar byas nas bsam gtan gang sgom pa de la sems rtse
[\[148b.2\]]gcig tu khugs pa'i ming yin pas na zhig nas zhes bya/_bi pa sh+ya na zhes bya ba bi ni bi she Sha ste/_khyad par ram lhag pa/_pa sh+ya na ni mthong ba'am lta ba la bya/_spyir na shes rab kyis dngos po'i rang bzhin lhag par rtogs pa'i rang bzhin te lhag mthong zhes bya/_yo ga zhes bya ba
[\[148b.3\]]yu dzir yo ga zhes bya ste/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa'i bsam gtan gyi ming ste rnal 'byor zhes bya/_yo ni sha ma na skA ra zhes bya ba yo ni u pA yA ste thabs sam rgyud la bya/_sha ni sha na sa ti zhes bya ste/_thabs dang tshul de nyid la spyod cing ston pa la bya ste/_spyir na mi
[\[148b.4\]]sdug pa sgom pas 'dod chags gzhil ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sgom pas gti mug spangs pa la sogs pa ste/_thabs tshul bzhin du sgom pa'i ming yin pas na tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya/_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rnam pa bcu drug du phye ba la sogs
[\[148b.5\]]pa'i ming la/_tsa tu rA r+ya sat+ya zhes bya ba tsa tur ni bzhi/_Ar+ya ni 'phags pa/_sat+ya ni bden pa ste sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam bzhi ji ltar 'phags pa rnams kyis bden par gzigs pa de bzhin du/_so so'i skye bo phyin ci log dang bcas pas bden par mi mthong bas
[\[148b.6\]]na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi zhes bya/_duHkha sat+ya zhes pa sdug bsngal gyi bden pa ste/_zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed la yid du 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur/_yid du mi 'ong ba rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
[\[148b.7\]]la/_de las ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/_phung po lnga sdug bsngal gsum dang ldan pas na sdug bsngal gyi bden pa zhes bya/_sa mu da ya zhes bya ba sa mu da ya t+ya smAd kar+m+ma kle sha lak+Sha NAd ces 'byung bas na las dang nyon mongs
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]pa'i mtshan nyid de dag las sdug bsngal 'byung ba la bya ste/_de las nyon mongs pa ni srid pa gsum du slar skye zhing 'byung bar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa la bya/_las ni mi dge ba dang dge ba zag pa dang bcas pa la bya ste/_kun 'byung ba zhes bya ste/_ni ro d+ha
[\[149a.2\]]zhes bya ba ni ro d+h+yan+te asmin sarba kle sha i ti zhes 'byung bas 'gog pa thob pas nyon mongs pa thams cad 'gag pa'i phyir 'gog pa zhes bya/_mAr+g+ga zhes bya ba mAr+g+ga yan+ti a ne na ni ro d+ha mi ti zhes 'byung ste/_lam des 'gog pa tshol ba'am mtshon pa'am dmigs pa'am 'thob par 'gyur
[\[149a.3\]]ba la bya ste lam zhes bya/_a ni t+ya zhes bya ba pra t+ye yan+d+hi na twA da a ni t+ya zhes 'byung ste/_rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir mi rtag pa ste/_rkyen tshogs na ni 'byung la rkyen dang bral na ni 'gag ste rang dbang med pas na mi rtag pa zhes bya/_duHkha zhes bya ba don du na pi DAr+tha ka twAd ces 'byung ste/_gnod pa'i
[\[149a.4\]]phyir sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ste/_shU n+ya zhes bya ba/_At+mi ya dr-iSh+Ti bi pak+Sha zhes 'byung ste/_bdag gir lta ba'i gnyen po yin te/_bdag gi med cing stong pas na stong pa zhes bya/_a nAt+ma zhes bya ba At+ma zhes bya ba At+ma dr-iSh+Ti bi bak+She a nAt+ma zhes 'byung ste/_bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po yin te/_
[\[149a.5\]]mu stegs can gyis brtags pa'i bdag dang sems can la sogs pa med pas bdag med pa zhes bya/_he tu zhes bya ba he tu bI dza d+har+m+ma yo ge na zhes 'byung bas sa bon gyi chos kyi tshul gyis phung po lnga'i rgyur gyur pas na rgyu zhes bya/_sa mu da ya zhes bya ba pra durba yo ge na zhes 'byung bas 'byung
[\[149a.6\]]ba'i tshul gyis kun 'byung ba zhes bya/_pra b+ha ba zhes bya ba saM ban+d+ha yo ge na zhes 'byung ste/_'brel pa'i tshul gyis rgyu yin no zhes 'byung bas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'brel par skye ba'i phyir rab tu skye ba zhes bya/_pra t+ya ya zhes bya ba a b+hi ni shA d+ha ni t+yar+the na pra t+ya ya zhes 'byung bas mngon par grub par
[\[149a.7\]]byed pa'i don gyis rkyen zhes bya ste/_dper na 'ji ba dang dbyu gu dang 'khor lo dang srad bu dang chu rnams tshogs pa las bum par 'grub par 'gyur ba dang 'dra bas na rkyen zhes bya/_ni ro d+ha zhes bya ba ni ro d+ha skan+d+ha pa ra ma ni ro d+ha zhes 'byung ste/_phung po 'jig cing med par 'gyur bas na 'gog
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]pa zhes bya/_shAn+ta zhes bya ba t+r+yag+ni nir+b+bA nAd shAn+ta zhes 'byung ste/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi me rnam pa gsum med par byas pas na zhe ba zhes bya/_pra Ni ta zhes bya ba ni rU ba dra bAd twAn zhes 'byung bas gnod pa med pa'i gya nom pa zhes bya/_ni s+sa ra Na zhes bya ba sarba a bak+Sha la bi yuk+ta twAd nis+sa
[\[149b.2\]]ra Na zhes 'byung bas skyon thams cad dang bral te skyon rnams las byung ba'am/_bral bas na nges par 'byung ba zhes bya/_mAr+g+ga zhes bya ba ga ma nA r+then mAr+g+ga zhes 'byung bas 'gro ba'i don la bya ste/_'phags pa'i lam du zhugs nas mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i don gyis lam zhes bya/_n+yA ya zhes
[\[149b.3\]]bya ba yo ge yuk+ta twAd n+yA ya zhes 'byung bas rigs pa dang ldan par bshad pas lam de 'khrul pa med cing tshad mar gyur pas na rigs pa zhes bya/_pra ti pat+ta zhes pa samyak+b+ra ti pa da nAr+the na pra ti pat+ta zhes 'byung ste/_yang dag par thob par byed don gyis sgrub pa zhes bya/_niR+YA Ni ka zhes bya ba at+yan+ta
[\[149b.4\]]sa ma ti kra mA da niR+YA Ni ka zhes 'byung ste/_shin tu yang dag par byung bas slar 'khor bar mi skye ba'i phyir nges par 'byin pa zhes bya/_a nan+ta R+Ya mAr+g+ga zhes bya ba/_a nan+ta R+Ya ni kle shai ran+ta ri du na shAkya twAd ces bya ste/_nyon mongs pas bar chad mi nus pas na bar chad med pa zhes bya/_mAr+g+ga ni lam ste spyir
[\[149b.5\]]na sgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i tshe bzod pa nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pas na nyon mongs pa chom rkun dang 'dra ba sgor phyung zhing spangs pa la bya bas na bar chad med pa'i lam zhes btags/_bi muk+ta mAr+g+ga zhes bya ba bi muk+ta ni rnam par grol ba/_mAr+g+ga ni lam ste sgom pa'i lam la nyon mongs pa dang bral
[\[149b.6\]]ba'i shes pas rkun po slar mi 'ong bar sgo bcad pa lta bu yin te/_rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya/_a b+hi sa ma yAn+ti ka ku sha la mU la zhes bya ba mthong ba'i lam thob ste/_de kho na nyid rtogs pa'i rjes la 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mang po 'phel zhing 'byung ba'i ming ste/_mngon par rtogs pa'i mjug la
[\[149b.7\]]'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya/_k+Sha ya dz+nyA na bi ka ku sha la mU la zhes bya ba/_dgra bcom pa'i zad pa shes ba skyes pa'i 'phral la 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mang po skyes pa'i ming ste/_zad pa shes pas thob pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya/_sems kyi skad cig bcu drug la duHkhe d+har+m+ma dz+nyA na k+ShAn+ti zhes bya ba duHkhe ni
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]sdug bsngal/_d+har+m+ma ni chos/_dz+nyA na ni shes pa/_k+ShAn+ti ni bzod pa ste/_sdug bsngal la chos de kho na nyid rtogs par bya bar bzod pas na shes rab kyi ming ste/_sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya/_duHkhed+har+m+ma dz+nyA na zhes bya ba chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i
[\[150a.2\]]rjes la sdug bsngal gyi chos de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur bas na sdug bsngal la chos shes pa zhes bya/_duHkhe n+wa ya k+ShAn+ti zhes bya ba duHkhe bi sha ye a nu pash+tsad a ya a ba ga ma zhes 'byung ste/_ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal la chos shes par bzod pa de bzhin du gzugs dang
[\[150a.3\]]gzugs med pa'i khams kyi chos shes pa la bzod pas na sdug bsngal la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa zhes bya ste/_chos shes pa ni 'dod pa'i khams la dmigs te/_sa la lta ba dang 'dra la/_rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gnyen po ste/_gnam
[\[150a.4\]]la yar lta ba dang 'dra bas chos shes pa dang rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gnyis gcig gi yul gcig gis mi mthong /_kun 'byung ba man chad lhag ma gsum yang 'di bzhin bshad/_mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa la sogs pa dbang po gsum la/_a nA dz+nyA ta mA dz+nyA tA s+ya min+d+ri yan zhes bya ba mi
[\[150a.5\]]shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po yin te/_mthong ba'i lam gyi yid dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba dang /_btang snyoms dang /_dad pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po rnams sngon 'phags pa'i bden pa ma mthong ba mthong bar byed pa kun shes pa'i dbang po mthong ba la dbang
[\[150a.6\]]byed pas na mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po zhes bya/_A dz+nyA+e n+d+ri yan zhes bya ba kun shes pa'i dbang po yin te/_sgom pa'i lam la kun shes par bya ba'i yul gzhan med kyi/_bag la nyal lhag ma spang ba'i phyir sgom pa'i lam gyi yid la sogs pa'i dbang
