[\[150a.7\]]po dgus 'phags pa'i lam gyi bden pa de nyid kun shes pa yin te/_kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po thob pa la dbang byed pas na kun shes pa'i dbang po zhes bya/_A dz+nyA tI yin+d+ri yan zhes bya ba kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po yin te/_mi slob pa'i lam la dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]shes par bya ba thams cad shes te/_shes pa de dang ldan pas gang gi sems kyi rgyud la yod pa'i yid la sogs pa'i dbang po dgu tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa dang mya ngan 'das pa thob par byed pas na kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po zhes bya/_lam bzhi la/_duHkha pra ti pad+d+h+ya na
[\[150b.2\]]d+h+yA b+hi dz+nyA zhes bya ba bsam gtan bzhi'i sa la ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lta bu lhag mthong med la zhi gnas kyi shas che ba dang /_mi lcogs pa med pa bsam gtan dang po la 'jug pa'i sems lta bu lhag mthong gi shas che la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ya char
[\[150b.3\]]gyur pas nyon mongs pa spang dka' la gang zag dbang po rtul po'i shes pa'i ming ste/_mngon par shes pa bul la dka' ba'i lam zhes bya/_duHkha pra ti pa tak+Shi prA b+hi dz+nyA zhes bya ba bsam gtan bzhi las ma gtogs pa gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa lta bu lhag mthong med la zhi
[\[150b.4\]]gnas kyi shas che ba dang /_mi lcogs pa med pa bsam gtan dang po la 'jug pa'i sems lta bu lhag mthong gi shas che ba la zhi gnas chung ste/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong ya char gyur pas nyon mongs pa spang dka' la/_gang zag dbang po rnon po'i shes pa'i ming ste/_mngon par shes
[\[150b.5\]]pa myur la dka' ba'i lam zhes bya/_su khA pra ti pad+d+h+ya na d+h+yA b+hi dz+nyA zhes bya ba bsam gtan bzhi'i sa la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa spang zhing bsal sla la/_gang zag dbang po rtul po'i shes pa'i ming ste/_mngon par shes pa bul la sla ba'i lam zhes
[\[150b.6\]]bya/_su kha pra ti pa ta k+Shi prA b+hi dz+nyA zhes pa bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa la zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa bsgoms pas nyon mongs pa spang zhing bsal sla la/_gang zag dbang po rnon po'i shes pa'i ming ste/_mngon par shes pa myur la sla ba'i lam zhes bya/_kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i
[\[150b.7\]]bden pa la saM br-i ti sa t+ya zhes bya ba saM br-i ya te a na ya twat+ta zhes bya ste/_rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa'i shes pas dngos po'i de kho na nyid mthong bar bya ba la sgrib pas na yang dag sgrib ces bya/_yang gcig tu na/_lo ka saM br-i t+yA sat+ya zhes bya ste/_chos thams cad rang bzhin med cing stong
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]pa las 'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi dngos po skye zhing 'byung bar mthong ba la sogs pa'ang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad dang grags pa tsam du bden pa ste/_kun gyis shes shing rdzob pa la bya bar dbu ma'i gtsug lag las bshad/_blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa la sogs pa'i nang
[\[151a.2\]]nas ji snyed du yi ge dang tshig 'brus bstan pa thams cad ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o zhes 'byung ste/_mdo sde dang dbu ma'i gzhung btsan par bya ste/_kun rdzob kyi bden par btags/_pa ra mAr+tha zhes bya ba par ma ni mchog gam dam pa/_ar+tha ni don nam dgos pa ste/_gcig tu don sgrub cing
[\[151a.3\]]dgos pa bya ba'i mchog tu sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar bya ba mya ngan las 'das pa la yang bya/_yang gcig tu na/_'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes mchog gi dmigs pa'i spyod yul lam don du gyur pa yin la/_sat+ya ni bden pa ste/_'phags pa phyin ci log med par gzigs
[\[151a.4\]]pa rnams la mya ngan las 'das pa dang skye ba med par yang dag par bden pas na don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya/_lung du bstan pa'i rnam grangs kyi ming la/_e kAM sha byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba sems can thams cad 'chi'am mi 'chi zhes 'dri na/_gcig tu chad par thams cad 'chi'o zhes bya ba
[\[151a.5\]]yin te/_mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa zhes bya/_bi b+ha dza byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba sems can thams cad skye'am zhes 'dri na/_nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa ni skye la/_nyon mongs pa med pa ni mi skye'o zhes so sor phye ste bstan par bya ba'i ming ste rnam par phye ste lung bstan pa zhes bya/_pa ri br-its+tsha byA ka ra
[\[151a.6\]]Na zhes bya ba mi 'di bzang ngam ngan zhes 'dri na/_gang dang gang sgrun zhes slar dri ste/_lha dang sgrun zhes zer na ni ngan zhes bya/_sems can dmyal ba dang sgrun zhes zer na ni bzang zhes bya ba lta bu/_slar dris nas lan blan pa'i ming ste dris nas lung bstan pa zhes bya/_s+thI t+ya byA ka ra Na zhes bya ba
[\[151a.7\]]sems can dang phung po gnyis gcig gam tha dad ces 'dri na/_sems nyid dngos por med pas mo gsham gyi bu dkar ram sngo zhes brjod du med pa dang 'dra ste/_lung mi bstan pas na gzhag pa'i lung bstan pa zhes bya/_mtshan nyid gsum la pa ri kalpi ta lak+Sha Na zhes bya ba kun brtags pa'i
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]mtshan nyid yin te/_pa ri sa maM tAd ces bya ba yongs su'am kun tu/_kalpi ta ni med pa'am sgro btags pa lta bu la bya/_spyir na gzung ba dang 'dzin par bcas pa'i chos nan gyis brtags pa la bya ste/_kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya/_pa ra tan+t+ra lak+Sha Na zhes bya ba gzhan gyi dbang gi
[\[151b.2\]]mtshan nyid yin te/_pa ra ni gzhan/_tan+t+ra ni tan+t+ra ste dzan+m+ya te zhes bya ste/_gzhan gyi rkyen la rag las shing rang mi 'byung bas rten cing 'brel pa 'byung ba'i ming ste/_gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid ces bya/_pa ri niSh+pan+na lak+Sha Na zhes bya ba yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin te/_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang
[\[151b.3\]]dag pa'i ye shes gnyis mi 'gyur ba dang /_phyin ci ma log pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rdzogs shing grub pas na yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya/_dgongs pa bzhi la/_tsa twA ro a b+hi prA ya zhes pa dgongs pa bzhi yin te chos kyi sku dang /_tshogs la sogs pa mnyam pa la dgongs
[\[151b.4\]]te/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyang nga nyid yin zhes bka' stsal pa lta bu mnyam pa nyid la dgongs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos pa tsam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba lta bu dus gzhan la dgongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[151b.5\]]gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas na/_gdod theg pa chen po'i don khong du chud do zhes bya ba lta bu don gzhan la dgongs pa dang /_gang zag gcig la sngar sbyin pa la sogs pa'i legs pa brjod la phyis smad pa lta bu gang zag gi bsam pa la dgongs pa'i ming yin te dgongs pa bzhi zhes bya/_
[\[151b.6\]]ldem por dgongs pa bzhi la/_tsa twA yA b+hi san+d+hi zhes bya ba ldem por dgongs pa bzhi yin te/_sems can chos la drangs pa'i phyir theg pa chung ngu las bdag dang gang zag la sogs pa yod par bshad pa lta bu gzhug pa la ldem por dgongs pa dang /_kun brtags pa dngos po med par bshad pa
[\[151b.7\]]dang /_gzhan gyi dbang rten cing 'brel par bshad pa dang /_yongs su grub pa mi 'gyur ba dang phyin ci log par bshad pa lta bu mtshan nyid la ldem por dgongs pa dang /_sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong gi gnyen por chos sna tshogs bshad pa lta bu gnyen po la ldem por dgongs pa dang /_
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]nyon mongs pas gnas na byang chub kyi mchog thob po zhes 'byung ba lta bu byang chub kyi spyad pa dka' ba la dgongs te nyon mongs pa zhes gsungs pa la sogs pa bsgyur ba la ldem por dgongs pa dang 'di bzhi ldem bu bzhin du tshig thel gyis mi gdab par bsgyur te
[\[152a.2\]]bstan pa yin pas ldem por dgongs pa bzhi zhes bya/_a b+hi prA ya dang ma 'dom na a b+hi san+d+hi yang dgongs par gdags/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched la rU pa skan+d+ha ni rU pa N+yAd rU paM zhes bya ste/_lag pa dang dbyig pa la sogs pas gzugs shing gnod par byar rung bas
[\[152a.3\]]na gzugs zhes bya/_skan+d+ha ni dus gsum gyi gzugs bzang ngan dang che phra yod do cog gcig tu bsdus pa'i ming ste gzugs kyi phung po zhes bya/_be da nA skan+d+ha zhes bya ba ni a nu b+ha ba lak+Sha Na be da na Na ka mi ka zhes bya ba ste/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i tshor ba rnam pa
[\[152a.4\]]gsum myong bar ma lus par gcig tu bsdus pa'i ming ste tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya/_saM dz+nyA skan+d+ha ni ni mit+ta dz+nyA gra zhes bya ste/_gzugs la sogs pa dag la 'di ni dkar po'o/_/'di ni sngon po'o/_/'di ni bzang ngo /_/'di ni ngan no zhes mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dmigs yul dang /_de
[\[152a.5\]]ma thag pa'i rkyen la sogs pa'i 'du ba las shes pa 'byung zhing 'di yin no snyam du mtshan mar 'dzin pa la bya bas na snyam shes zhes su yang drang du rung gis kyang ming sngar btags pa bzhin du 'du shes su btags/_saM skA ra skan+d+ha ni a b+hi si skA ra lak+Sha Na zhes bya ste/_sems pa la
[\[152a.6\]]sogs pa'i las kyis 'phangs nas 'du byed phyi ma 'byung zhing mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas na 'du byed kyi phung po zhes bya/_bi dz+nyA na skan+d+ha ni bi dz+nyA na zhes bya ba ste/_yul tha dad pa rnam pa sna tshogs shes pa mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa brgyad bsdus pa'i ming yin pas
[\[152a.7\]]na rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya/_bi dz+nyAp+ta zhes bya ba lus dang ngag gi spyod pa'i tshul gyis dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa snying la ci sems pa gzhan la go bar byed pas na rnam par rig byed ces bya/_a bi dz+nyA pa ti zhes bya ba sdom pa dang /_sdom pa ma yin pa dang /_sdom pa
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]yang ma yin/_sdom pa ma yin pa yang ma yin pa dang /_'di rnams rnam par rig byed bzhin du gzhan gyis shes shing rtogs par mi rung bas na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya/_tsit+ta saM pra yuk+ta zhes bya ba/_sems dang sems las byung ba 'dus pa gcig tu gtogs pa mig la sogs
[\[152b.2\]]pa'i dbang po'i rten mtshungs pa dang /_gzugs la sogs pa'i dmigs pa mtshungs pa dang /_yul la shes shing 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa mtshungs pa dang /_sems dang snga phyi mnyam du 'byung ste dus mtshungs pa rnams dang /_sems dang sems las byung ba'i dngos po mang nyung
[\[152b.3\]]mnyam par 'byung ste rdzas mtshungs pa dang /_mtshungs pa 'di lngas sems dang mnyam par ldan pa'i phyir ming ste sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa zhes bya/_dauSh+Thu l+ya zhes bya ba du ni smad pa'am ngan pa/_Sh+ThA na ga ti ni br-i tau zhes bya ste gnas pa la bya/_la ni A da na ste len ba'am 'dzin pa'o/_/
[\[152b.4\]]gcig tu na duSh+Tu ni nyes pa'am skyon gyi ming la ni gong du bshad pa dang 'dra ste/_spyir na ltung ba dang sgrib pa'i ming ste gnas ngan len du btags/_a nu sha ya zhes bya ba chos mngon pa'i gzhung dang sbyar na 'phags pa'i ye shes ma thob kyi bar du sems can gyi sems kyi rgyud la khyab par gnas
[\[152b.5\]]kyang brtag dka' ste phra ba dang /_dmigs pa dang mtshungs par ldan pas nyon mongs pa 'phel zhing rgyas par byed pa dang /_rgya mtsho'i bya gnam la 'phur ba'i grib ma la chu srin snyeg pa'i ming ste phra rgyas zhes bya/_mdo sde pa ltar na nyon mongs pa mngon du ma byung ste/_bag chags kyi tshul
[\[152b.6\]]du nyal ba ni a nu sha ya ste bag la nyal zhes bya/_nyon mongs pa mngon du byung ste langs pa'i ming ni pa ri byut+thA na zhes bya ste/_kun nas langs pa zhes 'byung bas chos mngon pa'i skabs su ni phra rgyas zhes gdags/_mdo sde ba'i skabs su bag la nyal zhes gdags/_A ya ta zhes bya ba/_
[\[152b.7\]]A ya na twaM nAn+tI ti A yan twaM zhes bya ste/_mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i skye mched kyi sgo nas rnam par shes pa skye zhing 'phel bas na skye mched ces bya/_d+hA tu zhes bya ba d+hA twar+tha zhes bya ba ste khams dang rigs sam 'byung khungs kun la yang bya mod kyi sngon grags pa bzhin du khams zhes
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]btags/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la pra ti t+ya sa mut+pa da zhes bya ba pra ti ta ni rten pa'am rkyen du gyur pa la bya/_saM ni saM ban+d+ha sta 'brel pa la bya/_ut+pa t+ta ni skye ba'i tshig ste phyi nang gi chos rnams rang dbang du mi skye'o/_rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las skya ste snga ma snga ma'i rgyu la brten
[\[153a.2\]]nas phyi ma phyi ma gzhan gyis bar ma chod par 'byung bas na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya/_dge ba bcu dang mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la/_dashA ku sha la kar+m+ma pa tha zhes bya ba mi dge ba bcu la bya ste/_las ni sems pa yin la sems pa yang brnab sems dang gnod sems dang log
[\[153a.3\]]par lta ba gsum gyi dbang du 'gro zhing mngon par 'du byed pas na las kyi lam 'di gsum la bya/_srog gcod pa la sogs pa lus dang ngag gi las rnam pa bdun ni las nyid kyang yin la/_las 'di rnams slong zhing skyed pa'i gzhi sems pa yin yang /_'di dag la rten cing 'jug pas na mi
[\[153a.4\]]dge ba bcu'i lam zhes bya/_dge ba bcu yang 'di las bzlog pa yin pas na brnab sems med pa dang /_srog gcod pa spangs pa la sogs pa dang sbyar te bshad/_bsod nams bya ba'i yon tan la/_puN+ya zhes bya ba puN+ya kar+m+ma ni shu b+ha zhes 'byung ste/_dge ba'i las la bya/_yang rnam pa
[\[153a.5\]]gcig tu na puN ti pa bi tr-i ka ro ti zhes bya ste/_sdig pa sbyong zhing gtsang mar byed pa la yang bya/_dngos su na gzhan la phan zhing bsod pas gsos shing bsnams pa'i ming ste bsod nams su btags/_dA na ma ya puN+ya kri ya bstu zhes bya ba dA na ni nor rdzas la sogs pa sbyin pa la/_
[\[153a.6\]]ma ya ni rang bzhin nam de'i rgyu las byung ba lta bu la bya/_pu N+ya ma ya kri ya bstu ni bsod nams bya ba'i dngos gzhi yin pa'am/_dngos po ste sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya/_shI la ma ya puN+ya kri ya bstu zhes bya ba shIl ni tshul khrims te bslab pa lnga la sogs
[\[153a.7\]]pa srung ba la bya/_tshig gi mjug gzhan ni sbyin pa'i skabs nas 'byung ba dang 'dra bar bshad de/_tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya/_b+hA ba na ma ya puN+ya kri ya bstu zhes bya ba b+hA ba na ni sgom pa ste/_byams pa la sogs pa'i tshad med pa dang bsam gtan
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]sgom pa la bya/_tshig gi mjug gzhan ni bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gong ma gnyis dang 'dra ste bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya/_gu N+ya zhes bya ba gu N+yan+te A b+ha s+yan+te shre yor+thi bi zhes bya ste/_legs pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sgom zhing sbyangs pa la bya/_
[\[153b.2\]]dngos su na stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa yon tan gyi ming ste don btsan par byas nas yon tan du btags/_dge sbyong dang bram ze dang mu stegs can gyi ming la shra ma Na zhes bya ba shra ma tsA ri shra ma Na zhes bya ste/_sdig pa zhi bar byed pa spyod cing legs pa la sbyong bas na dge sbyong zhes bya/_
[\[153b.3\]]dngos su na 'phags pa rab tu byung ba rnams la bya/_de'i rjes su rab tu byung ba gzhan la yang bya/_b+hik+Shu zhes bya ba dge slong pha yin te/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i don slong zhing tshol ba dang gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs la chos dang mthun par bsod snyoms len pas 'tsho bas
[\[153b.4\]]na dge slong zhes bya/_u pA sika zhes bya ba ni bslab pa lnga la sogs pa mnos te/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu dang nye bar gnas pas dge bsnyen zhes bya/_upa bA sa s+tha ni zhes bya ba u pa bA sa ni khrims brgyad mnos te 'phags pa dang nye bar gnas pa'am bsnyen pa la bya/_s+thA ni tiSh+Tha na ti
[\[153b.5\]]ste gnas pa la bya bas na bsnyen gnas la gnas pa zhes bya/_u pa saM pan+na zhes bya ba/_u pa ni nye ba/_saM ban+na ni rdzogs pa'am phun sum tshogs pa lta bu'i ming ste/_mya ngan las 'das pa dang nye bar gsol ba dang /_bzhi'i las kyis dge slong gi khrims gtsang mar mnos pas na bsnyen par rdzogs
[\[153b.6\]]pa zhes bya/_u pA d+h+yA ya zhes bya ba u pe t+yad+hI yata a smAd ces bya ste/_dang po su las khrims nod pa de'i drung du ched du song nas yas brjod pa bzhin du gdon zhing bzlas par byas pas na lung 'bog pa la bya ste/_sngon chad grags pa dang don gnyi ga sbyar nas mkhan po zhes btags/_A tsAR+Ya zhes bya
[\[153b.7\]]ba A tsAR+Ya ste asmin zhes bya ste/_gang las chos dang cho ga la sogs pa nyan zhing slob pa de la bya bas na slob dpon zhes bya/_brA h+ma zhes bya ba bskal pa dang po'i tshe mi kha cig khyim na mi gnas shing dgon pa na chos spyod pa grong nas phyi rol tu yid dga' ba las phyi rol pa zhes chos mngon pa las bshad
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]bram ze'i gzhung las brA h+ma No A pa t+yan zhes bya ba 'byung ste/_tshangs pa'i bu zhes bya bar 'gyur mod kyi sngon chad grags pa btsan par byas te bram ze so na gzhag_/tIr+tha ka ni tir+th+yaM bid+ya te tIr+tha ka zhes bya ste/_mtsho'i 'gram nas mtshor 'jug pa'i stegs 'cha' ba dang 'dra bar dka' thub
[\[154a.2\]]dang rnal 'byor la sogs pa chos sna tshogs spyod cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshor 'jug pa'i stegs 'cha' bas na mu stegs can zhes bya/_sngags kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i ming la/_tan+t+ra zhes bya ba tan+t+ra pra ban+d+hA khyA zhes 'byung ste/_sngags kyi rgyud zhi ba dang rgyas pa la sogs pa rgyun chags par
[\[154a.3\]]bshad pa'i ming ste sngags kyi rgyud ces bya/_man+t+ra zhes bya ba man+t+re gup+ti b+hA Sha Ne zhes 'byung ste/_sngags kyi lha la sogs pa dgug cing gsang ste brjod pa yin pas na gsang sngags zhes bya/_bid+yA zhes bya ba bid dz+nyA na zhes bya ste/_ma rig pa'i gnyen por gyur pa lha mo'i gzugs su bzhugs pa'i ming
[\[154a.4\]]ste rig sngags zhes bya/_d+hA ra Ni zhes bya ba ar+tha gran+tha d+hA ra ya ti d+hA ra NI zhes bya ste/_sngags kyi chos kyi don dang tshig mi brjed par 'dzin cing khyad par gyi rim pa thob par 'gyur ba'i ming ste/_gzungs sngags zhes bya/_maN+Da la zhes bya ste/_maN+Da ni sA ra ste snying po'am dbyings sam dkyil la bya/_la ni A
[\[154a.5\]]da na ste len pa'am 'dzin pa lta bu la 'ang bya/_khor khor yug zlum po'i ming yang maN+Da la zhes bya bas na dkyil 'khor du sngan chad grags pa bzhin so na gzhag_/shAn+ti ka zhes bya ba gnod pa dang nad la sogs bzhi bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/bauSh+Ti ka zhes bya ba tshe dang sring dang
[\[154a.6\]]longs spyod la sogs pa rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming yin pas na rgyas pa zhes bya/_ba shiM ka ra Na zhes bya ba pha rol gyi sems sgyur zhing bdag ci dga' bar bya ba'i sngags kyi ming ste dbang du bya ba zhes bya/_a b+hi tsa ra zhes bya ba gzhan la gnod cing phung bar byed pa'i sngags kyi ming ste
[\[154a.7\]]drag shul spyod pa zhes bya/_kalba zhes byab sngags kyi gzhung sngar bshad pa las phyis cho ga rgyas par bshad pa'i ming ste cho ga zhib mo zhes bya/_u pa tsar zhes bya ba mchod pa'i yo byad kyi skabs su ni yo byad ces gdags/_cho ga dang sgrub pa'i skabs su ni bya ba'i cho ga zhes gdags/_ho ma zhes
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]bya ba hu dA ni zhes bya ste sbyin zhing mchod pa la yang bya/_ag+ni ho traM dzu hu yad ces kyang 'byung ste/_lha'o cog la mchod sbyin bya ba'i sgo dang kha me yin pas na mer sreg pa'i ming du yang 'dren te sbyin sreg ces bya/_sid+d+hi zhes bya ba sngags kyi byang chub kyis man chad 'grub pa dang /_rig sngags 'chang
[\[154b.2\]]nas nam mkha' la 'gro zhing tshe bskal par thub pa la sogs pa ci sgrub pa nyid grub pa'i ming ste dngos grub ces bya/_dzam+b+ha na zhes bya ba sngags kyis sems rmongs par byed pa'i ming ste rmugs byed ces bya/_stam+b+ha na zhes bya ba sngags kyis lus khengs shing las byed mi nus pa'i ming ste rengs byed ces
[\[154b.3\]]bya/_mo ha na zhes bya ba sngags kyis sems blun zhing mi dran par 'gyur ba'i ming ste rmongs byed ces bya/_o ha na zhes bya ba sngags kyis sems khral khrul khyer bar byed pa'i ming ste 'khrul byed ces bya/_'dul ba las 'byung ba'i skad kyi ming la/_shik+Sha pa da zhes bya ba shik+Sha ni bi d+yo bA dA na zhes bya
[\[154b.4\]]ste rig pa'am shes pa len zhing slob pa la bya/_ba da ni rten nam gzhi'i ming ste tshul khrims la brten nas nyon mongs pa zad par slob cing sbyor bas na bslab pa'i gzhi zhes bya/_shI la zhes bya ba shI las mA d+hau zhes 'byung ste/_legs par spyod pa la zhugs shing tshul khrims dam por bsrungs bas
[\[154b.5\]]mi dge ba spangs pa'i ming la bya/_yang gcig tu na shI ta la twA ts+shI la zhes kyang bya ste/_nyon mongs pa'i gdung bzhi zhing bsil bar gyur pa'i ming yang yin te/_dngos su na dang tshul gyis mi dge ba la mi spyod cing khrims srung ba'i ming ste tshul khrims zhes bya/_saM bar zhes bya ba lus dang ngag dang yid gsum
[\[154b.6\]]mi dge ba mi byed de sdom zhing srung ba'i ming yang yin pas na sdom pa zhes bya/_d+hU ta gu Na zhes bya ba ni d+ho ta gu Na zhes 'byung ba ste/_dgon pa na gnas pa dang bsod snyoms len pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gong nas gong du sbyangs te dag cing gsal bar bya ba'i ming yin pas na sbyangs pa'i yon tan zhes bya/_
[\[154b.7\]]san le kha zhes bya ba li kha bi le kha na zhes bya ste/_dge sbyong gi yo byad chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed la sogs pa ma gtogs pa spangs shing /_bya ba'i mgo bsnyungs te mi 'gyur bar lugs gcig tu spyod pa'i ming yin pas na yo byad bsnyungs pa zhes bya/_po Sha d+ha zhes bya ba po Sha ni pu Sh+Na te dge ba
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]gso zhing rgyas par byed pa la bya/_d+ha ni d+ha ba ga ti shud+d+hau zhes bya ste/_rgyug pa'am dag par byed pa lta bu la bya/_spyir na dus drug tu khrims brgyad nod pa dang /_dge slong khrims kyi yan lag las nyams pa rnams gso zhing sbyong ba'i ming ste gso sbyong zhes bya/_baR+Sho pa na
[\[155a.2\]]yi ka zhes bya ba/_u pa na ya ti sa pra ba ya ti zhes bya ste/_ba R+Sho ni dbyar/_u pa nA yi kA ni phrad par byed pa ste/_dbyar zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga la dge 'dun las su bsgo ba dang khrims su bya ba dang mal cha bsgo ba la sogs pa bya ba nas tshes bcu drug la dbyar gnas par byin gyis rlob pa'i
[\[155a.3\]]cho ga byed pa dang /_sbyor bas na sbyor zhing gnas par dam 'cha' ba'i ming ste/_dbyar sbyor zhes bya/_baR+Sho pa ga ti zhes bya ba/_ba ri Sha ni dbyar/_u pa ga ti ni khas len pa ste/_gtsug lag khang ngam gnas de nas gud du mi 'phags par gnas par dam 'cha' zhing cho ga bya ba'i ming ste/_
[\[155a.4\]]dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa zhes bya/_pra bA ra NaM zhes bya ba pra muk+ta ba ra Na zhes bya ste/_dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa'i tshe thos pa dang mthong ba dang dogs pas rgol zhing rtsod du mi gnang ba las skabs phye bas na dgag dbye zhes bya/_ka Thi nA sta ra zhes bya ba ka Thi na ni sra ba ste chos gos
[\[155a.5\]]mi 'khum par brkyang ba'i gtan pa dang 'dra bar/_chos gos sum phrugs gcig la byin gyis brlabs/_dge 'dun dbyar gnas par dam bcas pa rnams kyis chos gos zla ba lnga ba'i bar du lhag pa dang bral ba dang kha zas snga dro yang dang yang za ba dang /_so sor 'dus shing za ba la sogs
[\[155a.6\]]pa ltung bar mi 'gyur bar brtan par thub cing bag brkyang ba'i ming ste sra brkyang zhes bya'o/_/asta ra ni chos gos bkram pa'am bting ba dang 'dra bar kun la khyab pa'i ming ste bting ba la bya/_bsdus na sra brkyang bting bar btags/_gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i ming la/_yak+Sha zhes bya ba byA ka
[\[155a.7\]]ra Na las yak+Sha pU dza yin zhes 'byung ste/_kun gyis mchod cing sbyin pa la bya/_tshig gzhin du drangs na ya ka tsid k+Shin+nan+tA ta yak+Sha zhes bya ste/_ya ka tsi da ni su yang rung ba la bya/_k+Shin+nanA tI ni gnod par byed pa la bya ste/_gnyi ga'i don dang sbyar nas gnod sbyin du btags/_rA ba Na zhes bya ba
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]ru ni shap+da yin la/_ra ba Na s+ya pat+t+yan rA pa Na zhes bya ste/_skad sgrog cing 'byin pa'i bu yin pas na sgra sgrogs kyi bu zhes bya/_rAk+Shas zhes bya ba ra ba Na dang /_bi b+hi Sha na la sogs pa mi la gnod par byed pa'i srin po la bya bas na srin po zhes bya/_pi shA tsa zhes bya ba pi shA tsa maSh+Ta tI ti pi shA tsa zhes bya
[\[155b.2\]]ste/_yi dgas smad rigs mi sha la sogs pa rje na par za bas na sha za zhes bya/_ka Ta pu ta na zhes bya ba gdon gyi ming ste/_ka Ta ni lus/_pu ta ni rul bar byed pa yin pas na lus srul po zhes bya/_skand ta zhes bya ba skand ti sho Sha yo zhes bya ste/_ma hA de ba'i sras kArta ka'i mtshan gyi skabs su
[\[155b.3\]]ni phyi 'gro zhes bya/_gdon gyi skabs su ni skems byed ces bya/_un+mA da zhes bya ba sems mi dran zhing myos par byed pa'i gdon yin pas smyo byed ces bya/_ts+tsha ya zhes bya ba grib mas mi dag la gnod pa dang /_gdon gyis mi'i grib ma gnon zhing gnod par byed pas na grib gnon zhes bya'o/_/
[\[155b.4\]]a pa sma ra zhes bya ba dran pa nyams shing brgyal bar byed pa'i gdon gyi ming ste brjed byed ces bya/_o sta ra ka zhes bya ba u ra si ts+tsha da ni zhes bshad de nyal ba la brang nas gnon zhing gnod par byed pas na gnon po zhes btags/_pany+tsi ka zhes bya ba bu lnga brgya dang 'grogs te rtse ba dang /_cho lo
[\[155b.5\]]lngas rtse ba'i ming ste lngas rtse na zhes bya/_DA ki nI zhes bya ba DiM bi ha ya si ga to zhes bya ste/_sngags grub pa nam mkha' la 'gro ba la sogs pa rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i ming ste mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya/_be tA Da zhes bya ba mi shi ba'i ro'i nang du gdon zhugs te gnod par byed pas na ro langs zhes bya/_
[\[155b.6\]]mu stegs can gyis bdag tu brjod pa'i rnam grangs la/_At+ma ni pa ra mAt+ma la zhes bya ste/_bdag ces bya ba lus gtso bo'i phung po 'di bor nas phung po gzhan len cing dngos po rtag la phung po gzhan 'dor ba ni sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa dang 'dra bar 'dor te/_nga dang nga yir 'dzin pa'i
[\[155b.7\]]gzhi yin pas na bdag ces bya/_satwa ni mu stegs can gyis bdag tu brtags pa'i bye brag yin te sems la bdag yin par 'dzin cing sems kyi rgyud la mi 'chad par 'dod pas na sems can zhes bya/_dzI ba ni ji srid du lus 'tsho ba de srid du srog ces bya ba'i bdag de lus la gnas/_lus
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]shi nas rdza bcag pa'i bye'u dang 'dra bar 'byung ste 'gro bas na srog 'dzin pa'i ming ste srog ces bya/_dzan+tu dza ya ta i ti dzan+tu zhes bya ste/_bdag tshe rabs kun du skye zhing 'byung bas na skye ba zhes bya/_po Sha ni lus dang 'gro ba'i rgyud bdag 'dis gsos shing bskyed de yod par byas
[\[156a.2\]]pas na gso ba zhes bya/_bu ru Sha ni skyes bu mgo stong yod pa zhig rig byed kyi sgra 'don zhing brjod pa zhig yod pa skad 'byung ba dang /_skyes bu rtsal dang ldan pa zhig khod na yod par 'dod pa la bya bas na skyes bu zhes bya/_puM ga la ni pu naHpu narga ti shu li ya ta i ti zhes bya ste/_yang dang yang lha dang mi
[\[156a.3\]]la sogs pa'i rgyud du skye zhing sbyor bas na yang sbyor ba zhes kyang bya/_pur+ya te gal te tse pa puM ga la zhes kyang bya ste/_skyes nas dar gyi bar du ni gang /_dar yol nas shi ba'i bar du ni zag pa la yang bya ste/_tshig 'di gnyis kar yang drang du rung gis kyang sngan chad ming du btags te grags pa bzhin
[\[156a.4\]]du bzhag nas gang zag ces btags/_ma nu dza ni ma no dz+ThA tat+t+wAd ces bya ste/_skye dgu'i bdag po shed ces bya ba las byung bas na shed las skyes zhes bya/_ma na pa ti ma not+pa da t+yaM zhes bya ste/_mu stegs can gyi gzhung gis skye dgu'i bdag po 'jig rten thams cad bskyed pa de las byung
[\[156a.5\]]ba la bya/_bod la yang shed kyis kyang bskal/_shed kyis tshe bskal te byed pa'i mkhan po shed kyis byas pa skad du byung bas na shed bur btags/_kA ra ka ni mu stegs kyi gzhung las skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pa thams cad bdag rtag pas byas par 'dod pas na byed pa po zhes bya/_ka ra brti ka ni
[\[156a.6\]]bdag ces bya ba rtag pa des dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las kun byed du 'dzud pas na byed du 'jug pa po zhes bya/_bed ka ni las dge ba dang mi dge ba'i 'bras bu myong bar byed pas na tshor ba po zhes bya/_dza na ka ni bdag gtso bor gyur te dbang po dang yid dang yul du phrad pa las shes par 'gyur bar bshad
[\[156a.7\]]pas na shes pa po zhes bya/_pa sh+ya ka ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phyi rol gyi yul thams cad mthong ba yang bdag ces bya ba'i mthu yin pas na mthong ba po zhes bya/_ut+thA pa ka ni phung po slong zhing skyed pas na slong ba po zhes bya/_sa mut+thA pa ka zhes bya ba saM ni sa man+ta te kun zhes bya/_ut+thA pa ka ni tshig
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]lhag tu smos pa dang sbyar te phung po dang skye mched la sogs pa kun skyed pas na kun nas slong ba po zhes bya/_dud 'gro'i rgyud la/_tir+ya ka tsa zhes bya ba/_tir+ya any+tsa tI ti tir+yany+tsi zhes bya ste mi ltar 'greng ste 'gro ba ma yin pa phyugs kyi khams su gtogs pa dud de 'gro bas na dud 'gro zhes bya/_
[\[156b.2\]]ga ru Da zhes bya ba khyung gi ming ste nam mkha' lding zhes bya/_tA rak+Sha khyung /_su par+Na 'dab bzang /_ga ru Da 'dab chags zhes bya/_'di rnams ma 'dom na thams cad nam mkha' lding du gdags/_kin+na ra zhes bya ba dud 'gro rdzu 'phrul can gyi ming ste/_byad gzugs mi dang yud kyis 'dra
[\[156b.3\]]bas na mi'am ci zhes bya/_ma ho ra ga zhes bya ba ma hA ni chen po/_u ra ga ni ltos 'gro ba la bya ste/_klu 'brug gi khams su gtogs pa ste/_sbrul chen po yin pas na lto 'phye chen po zhes bya/_bA su ki zhes bya ba bA su ka pat+t+ye na bA su ki zhes bya ste/_klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu zhes bya ste/_tA
[\[156b.4\]]la ha ka ka zhes bya ba rta rin po che sngo skya'i ming ste/_sprin gyi shugs ltar mgyogs pas na sprin gyi shugs can zhes bya/_ai rA ba ti zhes bya ba i ra ni sa/_a ba ti ni srung ba de'i bu yin pas na glang po sa srung gi bu zhes bya/_gling bzhi dang 'jig rten bshad pa/_pUrba bi de ha zhes bya ba pUrba ni shar
[\[156b.5\]]phyogs la bya/_bi ni bi shiSh+Ta ste bye brag tu 'phags pa dang bzang po/_de ha ni lus 'phags te/_lus 'phags par bzang ba la ming du btags pas na shar gyi lus 'phags zhes bya/_dzam+bu dwI pa zhes bya ba dzam+bu ni lho phyogs kyi gling 'di'i byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i 'gram na shing chen po dzam+bu
[\[156b.6\]]zhes bya ba shing tog rdza ma tsam chags pa'i 'bras bu chu'i nang du lhung ba rnams dzam+bu chu bo'i gser du 'gyur ba zhig yod de/_de la mtshan mar btsugs te ming du btags pas na dzam+bu'i gling zhes btags/_a ba ra go dA ni ya zhes bya ba a ba ra ni nub phyogs/_go ni ba lang /_dA ni sbyin zhing
[\[156b.7\]]spyod pa ste/_de la ba lang lhag par mang zhing spyod pa las ming du btags te nub kyi ba lang spyod ces bya/_ut+ta ra ku ru zhes bya ba ut+ta ra ni byang phyogs/_ku ni kuM si ta te ngan pa/_ru ni ra ba ste sgra/_byang phyogs kyi gling de na mi'i skad du smra ba med de skad ngan pas brda byed pa la yang bya/_yang sngon
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]gyi mkhan po kha cig gi bshad pa las byang phyogs kyi gling gi mi lo stong thub pas sgyid cing bde ba las 'chi kar sgra mi snyan pa 'byung ste dus las 'da' 'o zhes kyang 'chad de/_spyir gnyis ka dang sbyar na mthun te byang gi sgra mi snyan du btags/_lo ka zhes bya ba lu dz+ya ta i
[\[157a.2\]]ti zhes bya ste/_sems can la sogs pa 'chi zhing mi rtag la 'jig pa'i gzhi yin pas na 'jig rten zhes bya/_yul dang mtho ris kyi shing gi ming la/_shra ba sti zhes bya ba drang srong mnyan po zhes bya ba dang /_drang srong yod pa zhes bya gnyis kyis grong khyer 'di dang po btsugs pa yin pas na
[\[157a.3\]]mnyan yod ces bya/_nai r+r-i ti di sha zhes bya ba ni rga ti r-i ta zhes bya ste/_nir ni bral ba/_r-i ta ni bden pa ste srin po'i rgyal po bden bral zhes bya/_lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams na gnas pa'i phyogs skyong gi ming ste/_bden bral gyi phyogs zhes bya/_pA ri yA tra ko bi dA ra zhes bya ba'i sgra las drangs
[\[157a.4\]]na pA ri yA tra ni parI ti sa man+ta yA tra ste/_lha'i spos kyi shing bzang po'i drung du lha thams cad 'dus te rdzi phyogs su ni dpag tshad brgya'i bar du dri zhim po'i ngad ldang /_rdzi phyogs ma yin pa'i logs su ni dpag tshad lnga bcu'i bar du dri zhim po'i ngad ldang ba'i shing gi ming ste yongs su 'du zhes bya/_ko bi dA ni
[\[157a.5\]]kuM bi dA ra ya ti ba zhes bya ste/_spos kyi shing chen po yal ga mang zhing sdong po che bas sa chen po brtol te 'byung ba dang 'dra bas sa brtol zhes bya ste/_bsdus pas shing yongs 'du sa brtol zhes bya/_'dod pa'i khams kyi gnas kyi ming la/_b+hau ma zhes bya ba b+hau mau b+hau ma zhes bya ste/_sa la
[\[157a.6\]]brten pa'i gnod sbyin gyi ming ste sa bla zhes bya/_an+ta ri k+Sha bA si zhes bya ba an+ta ri k+Sha bar snang la bya/_bA sa gnas pa la bya ste/_nyi zla la sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris su gtogs pa kha cig nam mkha' la rgyu ba ltar snang bas na bar snang la gnas pa zhes bya ste/_tsa tu rma hA rA dza kA yi ka
[\[157a.7\]]zhes bya ba tsa tu ra ni bzhi/_ma hA rA dza ni rgyal po chen po/_kA ya ni tshogs pa'am gnas sam ris la bya/_i ka ni tshig gong ma'i rkyen du sbyar ba yin te/_spyir na ris de na spyod cing gnas pa la bya ste/_rgyal po chen po bzhis ris su gtogs pa lag na gzhong thogs dang /_phreng thogs dang /_
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]rtag tu myos dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi'i 'khor dang 'di bzhi la bya ste/_tshig spyir bsdus na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris zhes bya/_tra yas+t+ring+sha zhes bya ba tra ya ni gsum/_s+t+ring+sha ni sum cu ste/_'jig rten gyi gtsug lag las ni mtho ris ri rab kyi steng na lha'i gtso bo sum cu rtsa gsum bzhugs te/_drag
[\[157b.2\]]po bcu gcig dang /_nyi ma bcu gnyis dang /_nor lha brgyad dang /_tha skar gyi bu gnyis dang sum cu rtsa gsum bzhugs pas na sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya/_chos mngon pa las ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i gnas na g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi gral du nye ba'i dbang po bcu drug bcu drug
[\[157b.3\]]seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa dang /_gung na lha'i dbang po brgya byin seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te spyir na lha'i gtso bo sum cu rtsa gsum bzhugs pa las btags te zhes 'byung /_sgra bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa zhes bya/_yA ma zhes bya ba a su ra bi b+ha d+b+ha ya ya ta a pa ya ta zhes bya
[\[157b.4\]]ba ste/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris man chad na lha ma yin gyis 'thab pa'i 'jigs pa dang ma bral la/_'di yan chad ni lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i 'jigs pa las 'das te bral bas 'thab bral zhes btags te/_bsod nams kyis phyin pa dang /_mel tshe thun re re la
[\[157b.5\]]skoms shing skul ba skad 'byung ba dang /_sngon mtshe ma dang zung ma zhes btags pa ni yi ge gzhung dang sbyar na gtan tshigs mi che bar 'gyur te mi btsan par byas so/_/tu Shi ta zhes bya ba tu Sha ni pri to zhes bya ba dga' ba/_i ta ni prAp+ta ste 'thob pa'am ldan pa ste/_chos kyi dga'
[\[157b.6\]]ba dang bde ba lhag par che bas na dga' ldan zhes bya/_ni rmA Na ra ti zhes bya ba swa yan+nirmA Na kA man pa ri b+hu ny+dza ta zhes bya ste/_rang gis gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya rnams ci dga' bar sprul nas 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la spyod pas na 'phrul dga' zhes bya/_pa ra
[\[157b.7\]]ni rmi ta ba sha brti zhes bya ba pa ra ni rmi tA b+ho ga na ba she na brta yi tuM shI la zhes bya ste/_gzhan gyis 'dod pa'i longs spyod sprul pa rnams la phan tshun spyod par dbang byed pas na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ces bya/_bsam gtan dang po'i sa'i ming la/_brah+ma kA yi ka zhes bya ba/_brah+ma ni tshangs pa/_
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]kA yi ka ni ris su gtogs pa ste/_'dod pa'i khams las thar nas bsam gtan dang po'i sar phyin pa'i ming yin te tshangs ris zhes bya/_brah+ma pu ro hi ta zhes bya ba/_brah+ma Na pu ro d+hi ya te zhes bya ste/_tshangs pa chen po'i mdun du rtag tu 'dug la tshig 'don zhing
[\[158a.2\]]smra bas na tshangs pa mdun na 'don zhes bya/_bra h+ma pa ri ShA d+ya zhes bya ba brah+ma Na pa ri tsA ra ka zhes bya ste/_lha'i ris de'i tshangs pa rnams tshangs pa chen po'i khams dang zham 'bring du gtogs pa'i phyir tshangs 'khor zhes bya/_ma hA bra h+ma zhes bya ba tshe dang byad gzugs dang mdog la sogs pa
[\[158a.3\]]tshangs pa phal dang mi 'dra bar 'phags la/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi bdag po mdzad pas na tshangs pa chen po zhes bya/_bsam gtan gnyis pa'i sa'i ming la/_pa rI t+tA b+hA zhes bya ba ba rIt+ta e sham a b+hA swa b+hU mi baik+Sh+ya ti zhes bya ste/_ris 'di na gnas pa 'di bsam gtan
[\[158a.4\]]gnyis pa'i sa la gnas rim pa gsum yod pa'i tha ma yin te/_gong ma gnyis las 'od chung ba'i phyir 'od chung zhes bya/_a pra mA NA b+hA zhes bya ba/_nA b+hA pra mA Na me shan shAkya ma bra ma hu na zhes bya ste/_lha de dag gi 'od sa 'og ma bas tshad gzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir tshad
[\[158a.5\]]med 'od ces bya/_A b+hA swa ra zhes bya ba A b+hA sa ni 'od/_wa ra ni 'od byed pa'am gsal bar byed pa lta bu'i tshig gi rkyen te lha'i gnas kyi 'od kyis gnas kun du rgyas par snang bar gyur pas na 'od gsal zhes bya/_bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa'i ming la/_pa rIt+ta shu b+ha zhes bya ba
[\[158a.6\]]pa rIt+ta ni chung ngu /_shu b+ha dge ba ste/_bsam gtan gsum pa'i yid kyi sa'i ba de ba la dge ba zhes bya/_bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa la gnas rim pa gsum yod pa'i tha ma yin te/_sa gong ma gsum pas dge ba chung ba'i phyir dge chung zhes bya/_a bra mA Na shu b+ha zhes bya ba lha'i gnas
[\[158a.7\]]der skyes pa de dag gi bde ba sa 'og ma pas tshad gzung du med pa'i phyir tshad med dge zhes bya/_shu b+ha kr-it+s+na zhes bya ba lha de dag gi dge ba las lhag pa lha'i ris man chad gzhan la med pas dge rgyas zhes bya/_bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa'i ming la/_a na b+h+ra ka zhes bya ba b+h+ra ka ni sprin te/_sprin
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]lta bu med pas na a na b+h+raka zhes bya ste sprin 'khrigs pa dang 'dra bar 'dab chags pa med de/_gzhal med khang dang bcas par skye zhing 'chi 'pho la/_de yan chad kyang gnam gyi rim pa sprin ltar 'gebs pa med pas sprin med ces bya/_puN+ya bras ba zhes bya ba puN+ya ni bsod nams/_pra sa ba ni skyes
[\[158b.2\]]pa'am 'byung ba la bya ste/_mi g.yo ba'i bsod nams las lha de dag skyes pas na bsod nams skyes zhes bya/_br-ihat+pha la zhes bya ba gnas gzhan yod pa'i so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'i mchog skye bas na 'bras bu che zhes bya/_gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ming la/_shub+d+ha
[\[158b.3\]]bA sa zhes bya ba 'phags pa'i lam gyi chus sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma bkrus pas phyir mi 'ong ba la sogs pa sems can dag pa sha stag gnas te/_so so'i skye bo dang ma 'dres pas na gnas gtsang ma zhes bya/_a br-i ha zhes bya ba gnas gtsang ma ris lnga yod pa'i nang na tha ma yin pas na
[\[158b.4\]]mi che ba zhes bya/_a tA pa zhes bya ba lha'i ris 'dir skyes pa rnams bsam pa dge ba'i phyir sa 'og mar skyes pa rnams kyis zil gyis mi gnon pa dang /_sa gong ma ma thob kyang mi dga' ba med pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba chen po med pas mi gdung ba zhes bya ba dang /_su dr-i sha zhes bya
[\[158b.5\]]ba lha'i ris 'dir skyes pa rnams rab tu zhi ba'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir mig sngar mdzes shing bzang bas na gya nom snang zhes bya/_su daR+sha na zhes bya ba lha'i ris 'dir skyes pa rnams zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin spel mar bsgoms pa'i sgrib pa lhag ma cung zad
[\[158b.6\]]cig lus su zad de/_mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag cing mthong bas na bzang ba'i phyir shin tu mthong ba zhes bya/_a ka niSh+Tha zhes bya ba a ni ma yin pa/_ka niSh+Tha ni 'og ma la bya/_spyir na gzugs kyi khams kyi dang po ste/_gong na gzhan med pas 'og min zhes bya/_yang mdo snga kha cig gi
[\[158b.7\]]nang nas a g+ha niSh+Tha zhes 'byung ste/_a g+ha ni rdul phra mo bsags pa/_niSh+Tha ni mthar thug pa ste/_gzugs kyi khams kyi ya thog yin pas bsags pa'i mtha' zhes kyang bya ste skabs dang sbyar zhing gdags/_mahA ma he shwar yA ta na zhes bya ba 'og min gyi phyogs kyi gnas zhig na byang chub
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]sems dpa' dbang phyug chen po'i nang na rnam par snang mdzad chen po bzhugs te/_chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa bsten zhing myong bar gyur pa'i gnas yin pas na dbang phyug chen po che ba'i gnas zhes bya/_gzugs med pa'i sa'i ming la A kA shA nan+t+ya ma zhes snyoms par 'jug
[\[159a.2\]]pa la sbyor ba'i dus na gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'das te/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes 'byung bas nam mkha' mtha' yas/_A ya ta ni skye ba'i gnas yin pas skye mched de/_bsdus na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched ces bya ste/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_
[\[159a.3\]]cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched kyang tshul 'di bzhin bshad/_mngon par mtho ba dang nges par legs pa la sogs pa'i ming la/_a b+h+yung ya zhes bya ba lha dang mi la sogs pa'i go 'phang mthon po dang /_dbang thang thob pa'i ming ste mngon par
[\[159a.4\]]mtho ba zhes bya/_niH shre ya zhes bya ba thar pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i ming ste/_sgra dang sbyar na nges par legs pa zhes bya/_a pa brga ya thar pa'i ming ste/_nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad byang zhing bsal ba la bya bas na byang grol zhes bya/_au pa d+hi she Sha nirbA Na zhes
[\[159a.5\]]bya ba/_dgra bcom pa lta bu khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs nas/_phung po tsam ma bor ba'i ming ste/_phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya/_ni ru pa d+hi she Sha nirbA Na zhes bya ba nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang spangs la/_phung po lnga'i sdug bsngal gyi me yang
[\[159a.6\]]zhi bar byed pa'i ming ste/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya/_pra ti saM khyA ni ro d+ha zhes bya ba/_shes rab kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi so sor brtags nas nyon mongs pa 'gags pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba'i ming ste/_so sor brtags pas 'gog pa
[\[159a.7\]]zhes bya/_a pra ti saM khya ni ro d+ha zhes bya ba rkyen ma tshang bas 'gog gi brtags pas mi 'gog pa ste/_dper na gzugs gcig la mig gi rnam par shes pa lhag par zhen cing dmigs pa'i skyes bu gzugs gzhan la dmigs pa'i mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /_rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]sogs pa de dang dus gcig tu 'byung ba'i yul dmigs su de ma thag pa'i rkyen med pas mi dmigs pa 'das zin pa la ni dmigs su mi rung bas na sems dang sems las byung ba ma 'ongs pa rnams skye ba la gtan gyi gegs su gyur pa'i ming ste/_so sor brtags pa ma yin pas 'gog pa
[\[159b.2\]]zhes bya/_saM skr-i ta zhes bya ba sam+ba ra ma b+hu ya he tu pra t+ya yai tri ta zhes bya ba rgyu dang rkyen sna tshogs shing 'dus pas byas pa'i chos thams cad kyi ming yin te 'dus byas zhes bya/_a saM skr-i ta zhes bya ba nam mkha' la sogs pa rgyu dang rkyen las ma byung ba'i ming ste 'dus ma byas zhes bya/_sA sra ba zhes bya bas
[\[159b.3\]]ha A sra be na bar+t+ta zhes bya ba ste/_srid pa'i rtse mo man chad mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba yan chad rma'i sgo drug nas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa 'byung ba'i ming ste zag pa dang bcas pa zhes bya/_a nA sra ba zhes bya ba 'dus ma byas gsum dang lam gyi bden pa nyon mongs pa med
[\[159b.4\]]pas na zag pa med pa zhes bya/_sa man+ta t+ya ya zhes bya ba san+ti sa mash+tsa sau bo d+ha ru pat+t+ya na zhes bya ste/_rnam par shes pa snga ma rgyur gyur pa dang /_phyi ma 'bras bur gyur pa gnyis shes pa'i rang bzhin du 'dra bas na mtshungs pa zhes bya/_a nan+ta ra ni rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis gzhan gyis bar du ma chod pa zhes
[\[159b.5\]]bya/_pra t+ya ya ni rkyen yin te bar med par mtshungs pa'i rkyen zhes 'chad pa yang yin te/_dngos su na sems dang sems las byung ba skad cig ma gzhan gyis bar ma chod par sngar byung ba'i ming ste/_sngon chad de ma thag par btags pa yang mi 'gal bas de ma thag pa'i rkyen zhes bya/_ra sA ya na zhes bya ba'i sgra
[\[159b.6\]]las drangs na/_ra sa ni bcud dam nying khu lta bu la bya/_A ya na ni a ya pa ga tau las drangs te thob pa'am len pa la bya ste/_spyir na 'phrul gyi sman gyi ming ste/_sman bzang po'i mthu dang bcud kyis tshe lo grangs mang por thub pa dang /_gzhon zhing nad med par 'gyur ba len cing 'thob par byed pa yin te/_sman
[\[159b.7\]]bcud kyis len zhes bya/_tsaN+yU ra zhes bya ba'i sgra las drangs na/_tsa Na ni tsa Na shra Na A dA na zhes bya ste/_pha rol gyi stobs dang mthu len cing 'phrog bas na stobs la bya/_u ra ni u a grA khyA zhes bya ste/_mchog gam dam pa la bya bas na stobs mchog ces bya/_nA rA ya Na zhes bya ba na ra s+ya pat+t+ya na nA rA ya Na zhes
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]bya ste/_yab sred med kyi sras yin pas na sred med kyi bu zhes bya/_tan+t+ra ku la dza ta zhes bya ba nor dang khyim dang bu dang chung ma la sogs pa la chags pas sems phan tshun du g.yeng ba'i phyir thag 'khrug pa lta bu zhes bya/_gu Da guny+dzi ka b+hU ta zhes bya ba sred pa dang ldan
[\[160a.2\]]pa'i rtog pa mang du byed pas dgrol dka' ba'i phyir dru gu 'dzings pa lta bu zhes bya/_muny+dza ba la ba dza dzA ta zhes bya ba nor dang khyim la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa la chags pas sdug bsngal mang po'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir rtsa 'di gnyis dang 'dra bar rno zhing rtsub pas na rtswa muny+dza dang bal rdza lta
[\[160a.3\]]bur gyur pa zhes bya/_a dza bany+dza bi saM pan+na zhes bya ba/_a dza ba nya ni 'ong ba/_dza bi ni 'gro ba/_saM ban+na ni gyur pa'am zhugs pa yin te/_'gro ba lnga kun du 'khor zhing rgyu ba la bya bas na 'ong ba dang 'gro bar gyur pa zhes btags/_pany+tsa ka ShA ya zhes bya ba snyigs ma lnga yin te/_
[\[160a.4\]]sngon las sems can rnams tshe dang lta ba la sogs pa nyams shing bri ste sman gyi nying khu bskus pa'i tshigs ma dang 'dra bar tshe dang sems can dang dus ni dman par gyur te/_nyon mongs pa dang lta ba la sogs pa'i shas ni phyir zhing skyes pas na snyigs ma lnga zhes bya/_ma hA byut+pa ta
[\[160a.5\]]bye brag tu rtogs byed chen po/_ma d+h+ya byut+pa ta bye brag tu rtogs byed 'bring po/_kwalpa byut+pa ta bye brag tu rtogs byed chung ngu /_ba tsa byut+pa ta skang bye brag tu bshad pa 'di ni 'bring po'o/_/chen po'i dka' ba'i gnas dang sgra'i gzhung dang sbyar te bshad pa'i pany+dzi ka ma d+h+ya byut+pa ta yin
[\[160a.6\]]no/_/pho brang 'on cang dor bod dang rgya gar gyi mkhan po thams cad kyis chos skad gtan la phab ste/_rje blon mol nas reg zid du mdzad pa skad gsar gyi ming sngon ma thogs pa dang /_gtan la ma phab pa la mkhas pa rnams 'tshogs te ming du btags shing gtan la phab ste/_lha btsan
[\[160a.7\]]po khri lde srong btsan gyis bskul nas bkas bcad de mi bcos par gzhag pa rdzogs so//_//bkas bcad pa bla dpe bzhin bris pa gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin du zur ma bcos so/_/sgra sbyor bam po gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]{D4348}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_byA ka ra Na mU la triM shad nA ma/_bod skad du/_lung du ston pa'i rtsa ba sum cu pa zhes bya ba/_smra ba'i dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang la yon tan mchog mnga' ba'i/_/dkon mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[160b.2\]]gang gi sgra dbyangs sngon gsungs pa'i/_/'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang gi ming gzhi sngon gsungs pa/_/rtag zhi ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdeb sbyor legs mdzad mkhas rnams dang /_/bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal nas/_/bslab pa kun gyi gzhi 'dzin cing /_/rig
[\[160b.3\]]byed smra ba rnams kyi rgyu/_/ming tshig brjod pa kun gyi gzhi/_/yi ge'i sbyor ba bshad par bya/_/yi ge A li kA li gnyis/_/A li gsal byed i sogs bzhi/_/kA li sum cu tham pa'o/_/de la rjes 'jug bcu yin te/_/de la lnga ni sngon du 'jug_/mi 'jug pa ni nyi shu'o/_/kA li
[\[160b.4\]]byed dang brgyad sde ni/_/bzhi bzhi dag tu dbye ba las/_/dang po gsum pa bzhi pa la/_/mas gnyis drug pa'i gsum pa dang /_/bdun pa la ni sha ma gtogs/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu ru 'dod/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu nyid las/_/dang po gsum pa lnga pa drug_/bdun pa rnams ni sngon du 'ang 'jug_/
[\[160b.5\]]ming gzhi gnyis sam gsum sbrel lam/_/de la dbyangs kyi bzhir ldan yang /_/gang du 'ang 'jug min sbyar ba'ang min/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu po ni/_/ming gang gi ni mthar sbyar ba/_/de la A li bzhi pa sbyar/_/slar bsdu bar ni shes par bya/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu po las/_/
[\[160b.6\]]gang ming mtha' na bcu pa gnas/_/de la A li gnyis pa sbyar/_/gang ming mtha' na brgyad pa gnas/_/de la gnyis pa u yang sbyar/_/gang ming mtha' na gsum pa gnas/_/de la A li gnyis pa sbyar/_/bzhi pa dgu pa dngos kyang ste/_/las dang ched dang rten gnas dang /_/de
[\[160b.7\]]nyid tshe skabs la sgra yin/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu po la/_/i dang mthun lugs 'di zhes bya/_/dang po gnyis la dang po mthun/_/gsum lnga bcu la kya dang sbyar/_/bdun pa nyid la bdun pa ste/_/lhag ma rnams la gyi sbyar ba/_/de dag i sbyar 'brel ba'i sa/_/de nyid la ni bcu
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa sbyar/_/byed pa po ru shes par bya/_/A li phyis nas gnyis pa sbyar/_/tshig rgyan gnyis dang sdud par 'gyur/_/la don su la u phyis nas/_/de la gsum pa'i dang po sbyar/_/de la A li gsum pa sbyar/_/de ni lhag dang bcas pa'o/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu po
[\[161a.2\]]la/_/drug pa sbyar na 'byed sdud yin/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu po yi/_/bzhi pa dgu pa la bcu pa/_/sbyor ba 'byung khungs dag yin te/_/dgar dang sdud pa'ang de bzhin yin/_/gang ming brjod pa dang bo ru/_/kye sbyar ba ni bod pa yin/_/gang ming mtha' na mthun pa yi/_/bzhi pa la ni i
[\[161a.3\]]sbyar ba/_/dgar dang bsnan pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/_/ming gang rung ba'i bar mtshams su/_/gsum pa la ni gnyis pa sbyar/_/de ni sdud dang 'byed pa dang /_/rgyu mtshan tshe skabs gdams ngag lnga'o/_/gang ming gi ni ya tha ru/_/dang po la ni gnyis pa sbyar/_/spyi la khyab pa nyid du 'gyur/_/
[\[161a.4\]]ming gang gi ni ma tha na/_/pu ling+ga yi sgra med pa/_/de la pu ling+ga sbyar na/_/bdag po'i sar ni shes par bya/_/ming gang gi ni ya tha na/_/s+t+rI ling+ga yi sgra med pa/_/de la s+t+rI ling+ga sbyar na/_/dgag pa'i gnas su shes par bya/_/gang ming gi ni ya tha na/_/gsum pa la ni e sbyar ba/_/tha snyad
[\[161a.5\]]dbang du gsum yin te/_/dngos po'i dbang du bzhi ru sbyar/_/dus kyi dbang du gnyis yin te/_/tshigs su bcad pa mtshams sbyor rnams/_/cung zad bsdus pa yod na yang /_/de ni de bzhin sbyar bar bya'o/_/sngon 'jug yod dam med kyang rung /_/ming gzhi'i yi ge gang yin la/_/
[\[161a.6\]]gnyis 'brel yod dam gsum 'brel yod/_/A li bzhi las gang ldan yang /_/rjes 'jug bcu bo ma zhugs na/_/ming gzhan sbyor ba yod mi srid/_/rjes 'jug bcu yi don shes nas/_/'dri dang klog dang bshad rnams kyi/_/mtshams sbyor sgra la thogs med cing /_/
[\[161a.7\]]'brel par smra ba'i mchog tu 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rjes 'jug shes pa yis/_/don gyi sbyor ba ma mthong yang /_/don dang mthun pa'i sbyor ba shes/_/rjes 'jug sbyor ba mkhas pa na/_/lung gi don dang sbyor ba dang /_/bla ma'i man ngag gsum sbyar nas/_/don gyi thog tu dbab par
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]bya/_/bslab la brtson pa'i gang zag gis/_/dang por nga ro rnams la sbyang /_/sngon 'jug rjes 'jug ming gzhi gsum/_/klog gi ched du bslab pa yin/_/rjes 'jug bcu yi sbyor ba ni/_/mnyan bsam gtan pa'i ched du sbyar/_/yan lag de dag mthu yis ni/_/'bras bu'i ched du
[\[161b.2\]]don la dbab/_/bslab pa'i rim pa 'di yis ni/_/gang zhig 'bad pa chung ngus kyang /_/shes rab myur du 'grol bar 'gyur/_/de phyir dang por 'di nyid bslab/_/de nas rgyas pa'ang mnyan byas nas/_/bslab pa gang la dad pa yi/_/gzhung nyid bla ma rnams las mnyan/_/slob dpon de
[\[161b.3\]]nyid du 'dzin cing /_/le log g.yeng ba rnam par spang /_/zo bzang dad pa la brten pa/_/skyes bu des ni myur rtogs te/_/de la dus su 'doms par bya/_/cig shos de las bzlog pa'o/_/de ltar bshad des deng nas 'dir/_/kun gyis de ltar rtogs gyur cig_/byA ka ra Na rtsa ba'i sh+lo ka
[\[161b.4\]]sum cu pa zhes bya ba slob dpon a nus mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//byA ka ra Na rtsa ba brgyad ba las/_kun du bzang po'i byA ka ra Na dang po'i skabs te lnga pa'o//_//[{D4349}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_byA ka ra Na ling+gA ba tA ra Na nA ma/_bod skad du/_lung du ston pa rtags kyi 'jug pa zhes bya ba/_byA ka ra
[\[161b.5\]]Na'i dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/smra ba'i skyes mchog smra ba'i rgyal/_/thams cad mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/pho yi yi ge 'ba' zhig la/_/sde ba phyed dang brgyad gnas pa'ang /_/sde tshan lnga ru dril byas la/_/yi ge sum cu tham pa la/_/pho dang ma ning mo dang ni/_/shin tu mo dang bzhi bzhi
[\[161b.6\]]ru/_/sde pa bzhi pa yan chad dbye/_/lhag ma bcu bzhi gnas pa la/_/tsa sogs gsum ni ca sogs sbyar/_/wa ni ba dang sbyar bar bya/_/lhag ma drug ni mo ru sbyar/_/ra la ha ni mo gsham ste/_/ma ning mtshan med ces kyang bya/_/mo yi yi ge'i nang nas ni/_/'jug pa'i yi ge bcu dbyung bya/_/'jug
[\[161b.7\]]pa bcu yi nang nas ni/_/sngon 'jug yi ge lnga dbyung bya/_/sngon 'jug yi ge lnga po la/_/pho dang ma ning mo dang ni/_/shin tu mo dang bzhi ru dbye/_/de dag re re'ang bzhi byed de/_/gang la 'jug byed gang gis byed/_/ji ltar 'jug byed ci phyir byed/_/gang la 'jug par byed ce na/_/pho ni pho dang mo la
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]'jug_/mo ni mo dang ma ning la/_/ma ning yang ni pho mo la'o/_/shin tu mo ni ma ning dang /_/mo dang shin tu mo nyid la'o/_/mi 'jug pa ni 'di lta ste/_/pho ni ma ning la mi 'jug_/mo ni pho la 'jug pa min/_/ma ning rang la rang mi 'jug_/rang gi sde dang phrad pa na/_/pho yang mo la
[\[162a.2\]]'jug mi 'gyur/_/ma ning mo yang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar 'jug par byed ce na/_/pho ni drag po'i tshul gyis 'jug_/ma ning ran par 'jug pa yin/_/mo ni zhan pa'i tshul gyis 'jug_/shin tu mo ni mnyam pas so/_/ci phyir 'jug par byed ce na/_/pho ni 'das dang gzhan bsgrub phyir/_/
[\[162a.3\]]ma ning gnyis ka da ltar ched/_/mo ni bdag dang ma 'ongs phyir/_/shin tu mo ni mnyam phyir ro/_/rjes 'jug yi ge bcu po la/_/pho mo ma ning gsum du dbye/_/pho la skyes bu rab 'bring gsum/_/mo la mo dang shin tu mo/_/ma ning 'gyur dang mtshan gnyis dang /_/mtshan med dag
[\[162a.4\]]dang gsum du 'dod/_/de yang byed pa bzhi bzhi ste/_/gang la 'jug byed gang gis byed/_/ji ltar byed dang ci phyir byed/_/gang la yi ge thams cad la/_/gang gis bcu po de dag gis/_/ji ltar rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/sgra yi 'jug tshul don gyi tshul/_/pho gsum mo gnyis ma ning gsum/_/
[\[162a.5\]]drag zhan bar ma gsum du 'jug_/drag pa gsum ni nang phrad dam/_/gal te zhan pa nang phrad na/_/de la nang gi cha shas kyis/_/de yang drag zhan gnyis su dbye/_/ma ning gsum du gang gtogs pa/_/drag dang phrad na drag par 'gyur/_/zhan dang phrad na zhan par 'gyur/_/gnyis ka dag dang phrad
[\[162a.6\]]gyur na/_/de ni gnyis ka can du 'gyur/_/gnyis ka dag dang ma phrad na/_/gang du yang ni mi 'gyur ro/_/des na 'gyur dang mtshan gnyis dang /_/mtshan med ma ning gsum du 'dod/_/de ni sgra yi 'jug tshul lo/_/don gyi rnam pa gnyis yin te/_/snga ma gang ltar gyur pa dang /_/phyi ma
[\[162a.7\]]gang ltar gyur pa'o/_/snga ma sngon 'jug sngar bzhin sbyar/_/phyi ma dag gi 'dren tshul ni/_/pho yis pho yi ming mtha' drang /_/mo yis mo yi ming mtha' drang /_/ma ning gis ni ma ning ngo /_/ming mtha' de dag nyid kyis ni/_/de nyid rang gi sgra mthun pa'i/_/chos dngos las dang byed pa dang /_/
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]sbyin dang 'byung khungs 'brel ba dang /_/gnas dang bod pa'i sgra yang drang /_/gzhan yang slar bsdu lhag bcas dang /_/'byed sdud bsnan dang bdag po dang /_/dgag sgrub rgyan dang dus la 'jug_/de dag snga shugs 'dren pas 'byung /_/de dag nang gses gang 'jug pa/_/mtha' sbyar 'og
[\[162b.2\]]ma'i ming don las/_/spyir 'jug yod dam byed pa yod/_/de bzhin ched byed rten byed dang /_/las bya blang bya bsgrub par bya/_/sngon du 'os pa gnas pa'am/_/gzhan yang tshig don 'og ma las/_/bsdu rgyu yod dam med pa dang /_/gong ma las kyang de bzhin te/_/rnam grangs
[\[162b.3\]]dag ni bkod pa las/_/bskyar ba yod dam med pa dang /_/pho sgra dang ni mo sgra dag_/ming gi mtha' la yod med dang /_/rgyan du gyur pa rnams la yang /_/don la snyegs pa yod med dang /_/bstan bya lhag ma yod med dang /_/tshig don rdzogs dang ma rdzogs kyis/_/de dag nang gses rnam
[\[162b.4\]]bar dbye/_/ci phyir 'jug par byed ce na/_/yi ge'i khong nas ming dbyung ste/_/ming gi khong nas tshig phyung nas/_/tshig gis don rnams ston byed pa'o/_/mo yi yi ge med pa na/_/pho yig brjod pa med par 'gyur/_/pho yig de dag rnams la yang /_/'jug par bcas pa med na ni/_/ming dang
[\[162b.5\]]tshig kyang gsal mi nus/_/ming tshig gsal ba med na ni/_/don rnams brjod par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gyur na 'jig rten na/_/don mtshan brjod pa kun kyang med/_/rig byed smra ba'ang yod mi 'gyur/_/nyan thos rang rgyal sangs rgyas kyi/_/bslab pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar
[\[162b.6\]]'jig rten sems can dag_/phung po khams dang skye mched dang /_/grub mtha' gzhan yang yod mod na'ang /_/rang nyid kyis ni mi shes bzhin/_/de bzhin yi ge'i 'jug tshul rnams/_/smra ba rnams la gnas gyur kyang /_/rang tshul de nyid mi shes pas/_/don la sbyor ba ga la shes/_/de phyir
[\[162b.7\]]smra ba'i skyes mchog gis/_/rjes smras 'di kun rtogs gyur cig_/lung du ston pa rtags kyi 'jug pa zhes bya ba slob dpon a nus mdzad pa'o//_//byA ka ra Na'i rtsa ba brgyad pa las/_kun tu bzang po'i byA ka ra Na gnyis pa'i skabs te drug pa'o//_//
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]{D4350}]@/_/gnas brgyad chen po'i rtsa ba bzhugs/_/@##/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byA ka ra Na'i skad ni gnas brgyad de/_byed pa'i gnas dang /_bsdu ba'i gnas dang /_sgyur ba'i gnas dang /_drang ba'i gnas dang /_'jug pa'i gnas dang /_rnam par dbye ba'i gnas dang /_
[\[163a.2\]]phyogs kyi gnas dang /_dngos po'i gnas so/_/de la byed pa'i gnas ni/_byed pa'i tshig brgyad kyi lugs dang /_tshig drug gi lugs dang /_tshig bzhi'i lugs so/_/de la tshig brgyad ni gang byed/_gang la byed/_gang gis byed/_gang gi phyir byed/_gang las byed/_gang gi byed/_gang na byed/_gang
[\[163a.3\]]zhes bya ba byed/_/dang po ngo bo'i tshig_/gnyis pa dmigs 'dzin pa'i tshig_/gsum pa byed pa'i tshig_/bzhi pa ched du bya ba'i tshig_/lnga pa 'byung gnas kyi tshig_/drug pa 'brel pa'i tshig_/bdun pa gnas gzhi'i tshig_/brgyad pa gdags pa'i tshig_/tshig drug ni gang byed/_gang la byed/_gang
[\[163a.4\]]gis byed/_gang gi phyir byed/_gang las byed/_gang la byed/_dang po ngo bo'i tshig_/gnyis pa las kyi tshig_/gsum pa byed pa'i tshig_/bzhi pa dgos ched kyi tshig_/lnga pa rgyu'i tshig_/drug pa gnas gzhi'i tshig_/tshig bzhi'i ni gang byed/_gang la byed/_gang gis byed/_gang na byed/_dang
[\[163a.5\]]po dngos po'i tshig_/gnyis pa las kyi tshig_/gsum pa byed pa'i tshig_/bzhi pa gzhi'i tshig_/de dag ni byed pa'i gnas zhes bya ste/_skad kyi dbyings la bsgyur ba'i lugs yin pas/_lugs re res byas pa gcig la sbyor ba yin gyi/_bi b+hak+ta lta bu ming ngo cog gi sgra la sbyor ba ma yin
[\[163a.6\]]no/_/bsdu ba'i gnas ni brgyad de/_'bru mang po pa'i bsdu ba dang /_mdor bsdu ba dang /_bye brag bsdu ba dang /_yan lag gnyis kyi sgo nas kun sdud pa tsam byed pa'i sbyor ba yin no/_/gzhi bsdu ba ni gnyis te/_rigs bsal ba'i bsdu ba dang /_rigs ma bsal ba'i bsdu ba'o/_/de dag ni de gnyis kyi sgo
[\[163a.7\]]nas kun sdud pa tsam byed pa'i sbyor ba yin no/_/gzhi gcig tu bsdu ba'i sbyor ba ni gnyis te/_phyogs gcig tu byed pa'i bsdu ba dang /_so so phyogs gcig tu byed pa'i bsdu ba'o/_/de dag ni gzhi bsdu ba'i sbyor ba phyogs su byas pa las mtshan nyid gcig tu bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yin no/_/skyes bu'i bsdu ba
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ni gsum ste/_las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba dang /_ba gnyis pa'i bsdu ba dang /_byed pa'i tshig gi bsdu ba'o/_/de rnams ni yan lag gtso bor ston pa'i sbyor ba yin no/_/zlas bsdu ba ni gnyis te/_mthun pa bsdu ba dang /_mi mthun pa bsdu ba'o/_/de dag ni gcig gi zlas gcig shes pa'i sbyor ba
[\[163b.2\]]yin no/_/bsgyur ba'i gnas ni bzhi ste/_brgyud de bsgyur ba dang /_yan lag bsgyur ba dang /_rnam grangs bsgyur ba dang /_drang thad du bsgyur ba'o/_/de la brgyud de bsgyur ba ni/_sgra gcig gi zur las brgyud pas don rdzogs par ston nus pas sgra go ba ste/_ji ltar gu lu zhes bya ba las brgyud
[\[163b.3\]]pas/_'dzam bu'i 'bras bu smin pa ni/_/dri ma med pa'i chu la lhung /_/nya yis bza' ba'i ched du ni/_/gu lu gu lu zhes su smra/_/zhes zer ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/yan lag bsgyur ba ni/_tshig gcig gi sgra'i yan lag phral te/_ji ltar a pra shi kha zhes bya ba so sor phral la/_
[\[163b.4\]]a las bsgyur na/_a ne na d+hi dza mi tre/_pra biSh+Te haM ban+d+ha re/_shi ra mA kra mya bA de ni/_kha gaM ne na muN+Do pa tshi t+ya/_zhes bya ba lta bu'o/_/rnam grangs bsgyur ba ni/_sgra gcig gi rnam grangs du mar bsgyur ba ste/_ji ltar/_ri 'od sa dang rdo rje dang /_/mtho ris ba lang phyogs rnams su/_/mkhas pas
[\[163b.5\]]gau sgra shes par bya/_/zhes pa lta bu'am/_skye dang bden dang de bzhin yod/_/sems can 'das dang mi ma yin/_/cung zad lus dang sa la sogs/_/'byung ba'i sgra ni mkhas pas brjod/_/ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/drang thad du bsgyur ba ni/_nye bar bsgyur ba nyi tshe'i dbang du byas
[\[163b.6\]]pa ste ji ltar bcom pa dang ldan pa'i don ni bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu thams cad do/_/drang ba'i gnas ni mu bzhi ste/_yin pa dang /_ma yin pa dang /_gnyi ga yin pa dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa'o/_/de dag la yang dngos po gcig la mu bzhir drang ba dang /_mu bzhi las dngos
[\[163b.7\]]po gcig tu drang ba'o/_/de la gcig la mu bzhir drang ba la ni chos gcig bsgrub pa'i sgo nas ni yin pa bsgrub pa'o/_/mu bzhi las gcig tu drang ba la ni gnyis te/_ngo bo nyid kyi tshig dang /_khyad par gyi tshig dang ldan pa'o/_/de la ngo bo nyid la ni ngo bo sgrub pa'i tshul gyis yin pa 'grub pa'o/_/
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]ngo bo dgag pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa 'grub bo/_/tshul gzhan gyi sgo nas ni gnyi ga yin pa 'grub po/_/tshul gzhan gcig gi sgo nas ni gnyi ga ma yin pa 'grub po/_/khyad par gyi tshig dang ldan pa la ni/_khyad par gyi gzhi yin la khyad par ma yin pa dang /_khyad
[\[164a.2\]]par yin la khyad par gyi gzhi ma yin pa dang /_gnyi ga yin pa dang /_gnyi ga ma yin pa'o/_/mu gsum pa la ni khyad par yin la khyad par gyi gzhi ma yin pa med do/_/mu gnyis la ni khyad par gyi gzhi yin pa'ang med do/_/yi ge 'jug pa'i gnas ni brgyad de/_sgra dang /_skad dang /_ming dang /_
[\[164a.3\]]mtshan ma dang /_brda dang /_tha snyad dang /_tshig dang /_don no/_/de la sgra ni shes bas zin pa las byung ba dang /_ma zin pa dang /_gnyi ga las byung ba la sems can du ston pa dang /_mi ston bar phye ba dang /_lung du ston pa dang /_mi ston pa dag go/_/skad ni bzhi ste/_rang bzhin dang /_'dus byas dang /_
[\[164a.4\]]zur bcag pa dang /_sha za'i 'o/_/ming ni chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshig bla dgas te yi ge 'dus pa'i bdag nyid do/_/mtshan ma ni 'dis mtshon par byed pas mtshan ma ste snang bar nus pa'o/_/brda ni ming dang ming can 'brel par byed pa ste sgra dang don gyi spyi'i rnam pa gzhan la smra bar byed pa'i dus
[\[164a.5\]]can gyi bdag nyid do/_/tha snyad ni dngos po med pa la dngos por brtags pa ste/_de yang brtags pa dang 'jug pa dang brjod par bcas pa thams cad do/_/de la brda ni go bar byed pa'i bdag nyid yin la/_tha snyad ni 'jug par byed pa'i bdag nyid can yin no/_/tshig ni chos rnams kyi khyad par
[\[164a.6\]]gyi tshig bla dgas yin te ming 'dus pa'i bdag nyid can no/_/don ni chos rang gi ngo bo ji ltar gnas pa'o/_/de rnams la yi ge ji ltar 'jug ce na/_don gyi dngos gzhi las don gyi spyi'i rnam pa skye'o/_/de las sgra spyi'i rnam pa skye'o/_/brda dang tha snyad 'byung ngo /_/brda dang tha snyad kyi dus skabs na/_
[\[164a.7\]]yi ge'i tshogs dang /_ming gi tshogs dang /_tshig gi tshogs kyi rnam pa yod do/_/de la rgyu rkyen gyi tshogs la brten nas sgra rang gi mtshan nyid du 'byung ste sgra zhes bya ba'i ming thob po/_/sgra des nyan pa po la sgra las byung ba'i shes pa skye ba na sngon brda'i dus kyi dang gcig tu sgo btags te spyi gsal bar byed
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]do/_/des don gyi spyi sgro btags pa'i bdag nyid du brjod nas/_des don rang gi mtshan nyid khong du chud par 'gyur bas de dag yi ge'i 'jug pa zhes bya ba'o/_/rnam par dbye ba'i gnas ni brgyad de/_gang /_gang la/_gang gis/_gang gi phyir/_gang las/_gang gi_/gang la/_'di rnams bod pa dang bcas
[\[164b.2\]]pa ni/_rnam par dbye ba bdun/_bod pa dang brgyad do/_/'di rnams gcig gi tshig dang /_gnyis kyi tshig dang /_mang po'i tshig dang /_gsum gyis na nyi shu gcig go/_/de la sgyur byed kyi yi ge nyi shu rtsa gcig dang sgra tsam du phrad nas sgra gcig sgra thams cad du 'gyur du rung ba'i don ni/_bi b+hak+ta
[\[164b.3\]]zhes bya ba rnam par 'byed pa'i don yin gyi/_byed pa'i gnas lta bu skad kyi dbyings tsam la bsgyur ba ni ma yin no/_/de dag kyang /_si au dzas pra tha mA/_am au shas dwi tI ya/_TA b+h+yaM b+hi sa tri tI ya de b+h+yAM b+h+yas tsa tur+thi/_da si b+h+yAM b+h+yas pany+tsa mi/_ngas os A ma ShaSh+Thi/_ngi os sub sap+ta mi zhes bya ba
[\[164b.4\]]bsgyur na/_rnam par dbye ba bdun po re re la yang /_gang /_gang dag_/gang rnams/_gang la/_gang dag la/_gang rnams la/_gang gis/_gang dag gis/_gang rnams kyis/_gang gi phyir/_gang dag gi phyir/_gang rnams kyi phyir/_gang las/_gang dag las/_gang rnams las/_gang gi_/gang
[\[164b.5\]]dag gi_/gang rnams kyi/_gang la/_gang dag la/_gang rnams la zhes bya ba bod pa dang bcas par 'gyur ba'i don yin no/_/phyogs kyi gnas ni/_sgra gcig shes pa dang /_sgra gcig shes pas phyogs kun shes pa dang /_sgra ji snyed pa shes pas phyogs kun shes pa dang /_sgra phyogs med shes
[\[164b.6\]]pas chos thams cad shes pa'o/_/de dag ni skyes bu rab 'bring gis phye ba yin no/_/dngos po'i gnas ni chos can gyi sgo nas chos nyid kyi dngos po sgrub pa'am/_sgra skad kyi sgo nas don gyi dngos po sgrub par byed pa ste bshad zin to/_/byed pas bye brag rnam par 'byed/_/bya ba yongs su rdzogs par
[\[164b.7\]]ston/_/bsdus pas yi ge nyung 'gyur zhing /_/'brel pa'am ming yang 'dogs par byed/_/bsgyur bas bsgyur bya'i mthu shes shing /_/skad byings khongs su chud par 'gyur/_/drang bas bshad pa'i dmigs pa mkhas/_/gzhan sel ba yang shes par 'gyur/_/'jug pas brda dang tha
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]snyad shes/_/dgos 'brel khong du chud par 'gyur/_/dbye bas sgyur byed rkyen la mkhas/_/sgra'o cog la mkhas par 'gyur/_/phyogs kyis skyes bu rab 'bring shes/_/dngos pos don gyi dngos gzhi rtogs/_/ming can tha dad ston pa dang /_/ming dang ming can
[\[165a.2\]]'brel pa dang /_/dgos pa tha dad ston pa'o/_/kha cig sbyor ba tha dad kyang /_/dgos pa tha dad ma yin dang /_/phyogs gcig mthun par ston pa rnams/_/sgra yi ming gis shes pa yin/_/tshig la ming gis sbyor ba dang /_/gang la tshig gis sbyor ba dang /_/bye brag ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/
[\[165a.3\]]gang gi tshig don gtso bo zhes/_/sbyor ba'i dgos pa tha dad pa'ang /_/sgra yi ming gis shes pa yin/_/dbul ba 'joms byed rnyed dka' rin po che/_/bgrod dka' rgya mtsho che la gnas pa dag_/legs par gru btsugs dar phyar rlung gis bskyod/_/rin chen thob byed gzhan du thabs med
[\[165a.4\]]bzhin/_/sdug bsngal 'joms byed dam chos rin po che/_/rtogs dka' gsung rab rgya mtsho dag la gnas/_/yi ge ming dang tshig gi 'bru btsugs te/_/sgra yi dar phyar shes rab rlung gis bskyod/_/dam chos thob byed gzhan du thabs med do/_/ce khyi 'brug gis byA ka ra Na'i skad
[\[165a.5\]]mdo tsam zhig bsgyur ba gnas brgyad po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so//[ {D4351}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_shap+da shAs+t+ra/_bod skad du/_sgra'i bstan bcos/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byA ka ra Na zhes pa ni spyir gang yin pa lung du ston pa yin yang /_'di skad kun gsal
[\[165a.6\]]bar byed pa yin te/_de'i gzhi'am gnas na bslab pa'am/_tshig gam don gyi gnas su gyur pa'o/_/brgyad ni byed pa'i gnas la sogs pa ste/_de la byed pa'i gnas ni bya ba gcig sgrub par byed pa'i gnas so/_/bsdu ba'i gnas ni tshig don dang ldan pa'i tshig sdud pa'i sgo'i gnas
[\[165a.7\]]so/_/bsgyur ba'i gnas ni skad kyi dbyings dang nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgra'i gnas so/_drang ba'i gnas ni gzhan gcod cing bye brag pa'i sgra'i gnas so/_/'jug pa'i gnas ni yi ge 'jug pa'i gzhi dang brda dang tha snyad ston pa'i sgra'i gnas so/_/rnam par dbye ba'i gnas ni sgra gcig sgra
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]kun du bsgyur du btub pa dang /_sgra gcig don thams cad la 'jug tu rung ba'i phyir ston pa'i sgra'i gnas so/_/phyogs kyi gnas ni skyes bu'i nus pa ston pa'i sgra'i gnas so/_/dngos po'i gnas ni don gyi ngo bo nyid dam gtso bo ston pa'i sgra'i gnas so/_/de la byed pa'i gnas kyi dbye ba dang ngo bo
[\[165b.2\]]bstan pa'i phyir/_de la byed pa'i gnas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_byed pa'i tshig brgyad kyis bya ba gcig sgrub pa ston pa ni byed pa'i tshig brgyad kyi lugs yin no/_/de bzhin du byed pa'i tshig drug dang bzhis bya ba re re ston pa yang byed pa'i tshig drug gi lugs dang bzhi'i lugs
[\[165b.3\]]yin no/_/de la tshig brgyad ni gang byed ces pa la sogs pa ste de la gang byed ces pa ni dang po'i byed pa'i dngos po'am don tsam gyi tshig yin te/_'di ltar 'bras chan 'tshed pa'i byed pa po lha sbyin yin pa dang 'dra bar nyon mongs skyed pa'i byed pa po tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa yin pa
[\[165b.4\]]dang /_lam skye ba'i byed ba po chos rgyu 'bras la yid ches lta ba dang /_rnam par shes pa skye ba'i byed pa po 'du byed sems pa yin pa lta bu ni dngos po ngo bo'i tshig ces bya'o/_/yang na gang 'tshed par byed na 'bras chan 'tshed par byed pa dang 'dra bar gang skyed par byed na nyon mongs pa dang lam
[\[165b.5\]]rnam par shes pa skyed par byed ces don gyi ngo bo tsam ston par byed pa ni dang po'i tshig ces bya'o/_/gang gis zhes bya ba ni dper na lha sbyin ni 'bras chan 'tshed par byed pa po dmigs 'dzin pa'am/_yang na gang zhig la 'tshed par byed na 'bras chan la 'tshed par byed ces las kyi
[\[165b.6\]]dmigs 'dzin par byed pa bzhin du tshul bzhin ma yin pa ni nyon mongs pa skyed par byed pa la sogs pa'am/_nyon mongs la byed ces pa la sogs pa ni gnyis pa dmigs 'dzin pa'i tshig ces bya'o/_/gang gis byed ces pa ni dper na mes 'tshed par byed pa dang 'dra bas ma rig pas nyon mongs
[\[165b.7\]]pa dang dad pas lam dang rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa lta bu ni gsum pa byed pa'i tshig ces bya'o/_/gang gi phyir byed ces pa ni/_dper na chos ston bya ba'i phyir 'bras 'tshed pa dang 'dra bar phung po'i phyir nyon mongs pa dang /_yon tan gyi phyir las dang yul la mi dmigs bar bya ba'i
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]phyir rnam par shes pa 'byung bar byed ces pa lta bu ni bzhi pa ched du bya ba'i tshig ces bya'o/_/gang las byed ces pa ni/_dper na 'bras las 'bras chan byed pa dang 'dra bar yul la g.yeng ba las nyon mongs pa dang /_shes rab rnam gsum las lam dang /_rgyu mthun pa'i bag
[\[166a.2\]]chags las rnam par shes pa 'byung zhes pa lta bu ni lnga pa 'byung gnas kyi tshig ces bya'o/_/gang gi byed ces pa ni/_dper na mchod sbyin gyi 'tshed par byed pa dang 'dra bar 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam dang /_mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes par byed ces ba lta bu ni drug pa
[\[166a.3\]]'brel pa'i tshig ces bya'o/_/gang na byed ces pa ni/_dper na tshang bang na 'tshed par byed pa dang 'dra bar nyon mongs pa thams cad ni nye bar len pa'i phung po la gnas te skye ba dang /_lam ni zag pa med pa'i phung po la gnas te skye ba lta bu ni bdun pa gnas gzhi'i tshig ces bya'o/_/gang zhes bya ba
[\[166a.4\]]byed ces pa ni/_dper na 'bras chan ni don gyi gzhi la tha snyad 'bras chan zhes ming du btags pa dang 'dra bar chos rnams kyi don gyi dngos gzhi la nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par shes pa dang lam la sogs pa ming gdags pa thams cad ni brgyad pa gdags pa'i tshig ces bya'o/_/byed pa'i
[\[166a.5\]]tshig drug gi lugs ni lha sbyin 'bras chan 'tshed pa dang /_mchod sbyin shing gcod pa la sogs pa dang po byed pa bsgyur ba'am ngo bo tsam ston pa'i tshig go/_/gang la byed ces pa ni gnyis pa las kyi tshig ste/_las su bya ba gang zhig las byed pa gzhan zhig yul du byas pa yin te/_shing
[\[166a.6\]]la byed ces pa lta bu'o/_/gang gis byed ces pa lta bu ni gsum pa byed pa'i tshig yin te sta res byed ces pa lta bu'o/_/gang gi byed ces pa ni bzhi pa dgos ched kyi tshig yin te ka ba'i phyir byed ces pa lta bu'o/_/gang las byed pa ni lnga pa rgyu'i tshig yin te shing las byed pa lta bu'o/_/de
[\[166a.7\]]dag kyang byed pa'i dus na las yin la/_bya ba dang sbyar na rgyu yin/_byas pa ni dgos ched yin no/_/gang na byed ces pa ni/_drug pa gnas gzhi'i tshig yin te/_yul dbus na byed ces pa lta bu'o/_/byed pa'i tshig bzhi'i lugs ni/_gang byed ces la ni byed pa po'am don tsam gyi tshig go/_/
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]gang las byed ces pa ni gnyis pa las kyi tshig go/_/gang gis byad ces pa ni gsum pa byed pa po'i tshig go/_/gang na byed ces pa ni bzhi pa gzhi'i tshig ste/_de dag kyang ngo bo brgyad pa dang mthun te grangs kyis phye ba'i tha dad pa'i lugs yin no/_/de dag ni skad kyi dbyings la bsgyur
[\[166b.2\]]ba'i lugs yin no zhes bya ba ni/_ti dan+ta'i lugs yin te/_bya ba gcig la tshang bar sbyor gyi/_ngo bo gcig gi sgra la mi sbyor bas bi b+hak+ta lta bu yin te/_bi b+hak+ta 'og nas 'chad pa lta bu yin no/_/ci'i phyir byed pa'i gnas zhes bya zhe na/_bya ba shin tu sgrub par byed pa kho nar
[\[166b.3\]]drang ba'i yan lag yin no/_/bsdu ba'i gnas kyi dbye ba dang ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir/_bsdu ba'i gnas ni brgyad de zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te/_de la 'bru mang po pa ni dbye ba'i gnas so/_/de la tshig 'bru gnyis don gzhan la 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni dper na ba khra mo can lta bu
[\[166b.4\]]dang /_ba dang khra mo gnyis kyi tshig gi don gyi bdag po yin pa lta bu'o/_/de'i dbye ba ni gsum ste/_de la rang gi ming dang ldan pa ni/_skyes bu rta can lta bu rang gi ming skyes bu dang rta gnyis kyi don ming can gyi bdag po yin pa lta bu'o/_/gzhan gyi ming dang ldan pa ni mda' gzhu can lta bu
[\[166b.5\]]phyogs kyi ming dang ldan pa ni/_shar dang lho'i bar la shar lho zhes pa lta bu'o/_/tshig mang po don gzhan la 'jug pa ni gsum ste/_de la grangs tsam dang ldan pa ni/_bcu dang nye ba ni nye bar bcu pa zhes pa'am/_yang na brgya rtsa brgyad lta bu'o/_/grangs ma yin pa dang ldan pa ni/_phyogs gang
[\[166b.6\]]na me tog pad+ma mang po yod pa de ni me tog pad+ma mang po can nam/_skyes bu gang la legs pa'i yon tan mang po yod pa ni yon tan phun sum tshogs pa can zhes pa lta bu'o/_/gcig la brten pas 'grub pa ni/_gang dang gang dag la gcig la gcig phan tshun gnod pa sgrub pa ste/_dper na lha sbyin
[\[166b.7\]]stobs 'gyed pa can zhes mtshungs pa thob pa lta bu yin no/_/sbyor ba'i bye brag gis phye bas drug yin te/_byed pa'i tshig drug gis bsgyur na bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur ro/_/drang ba'i gnas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]mu bzhis phye na brgya drug cu rtsa brgyad yin no/_/mu bzhi ni gzhi mthun pa gnyis/_gzhi tha dad pa
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]gnyis so/_/de la gzhi mthun pa ni lha sbyin rna ba 'phyang ba can nam/_skyes bu lus legs pa can lta bu thams cad mthun pa'am/_skyes bu rkang lag can lta bu tshig don rkang pa dang lag pa ni tha dad pa yis bstan pa'i ldan pas ni mthun pa gnyis so/_/gnyis tha
[\[167a.2\]]dad pa ni mda' gzhu dang skyes bu tha dad pa dang ba khra mo can lta bu ba dang khra mo gnyis ngo bo mthun la ldan pa dang tha dad pa gnyis so/_/des kun mthun pa dang kun mi mthun pa dang 'bru mang po pa mthun pa dang mi mthun pa dang /_'bru mang po tha dad pa dang /_mthun pa'i gzhi yin no/_/byed tshig drug gi las
[\[167a.3\]]dang byed pa dang /_ched dang /_rgyu dang /_'brel pa dang /_gzhi'i tshig go/_/de rnams ni tshig 'bru gzhan gyis don gzhan ston pa'i sbyor ba yin no zhes bya ba ni/_rang gi tshig gi don gyis bstan par bya ba gzhan ston pas rang gi tshig gi don gtso bo ma yin no zhes bya ba ston to/_/mdor bsdu
[\[167a.4\]]ba ni lnga ste zhes bya ba ni tshig bsdu ba lnga yin no/_/de la gnyis kyis mdor bsdu ba ni pha dang ma zhes zlas dbye ba'i tshig sdud pa lta bu'o/_/rnam grangs kyis mdor bsdu ba ni sa dang chu dang me dang rlung ni/_sa chu me rlung zhes zlas dbye ba'i tshig sdud pa lta bu'o/_/gzhan gyis don bsdus pa ni/_
[\[167a.5\]]rta khra bo dang ldan pa ni rta khra can zhes gzhan gyi tshig gi don bsdu ba lta bu'o/_/byed pa'i tshig drug gis mdor bsdus pa ni las la sogs pa'i tshig bsdus pa ste/_chos la spyod pa ni chos spyod ces las kyi tshig bsdus pa dang /_yon tan gyis 'thob pa ni yon tan 'thob ces byed pa'i
[\[167a.6\]]tshig bsdus pa dang /_mchod pa'i ched du btsugs pa'i sdong po ni mchod sdong zhes ched kyi tshig bsdus pa'o/_/shing las byung ba'i 'bras bu ni shing 'bras zhes rgyu'i tshig bsdus pa dang /_zas kyi bcud ni zas bcud ces 'brel pa'i tshig bsdus pa dang /_dka' ba la gnas pa ni dka'
[\[167a.7\]]gnas zhes gzhi'i tshig bsdus pa'o/_/khyad par gyis mdor bsdus pa ni sngon po yang de nyid ut+pa la yang de nyid yin pa ni ut+pa la sngon po gzhan spong ba'i tshig mdor bsdus pa'o/_/de rnams ni mdor bsdus pa tsam gyi sbyor ba yin zhes bya ba ni tshig gi don gyis bsdus pa gzhan las kyang
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]phyogs mthun no zhes pa'i don to/_/bye brag bsdu ba ni gnyis te/_de la tshig snga ma bye brag tu sbyor ba ni/_sngon po nyid ut+pa la zhes pa snga ma'i tshig gi don bye brag tu ston pa yin no/_/tshig phyi ma bye brag tu sbyor ba ni/_ut+pa la nyid sngon po zhes pa lta bu phyi ma'i tshig gi don bye brag tu ston pa yin
[\[167b.2\]]no/_/de dag ni dngos po kun spyi dang bye brag dang ldan pa'i phyir bye brag bsdus pa yin zhes pa ni/_spyi tsam ni khong du chud la/_bye brag ni khong du ma chud pa dag la spyir bye brag bsdus pas/_bye brag la the tshom za ba sel bar nus pa yin no/_/yan lag bsdu ba ni bzhi ste/_de la 'brel pa'i
[\[167b.3\]]yan lag bsdu ba ni gtso bo la 'brel pa'i yan lag bsdu ste/_lus la sogs pa'i dbang po lnga la zhes pa lta bu'o/_/go rims kyi yan lag bsdu ba ni/_mig la sogs pa'i dbang po zhes pa'am/_sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes pa lta bu'o/_/don gyi yan lag bsdu ba ni/_
[\[167b.4\]]don gyi dbang gis gtso bo'am/_skabs kyi dbang gis gtso bo yin pa'i yan lag bsdu ba ste/_shes rab la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta bu'am/_'khor lo la sogs pa'i rin po che zhes pa lta bu'o/_/grags pa'i yan lag bsdu ba ni/_'jig rten pa dang bstan bcos la grags pa gnyis te/_de la 'jig rten
[\[167b.5\]]la grags pa ni/_ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa'i tha snyad ces pa lta bu grags pa tsam gyi sa gtso bo yin pas so/_/bstan bcos la grags pa ni/_las la sogs pa'i byed pa'i tshig ces pa la sogs pa grags pa tsam gyis gtso bo yin pas yan lag bsdu ba yin no/_/de rnams dngos po kun gtso bo dang yan lag dang
[\[167b.6\]]ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni/_rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas gtso bo dang yan lag ldan pas so/_/gtso bo la sogs pas zhes pa ni gtso bo'i rjes su sogs pa'i tshig gis yan lag ji ltar rigs par sdud pa yin no/_/gzhi bsdu ba ni gnyis te/_de la rigs bsal ba'i bsdu ba ni/_rigs mi mthun pa tsam sel ba'i rjes su kun sdud
[\[167b.7\]]pa'i tshig smos pa ste/_chos thams cad dang chos mtha' dag dang zad par la sogs pa'o/_/rigs ma bsal ba'i bsdu ba ni ma lus pa la snyegs pa'i tshig ste/_thams cad zad par kun la sogs pa'o/_/de dag ni de gnyis kyi sgo nas kun sdud pa tsam byed pa'i sbyor ba yin no zhes pa ni chos thams cad kyi dngos po de sgra gnyis
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]kyi sgo nas kun sdud pa'i tshig yin no/_/gzhi gcig tu bsdu ba ni gnyis te/_de phyogs gcig tu byed pa'i bsdu ba ni/_'dus byas thams cad mi rtag par phyogs gcig tu byed pa lta bu'o/_/so so phyogs gcig tu byed pa ni 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas ni bdag med par phyogs gcig tu byed pa lta bu'o/_/
[\[168a.2\]]de dag ni gzhi bsdu ba'i phyogs su byas pa las zhes pa ni 'dus byas thams cad ces gzhi bsdu ba'i phyogs su byas pa las mi rtag go zhes mtshan nyid gcig tu bsdus pa'i sbyor ba yin no zhes pa'o/_/skyes bu'i bsdu ba ni gsum mo/_/las 'dzin pa'i bsdu ba ni/_chos rnams kyi ngo bo 'ga' la khyad par gyi gzhi dang
[\[168a.3\]]khyad par gyi yul du yang 'gyur ba ste ut+pa la yang de/_sngon po yang de yin pas ut+pa la sngon po zhes pa lta bu ste/_'di ni khyad par gyi gzhi la the tshom za ba sel ba yin te/_'di ltar gyi khyad par gyi chos ni/_khong du chud la khyad par gyi gzhi gang la yod pa khong du ma chud pa la sbyor bar byed pa yin no/_/las nyid
[\[168a.4\]]ni 'di gzhi yin la/_de 'dzin pa ni gtso bo yin no/_/las dang gtso bo gnyis kyi dbang du byas pas yan lag gtso bo'i phyir ro/_/ngo bo tha mi dad kyang de'i skyes bu yin no/_/ba gnyis pa'i bsdu ba ni/_mtshams sbyor ba la bsdus pa'i don dang /_rnam grangs yod pa ste/_phung po zhes bya ba'i don dang /_lnga zhes bya ba
[\[168a.5\]]grangs yod pa'i tshig la phung po lnga zhes tshig gnyis bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yin no/_/byed pa'i tshig gi bsdu ba ni/_don tsam gyi tshig dang /_dbye ba'i tshig dang /_ched gyi tshig dang /_rgyu'i tshig dang /_'brel pa'i tshig dang /_gzhi'i tshig dang /_dgag pa'i tshig go/_/de la dang po bsdu ba ni/_dper na shing yan lag rgyas pa ni shing rgyas pa
[\[168a.6\]]zhes pa lta bu'o/_/las la sogs pa bsdu ba ni byed pa'i tshig drug bsdu ba lta bur rig par bya'o/_/dag ga pa zhes bya ba ni/_'gegs pa'i tshig ste med pa dang ma yin par ro/_/de la med pa'i dgag pa ni/_dper na rgyal po med ces pa'i tshig don rgyal po med pa nyid don yin pa ste/_tshig gi gzhan zhig yod pa ni don ma yin no/_/
[\[168a.7\]]med pa de yang gtan med pa dang /_zhig nas med pa nyid khon yin gyi gtan ma yin no/_/ma yin par dgag pa ni tshig gi don yod pa zhig ste don yang dgag pa yin par ston pa dang /_zhig nas med pa nyid kho na yin par ston pa dang /_chung ba la sogs pa dang bral ba dang /_mi 'dra ba dang dman ba dag tu ston par byed pa yin no/_/de
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]dag kun yan lag gtso bor ston pas de'i skyes bu yin no/_/zlas bsdu ba ni gnyis so/_/de la mthun par bsdu ba ni/_mi rtag pa'i zlas sdug bsngal bsdu ba'o/_/mi mthun pa'i bsdu ba ni/_mi rtag pa'i zlas rtags bsdu ba lta bu'o/_/de dag gi ni gcig gi zlas gcig shes pa'i sbyor ba yin te/_kha cig tu zla nyid sdud/_kha cig tu sbyor
[\[168b.2\]]ba'i tshig sdud do/_/de dag gi tshig dang don sdud pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i gnas yin no/_/bsgyur ba'i gnas ni go sla'o/_/drang ba'i gnas ni mu bzhi ste/_yin ba dang ma yin pa dang /_gnyi ga yin pa dang gnyi ga ma yin pa dag las dngos po gcig la mu bzhir drang ba la chos gcig sgrub pa'i sgo nas yin pa 'grub po zhes bya ba ni/_dper na mi la
[\[168b.3\]]bde ba'i chos sgrub pa'i sgo nas bde ba yin par 'grub pa'o/_/shin tu bde ba'i chos dgag pa'i sgo nas ni sdug bsngal bde ba mang ba ma yin par 'grub po/_/de gnyi ga'i sgo nas ni gnyi ga yin pa 'grub pa ste bde ba yong pa'i sgo nas ni bde ba yang yin la/_mi bde ba yod pa'i sgo nas mi bde ba yang yin no/_/mu bzhi las gcig tu
[\[168b.4\]]drang ba ni gnyis so/_/de la ngo bo nyid kyi tshig dang ldan pa ni ma yin zhes pa dang /_mi ma yin zhes ngo bo sgrub pa dang dgag pa yin pas snga ma ni khyad par sgrub pa dang dgag pa yin pas ngo bo gcig la ldan no/_/khyad par gyi tshig dang ldan pa ni mi'i skyes bu lta bu'am ut+pa la sngon po lta bu la/_khyad par gzhi ut+pa la yin la/_khyad
[\[168b.5\]]par sngon po ma yin pa dang /_khyad par sngon po yin la/_khyad par gyi gzhi ut+pal ma yin ba dang /_gnyi ga ste ut+pa la yang yin la/_khyad par sngon po yang yin pa lta bu dang /_de gnyi ga ma yin pa bzhi las gcig yin pa'o/_/mu gsum pa la ni khyad par yin la/_khyad par gyi gzhi ma yin pa med do zhes bya ba ni dkar po yin la kha dog ma
[\[168b.6\]]yin pa med do zhes pa lta bu'o/_/mu gnyis pa la ni khyad par gyi gzhi yin la khyad par ma yin pa yang med do zhes pa ni'ang gi brjod pa ni snga ma sdud pa yin te/_bar mtshams shes pa lta bu ste/_bar yin la mtshams ma yin pa yang med la mtshams yin la bar ma yin pa yang med do/_/yi ge 'jug pa'i gnas ni brgyad de/_sgra dang
[\[168b.7\]]skad la sogs pa lta bu'o/_/de la brda ni ming dang ming zhes 'brel par byed pa ste/_sgra dang don gyi spyi'i rnam pa gzhan smra bar byed pa'i dus can gyi bdag nyid do zhes bya ba ni ming gi ka ba la sogs pa ni sgra rang gi mtshan nyid do/_/de 'brel par byed pa'i sgra dang /_don gyi spyi'i rnam pa na brda byed pa'i dus na don la dmigs shing sgra las
[\[169a\]]
