[\[228b.2\]]dang /_/bzod par dka' ba bzod byed dang /_/bkur dka' nyams su len pa dang /_/ring por blta zhing nges pa dang /_/'phral blo myur zhing sdug pa dang /_/khong sran che zhing dpa' ba dang /_/bslu bar mi tshugs gsang thub dang /_/chos kyis rgyal srid skyong dga' dang /_/dam chos mdzad la mi 'khor
[\[228b.3\]]ba/_/rin gyis 'jal yang mi pham gyis/_/thugs brtan mdzod la spyan sngar zhog_/khyod kyis blun dang phongs chos can/_/gzhung ngan gdong gang byed pa dang /_/brkam zhing byas pa mi gzo dang /_/kha gcam gtum po mi bzang ba/_/yul na'ang gnas sum stsal cig_/gal te gzhung lugs
[\[228b.4\]]bzang dgyes na/_/gong nas god du 'bar bar 'gyur/_/gal te ngan pa spyod mdzad na/_/'og nas 'og tu ltung bar 'gyur/_/khyu mchog dang ni khyus 'gro bzhin/_/khyod ni gya gyu la zhugs na/_/gya gyu kho na'i rjes 'brangs te/_/skye dgu khyod kyi rjes 'brangs pas/_/rgyal khams ngan par 'ong
[\[228b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/zla ba mar gyi ngo bzhin du/_/nyes pa'i tshogs rnams 'grib par mdzod/_/zla ba yar gyi ngo bzhin du/_/rgyal khams legs par rgyas par mdzod/_/dam chos bskyang ba'i khrims rnams mdzod/_/dam chos 'jig pa'i skye bo dang /_/bka' khrims 'dral ba'i ngan pa rnams/_/lo thog
[\[228b.6\]]rtsi thog rgyas pa la/_/thog dang ser ba bzhin du phob/_/'on dang ngan mig 'gag par 'gyur/_/le lo nyam bu shed ma mdzad/_/'chi bdag su dang mi bshes pa/_/glo bur dag tu 'bab 'gyur bas/_/sang dag bya zhes ma gzhes par/_/dam pa'i chos la smyur te mdzod/_/'chi bdag gis ni
[\[228b.7\]]drangs pa na/_/dge dang sdig pa ma gtogs pa/_/'gro ba thams cad phyir log nas/_/'ga' yang khyod rjes mi 'brang bas/_/mkhyen par mdzod la legs par spyod/_/slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyis/_/rgyal po bde spyod bzang po la/_/brdzangs pa'i 'phrin yig dag las kyang /_/
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]longs spyod g.yo ba snying po med mkhyen nas/_/dge slong bram za bkren dang bshes rnams la/_/sbyin pa tshul bzhin stsal bgyi pha rol tu/_/sbyin las gzhan pa'i gnyen mchog ma mchis so/_/khyod kyis dge slong bram ze la dang ni/_/mgron dang yab yum sras dang btsun
[\[229a.2\]]mo dang /_/'khor gyi slad du sdig pa mi bgyi ste/_/dmyal ba'i rnam smin skal nod 'ga' ma mchis/_/sdig pa'i las rnams spyad pa 'ga' yang ni/_/mtshon bzhin 'phral du lus la mi gcod kyang /_/gang du phyin pa'i sa phyogs de na sdod/_/thar pa dag la rag lus 'di la ni/_/gzhan gyis
[\[229a.3\]]grogs bgyir cir yang ma mchis kyis/_/de ltar nyid kya rtsal gyis 'bad par mdzod/_/tshe ni gnod mang rlung gis btab pa yi/_/chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag ste/_/dbugs rngub dbugs phyung gnyid kyis log pa las/_/sad khom gang lags de dag ngo mtshar che/_/lus mtha' thal ba mthar
[\[229a.4\]]skam mthar 'drul zhing /_/tha mar mi gtsang snying po ma mchis pa/_/rnam par 'jig dengs myags par 'gyur ba de/_/so sor gyes chos can du rig par mdzod/_/rgya mtsho gcig gnas gnya' shing bu ga dang /_/rus sbal phrad pa bas kyang dud 'gro las/_/mi nyid ches 'thob dka' bas mi dbang gis/_/
[\[229a.5\]]dam chos spyad pas de 'bras mchis par mdzod/_/gang zhig gser snod rin chen spras pa yi/_/snod du ngan skyugs phyag dar bgyid pa bas/_/gang zhig mi ru skyes nas sdig pa dag_/bgyid pa de ni ches rab blun pa lags/_/sras dang btsun mo yab yum 'khor rnams kyang /_/nges pa ma mchis las
[\[229a.6\]]kyi rlung dmar gyis/_/bdas pa tsam ste bdag tu bzung ba bas/_/pha ni bu nyid ma ni chung ma nyid/_/skye bo dgrar gyur pa yang bshes nyid dang /_/bzlog pa nyid du mchis pas de slad du/_/'khor ba dag na nges pa 'ga' ma mchis/_/thugs brtan ma mdzad 'di kun bslu ba'i bdud/_/bsnyengs dang
[\[229a.7\]]bral ba mang du gsol ci 'tshal/_/phan pa'i gdams ngag dam pa 'di lags te/_/khyod kyis thugs dul mdzod cig bcom ldan gyis/_/sems ni chos kyi rtsa ba lags par gsungs/_/rin po che'i phreng ba las kyang /_dam pa'i chos dang chos smra la/_/nyid kyis bkur sti mchog dang ni/_/gus
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]par mdzod de gdan las bzhengs/_/me tog gtor nas chos mnyan cing /_/chos kyi sbyin pa dag kyang mdzod/_/'jig rten gtam la dga' ma mdzad/_/'jig rten 'das la dgyes bar mdzod/_/'khor rnams zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir/_/lhun stug brtan dang nges par mdzad/_/bka' lung
[\[229b.2\]]mi 'gyur nges par gsungs/_/snyan khung mi yangs stug pa dang /_/bud med chags phyir 'phyar g.yeng dang /_/srab chos bus pa ltar ma mdzad/_/cung zad tsam gyis khrom mdzad/_/ji ltar rgyal srid bskyang ba dang /_/'bangs kun bde la 'god pa dang /_/bsngo ba'i dgra rnams gdul ba dang /_/rgyal
[\[229b.3\]]khams chos kyis bskyang bgyi ba/_/zhib tu dgongs nas grub par mdzod/_/'grub bam mi 'grub ma nges par/_/dgongs ma thag tu ma gsungs shig_/yun ji srid cig chos sgrub cing /_/ser sna 'jur 'gegs ma mdzad par/_/bdog pa thams cad gtugs te mdzod/_/khyod ni bdog pa
[\[229b.4\]]kun bor nas/_/gcig pu gshed gshegs 'tshal ba/_/chos kyi slad du spyad pa kun/_/khyod kyi mdun du 'ong ba nyid/_/'bangs la re ba ma 'jog par/_/zhal bzhugs tshe na myur bar mdzod/_/gtsug lag khang dag brtsig pa dang /_/mchod rten brtsig dang na bza' gsol/_/zhig
[\[229b.5\]]ral bcos dang mchod pa gzugs/_/lha khang la sogs gzhan bgyi ba/_/snga lugs bzhin du rgyas par mdzod/_/dam chos tshul bzhin spyod pa yi/_/dge slong dge bsnyen la sogs pa/_/gzhan gyis gtse ba med pa yi/_/dpung gnyen skyabs dang kha 'dzin mdzod/_/'di kun yun du bde ba
[\[229b.6\]]yi/_/mya ngan 'da' ba'i dge tshogs lags/_/bgres khar dgon par gshegs nas ni/_/mi ru 'khrungs pa'i don yod mdzod/_/blon po rnams dang las kyi sna/_/mnga' ris dbus mtha'i 'bangs rnams ni/_/dran pa can gyis bsgrubs byas pa/_/rnam pa mang po yod na yang /_/sngon gyi drang
[\[229b.7\]]srong mkhas rnams kyis/_/gdams ngag mdo tsam 'dir bstan gyis/_/bdud rtsi 'thung ba bzhin du slobs/_/gting nas khros shing 'khrugs gyur kyang /_/mdog mdangs ldan zhing 'dzum par smra/_/'khon gcugs che zhing sha chags kyang /_/phran tshigs khro gtum gnod mi byed/_/
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]dgra bo 'thab zlar gyur kyang 'phral tshul ci dgar 'drid/_/pha rol tshig ngan rdzogs kyang ngan du lan mi smra/_/bdag gi rgyab tu lta zhing lam sel thub thabs srang srub tshol/_/gnyen sbyar ran par tshol zhing so nam zhib mor sgrub/_/phaT ral rtsing dang gtum chos nga rgyal chung /_/
[\[230a.2\]]rnam smin med pa'i so nam yal bar bor nas ni/_/gzhan gyi nor la rtsis gdab chom rkun gzan btsal yang /_/pha ma'i nor dang drin chen dga' mdza'i nor/_/dkon mchog dkor dang lha klus dbang byas nor/_/nam du'ang mi spyod phongs chos khrel dor spang /_/bya'o cog la yid ring sran dang ldan/_/
[\[230a.3\]]rna khung ran par che zhing phra ma'i kha na lci/_/drin can pha khu ma dang gnyen bshes la/_/gsong des bkur sti rim gro bran ltar byed/_/byed dgu ran la tshod zin brtan par gzhung la mkhas/_/dogs pa'i don lam lus le lo med/_/gya tshom mi smra shes kyang ma bcol rang zhugs yong mi byed/_/
[\[230a.4\]]zin khar mi 'dor 'og nas sngar mi smra/_/lhag par khe mthong btsal glags yod kyang mi rigs 'dod chen yong mi byed/_/dbang dang tshan gyis thub kyang 'phyas gnon gzan mi tshol/_/nye zhes nye mgon mi byed ring zhes snyom las yong mi spyod/_/dbang sar phyin cing kun gyis bkur yang
[\[230a.5\]]mtha' dag sems bsrung bya/_/legs nyes bsam zhing srod dang tho rangs dge ba spyad/_/nga rgyal khengs sems mur cor smra dang rgyags chos med/_/tshan kar mi 'dor gzhan gyis brtsi sar yun rings sdod/_/phyi tshul mi 'chos nang gi g.yo sgyu med/_/gsong des mnyen dang gsal stug
[\[230a.6\]]'jam la ring /_/ngan la khyad du mi gsod zhe sa phangs med mnyam/_/phrag dog 'gran sems nor ngan gzhan la 'phya mi byed/_/bdag la rang bstod mi byed gzhan la mtshang mi 'bru/_/dpa' la sran che byed dgu mdzangs las slob/_/chang dang bud med dad dang khe brkam gcam bu'i las/_/nam
[\[230a.7\]]du'ang mi byed chung ma ngan pa'i khar mi gtang /_/yong ni 'phya la mi mkhas shing /_/byed du bcug na nor par rtsom/_/zhib tu dpyad de las rnams brtsam/_/mang po rnams ni kha bsdus la/_/ngan pa'ang khyad du mi gsod par/_/gros su byas dang 'gyod pa med/_/mdzangs ba rnams ni las su brko/_/
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]yul du gsar khung byung ba yin/_/dpa' bo rnams kyis 'thab sna drang /_/drang rgan rnams kyis mdun sa gzung /_/drang po rnams kyis zhal lce gcad/_/g.yog rnams 'khor gyis mel tse bsgrim/_/nyes na chad par na par gcad/_/ches na bus kyang mi bzod 'gyur/_/thog tu bab pa'i las
[\[230b.2\]]rnams bya/_/'on tang kun gyis bsngags par 'gyur/_/legs pa'i ngo 'phral sbyin pa yang /_/thog tu bab dang phrag dog med/_/nyes pa'i skyon yang mi 'phel lo/_/nyes pa ma legs byung na yang /_/mi ni gting nas yi mi gcad/_/phya nas chu gang dran par 'gyur/_/phyugs ni dus gcig
[\[230b.3\]]sun mi dbyung /_/'on dang lcags skyed che bar 'gyur/_/bran ni 'os shing rigs bkol dang /_/yun du snying ni nye bar 'gyur/_/bu tsha mkhas par bslab pa ni/_/gtan gyi srid du phyi phyir che/_/skyes pa mdzangs par gyur pa ni/_/nor du mkhas dang gtam snyan sgrub/_/bud med mdzangs par gyur
[\[230b.4\]]pa ni/_/khyo la sri zhu rim gro dang /_/rigs las bsgrubs pa'i bdog don dang /_/mi smra rna khung che ba dang /_/dgos pa'i mgron la yangs pa dang /_/skyes bu gzhan du mi tshol dang /_/bya ba rnams lam rmongs na/_/lkugs pa bzhin du 'dug kyang bla/_/zhes pa la sogs pa sngon gyi drang srong gis
[\[230b.5\]]gdams ngag mdo tsam bstan pa yang tshe 'di'i ched dang /_tshe phyi ma'i ched kyang gong du bstan pa bzhin byas la ngang drang na yun gyi srid chen po yang zhar la yod de/_rgyal pos drang por byas dang rgyal srid mi nyams che/_/blon pos drang por byas dad che btsan yun du rtag_/de yi gzhi las thar pa
[\[230b.6\]]thob par 'gyur/_/zhes 'byung /_gzhan dag las kyang /_rtsod pa med par chos smra ba ni mkhas pa'i rab/_/ji ltar ngan par glengs par gyur yang ma 'khrugs pa ni bdud kyi yul las 'das/rgyal po'i phrin las bya ba ni/_/gtso cher 'bangs kyi spu 'dam mo/_/blon po'i las su bya ba
[\[230b.7\]]ni/_/drang snyoms mi ni thabs kyis bcos/_/phyugs ni mig gis btsa' ba dang /_/nor ni dgos pa'i don dang sbyar/_/mo ni sman dang yul mi 'chor/_/skyid pa'i mtha' ni ring por 'gyur/_/dal gyis 'bab pa'i chu bo ni/_/yun du gzhung ni btsan par 'gyur/_/sprin ni hal hol can dag gis/_/
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]zhing pa dga' ba'i char mi phebs/_/mi ni khra khro can dag gis/_/dgos pa'i don ni shor bar 'gyur/_/dal bus song bas gang du'ang phyin/_/'jam par smras pas su yang go/_/bsrings nas bsgrubs pa ci yang 'grub/_/blon po rnams kyis bya ba'i mdo/_/khrims
[\[231a.2\]]su bcas pa brtan por bzung /_/bka' lung btsan zhing snyan par bsgrub/_/sgo phyed yal bar bor nas ni/_/gtso cher spyi ched srog dang bsngo/_/mna' ni gzan du mi bor zhing /_/'thams pa thams cad btsan par bya/_/dam chos bsrung la brtson pa dang /_/gtso cher yun gyi srid du ni/_/
[\[231a.3\]]dam chos spyod pa mchog yin no/_/zhes 'byung /_blon po gcig pur ma zad kyi/_/mi yi ris su skyes pa yi/_/glen lkugs 'on pa ma gtogs par/_/thams cad kun gyis de bzhin spyad/_/'on tang 'di dang phyi mar yang /_/bde ba phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/_/de dag gdams ngag
[\[231a.4\]]dam pa yin/_/da ni rab tu byung ba'i dge slong dang /_dge tshul dang /_dge slong ma la gdams ngag bya ba/_dang por rab tu ji ltar byung /_/sems thag bcad nas skra bregs shing /_/ston pa'i na bza' ngur smrig bgos/_/pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes la'ang /_/chags pa med pa'i tshul
[\[231a.5\]]byas pas/_/kun gyi mchod gnas yin pas na/_/'jig rten pa yis ma 'phyas pas/_/bslab pa 'di ltar rim bzhin bya/_/ston pa rkang gnyis gtso bo dang /_/'dod chags bral ba chos kyi gtso/_/'dus ba'i gtso ste dge 'dun la/_/gus par skyabs su mchi bar bgyi/_/slob
[\[231a.6\]]dpon mkhan po khrims dbang dang /_/phrin las mdzad pa'i dge 'dun la/_/gus par zhus te dge bsnyen dang /_/dge tshul dge slong bar slob dang /_/dge slong ma yi sdom pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa rnams/_/rim pa bzhin du mnos nas kyang /_/nyes byas med par bsrung
[\[231a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/maN+Dal chag chag phyag dar dang /_/zhu gnas bca' dang lhung bzed bkru/_/bla ma dge 'dun bgres pa yi/_/dgos pa'i yan lag thams cad bya/_/srod dang tho rangs thun gnyis la/_/mi nyal kha thon dge ba bya/_/'dri klog nyan 'dzin bsam pa dang /_/sgom dang bden pa bzhi
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]la bsam/_/de nas rim gyis brtson ldan par/_/bla ma mgu bar byas nas ni/_/phung po khams dang skye mched dang /_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i lugs/_/'dul ba mdo sde mngon pa rnams/_/theg pa kun las 'jam par bslab/_/kun gyi phul du phyin bya'i phyir/_/rig pa'i gnas lnga
[\[231b.2\]]dag dang ni/_/rig pa'i gnas ni bco brgyad la/_/thogs pa med par bslab par bya'o/_/bkur sti'i gnas su gyur nas kyang /_/nga rgyal khengs sems phrag dog spang /_/rang mthong sger bu'i las mi bya/_/kha nas smra ba'i tshig rnams dang /_/don du mthun par chos bzhin spyod/_/nga
[\[231b.3\]]mkhas gzhan ni mi shes zhesarka/_/kun la 'phya ba'i las mi brtsam/_/slob par 'dod pa'i gang zag rnams/_/ci la dga' bar bshad par bya'o/_/sngon gyi slob dpon drin can la/_/bkur sti rim gro bran bzhin bya'o/_/gtsor na snying rje brtser ldan zhing /_/tshad med bzhi yi go cha bgos/_/dus
[\[231b.4\]]ngan tha mar skyes pa yi/_/da lta'i dge slong rang mthong can/_/cung zad yon tan rnyed pa dang /_/khengs shing rang mthong gyong bu byed/_/mar gyis ko khengs bskus mnyes na/_/mi dul ba ni gcig kyang med/_/de bzhin chos kyi mar gyis kyang /_/mi shes ko khengs 'dra ba 'dul/_/grod skogs
[\[231b.5\]]mar dang lhan cig kyang /_/mnye btul ma byas gyong bur 'dug_/de bzhin chos kyi mar gyis bskus/_/shes bzhin dran pas ma mnyes na/_/chos mar bskus kyang gong bur 'dug_/mnyes pa bzhin du dul bar gyis/_/bslab pas mi ngoms mnyan par byos/_/mkhas pa rnams la dri ba phros/_/
[\[231b.6\]]che 'chos sa ni shor dogs par/_/thos pa mang po ma yin yang /_/'ga' tsam goms la'ang mnyen par byos/_/grogs po rnams la 'gran sems bor/_/rgan pa rnams ni rim par khur/_/gzhan la 'phya ba mi dgos kyis/_/rang nyid de ltar ma byed cig_/chos kyi spun dang bral nas ni/_/
[\[231b.7\]]mi chos gnyen la mnyes ma byed/_/sems can ngan mag ma skyed cig_/khyod kyis bya ba'i las min pa/_/chung ma blang dang bu tshang klag_/'khrug pa bya dang khe tshong bya/_/bre zol bya dang srang zol bya/_/sgyu ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'phyar dang rta gad rtsab hral dang /_/chos gos med par
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]grong rgyu dang /_/gzhan gyi chung ma bsten pa dang /_/srog chags gsad dang brdzun smra dang /_/chom rkun bya ba'i pho nya dang /_/phra ma mi dbyes la sogs pa/_/'chi bar bsams nas mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan shAkyas bka' stsal pa/_/nga yi bstan pa'i dam chos ni/_/mu stegs can gyis mi bshigs
[\[232a.2\]]te/_/seng ge'i khog pa ji bzhin du/_/nga yi slob mas gzhig par 'gyur/_/nga yi bstan pa dam chos ni/_/nan tan snying por byed pa yi/_/gang zag dge slong lag na gnas/_/bka' bzhin byed pa'i dge slong ni/_/'jigs pa med par ngas bshad de/_/dam pa'i chos 'jig ngan sna 'dren/_/ngan song gsum gyi 'jigs chen las/_
[\[232a.3\]]nams kyang thar par ngas ma gsungs/_/bdud kyi slu bas zin pa la/_/thar pa'i glags ni med 'gyur gyis/_/dang po'i dam bcas ji bzhin du/_/chos kyi klung du 'gro bar byos/_/bu smad 'dod pa'i sred pa dang /_/nams kyang gnas par ma byed cig_/gal te bu smad 'dod ces te/_/khyim pa'i dngos po byed ce na/_/dang po khyod ni
[\[232a.4\]]su yis bslus/_/dkon mchog gsum bslu ci yi phyir/_/slob dpon mkhan po ci la dgos/_/skye bo'i mchod gnas ci phyir bya/_/'dreg pa'i bye brag gsum yod de/_/sog po rnams ni bcos kyis 'dreg_/dud 'gro phal ni las kyis 'dreg_/dge 'dun rnams ni yon tan gyis/_/'dreg pa
[\[232a.5\]]yin na gang phyir bregs/_/ston pa'i na bza' chud re zos/_/na bza' chos gos 'o re brgyal/_/dang po 'dod chags bral zhe na/_/ci'i phyir da ni bu smad la/_/mi shes skye bo 'ju ba bzhin/_/khong nas gdung sems yod re che/_/'dod pa rnams la de bzhin 'dun/_/dang po'i dam bca' gang tsug song /_/de
[\[232a.6\]]yis mya ngan 'da' 'gyur ram/_/sdug bsngal grong khyer 'jig 'gyur ram/_/ji ltar bshang gci gsher ba la/_/ngan skyugs khyi phag chags pa ltar/_/de bzhin bshang gci gsher ba la/_/'dod ldan ban de phag ltar chags/_/bdag lus bud med mi gtsang par/_/da dung bar du
[\[232a.7\]]ma rtogs par/_/mi rtag sgyu ma'i bu smad la/_/yang dang yang du chags pa ni/_/mi gtsang don du khyi rnams bzhin/_/e ma'o gzu lum sa e ma'o blun/_/e ma'o skye bos khrel du rung /_/slob dpon mkhan po khrims dpang rnams/_/khyud skor los kyang mthong mi byed/_/chur ma'i gnyen la dge bshes
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]bzhin/_/skyo ba tsam du 'khor bar byed/_/des ci 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las/_/myur du rgal bar 'gyur zhe'am/_/ga sha khu ljo ma byas tsam/_/glegs bam thag pas khu ljo yi/_/dkri ba'i thag pa ma byas tsam/_/sku gzugs dar ma lha cha rnams/_/byi brun thigs pa du bas non/_/g.yang sa gtsang mar bskyal na rung /_/
[\[232b.2\]]gal te legs don ma yin yang /_/'bum la khyim par gyur yang ni/_/bde gshegs bslab pa dran byas nas/_/gnas khang so sor 'dug byas la/_/nyes pa bshags shing dge ba spyad/_/bslab la 'grus par brtson par bskyed/_/btsun pa rnams la bkur sti bya/_/rang skyon sba phyir mtshang mi 'bru/_/'on tang sdig
[\[232b.3\]]zhad 'bri la phan/_/sems la lta zhing don la sgom/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/dge slong ma yang ci yi phyir/_/dang po khas blangs dam bcas nas/_/sngar tshul bstan pa'i dge slong bzhin/_/legs par rab tu byung byas nas/_/rang bslus sdig pa'i khur bu drags/_/ston pa'i bka' ni khyad
[\[232b.4\]]du gsad/_/khyim pa skye bo'i 'og na nyal/_/dang po skra ni 'drag pa'i tshe/_/khyim bdag snying du mi sdug gam/_/pha ma sdang ngam mgo rgyan med/_/khyim thab mchis sam nyes skyon byung /_/ci yi phyir na tshul khrims dral/_/snying nas dam chos spyod ce na/_/las 'phro ngan cing blo zhan pas/_/mkhas pa'i phul du mi
[\[232b.5\]]'grub kyis/_/sems thag chod la btsun par sgrubs/_/klog dang don la brtson 'grus bskyed/_/skyes pa rnams la mi lta zhing /_/rang gi gnas khang dag tu 'dug_/thos pa bsags na nam zha yi/_/chos kyi gter ni gzung bar 'gyur/_/bya byed dag la yong ma 'jug_/de dag tsam ni theg tshad yin/_/da 'di man chad
[\[232b.6\]]ni/_spyir dge ba spyad cang sdig pa spang bar gdams ngag byed/_de yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i nang nas mdo tsam bstan pa/_dal 'byor 'di ni rnyed par shin tu dka'/_/skyes bus don grub thob par gyur pa la/_/gal te 'di la phan pa ma bsgrubs na/_/phyis 'di yang dag 'byor par ga la 'gyur/_/
[\[232b.7\]]bdag gi 'byor pa drug gzhan gyi 'byor pa bdun te bcu gsum mo/_/de la bdag gi 'byor pa drug la/_yul gyi dbus su skyes pa dang /_dbang po tshang ba dang /_gnas la dad par gyur pa dang /_smon lam dag pas sdig pa'i grogs po dang ma phrad pa dang /_las kyi mtha' ma log pa dang /_lta ba ngan pas mi 'phrogs pa'o/_/gzhan
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]gyi 'byor pa la/_sangs rgyas 'jig rten byung ba dang /_dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang /_bstan pa gnas pa dang /_chos kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i grogs po zang zing la mi lta ba dang phrad pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gzhan gyi don du snying rje chen po dang phrad pa dang /_chos byed pa la
[\[233a.2\]]byams pa'i grong khyer du nye bar skyes pa dang /_rgyal po chos bzhin byed pa'i yul du skyes pa'o/_/ji ltar mtshan mo'i mun nag sprin rum nas/_/glog 'gyus skad cig bar snang ston pa ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas mthus kyang brgya lam na/_/'jig rten bsod nams blo gros thang 'ga' 'byung /_/de ltar dge ba nyam
[\[233a.3\]]chung nyid la rtag_/sdig pa stobs chen shin tu mi bzad pa/_/de ni rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems min pa/_/dge gzhan gang gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_/sdug bsngal 'dor 'dod sems yod kyang /_/sdug bsngal nyid la mngon par rgyug_/bde ba 'dod kyang gti mug pas/_/rang gi bde ba dgra ltar
[\[233a.4\]]'joms/_/yid brtan mi rung 'chi bdag 'di/_/byas dang ma byas mi sdod pas/_/na dang mi na kun gyis kyang /_/glo bur tshe la yid mi brtan/_/thams cad bor te chas dgos par/_/bdag gis de ltar ma shes nas/_/mdza' dang mi mdza'i don gyi phyir/_/sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs byas/_/mi mdza' rnams kyang
[\[233a.5\]]med 'gyur zhing /_/mdza' ba rnams kyang med par 'gyur/_/bdag kyang med par 'gyur ba nyid/_/de bzhin thams cad med par 'gyur/_/rmi lam nyams su myong ba bzhin/_/re zhig gson tshe 'di nyid la/_/mdza' dang mi mdza' du ma 'das/_/de dag don du byas pa'i sdig_/mi bzad gang yin mngon na
[\[233a.6\]]gnas/_/de ltar bdag ni glo bur zhes/_/bdag gis rtogs par ma gyur pas/_/gti mug chags dang zhe sdang gis/_/sdig pa rnam pa du ma byas/_/nyin mtshan sdod pa yong med par/_/tshe 'di rtag tu 'god 'gyur zhing /_/snon pa gud nas 'ong med na/_/bdag lta 'chi bar cis mi 'gyur/_/bdag ni ma lan
[\[233a.7\]]'dug bzhin du/_/gnyen bshes mang pos mtha' bskor yang /_/srog gcod pa yi tshor bdag_/bdag nyid gcig pus myong bar 'gyur/_/gshin rje'i pho nyas zin pa la/_/gnyen pas ci phan bshes ci phan/_/de tshe bsod nams gcig skyabs na/_/de yang bdag gis ma bsten to/_/'jigs pa 'di 'dra
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]ma 'tshal nas/_/mi rtag tshe 'di'i ched dag tu/_/sdig pa mang po nye bar bsgrubs/_/de ltar 'jigs chen yod pas na/_/dge bshes bsten la bsod nams byos/_/gnyen dang bshes rnams rnam spangs nas/_/gcig pu ga shed 'gro dgos na/_/mdza' dang mi mdza' kun cir rung /_/mi dge ba las sdug
[\[233b.2\]]bsngal 'byung /_/de las ji ltar nges thar zhes/_/nyin mtshan rtag tu bdag gis ni/_/de nyid rtag tu bsam par rigs/_/da ni bdag gis ci nas kyang /_/mi ru skyes pa'i don yod bya/_/long bas phyag dar phung po las/_/ji ltar rin chen rnyed pa ltar/_/de bzhin ji zhig ltar stes nas/_/byang chub sems ni bdag la
[\[233b.3\]]skyes/_/blo 'dir rab tu shugs dbyung ngo /_/ding nas brtson pa ma byas na/_/'og nas 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la phan mdzad pa'i/_/sangs rgyas grangs med 'das gyur kyang /_/bdag ni rang gis nyes pa de'i/_/gso ba'i spyod yul ma gyur to/_/da dung de bzhin bdag byed na/_/ngan 'gro ngan dang
[\[233b.4\]]'chi ba dang /_/sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba dang /_/dad dang mi lus thob pa dang /_/dge goms rung ba de lta bur/_/dkon pa nam zhig thob par 'gyur/_/nad med nyi ma 'di lta bur/_/zas bcas 'tshe ba med kyang ni/_/tshe ni skad cig slu ba ste/_/lus ni thang cig brnyan po
[\[233b.5\]]bzhin/_/bdag gi spyod pa 'di 'dras ni/_/mi lus phyis ni thob mi 'gyur/_/mi lus thob par ma gyur na/_/sdig pa 'ba' zhig dge ba med/_/gang tshe dge spyad skal ldan yang /_/dge ba bdag gis ma byas na/_/ngan song sdug bsngal kun rmongs pa/_/de tshe bdag gis ci byar yod/_/dge ba dag kyang ma byas la/_/sdig
[\[233b.6\]]pa dag ni cher bsags na/_/bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni/_/bde 'gro'i sgra yang thos mi 'gyur/_/don med dgra yis rma srol btod pa yang /_/lus la rgyan dang 'dra bar srel byed na/_/don chen sgrub phyir yang dag brtson gyur la/_/bdag la sdug bsngal ci'i phyir gnod byed yin/_/nya pa zhing pa gdol ba la sogs pa/_/
[\[233b.7\]]rang gi 'tsho ba tsam zhig sems pa yang /_/grang dang tsha la sogs pa gnod bzod na/_/yun gyi bde phyir bdag lta ci zhig smos/_/de phyir sdig ni sems las byung bas na/_/bslab pa bsrung bar 'dod pa yis/_/rab tu bsgrims te sems gdul te/_/sems 'di gdul ba ma byas na/_/bslab pa bsrung bar yong mi
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]nus/_/sems kyi glang po yan btang bas/_/mnar med gnod pa byed pa ltar/_/glang chen ma dul myos pa yis/_/'di na de 'dra'i gnod mi byed/_/kun nas dran pa'i thag pa yis/_/sems kyi glang po dam btags na/_/'jigs pa thams cad med par 'gyur/_/dge ba thams cad lag
[\[234a.2\]]tu 'ong /_/sems 'di kho na thul ba yis/_/gnod byed thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur/_/sems can mi srun nam mkha' bzhin/_/de dag gzhom gyis ga la lang /_/khro ba'i sems ni gcig bcom na/_/dgra de thams cad choms dang 'dra/_/sa stengs 'di kun kos g.yog tu/_/de snyed ko ba ga la yod/_/
[\[234a.3\]]rkang mthil gang gi ko bas ni/_/sa stengs thams cad g.yogs dang 'dra/_/de phyir phyi rol dngos po yang /_/bdag gis phyir bzlog mi lang gis/_/bdag gi sems 'di phyir bzlog bya'i/_/gzhan rnams bzlog go ci zhig dgos/_/gang gis chos kyi don po mchog_/sems kyi gsang 'di ma shes na/_/
[\[234a.4\]]bde 'dod sdug bsngal gzhom 'dod kyang /_/de dag don med gyi na 'khyam/_/de ltar bdag gi sems 'di ni/_/legs gzung legs par rtogs par bya/_/sems bsrung brtul zhugs ma gtogs pa/_/brtul zhugs mang pos ci zhig bya/_/ma grangs grol ba'i khrod gnas na/_/bsgrims te rma yi
[\[234a.5\]]bag byed bzhin/_/skye bo ngan khrod gnas pas kyang /_/sems kyi rma ni rtag tu bsrung /_/sems rma rtag tu bsrung ba yang /_/bla ma dang ni 'grogs pa las/_/mkhas pas rjes su bstan pa dang /_/'jigs pas skal ldan gus byed la/_/dran pa shin tu skye bar 'gyur/_/de phyir dge bshes mkhas pa bsten/_/
[\[234a.6\]]don med g.yeng bar lta ba ni/_/ban des nam yang mi bya ste/_/skye bo mdzangs pa'ang de bzhin spyod/_/gang zhig mig lam 'ongs na yang /_/bltas nas legs par mgu bar bya/_/dgos na thag ring dag tu'ang lta/_/gang zhig bsams nas byar brtsams pa/_/de las gzhan du mi bsam ste/_/der gtad pa yi bsam pa
[\[234a.7\]]yis/_/de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya/_/de ltar na ni kun 'grub 'gyur/_/gzhan du gnyis kar mi 'grub po/_/khyi ni cung peng snyeg pa dang /_/lha khang bar gyi khyi bzhin du/_/dran drod thams cad mi bya'o/_/ring zhig lon nas dal ba'i mchog_/rnyed pa yang dang yang bsams nas/_/dge slong yin na 'khor g.yog dang /_/drung du
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]'ongs pa'i lha mi rnams/_/thams cad dge la gzud par bya/_/khyim pa yin na'ang bu dag dang /_/chung ma pha ma gnyen 'dun rnams/_/gros btab thams cad dge la gzung /_/'on tang byang chub spyod pa rdzogs/_/bran g.yog bkol du mi btub pa/_/zas la sogs pa mi sbyin ltar/_/dge ba mi byed lus 'di la/_/
[\[234b.2\]]bsnyod kyang de'u re gzhan 'gro la/_/sdig lus bsnyod cing gos bskon yang /_/phan med sdig byed ji ste gso/_/khyod ma 'grangs pas phung 'og bcug_/khyod 'grangs pas na phung mgo btsugs/_/dkon mchog pha ma dga' mdza' dang /_/drin yod drin med rnams kyi nor/_/sgyus brkus mthus phrogs
[\[234b.3\]]thabs kyis bslus/_/ma 'grangs ma g.yogs sdig lus khyad/_/mjug tu 'bu sbrang nyod par song /_/khyod ma sos pas dmyal bar btang /_/bsad pa'i sdig pa khyod las byung /_/khyod ma mgu bas 'phrog rlom byas/_/yi dgas gnas su khyod kyis btang /_/khyod ma sos pas long chung ste/_/dge bshes
[\[234b.4\]]ma bsten chos ma nyan/_/des na dud 'gro blun por gyur/_/gtan du 'khyams pa khyod kyis nyes/_/khyod ni dge ba spyod gyur na/_/rin chen phung po phangs pa'i gtso/_/khyod la brten nas sangs rgyas chos/_/'bras bu bla med byang chub dang /_/bar du'ang bde 'gro skyid pa ni/_/long btags don yod byed pas na/_/'gro
[\[234b.5\]]dang 'ong pa'i rten tsam du/_/lus la gru yi blo zhog ste/_/'di la gla rngan byin nas ni/_/da ni rang gi don byed chug_/rmongs pa'i sems khyod ci zhig zer/_/gzugs su 'dzin pa khyod rang yin/_/lus su lta ba khyod rang yin/_/don med shes pa gzhan nas 'ongs/_/'byung bas bsgrubs pa'i khu khrag la/_/khyod
[\[234b.6\]]kyis ngar 'dzin byas nas ni/_/bu dang bu mor khyod kyis bzung /_/gzhan gyis 'byung ba'i khu khrag la/_/gzhan zhes dgra ru lta bar byed/_/sdig pas bsgrubs pa'i zang zing la/_/gzhan gyis khyer snyam phrag dog langs/_/don med byis pa'i spyod pa 'dra/_/khyed kyis shes na de min pa'i/_/bzang po'i dpal ta re yod na/_/de
[\[234b.7\]]las ma shes ci byar yod/_/nga yi nyes pa ci yang med/_/nyes pa thams cad khyod las byung /_/khyod kyis rtsa ya kun bcom na/_/gang du 'gro ba kho bos lta/_/khyod kyis ngar 'dzin ma byas na/_/nga ni 'byung ba'i bag la zha/_/nga ma gso bar khyed bder sgrubs/_/skyon can khyod kyi nyes pa kun/_/dran drod ma smra so sor 'dug_/khyod la
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]gsol bag ci ma lus/_/gzhan yang tshigs su bcad pa la/_/deng bya sang bya le lo phyi shol gyis/_/sngon 'das du sa nas da srid 'gyangs pas chog_/'chi bdag dgra dang bang bya brtod nas ni/_/bka' bsngos myur te bya ba'i mi rigs sam/_/skra dkar skyes shing gnyer ma'i tshogs bgrangs kyang /_/
[\[235a.2\]]byis pa sheng ma bye dang 'dra ba ni/_/don la mkhas pas brtags na snying re rje/_/gzhan yang /_bskal pa stong du bsags pa yi/_/sbyin dang bde gshegs mchod la sogs/_/legs spyad gang yin thams cad kyang /_/khong khro gcig gis 'joms par byed/_/zhe sdang lta bu'i sdig pa med/_/bzod pa lta bu'i
[\[235a.3\]]dka' thub med/_/de bas bzod la nan tan du/_/sna tshogs tshul bzhin bsgom par bya/_/zhe sdang zug rngu'i sems 'chang na/_/yid ni bde ba'i nyams mi myong /_/sgyu mar bsams nas bzod pa bsgoms/_/gal te bcos su yod na ni/_/de la mi dga' byar yang med/_/'on te bcos su med na yang /_/de la mi dga' byas ci phan/_/
[\[235a.4\]]la la bdag gi khrag mthong na/_/phyir zhing khong dgrar 'gyur ba'ang yod/_/la la gzhan gyi khrag mthong na/_/'bog cing brgyal bar 'gyur ba'ang yod/_/de ni sems kyi ngang brtan dang /_/sdar ma'i tshul las gyur pa yin/_/de bzhin dge ba bsgrub pa yang /_/sems thag gcad dam mi gcad zan/_/khyim dang 'bral
[\[235a.5\]]bar mi nus dang /_/so nam yal bar dogs pa dang /_/dam chos bsgrub par bsam pa dang /_/yun gyi bde ba bsgrub pa ni/_/gnyis ka yong ye 'grub mi 'gyur/_/sbyin pa gtang bar bya ba dang /_/zad par dogs pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/dpa' bo bya bar bsam pa dang /_/shi bar dogs pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/mang po
[\[235a.6\]]dga' bar bya ba dang /_/khro gtum bya ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/bslab la 'grus par bya ba dang /_/zang zing btsal ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/btsun pa'i phul du byung ba dang /_/yul la chags pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/kun gyis bkur bar 'dod pa dang /_/spyod lam ngan pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/rgyal po mnyes par bya ba dang /_
[\[235a.7\]]khyim na nyal ba gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya ba dang /_/sdig pa spyad pa gnyis mi 'phrugs/_/de bzhin gang zhig sgrub na yang /_/sems thag gcod par byed par bya/_/'on tang dgos pa thams cad 'grub/_/'jig rten mgon pos de skad gsungs/_/mdo sde rnams las bslab pa snang /_/rtag tu mdo sde
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]blta bar bya'o/_/de dag gang zhig sgrub na bde/_/rlung med g.yo ba'ang med pa bzhin/_/bsod nams brtson 'grus med mi 'gyur/_/sgyid lug snyom pa'i stobs bcom ste/_/nyin mtshan phyed par bsgrub par bya'o/_/des na 'bras bu med mi srid/_/srid pa'i rgya mtsho rgal ba dang /_/'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi/_/dgos
[\[235b.2\]]pa ma lus bos pa bzhin/_/sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa/_/rgyal bas kyang ni mi mgu na/_/bdag 'dra ngan pas ci zhig smos/_/de bas 'jig rten bsam pa btang /_/sems can rnyed pa med la smod/_/rnyed pa can la mi snyan brjod/_/rang bzhin 'grogs dka' de dag gis/_/dga' ba ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/_/des na dben
[\[235b.3\]]par gnas par bya'o/_/bdag gis mkhas pa'i rjes bsnyags la/_/bag yod gdams ngag dran byas te/_/gnyid dang rmugs pa bzlog par bya/_/rgyal sras thugs rje chen po ltar/_/rigs pa'i sran du gzugs bya ste/_/byis pa'i spyod pa btang byas nas/_/mdor na bdag dang gzhan rnams la/_/phan
[\[235b.4\]]pa 'ba' zhig lhur bya'o/_/de ltar gdams ngag byas nas kyang /_/bdag gis spyad par ma grub cing /_/nyams kyis lcogs par ma gyur na/_/tshe rabs kun du phan pa yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas gsungs/_/sdig pa thams cad zad byed cing /_/dge ba ma lus rdzogs byed pa/_/'di dag brjod pa'i
[\[235b.5\]]bsod nams gang /_/gal te de la gzugs yod gyur/_/gang gA'i bye ma snyed kyi ni/_/'jig rten khams su shong mi 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu 'di/_/gtsug lag khang ngam mchod khang ngam/_/mchod rten sku gzugs spyan snga'am/_/gzhan du'ang rung ste 'di skad brjod/_/nyin mtshan lan ni gsum gsum
[\[235b.6\]]brjod/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang /_/sgo gsum btud de skyabs su mchi'o/_/mchod 'os rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdig pa'i las las bzlog bgyid cing /_/bsod nams thams cad yongs su gzung /_/lus can rnams kyi bsod nams dag_/kun la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bdag ni
[\[235b.7\]]spyis btud thal sbyar te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor slad dang /_/'gro gnas rab tu bzhugs slad du/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la gsol/_/de ltar bgyis pa'i bsod nams dang /_/bdag gis bgyis dang ma bgyis gang /_/des ni sems can thams cad kyang /_/bla med byang chub sems ldan shog_/sems can thams cad dri med
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dbang /_/yongs rdzogs mi khom kun 'das shing /_/spyod pa rang dbang yod pa dang /_/'tsho ba bzang dang ldan par shog_/lus can dag ni thams cad kyang /_/lag na rin chen nyid ldan zhing /_/yo byad thams cad mtha' yas pa/_/'khor ba ji srid mi zad shog_/bud med thams cad rnam kun du/_/
[\[236a.2\]]phan tshun phrag dog 'gran sems dang /_/rang bzhin bzang por skyes gyur nas/_/skyes mchog nyid du 'gyur bar shog_/lus can thams cad rig pa dang /_/rkang par ldan pa nyid du shog_/lus can kha dog ldan pa dang /_/gzugs bzang gzi brjid che ba dang /_/blta na sdug cing nad med dang /_/stobs can tshe dang ldan
[\[236a.3\]]par shog_/thams cad thabs la mkhas gyur te/_/sdug bsngal kun las thar ba dang /_/dkon mchog gsum la gzhol ba dang /_/dmu rgod mi nag med par shog_/gtsug lag khang dang dben gnas kyi/_/gnas dang nye bar gnas par shog_/sangs rgyas chos nor ldan pa dang /_/tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa dang /_/
[\[236a.4\]]pha rol phyin drug ldan par shog_/tshogs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs te/_/mtshan dang dpe byad gsal ba dang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab sa bcu dag_/rgyun mi 'chad par bgrod par shog_/bdag kyang yon tan de dag dang /_/gzhan kun gyis kyang rgyan ldan te/_/nyes pa'i skyon las grol ba dang /_/sems can kun
[\[236a.5\]]mchog byams pa dang /_/sems can thams cad yid re ba'i/_/bde ba thams cad rdzogs byed cing /_/rtag tu lus can thams cad kyi/_/sdug bsngal sel bar byed par shog_/'jig rten kun na skye bo gang /_/su dag 'jigs pas nyen pa rnams/_/bdag gi ming tsam thos pas kyang /_/shin tu 'jigs pa med
[\[236a.6\]]par shog_/bdag ni mthong dang dran pa dang /_/ming tsam thos pas skye bo rnams/_/rab tu 'khrug med rnal ma dang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pa rnams/_/tshe rabs kun du rjes 'brangs pa'i/_/mngon shes lnga po thob par shog_/sems can kun la rnam kun du/_/rtag tu phan bde byed par shog_/'jig rten kun na skye bo
[\[236a.7\]]gang /_/sdig pa byed par 'dod gyur ba/_/de dag thams cad gnod med par/_/rtag tu cig car zlog gyur cig_/sa dang chu dang me dang rlung /_/sman dang dgon pa'i shing bzhin du/_/rtag tu sems can thams cad kyis/_/rang dgar dgag med spyod par shog_/sems can la bdag srog bzhin phangs/_/de dag bdag la ches
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]phangs shog_/bdag la de dag sdig smin cing /_/bdag dge ma lus der smin shog_/ji srid sems can 'ga' zhig kyang /_/gang na ma grol de srid du/_/de phyir bla na med pa yi/_/byang chub thob kyang gnas gyur cig_/bdag ni dge slong dpal dbyangs kyis/_/gces pa'i phreng ba las bsdus pa'i/_/gdams
[\[236b.2\]]ngag brtsam par byas pa yis/_/gdams ngag 'di ni sus thos pa/_/gdams pa'i rjes su spyod gyur nas/_/byang chub myur du thob par shog_/bod la dge slong ming yang med pa las/_rje byang chub sems dpa' khri srong lde btsan gyis dam pa'i chos brnyes nas dpal lha btsan po dad pa bskyed de/_rab tu byung
[\[236b.3\]]ba'i ming dpal dbyangs zhes bgyi/_btsun pa'i phul du phyin/_mdzangs pa'i zhi rab tu phyin/_/bod kyi mdun sar bsres na dpe zla med pa des mdzad de/_/btsan po la bka' gros dag gsol ba las/_la la ni gnang /_la la ni ma gnang bas 'khon nas gyed de lhor bzhud/_gdams ngag 'di slar rje
[\[236b.4\]]blon dang /_ser chags yongs dang /_bod rje 'bangs la brdzangs pa lags so/_/mjug 'khon pas legs te/_btsun pas ni bzang po'i spyod pa 'grub/_/bod rje 'bangs ni grogs kyis dma' zhes gda'o/_/gdams ngag gces pa bsdus pa'i 'phrin yig btsun pa dpal dbyangs kyi sa sngon nas las kyis
[\[236b.5\]]'brel cing bshes par gyur pa bod rje 'bangs la brdzangs pa rdzogs so//_//[{D4356}]@/_lta ba'i rim pa bshad pa bzhugs/_/@##/_pad+ma'i spyan la phyag 'tshal nas/_/lta ba'i rim pa bshad par bya/_/'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das/_/gser gyi rdzas ltar gcig las snang /_/rnam
[\[236b.6\]]grangs snang ba lnga gsum gnyis/_/shes nas gzhag dang blang bar bya/_/thams cad byang chub snying po'i klong /_/pad+ma 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin la/_/rang gi rtog rnyog ri bos mnan/_/rang rgyud rkyen gyis log snang ba/_/skye bo pa dang mu stegs pa/_/drug dang rtag chad snang bar byung /_/dmus long tshul gyur
[\[236b.7\]]skye bo yang /_/mtho yor mi ltar brtags snang ba/_/dmyal ba'i rang sems mi sogs snang /_/yi dgas sdig sems mi gtsang yul/_/byol song gyen thur ngam grog snang /_/mi la mthong yul 'di nyid snang /_/de bzhin lha min go mtshon snang /_/lha yi dge sems rin chen snang /_/ci yang snang phyir mthong mi bden/_/
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]skye bo rtog pas phrogs pa yi/_/rnam 'phrul phyi nang lta bur snang /_/brtags pa brda yi tha snyad shar/_/rkyen gyis log tshul mu stegs pa/_/khrid byed drug gi bstan pas bslus/_/mdo bsdus mu stegs chad pa la/_/glo bur tsam snang mtha' med lta/_/rtag pa byas snang dngos por 'dod/_/de yang rgyu min
[\[237a.2\]]rgyur smra ba/_/rang bzhin rgyur 'dod dbang phyug rgyu/_/ngo bo nyid la rgyur smra dang /_/rdul phran rgyu ru 'dod pa dang /_/byed po rgyu ru 'dod pa log_/gzhan yang mu stegs zhar byung la/_/phyi rol ba dang yang dag pa/_/gsang sngags pa dang gsang chen pa/_/gnyis gsum lnga rnams rgyu yi tshul/_/gsum gnyis 'bras bu'i tshul
[\[237a.3\]]snang ba/_/bdag tu 'dzin pa bzhi la lta/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i lta ba yang /_/cig shos lta ba las 'phags pa/_/nyan thos rang rgyal mdo sde dang /_/kr-i ya u pa yang dag dang /_/de bzhin yo ga'i theg pa dang /_/ma hA yo ga'i theg pa dang /_/a nu yo ga'i theg pa dang /_/a ti yo ga'i theg pa dang /_/chos tsam lta ba'i nyan thos
[\[237a.4\]]pas/_/mdo sde pa dang bye brag gnyis/_/phyi rol yul la rtsod byed cing /_/shes pa skad cig snang bar mthun/_/de bzhin rang rgyal theg pa pa/_/phyi rol bcu gnyis sgyu ma tsam/_/rdul yang phyogs chas ma grub 'phags/_/shes pa skad cig snang dang mthun/_/mtshan nyid theg pa'ang rnam pa gsum/_/rnam rig pa dang rnal 'byor pa/_/de
[\[237a.5\]]bzhin mdo sde dbu ma pa'o/_/rnam rig phyi rol mtho yor mi/_/srab mo rta ltar med bzhin du/_/rang gi rnam shes 'khrul snang 'dod/_/don dam ye shes skad cig 'dod/_/rnal 'byor dbu ma kun rdzob mthun/_/don dam stong pa ma skyes 'dod/_/mdo sde kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam/_/yul rnams log nas snang bar lta/_/dam par mtha' gnyis
[\[237a.6\]]bral ba yis/_/dbu ma chen por 'dod pa'o/_/kr-i yas don dam chos nyid lta/_/kun rdzob rang rig yon tan lta/_/rigs gsum dkyil 'khor snang ba la/_/skye bos 'khrul pa med par 'dod/_/gnyis ka rgyud kyi spyod pa ni/_/lta spyod gong 'og rjes su mthun/_/yo ga'i don dam rnam dag pa'i/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes su/_/rtogs
[\[237a.7\]]pa'i byin rlabs lhar snang la/_/skye bos 'di dag lhar mthong 'khrul/_/ma hA yo ga'i don dam du/_/rang gnyis med de de bzhin nyid/_/rtogs pa'i cho 'phrul drug sogs pa'i/_/ltar snang ngang la 'khor ba med/_/a nu yo gas don dam du/_/bde chen rtogs pas rig pa'i rtsal/_/kun rdzob lha yi dkyil 'khor snang /_/de phyir skye bos brtags
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]pa 'khru la/_/a ti yo ga'i bden gnyis bral/_/thams cad rang byung rang snang ba'i/_/ye shes mtha' dbus bral ba la/_/brtags pa gnyis po gdod nas med/_/de phyir gser la gser mthong ltar/_/ji bzhin ma nor bden mthong yin/_/mnyam nyid rang bzhin ma nges pas/_/ji ltar bltas pa der snang phyir/_/dngos po rtag pa
[\[237b.2\]]yod min te/_/yod na kun la mthun snang phyir/_/de phyir rang sems ngo bor snang /_/brtags pa gcig yul gcig min pas/_/'khrul pa snang bar the tshom med/_/des na spyod yul gdod nas med/_/rtog sems 'gro ba so so'i sems/_/gcig na dge sdig rnam smin yang /_/ma spyad kun gyis myong bar rigs/_/de min yang dag don mi
[\[237b.3\]]rung /_/rnam smin thun mong ma gyur phyir/_/gcig min de nyid ma skyes pas/_/tha dad don du'ang mi rung ste/_/gcig dang tha dad las grol ba'o/_/dngos po sna tshogs brtags pa yi/_/ming la grub pa'i gtan tshigs med/_/de phyir mtshan nyid ci yang min/_/ma grub pa la yod rtogs pa/_/sgyu ma'i skyes bus shes 'gyur gyi/_/rgyal ba nyid
[\[237b.4\]]kyis mi mkhyen no/_/snang bas spyod yul ma grub phyir/_/dmigs pa'i shes pa yod mi rung /_/spyod yul ma skyes ye shes phyir/_/bsgom bya'i chos nyid logs na med/_/sems kyi ye shes mtha' bral phyir/_/sgom pa po yang ga la yod/_/de ltar sgom mkhan dngos med na/_/mi gnas mi rtog 'jog pa dang /_/nam mkha' lta bu rang gsal
[\[237b.5\]]ba'i/_/rang sems yong gis de lta'o/_/ci yang yid la mi byed na/_/yang dag don la phebs pa'i rigs/_/lus ngag ma skyes gzhi med phyir/_/skyil krung smra bcad kha na med/_/de bzhin sems kyang dngos bral bas/_/rtog spang sgom pa'i khar mi 'ong /_/de ltar rtog pa sgom pa'o/_/yal bar 'dug pa nam yang med/_/ci phyir bdag nyid de
[\[237b.6\]]phyir bas/_/rang gi dbyings las g.yos pa med/_rtog pa'i mtshan ma bzang dang ngan/_/ci skyes dgag par mi bya zhing /_/de don dran pas 'bral ba'ang med/_/rang byung rang zhir nga smra'o/_/dper na rkun po tshor ma thag_/ma bskrad 'bros bzhin gdeng gis zhi/_/lta ba'i shugs las byung ba'i phyir/_/ched du tshor ba bstan mi dgos/_/de min blo
[\[237b.7\]]yi skad cig tu/_/rnam rtog rang gi de nyid blta'o/_/bying ba shes pa ldang mi nus/_/rmugs pa don nyid mi gsal ba'o/_/bying rmugs rab tu bying rmugs dang /_/shin tu bying rmugs phyir mi gtang /_/de bzhin rgod pa rnam pa gsum/_/le lo snyom las dman la sbyor/_/dogs pa gol dang lhung ba gnyis/_/re ba rtags dang 'bras bu'o/_/
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]'khrug dang 'jug tu mi btub dang /_/lus kyi bya byed spyod pa dga'/_/ngag gi ca co smra dga' ba/_/yang dag don las ring ba'i phyir/_/bya byed grong yul gtam mi gleng /_/sbyin dang cho ga'i las mi bya/_/dge ba'i las kyang g.yeng 'gyur na/_/sdig las mi bya smos ci dgos/_/nyams dang g.yo dang goms pa dang /_/
[\[238a.2\]]brtag pa'i nyams dang sbyar bar bya/_/don du 'di snyam bstan du med/_/de rtogs yang dag nyams dang ldan/_/de tshe phyi nang gsang ba'i drod/_/phyi nang rtags kyang rim pas 'byung /_/skyes kyang dga' drod sems ma byed/_/med kyang de la mi dga' med/_/de dag g.yo dang thob brtan na/_/rim 'byung gsang na dngos grub 'byung /_/klu gsum
[\[238a.3\]]ldan pa'i skyes mchog la/_/seng ge lta bur 'jig tshogs bral/_/zas dang nor gnyen ma chags shing /_/snying rje chen po mi 'bral na/_/chos nyid don dang phrad pa'i rtags/_/ci spyod don las ma nyams na/_/goms nas las su rung ba'i rtags/_/'di ldan dbang phye btsums med na/_/snang ba gang yang mi bskyon zhing /_/yid la bya ba med
[\[238a.4\]]phyir ro/_/lus kyis rim par bzod thob dang /_/chos brgyad spong len med pa dang /_/gang la'ang nyon mongs mi skyen/_/'di yang sa la 'gro ba'i rtags/_/yid la byed med 'gags snang med/_/'du shes ma bzung rang gsal la/_/gang yang nyams su mi len cing /_/sems kyis mngon par ma phyogs shing /_/dmigs med tshul du rang
[\[238a.5\]]snang ba/_/tha snyad tsam du bsgom zhes brjod/_/yang dag don gyi gdeng med par/_/tshig tsam lta la khungs chung zhing /_/bya med chos la blo gtad nas/_/rtsing chos phaT ral spyod byed pa/_/rgyal ba'i bkas kyang mi skyobs te/_/ya nga'i 'bras bu the tshom med/_/rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid brgyad ldan na/_/skyes bu de ni rgyal ba'i sras/_/gdeng med lta ba
[\[238a.6\]]mtho 'dod pas/_/rang gi nga rgyal snyems byed pa/_/ri bos srog chags mnan pa ltar/_/nam yang thar ba'i khar mi 'byung /_/gsang sngags gsang ba'i sgor zhugs nas/_/yang dag don la mi 'dud par/_/mi chos zang zing las byed cing /_/rang dbang yod bzhin dbang med ces/_/smra zhing gsang don yal 'jog pa/_/phyi ma gar
[\[238a.7\]]'gro gtol med par/_/gal med le lo'i las byed pa/_/e ma'o rang 'joms dpa' ba ste/_/rgya mtsho mjing gi pha bong ltar/_/thugs rje'i zhags pa dpyangs thag yin/_/rang gis rang bslus snying re rje/_/le lo can la thar lam med/_/lta ba'i rim pa'i man ngag ka ba dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]{D4357}]@/_/gsung rab rin po che'i gtam rgyud dang shAkya'i rabs rgyud bzhugs/_@#/_/dkon mchog gi za ma tog las/_sems can 'khor ba las 'byung bar rtsol ba la bdud bar chad byed kyi mi rtsol ba la ni mi byed do zhes 'byung /_sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi
[\[238b.2\]]khyab pa bstan pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis chos zab mo bshad pa dang /_rab 'byor gyis khyod las dang po rjes su mi bsrung ba'i chos ston to zhes bya ba dang /_'jam dpal gyis nad gso ba'i phyir/_sman pas sman rtsa ba byin pa 'phral du bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma
[\[238b.3\]]yin no zhes bya ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'ongs pa na chos zab mo 'di la su dad pa nyan thos kyi theg pa can zhig na ni byams pa'i 'dus pa gsum gyi khongs su gtogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can zhig na ni bzod pa gang yang rung ba thob par 'gyur
[\[238b.4\]]zhes gsungs/_dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa'i mdo las/_ye shes mtha' yas pa ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rab 'byams thams cad du 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las dang bzo gnas la ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'o/_/blo gros mi zad pas bstan pa las/_
[\[238b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims mi zad pa ni rgyun mi zad pa'i phyir blta bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_so so'i skye bo rnams kyi tshul khrims ni skye ba'i gnas rnams kyi zad par 'gyur ro/_/phyi rol gyi brda mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'gyur ro/_/mi rnams
[\[238b.6\]]kyi ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam zad pas so/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i bu rnams kyi ni bsod nams zad pas so/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi ni tshad med pa dang bsam gtan zad pas so/_/gzugs med pa'i lha rnams kyi tshul khrims ni ji lta bur snyoms par zhugs pa
[\[238b.7\]]skyes pa zad nas zad par 'gyur ro/_/slob pa dang mi slob pa dang nyan thos thams cad kyi ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar ro/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi ni snying rje chen po dang bral bas so/_/gzhan yang theg pa gnyis te/_lha'i theg pa dang mi'i theg pa'o/_/de la sems can thams cad
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni/_sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/chos la dmigs pa ni/_spyod pa la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/dmigs pa med pa'i byams
[\[239a.2\]]pa ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi'o/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun gyi sngon du 'gro ba ltar dbugs dbyung ba dang /_rngub pa ni skyes bu'i srog gi dbang po'i sngon du 'gro ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lha'i mig rnam par dag pa
[\[239a.3\]]ni phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa na/_sems can gzugs med pa ma gtogs pa thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba dang las dang 'bras bu dang po'i rim pa shes pa'o/_/sbyin pa ni chos dang zang zing ngo /_/snyan par smra ba ni tshig 'jam pa'o/_/don spyod pa ni gzhan dag
[\[239a.4\]]gi bsam pa bzhin rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/don mthun pa ni bdag yon tan du 'du shes pa'i theg pa de nyid la gzhan dgod pa'o/_/mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan pa ni tshig 'bru zhes bya'o/_/sems can thams cad kyi skad dang yi ge dang tshig 'brus brjod du
[\[239a.5\]]med pa'i don ni ston to/_/skye ba dang 'gog pa la gnas pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/mi skye ba dang mi 'gog pa la gnas pa ni ye shes so/_/nges pa dang drang ba ni don dam pa dang kun rdzob bstan pa'o/_/gang zag ni skye bo'i gang zag gi sangs rgyas kyi bar brdas bstan te/_
[\[239a.6\]]de dag la mngon par zhen pa ni ston pa ma yin no/_/chos nyid ni mnyam mo/_/'dod chags la spyod pa nyi khri chig stong de bzhin du zhe sdang dang gti mug dang cha mnyam la spyod pa ste/_spyir brgyad khri bzhi stong ngo /_/sbyin pa bzhin ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/_chos smra ba
[\[239a.7\]]rnams la smyu gu dang /_gro ga la sogs pa sbyin pa dang /_stan sbyin pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_snyan pa sbyin pa dang /_legs par gsungs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'o/_/yang bzod pa bzhi ni ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te/_chos tshol ba la brtson pas ngan du smra ba bzod
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]pa dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon dang mthun par 'jug pa'i bzod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la bzod pa'o/_/mi rtag pa'i don gang zhe na/_med pa'i don dang /_mi chags pa'i don to/_/dkon mchog 'byung gnas las/_bram ze'i rig byed las mtshan sum cu
[\[239b.2\]]rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ni 'gro ba gnyis te/_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas so/_/sman ser 'di yis mig bskus na/_gzugs ci mthong ba thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa gang dag
[\[239b.3\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu btsud do/_/za ma tog bkod pa las/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po gtor ma lung bstan/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi spobs pa lta bu de bzhin
[\[239b.4\]]gshegs pa la yang mi mnga' zhes 'byung /_ri'i rgyal po de dag la rang sangs rgyas de dag gnas te/_mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa la sogs pa rnam pa du ma dag phan tshun smra'o/_/dge 'dun gyi las spyod pa'i mi 'os pa las spyod pa las sdig che ba 'byung /_'jam
[\[239b.5\]]dpal rnam par rol pa las/_gang du sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa 'jug na/_tha na mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang rung ste/_de thams cad nyon mongs pa'o/_/kha dog dang gzugs kyi rtags dang spyod lam gyi dbyibs ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu
[\[239b.6\]]'byung ba ma yin gyis sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan dag la byams pa dang /_snying rje'i sems bskyed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa las/_chos nyid la brten na mdo sde thams cad nges pa'i
[\[239b.7\]]don yin no/_/'jig rten la brten na thams cad drang ba'i don yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i las ni gnyis so/_/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la gnas
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]shing sa dgu par 'phar ba la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod/_chos de dag kyang mdo 'di nyid las 'byung /_ma 'dres pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la sems can gdug
[\[240a.2\]]pa rnams kyis gnod pa byas kyang mi brdzi la/_gnod pa byas pa'i gzhi des sems can de yang ngan 'gror mi 'gro ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dag pa'i smon lam gyi dbang gi phyir ro/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa
[\[240a.3\]]las/_rab tu byung ba'i yon tan bcu yod de/_'dod pa la mi chags pa dang /_dgon pa la dga' ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'thob pa dang /_chung ma la sogs pa la sred par mi 'gyur ba dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i chos spong ba dang /_bde 'gro'i chos la brten
[\[240a.4\]]pa dang /_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang /_lha rnams dga' ba dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/sangs rgyas bdun gyi smon lam las/_sems can gyi rnam par shes pa gshin rje'i
[\[240a.5\]]mis drangs te/_gshin rje'i mdun du khrid cing mi de dang lhan cig skyes pa'i lha phyi bzhin 'brang bas sems can des legs nyes ci byas pa thams cad legs par yi ger bris te/_gshin rje la phul ba dang /_gshin rjes dris shing brtags nas/_de la ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du
[\[240a.6\]]bsgo'o/_/mi shi ma thag tu sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od mchod na/_des zhag bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/_sum cu rtsa lnga'am/_bzhi bcu rtsa dgu na dran te/_de phyin chad sdig pa mi byed do/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las/_
[\[240a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa la/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang byas pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba rab tu dben pa
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]'dod cing dgon pa'i logs su phyogs te/_gom pa bdun bor na ches bsod nams che zhing /_sangs rgyas su yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs ni bag yod pa la gnas so/_/byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing smon lam gyis grub po/_/gang gis
[\[240b.2\]]sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi mtshan brjod pa bas ni/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan brjod pa bsod nams ches che na/_de bzhin gshegs pa kun du gzigs pa'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_'phags pa 'jam dpal la byang chub sems
[\[240b.3\]]dpa' zhig gis khyod nam 'tshang rgya zhes dris pa dang /_nam yang 'tshang mi rgya ba'i dper/_zla ba ni nyin mor 'gyur ba dang /_nyin mo ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba dang /_dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba na ba dag 'tshang rgya'o zhes bshad do/_/de bzhin
[\[240b.4\]]gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa las/_bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu la bskal pa gcig go/_/de'i bskal pa bcu la bskal pa chen po gcig go/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim nas byung ba zhig gis mdo sde 'di gzung ba dang /_bklag pa la
[\[240b.5\]]sogs par mi rnyed la de la gal te la la zhig gis khyod khyim gyi gnas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du 'dug phod na mdo sde 'di sbyin no zhes zer la/_gal te mdo sde rnyed pa lta na khyim gyi gnas btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na gnas kyang ltung ba med do/_/mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[240b.6\]]kyi zhing de na tshe gcig gis dgra bcom par 'gyur te/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i 'bras bu ming tsam ste/_sems can gyi ris der skye ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa las/_'di lta ste/_las bsam
[\[240b.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa dang /_klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_bsam gtan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/rang gi lus kyang ras bcos bus dkris nas/_'bru mar gyis bskus nas mar me 'bud do/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]pa 'di de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin mig bzangs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na rgyal po la chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_gzhan dag kyang byang chub la bkod pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
[\[241a.2\]]cad byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba mthong ngam thos na de la mos pa ma gtogs pa lha la sogs pa dang /_nyan thos la sogs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa gang la yang ma mos pa'o/_/byams pa seng ge tog me tog pad+ma me tog skar ma rgyal spyad legs lag
[\[241a.3\]]bzangs 'od skar ma la dga' ba/_mngon 'phags shes pa yon tan gyi mchog mnga' ba nor dpal ye shes 'byung gnas/_rin po che 'byung gnas kun du snang ba/_yon tan mtha' yas grags pa mos pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa mos pa'i sku tshe dang nyan thos ni bskal
[\[241a.4\]]pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa dgu kun bsdoms pa dang mnyam mo/_/de snyed kyi mdzad pa kun sangs rgyas mos pa gcig pus mdzad do/_/tshangs pa gtsug phud byang chub kyi rim gro ba'i lta gzi brjid kyi stobs zhes bya ba rtag tu de bzhin gshegs
[\[241a.5\]]pa'i zham ring na 'brang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal zas snod du zed/_gzugs med pa'i lha'i tshe bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong /_sems can gang dag dgon pa'i gnas la chags pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa'i sems dben par bya ba'i gtam bya'o/_/
[\[241a.6\]]lag na rdo rjes smras pa/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pas yi ge gcig kyang ma brjod do zhes kho bos sngar ma bshad dam/_de lta mod kyi sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs/_sems can rnams kyis dmigs so/_/chos kyi mdo bzhi
[\[241a.7\]]rnam par gzhag ste/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rtag par smra ba rnams dang /_lha tshe ring po rtag par 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/_'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes bya ba dang /_lha dang mi bde bar 'du shes pa rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal lo zhes
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]bya ba dang /_mu stegs can bdag tu smra ba rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir chos thams cad bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang /_rnam par rtog pa la spyod pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi gzhom pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba zhes bya'o/_/rmi lam bstan pa las/_sa dgu pa
[\[241b.2\]]dang bcu pa las rmi lam log par mthong ba med do/_/phung po gsum pa las kyi sgrib pa sbyang ba'i phyir bklag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gos gsum char rnyed na de ni sa brgyad par blta'o/_/me tog gi tshogs las/_byang phyogs na yul gan
[\[241b.3\]]d+ha ra zhes bya ba na lo 'bum du mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba 'dzin par 'gyur ba yod do/_/kha che'i yul nas khri phrag lnga/_byang phyogs nas bye ba phrag brgyad dang lnga 'bum/_shar phyogs nas brgya stong phrag mang po/_/lho phyogs su nyis 'bum/_nub phyogs nas 'bum/_rigs kyi bu gang de
[\[241b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de la ma dad cing /_yid ma ches nas/_de lta bur ga la 'gyur zhes tshig tu smras na/_lo stong phrag drug cur sems can dmyal ba chen po 'o dod 'bod pa zhes bya bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs gang na bstan pa rab tu 'bar
[\[241b.5\]]bar gyur pa de na/_dam pa'i chos spang ba'i skyes bu blun po shin tu mang bar gyur to/_/mi lus thob par dka' ste/_rus sbal dang gnya' shing gi dpes bstan pa 'byung /_'phags pa byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po las/_'bras bu ma thob par tha na dad pas byin pa chu snod gang tsam
[\[241b.6\]]yang blang bar mi bya'o/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rab tu byung ba sdig pa can gyi 'dod pa bzhi ste/_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong bar 'dod pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid 'dod pa/_rgyal rigs 'dod pa/_bram ze'i rigs 'dod pa'o/_/gling bzhi pa'i sems can
[\[241b.7\]]thams cad la bskal pa bas lhag par yo byad kun byin pa bas/_yang dag par zhugs pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pa 'tsho ba dag pa zhig gis sbyin pa po gang gis dad pas byin pa tha na chu snod gang tsam blangs na de bsod nams che'o/_/rab tu byung ba nyon mongs pa cha phra ba 'di
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]dag dang ldan na/_mda' 'phangs pa bzhin dmyal bar 'gro ste/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog dang /_sdom pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thos na tshul khrims la smod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkas bslabs pa las 'gal na nga rgyal gyis mi 'chags pa dang /_
[\[242a.2\]]shes bzhin du yon bdag dad pas byin pa la spyod pa'o/_/rab tu byung ba rgyags pa 'di bzhi dang ldan na dmyal bar 'gro ste/_bzhi ni mang du thos pas rgyags nas bag med pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur stis rgyags pa dang /_mdza' ba shes dang /_slong mo ster ba'i khyim gyis rgyags pa dang /_sbyangs
[\[242a.3\]]ba'i yon tan gyis rgyags nas bdag bstod/_gzhan la smod pa'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpar khas 'ches te/_rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa dang /_g.yo byed pa dang /_yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar byed pa'o/_/dus lnga brgya tha ma la byang chub sems dpar khas 'ches pa'i khyi'i chos kun tu
[\[242a.4\]]spyod pa dag 'byung /_dge slong khyim pa rnams su 'gro bar 'dod pas ni chos kyi skyes ma gtogs par skyes gzhan bskur bar mi bya/_khyim du song nas chos ma gtogs 'du 'dzi'i gtam mi bya/_ngas ni sngon byas pa'i las zad par bya ba'i phyir/_phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gsungs/_byang chub
[\[242a.5\]]sems dpa' ltar bcos pa kha cig sdig pa byas pa bshags pas 'byung ba'i sems kyis phyin chad sdom par mi byed/_nyin gcig la lan brgya bar du 'byung ba'i phyir spong ba ni bla'i/_tshul khrims ma dag pas dad pas byin pa la yongs su spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/gal
[\[242a.6\]]te khyed nyan thos gcig gi sems dag rnam par grol bar ma gyur du zin na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byed du bcug nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/khyim pas
[\[242a.7\]]kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_tshong dpon bzang skyong gis zhus pa las/_tshong dpon zla ba 'byor pa de la ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bde ba'i yo byad kyis kyang ci tsam du yang mi phod do/_/dper na dgra bcom pa 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]rnam par shes pa'i khams de 'gog pa las 'das nas yongs su phyin pa de bzhin du/_rnam par shes pa'i khams 'di yang skye ba po shi ba'i lus yongs su btang zhing khams rnams bor nas/_nang gi gzugs dang phyi rol gyi gzugs yod de/_nang gi gzugs ni zin pa'i mig gang yin pa ni
[\[242b.2\]]phyi rol gyi gzugs so/_/mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa ni gzugs so/_/nang gi mig shes pa dang ldan pas rmi lam na gzugs mthong gi sha'i mig gis ni ma yin no/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo las 'di gnyis lo khrir dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa bas/_
[\[242b.3\]]gang zhig der snga dro gcig gi de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du yang dag par smra ba'o/_/dkon mchog sprin las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni don dang bral ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos nyid thob pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu chos nyid ma thob pa rnams kyi ni
[\[242b.4\]]don dang 'bral bar 'gyur gyi/_chos nyid thob pa rnams kyis ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni tshig 'bru dang bral ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bstan bcos thams cad la 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu bstan bcos kyi phyogs 'ga' shes pa
[\[242b.5\]]rnams kyis ni tshig 'bru dang bral bar 'gyur gyi bstan bcos thams cad med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gang na gnas pas sangs rgyas skyes bu du ma 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can gyi don 'grib par 'gyur ba/_lha tshe ring po'i nang du mi skye'o/_/byang
[\[242b.6\]]chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams nyid du gang sems can gdul bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas skyes pa mnyes par byar yod par skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni thabs mkhas pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o/_/'dul ba'o/_/tshangs
[\[242b.7\]]pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa las/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na 'ga' zhig bskal pa brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa bas/_mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na gang snga dro'i dus gcig zhe sdang med par gnas pa bsod nams shin tu che'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]chub sems dpa' bsam gtan la gnas nas/_'dod pa'i khams su skye ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_sems las su rung ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba stobs skyed pa dang /_sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa'o/_/gang rnams dngos
[\[243a.2\]]po 'jig pa las 'gags pa de 'phags pa'i bden pa'o/_/smra bar gyur pa de dag ni lam log par zhugs pa ste/_nga yang de dag gi ston pa ma yin/_de dag yang nga'i nyan thos ma yin no/_/gal te sems can thams cad kyang /_/theg pa dam pa 'dod 'gyur na/_/thams
[\[243a.3\]]cad kyi yang go skabs yod/_/theg pa'i khyad par dag la ltos/_/dngos po ni mig gi rang bzhin gyis dben te/_gang chos thams cad mi sgom pa 'di ni lam sgom pa'o/_/bskal pas bsreg pa na chu bran dang /_rdzing bu dang mtsho la sogs pa sngar skam la phyis rgya mtsho chen po skam pa ltar
[\[243a.4\]]dam pa'i chos nub pa'i tshe/_nyi tshe ba'i spyod pa la zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyi chos sngar nub par 'gyur la/_phyis skyes bu dam pa blo gros rgya mtsho lta bu sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin pa de dag gi lag nas dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho
[\[243a.5\]]las byung ba/_/rin po ches ni rin chen sdud/_/ces bya bar bsngags pa/_bsreg pa'i bskal pa byung yang mi 'tshig ste/_/de yang 'jig rten 'jig tshe gzhan du 'gro/_/de bzhin dri ma med pa'i chos 'jig tshe/_/brtson 'grus mchog ldan de dag 'bad cing
[\[243a.6\]]'dzin/_/snod min 'jig rten chos min 'dod rig nas/_/khams pa rgyal ba gzhan gyi drung du 'gro/_/chos rnams 'byung ba med pa bstan pa las/_/lan cig kho nas rgyal bar 'gyur ba min/_/rigs pa'i rim dang bya ba'i rim gyis 'thob/_/bskal pa khrag khrig bye ba
[\[243a.7\]]grangs med du/_/go cha bgos pas 'thob kyi gzhan du min/_/rigs kyi bu bdag bsrung bar 'dod pa des gzhan su'i spyod pa la yang brtag par mi bya ste/_'di ni 'di 'dra'o/_/'di ni 'di 'dra'o zhes dpya bar mi bya'o/_/chos 'di thos shing mir 'gyur ba'i/_/'dod pa'i
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]yon tan lnga chags khyim pa'ang bla'i/_/bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung gyur zhing /_/dmigs lta sbyangs pa'i yon tan rlom pa min/_/'phags pa nam mkha' mdzod kyi zhus pa las/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kun gyi rtsa ba'o/_/
[\[243b.2\]]bsod nams ni sems bskyed ma thag tu sems can dang theg pa dman pa'i bsod nams zil gyis gnon pa'o/_/ye shes ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bla na med par bsngo ba'o/_/shes rab kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor/_thabs kyi
[\[243b.3\]]ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi gtong ba ste/_tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir gshe yang slar mi gshe/_lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdeg kyang slar mi brdeg_/sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas spyo yang slar mi spyo/_/bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs
[\[243b.4\]]pas khros kyang slar mi khro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rab tu rnyed pa'o/_/bsod nams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su mi gtong ba'o/_/ye shes ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la kun dri bya'o/_/thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/_sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas/_'khor
[\[243b.5\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de la btsun mo yang brgyad khri bzhi stong bu yang brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sdig pa so sor 'chags pa'o/_/bsod nams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/ye shes ni sangs rgyas
[\[243b.6\]]thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa'o/_/shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin tu ngoms/_byang chub kyi sems ni chos gnyis kyis bsdus na phyir mi ldog par gnas so/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa'o/_/de la bsam pa ni g.yo med pa dang sgyu med pas
[\[243b.7\]]bsdus so/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa ni de la chags pa dang khyad par du 'gro bas bsdus so/_/sems kyi dmigs pa ni bdud kyi yul te/_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/_chos bzhi dang ldan na mi khom pa spong bar 'gyur te/_dkon mchog gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_chos 'dod
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]pa rnams g.yengs par mi byed pa dang /_bdag gi 'gyod pa mi skye ba dang /_gzhan gyi 'gyod pa sel ba'o/_/chos gnyis dang ldan pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams bsal nas mi dge ba'i chos 'gog par 'gyur te/_gnyis ni phung po gsum gyi bsngo ba dang ldan
[\[244a.2\]]pa dang /_bag yod par gnas pa'o/_/yang gnyis te/_dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/_/chos brgyad dang ldan na rab tu byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_gang zhe na/_'phags pa'i rigs kyis chog par 'dzin pa
[\[244a.3\]]dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsdus pa mang du thos pa/_sems nges par sems la dga' ba/_byang chub pa'i bsam pa la ma rmongs pa dran pa mnyam par gzhag pas gnas pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab bsgom pa la brtson pa/_brtsams pa thams cad bsrung
[\[244a.4\]]ba snying por byed pa/_'khor gyi nang du 'ong ba la zab mo'i chos kyi gtam gyi bar bgyid de gtam sna tshogs gleng ba gang yin pa de ni dam pa'i chos mi nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir ji srid zab mo'i chos grags pa
[\[244a.5\]]de srid du chos nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya pa dang ji tsam gyi gling bzhi par gyur pa la de lta bu'i bye ba phrag brgya/_de na mi rnams par mdor 'chi ba med/_legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu
[\[244a.6\]]byung nas tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par ma byas te/_cho ga nyams pa dang /_'tsho ba nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa ni yongs su rdzogs par byas la/_de dag gi lta ba drang por 'gyur te/_des na sems can dmyal ba rnams su mi skye'i/_klu'i skye gnas su skye bar 'gyur/_
[\[244a.7\]]byad bzhin bzang po la phrag dog mi byed pa de ni lus chen por 'gyur/_bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhis/_khye'u bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin las/_dbu ni shar phyogs/_zhal ni byang phyogs/_rgyab ni lho phyogs su bstan la glo g.yas pas phab/_drang srong rgyas pas zhus pa
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]las/_nor gang gi yin pa de ni sbyin bdag yin no/_/byed du bcug pas byin pa ni/_sbyin pa po yin gyi sbyin bdag ma yin no/_/gang rang gi dngos po bdag nyid kyis sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa po yang yin la/_sbyin bdag kyang yin no/_/dug dang mtshon cha dang srog chags bsad de sha
[\[244b.2\]]dang /_bag med pa rnams la chang sbyin pa dang /_'di dag ni bdag gi rim gro dang mchod par 'gyur ro snyam nas sems can bsdu ba dang /_'thob pa'i phyir bsdu bar sbyin pa ni sbyin pa yongs su ma dag pa'o/_/rtsed mo la sogs pa bya ba'i phyir rol mo mkhan la sbyin pa byin pa ni yongs su ma
[\[244b.3\]]dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun dang chos smra ba dang nad pa dang pha ma la sbyin pa byin pa ni sbyin pa bla na med pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la mchod pa byed pa ni rnam par smin pa mtshungs so/_/dge ba byas pa ma'i mngal du
[\[244b.4\]]skyes pa na zhag bdun gyi bar du/_bdag de nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes te las 'di lta bu zhig gis gyur to zhes bya bar dran no/_/mi dge ba byed pa yang de dang 'dra'o/_/lha phreng ba thogs pa dag gnyis kyis gnyis sprod kyi khu ba ni mi 'byung /_bu mngal na zhag bdun gnas nas dku
[\[244b.5\]]g.yas nas 'byung ngo /_/rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bar dor 'chi ba'i dus mi byed/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha ag tshom dang spu thung ba/_cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa las/_mngon par rtogs pa gcig tu 'dus pa la/_bden pa bzhir yongs su brjod/_byang chub kyi gnas kyi rjes
[\[244b.6\]]su 'jug pas/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/rtsom pa chen po nyams 'og tu chud par byed pa dang /_ye shes chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/_sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung ba'i tshig gis sems can thams cad kyi nyes par smra ba zil
[\[244b.7\]]gyis non par byed pa de lta bu ni chos smra ba yin no/_/sems can thams cad la 'dun cing mi dge ba mi byed pa ni nga rgyal med pa'o/_/bdag tshul khrims la gnas la/_sems can thams cad kyi 'gyod pa dang /_kun nas sdang ba bsal ba'i phyir chos ston pa ni 'dul ba smra ba'o/_/byang chub
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]sems dpa'i sde snod las/_bdag dang sems can dang gang zag la sogs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/_/byis pa thos pa dang mi ldan pas/_bdag la sogs pa yongs su rtogs pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'o/_/nga ni tshul khrims
[\[245a.2\]]ldan zhes bdag ma bsnyems/_'di ni tshul khrims ngan zhes gzhan ma brnyas/_tshul khrims tsam gyis gzhan la gang brnyas pa/_/bsnyems phyir de ni tshul khrims 'chal zhes bya/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chags pa med pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
[\[245a.3\]]bye ma snyed kyi shing la sogs pa thams cad gcig tu spungs te/_bsregs la rgya mtsho chen por sbyangs nas/_de las rdul blangs na 'di ni 'di'o zhes bya bar yang mkhyen la chags pa yang mi mnga'o/_/rgyun du zhugs pa srid pa brgyad pa mngon par sgrub pa ni gnas ma yin no/_/tshe de nyid
[\[245a.4\]]kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni gnas yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la chos gos sor bzhi tsam gyis mi reg mod kyi/_rnam par 'thor rlung gis kyang bskyod par mi nus so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa rnams kyi byams pa ni sems can la dmigs
[\[245a.5\]]pa'o/_/spyod pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi ni chos la dmigs pa'o/_/bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi ni dmigs pa med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni sbyin pa nyung ngu yang mang por byed do/_/ye shes kyi stobs kyis lhag par byed do/_/shes rab kyis rgyas par byed do/_/bsngo
[\[245a.6\]]bas dpag tu med par byed do/_/gang zag sbyor ba dman pa la mos pa rgya che ba yang yod/_mos pa dman pa la sbyor ba rgya che ba yang yod/_bud med ni nyes pa mang ba sgyu mkhas pa sems yang ba/_sems 'gyur ba sems mi brtan pa/_sems rab tu g.yo zhing mi brtan pa spre'u'i
[\[245a.7\]]sems spre'u dang mtshungs pa sgyu ma ston pa la mkhas pa ste/_de'i phyir bud med ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ni ldog pa bzhi bskyed de/_'dod pa dang /_srid pa dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_'du byed du gtogs pa'i sdug bsngal las bzlog
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]pa'o/_/theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bus/_bud med kha dog rgyas pa mthong na 'du shes bzhi bskyed par bya ste/_nyams par 'du shes pa dang /_g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang /_phyi sa khung du 'du shes pa dang /_rnag tu 'du shes bskyed do/_/gal te de ltar
[\[245b.2\]]brtags kyang 'dod chags skye ba lta na/_'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/_ma 'dra ba la ma'i 'du shes dang /_sring mo 'dra ba la sring mo'i 'du shes dang /_bu mo 'dra ba la bu mo'i 'du shes bskyed do/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa'i bar du gcod pa dang /_'jig
[\[245b.3\]]par byed pa ni dge slong sdig can las gzhan gang yang med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos lnga dang ldan na sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par mi byed/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mi brten/_dal ba 'byor ba mi rnyed/_dge ba'i chos bsgrubs pa chud gzon/_sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub
[\[245b.4\]]sems dpa'i rjes su mi slob 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/lnga ni rgyal pos bkrab par 'gyur/_skye bo mang pos skrag par 'gyur la/_skye bo mang pos bdag cag gi 'di bgyir gsol zhes don bcol ba las bya bar khas 'ches nas mi byed pa dang /_dge slong dang dge slong ma dang dge bsnyen dang /_
[\[245b.5\]]dge bsnyen ma grong ngam/_ljongs sam yul lam pho brang 'khor du gnas par gyur pa la/_de dag gis tshul khrims nyams par byed pa dang /_pha ma dang bu pho dang bu mo dang sring mo dang mdza' bo dang /_nye du dang sems can gzhan yang rung ste/_chos byed pa'i bar chad byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[245b.6\]]pa'i bstan pa zab mo thos na ma dad cing /_kha zer la gzhan yang de las 'dun pa bzlog pa dang /_blon po'am 'khor gzhan stobs chen po la brten cing /_dbang phyug bsnyems pas skye bo mang po la gshe brgyad/_'phyas 'dogs 'thing slad byed do/_/rab tu byung ba
[\[245b.7\]]yang chos lnga dang ldan na da ltar 'gyur te/_lnga ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims spyod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la chags pa dang /_bdag tu lta ba'i thibs po dang /_gzhan gyi khyim la phrag dog dang ser sna byed pa'o/_/ye shes kyi tshogs
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]ni sbyin pa bzhi ste/_chos smra ba la rim gro dang /_smyu gu dang /_snag tsha dang /_glegs bam sbyin pa dang /_stan sna tshogs sbyin pa dang /_bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa thams cad sbyin pa dang /_g.yo med par legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'o/_/
[\[246a.2\]]de ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa ting nge 'dzin las/_bu dang bu mo la dgrar 'du shes pa/_chung ma la sring mor 'du shes pa dang /_'di ltar ma gus pas na dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gzung 'dod pas/_ngo mi rtag pa thams
[\[246a.3\]]cad spang bar bya/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bzhi stong du ting nge 'dzin 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par 'gyur te/_lo brgya pa tha ma phyi ma'i tshe/_phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mar gyur pa/_dngos po'i 'du shes can gyis sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'gyur/_chos kyi 'du shes can gyis mthong
[\[246a.4\]]bar mi 'gyur/_rnam par smin pa'i re bas gtong ba phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur/_bsgom pa la mngon par dga' bas tshul khrims rnam par dag par mi 'gyur/_chos la ser sna byed pas mang du thos par mi 'gyur/_gang zag la brten pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur/_
[\[246a.5\]]bre mo'i gtam la dga' bas bden pa mthong bar mi 'gyur/_gnas la dga' bas 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur/_rjes su chags pas skyon mthong bar mi 'gyur/_gnod sems la dga' bas nges par mi 'gyur/_sdang zhing zhe 'gras pas phan yon mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[246a.6\]]bka' mi bcag pa dang /_mdza' rtag pa dang /_mi rtag pa spangs pa dang /_nyes par lta ba med pas slob dpon gyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o/_/bsod nams kyi stobs kyi rtog pa brjod pa las/_gang dag shin tu gtang dka' ba/_/nyung du'ang mang po gtong byed na/_/shi yang de ni
[\[246a.7\]]shi ma yin/_/rgyags zad pa yi mgron po bzhin/_/bsod nams min pas phan pa'i sman/_/shin tu gnod pa dag tu 'gyur/_/mthu rtsal nyams la dregs pa yi/_/bag med chang gis rtag myos shing /_/gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa/_/de dag shi ba snying nas shi/_/
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]sor mo'i phreng bas/_'jam dpal skyes bu chos 'dod pa la la zhig bdag nyid dus gnyis su za ba las/_la la zhig gis bstan te/_zas lan gcig par gyur na/_srin bu'i rigs brgyad cu gsod par 'gyur ro/_/ji ste de ltar gyur na de dag la srog gcod pa dag par mi
[\[246b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i dus na dge slong gi gzhi las gzhan du 'gyur/_sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ma byas pa rtag par g.yung drung mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa yod de/_dper na chu dang 'o mar 'dres pa mi
[\[246b.3\]]dmigs pa de bzhin du/_sangs rgyas kyi dbyibs kyang nyon mongs pas g.yogs mod kyi/_de gnyis 'dres par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do/_/nyon mongs pa med pa nas/_nyi zla sprin las grol ba bzhin snang ngo /_/sngon phyugs su gyur pa'i sems can ma rgal ba la da dung so sgra
[\[246b.4\]]khrig khrig zer ba gang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la yid mi ches so/_/de bzhin du sngon las ngan pa byed byed pa ril yid mi ches te/_de dag la skyon ril 'byung ngo zhes 'byung ngo /_/bsod nams can de dag ni dad par 'gyur te/_de dag ni skye ba thams cad du legs
[\[246b.5\]]dgu 'grub par 'byung /_kha che'i yul gyi dge slong rnams sgrub pa'i don mi shes nas/_theg pa chen po thams cad la smad pa 'byung ste/_nga la skur pa 'debs pa de la ci ltar bya zhes/_nga yang ngo tsha ba skye'o/_/ma 'ongs pa na sems can gang dag bud+ha'i sku pha ma phrad pa las skyes pa/_
[\[246b.6\]]rus pa dang /_rgyus pa dang /_rkang dang khrag can mi'i lus so zhes zer ba de dag 'jig rten na mi sdug pa'i skyon can zha bo gzhogs nyams pa kham nam pa yan lag ma tshang ba dang /_ngan song gi sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro/_/dper na sog bur gyi phung po'i
[\[246b.7\]]nang du me bcug na/_sog ma'i phung po'i dbus tshig la mtha' 'khor mi tshig pa de bzhin du/_'jam dpal dang po nga skyes pa'i yul na nan tan lhur len pa zhig ste tshig pa las/_lho phyogs kyi rgyud du lhag ma lus te/_mtha' 'khor na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]skyes pa der/_rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang bar grags pa yin no/_/gang gcig tu stong bar smra ba dang /_bdag tu lta ba de gnyis ni/_dam pa'i chos 'jig pa dang /_khas 'bub pa'o/_/dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas so/_/dbu
[\[247a.2\]]ma'i lam mi shes pas sems can rnams dbu ma'i lam gzhan du rtog go/_/sor mo'i phreng ba'i ma yang sprul pa yin par 'byung /_sor mo'i phreng ba dang 'jam dpal gnyis sangs rgyas yin par bshad/_'phags pa chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[247a.3\]]ni yal bar 'dor ba bcu dang lhan cig mi 'grogs te/_bcu ni dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos sbyin pa dang /_bla ma thams cad la rim gro bya ba dang /_bdud kyi las dang /_sems
[\[247a.4\]]can dkrugs pa dang /_dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par 'jig pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_phung po gsum po'i yongs su bsngo ba dang lhan cig mi 'grogs so/_/'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las grub pa/_mgar bas ma brdungs/_sbyin pa ni zas la sogs pa sbyin pa'o/_/sbyin pa chen po ni
[\[247a.5\]]bu dang chung ma dang rgyal srid la sogs pa gtong ba'o/_/shin tu sbyin pa ni mgo dang lag pa la sogs pa gtong ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni mya ngan las 'das pa las rnam par grol zhing /_'khor ba las ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_byang
[\[247a.6\]]chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das ba la 'jigs par bgyi'i/_/'khor ba la ni ma lags so/_/byang chub sems dpas chos shin tu mang po bslab par mi bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas chos gcig tu bzung zhing rab tu rtogs par bgyis na/_sangs rgyas
[\[247a.7\]]kyi chos thams cad lag mthil du mchis pa lags so/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po'o/_/bzhi pa bsgrub pa las/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_sems can 'grol ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi 'chad par bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bzung ba la dmigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa bya'o/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni lhag pa'i sems bskyed pa ste/_bzhi ni sems can bsdu ba dang /_smin par bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang /_
[\[247b.2\]]chos rtogs par bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa brag ca lta bu bzhi ni slong ba la khong khro ba med pa dang /_log par zhugs pa la snying rje ba dang /_shes rab las ma nyams pa dang /_rtsol ba nyams 'og tu chud pa'i sems so/_/sems bskyed
[\[247b.3\]]pa mngon par 'phags pa bzhi ni tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje mngon par 'phags pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu bzhi ni/_bsam pa dang /_mdza' ba dang /_nan tan dang /_theg pa chen po las mi phyed pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa rnyed
[\[247b.4\]]dka' ba bzhi ni/_nyon mongs pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_theg pa dman pa dang /_skye bo mi bgrungs pa dang ma 'dres pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa bla na med pa bzhi ni phangs pa thams cad gtong ba dang /_btang nas mi 'gyod pa dang /_
[\[247b.5\]]rnam par smin pa la mi re ba dang /_byang chub tu bsngo ba'i sems bya'o/_/spyi bor phyin pa'i chos bzhi ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_thabs la mkhas pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_sems can smin par byed pa'o/_/chos gya nom pa dang /_dam pa'i mchog
[\[247b.6\]]bzhi ni sems can la khong khro ba med pa dang /_gang dag 'gal bar byed pa dag nyid la rab tu thar bar bya bar sems bskyed pa dang /_yul rgya chen po 'byor kyang de la bag yod pa dang /_dbul bas phongs kyang chos spyod pa'o/_/dge ba'i chos bzhi ni/_dge ba thams cad la sbyor ba
[\[247b.7\]]dang /_ma bslabs pa la mi brnyes pa dang /_ma gsol bar sems can gyi bshes gnyen byed pa dang /_yon tan bsgrubs pa la lan re ba med pa'o/_/tshangs pas byin gyis zhus pa las/_chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod yin te/_gang zhe na/_khwa ltar
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]skru zhing mu cor smra ba la gzhan gyi yid dang mi sbyor ba yin/_bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa yin/_tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa yin/_mthun pa 'byed pa yin no/_/gang zag phrag dog can dang /_mi brtson pa dang /_smra ba la dga' ba dang /_bre mo'i gtam byed pa dang /_
