[\[248a.2\]]tshul bzhin ma yin pa dang /_sbyor ba dang bral ba rnams gang na ba de na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mi gnas so/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung ba'i g.yang sa yin te/_gang zhe na/_'di sangs rgyas la ma gus pa dang /_chos spong ba dang /_chos smra ba la sdang ba dang /_mngon
[\[248a.3\]]par brtson pa med pa dad pas byin pa len to/_/mya ngan med kyis byin pa lung bstan pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' la ni khyim pa'am/_rab tu byung ba zhes gzung bar mi bya'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni bsam pa dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes kyis phye ba yin pa'i phyir
[\[248a.4\]]ro/_/spobs pa'i blo gros kyis zhus pa las/_chos lnga dang ldan na/_skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum dang phrad pa 'thob/_chos kyang thos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin phun sum tshogs pa yang 'thob par 'gyur te lnga ni/_bdag nyid dkon mchog gsum la skyabs
[\[248a.5\]]su song nas/_gzhan yang de la 'dzud pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rgyas par byed du 'jug pa dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon la gus pa dang bcas shing mthun par 'dzin pa dang /_sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa bzhin sems pa dang /_mdo sde
[\[248a.6\]]zab mo kha don byed pa la sogs pas bar chad med par bsgrub pa'o/_/'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag la mngon par dga' zhing mi gtong mi spong la/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang 'dod pa'i ngo bo nyid du mthong
[\[248a.7\]]ba des ni las kyi sgrib pa dag 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kun nas sgo'i le'u las/_bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/nga yi chos ni gnas gyur la/_/nyin gcig bzhin du nyin re la/_/stong gsum sems can ji snyed pa/_/thams cad mya ngan 'das byas shing /_/
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]thams cad de ltar byas kyang ni/_/sems can khams la zad pa med/_/nges pa dang ma nges par 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'jug pa las/_gang zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa'i tshul khrims la sogs
[\[248b.2\]]pa'i phung po lnga med par byas la/_gzhan zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tha na bslab pa gcig tsam yang med par byas na/_de bas sdig pa ches grangs med pa bskyed do/_/'ga' zhig gis phyogs
[\[248b.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad btson rar bcug pa bas/_'ga' zhig gis sdang ba'i sems kyis byang chub sems dpa' la khros te/_'di dang ma phrad par gyur cig ces 'dug na snga ma bas ches sdig che'o/_/'ga' zhig gis phyogs bcu'i sems can thams
[\[248b.4\]]cad kyi mig phyung ba bas/_'ga' zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' la khros te bltas na sdig pa ches che'o/_/'ga' zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad kyi rang sangs rgyas pa rnams rang sangs rgyas las nyams par byas la/_'ga' zhig gis byang chub sems
[\[248b.5\]]dpa' gcig byang chub sems dpa' las nyams par byas na ches sdig che'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum pa las/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug la 'jig rten pa yang yod/_'jig rten las 'das pa yang yod de/_dmigs pa can thams cad ni 'jig rten pa yin te/_'jig
[\[248b.6\]]rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags pas so zhes 'byung /_dmigs pa med pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes 'byung /_de gnyis ka yang pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ni bya bar 'byung /_bu mo blo gros bzang mos zhus pa las/_chos bzhi ni mdzes par 'gyur ro/_/dgra la yang mi khro
[\[248b.7\]]pa dang /_byams pa la gnas pa dang /_chos 'dod pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa'o/_/bzhi dang ldan na nor mang bar 'gyur te dus su sbyin pa dang /_'gyod pa med par sbyin pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba sbyin pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi re bar
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]sbyin pa'o/_/bzhi dang ldan na 'gran zla med par 'gyur te/_g.yo med par dge ba 'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la ser sna mi byed pa dang /_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la dga' ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba dang gnas pa thams cad la mi khro ba'o/_/
[\[249a.2\]]bzhi dang ldan na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas mdun na bzhugs shing /_chos thos la sdug bsngal med par 'gyur te/_gzhan gyi bsam pa rdzogs par byed pa dang /_mos pa mang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa bkod pa sna tshogs sgrub pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum mchod
[\[249a.3\]]par brtson pa'o/_/dpal spong gi mdo las/_'di ni chos 'dus pa la 'phel ba ste/_nyes pas nyes pa can du mthong na 'chags shing mthol te phyin chad kyang sdom pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga brgya pa las/_rab 'byor gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/_
[\[249a.4\]]gzugs rang bzhin med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_gdod ma nas zhi ba dang /_rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par bstan pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni ldem por dgongs pa ma yin pa ste/_sgra ji bzhin pa nyid du shes par bya'o zhes smras na/_de ni phyi rol pas kyang phyis
[\[249a.5\]]so so skye bo'i phyogs la gnas pa ste/_log par smra ba'o/_/gang la la zhig gis gzugs la yang yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa tsam du yang dag par mi mthong ba de dag gzugs la gzugs su dmigs pa'o/_/chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po las/_chos
[\[249a.6\]]bzhi dang ldan pas dgon par gnas par bya ste/_khyim na gnas pa spong ba dang /_mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen spong ba dang /_khyim pa spong ba dang /_bdog pa thams cad gtong ba'o/_/chos gnyis kyis dmyal bar ltung ste/_'dod chags dang zhe sdang ngo /_/chos bzhis mtho ris su 'gro
[\[249a.7\]]ste/_sems can la sems snyoms pa dang /_bsam pa dag pa dang bdog pa thams cad gtong ba dang /_tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'o/_/des bas zhus pa las/_chos bzhi dang ldan na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba don yod pa yin te/_bzhi ni yid ches pa dang /_dad pa dang /_
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]phangs par 'dzin pa dang /_gus pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ni gang la bdag nyid kyang 'dod pa spong bar gyur pa las/_gzhan yang 'dod pa'i sems bskyed par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i gos bcang bar bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par bstan pa
[\[249b.2\]]las/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mchod pa'i phyir tha na bzhad gad dam/_ku re'am byis pa'i kyal kas rtsed mo byas kyang 'jim pas mchod rten byed na/_de dag thams cad kyang sdug bsngal mthar byas nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje snying po'i gzungs las/_gang
[\[249b.3\]]dag chos thams cad la dngos po med par lta ba de ni skye bar yang mi 'gyur/_'gag par yang mi 'gyur te/_chos thams cad nam mkha'i ngos lta bur mthong /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi dmigs mi 'dor ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nges par bshad pa'i rin
[\[249b.4\]]chen byin gyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'i yon yongs su sbyong ba ni lnga ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_lus mi dmigs pa dang /_sbyin pa la ma zhen pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la mi smod pa dang /_len pa la rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'o/_/byang chub sems
[\[249b.5\]]dpas chos bzhi rtag tu mngon du bya ste/_bzhi ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/glang po'i rtsal las/_thams cad mkhyen pa bla med pa/_/mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas
[\[249b.6\]]shing /_/gang gA'i bye ma'i grangs snyed dag_/me tog rnams kyis bkang byas te/_/'jig rten mgon la phul ba bas/_/gang gis 'dir ni thal sbyar nas/_/byang chub tu ni sems btud na/_/'di ni bsod nams ches mang ste/_/de la tshad ni yod ma yin/_/de 'dra'i mchod pa gang yang
[\[249b.7\]]med/_/de 'dra yi dam la yang med/_/sangs rgyas ye shes thob 'dod pas/_/chos rnams gang yang mi gzung zhing /_/chos rnams gang yang mi 'dor ro/_/klu'i rgyal pos zhus pa las/_zhi gnas kyis brgyan na nyon mongs pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro/_/lhag mthong gis
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]brgyan na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin shes par 'gyur ro/_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las/_sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/_/mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis ldan pa'i/_/sangs rgyas dag la mchod par 'gyur/_/bad sa'i rgyal po
[\[250a.2\]]'char byed kyis zhus pa las/_sbrang bus rma zhig mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang /_/phag ni ngan skyugs mthong nas rgyug pa ci 'dra dang /_/khyi ni sha yi don du shan par 'gro ba ltar/_/de bzhin mi mkhas bud med dag la dga' bar byed/_/rab tu me 'bar thu lum bzung ba de bla la/_/de bzhin
[\[250a.3\]]lcags kyi thu lum 'bar ba za bla zhing /_/me dong 'jigs su rung ba rnams la reg pa bla'i/_/lag pa gnyis kyis nam yang bud med reg mi bya/_/bud med kyi dbang du song nas 'dod pa rnams la brten cing /_pha ma la brnyas pa dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'jug pa de ni skyes pa'i skyes
[\[250a.4\]]bu'i skyon gnyis yin no/_/mi yi gtso bor gyur cing lha yi lhar gyur pa/_/thub pa chen po 'di 'dra'i gsung ni thos gyur na/_/rgas shing dbang po shin tu nyam chung gyur pa yi/_/pha ma sbyin gnas dam pa su zhig gso mi byed/_/mi rnams gang dag mi mkhas pas/_/rnga mo bong
[\[250a.5\]]bu'i chos spyod cing /_/bud med mthong na rab snyegs pa/_/ngan skyugs gnas la phag rnams bzhin/_/mi gtsang bum pa khra bo zhig_/kha dog ldan par mthong mod kyi/_/nang na ha la ha la'i dug_/drag po chen po yod pa ltar/_/de ni bud med brgyan pa dag_/gang dang gang na snang ba
[\[250a.6\]]dang /_/gcin dang phyi sas gang ba yi/_/rkyal pa rlung gis bus pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bud med dag_/phyi sa bzhin du dman par bsgrags/_/ji ltar phag ni yud tsam zhig_/sngangs zhing skrag pa byung gyur kyang /_/des ni phyi sa mthong ba na/_/chags pa skyed par byed pa
[\[250a.7\]]ltar/_/rmongs pa rnams kyis chos thos nas/_/dge bar gsungs zhes rjod byed kyang /_/de'i sems bud med phyi bzhin song /_/byi ba la ni byi la bzhin/_/rnam par dag pa bsdus pa las/_/dge slong chos de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas/_'di ltar dam pa'i chos spangs pas bskal pa
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]bcur sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa gang dag 'byung ba'i tha ma'i tshe/_khyod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/bsam gtan bzhi thos der phan chad bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par 'tshang
[\[250b.2\]]rgya'o/_/mi blun po dag 'di skad du 'di lta ste/_dmigs pa'i tshul gcig pus byang chub thob po zhes zer te/_de dag ni spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/brtson pa la bdud glags tshol gyi mi brtson pa la bdud kyis ci zhig bya bar 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las/_
[\[250b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la g.yo dang /_ser sna dang phrag dog dang /_/phra ma dag gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya mi nus so snyam pa'i zhen pa'i sems med do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dus ma yin pa dang /_ma ldong ba dang /_ra ro ba dang /_dug dang /_brdeg pa dang /_mtshon dang /_'gyed pa dang /_
[\[250b.4\]]rang gi lag nas ma yin pa 'dod pa'i reg pa'i sbyin pa med do/_/blo gros mi zad pas zhus pa las/_chos thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems ni byang chub kyi sems shes pa'o/_/sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i le'u las/_lha'i bu khams gsum pa ni sems tsam du zad la sems de yang sgyu ma lta bu ste/_
[\[250b.5\]]sems kyi chos nyid kyis yongs su btsal kyang mi rnyed do/_/sems gang gis yongs su btsal ba'i sems de yang mi rnyed do/_/sems can mi dmigs pas chos thams cad mi dmigs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa ni ji tsam du bdag sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde
[\[250b.6\]]ba de tsam du gzhan gyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir brtson no/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na chos zab mo rnams la yang spyod la/_yang dag pa'i mtha' yang mngon sum du mi byed do/_/bzhi ni dam bcas pa la brtan pas snying po la gnas pa dang /_zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus
[\[250b.7\]]dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/gling chen po bzhi pa 'di 'ba' zhig tu nga mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi/_gling gzhan du ma yin no snyam na maung gal gyi bu khyod de ltar mi blta'o/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_gling chen po bzhi pa thams cad du/_ngas sems can rnams kyi mos
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]pa ji lta ba bzhin chos ston to/_/kha cig tu ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/_kha cig tu ni yum gyi lhums na gnas pa/_kha cig tu ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa/_kha cig tu ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ngas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/_/
[\[251a.2\]]de ltar 'di na rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa/_dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhi rnam par gzhag pa lta bu de ni med kyi de dag thams cad stan gcig la 'dug nas/_mngon par shes pa 'ga' zhig gis mngon sum du byed cing /_rnam par thar pa brgyad rjes su 'thob pa dang /_
[\[251a.3\]]ye shes chen po thob nas nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_rang gi lus mes sreg par byed cing yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/maung gal gyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni re zhig skye gnas lnga len par 'gyur te/_bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'i ming gis rnyed par 'tsho bar byed
[\[251a.4\]]la/_byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la mi slob pa dang /_chos spong ba la btang snyoms su byed cing mi bzlog pa dang /_gzhan dag gi rnyed pa'i bar chad byed cing bsngags pa ma yin pa brjod pa dang /_lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ma bsrungs pa'o/_/sdom pa gsum bstan pa las/_gang
[\[251a.5\]]gi sems la rjes su 'gyod pa yod pa de dag mtshams med pa dang mi dge ba bcu mi byed/_mir ro ba'i lag pa nas 'dzin pa'am rtsod par mi byed/_byams pa'i sems la zhugs pas gnas nyi shu yongs su spong ngo /_/bud med nyi shu ma tshang ba la chos mi 'chad/_dge slong mas dris pa'i
[\[251a.6\]]lan mi gdab/_bud med kyi yi ge mi bri/_gnyan 'dab kyis mgron du bos par mi 'gro/_/dge slong mas bskugs pa la slar bskugs par mi bya/_/dge slong mas byin pa'i chos gos mi bgo/_/yugs sa mos bos na/_dge 'dun med par khas mi blang /_dge slong mas bos na lag
[\[251a.7\]]bsnol mgo smad de phyogs de nas byol bar bya/_chos ston pa'i gnas su dge slong ma 'ongs na snyim pas gdong bkab ste 'dug par bya/_chos gnyis kun du bstan par bya ste/_gang zhe na/_chos thams cad la dngos po med pa'i chos nyid yongs su btsal bar bya ba dang /_yongs su btsal ba'i sems kyang
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]bskyed par mi bya'o/_/ji ltar btsal zhe na/_ji ltar yongs su btsal ba de gnyis mi dmigs pa ltar ro/_/mi dmigs pas mi dmigs pa'i sems kyang bskyed par mi bya ste/_de ni log par lta ba yin pas khams gsum pa'i sems so/_/mis zhag drug gi bar du zan ma
[\[251b.2\]]zos pa ni bla'i/_bstan pa 'di la rab tu byung nas bdag dang sems can nas/_mya ngan las 'das par blta ba'i bar du lta bas dad pas byin pa spyod pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong brkam chag can phra ma can brlang pa/_rtsub pa khro gnyer can chos gsum po la
[\[251b.3\]]gnas te/_sman dpyad dang /_nyo tshong dang /_bud med dang 'dra ba dag 'byung ngo /_/dper na khyi khro ba'i snar mkhris pas btab na phyir khro'o/_/de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa khyi dang wa dang 'dra ba dag 'byung ste/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab zab pa dang sdom pa
[\[251b.4\]]thob nas phyir zhing khro'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams gsung rab ji lta bu thos kyang skyo ba mi skye ste/_bzhi ni bag med pa dang /_rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pa dang /_dmyal ba chen po la yid mi ches pa dang /_bdag 'chi ba la yid mi ches pa'o/_/gzhan yang bzhis skyo
[\[251b.5\]]bar mi 'gyur te/_bzhi ni/_/'byung ba gzhon te bar chad med pa dang /_mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /_'dod pa'i yon tan la chags pa dang /_rnal 'byor ma myong zhing gdung ba'i stobs can du gyur pa'o/_/dge sbyong dang bram zer byed pa'i chos ni gcig ste/_chos thams cad la sems mi
[\[251b.6\]]gnas pa'o/_/sems rtse gcig pa zhes bya ba ni yongs su btsal na chos gcig kyang mi dmigs pa'o/_/dge slong ma'i shes rab ni sor gnyis pa yin/_ma 'ongs pa na phan tshun stong pa stong pa zhes brjod pas yongs su rtogs so yongs su rtogs so zhes tshig tu smra ba 'byung ngo /_/
[\[251b.7\]]de'i tshe yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs shing mi 'gal bar sbyong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i dge slong ni dge slong nyis stong gi dge 'dun gyi nang na gcig kyang dkon par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa 'di ni 'das 'og tu/_/bskal pa drug cu tham par ni/_/sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]'gyur na/_/dga' ba 'di ni ga la 'byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas chos gsum mi bya ste/_gzhan gyi sbyin pa la ma bos sam thabs med par mar gyi nying khu yang sbyin par mi bya ba dang /_rab tu byung ba'i bar chad mi bya zhing bskul ba dang /_mchod rten gyi las kyi blar
[\[252a.2\]]bskos na de la brten te yo byad du mi spyad pa'o/_/yang gsum mi bya ste/_skyes pa btsong ba dang /_bud med 'tshong ba dang /_sman ma yin pa sbyin pa'o/_/yang gsum mi bya ste/_smad 'tshong ma'i thad du 'gro ba dang /_smra sems tha dad par spyod pa'i skyes pa dang bud med bsten pa dang /_ba glang gsod pa'i
[\[252a.3\]]gnas su 'gro ba'o/_/zung gi mdo las/_de nas bram ze dang gzhan mu stegs can spyod pa dang /_kun du rgyu dang /_gcer bu pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_bdud sdig can 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad lhags nas/_g.yo bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan
[\[252a.4\]]'das bdag cag 'dir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du mchis te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi bde ba 'di lta bu thob par gyur cig_/'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta bu thob par gyur
[\[252a.5\]]cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_bzhin bzangs dag de de bzhin te/_ji ltar khyed de bzhin gshegs pa'i gan du lhags nas/_khyed kyis zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/des na khyed thams cad ring po mi thogs
[\[252a.6\]]par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig 'di gsungs ma thag tu/_de nas gzhan mu stegs can de dag thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/_thams cad kyang sa bcu la gnas pa'i byang
[\[252a.7\]]chub sems dpar gyur nas/_de dag steng gi bar snang la 'phags te/_pha rol tu phyin pa lnga pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' la sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_bdag gi sbyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par/_gzhan du smin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar bsngo na/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/byang
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]chub sems dpa' la thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba na thams cad mkhyen par yongs su ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pa btang ba yang /_thabs mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la byed cing bsngo na pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpas thog ma kho nar sbyor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
[\[252b.2\]]par bya'o/_/nyams pa phyir bslang bar nus sam/_smras pa/_ji ste yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas la/_ji ste bden pa ma mthong na'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par khyim par gnas te 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams
[\[252b.3\]]la brten cing longs spyod la/_nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas su sems mi bskyed na/_de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes mi bya ste/_'di ltar lhag pa'i sems ma dkrugs pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug
[\[252b.4\]]pa la dbang thob mod kyi/_mnyam par gzhog par ni mi byed do/_/'du shes dang tshor ba bar gzhag na ni/_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byed par blta ste/_yab dang sras mjal ba las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa las/_skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin so sor
[\[252b.5\]]'chal/_bskal pa grangs med pa gzhal du med pa'i sngon rol na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_chos kun yid la byar med pa/_/'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te/_/bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan/_/stobs bcu rgyal ba ma
[\[252b.6\]]dris par/_/sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston/_/de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de zhes bya ba yang 'dir zad do/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs/_rab tu mkhyen/_legs par mngon du mdzad pas/_de'i
[\[252b.7\]]phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/'dod chags gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal pa/_zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs/_/gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong ni/_/thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes te/_chos thams cad
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]kyang ma skyes pa'o/_/de bas na chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/dmyal ba nas tshe 'phos pa'i rtags skad che ba yin/_skad lhang lhang po yin/_sems can kun la yid mi rton pa yin no/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i rtags ni gnyid
[\[253a.2\]]che le lo che mang du za ba yin/_mi gsal bar smra ba yin/_kun du bskums te nyal ba yin/_gzhan du smra zhing gzhan du skye zhing g.yo byed pa yin/_bab chol du spyod pa yin no/_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i rtags ni skra ser rtag tu bkres skom ser sna dang 'dod zhen che ba/_dngos
[\[253a.3\]]po kun la rku ba'i sems yod la/_gzhan gyi rnyed pa la phrag dog che ba yin no/_/lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa ni/_khengs pa/_'thab krol can/_khon du 'dzin pa/_nga rgyal can/_lus che ba/_mche ba snang ba/_dbyen la dga' ba/_kun la brnyas par byed pa yin no/_/mi las shi 'phos pa ni/_
[\[253a.4\]]'phags pa la brten pa/_'phags pa la smon pa/_khrel dang ngo tsha shes pa/_mdza' bo la gdung ba/_gtong phod pa/_skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i mthu yod pa yin no/_/lha las tshe 'phos pa ni mdzes pa gtsang sbra che ba/_rol mo'i sgra la dga' ba/_byams pa che ba'i ngang tshul can/_'jam
[\[253a.5\]]par smra ba/_smra mkhas pa/_phan par bya ba la mkhas pa yin no/_/gang rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa de ni 'chi ba zhes bya/_gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po nga las nu byung ba'i tshe 'dzam gling gi grong khyer thams cad bya gag gi 'phur stabs kyis chod pa
[\[253a.6\]]tsam du nye'o/_/bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i ting nge 'dzin las/_bsod nams su bya ba thams cad ni/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de'i khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' gang la 'dug pa'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[253a.7\]]khams de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis ma brlabs na/_skyes ma thag tu gom pa bdun 'dor ba'i tshe/_thur du dpag tshad drug khri brgyad stong zhom par 'gyur te/_/'og nas chu shing rta'i gnya' shing tsam gyi rgyun dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yab yum las skyes
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]pa'i stobs kyang /_mi bcu'i stobs nas/_ba glang dang /_lha dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa bcu bcur bsgres pa/_drug cu la thug pa bas kyang che ste/_tha ma ni byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa yin par 'byung /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims
[\[253b.2\]]kyi tshogs ni/_bslab pa 'dral ba las snying rje ba dang /_bslab pa dang ldan pa rnams la gus pa drag pa'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na sbyin pa zad par 'gyur te/_ma bsngos pa dang /_thabs mi mkhas pa dang /_dma' bar skye ba sgrub pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po la brten pa'o/_/bzlog pa ni
[\[253b.3\]]mi zad pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' slong mo ba 'ongs na/_gtong mi phod pa de lta bu'i g.yog 'khor dang /_nor dang rgyal srid gzung bar mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun nas ston pa'i phyir kun nas sgo'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos 'dod pa rnams
[\[253b.4\]]ni/_ri dang /_ri sul dang /_shing dag gi nang du chos kyi gter bcug pa yod de gzungs dang /_chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa glegs bam du byas pa dag kyang lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal
[\[253b.5\]]dang /_chos la ma gus pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la khyad du gsod pa dang /_log pa'i tshig smra ba'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_theg pa dman pa'i rnal 'byor pa dang 'dris par byed pa dang /_theg pa dman pa la mos
[\[253b.6\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la skur pa dang /_chos la slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud byed pa'o/_/thos pas chos rnams shes par 'gyur/_/thos pas sdig pa byed mi 'gyur/_/thos pas gnod pa spong bar 'gyur/_/thos pas mya ngan 'das pa 'thob/_/byang chub
[\[253b.7\]]sems dpa' ni srog gi phyir yang sdig pa mi byed do/_/lus brtas pa'i phyir yang bas 'tsho bar mi byed do/_/srog gi phyir yang gzhan la slong khro mi byed do/_/longs spyod kyi phyir mi dge ba'i mngon par 'du mi byed do/_/yang bzhis brjed par 'gyur te/_sgyu byed pa dang /_sems can
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]la g.yos ston pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lce gnyis byed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa'o/_/spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug cha mnyam pa la spyod pa nyi khri chig stong ngo /_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' lta ba 'ga'
[\[254a.2\]]zhig la mngon par zhen te/_tha na sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen na/_de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku slu ba yin no/_/byang chub sems dpas ni dug gsum la yang spyad par bya zhing /_de dag dang yang 'bral bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad
[\[254a.3\]]la sems snyoms pa dang /_'gro ba lngar srid pa len pa ni byams pa'o/_/sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las dgrol ba dang /_'khor ba'i lam las dgrol lo snyam pa ni snying rje ba'o/_/lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams gtan gdul ba
[\[254a.4\]]nyid du yang shes par byed cing /_ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang bral la/_ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed cing /_de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par byed la/_byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na/_de tsam gyis na 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no/_/'jam dpal
[\[254a.5\]]gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu rnam grangs med pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyi/_rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no/_/lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin pas na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa kho na byang chub yin no zhes gsungs
[\[254a.6\]]so/_/shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam la thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no/_/sgrogs pa yang gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog la/_thos pas kyang mi rlom pa ni/_byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i
[\[254a.7\]]spyod pa bstan pa las/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa 'di la/_las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar gdams ngag bstan par bya/_ji ltar rjes su bstan par bya/_rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_'di skad ces smra bar bya ste/_'dod chags ma spongs shig_/zhe sdang ma gzhil cig_/gti
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]mug ma bsal cig_/rang gi lus las gyen du ma bskyod cig_/mi dge ba spyod cig_/lta ba tshar ma bcad cig_/kun du mi sbyor ba ma ston cig_/phung po rnams zung shig_/khams rnams ril por gyis shig_/skye mched rnams la spyod cig_/mi dge ba la rtogs shig_/dge ba spongs shig_/
[\[254b.2\]]chos ma sems shig_/dge 'dun la mchod pa ma byed cig ces bstan par bya'o/_/bud med 'gyur ba las/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/mdang sum bdag gi rmi lam na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[254b.3\]]dang /_drang srong rnams kyis gzhan gyi sems shes pa ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu yin te/_dper na nyi ma la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis mig can rnams kyis gzugs mthong ba bzhin no/_/me 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyis 'tshal gyi/_me mi 'bar ba ni mi 'tshal lo/_/
[\[254b.4\]]de bzhin du/_skye bo la bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi 'phags pa la ni ma yin no/_/ci thams cad mkhyen pa'i ming de yang kun brtags pa yin nam/_de de bzhin te sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag na ming tha dad pa yod pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te bdag sems par ma gyur na ni/_
[\[254b.5\]]bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed pa zhig mod/_ma thos pa ni gling byang chub 'dod pas nyan thos kyi theg pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni chos 'phags
[\[254b.6\]]kyis dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa bden pa la gnas pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/dar ma 'di las mi dge ba bcu/_byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa dge ba sbyor bar 'byung ste/_don du na byang chub kyi phyir rang dang gzhan gyi srog bor bas srog gcod pa'o/_/byang
[\[254b.7\]]chub rang rig par blangs pas ma byin par blangs pa'o/_/'dod pa 'di dag log pa yin par shes pa ni 'dod pa la log par spyod pa'o/_/sgra ji snyed pa brdzun pas na brdzun du smra ba'o/_/theg pa dman pa la mos pa theg pa de las phye nas mchog la 'god pa dang /_mu stegs can rnams
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]phra mas phye nas yang dag pa'i lam la bkod pas phra ma'o/_/rgol ba tshar bcad pas tshig rtsub pa'o/_/bye ba 'dum par byed pas na kyal pa'o/_/sems can kun bde ba la bkod par 'dod pas brnab sems so/_/chos 'jig pa'i tshe
[\[255a.2\]]stobs chen pos chos la 'dzud pa ni gnod sems so/_/log par lta ba rnams yang dag pa la 'dzud par byed pas na log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/khyim bdag drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sangs rgyas
[\[255a.3\]]la skyabs su song ba yin te/_byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba dang /_dam bcas pa mi 'jig pa dang /_snying rje chen po mi gtong ba dang /_theg pa gzhan la mi dmigs pa'o/_/bzhi dang ldan na chos la skyabs su song ba yin te/_chos smra ba la gus par byas te/_chos nyan pa dang /_
[\[255a.4\]]thos pa la tshul bzhin du rtogs pa dang /_gzhan la ston pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub chen por bsngo ba'o/_/bzhi dang ldan na dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba yin te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la 'dzud pa dang /_zang zing gis
[\[255a.5\]]sdud pa de dag chos kyis bsdu ba la sbyor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la rton gyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la ma yin pa dang /_nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la mos pa ma yin pa'o/_/'di dag la gang 'dod pa sbyin te/_chang yang byin nas de'i 'og tu 'khrul
[\[255a.6\]]pa med pa'i spyod pa dang /_shes bzhin yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug go snyam na/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas gzhan la chang byin yang /_de bzhin gshegs pas nyes par brjod pa ma yin te/_bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong ba yin
[\[255a.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas chung ma la 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/_dga' zhing brtse ba'i grogs yin gyi/_'jig rten pha rol gyi grogs ma yin pa dang /_bza' btung gi grogs yin gyi rnam par smin pa'i grogs ma yin pa dang /_bde ba'i grogs yin gyi/_sdug
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bsngal gyi grogs ma yin pa'o/_/phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kha don bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_spyod pa rnam par dag pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed gnyis kyis khyim bdag 'di rnams rab me tog puN+Da rI ka zhes 'gro
[\[255b.2\]]ste/_sdug bsngal myong nas/_tshe 'di nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa 'byung /_'phags pa dkon mchog tal la las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gzhag pa ni bcu po 'di dag ste/_sems dang po bskyed pa dang /_las dang po pa dang /_rnal 'byor spyod pa dang /_skye bar skyes pa dang /_sbyor ba phun sum tshogs
[\[255b.3\]]pa dang /_bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rgyal tshab dang /_dbang bskur ba thob pa'o/_/chos 'di dag spong bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni phal cher rab tu 'byung ba dag 'byung ste/_slob dang mi slob lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/rkyen gyi sangs
[\[255b.4\]]rgyas lus ni rnam par snang /_/rkyen gyi sangs rgyas lus la mnyam gzhag cing /_/sangs rgyas sku mchog rab las rnam par snang /_/theg pa chen po man ngag las/_chos smra ba ni sha za ba ma yin no/_/ma 'dres pa bco brgyad zhi ba rab tu byung ngo /_/theg pa chen po'i bar du gcod pa'i chos sum cu rtsa
[\[255b.5\]]gnyis la thos pa don du mi gnyer ba dang /_dpyad pa med pa dang /_slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud byed pa dang /_chos smra ba yongs su bzung bas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba yin no/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas/_sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba yin no/_/chos thams
[\[255b.6\]]cad 'byung ba med pa bstan pa las/_su zhig tshul khrims med pa de la ni/_/tshul khrims med de de mthong na/_/tshul khrims 'chal dang tshul khrims mtshan nyid gcig_/de ltar shes na de ni mgon por 'gyur/_/phan tshun khro bar byed dang ldan gyur cing /_/tshad med tshe yi zhing du smon par
[\[255b.7\]]byed/_/gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed par/_/brdeg cing spyod sar 'thob pa'i gnas yod kyi/_/bzod pa dam pa yongs su ma bsgoms par/_/rgyal ba de dag zhing du de mi 'gro/_/zhing rnams zhing ming gang gis shes gyur cig_/zhing rnams thams cad nam mkha'i rang bzhin shes/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]zhing gi yon tan rlom sems gang med pa/_/skyes bu khyu mchog zhing du de 'gro'o/_/'phags pa 'od dpag med kyi bkod pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa de spyi ni sku tshe bskal pa dpag tu med pas tshe dpag med ces kyang bya/_mngon par sangs rgyas
[\[256a.2\]]nas ni bskal pa bcu lon/_Ar+ya pa lo dang mthu chen thob kyang 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos nas der skyes/_da dung yang 'di nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis der skyes par 'gyur/_bud+d+ha 'od dpag med sngon dge slong chos kyi 'byung gnas
[\[256a.3\]]su gyur pa na/_zhing yongs su dag pa'i smon lam btab pa 'byung /_dper na/_rgya mtsho chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa/_'od dpag med kyi mtshan thos nas dad pa ni skyes la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang bkod pa rgya chen po la the tshom yod bzhin
[\[256a.4\]]pa ni der pad+mo'i mngal na gnas par skye ste/_lo lnga brgya'i bar du bud+d+ha mi mthong /_chos mi thos so/_/the tshom med pa ni pad+mo las skyil mo krung bcas te skye'o/_/byang chub kyi snying po rgyan gyi mdo las/_mchod ston la bod pa la tshul shing brim pa 'byung /_'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs
[\[256a.5\]]su 'dzin pa las/_bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa 'od srungs la stan phyed bstab bo/_/bdag ni chog shes 'dod chung dang /_/rab tu dben par gnas pa dang /_/chos gos ngan pa 'chang snyam rlom/_/'od srungs de ni mu stegs can rnams so/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa'i tshigs bcad las/_/
[\[256a.6\]]bzod bya thos pa btsal bar bya/_/de nas dgon par 'gro bar bya/_/dkon mchog ta la las 'byung ba/_/gang dag bsrungs pas sangs rgyas mchod byed pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas rjes su dran mi byed/_/gang dag sangs rgyas rjes dran mi byed pa/_/de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas bsam yas mthong /_/gang
[\[256a.7\]]dag sangs rgyas bsam yas rtag mthong ba/_/de la nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/_/gang dag nam yang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs min/_/de la bar skabs chos las nyams mi 'gyur/_/dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las/_cung zad cig bsam pa las ma byin na yi dgas su skye/_dam bcas
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]pa las ma byin na sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/byang chub sems dpa'i so sor thar pa las/_gang byin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/_/gang bzhag pa de ni byis pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'o/_/sred med kyi bus zhus pa las/_dngos po gang la gtong ba'i blo mi skye ba dang /_sems mi
[\[256b.2\]]'jug pa'i dngos po de srel bar mi bya'o/_/yongs su 'dzin pa gang la de spang ba'i sems mi skye ba'i yongs su 'dzin pa de gzung bar mi bya'o/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' lung 'bogs pa dang /_kha don du gnyer bas sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_
[\[256b.3\]]brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang ldan pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi tshogs sogs pa dang ldan pa'i tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa su las mnyan nam lung mnos sam/_bslabs pa'i slob dpon de la/_ming dang tshig dang yi ge ji snyed pa las tshigs su bcad pa de bstan
[\[256b.4\]]pa de snyed kyis bskal par gal te slob dpon de la g.yo med pa'i rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti thams cad kyis mchod pa byas kyang /_drin mi 'tshobs na/_chos ma yin pa'i gus pas lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/_cho ga spyod yul bsrung bya zhing /_/'du 'dzi med la
[\[256b.5\]]gtsang mar bya/_/rgyal po dag dang rgyal bu dang /_/'dris byed rtag tu spang bar bya/_/rgyal po'i zham 'bring gang yin dang /_/gdol pa dag dang rigs ngan dang /_/mu stegs can ni de dag dang /_/rnam pa kun du 'dris pa spang /_/dge slong 'dul dang lung gnas pa/_/dgra bcom snyam du snyems byed cing /_/
[\[256b.6\]]nga rgyal can rnams bsten mi bya/_/dgod cing smra ba'i spyod yul can/_/dge slong ma rnams rtag tu spang /_/mi brtan par ni mngon pa yis/_/dge bsnyen rnams kyang spang bar bya/_/dge 'dun bsrungs kyi rtog pa las byung /_dge tshul dgra bcom pa gcig cig la dam bzhag pa'i res bab nas/_
[\[256b.7\]]nam mkha'i snying po las/_rgyal po bzhi la mchod rten dang /_dge 'dun dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi 'phrog pa dang /_chos spong zhing 'gog pa dang /_rab tu byung ba gang yang rung ste/_de la brdeg 'tshog gam bsad bcings la sogs pa dang /_chos gos 'phrog cing khyim na gnas
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]su 'jug pa dang /_mtshams med pa gang yang rung ba zhig byed pa dang /_'jig rten pha rol la g.yem ste/_mi dge ba bcu yang blangs shing gzhan yang len du 'jug pa'o/_/sa'i snying po las/_ngan phyir rab tu byung ba tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am/_'chal ba
[\[257a.2\]]yang rung ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang chos dang mthun pas kyang chad pas gcod du mi gnang na/_chos ma yin pas lta smos ci dgos/_lhag pa'i bsam pas bskul ba las/_byams pa gang dag la brtson pa med pa dang /_bsam gtan dang /_spong ba dang /_kha ton
[\[257a.3\]]bya ba dang mang du thos pa tshol ba med pa de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/_bsam gtan la sogs pas rab tu phye ba yin gyi/_'di ltar zhal ta byed pa dang /_las kyi mthas rab tu
[\[257a.4\]]phye ba ni ma yin no/_/byams pa zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po bkang yang /_des nga mnyes pa dang /_rim gro dang /_bsti stang byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos
[\[257a.5\]]dran pa nye bar gzhag pa las/_lkog tu lhag mar bya ba te lhag ma mi za bdag la byin na yi dgas su skye'o/_/'jam dpal rnam par rol pa'i mdo las/_khong khrob khong khro ba zhes bya ba ni/_bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pas de'i phyir khong khro ba zhes
[\[257a.6\]]bya'o/_/blo gros mi zad pa las/_dge ba'i rtsa ba byang chub tu yongs su bsngos ba ni byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du bar ma dor zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/_chu'i thigs pa rgya mtsho chen por ltung ba ni/_bskal pa'i mthar thug gi bar du
[\[257a.7\]]bar ma dor zad pa med do/_/nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las/_nye ba 'khor gal te theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/_'dod chags dang ldan pa'i ltung ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed byung ba dang /_gang zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i ltung ba gcig 'byung ba/_byang chub sems
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]dpa'i theg pa brtsan par bya na/_de gnyis las gang zhe sdang dang ldan pa ni shin tu lci'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhe sdang ni sems can yongs su gtong bar 'gyur/_'dod chags ni sems can sdud par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/nye ba 'khor de la nyon mongs pa gang sems can sdud par 'gyur ba de la ni/_
[\[257b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa yang med/_'jigs pa yang med do/_/nye ba 'khor de lta bas na khyod la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i ltung ba thams cad ni ltung ba ma yin par ngas bshad do/_/nye ba 'khor de la gang thabs la mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/_'dod chags
[\[257b.3\]]dang ldan pas 'jigs kyi/_zhe sdang dang ldan pas ma yin no/_/thabs mkhas pa de dag ni zhe sdang dang ldan pas 'jigs kyi/_'dod chags dang ldan pas ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi mdo las/_chos 'dod pa rnams rnam par g.yeng bar byed pa 'di ni/_tshig kyal pa'i
[\[257b.4\]]nang na ma rungs pa'o/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las/_chos kyi rnam grangs ji snyed mang por chub byas kyang /_/thos pas rgyags te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed na/_/'di ni thos pas yongs su bskyab par mi nus te/_/tshul khrims 'chal ba des na ngan song 'gro bar 'gyur/_/'phags pa blo gros
[\[257b.5\]]mi zad pa'i mdo las/_de la sems can la dmigs pa'i byams pa ni gang thog mar snying du sdug pa'i sems can la phan pa dang /_bde ba nye bar sgrub pa'i bsam pa goms par byed cing /_de dang mthun pa'i byams pa nye bar sgrub po/_/de'i 'og tu 'dres pa rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu nye
[\[257b.6\]]'khor ba rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu rang gi grong na gnas pa rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu gzhan gyi grong nas phyogs gcig gi bar la mos par byas shing khyab par byas nas rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/phyogs bcur yang de bzhin no/_/dpal byin gyis zhus pa las/_
[\[257b.7\]]dper na byis pa sol ba thogs nas su/_/'di ni dkar por bya zhes bdar byed kyang /_/dkar po'i dngos por mi 'gyur zad par 'gyur/_/byis blo phyin ci log gi nga rgyal can/_/de ltar mi gang gtsang sbra'i blo gros ldan/_/nga yis lus 'di gtsang mar bya zhes te/_/bskus phyis 'dab
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]stegs brgyar ni khrus kyang byas/_/'chi bdag dbang gis zad 'gyur gtsang mi 'gyur/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_chang yang sbyin par 'byung /_mtshon cha la sogs pa yang shugs su 'gyur ba lta brtags te byin na ltung ba 'di nyid kyis
[\[258a.2\]]mngon no/_/gtsug na rin po che las/_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_sbyin pa ma tshang ba med pa nas/_zhi gnas lhag mthong ma tshang ba med pa'i bar dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la rtag tu 'bad pa ste/_'di ni rnam
[\[258a.3\]]pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid do zhes bya ba nas/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ngo /_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/_byang chub sems
[\[258a.4\]]dpa' rnams ni snying rje med par ci yang mi spyod do/_/bslab pa kun las btus pa las byung ba/_de la phung po gsum ni sdig pa bshags pa dang /_bsod nams kyi rjes su yi rang ba dang /_rang sangs rgyas sa la bskul ba zhes bya ste/_bsod nams kyi phung po yin pa'i phyir ro/_/lang
[\[258a.5\]]kar gshegs pa las/_blo gros chen po de la 'dod chen po rnams kyi thar par mi 'dod pa ji ltar 'byung zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa dang /_thog ma med pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi phyir smin pa'o/_/de la dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pa gang zhe na/_
[\[258a.6\]]'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'di dag ni thar pa dang mthun pa'i mdo dang 'dul ba ma yin no zhes smra bas spong zhing skur ba yin te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spangs pas mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/blo gros chen po gnyis su ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
[\[258a.7\]]po 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das kyi bar du/_bdag kyang mya ngan las mi 'da'o zhes srid par smon lam dang thabs yongs su btang bas/_de'i phyir mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/blo gros chen po de ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba rnams kyi rang
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]gi mtshan nyid de/_des 'dod pa can rnams kyi tshul rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen pos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la gtan du mya ngan las mi 'da' ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po de la byang chub
[\[258b.2\]]sems dpa' 'dod chen po ni chos thams cad thog ma nas mya ngan las 'das par shes nas/_gtan du mya ngan las mi 'da'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spong ba'i 'dod chen po ni ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad spong ba'i 'dod chen po yang /_de bzhin gshegs
[\[258b.3\]]pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis brgya la gal te na dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyor bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros chen po 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang ngo /_/blo gros chen po de ltar de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod chen po rnams
[\[258b.4\]]ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/blo gros chen po'i tshig ni rnam par rtog pa dang tha dad pa yang ma yin gcig pa yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de'i rgyu las 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir tshig gi rnam par rtog pa 'byung ngo /_/blo gros chen po de ltar tshig
[\[258b.5\]]'di rnam par rtog pa dang /_tha dad pa zhig yin na ni/_rnam par rtog pa'i rgyu las byung ba ma yin pas 'gyur ro/_/de ste gcig pa zhig yin na ni tshig de don gsal bar yang byed par yang mi 'gyur ba zhig na de ni byed do/_/de lta bas na tha dad pa yang ma yin/_gcig pa yang ma yin no/_/rnam
[\[258b.6\]]rig 'di ni ming tsam ste/_/mtshan nyid kyis ni yod ma yin/_/blo gros chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la ni mig mi 'dzums pas/_la la ni smin ma bskyod pa la sogs pas chos ston to/_/blo gros chen po nor ba de yang phyin ci log dang /_phyin ci log ma yin par rnam par brtags pas/_
[\[258b.7\]]'di lta ste 'phags pa'i rigs sam/_byis pa so so'i rigs dang rigs gnyis 'thob par byed pa yin no/_/blo gros chen po 'phags pa'i rigs kyang 'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas su dbye bas rnam pa gsum du dbye bar 'gyur ro/_/de la blo
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]gros chen po ji ltar na byis pa rnams kyis nor ba la rnam par brtags pas/_nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs bskyed ce na/_'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pas/_mngon par zhen pa nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs
[\[259a.2\]]su 'gyur te/_de ltar na blo gros chen po nor ba de nyan thos kyi theg pa'i rigs 'thob par byed pa yin no/_/de la blo gros chen po ji ltar na nor pa de nyid la rnam par brtags pas/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs 'thob par byed pa yin zhe na/_blo gros chen po 'di lta
[\[259a.3\]]ste/_/nor ba de nyid kyis rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa dang /_'du 'dzi med pa'i phyir rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs 'thob par byed pa yin no/_/blo gros chen po de la ji ltar na/_mkhas pa rnams kyis nor ba de nyid la rnam par brtags pas/_sangs rgyas kyi theg
[\[259a.4\]]pa'i rigs 'thob par byed pa yin zhe na/_'di lta ste/_blo gros chen po rang gi sems snang ba tsam khong du chud pa'i phyir phyi rol la dngos po dang dngos po med par rnam par mi rtog pas rnam par brtags na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i rigs 'thob par byed pa yin no/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen
[\[259a.5\]]po 'di ni rigs te rigs kyi don to/_/blo gros chen po byis pa rnams kyis nor ba la dngos po sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin du 'di ni de bzhin te/_gzhan du ma yin no zhes rnam par brtags na/_'khor ba'i theg pa'i rigs 'thob par byed do/_/blo gros chen po mya ngan las 'das pa ni
[\[259a.6\]]rnam pa bzhi ste/_dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_mtshan nyid sna tshogs kyi dngos po med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po med par rtog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_phung po rnams kyi rang dang spyi'i mtshan
[\[259a.7\]]nyid kyi rgyun chad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de dag ni blo gros chen po mu stegs can rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yin te/_nga'i gsung rab ma yin no/_/blo gros chen po nga'i gsung rab la ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa dang /_bcas pa'i yid kyi rnam
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]par shes pa bzlog pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bya'o/_/kun brtags pa yi rang bzhin yod/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni med pa ste/_/nor ba dag gis brtags pa snang /_/gzhan gyi dbang la mi rtog go/_/kun rdzob dang ni don dam ste/_/rgyu las skyes pa gsum du med/_/
[\[259b.2\]]brtags pa dag ni kun rdzob bshad/_/de bshad 'phags pa'i spyod yul lo/_/blo gros chen po ye shes ni rnam pa gsum ste/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i mchog go/_/de la skyes nas 'jig pa ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/
[\[259b.3\]]ma skyes mi 'jig pa ni ye shes so/_/gzhan yang blo gros chen po gsum 'dus pa'i bya ba skye ba dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes pa'o/_/mi ldan pa'i ngo bo nyid ni ye shes so/_/blo gros chen po khyad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun
[\[259b.4\]]gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa rnam par sbyar bar bya'o/_/de la ming dang mtshan ma ni yongs su kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin du shes par bya'o/_/gang yang blo gros chen po de la gnas shing bzhugs pa'i rnam par rtog pa sems dang sems las byung ba zhes pa bsgrags
[\[259b.5\]]pa nyi ma dang 'od zer lhan cig pa bzhin du dus gcig tu byung ba sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid rang gi rnam par rtog pa khong du chud par byed pa'i rang bzhin ni gzhan gyi dbang zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po yang dag pa'i ye shes dang /_de bzhin nyid ni mi 'jigs pa'i phyir yongs su grub par
[\[259b.6\]]shes par bya'o/_/blo gros chen po gzhan yang gser dang rdo rje dang /_rgyal po'i rin sred dang /_thob pa dang khyad par dag ni mi 'jigs pa yin te/_blo gros chen po gal te mngon par rtogs pa thob pa yin na ni/_'phags pa rnams 'phags pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_'phags
[\[259b.7\]]pa rnams ni 'phags pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po gser dang rdo rje ni rnam par gzhag kyang de bzhin du 'dug ste/_mi 'bri mi skye na byas pa ldem po ngag tu bshad pa la/_mi mkhas pa dag gis phyi nang gi chos thams cad skad cig pa'i don ji ltar brtags/_
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]sems ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/_/ngar sems nyid ni yid yin no/_/gang gis yul rnams 'dzin pa ni/_/de ni rnam par shes zhes bya/_/sems ni rtag tu lung ma bstan/_/yid ni gnyi gar gyur pa ste/_/rnam par shes pa 'byung ba yang
[\[260a.2\]]de ni dge dang mi dge ba'o/_/lnga po snang la rtog par byed/_/chos lnga dag dang rang bzhin rnams/_/de ni sangs rgyas spyod yul yin/_/yod pa'i zla grangs med pa ste/_/med pa'ang yod pa'i zla grangs so/_/kun du brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang /_/phan tshun mtshan
[\[260a.3\]]nyid tha mi dad/_/gzugs kyi mi rtag nyid bzhin te/_/gcig la gcig kyang skyed byed pa'o/_/brtags pa shul du mthong gyur na/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni mi skye'o/_/gzhan gyi dbang ni rab mthong na/_/brtags pa de bzhin nyid du 'gyur/_/ji ltar 'phags pa rnam bsgom ltar/_/
[\[260a.4\]]dngos po'i dngos nyid med mod kyi/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa ltar/_/dngos po dag ni yod pa'o/_/sems ni snang dang rnam bral ba/_/rang bzhin gnyis kyang spangs pa ste/_/gnas rnams rab tu gyur pa ni/_/skye ba med par ngas bshad do/_/nam yang stong bas stong pa
[\[260a.5\]]nyid/_/skye ba med pa'i stong pa'o/_/ji srid sems ni 'jug pa'i bar/_/de srid 'jig rten rgyang pan yin/_/'jig rten rang gi sems mthong na/_/rnam par rtog pa mi 'jig go/_/nga dang de bzhin gshegs rnams kyis/_/stong phrag gsum gyi mdo rnams kyis/_/mya ngan 'das
[\[260a.6\]]pa shin tu bshad/_/'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs med du/_/sangs rgyas rnam par 'tshang mi rgya/_/gzugs kyi khams kyi 'og min du/_/'dod chags bral khyod 'tshang rgya'o/_/reg pa dang ni gzir ba yis/_/lha dang sems can dmyal ba'i lus/_/bar ma
[\[260a.7\]]do yi srid med de/_/rnam par shes pas bskyed pa yin/_/mngal sgong drod gsher la sogs pa'i/_/srid pa bar ma 'byung ba dag_/sems can mang po sna tshogs bzhin/_/dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po las/_/thang las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri rnams dang /_
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]chu las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri rnams dang /_/thang las skyes pa'i rin po che la sogs pa phyogs bcu na rnam par gnas pa nga yir bya ba med par yongs su gzung ba med pa rnams la 'bul lo/_/don dam pa'i chos kyi rnam par rgyal ba las 'byung ba/_kha cig ni mngal na
[\[260b.2\]]gnas pa nyid kyi tshe srin bu rnams kyis zos so/_/drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste/_bskal pas bsregs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ste/_drang srong chen po 'di lta ste dper na/_gser la gnod pa bya ba'i phyir mer bcug pa ma yin gyi/_
[\[260b.3\]]gser ma dul ba 'di ji ltar dul bar 'gyur snyam nas de'i phyir mer 'jug go/_/drang srong chen po de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rgyu med par bsreg pa'i bskal pa mi 'byin te/_'dir sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur ro/_/bskal pas bsregs
[\[260b.4\]]pa'i 'jigs pa las bdag nyid bsregs pa mthong nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas 'di skad ces bdag kyang 'di ltar gyur ces smon lam 'debs so/_/sems can gnas gang du 'du bar gyur pa bdag la bka' stsol cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[260b.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_drang srong chen po theg pa chen po gcig gis 'byung ba las sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi snying po la sems can 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/phung po ma lus pa'i dbyings su sems can rnams 'du bar 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po yang 'di lta ste dper na/_chu klung tha dad pa
[\[260b.6\]]dang /_klung phran dang chen po dag rgya mtsho chen por bab nas ro gcig tu gyur to/_/de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'i/_dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/_thabs kyis ma zin pa'i shes rab ni bcings pa'o/_/thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab ni grol ba'o/_/shes rab
[\[260b.7\]]kyis ma zin pa'i thabs ni bcings pa'o/_/shes rab kyis zin pa'i thabs ni grol ba'o/_/de la thabs kyis ma zin pa shes rab bcings pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la nges par sems shing /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi sems pa ni thabs kyis ma zin pa'i shes rab ste bcings pa'o/_/de la thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab dgrol ba gang zhe na/_mtshan la sogs pa la nges par sems shing /_stong pa
[\[261a.2\]]mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la 'dris par bya ba 'di ni thabs kyis zin pa'i shes rab ste grol ba'o/_/de la shes rab kyis ma zin pa'i thabs bcings pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta ba thams cad dang /_nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_rjes su
[\[261a.3\]]chags pa dang /_khong khro ba la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad byang chub tu mi bsngo ba ni/_shes rab kyis ma zin pa'i thabs te bcings pa'o/_/de la shes rab kyis zin pa'i thabs grol ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lta ba thams cad nyon mongs pa la sogs pa
[\[261a.4\]]spangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rtsom pa thams cad byang chub tu yongs su bsngos la/_des kyang bsnyems pa med pa de ni shes rab kyis zin pa'i thabs te grol ba'o/_/kun dga' bo gang na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams
[\[261a.5\]]kyang yod do/_/gang na 'od dang gang na byang chub kyi shing dang /_gang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang /_gang na chos dang /_gang na zhal zas la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mdzad pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yod do/_/'phags pa rin po che'i mtha'
[\[261a.6\]]las/_des ji skad bstan pa la gal te mtshungs pa med pa byed pa de ltar mos te/_mtshams med pa yang de lta bu'i dbyings yin par shes na/_de kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal mtshams med pa ni chos kyi dbyings su
[\[261a.7\]]mtshungs par mnyam pa'i phyir te/_'di ltar mtshams med pa'i dbyings dang chos kyi dbyings ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med do/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba byas la/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag chos bzhi dang ldan na/_lnga brgya
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]tha ma la dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i tshe/_ma snad cing ma smas la bde bar yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_bdag gis 'khrul pa la so sor rtogs dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng ba dang /_
[\[261b.2\]]mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_slong mo ster ba'i khyim la mi lta ba dang /_yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig spong ba'o/_/yang bzhi ste/_thos pa nyung ngu'i sems can yongs su spong ba dang /_'khor mi bsdu ba dang bas mtha'i gnas mal la brten pa dang /_bdag dul ba dang /_
[\[261b.3\]]zhi ba dang /_zhi gnas kyi sbyor ba la brtson pa'o/_/byams pa nga ni tshul 'chos pa la dgon pa na gnas pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni bsod nams chung ngu la 'dod pa chung ba zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni kha zas bzang po 'dod pa la bsod snyoms pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni gos sdu
[\[261b.4\]]gu 'dod pa la phyag dar khrod pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba 'dres pa la ma 'dzings pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni g.yo sgyu can la sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni gzhan gyi 'khrul pa tshol ba la rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes mi smra'o/_/
[\[261b.5\]]nga ni khong khro ba mang ba tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni nga rgyal can la mang du thos pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni phyogs 'dzin pa la 'dul ba 'dzin pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni rgod pa la chos smra ba zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni khyim pa dang 'dres pa la zhal ta byed pa yongs
[\[261b.6\]]su dag pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni yon gnas dam pa la zang zing med pa yongs su gtong ba zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni lan du phan 'dogs su re ba la bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa la lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs sa dag pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni ma dang
[\[261b.7\]]pha mang ba la rab tu byung ba zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni pha rol la shes par byed pa la bslab pa 'dod pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni ma gus pa la chos sbyin pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni 'jig rten pa'i gsang tshig la brtson pa la chos la dga' ba zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni stong pa nyid la mi brtson
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]pa la nges par byung ba zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni dmigs pa can la mngon par rtogs pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni mthu med pa la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni ma bcos pa la bzod pa'i stobs kyi go cha can zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni rang
[\[262a.2\]]bzhin gyis 'dod chags chung ba la tshangs par spyod pa dga' ba la gnas pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni sbyor ba la mi gnas pa la ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni thabs dang ldan par gyur pa la g.yo sgyu can zhes mi smra'o/_/nga ni sems zhum pa la
[\[262a.3\]]nga rgyal med pa zhes mi smra'o/_/lag bzangs kyis zhus pa las/_lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' ni slong ba rnams kyis bslongs pa na yan lag dang nying lag bcad nas slong ba rnams la mi sbyin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag nyid kyis sems can dmyal
[\[262a.4\]]ba chen por 'gyur ba dang /_mi dge ba'i las chen po rgya che ba yongs su myong ba'i phyir ro/_/lag bzangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni slong bas bdog pa thams cad blangs na/_pha ma la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/_/nod pa byas shing
[\[262a.5\]]bu dang chung ma dang /_bran pho dang bran mo dang zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_las byed pa dag la gnod pa byas shing spangs te/_sdug bsngal bar byas nas slong ba rnams la sbyin par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad la mtshungs par snying brtse
[\[262a.6\]]ba'i phyir ro/_/bu mo zla mchog gis zhus pa las/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni skye ba dang 'gag pa dang /_chad pa dang /_rtag pa dang /_don gcig pa dang /_don tha dad pa dang /_'ong ba dang 'gro ba ma mchis pa'o/_/las rnam par 'byed pa las/_
[\[262a.7\]]mdog mi sdug par 'gyur ba'i las bcu ste/_da bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi mar me'i 'od kyi bar du gcod pa dang /_gang zag mdog mi sdug pa rnams la dbang za ba/_rigs dma' bar 'gyur ba'i chos bcu ste/_rigs dma' bar skye ba rnams la
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]dbang za ba/_shes rab 'chal bar gyur pa'i chos smra ba rnams legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa/_yi dgas su gyur pa'i chos bcu ste/_bkres shing skom bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dang /_dngos po la chags bzhin du 'chi ba'i dus byed pa/_de la nges par skye bar
[\[262b.2\]]'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/_dge ba'i las byas nas 'dis bdag 'di lta bu zhig tu skye bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ba dang mtshams med pa lnga rnams so/_/de la las gang dang ldan na/_gang zag sems can dmyal ba rnams su skyes ma thag tu 'chi
[\[262b.3\]]'pho ba'i las gang zhe na/_dper na rgyal po ma skyes dgras pha bsad pa lta bu ste/_de skad du/_shin tu mi bzad las rnams byas pa na/_/bdag la smod dang rab tu bshags pa dang /_/sdom pa byed pas de dag bsrabs 'gyur gyi/_/shin tu rtsa nas phyin
[\[262b.4\]]ces mi smra'o/_/zhes gsungs so/_/gang sngar bde bar 'gyur la phyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba'i las gang zhe na/_'di la gang zag 'ga' zhig sbyin pa byin pa na/_yid rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes la byin nas ni 'gyod pa yin te/_gang
[\[262b.5\]]zag de gang gi tshe mi rnams kyi nang du skyes pa na/_sngar phyug pa dang blon po dang nye du mang ba la sogs par 'gyur la/_phyis nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de la gang zag gang tshe zad par gyur pa las ma zad pa gang zhe na/_gang zag gang sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos
[\[262b.6\]]nas/_sems can dmyal bar skye ba dang /_las zad la tshe ma zad pa gang zhe na/_sngar bde bar gyur la phyis sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba dang /_chang 'thung ba la nyes dmigs sum cu rtsa drug ste/_tshe 'di la nor zad pa dang /_nad kyi gzhir 'gyur ba dang /_'thab
[\[262b.7\]]pa dang /_mtshang 'dru ba dang /_rtsod pa 'phel ba dang /_sba ba'i gnas ston pa dang /_mi snyan pa bskyed pa dang /_shes rab nyams par byed pa dang /_ma thob pa'i longs spyod mi ma thong ba dang /_thob pa las nyams pa dang /_gsang ba brjod pa dang /_las su bya ba nyams pa dang /_
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]mya ngan gyi rtsa bar 'gyur ba dang /_nyam chung bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gror mi byed pa dang /_pha mar mi 'dzin pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la mi gus pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa dang /_
[\[263a.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis spangs pa dang /_'dzin pa med pa dang /_dbang po ma bsdams pa dang /_bud med la bag med pa dang /_skye bo'i yid du mi 'ong ba dang /_nye du btsun pas smad pa dang /_chos ma yin pa 'dzin pa dang /_chos spong ba dang /_mkhas pa rnams la
[\[263a.3\]]yid mi brtan pa dang /_bag bya ba la g.yel ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa las ring ba dang /_myos par 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang /_shi nas ngan song ngan 'gro sems can dmyal bar skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la
[\[263a.4\]]'jug pa bstan pa las/_'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang mi la las ni/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_brjod du med pa'i bar gyi bskal ba ji snyed lon par shes/_la las ni mya ngan las 'das nas brjod du
[\[263a.5\]]med pa'i bar gyi bskal ba lon par shes so/_/'jam dpal gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_mthong na sa ri mor bris pa'am/_'jim pa las byas pa'ang rung ste/_gnod pa'i sems sam dang ba'i sems kyis mthong na/_de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[263a.6\]]des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang /_skye ba dang nub par 'gyur ba snang mod kyi/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la skye ba dang 'bri ba dang /_nub par 'gyur ba med de sems can rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[263a.7\]]las rnam par smin pas yud tsam la sogs pa dang /_lo bgrang ba'i grangs gzhag pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i bya ba rnams 'byung ste/_'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dpa' ni grangs med dpag tu med pa'i bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sems can dmyal ba dang /_byol song dang /_yi dgas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tshe 'di la rnam par smin te/_klad pa tsha ba'am/_rims sam/_rtsib
[\[263b.2\]]logs na ba'am/_rgyal po'i srid 'khrugs pa'am/_lho bal gyis dkrugs pa'am/_mu ge'i 'khrug pa'am/_gzhan dang gzhan gyi 'khrug pas lus kyi gnod pa'am/_ngag gi gnod pa'am/_yid kyi gnod pas tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur ro/_/spyos pa'am/_
[\[263b.3\]]tha na rmi lam gyis kyang 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni yang dag pa ther zug g.yung drung ngo /_/'jam dpal khros pa'i sems sam/_dang ba'i sems kyis de bzhin
[\[263b.4\]]gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa'am/_'jim pa las byas pa gang gis mthong ba tha na byol song gi skye gnas su song yang rung ste/_de dag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad med par 'gyur/_lha mo dpal phreng gis zhus pa las/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
[\[263b.5\]]pa'i snying po ni rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i mthar mchis pa mi skye ba dang /_mi 'gag pa'i chos can no/_/'dul ba rnam par gtan la dbab pa
[\[263b.6\]]nye ba 'khor gyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa khyim na gnas pas ni sbyin pa gnyis la gnas par bya ste/_chos sbyin pa dang /_zang zing sbyin pa'o/_/rab tu byung bas ni sbyin pa bzhi la gnas par bya ste/_smyu gu dang snag tsha
[\[263b.7\]]dang glegs bam dang chos sbyin pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi kha na ma tho ba chen po dang bcas pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te/_zhe sdang dang ldan pa dang /_gti mug dang ldan pa'o/_/de la 'dod chags ni kha na
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]ma tho ba dang bcas ba chung ma 'bral ba bul ba yin no/_/zhe sdang ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral ba myur ba yin no/_/gti mug ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa che la 'bral ba bul ba yin no/_/'dod chags ni nying mtshams sbyor ba'i sa bon yin no/_/zhe
[\[264a.2\]]sdang ni ngan song du 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa yin no/_/gti mug ni sems can dmyal ba chen po brgyad du ltung ba'i rgyur gyur ba yin no/_/nye ba 'khor de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems
[\[264a.3\]]dpa' tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa nyid dang shin tu 'chal pa'i tshul khrims nyid yin la/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yang nyan thos kyi yongs su ma dag pa dang shin tu 'chal ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos kyi gnas skad cig tsam yang sred
[\[264a.4\]]pa len par mi byed la/_de ni nyan thos kyi tshul khrims yongs su ma dag pa yin no/_/de nyid theg pa chen po'i 'chal ba'i tshul khrims yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal ba grangs med par srid par skye bas yongs su mi skyo ba yin te/_de nyid nyan thos kyi 'chal
[\[264a.5\]]pa'i tshul khrims yin no/_/'phags pa kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa las/_rdo chag pa'i 'phro mi 'byor pa lta bu ni nyan thos kyi 'dul ba'o/_/gser dang dngul chag pa'i 'phro 'byor pa lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba'o/_/gsang
[\[264a.6\]]chen thabs la mkhas pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can de dag gi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag thams cad bsdus nas 'chags par byed cing /_sems kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad bdag gi
[\[264a.7\]]lus la bab par gyur cing /_sems can de dag bde bar gyur cig ces go gyon par yang byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa ni gal te brgya lam na nyes pa 'byung na yang 'di ltar so sor slob te/_gal te khams dang skye mched dang phung po
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]'di dag nyid kyis mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur na ni/_de lta bas na bdag gis yongs su gdul bar bya dgos par 'gyur ba las bdag gis 'di ltar go bgo bar bya ste/_bdag sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i bar du 'khor bar bya ba la
[\[264b.2\]]bdag gis sems zhum par mi bya zhing /_ji lta ji ltar 'khor ba na 'khor bar gyur pa de lta de ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_nyes pa 'di yang chos bzhin phyir bya zhing /_phyin chad kyang nyes pa mi 'byung bar bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyang nyes pa las 'byung
[\[264b.3\]]ba'i chos bstan par bya'o zhes go cha gyon par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung na/_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba la gal te rtsa ba'i nyes pa bzhi po thams cad byung bar gyur na yang thabs la mkhas pa des sel bar byed na/_rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan
[\[264b.4\]]pa la nyes pa med ces smra'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des cung zad cig 'dod pa dang ldan par byas pas kyang bskal pa khrir 'khor ba bsnyil cing spangs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu sems can gzhan dag gi sems can dmyal bar 'gyur
[\[264b.5\]]ba'i las gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba ltos/_kun dga' bo 'dod chags bskyed pa gang gis ni/_sems can gzhan dag sems dmyal 'gro 'gyur ba/_/de yis dpa' rnams mtho ris
[\[264b.6\]]'gro 'gyur zhing /_/skyes par 'gyur ba'i yon tan de 'dra ltos/_/rigs kyi bu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na/_zhag bdun gyis kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni dga' ldan gyi
[\[264b.7\]]gnas nas mi g.yo bzhin du sprul pas 'pho ba dang /_skye ba la sogs pa kun du ston to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dam pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshig gang gis bdag dang gzhan
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]lag dung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshig mi smra'o zhes bka' stsal lags na/_bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng zhes bgyi bar gyur pa na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
[\[265a.2\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya/_byang chub sems ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas/_dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod ces gsungs na/_bcom
[\[265a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs pa/_de ci las dgongs te gsungs lags/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes dam pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub
[\[265a.4\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa'i tshad rab tu rnam par dbye ba khyod la ci bya thong shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thabs la mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pas/_skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ji lta ji ltar
[\[265a.5\]]sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' lo drug tu dka' ba spyad pa yang nyon cig_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams mi dge ba'i
[\[265a.6\]]las kyi bya ba dag la nges par skyo bar bya ba'i phyir te/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od srungs kyi gsung rab la tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de yang byang chub sems dpa'
[\[265a.7\]]thabs la mkhas pa de dang /_ldem po ngag yin par blta bar bya ste/_las kyi sgrib pa de'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' lo drug tu dka' ba spyod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag yongs su smin par byas shing /_las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan pa
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]gang yin pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa des kyang ngas lo drug tu dka' ba'i spyod pa spyad par gyur pas sems can mi shes pa spyod pa gzhan dag gis ni dge sbyong ngam/_bram ze'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa la lkog nas tshig rtsub po brjod na/_de dag la yun ring por gnod
[\[265b.2\]]par bstan pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pas las de kun du ston par zad kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do/_/gzhan yang sems can gang dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa la tshig rtsub mo smras nas/_bdag cag la ni thar ba'i skal ba med do
[\[265b.3\]]snyam du sems shing phyin chad rtsol bar mi byed pa de dag gi 'gyod pa bsal ba'i phyir yang las de kun du bstan te/_gal te rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa btab par gyur na yang de nyid kyis sad pa'i tshe na dri mar yang 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[265b.4\]]pa la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pas zhal zas mi bsod pa gsol kyang mod la lha'i kha zas las yang dag par 'das pa'i ror 'gyur ro/_/srid pa 'pho ba las/_rgyal po chen po de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas 'jig rten pha rol du 'pho ba yang med
[\[265b.5\]]la/_'chi 'pho dang skye bar mngon pa yang yod do/_/de la gang rnam par shes pa thams cad 'gag pa de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya la/_gang dang po 'byung ba ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing /_/yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa/_/de ni bden pa mchog yin
[\[265b.6\]]te/_/de la 'jig rten mi dpogs so/_/'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/_/'du shes tsam du gnas pa yin/_/brjod pa la ni gzhan gyur pas/_/brjod par bya ba yod ma yin/_/ming ni gang dang gang gis su/_/chos rnams gang dang gang brjod pa/_/de la 'jig rten mi dpogs
[\[265b.7\]]so/_/'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/_/de la de ni yod ma yin/_/'di ni chos rnams chos nyid do/_/ming gis ming ni stong pa ste/_/ming ni ming gis yod ma yin/_/phag mo'i rtogs pa brjod pa las/_/lha'i bu 'chi 'pho ba'i snga ltas rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang zhe na/_gos
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]sngan chad ma rnyings pa rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /_me tog gi phreng ba sngon chad ma rnyings pa rnyings par 'gyur ba dang /_mchan khung gnyis na rngul 'byung ba dang /_lus las dri nga ba 'byung ba dang /_rang gi gnas la mi dga' ba'o/_/sangs rgyas mi spang ba
[\[266a.2\]]las/_'jig rten gyi khams smig rgyu can du bud+d+ha rnam par gzigs pa'i nga ro 'byung ba'i tshe/_rigs kyi bu bcu zhig gis gtsug lag khang lnga brgya lnga brgya byed du bcug la/_gtsug lag khang re re na yang ban de stong stong gi 'tsho ba sbyor ba las/_de'i tshe chos smra ba spobs pa
[\[266a.3\]]brtsegs pa zhes bya ba la tshul khrims 'chal pa gleng gleng ba las/_las de'i rnam par smin pa las lo dgu khrir sems can dmyal bar skyes so/_/tshe rabs lnga brgyar ni mi rnams kyi nang du za ma dang /_kla klo dang log par lta ba'i khyim du skyes so/_/lo drug brgyar ni
[\[266a.4\]]dmus long dang /_lce med par gyur to/_/tshe rabs bdun brgyar ni rab tu byung nas/_ji srid 'tsho ba'i mthar thug gi bar du gzungs ma thos par 'chi ba'i dus byas te/_las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis rigs kyi bu de dag bsgribs so/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod mos
[\[266a.5\]]par bya/_khong du chud par bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos smra ba la mngon sum du mthong yang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyis brjod par mi byan/_thos pas lta ci smos/_/rigs kyi bu gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed pa bas ni/_gang zhig
[\[266a.6\]]chos smra pa la gshe ba'i bsam pas lta bar byed na/_de ni de bas ches kha na ma tho ba'i las che ba yin no/_/gang zhig sems can thams cad 'ching bar byed pa bas/_gang zhig chos smra ba mthong na rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug par byed na/_'di la snga mas brgya dang /_stong dang /_
[\[266a.7\]]'bum dang /_grangs dang /_dpag pa'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang chos smra ba la skur pa 'debs pa des ni sangs rgyas la skur ba btab pa'i phyir ro/_/sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byed par 'dod pas chos smra ba la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas pas gnas kyang rung ste/_byang chub sems dpas srog gi phyir yang 'khrul pa blta bar mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/bzhi gang
[\[266b.2\]]zhe na/_stong pa nyid sgom pa dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la rtag tu phan pa nye bar sgrub pa dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos sbyin pa'o/_/s+yad ya the dan/_ad tshe ad tshab Di/_an bi le/_a sheSho/_a
[\[266b.3\]]tri te/_a na yu d+hi/_a phe a bi dza ri da/_b+ha ba rud tra/_aM ga ma/_yut+ta na da nya ba/_pra k+Shi be/_Ni ba De/_a gra he/_hu hu me/_tsa pa le/_sa De sa me/_sa ma de yo Di/_na yo ba ri sho d+hi/_zhag bdun du gzungs sngags 'di dag bzlas na/_zhag bdun du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa
[\[266b.4\]]bsgom par bya'o/_/lhag pa'i bsam pa bstan pa'i le'u las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid rtogs par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo nyon mongs pa thams cad las kyang sems sbyang dgos la/_chos gang las kyang bskyod par mi bya
[\[266b.5\]]'phags par yang mi bya ba'i phyir ro/_/chos kyi tshul las rigs kyi bu dag 'jigs par gyis shig_/mngon par dga' ba med par gyis shig_/snying brtse ba med par gyis shig_/snying rje ba med par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu dag 'dum bar gyis shig_/rtag tu byed par
[\[266b.6\]]gyis shig_/brtag par gyis shig_/blo rgod par gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu dag rjes su chags par yang gyis shig_/rtag tu zhe 'gras par gyis shig_/yun ring por blta bar yang gyis shig_/byas pa mi gzo bar yang gyis shig_/rigs kyi bu dag bdud kyi las
[\[266b.7\]]rnams ni 'bar bar gyis shig_/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni zhi bar gyis shig_/gang dag nyan thos kyis smad par bya ba de dag khyed kyis ma smad cig_/gang nyan thos kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ba la khyed dga' bar ma byed cig_/gtsug na rin po ches zhus
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa ni bzhi ste/_gang zhe na pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang /_mngon par shes pa sgrub pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_
[\[267a.2\]]sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ni lnga ste/_gang zhe na/_bdag mi ston pa dang /_gzhan mi ston pa dang /_ma bslabs pa la mi snyan pa dang /_nyan thos kyi sems la mi reg pa dang /_rang
[\[267a.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa la mi 'dod pa'o/_/dpal dbyig gis zhus pa las/_gal te bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la slob par mi nus na yang /_des bzhi'am/_gsum mam/_gnyis sam/_de'i nang na gcig tsam la yang blangs nas bslab par bya'o/_/gal te bslab pa'i
[\[267a.4\]]gzhi gcig tsam la yang slob par mi nus na/_des sdig pa'i las gang spyod pa de la ma zhen pa dang /_drag pa ma yin pa dang /_mi dga' bzhin par bya'o/_/bshung ba dang smad par bya'o/_/dge ba la ni de las bzlog ste bya'o/_/gser gyi bye ma lta bu las byung ba/_gnas
[\[267a.5\]]brtan shA ri'i bu tshig gcig tsam smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rnam grangs med pa ston to/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi tshig gcig smra ba'i yun ji tsam pa de'i bar skabs su/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bstan pa rnam grangs med
[\[267a.6\]]dpag tu med brjod du med pa ston cing /_don kyang brda sprod par byed do/_/lha'i bu blo gros rab tu brtan gyis zhus pa las/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bdag tu lta ba la brten pa'am/_sems can du lta ba la brten pa'am/_srog tu lta ba la brten pa gang gis de bzhin
[\[267a.7\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la/_ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas la/_gang gis chos zab mo shes par dka' ba 'jig rten thams cad
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]dang mi mthun pa 'di lta bu thos shing /_chos stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_zhi ba dang dben pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag med pa mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa 'di lta bu thos nas spangs te/_sems
[\[267b.2\]]can dmyal ba rnams su lhung bar gyur pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo chos zab mo 'di thos nas spangs te/_sems can dmyal ba rnams su ltung ba de/_ches myur bar de dag nas ldang zhing rnam par thar bar 'gyur gyi/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bdag tu lta ba la brten
[\[267b.3\]]pa chos 'di ma thos par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bsnyen bkur byas pa de ni de lta ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag rna blags te/_chos zab mo 'di mnyan nas ma
[\[267b.4\]]rtogs shing spangs te/_sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba de dag ni ches myur bar rnam par thar par 'gyur gyi/_dmigs pa can the tshom du gyur pa gzhan dag ni de lta bu ma yin no/_/bden pa gnyis bstan pa las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[267b.5\]]skyes bu bkris shing ltogs pas nyam chung ba brnag pa bla'i/_mi shes par kha zas dug can zos pa de ni de lta ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa can ma yin par ser sna can dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_le lo can dang /_brjed
[\[267b.6\]]ngas pa dang /_shes rab med pa bla'i/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can gyi sems kyi sbyor ba dang /_tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab kyis sbyor ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i
[\[267b.7\]]bu 'di lta ste dper na/_gang mi dbul po'i kha zas de ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dug yin no/_/de bzhin du nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dmigs pa can rnams kyi tshul khrims dang brtson 'grus kyi bar de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]nas le lo'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'i 'dul ba la bslabs sam/_'on te nyan thos kyi 'dul ba la bslabs/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i
[\[268a.2\]]bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rgya mtsho chen por mi lom pa'i chu gang yang yod dam/_lha'i bus smras pa/_chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu de ni don dam pa sna tshogs med pa'i tshig bla
[\[268a.3\]]dgas so/_/smras pa/_chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa la/_ci'i phyir sna tshogs su snang /_lha'i bu chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa la/_don dam par rdzas dang /_dngos po dang /_ngo bor yongs su rdzogs pas de dag don dam par sna tshogs su spyod
[\[268a.4\]]do/_/de dag don dam par sna tshogs su spyod pa la/_dmigs pa'i lta ba mang du 'gyur ro/_/de dmigs pa'i lta ba mang pos 'gro ba rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su dbang med par 'khyam mo/_/gang lha'i bu chos thams cad shin tu mi 'byung bar mnyam pa la/_don dam par ngo bo
[\[268a.5\]]dang /_rdzas dang dngos por yongs su mi rtogs na de dag don dam par sna tshogs su mi spyod do/_/de dag don dam par sna tshogs su mi spyod na/_don dam par shin tu dngos po med par 'gro ba'i tshul gyis don dam par chos thams cad shin tu ma skyes pa'i mnyam pa nyid dang /_mnyam
