[\[268a.6\]]par khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/kun rdzob tu ni rtog pa ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sgo'o/_/mi rtag pa ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i sgo'o/_/byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo'o/_/kun rdzob tu sha'i mig gis
[\[268a.7\]]sems can dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong /_lha'i mig gis sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mthong /_shes rab kyi mig gis sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang /_g.yo ba shes/_chos kyi mig gis chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong /_sangs rgyas kyi spyan
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad mdzad kyang /_don dam par ci yang mi shes mi byed do/_/rnam par gtan la dbab pa'i rgyal po'i mdo las 'byung ba/_kun dga' bo 'di lta ste dper na/_u dum bA ra'i me tog ni sangs rgyas skye ba dang dus gcig tu 'byung ste/_
[\[268b.2\]]kha dog dang ldan zhing gsal te/_bzang la dris ni dpag tshad gcig_/khor yug tu khyab par byed do/_/me tog des ni rab rib med par byed/_/dran pa yongs su sbyong bar byed/_/nad kyang rab tu zhi bar byed do/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la yang de mi 'byung na/_
[\[268b.3\]]tshul khrims 'chal pa la smos kyang ci dgos/_me tog de lta bu de gang du skye zhe na/_rtogs pa brjod pa las 'byung ba mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i byang phyogs na ri rab rtse lnga ba zhes bya ba de'i pha rol na u dum pa'i tshal yod de/_nam bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan nas babs te lhums su zhugs pa
[\[268b.4\]]de'i tshe/_tshal de'i kha 'bu bar 'gyur ro/_/bltams pa'i tshe kha 'bye bar 'gyur ro/_/mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe me tog rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/tshe'i 'du byed bor ba'i tshe rnyings par 'gyur ro/_/mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshe me tog dang /_lo ma la sogs pa lhags par 'gyur ro/_
[\[268b.5\]]me tog de'i tshad ni shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam mo/_/nam sangs rgyas rgyal rigs su skyes pa de'i tshe/_me tog dkar po rab tu byung /_nam bram ze'i rigs su skyes pa de'i tshe ser por 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bzang po'i mdo las/_bskal pa bzang po 'di'i 'og tu
[\[268b.6\]]sangs rgyas med pa'i bskal pa drug cu 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal ba snyan pa chen po la sangs rgyas khri 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa khrir sangs rgyas mi 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal ba skar ma lta bu la/_sangs rgyas brgyad khri 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa
[\[268b.7\]]sum brgyar sangs rgyas mi 'byung ngo /_/de'i 'og tu bskal pa yon tan bkod pa la sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong 'byung ngo /_/yang dag par ldan pa'i lung las/_mi'i lus thob par dka' ba gnya' shing dang rus sbal gyi dpe 'byung ngo /_/'od srungs kyi le'u las/_'od
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]srungs dper na zla ba tshes pa la phyag bya ba de ltar zla ba nya ba la ma yin no/_/de bzhin du gang dag nga la rab tu dang ba de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la phyag bya'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[269a.2\]]las ni de bzhin gshegs pa skye'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa las ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad skye'o/_/chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya mtshor chu thigs ltung ba bskal pa ma byung gi bar du mi 'byung ba'i
[\[269a.3\]]dper bstan pa 'byung /_dad pa'i stobs bskyed pa la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya las/_'jam dpal la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byas pa bas ni/_gzhan zhig gis dge bsnyen/_
[\[269a.4\]]ston pa gzhan la mi rtog pa'i dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gi bar chad byas na/_des sdig pa grangs med par bskyed do/_/dge bsnyen de snyed kyi dge ba'i bar chad byas pas/_dge slong gcig gi bar chad byas na de bas sdig pa grangs med
[\[269a.5\]]par skyed do/_/dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i mdo las/_rigs kyi bu mo chos bcu po 'di dag ni/_bsam gtan dang /_kha don gyi bar du gcod pa yin te/_bcu ni/_'du 'dzi'i gtam nyan pa dang /_ri mo 'dri ba dang /_stan dang /_gos sbyor ba dang /_gza'i tshogs dang /_
[\[269a.6\]]rgyu skar sems pa dang /_zas rnyed pa bdag gir byed pa dang /_sha za mo lha'i rnam par bsgyur ba sems pa dang /_rgyal po la brten pa dang /_mkhas pa rnams la mi 'dri ba dang /_de ba la mgron du 'bod pa dang /_'dre zhing gnas pa'o/_/ma 'dres pa'i mdo las 'byung ba/_thams
[\[269a.7\]]cad mkhyen pa'i sems bskyed pa'i bar du gcod pa ni gnyis te/_g.yo dang sgyu med pa'o/_/de'i gzhi yang drang po dang g.yo med pa'o/_/don dam pa'i mchod pa la yang rtag tu brtson par bya ste/_byams pa seng ge'i sgra las/_sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas mthong ba yang med
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]na/_sangs rgyas mchod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_de yang sangs rgyas mchod pa gang zhe na/_gang 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi bskyed pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba'i mdo las/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni/_sems
[\[269b.2\]]can yongs su tshim par bya ba'i tshig go/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni/_sems can skyo ba bskyed pa'i tshig go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni skye ba med do/_/yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi
[\[269b.3\]]dbyings la bzhugs pa'i phyir te/_sems can gyi bsam pa yongs su bskang bar bya ba'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa ltar snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa ni rang gi de ltar mthong ste/_snod chag pa'i chu lta bu dang /_'byung ba yang snod bzang po chu dang ba
[\[269b.4\]]bzhin no zhes bya ba yang 'byung ngo /_/'phags pa nA gardzu nas bka' stsal pa/_theg pa gcig la mos pa'i sems can de dag ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ste/_theg pa gcig tu zad par ni mdo sde du ma las gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/'phags pa bden pa'i le'u
[\[269b.5\]]las/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas la la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa/_la la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa/_la la la ni theg pa chen po bshad par gyur na/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems yongs su ma dag par 'gyur te/_ngas chos la dpe mkhyud byas par
[\[269b.6\]]yang 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal ngas sems can rnams la chos gang dang gang bstan pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par bya ba'i phyir/_byang chub la gzhol ba/_theg pa chen po la bab pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa/_yul gcig tu yang dag
[\[269b.7\]]par phyin par byed pa ste/_de bas na nga la theg pa rnam par dgod pa med do/_/theg pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pas sa rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa de ni gang zag rnam par dgod tshogs su chung ngu dang tshad med pa rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa ste/_chos kyi dbyings tha
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dad pa med pa'i phyir/_'di la theg pa tha dad pa med de/_'di ni kun rdzob tu 'jig pa bstan pa'i sgo tsam du brjod pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/_lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa de
[\[270a.2\]]dag gis/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gang dag yang dag pa nyid du nges par zhugs pa de dag ni/_byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mthu med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun gyi mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/_/de dag gal
[\[270a.3\]]te bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na ni/_nga yang rjes su yi rang zhing /_de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la bar chad mi byed do/_/khyad par du 'phags pa bas kyang shin tu 'phags pa'i chos la lhag par dmigs pa bya'o/_/gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos zhus pa
[\[270a.4\]]dang /_'dus pa chen po dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang /_dpal gyi phreng ba seng ge'i sgra dang /_lang kar gshegs pa las/_theg pa gsum gcig tu 'du bar 'byung /_dpal gyi phreng ba'i seng ge'i sgra las/_dam pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i tshig bla dgas so/_/
[\[270a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /_theg pa chen pos rab tu phye ba'i phyir ro/_/zla ba'i snying po'i mdo las/_don dam pa'i bden pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_nyan thos
[\[270a.6\]]dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no/_/de bas na kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang gis kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs kyi mchog sgrub mi nus so/_/zla ba'i snying po dper na me stag gang gis kyang rgya mtsho chen po skems
[\[270a.7\]]par mi nus so/_/de bzhin du kun rdzob kyi bden pa gang gis kyang /_rang gi nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho skems par yang mi nus na/_sems can gzhan gyi lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las/_'phags pa yang dag pa'i lta ba 'byung ba ni rgyu gnyis te/_
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]gzhan gyi sgo dang bdag nyid kyis tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal rnam par sprul pa'i le'u las/_lha'i bu yi ge rnams kyi ye shes de bstan pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs yin te/_ye shes de ni yi ge med pa'o/_/dper na me ma gtsubs pa las me mi 'byung
[\[270b.2\]]gi/_gtsubs pa las me 'byung ba de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pas thog ma kho nar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya cher yang dag par bstan na/_sems can gang gis kyang kun shes par mi 'gyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs pas gtsub shing gi gtam gyis/_ye shes de bstan te
[\[270b.3\]]ye shes ni yi ge med pa'o/_/smras pa/_'jam dpal gtsub shing gi gtam gang yin/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_lha'i bu sdom pa dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam yin no/_/'phags pa nA gardzu nas bshad
[\[270b.4\]]pa thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bar chos nyid zab mo la sbyor bar mi bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug par bstan pa las/_'jam dpal la la dag gis mngon par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu lon pa dang /_la la dag gis yongs
[\[270b.5\]]su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu lon pa dang /_la la dag gis ni byang chub kyi snying por byon pa dang /_la la dag gis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa nub par shes so/_/de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs su shes so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa chen po las/_stong gsum gyi stong chen
[\[270b.6\]]po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'khod pa'i sems can thams cad kyang gcig la gcig pu gcig pa bzhin byams par byed do/_/'dod chen po rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus byas so zhes zer ba de dag ni brdzun du smra ba ste/_rang gi khyim dang 'dra bar
[\[270b.7\]]sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos sun phyung yang rung /_'dod chen po yang rung ste gsad du mi rung ngo /_/rgyu sogs pa'i srog gcod pa ni byed mi phod do/_/zhing ngam khyim gyi nang du dug shing ngam/_snye long skyes na rtsa nas gdon dgos pa
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]ltar/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_dam pa'i chos sun 'byin pa rnams ni bran bzhin tshar gcad par ngas gnang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa dang brtan pa yin par khong du chud bar gyis shig_/'jig rten 'di ni sprul pa'i lus ma yin te/_de de
[\[271a.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa dug sman la brten pa'i sku yongs su 'dod par mdzad do snyam du shes par gyis shig_/tshul khrims 'chal pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni khyim bdag mgo reg ces bya'o/_/dge bsnyen gyi bslab pa'i gzhi lnga gzung bar mi bya ste/_mtshon cha thogs nas dge slong
[\[271a.3\]]bsrung bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas dus ngan pa'i tshe mu ge'i nyes pas phal cher rab tu byung zhing mgo reg tu gyur te/_de dag gis dge slong tshul khrims dang /_yon tan dang ldan pa dag skrod par 'gyur/_gsod par 'gyur/_dge 'dun rnam pa gsum
[\[271a.4\]]ste/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_byis pa dang /_rang bzhin gyi dge 'dun no/_/bud+d+ha dpyid zla tha chungs nya'i nang bar du mya ngan las 'das te/_da phyin chad nga'i nyan thos rnams sha za bar mi gnang ngo /_/sha za na ni byams pa chen po chad par 'gyur ro zhes ngas bstan to/_/rigs
[\[271a.5\]]kyi bu yang rung ba ma yin pa'i 'bras 'tshed pa dang /_sha dang nya sha len pa dang /_snabs su sbyor ba dang /_'bru mar gyi snod dang /_gdugs dang /_lha byed pa dang /_rgyal po la brten pa dang /_mo yig 'chad ba dang /_sman dpyad la brtson pa dang /_bran dang gser la sogs pa len
[\[271a.6\]]pa dang /_ri mo dang /_gzugs byed pa dang /_skye shing 'dzugs pa dang /_gsang sngags dang /_sman dang /_byis pa'i rtsed mo dang /_gar thabs kyi yan lag dang /_'gros 'chos pa dang /_sgeg pa'i yan lag la brtson pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag spangs pa la dge slong zhes
[\[271a.7\]]zer ro/_/'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bud med kyi gzugs kyis 'tshang rgya bar ston/_'dzam bu'i gling la lar ni bdag nyid khams bzhi po rnams su sgyur bar byed cing /_sems can rnams kyi nad bsal bar bdag nyid sman dang shing thams cad du sgyur bar byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]pa ni gsor mi rung ba'i nad 'dod chen po ma gtogs par nad thams cad gso bar mdzad do/_/gang mya ngan las 'da' ba de dag gso ba yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sha'i sku yin te/_bud shing zad pa'i me bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes bya ba 'di ni/_nyan
[\[271b.2\]]thos kyi theg pa yin te tshad ma ma yin no/_/dge slong rnams kyis ni thog mar dge sbyong gi chos kyis grog spur rnams la yang snying rje bya'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos kyis chang gi ro bro ba'i btung ba yang dag par spang bar bya'o/_/rmi lam du yang brdzun du smra ba dang /_bud med dang phrad pa'i sems
[\[271b.3\]]bskyed par mi bya'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi gsung ni dbu ma'i lam yin par shes par gyis shig_/sangs rgyas kyis na rtag pa dang chad pa gnyis ka'i mtha' spangs pa/_dbu ma'i lam du gsungs so/_/rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i mdo dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[271b.4\]]pa'i mdo chen po las/_gnyis su med pa la 'jug pa'i snang ba dang /_de nyid bdag yod pa dang /_bdag med pa gnyis su med par ngas bstan pa de rjes su dran par gyis shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po thog mnas bcos ma ma yin la/_nyon mongs pa ni glo bur ba yin te/_sangs rgyas su
[\[271b.5\]]'gyur bar 'dod pas/_nyon mongs pa rnams gzhom par bya'o/_/sa bcu thob par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang legs par brtags nas/_rang gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po byas pa ma yin par yod par 'ol byir mthong bar zad do/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs
[\[271b.6\]]rgyas thams cad kyis kyang /_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo'i tshul gyis bdag gi lus la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod par yid ches par bya ste/_legs par smras pa chos dang 'tsham pa ni 'jig rten pa yin yang /_'jig rten las 'das pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/bstan bcos
[\[271b.7\]]sam/_rigs sngags sam/_gsang sngags gang ci yang rung ba thams cad ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yin par shes par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yi ge phyi mo ji ltar bka' stsal lags/_bka' stsal pa yi ge'i phyi mo dang chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/_de yang dam pa'i
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]chos kyi tshul gyis yi ge phyi mo bslabs na/_chos dang chos ma yin pa bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ngas sprul pa yin gyi/_chos ma yin pa'i phyir ni ma yin no/_/'phags pa gang dag yin zhe na/_'phags pa ni byung ba gang /_chags
[\[272a.2\]]pa med pa dang /_rung bas chog par 'dzin pa dang /_sems can srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol ba ni 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la zhugs pa ni 'phags pa ste/_dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa yang 'phags pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[272a.3\]]pa'i sku la ni/_bsags pa'i khams kyi bag kyang ma mchis/_rigs kyi bu nga 'das nas lo bzhi stong gi bar du 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod par 'gyur te/_de'i rjes la sa'i 'og tu nub par 'gyur ro/_/nga'i chos kyi mjug lo brgyad cu lus par 'gyur te/_chos nub tu
[\[272a.4\]]cha ba na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo sde chen po 'dzam bu'i gling du 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lo bzhi bcu'i bar du chos kyi char phab nas nub par 'gyur ro/_/rgan nam yang na gzhon yang rung /_/gang las chos ni rtogs 'gyur ba/_/dbang chen lha yi bya ba bzhin/_/de
[\[272a.5\]]la bkur sti phyag kyang bya/_/zhes bya ba ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyir ngas bstan pa yin gyi/_nyan thos rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no/_/kha cig ni zla ba phyed yin par 'dzin te/_zla ba ni phyed du 'gyur zhing lhag pa yang med de/_zla ba ni ri rab kyi rkyen gyis de ltar snang
[\[272a.6\]]bar zad do/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na zla ba dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan phrad pa'i tshe/_'jig rten rnams kyis zla ba gzas zin to snyam du 'dzin te/_sgra gcan ni zla ba la 'dzin par yang mi byed la/_des ni de la gza' bar yang mi nus te/_sgra gcan gyi lag pas zla ba
[\[272a.7\]]bsgribs nas 'od mi snang bar byed par zad de/_zla ba la rma yang med/_nyon mongs pa yang med do/_/mi rnams kyis ni zla ba sdug bsngal zhing 'dug par 'dzin to/_/zla ba ni rang bzhin kho nar 'dug bzhin du/_bdag nyid sgra gcan dang lhan cig 'dug ste/_'di ni 'jig rten gyi chos nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]pa ni 'jig rten gsum du yang dag par snang ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid do/_/rigs kyi bu dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo yang ma yin/_mar gyi ngo yang ma yin pa gnam stong gnyis par nyi ma dang zla ba med pa'i skabs su/_gza' mjug rings shar nas kun gyis ma tshor bar skad cig
[\[272b.2\]]kho na la mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i tshe byung nas/_sems can mang po dam pa'i chos la bkod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/'dod chen po rnams la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod mod kyi/_'on kyang g.yang sa shin tu
[\[272b.3\]]lkugs par 'dug go/_/dper na dar gyi srin bu rang nyid kyis kun nas dkris nas/_sgom btod pas phyir 'byung mi nus pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yang de'i las kyi nyes pas 'dod chen po'i khong nas 'byung bar mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bud med ji ltar mi bzod pa
[\[272b.4\]]nyon cig_/bud med ni gal te skyes pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dam/_gtam snyed dam/_dkrigs snyed dang lhan cig 'dod pa zhen par spyod kyang /_sbrang bu'i gcin gyis rgya mtsho brlan cing ngoms par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bud med rnams ngoms par mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo
[\[272b.5\]]chen po 'di yang lho phyogs su song nas/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i dgongs pa'i tshig gi char 'bebs so/_/de nas lho phyogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis dam pa'i chos 'jig par shes nas dgun gyi dus dang nye bar gyur pa'i
[\[272b.6\]]sprin bzhin du kha che'i yul du song nas/_sa la nub par gyur te/_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa bdud rtsi'i mchog gi dam pa'i chos thams cad nub par 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_'dod chen po ji lta bu lags/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge
[\[272b.7\]]bsnyen ma yang rung ste/_tshig ngan pas mdo sde spangs nas/_phyis bzod pa gsol bar yang mi byed pa gang yin pa de lta bu ni/_'dod chen po'i lam du zhugs pa yin no/_/pham pa bzhi dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa de dag bdag cag 'jigs pa'i lam du zhugs pa yin no snyam du shes kyang /_
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]'jigs par mi lta la/_dam pa'i chos 'byung ngo snyam du mi sems shing de nyid kyi bsngags pa ma yin par yang rjod par byed pa de dag kyang der zhugs pa yin no/_/dkon mchog gsum med do zhes zer ba de dag kyang der zhugs pa yin no/_/mchog tu
[\[273a.2\]]tshul khrims 'chal pa la byin pa ni 'bras bu cung zad kyang med do/_/'bras bu chen po 'chags shing bzod pa gsol ba'i sems bskyed pa ni mi srid do/_/chad pa dag gis thams cad skrag_/kun la srog ni phangs pa yin/_/bdag gi nyams las dpag bya zhing /_/brdeg par
[\[273a.3\]]mi bya gsad mi bya/_/gser 'od dam pa las/_sgrib pa thams cad dang bral zhing /_/dge ba'i chos thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/_de kho na nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes ni chos kyi sku'o/_/kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas gyur ba ni chos kyi sku'o/_/nyon mongs pa can gyi yid gyur
[\[273a.4\]]pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o/_/'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gyur pa ni sprul pa'i sku'o/_/dung phreng gi mdo las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po gsal bar ma gyur pa'i tshe ni kun gzhi zhes bya'o/_/gsal bar gyur pa'i tshe ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/_/stug po bkod
[\[273a.5\]]pa las/_sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su/_/gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/_/bum pa snam bu la sogs pa'i/_/lus ni gang yang yod ma yin/_/gser mdog gi sngon gyi sbyor ba las/_gang rang sangs rgyas kyi lus kyis chos ston pa ni chos nyid yin te/_tshig gis ni ma yin no/_/bcom
[\[273a.6\]]ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas/_stug po bkod pa las/_'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung /_/mtshan ma gzugs su snang ba las/_/bag chags yod par kun gzhi ste/_/sa rnams kun na gzugs ltar gnas/_/ji ltar 'o ma gyur pa dang /_/yon tan zho dang dar bar snang /_/de bzhin kun gzhi
[\[273a.7\]]rnam shes kyang /_/rnam par gyur na gzugs ltar snang /_/gzugs kyi yon tan ldan pa'i gzugs/_/kun gzhi gzugs ltar gnas pa ste/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin/_/gzugs ni gud na yod ma yin/_/sa la gzugs rnams yod pa dang /_/lha yul gnas pa'i khyim rnams
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]kyang /_/rnam pa sna tshogs gang snang ba/_/de ni kun gzhir gyur pa yin/_/kun gzhi kun du lag pa ste/_/kun tu kha mig mgo yang yin/_/rim ma ma yang na cig car du/_/sa rnams log par rab tu gnas/_/ri rab tsam du gyur pa yi/_/bdag tu lta ba mi gnod kyi/_/stong nyid lta la
[\[273b.2\]]gnod pa ni/_/nga rgyal mi bden brtags pa'o/_/rnal 'byor spyod pas stong pa nyid/_/gnas ma yin par spyad mi bya/_/gnas min gal te spyad gyur na/_/bdud rtsi dug tu 'gyur ba bzhin/_/lta ba ji snyed gang yang rung /_/lus can rnams la yod pa yin/_/lta ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir/_/
[\[273b.3\]]stong pa nyid kyi tshul bstan to/_/stong pa nyid kyi lta thos nas/_/la la'i lta ba mang zhig ni/_/gsor mi rung ba'i lta can te/_/sman pas btang ba'i nad bzhin te/_/ji ltar bsreg bya tshig pa'i me/_/bsreg bya med pas mi gnas so/_/de bzhin bsreg bya lta tshig na/_/stong nyid me yang
[\[273b.4\]]'gag par 'gyur/_/lta ba 'gags pa'i dus su yang /_/yang dag ye shes me 'byung ste/_/nyon mongs bsregs nas rnam par mdzes_//sems ni rnam pa gnyis dngos su/_/gzung dang 'dzin par snang ba ste/_/bum pa snam bu la sogs pa'i/_/yul ni gang yang yod ma yin/_/rnam par
[\[273b.5\]]shes pa'i spyod yul gang /_/'di ltar snang ba ci yang rung /_/rnam par shes par gyur pa ste/_/bum pa la sogs ma yin no/_/'di ltar nor ba snang ba gang /_/bum pa la sogs ci yang rung /_/de ni kun gzhi gyur pa ste/_/snang ba nor ba'i mtshan nyid do/_/'phags pa dpal sbas zhes
[\[273b.6\]]bya ba'i mdo las/_bram ze de ni lus thams cad nas me byung ste/_tshig nas tshig go zhes smras te/_sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/de la bram ze'i khye'u chos 'dod kyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/slob dpon ma bsnyengs shig_/bdag gis khyod bskyab par bgyi'o/_/de nas bram ze'i
[\[273b.7\]]khye'u chos 'dod kyis/_bdag sems can rnams kyi don du byang chub la spyod pa'i bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig des 'di'i sems can dmyal ba zhi bar gyur cig ces byas pa dang /_de ma thag tu bram ze de sems can dmyal ba nas thar to/_/spobs pa'i rgyan bkod pa las/_de bzhin du gzugs
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]nas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan na ming sna tshogs su bya ba dpag tu med de rnam grangs 'di ni/_ming thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_
[\[274a.2\]]gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na/_bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur na da ci byar yang med do/_/bkres pa ni nyes pa med kyi/_dug dang 'dres pa'i zas zos pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de bzhin du byang chub
[\[274a.3\]]sems dpas nyan thos kyi theg pa ni mthos kyang bla'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan ni rgyan te/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang /_snying rje chen po'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i rgyan dang /_sems can kun la sems thogs pa med pa'i rgyan dang /_chos nyan pa
[\[274a.4\]]tshol bas chog mi shes pa'i rgyan dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams chub par byas nas/_tshul bzhin so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang /_chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang /_/chos zab mo la rnam par sems
[\[274a.5\]]shing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i rgyan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs la thabs la mkhas pas rgyan no/_/sangs rgyas phal po che las/_sangs rgyas spyod yul ting nge 'dzin las skyes/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
[\[274a.6\]]kyis/_'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gzhi dang /_snying po rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu g.yos so/_/yang dag sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra ba ste/_/gzugs kyi sku yang rab brtan cing /_/chos nyid 'di la shin tu 'jug_/skad cig sems
[\[274a.7\]]kyis dus gsum 'byung ba yi/_/zhing 'byung tshul dang 'jug pa kun kyang ston/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis dus gsum zhing bstan pa/_/rnam par snang mdzad rgya mtsho zhing mi zad/_/zhing rnams ring dang thung dang gling gi gzugs dang rnam pa sna tshogs te/_/chos dbyings mnyam
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]zhing rnam par 'byam klas mig yor sgyu ma dang yang 'dra/_/mig 'phrul rnam phye rnam dag dri med sems kyis shin tu bskyed pa ste/_/nam mkha'i dbyings rnams sna tshogs rgyan gyi snying po gnas 'gyur 'di la snang /_/rin chen 'od 'phro 'byung ba'i zhing /_/'od 'phro'i sprin gyis mngon
[\[274b.2\]]khebs shing /_/rin chen thams cad sna tshogs ldan/_/thams cad las kyi sprul pa yin/_/rgya mtsho sems las byung ba yi/_/zhing rnams mod pa'i yid la gnas/_/ye nas mi gnas smig rgyu bzhin/_/yongs su rtogs par yang dag bskyed/_/bsam gtan tshul dang rnam thar sa sbyang
[\[274b.3\]]zhing /_/zhing rnams rgya mtsho sna tshogs yangs pa 'byung /_/yid bzhin rin chen rgyal po rnams/_/kha dog kun du snang ba ltar/_/sems can bsam pa rnam dag pas/_/de bzhin zhing rnams rab tu snang /_/klu yi rgyal po'i sprin gyi gnas/_/nam mkha'i dbyings la ston pa ltar/_/de
[\[274b.4\]]bzhin sangs rgyas smon lam gyis/_/zhing gi rnams ni 'byung ba yin/_/sems can lus kyi rnam pa dag_/ji ltar sems kyis brtag pa ltar/_/de bzhin zhing gi rnam pa yang /_/thams cad las kyis rnam par bris/_/ji ltar gzhan dang gzhan gzugs su/_/sems can
[\[274b.5\]]rnams kyi bsam pa bzhin/_/mgon po rnams ni snang ba ltar/_/de bzhin zhing rnams snang ba'o/_/sgyu ma'i mkhan po sngags dag gis/_/sgo rnams sna tshogs ston pa ltar/_/de bzhin sems can las rnams kyis/_/bsam gyis mi khyab cing 'byung ngo /_/ji ltar ri mo
[\[274b.6\]]gzugs kyi rnams/_/ri mo'i las kyis bris pa ltar/_/de bzhin zhing rnams 'di dag kun/_/sems kyis ri mor bris pa yin/_/gling byang chub kyi rgyal mtshan de na grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbyings su 'dug pa/_grong rdal 'jig rten gyi
[\[274b.7\]]khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyi 'khor dang ldan pa yod de/_grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir/_rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa'o/_/
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa'i phyir yang re re zhing yang ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi 'obs rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang /_/de bzhin
[\[275a.2\]]gshegs pa zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyis yongs su dag pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi gnas kyi chu rgya mtsho de dag re re zhing yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang /_yon tan gyi me tog
[\[275a.3\]]ut+pa la dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul shin tu phra rab snyed kyis yongs su gang ba'o/_/grong rdal mdzod mtha' yas pa de ni/_sems rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pa'i pha gu/_rgya mtsho 'jig rten gyi
[\[275a.4\]]khams rgya mtsho bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed la sogs pa yin no/_/de nyid na'ang shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar rab tu shes so/_/rnam par snang mdzad ces bya bar rab tu shes so/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyang /_/phung po lnga las shin tu brjod/_/de rnams las
[\[275a.5\]]kyi phung chen yin/_/las kyi rtsa ba sems yin te/_/sems ni sgyu ma bzhin du bshad/_/sgyu mar gyur pa 'gro ba 'di'o/_/sems ni ri mo mkhan dang 'dra/_/sems ni phung po byed pa ste/_/'jig rten khams ni ji snyed pa'i/_/'jig rten 'di dag
[\[275a.6\]]sems kyis bris/_/gang zhig dus gsum thams cad kyi/_/rgyal ba thams cad shes 'dod na/_/sangs rgyas thams cad sems kyi dngos/_/chos kyi dngos su blta bar gyis/_/'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'dod pa'i
[\[275a.7\]]khams dang /_gzugs kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_sems can gyi khams rnams te/_'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos so/_/'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/_nam mkha' dang mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_so sor brtags
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]te 'gog pa dang /_so sor ma brtags par 'gog pa dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_chos kyi gnas nyid de/_'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so/_/las sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa/_nam mkha'i khams dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams
[\[275b.2\]]cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa/_'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su song bar rab tu gnas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du ye shes kyi ri bo shin tu 'phags shing rnam par dag pa'i rin po che'i ri bo grangs med pa kun du gsal bar gyur cig_/
[\[275b.3\]]ye shes kyi phung pos grub pa'i rin po che'i 'od kyi phung po grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi mar mes yongs su grub pa'i rin po che'i mar me grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/ye shes kyi snang ba kun du gtong ba'i rin po che'i lo ma dang ldan
[\[275b.4\]]pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig_/gzhung de ltar rin po che ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang khong du chud par bya ste/_ye shes kyis spos chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa'i spos kyis/_yid kyi las rgya chen po yongs su dag pa tshad med pa kun nas gnas
[\[275b.5\]]par gyur cig_/de bzhin du me tog thams cad kyi me tog gi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa kun du gnas par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_ye shes kyi me tog chags par gyur cig ces bya ba nas/_ye shes kyi me tog chags pa med pa'i mthar thug pa zhes bya ba dang /_
[\[275b.6\]]ye shes kyi phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_ye shes kyi phye ma dang /_bdug pa dang /_ye shes kyi gos dang /_chos gos kyi rgyan dang /_ye shes kyi gdugs kyi rgyan dang /_ye shes kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_ye shes kyi lhab lhub dang /_ye shes kyi nor bu rin po che rnam
[\[275b.7\]]par dag pa brjod du med pa/_kun du gnas par gyur cig ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sbyin pa la sogs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsngos na/_lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]gcan zhes bya ba yongs su bsngo'o/_/de'i rang bzhin gyi lus ni dpag tshad bdun brgya'o/_/sprul pa'i lus ni dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad do/_/'di lta ste/_nam mkha' ni skye ba med cing 'gag pa med kyang 'jig rten thams cad kyi skye ba dang /_/
[\[276a.2\]]'gag pa 'dzin to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni/_sku'i skye mched kyis phrin las gang sgrub pa de/_thugs kyi skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sa
[\[276a.3\]]gzhan la zhe sdang bskyed pa tsam du kha na ma tho ba'i chos ni 'ga' tsam yang bdag gis ma mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzhan la khong khro bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_sgrib pa'i chos brgya stong phrag bcu po 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur te/_gang zhe na byang
[\[276a.4\]]chub sems dpa' mi mthong ba dang /_chos mi thos pa dang /_ngan song du gnas pa dang /_theg pa dman pa dang 'dre ba dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po 'dzin pa dang /_bdud kyi yul bsten pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las ring ba dang /_theg pa dman pa la mos pa dang /_
[\[276a.5\]]theg pa chen po la yid mi ches pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos spong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa'i las drungs 'byin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang /_gleng gzhi sgug pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[276a.6\]]rigs dang /_ring bar 'dzin par 'gyur ba la sogs pa ste/_sgrib pa'i chos kyi sgo brgya stong phrag bcu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams 'jig pa'i tshe/_thog mar sgra chen po 'di lta bu 'byung ste/_kye ma grogs po dag bsam gtan dang po ni 'dod pa dang /_
[\[276a.7\]]gnod sems med pas shin tu bde ba ste/_'dod pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/sgra de thos nas sems can dag bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs nas 'dod pa'i khams nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/de bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]ba'i bar gyi sgra bsgrags nas/_de bzhin du bsgrubs te skye/_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa'i gnas nas chu klung chen po bzhi 'bab ste/_'di ltar chu klung chen po gang gA ni glang po che'i kha nas 'bab bo/_/si ta ni seng ge'i kha nas 'bab po/_/sin d+hu ni glang gi kha nas
[\[276b.2\]]'bab po/_/pak+Shu ni rta'i kha nas 'bab po/_/gang gA ni mdun nas dngul gyi bye ma 'dren cing 'bab po/_/si ta ni rdo rje'i bye ma'o/_/sin d+hu ni gser gyi bye ma'o/_/pak+Shu ni bai DUr+ya sngon po'i bye ma 'dren cing 'bab po/_/de dag 'bab pa'i tshe re res kyang mtsho chen po lan bdun
[\[276b.3\]]du g.yas phyogs su bskor te phyogs bzhir 'bab cing rgya mtsho la zhen par 'dod do/_/lan bdun bskor ba'i bar gyi gling de dag kyang /_me tog ut+pa la dang /_pad+mo dang /_ku mu da dang /_puN+Da rI ka lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rang bzhin las grub pa'i 'dab ma sna tshogs dang
[\[276b.4\]]ldan zhing snying po sna tshogs can gyis brgyan pa/_mtsho de'i dkyil 'khor ni dpag tshad lnga bcu yod de/_zabs su yang dpag tshad lnga bcu'o/_/de'i ngogs ni rin po che sna tshogs brtsigs pa pha gu ltar 'dug pas kun nas 'khor ba'o/_/ji ltar mtsho chen po ma dros pa/_rin po che'i zhing
[\[276b.5\]]gis 'khor ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' yang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba ston pa na/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gis kun nas 'khor zhing brgyan pa yin/_chu klung chen po bzhi char yang kha'i sgo dpag tshad tsam nas 'bab po/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[276b.6\]]rigs su byung ba'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po la smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku bltar yod ji ltar khong du chud par bya/_smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sku bltar yod pa ni/_dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
[\[276b.7\]]de nyid 'dzam bu'i gling du 'char ba'i tshe/_thog mar ri rab ri'i rgyal po la snang ngo /_/de'i 'og tu ri bo che gzhan la snang ngo /_/de'i 'og tu ri nag po la'o/_/de'i 'og tu sa phyogs mthon po rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu sa phyogs dma' ba rnams su snang bar byed de/_
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]'on kyang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la 'di ni thog mar snang bar bya'o snyam pa la sogs pa'i rtog pa med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang /_chos kyi dbyings mtha'
[\[277a.2\]]dang dbung med pa'i ris su 'char bar 'gyur ba'i tshe/_thog mar lhag pa'i ri'i rgyal po lta bu dang ldan pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la chos kyi snang ba chen po yang dag par ston pa'i tshul du 'char bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas [(]gyi [,]kyi [)]
[\[277a.3\]]theg pa la zhugs pa rnams la'o/_/de'i 'og tu dge ba'i rtsa ba nges pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la snod ji lta ba bzhin du'o/_/de'i 'og tu log par nges pa'i sems can yan chad sems can thams cad la yang 'char bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'char yang de
[\[277a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i 'od zer de dag ni/_sems can 'di rnams la bdag cag gis thog mar theg pa chen po snang bar byas te/_de'i 'og tu 'di dag snang bar bya'o snyam du rtog pa mi mnga' ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rnam par rtog
[\[277a.5\]]pa mi mnga' ba'i phyir ro/_/yang dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la rtog pa med cing /_'od zer mnyam pa nyid du 'char yang /_ri chen po rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa mi mnga'
[\[277a.6\]]zhing /_'od zer mnyam pa nyid du 'char yang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa'i rnam pa tha dad pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer tha dad pa yang snang zhing yod de/_kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid shar kyang /_
[\[277a.7\]]dmus long rnams la snang bar mi 'gyur te/_de mig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/de mig lam du mi snang du zin kyang /_dmus long rnams la kha zas 'ju ba dang /_lus kyi grang ba bsal ba dang /_lus kyi nad mkhris pa la sogs pa sel bas mi phan pa ma yin te phan 'dogs so/_/
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang sems can lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mig mdongs pa/_lta ba log pa/_sbyor ba log pa/_'tsho ba log pa/_dmus long lta bur gyur pa'i mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur te/_de ni dad pa'i mig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[277b.2\]]mig lam du mi snang yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus/_de dag gi lus la mi bde ba rtse zhil bar 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rgyu'i lhag ma sel ba'i sgor phan mi 'dogs ba ma yin te phan 'dogs so/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi gsung
[\[277b.3\]]brjod pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi sku nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing 'od zer mnyam pa nyid du 'char yang /_sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang /_bsam pa'i rnam pa tha dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer tha dad pa
[\[277b.4\]]yang snang zhing yod do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de nyid shar kyang /_dmus long rnams la snang bar mi 'gyur te/_de ni mig dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/mig lam du mi snang du zin kyang /_dmus long rnams la kha zas 'ju ba dang /_lus kyi grang ba bsal ba dang /_
[\[277b.5\]]lus kyi nad mkhris pa la sogs pa sel bas mi phan pa ma yin te/_phan 'dogs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang mi shes la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang khong na yod pa ngo mtshar ches/_bdag gis ci nas kyang sems can
[\[277b.6\]]'di dag rang rang gi 'du shes kyi 'dun pa chen po/_'phags pa'i lam gyis 'grol te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'phags pa'i lam bstan par mdzad do zhe na/_'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su sel bar mdzad do/_/de ltar 'du shes
[\[277b.7\]]yongs su sel ba'i phyir ro/_/ye shes tshad med pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'tsho'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras nam mkha' ni skye ba med pas/_'jig rten gyi khams 'jig kyang rung /_'du yang rung ste/_de bzhin du mi zad mi 'phel bar gnas so/_/smras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yongs
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]su mya ngan las 'das pa ji lta bu smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa shin tu mthar thug par mi brjod mi ston to/_/chu snod gcig cig gam de nas logs shig tu phyung ngam/_stong par
[\[278a.2\]]gzhag par gyur la/_nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan yang snang bar mi 'gyur na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis nyes sam/_smras pa ma yin no/_/smras pa de bzhin du sems can snod chag pa lta bu la sogs pa la/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das par snang ngo /_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chos
[\[278a.3\]]dbyings tshad dang mnyam pa ni/_snod du gzugs brnyan snang ste chag la snang ba min/_de ltar mi mchog dbang po kun du snang /_/sems can dad med rnams kyis mya ngan 'das par shes/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
[\[278a.4\]]ston pa shin tu nges pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi rjes su bsngo ba/_shin tu mthar thug pa'i mur phyin pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bag chags te/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i bag chags dang /_
[\[278a.5\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags dang /_sems yongs su smin pa'i bag chags dang /_sangs rgyas la lta ba'i bag chags dang /_'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par skye ba'i bag chags dang /_dge ba'i bag chags dang /_smon lam gyi bag chags dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa'i
[\[278a.6\]]bag chags dang /_chos mnyam pa nyid nges par rtogs pa'i bag chags dang /_spyod pa tha dad pa'i bag chags dang /_bag chags de dag la gnas shing /_nyon mongs pa ma lus par spangs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chen pos/_bag chags thugs su chud pa/_bla na
[\[278a.7\]]med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos las 'gol ba'i lam ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_dge ba'i ba shes gnyen la brnyas pa dang /_'khor bas 'jigs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba dang /_'jig rten gyi
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]khams na gnas pas skyo ba dang /_mnyam par gzhag pa la gnas su byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bal zhen pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las dpags pas 'byed pa byed pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su 'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems
[\[278b.2\]]dpa' la khro zhing zhe sdang bas te/_de dag ni yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdud kyi las te/_'di lta ste/_sems 'khrugs pa la brnyas pa dang /_shes rab 'chal ba la smod pa dang /_chos kyi dpe mkhyud dang /_chos kyi snod la khyad du
[\[278b.3\]]gsod pa dang /_zang zing dang 'brel par chos ston pa dang /_snod ma yin pa la chos rgya chen po ston pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su spong ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la zhe sdang zhing mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_bdag
[\[278b.4\]]bstod cing gzhan smod pa dang /_zab mo'i gtam 'chab cing spong ba dang /_yi ge sna tshogs rang bzor byas pa'i rang bzo la dga' ba dang /_grol ba dang dbugs phyin pa la bsnyen cing bkur sti byed kyi ma grol cing dbugs ma phyin pa la mi byed pa'o/_/nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal
[\[278b.5\]]de nyid na 'khod kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa rnams mthong bar ma gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs sam/_chu'am me'am rlung ngam
[\[278b.6\]]sngon po la sogs pas khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs na/_'gro ba mang po de dag gis chu'i phung po la sogs pa mi mthong ste/_ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shing rnam par dpyod pa rnams ni ma gtogs so/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par
[\[278b.7\]]'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan pa mdzad na/_nyan thos de dag gis ma mthong zhing shes par ma gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni mthong ngo /_/khong du chud do/_/dper na dge slong 'gog pa'i snyoms
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]par zhugs pa/_dbang po drug gis 'jig rten gyi tha snyad thams cad gnas de na yod kyang /_snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_mthu des mi shes mi mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag dze ta'i tshal de na rnam par dpyod la/_de dag la
[\[279a.2\]]dbang po drug yod de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu 'byung ba dang /_cho 'phrul da dag mthong bar ma gyur shes par ma gyur to/_/thams cad bdog bzhin du/_lto yi nad kyis shi ba bzhin/_/chos ma bsgoms pa de bzhin no/_/sgra
[\[279a.3\]]gdags ji snyed yod pa dang /_/sems can kun gyi sgra skad du/_/sgra la mkhyen pa thugs chud kyang /_/rnam par rtog pa gang yang med/_/gang dag sangs rgyas rtog med kyang /_/rgyal ba rnam par rtog par snang /_/ji ltar sa bon rnam dag pa/_/zhing bzang la ni skye 'gyur zhing /_/de
[\[279a.4\]]bzhin sems bsam rnam dag la/_/sangs rgyas chos ni skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rtog par mi mdzad do/_/ston la rtog pa mi mnga' yang /_/'jig rten khams ni tshad med par/_/thub pas rnam par rtog pa bstan/_/sku gnyis de dag bsam mi khyab/_/'jig rten khams su snang gyur kyang /_/
[\[279a.5\]]sku la gnyis su gyur pa med/_/ji ltar zla ba shar gyur pa/_/tshad med pa yi gzugs brnyan rnams/_/chu yi snod du snang gyur kyang /_/zla ba gnyis su gyur pa med/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi phrin las gang mdzad pa de snyan gyi
[\[279a.6\]]skye mched kyis yongs su grub par mdzad do zhes bya ba nas dbang po thams cad sbyar ba 'byung /_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/_'jig rten thams cad ni sems can rnams ngu zhing smre sngags 'don pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa de dag gis bsod nams 'thob par bya ba'i phyir
[\[279a.7\]]thabs mdzad pa 'byung /_kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa rnams la ni/_phan tshun du ngan sems kyi sems bskyed pa lta bur kha na ma tho ba'i che ba ngas 'ga' tsam ma mthong ngo /_/sems kyi rnam pa 'jig rten kun/_'jig rten rnam
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]pa sems can kun gyi sems yin te/_rnam pa gnyis kyi grangs su zhugs/_de bzhin gshegs pa sku yongs su 'byed pa mi mdzad/_sku tha dad par mdzad pa yang mi mnga' bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba
[\[279b.2\]]bzhin sku yongs su ston te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la rnam par rtog pa dang /_spros pa mi mnga'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbyings kyi ser sna mi mnga' ste/_sems can dbang po yongs su ma smin pa rnams la/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings grag par mi
[\[279b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du tshogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'di snyam du [(]sams [,]bsam [)]te/_bdag kho na'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston to snyam mo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung sgrogs pa yang med/_phyir sdud pa yang med de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
[\[279b.4\]]gi phrin las de dag kyang yod cing snang ngo /_/dper na rgya mtsho chen po la chu'i phung po tshad med pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad klu'i sems kyi khyad par las byung ngo /_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la/_chos kyi rgyun tshad med pa gang ji snyed pa de thams
[\[279b.5\]]cad sngon gyi dgongs pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par las byung ba'o/_/rgya mtsho chen po la gling bzhi pa'i sems can gyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan lta bur snang ste/_de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o/_/bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi rlabs te/_bcu ni sems zhum pa dang /_bsam pa
[\[279b.6\]]'khrugs pa dang /_rgya chung ngus mgu ba dang /_gcig las mi bzod pa dang /_smon lam la lhung bar mi dmigs pa dang /_nyon mongs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_dad pa dang /_'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa dang /_spyod pa las phyir ldog pa dang /_sems can yongs su
[\[279b.7\]]smin par mi byed pa dang /_chos la the tshom za ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gyi thabs kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa las/_chos bcu gnyis dang ldan na bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems skye bar 'gyur te gang zhe na/_rang bzhin gyis rgya chen po la
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]mos pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa dang /_bcos ma ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /_las gsum dag pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs spangs pa dang /_ji skad smras pa bzhin byed pa dang /_bged pa'i ngang tshul can dang /_de bzhin
[\[280a.2\]]gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_bdog pa kun la mi lta ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /_yi dam la brten pa'o/_/yon tan gyi chos bcu gnyis mthong bas sbyin par gnas par bya ste/_gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems kyi lam ston pa dang /_longs
[\[280a.3\]]spyod sgrub pa dang /_'dod pa'i rigs su skye ba dang /_ser sna tshar gcod pa dang /_gtong ba'i rgyun 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_yi dgas kyi sgo gcod pa dang /_thun mong gi longs spyod las snying po len pa dang /_yo byad rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang /_bdog pa la goms par 'gyur
[\[280a.4\]]ba dang /_'dzin pa'i sems med par 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang mthun pa dang /_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gnyis mthong bas tshul khrims bsrung ste/_byin gyi rlabs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub
[\[280a.5\]]kyi lam la 'jug pa dang /_bdag gi 'ching ba lhod par 'gyur ba dang /_bdag ngan 'gro las thar ba dang /_ngan 'gro'i lam spong ba dang /_las gsum kha nam tho ba med pa dang /_mkhas pas mi smad pa dang /_bag yod pa la brten pa dang /_sems can la mi 'jigs
[\[280a.6\]]pa sbyin pa dang /_sgo gsum gyi sdom pa 'thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'o/_/bzod pa'i bcu gnyis ni/_'du byed skad cig pa yin par bzod pa dang /_bdag mi dmigs par bzod pa dang /_bdag dang
[\[280a.7\]]gzhan bsrungs ba dang /_'khrug pa'i gtam med par bya ba dang /_bag la nyal ba dang /_kun nas dkris pa bsal ba dang /_rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba bsal ba dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bsgrubs pa dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba dang /_gzhan gyi gnod
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]pa las 'da' ba dang /_zad pa dang mi skye ba shes pa 'thob pa dang /_bdud kyi yul las 'da' ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/brtson 'grus kyi ni chos thams cad rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du phyin pa dang /_
[\[280b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can smin par byed pa dang /_gdul bya sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'god pa dang /_sems can gyi mi shes pa sel ba dang /_gdul bya la ye shes sgrub pa dang /_zhing
[\[280b.3\]]sbyang ba dang /_mu thug pa med par sems can gyi don byed pa dang /_skad cig gcig gis zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'o/_/bsam gtan gyi ni mi 'khrug cing zhi ba dang /_yul la mi rgyug pa dang /_sems gnas pa dang /_khams gsum
[\[280b.4\]]las 'da' ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa zil gyis mnan pa dang /_de la ma chags par 'gyur ba dang /_bsam gtan zlog pa dang /_dngos po'i 'du shes dang 'bral ba dang /_tshad yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la smon pa dang /_shin tu zhi ba dang /_cang
[\[280b.5\]]shes pa dang /_dbang po bsdams pa'o/_/shes rab kyi ni gti mug sel ba dang /_nyon mongs pa sel ba dang /_mi shes pa med pa dang /_ma rig pa drungs 'byin pa dang /_sred pa 'joms pa dang /_shes rab rdo rje lta bu dang /_shes rab nyi ma lta bu dang /_shes rab me lta bu
[\[280b.6\]]dang /_shes rab nor bu lta bu dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_stong pa nyid do/_/sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams dang ldan pa'i bsod nams brgya 'gyur gyis sangs rgyas kyi ba spu'i khung bu gcig 'grub/_ba spu'i bsod nams thams cad brgyar
[\[280b.7\]]'gyur bas/_dpe byad gcig_/de nas mtshan/_de nas gtsug tor/_de nas chos kyi g.yung drung ste/_des ni sems can thams cad kyis zhus na yang gsung gcig gis lan thebs so/_/nga mya ngan las 'das nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras sku gdung brgyad cha blangs nas rin po che'i
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]za ma tog tu bcug nas/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol du rgyal po mya ngan med 'byung ba la bsdad par sa brkos nas 'jog par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po mya ngan med ni nga mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya nas 'byung ngo /_/de nas nga'i ring bsrel byung nas zhag bdun
[\[281a.2\]]mchod de mchod rten brgyad khri bzhi stong byed par 'gyur ro/_/gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /_grog pa la sogs pa de ni nga yang skyed mos tshal 'di ni chos kyi rnam pa 'di ston pa dang /_'khor 'dus pa 'di yang mthong bar shes par bya'o/_/'jig rten dang mthun
[\[281a.3\]]par 'jug pa las/_de dag sna tshogs sku med kyang /_/sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/_/sku lus sprul pa mdzad pa nas/_/'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/_/bdud ni bye ba phrag brgya yis/_/dge 'dun dbye bar mi nus kyang /_/dge 'dun dbyen ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig
[\[281a.4\]]rten mthun 'jug yin/_/srid pa 'pho ba las/_rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya'o/_/rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba de ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/mig gis gzugs rnams mi mthong zhing /_/yid kyis chos rnams mi rig pa/_/de ni bden pa mchog
[\[281a.5\]]yin te/_/de la 'jig rten mi dgos so/_/byams pa 'jug pa las/_nor kun du bsrung la bgo bsha' mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang /_de nyan thos
[\[281a.6\]]kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/_dmigs par lta ba dang /_lhan cig rten par byed na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams par 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni yon dbul lo/_/'di la ni mi dbul
[\[281a.7\]]lo snyam pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni chos bshad do/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'o/_/'di ni mi 'chal pa'o zhes phye nas 'chal pa la brnyas par byed na byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/bag yod pa gang zhe na/_bslab pa mi gtong ba dang /_dam bcas
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]pa mi nyams pa dang /_sems can kun la byams pa dang /_sems can mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub la 'dun pa brtan pa dang /_brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos la gus pa dang /_thos pa mang pos chog mi shes pa dang /_
[\[281b.2\]]gzhan la chos bgo bsha' byed pa dang /_zang zing med par chos ston pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams mi gtong ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_nga rgyal bcom pa dang /_rna blags te chos nyan pa dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_bzod pa la gnas pa dang /_gnod
[\[281b.3\]]sems kyi tha ba spangs pa dang /_chos zab mo la mos pa dang /_dmigs par lta ba spangs pa dang /_nang du yang dag 'jog la 'dun pa drag pa dang /_bre mo'i gtam sdang ba dang /_lus dang sems dben par gnas pa dang /_dgon pa la gnas pa dang /_sems mnyen pa dang /_tshul khrims mchog
[\[281b.4\]]tu mi 'dzin pa dang /_bdag la mi bstod pa dang /_gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul la dga' ba dang /_gsang por smra ba dang /_bzhin khro gnyer med pa'o/_/yang nyan thos kyi sems dang /_dmigs pa can gyi sems tha na rmi lam du yang yid la mi byed pa ni bag yod pa'o/_/de bzhin
[\[281b.5\]]gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po bstan pa las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i spyan gyis sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba gzigs so/_/dmigs pa tshad med pa las yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin so sor rtogs pas/_kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs pa rnam par byang ba la/_rnam par 'jog pa
[\[281b.6\]]yang yod/_lhag pa'i nga rgyal gyis 'dzin pas rnam par byang ba la kun nas nyon mongs pa la dmigs par rnam par 'jog pa yod de/_de la snrel zhi'i rnam grangs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'jug go/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'o/_/rkyen
[\[281b.7\]]ni ma rig pa'o/_/ma rig pa ni rgyu'o/_/'du byed ni rkyen no/_/de bzhin du bsgre/_rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen ni gnyis te gzhan la rjes su mthun pa'i sgra dang /_rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o/_/yang gnyis te/_zhi gnas la rtse gcig pa dang /_lhag mthong la mkhas
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]pa'o/_/kun du 'gro ba la mkhyen pa ni lus kyi las sbyor la ngag gi ma yin pa yang mkhyen to/_/de bzhin du bsgre/_yang 'dod chags kyi lam sdug pa rnams las skye ba yang yod/_rjes su chags pa las skye ba yang yod/_bdag chags pa las skye ba yang yod do/_/
[\[282a.2\]]zhe sdang khong khro ba las skye ba'i rgyu yang yod/_bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa las skye ba yang yod/_bag chags las skye ba yang yod do/_/gti mug ma rig pa'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rgyu las skye ba yang yod/_the tshom gyi rgyu las skye ba yang yod
[\[282a.3\]]do/_/gang zag bsam pa dman pa la sbyor ba rgya che ba yang yod/_de bzhin du bsgre/_sems can gang dag snod min pa/_/de la sangs rgyas btang snyoms mdzad/_/gang gi dus na 'grol 'gyur ba/_/de yi dus la rab tu gzhes/_/'chags pa'i tshul khrims kyis lha dang
[\[282a.4\]]mir skye ba dang /_gnod sems kyis mdzes pa dang /_le los mngon par rtogs pa dang /_g.yeng bas nges par 'gyur ba dang /_dmigs pa can gyis rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa 'thob pa dang /_bud med kyi lus mdzes par 'khor los sgyur ba dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa
[\[282a.5\]]dang /_sangs rgyas su 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /_byang gi sgra mi snyan pa log par ltung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ma rtogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi rgyu ba shes pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la mnyam par bzhag pa ni gnas med do/_/skyes bu
[\[282a.6\]]kha dog lnga can du/_/nam mkha' gzugs su byed kyang srid/_/sangs rgyas gnas min bshad pa 'di/_/gnas su 'gyur ba mi srid do/_/nang ni zhi ba'o/_/phyi ni nye bar zhi ba'o/_/zag pa bzhi ni 'dod pa dang /_srid pa dang /_ma rig pa dang lta ba'o/_/nye bar len pa
[\[282a.7\]]bzhi ni/_'dod pa dang /_lta ba dang /_bdag tu lta ba smra ba dang /_tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa'o/_/sngon dri mchog gi bskal pa la/_'jig rten gyi khams dri ldan du/_de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan khyim 'jig rten du byung ba de mya ngan las
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'da' khar gang zhig gdul bar bya zhes 'jig rten la gzigs pa dang /_srid pa'i rtse mo na sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa sangs rgyas kyis gdul bya gcig cig 'dul ba de la/_bskal pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gnas nas mir skye ste/_de nas
[\[282b.2\]]shi 'phos te mir skyes nas 'dod pa la ma brtses pa theg pa chen po thos pa lta na/_byang chub chen po las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba gzigs so/_/de nas sangs rgyas de thugs rje dang thabs la mkhas pas/_dge slong dag la deng yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o
[\[282b.3\]]zhes mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan te/_sku gdung gis kyang rgyas par gyur to/_/dam pa'i chos kyang lo brgyad khri bzhi stong du gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das de ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus bskal pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhir sku mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas sems
[\[282b.4\]]can mir skyes te lo brgyad lon pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi kha dog dang gzugs kyis der gshegs nas/_khye'u de la chos bshad cing lung bstan te/_de'i tshe khye'u de ma gtogs pa mir gyur pa gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de ma mthong ngo /_/de nas yang mya ngan las 'das
[\[282b.5\]]pa bstan te/_sku gdung ni lha rnams kyis mchod do/_/nyi zla gcig gis mun pa thams cad sel ba ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag mthong dang ldan pa gcig gis mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan ni bzhi ste/_tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin
[\[282b.6\]]dang /_shes rab dang /_gzungs so/_/tshul khrims ni sems can thams cad la gnod pa mi byed pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin ni byams pa'o/_/shes rab ni the tshom med pa'o/_/gzungs ni dri ba brjod du med pa'o/_/sa gzhi bai DUr+ya dkar po'i dbyings su 'dug pa/_sangs
[\[282b.7\]]rgyas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag_/de yi ting 'dzin nyams pa med/_/chos rnams kun dang mnyam par ldan/_/sa chu me la ma yin te/_/rlung dang 'dod khams gzugs med la/_/rgyal ba gnas te bsam gtan min/_/lhag pa'i tshul khrims ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]mi mthong ba dang /_mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad rnam par spong ba'o/_/lhag pa'i sems ni ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas nas shes rab 'thob bo/_/lhag pa'i shes rab ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas so so yang dag par rig pa 'thob po/_
[\[283a.2\]]ma thos pa'i chos nyan pa ni shes rab kyi rtsa ba'o/_/thos pa'i chos gzhan la ston pa ni shes rab kyi las so/_/'di la bud+d+ha'i chos dang yig 'bru bshad pa ril 'byung /_bdud rtsi brjod pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' chos lnga dang ldan na bdud kyis mi brdzi ba dang /_tshe ring ba dang /_
[\[283a.3\]]myur du sangs rgyas su 'grub ste/_lnga ni rtag tu sems can la chos sbyin pa dang /_sems can la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_tshad med pa bzhi sgom pa dang /_mchod rten rnying pa 'chos pa dang /_sems can kun byang chub kyi sems la mos par byed pa'o/_/'jam dpal
[\[283a.4\]]gyis zhus pa las/_rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyi dbang dang /_gdul ba'i sems can gyi dge ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis te/_sku ji ltar gsung dang /_
[\[283a.5\]]mtshan dang chos ston pa la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_sems can rnams kyis de ltar shes so/_/dkyil 'khor brgyad pa las/_des ni lci ba sar bsres ba'i/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi lham par bya/_/sems can kun dang thun mong du/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[283a.6\]]gang yin dang /_/gang dag ma 'ongs da ltar byung /_/byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang dag yod pa/_/de dag rnams la yongs su bsngo/_/de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor yug tu/_/'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams bya ste/_/'jig rten dbang
[\[283a.7\]]phyug byams pa dang /_/thub pa skyes mchog nam mkha' dang /_/kun du bzang po blo ldan dang /_/gsang ba yi ni bdag po dang /_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel dang /_/de bzhin sa yi snying po ste/_/de dag gi ched du dkyil 'khor
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]brgyad bya'o/_/'di byas na yon tan bzhi 'thob ste/_tshe rabs thams cad du chos dang ldan pa'i sems dang mi 'bral ba dang /_'khor mang po dang /_yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_lus sra zhing brtan pa'o/_/chos kyi phung po las/_za ma'am ma ning gis bud med sdu
[\[283b.2\]]gu mthong nas 'dod chags skyes pas/_phal cher nad kyis btab cing 'byin pa rengs par 'gyur te/_de dag gi lus khu chu rgyas pas de ltar 'gyur ro/_/za ma dang ma ning las mtho ris su 'gro ba ni nyung ste/_phal cher dmyal bar 'gro'o/_/'khor bzhi po gang dag
[\[283b.3\]]'dod chags dang mi gtsang ba'i nyes dmigs mi shes pa de dag ni chags pas gdungs pas mdog ngan cing mi sdug go/_/shes pa ni de las bzlog pa'o/_/skyes pa lta bu ma yin pa srin bu'i rigs lnga bud med la yod de/_de dag ni bud med kyi gci ba'i lam na gnas
[\[283b.4\]]te/_re re la yang srin bu brgyad cu brgyad cu yod la/_mchu rno zhing mchu kha gnyis yod pas rtag tu bud med kyi lus la za'o/_/des na de dag gang yin spyod pa ste/_'dod pas ngoms mi myong ngo /_/'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa ni bcu ste/_'chi ba'i tshe gdung ba dang /_
[\[283b.5\]]'gyod par 'gyur ba dang /_mnar med par 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang /_/khrims la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis spangs pa dang /_nyan thos kyis spangs pa dang /_'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang bcas pa dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /_mi lus
[\[283b.6\]]'thob par dka' ba dang /_lha rnams kyis spangs pa'o/_/bud med kyi sna'i nang na srin bu'i tshogs kha rdzogs zhes bya ba dag yod de/_de dag bud med kyi kha spu la za bas bud med kyi kha spu mi skye'o/_/bud med la srin bu'i tshogs a ba ro phen zhes bya ba yod pas/_
[\[283b.7\]]bud med kyi kha la za ste/_des na mgul ba dma' ba yin no/_/bud med kyi khar bcug pa yang dang por de dag gis zos nas nyal nyil nu ma'i drung du 'dor te/_des na nu ma 'phyang ba yin no/_/bud med sbrum na srin bu de dag kyang sbrum ste/_des na nu zho mang ba yin
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]no/_/bud med 'dod chags mi bzod pas na bslab pa'i gzhi lhag ma bca' bar mdzad do/_/yi ge med pa'i za ma tog las/_byang chub sems dpas rtag tu nan tan du bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig ste gang zhe na/_gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan
[\[284a.2\]]la mi bya'o/_/gang zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa de/_'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nga nyid byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang thabs cig bya rgod phung po'i ri la gnas par mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi phyogs bstan pa las/_sus 'du byed thams cad mi
[\[284a.3\]]skye bar mthong bas sdug bsngal shes so/_/chos thams cad 'byung ba med par mthong bas kun 'byung spangs so/_/chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das par mthong bas 'gog pa mngon sum du byas so/_/chos thams cad dngos po med par mthong bas lam
[\[284a.4\]]bsgoms so/_/'phags pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo rin po che mthar phyin pa las/_bud med kyi lus de nyid kyis brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu de bzhin
[\[284a.5\]]gshegs pa gnyis 'byung ba gnas ma yin no/_/cha bzhi dang /_drug pa dang /_cha brgyad pa dang /_cha bcu drug pa dang /_zur gsum pa dang /_mo'i sgra dang /_mo'i dbyangs dang /_mo'i spa ba dang /_mo'i tshul dang /_kun du spyod pa ni mo'i dbang po zhes bya ste/_pho'i yang de dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[284a.6\]]byang gi sgra mi snyan rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong thub ste/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba yang yod do/_/'dod pa'i khams kyi lha drug dang /_gzugs kyi khams kyi gnas bcu bdun dang /_gzugs med pa bzhi la yang dus ma yin par 'chi ba yod par 'byung /_dmyal ba'i
[\[284a.7\]]ris la yang bar mdor 'chi ba yod par 'byung ngo /_/'chi ba na skye ba'i mtshan ma lam rgyud lnga gang gi mtshan ma mthong ba der skye ba 'byung /_zan la bod pa la tshul shing brim pa 'byung /_maud gal gyi bus shA ri'i bu'i snam sbyar myur bar byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]kyi thad du 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir sor mo lngas khab lngas drubs pa byung /_byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dri ba'i rang bzhin can ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/nga rgyal bskyed pas brnyas pa thob
[\[284b.2\]]'gyur la/_/nga rgyal spangs pa bkur sti 'thob par 'gyur/_/bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_nga rgyal spang bar bya/_sems can thams cad la yon gnas kyi sems nye bar gzhag par bya/_byang chub kyi sems mi
[\[284b.3\]]gtong bar bya/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mgu bar bya/_/chos btsal ba la chog mi shes par bya/_mang du thos pa la brtson par bya/_bstan bcos shin tu brtags pa dag kyang btsal bar bya/_so so'i grub pa'i mtha' rtogs pa la yang bslab par bya/_don
[\[284b.4\]]dang ldan pa'i bstan bcos btsal bar bya zhing don med pa'i bstan bcos 'di lta ste/_'jig rten rgyang phan pa dang /_byad stems kyi dang /_gzhon nu rtse ba'i bstan bcos dang /_rgyan po'i bstan bcos dang /_nyo tshong gi dang /_'khrig pa'i bar dang /_rig
[\[284b.5\]]byed kyi bstan bcos la sogs pa gang rnam par thar pa dang mi mthun pa thams cad ni spang bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa la bstan par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_log par lta ba
[\[284b.6\]]ni byang chub sems dpa'i mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma yin gyi nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni yin no/_/tshul khrims 'chal pa dang /_log par lta bas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gzhag par mi nus kyi/_nyan thos dang rang sangs
[\[284b.7\]]rgyas kyi theg pa pas ni byang chub sems dpa' zag pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug par nus so/_/sngon 'dzam bu'i gling 'di dag gi tshad khri phrag bzhi par gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rtsom pa ni 'di lta ste/_bstan bcos la mkhas pa yin no/_/chags pas ni 'gro ba lngar 'grub bo/_/zhe sdang gis ni gsum du'o/_/gti mug gis ni lngar ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_zhe sdang ni ngan song 'ba' zhig
[\[285a.2\]]gi sa ste/_las las nyon mongs pa rjes su dpag ste/_nyon mongs pa 'das pa las 'di mngon par 'dus byas nyon mongs pa las sems rjes su dpag ste/_nyon mongs pa rab tu spyod pa las chags pa'am/_sdang ba'am rmongs pa'i sems rjes su dpag
[\[285a.3\]]go/_/sems las gang zag 'byung bar rjes su dpag ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can de dag gi 'gro ba 'dod pas mdzad do/_/gang zag 'dis las 'di mngon par 'dus byas pas sems can dpa' bar 'gro'o/_/sngon bud+d+ha 'jig rten
[\[285a.4\]]gsum gyi bla mas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bram ze zla ba'i smin ma zhes bya bar gyur pa la/_ma 'ongs pa ni bskal pa bye ba drug cu na bud+d+ha 'jig rten gsal mdzes zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_sku tshe ni lo bye ba brgyad cur 'gyur bar lung bstan/_sngon
[\[285a.5\]]bud+d+ha grags ma smin pa'i spyan snga na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa na/_yi dam 'di ltar bcas te ji srid du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can rnams mngon par shes pa myur ba/_bde ba'i
[\[285a.6\]]lam gyis mya ngan las ma 'das pa dang /_ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /_sdug bsngal gyi sgra yod pa dang /_sems can thams cad srid pa tham par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang zag dang grong dang /_yul gyi
[\[285a.7\]]tha snyad dang /_'jig rten gyi shes pa thams cad bslab par bya'o/_/bud+d+ha shAkya thub pa sngon ston pa spyan bzangs zhes bya bar gyur pa na 'dod pa'i khams kyi skyon gyis gnod pa khams gnyis kyang de dang 'dra bas sems can rnams la skyabs med de/_bdag gis
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]ni 'du byed thams cad la gnas par mi bya ste/_gnas pa med na g.yo bar mi 'gyur ro snyam mo/_/de chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan du gyur nas/_sems can la snying rje ba'i sems thob ste/_chos de bstan pas sems can bye ba khrag khrig mi gnas
[\[285b.2\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das so/_/brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud lnga las rgyal bar nus so/_/lnga gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa dang /_las dang /_phung po dang /_'chi bdag dang /_lha'i bu'i bdud do/_/sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad
[\[285b.3\]]skye ste/_sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad 'gag ste/_ji lta ji ltar sems kyi rtog pa de lta de ltar chos thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan ston par byed do/_/tshe'i tshad kyi mdo las/_byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ste/_bar ma dor
[\[285b.4\]]'chi ba ni med do/_/sgyu ma mkhan bzang po lung bstan pa las/_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i lam ni bzhi ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la ngoms mi shes pa dang /_dam pa'i
[\[285b.5\]]chos sgrub pa'i phyir brtson pa'o/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis mi dpogs pa yin te/_bsam gtan zlog pa dang /_sems kyi rnam par 'byed pa dang /_sems can la snying rje che ba dang /_spobs pa dang skad sna tshogs
[\[285b.6\]]pa'o/_/phan yon bzhi mthong na/_thos pa tshol bar byed de/_rang dang gzhan gyi shes par sbyor ba dang /_phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i the tshom gcod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa mi zad pa'o/_/thos nas chos bye brag tu 'byed shes pa dang /_thos
[\[285b.7\]]nas bya ba mi byed pa dang /_thos nas gzhan la ston pa dang /_thos nas byang chub la gtong bar byed pa'o/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni chos smra ba'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur te/_'dod pa chung ba dang /_chog shes
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]pa dang /_ngang tshul bzang zhing mnyen pa dang /_rang gi chos sgrub pa'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas dang phrad par 'gyur te/_dran pa rtse gcig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa yang dang yang du brjod pa dang /_tshul khrims dag pa dang /_
[\[286a.2\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas smon lam 'debs pa'o/_/chos bzhis spobs pa dag 'thob ste/_chos smra ba gzhan gyis bshad pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_chos smra ba la gus pa dang /_zhes dang bcas par chos nyan pa dang /_thos pas khengs pa med pa
[\[286a.3\]]dang /_thos pa nyung ngu la brnyas par mi byed pa'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na smon lam 'grub ste/_tshul khrims dang /_bslab pa dag pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba dang /_g.yo sgyu med pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa la sems pa'o/_/'dul
[\[286a.4\]]ba gzhi las/_blta bas mi ngoms pa lnga ste/_rgya mtsho dang /_ba glang cang shes dang /_ri rab dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_sangs rgyas so/_/klu ni gnas skabs lnga rang bzhin du gnas te/_skye ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_za ba dang /_gnyid log pa dang /_
[\[286a.5\]]nyal po byed pa'o/_/bud med rang bzhin gyis mkhas pa kha cig ni skyes pa gang bdag la chags pa dang /_dus dang zla mtshan 'ong ba dang /_bu chags pa dang /_gag las mngal du zhugs pa dang /_bu pho mo shes te/_pho ni g.yas par ro/_/mo ni g.yon par ro/_/rang
[\[286a.6\]]bzhin gyi ma ning ni/_thog ma nas bud med kyang ma yin pa'o/_/zla ba phyed pa ni bud med/_phyed ni skyes par 'gyur ba'o/_/chags pa'i ma ning ni/_gang la pha rol la chags nas dbang po 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o/_/phrag dog pa'i ma ning ni/_pha rol log par sgrub pa mthong
[\[286a.7\]]nas dbang po 'gyur ba'o/_/nyams pa'i ma ning ni/_nad kyis dbang po nyams pa'am/_mtshon gyis bcad pa'o/_/sor mo'i phreng ba las/_nyan thos kyi theg pa las/_yid ches bstan pa gang yin pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o zhes bya ba'i don de yid rang
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]bzhin gyis dag pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'o/_/de ni chos thams cad kyi gtso bo ste/_chos thams cad kyi go de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i rang bzhin no/_/'di lta ste/_rgyal po gzhan gyis khrims byas pa thos nas bdag nyid kyang skye
[\[286b.2\]]dgu skyong ba de bzhin du/_kha che yul gyi 'khor dang /_yul b+ha ru ka tsa pa rnams kyang ngo tsha dang /_nga rgyal bskyed nas theg pa chen pos 'jigs shing skrag pas gsang ste ston par 'gyur gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston par mi 'gyur ro/_/sngon bskal pa dpag tu
[\[286b.3\]]med pa'i sngon rol du bud+d+ha ko san ta bzang po mnyan yod kyi drung du byung ba na dam pa'i chos nub kar dge slong sangs rgyas blo gros dgon pa na gnas pa la gcig gis gcig la gos bzang po zhig byin pa nub gcig nas gcig gis gos phrog ste gcer bur phyung nas
[\[286b.4\]]shing la btags so/_/de nas bram ze me tog thu ba zhig gis mthong nas/_kye ma dge sbyong ngur smrig gis ni thar par mi 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/_gcer bur byung la dka' thub byas na ngur ba lta zhes gcer bur byung nas rgyu ste/_de nas gcer bur byung ngo /_/de nas
[\[286b.5\]]dge slong de bcings pa khrol nas lus sa ser zhig gis byugs te 'gro ba dang /_chur zhugs te klad pa'i rma bkrus nas rtswa 'jam pos klad pa bkab pa dang /_rang gi lus rma yod pa skra 'jam pos g.yogs pa dang /_ba lang gi lci ba ba sogs te me lde ba dang /_rma la phog snyam
[\[286b.6\]]byed pa/_bram ze zhig dang shing thun zhig dang /_nyam thag pa gzhan dag cig gis mthong nas/_snga ma bzhin bsams te ya mtshan can kun du rgyu dang /_dka' thub can rtswa gos gyon pa dang /_phyugs bdag dang ba lang gi lci ba'i ri lu can dang /_mya ngan du 'gro ba byung /_
[\[286b.7\]]de nas mgo byung ste/_ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po thams cad kyang dge slong de'i spyod lam las 'phros te byung ngo /_/'phags pa bde byed kyis zhus pa las/_rigs kyi bu gang su yang rung ba dag de ltar chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi 'dod mi dad la
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]slar zlog pa dang /_gshe ba de ni dge sbyong ma yin pa zhes bya/_mu stegs can zhes bya/_dmigs can zhes bya/_dkrugs ma ba zhes bya/_ngan g.yo can zhes bya/_'chal pa zhes bya'o/_/skye bo rmongs pa khros pas zil non pa/_/'jig rten mkhas pa'i/_
[\[287a.2\]]bstan las de ring ste/_de ni log lta rnams kyi nang 'dzin yin/_/de lta bas na mkhas mis 'khrug mi bya/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhus pa las/_'jam dpal rgyu gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad du 'phags pa yin no/_/rgyu gnyis gang zhe na/_
[\[287a.3\]]'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang dang /_gdul bya'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba yongs su smin pa'i dbang gis te/_'jam dpal rgyu de gnyis kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/sku ji lta bar
[\[287a.4\]]gsung dang /_mtshan dang chos ston pa la sogs pa yang de 'dra ste/_sems can rnams kyis de ltar shes so/_/'phags pa chos kyi phung po las/_bcu po 'di dag ni tshul khrims 'chal pa'i nyes dmigs yin te/_'chi ba'i tshe gdung bar 'gyur ba dang /_'gyod par 'gyur ba
[\[287a.5\]]dang /_mnar med par 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang /_tshul khrims can la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis spangs pa dang /_nyan thos kyis spangs pa dang /_lhas spangs pa dang /_'chi ba'i tshe 'jigs pa dang /_ngan 'gror 'gro ba dang /_mi lus 'thob par dka' ba'o/_/
[\[287a.6\]]'phags pa rin po che'i mtha' las/_chos kyi dbyings la 'di dag ni skye bo'i chos so/_/'di dag ni 'phags pa'i chos so zhes gdags par mi nus so/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'di ni 'di na 'dug go/_/che ge mo zhig na 'dug go zhes gdags par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[287a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings ni bstan du med pa/_gdags su med pa/_gdags pa las yang dag par 'das pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi sngon gyi smon lam rgyas pa las/_dus ma yin par 'chi ba dgu yod do/_/gang zhe na/_nad pa sman dang rim
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]gro dang mi ldan pa'am/_sman ma yin pa byed pa dang /_rgyal po'i chad pa dang /_ha cang bag med pas mi ma yin pas mdangs phrogs pa dang /_me dang /_chu dang /_seng ge stag wa sbrul la sogs pa dang g.yang du lhung ba dang /_dug byad ro langs kyi sbyor ba dang /_bkres skom
[\[287b.2\]]ste/_'di dag ni mdor bsdus pa'o/_/gzhan yang grangs med dpag tu med do/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba'i mdo las/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis mtha' yas pa de bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa la yon
[\[287b.3\]]phul pa yang tshad med mtha' yas so/_/phyi ma'i tshe dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la mchod pa dang /_bsti stang byed pa des phan yon lnga gzung bar 'gyur te/_dran pa dang ldan pa dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_ngo tsha shes
[\[287b.4\]]shing khrel yod pa dang /_myur du sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_mthong nas dad pa skye ba'o/_/de chos bzhi dang yang ldan par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa dang /_de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin sgrub pa dang /_bsgrubs nas sangs
[\[287b.5\]]rgyas dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dag go/_/d+harma 'di las mchod rten la rgyan phul pa yan chad so so'i yon tan zhib tu 'byung ngo /_/'phags pa gser gyi bye ma lta bu las/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe
[\[287b.6\]]dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas mi 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa mi spyod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_sangs
[\[287b.7\]]rgyas 'byung ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa ni dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i bye ma dang /_gang gA'i bye ma'i nang na gser gyi bye ma dkon pa dang 'dra ste/_ji ltar rgya mtsho'i bye ma dang /_gang gA'i bye ma las la la zhig gis bye ma 'bru gcig blangs pa
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]bzhin du nyung ngo /_/'phags pa chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i mdo las/_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan ba shar dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul pa la rab tu byung
[\[288a.2\]]ba zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'jig rten pa'i chos las kyang ma 'das la/_zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyang ma thob na/_de tsam gyis rab tu byung ba dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pa yin no/_/'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa
[\[288a.3\]]las/_bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba byed pa ste/_gang zhe na/_sems can mthu chung ba la bzod pa byed pa dang /_dbul ba la bdog pa thams cad gtong ba dang /_yan lag gi mchog mgo slong ba la khro ba med pa'i steng du bshes gnyen
[\[288a.4\]]du 'du shes pa dang /_skye ba la mi rtog pas bsams bzhin du skye bar byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos zung du 'brel ba bzhi ste/_gang zhe na/_bsam pa dang sbyor ba zung du 'brel pa dang /_gtong ba dang bsngo ba zung du 'brel pa dang /_byams pa dang snying
[\[288a.5\]]rje zung du 'brel pa dang /_thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel pa'o/_/'phags pa blo gros mi zad pas/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/_spyod pa'i khyad par rdzogs pa'i don ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/ye shes zab mo rdzogs pa'i don
[\[288a.6\]]dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas lam chags pa'i don dang /_'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin rtogs pa'i don dang /_skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams rtogs par byed pa'i don dang /_sems can gyi khams shes pa'i don dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa'i don
[\[288a.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing sbyong ba'i don dang /_yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/'phags pa sgo mtha' yas ba sgrub pa las/_rgyal bas bsngags pa'i dgon par gnas par gyis/_/de la gnas pas gzhan la brnyas mi bya/_/zab mo'i bzod
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]la 'dun pa bskyed nas su/_bag yod mgo la 'bar bzhin gnas par gyis/_/'di ltar tshul 'chos byed kyi gzhi yin pa/_/shes khe rnyed pa rnams la gnas ma byed/_/bya dang 'dra bar ngan ngon tsam gyis chog bya ste/_/mir gyur pa yi 'bras bu yod par
[\[288b.2\]]gyis/_/'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa las/_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das dge slong de dag gis chos 'di thos nas gnod par gyur pa la gzigs/_bka' stsal pa/_de skad ma zer cig_/
[\[288b.3\]]gal te 'di ma thos na bskal ba'i bar du bzang 'gror yang mi skye na/_sangs rgyas mnyes par byed pa lta ci smos/_chos kyi rnam grangs de dag the tshom dang bcas par thos pas da gzod kho na dmyal ba nas thar nas dga' ldan du skyes so/_/'phags pa dpal dbyig gis zhus
[\[288b.4\]]pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pas pha ma la gnod pa byed pa dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba dang /_mdza' bo dang /_blon po dang /_nye du dang rgan rabs la gnod pa byed par ji ltar mos
[\[288b.5\]]pa dang /_ci nus par dus dus su sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/'phags pa bgres mos zhus pa las/_chos thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'i phyir te/_'on kyang chos rnams 'dogs so/_/mkhas pa rnams ni de la mngon par mi zhen te/_mngon par zhen pa med pas
[\[288b.6\]]mi rtsod do/_/rtsod pa med pa ni dge slong gi chos kyi mchog go/_/kun dga' bos gsol pa/_'di ci'i slad du 'di ltar dbul bar gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_'di nga'i mar gyur te/_de bzhin
