[\[288b.7\]]gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi bstan pa la rab tu 'byung du ma btang bas/_nga za gcig zan bcad par gyur te/_de nas 'dod pas btang ngo /_/de'i rnam par smin pas 'di ltar gyur to/_/'phags pa rnam par mi rtog pa la 'jog pa las/_dam chos 'di
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]la rgyal ba'i sras/_/rnam par mi rtog bsams gyur nas/_/rnam rtog bgrod dka' rnam 'das te/_/rim gyis mi rtog thob par 'gyur/_/'phags pa 'jig rten dang mthun par 'dug pa las/_sangs rgyas ye shes dpag yas te/_/chos kyi dbyings
[\[289a.2\]]las 'byung yin yang /_/sangs rgyas zhing ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/_/zhigs pa med cing skye med la/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gyur kyang /_/bsreg pa'i bskal pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten mthun 'jug yin/_/'phags pa chos
[\[289a.3\]]dang don rnam par 'byed pa las/_bud med gang la la zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam klog na/_de bud med kyi lus brjes nas/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur te/_de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no/_/'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang
[\[289a.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa srid pa 'pho ba las/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na las bgyis shing ba sogs pa 'gags nas yun ring du lags pa 'gum pa'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas shing yid la mngon du 'gyur
[\[289a.5\]]lags/_'du byed thams cad stod pa la ji ltar las rnams 'chab mi 'tshal bar gda'/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/_
[\[289a.6\]]dper na mi zhig nyal nyal ba'i rmi lam na/_yul gyi bud med bzang mo dang lhan cig tu yongs su spyod pa rmis la/_de nyal ba las sad nas yul gyi bud med bzang mo de dran no/_/rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo de yod dam/_gsol
[\[289a.7\]]pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po 'di ji snyam du sems/_'o na gang rmi lam gyi bud med bzang mo la mngon par zhen pa'i mi de ci mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das
[\[289b\]]
[\[289b.1\]]de ni ma lags te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi yul gyi bud med bzang mo yang shin tu ma mchis shing mi dmigs lags na/_de dang yongs su spyod pa lta ga la mchis te/_'di ltar mi de ni phongs shing du ba pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[289b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa yang mig gis gzugs rnams mthong na/_yid bde bar 'gyur pa'i gzugs rnams la mngon par zhen te/_mngon par zhen par gyur nas rjes su
[\[289b.3\]]chags par 'gyur ro/_/rjes su chags nas kun du chags par 'gyur ro/_/kun du chags nas 'dod chags las byung ba dang /_zhe sdang las byung ba dang /_gti mug las byung ba'i las lus dang ngag dang /_yid kyis mngon par 'du byed de/_las de mngon par 'dus byas par gyur nas 'gag
[\[289b.4\]]go/_/'gag pa na shar phyogs su brten te gnas pa ma yin/_lho phyogs su ma yin/_nub phyogs su ma yin/_byang phyogs su ma yin/_steng du ma yin/_'og tu ma yin/_phyogs mtshams rnams su brten te gnas pa ma yin no/_/dus gzhan zhig na 'chi ba'i dus
[\[289b.5\]]dang /_tshod nye bar gnas pa'i tshe dang skal ba 'dra ba'i las zad nas rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe/_'di lta ste dper na/_nyal nyal ba las sad pa'i mi'i yul gyi bud med bzang mo lta bur las de nyid la mngon du 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po de ltar rnam par shes
[\[289b.6\]]pa tha ma 'gag cing skye ba'i char gtogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dang po yang na ni lha'i nang du/_yang na ni mi'i nang du/_yang na ni lha ma yin gyi nang du/_yang na ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su/_yang na ni dud 'gro rnams su/_yang na ni yi dgas rnams su 'byung bar
[\[289b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa dang po de 'gags ma thag tu/_gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba/_mngon pa de dang skal pa 'dra ba'i sems kyi rgyud 'byung ngo /_/rgyal po chen po de la chos gang yang 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol tu phyin pa yang med la/_'chi 'pho
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]dang skye bar mngon pa yang yod de/_rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa gang tha ma 'gags pa de ni 'chi 'pho zhes bya/_gang rnam par shes pa dang po 'byung ba da ni skye ba zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa tha ma 'gag pa'i tshe yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o/_/rnam
[\[290a.2\]]par shes pa dang po skye ba'i tshe yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rgyal po chen po de la rnam par shes pa tha ma ni tha mas stong /_'chi 'pho ni 'chi 'phos stong /_las ni las kyis stong /_rnam par shes pa dang po ni dang pos stong /_
[\[290a.3\]]skye ba ni skye bas stong la/_las rnams chud mi za bar mngon pa yang yod do/_/rgyal po chen po rnam par shes pa dang po skye ba'i char gtogs pa 'gags ma thag tu bar ma chad par gang la rnam par smin pa myong bar 'gyur ba mngon par sems kyi rgyud 'byung ngo /_/'phags
[\[290a.4\]]pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/_kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yod de/_de rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byas te/_rgyun du zhugs pa nas rang sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[290a.5\]]phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba bas/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten brtsegs pa las skyu ru ra'i 'bras bu tsam byas la/_khab tsam gyi srog shing btsugs te/_rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs gsol nas nas 'bru tsam
[\[290a.6\]]gyi sku gzugs byas la/_yungs 'bru tsam gyi ring bsrel bcug na de ni de bas ches bsod nams che'o zhes nga smra'o/_/'phags pa bram ze mo dpal gyis zhus pa las/_dpal ldan ma ma rig pa ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par 'byung gi yang dag pa'i
[\[290a.7\]]rnam pa ni ma yin no/_/ma rig pa ni phyin ci log rnam par 'byung gi phyin ci log pa'i rnam par smin pa ni mi 'byung ngo /_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa las/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]pa 'di mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs thams cad der 'dus pas so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka las/_bka' stsal ba/_kau shi ka shes rab kyi
[\[290b.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya/_gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/_mtshan mar ma yin mtshan ma med par yang ma yin/_blang bar ma yin/_dor bar ma yin/_bsnan par ma yin/_bsnan pa med par ma yin/_
[\[290b.3\]]kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa med par yang ma yin pa nas yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/skar ma rab rib mar me dang /_/sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang /_/mi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/_/
[\[290b.4\]]'dus byas thams cad de ltar blta/_na mo b+ha ga wa te pra dz+nyA pa ra mi ta ye/_oM d+hI shI shru ti smr-i ti gti bi dza ye swA hA/_'gag pa med pa skye med pa/_/rtag pa med cing chad med la/_/tha dad don min don gcig min/_/'ong ba med cing 'gro med la/_/spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yin/_/rten
[\[290b.5\]]cing 'brel 'byung sus bstan pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa/_/smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa chos bzhi pa bstan pa las/_chos bzhin dang ldan na/_sdig pa byas shing bsags pa zil gyis non par 'gyur te/_rnam par sun 'byin pa ni mi
[\[290b.6\]]dge ba spyod pa na de la 'gyod pa mang ba 'o/_/gnyen po spyod pa ni mi dge ba byas nas dge ba la brtson pa'o/_/sor chud par byed pa'i stobs ni sdom pa blangs nas phyin chad mi byed pa'o/_/rten gyi stobs ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi
[\[290b.7\]]gtong ba'o/_/'phags pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las/_chos gang rgyus byung de dag gi/_/rgyu dang de 'gog gang yin pa'ang /_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal to/_/de skad gsung ba dge sbyong che/_/la las mi yod pa'i sa phyogs su mchod rten byas te
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]snying po 'di bcug na shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o/_/de nas shi 'phos nas gnas gtsang mar skye'o/_/'phags pa chos bzhi po las/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi srog gi phyir yang nam 'tsho'i bar du mi gtong ba la/_byang chub kyi sems dang /_
[\[291a.2\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_bzod pa dang /_nges pa dang /_dgon par gnas pa'o/_/'phags pa byams pa la bka' stsal pa/_byams pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i gang gA'i bye ma snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la phul ba bas/_gang gis
[\[291a.3\]]snying rje bas tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzhan gyi rgyud la bzhag na/_bsod nams 'di la snga mas char yang mi phod do/_/'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/_mdo 'di bklags na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bklags par 'gyur/_/'phags pa chos bzhi
[\[291a.4\]]pa'i mdo las/_dge slong gis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yid brtan par mi bya ba bzhi la/_bud med dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_bdag gi gzugs bzang ba dang /_dbang phyug pa yo byad 'byor pa'o/_/'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros las/_bsod nams 'dod pas de
[\[291a.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya'o/_/shes rab 'dod pas mnyan pa la brtson par bya'o/_/longs spyod 'dod pas gtong ba spel bar bya'o/_/gzugs bzang bar 'dod pas/_bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o/_/gzungs
[\[291a.6\]]'dod pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o/_/bde ba 'dod pas sdig pa spang bar bya'o/_/sems can la bde bar bya bar 'dod pas/_byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/skad snyan par 'dod pas bden pa smra bar bya'o/_/yon tan 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen
[\[291a.7\]]la bsten par bya'o/_/zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med par bya'o/_/lhag mthong mthong bar 'dod pas chos la stong par brtag par bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dod pas tshad med pa bsgom par bya'o/_/lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs par 'dod pas dge ba bcu bya'o/_/
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod pas/_thos pa la brtson par bya'o/_/yon tan thams cad 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o/_/'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa las/_ser sna spang ba'i phyir dad pas sbyin no/_/dus su sbyin no/_/de bzhin
[\[291b.2\]]gshegs pas gnang ba'i rung ba dngos po gsum yongs su dag par sbyin no/_/sems kyi 'khrug pa'i skyon thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bsti stong byas te sbyin no/_/snying po med pa'i lus las snying po blang pa'i phyir rang gi lag nas sbyin no/_/d+harma 'di las sbyin pa re
[\[291b.3\]]re'i rnam par smin pa nges pa rgyas pa 'byung /_'phags pa mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo las/_nad med mi rtag lang tsho rtag ma yin/_/'byor ba mi rtag srog kyang rtag ma yin/_/skye bo mi rtag nyid kyis nyen gyur na/_/'dod pas yon tan dga' ba ji ltar skye/_/'phags pa kun du rgyu sen rings kyis
[\[291b.4\]]zhus pa las/_bcom ldan 'das la kun du rgyu sen rings kyis gsol pa/_bdag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/_/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen te gnas pa la nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/srog chags thams cad gsod dang
[\[291b.5\]]gzhan nor rku dang mi tshangs spyod pa dang /_/gang gi dbye ba brdzun dang myos skyed btung dang dus min za ba dang /_/phreng ba kha dog glu gar rtse 'jo mal stan mthon po rnams/_/deng nas bdag gis spangs te yon tan brgyad kyis dgra bcom tshul du bgyi/_/de bzhin du lan
[\[291b.6\]]gnyis lan gsum du'o/_/bdag gis gso sbyong gi tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa 'di sems kyi rgyan dang /_sems kyi yo byad dang /_byang chub kyi tshogs su 'gyur ba dang /_don gyi dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_mya ngan
[\[291b.7\]]las 'das pa'i bde ba bla na med pa la gnas par gyur cig_/bka' stsal pa/_bram ze chen po khyod de ltar byed pa legs so legs so/_/'phags pa seng ges zhus pa las/_skye ba kun du byang chub sems/_/rmi lam na yang sems de ni/_/'dor mi
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]'gyur na ma nyal tshe/_/smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/_/grong dang grong khyer rnams su yang /_/gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/_/byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/_/des na sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir ni snying po lnga byin zhing /_/
[\[292a.2\]]skrag la mi 'jigs byin na ni/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/des ni stobs ni cher 'gyur te/_/rtag tu mthu yis 'phags pa dang /_/bdud rnams bye bas mi tshugs so/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa las/_'jam dpal ci la dmigs nas de
[\[292a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bgyi/_lha'i bu dmigs pa bzhi ste gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi sems dang /_sems can thams cad thar bar bya ba dang /_dkon mchog gi gdung rgyud mi gcad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la dmigs nas so/_/
[\[292a.4\]]'phags pa rdo rje snying po'i gzungs las/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can dmyal ba rang gi rtog pa las byung ngam/_'on te ngo bo nyid las byung /_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye bo rang gi rtog
[\[292a.5\]]pas sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten du rig ste/_de dag ma mchis pa la sgro btags pa'i slad du ngan song gsum du gnod pa tshor zhing sdug bsngal myong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dmyal ba ji ltar mi mthong ba de bzhin
[\[292a.6\]]du sems can dmyal ba pa rnams mi mthong ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper bgyi na mi la la zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na bdag sems can dmyal bar ltung ba snyam du rig nas de de na lcags kyi bum pa rab tu khros pa shin tu 'bar bar bdag
[\[292a.7\]]nyid bcug par yang 'du shes par 'gyur ro/_/des de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba drag cing mi bzad la brnag par dka' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba myong bar 'gyur/_des de na yid kyi gdung ba myong bar 'gyur/_des de na skrag par 'gyur/_dngang bar 'gyur/_kun du dngang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]nas de 'di ltar bdag ni gnyid kyis log par gyur te yang dag pa ma yin pa 'di bdag gis kun du brtags so snyam du dran pa skye bar 'gyur zhing /_slar yang yid bde ba thob par 'gyur lags so zhes gsungs so/_/'phags pa snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa las/_
[\[292b.2\]]chos bzhi dang ldan na myur du bzod pa 'thob cing bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_bzhi ni sangs rgyas la chos nyid du mthong gi/_gzugs su ma yin pa dang /_chos la 'dod chags dang bral bar mthong gi/_yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig tu ma yin pa dang /_
[\[292b.3\]]dge 'dun la 'dus byas su mthong gi/_tshogs su ma yin pa dang /_shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'o/_/'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu pa las/_gang gis mtshan bzung na myur du 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas bcu la/_shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams
[\[292b.4\]]yon tan thams cad rnam par dag pa na sangs rgyas yon tan bskal pa dpag tu med pa las 'das pa dang /_lho phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams yon tan rin chen bkod pa na sangs rgyas yon tan bkod pa'i dpal gzi brjid kyi phung po'i bskal pa dang /_nub phyogs
[\[292b.5\]]na 'jig rten sbyor bas mun pa thams cad bral ba na sangs rgyas chos thams cad la spobs pa bkod pa'i dpal dang /_byang phyogs na 'jig rten mun pa dang rdul dang bral ba na spobs pa dpag tu med pa yang dag par spyod pa dang /_shar lho na 'jig rten yun ring por bde
[\[292b.6\]]ba bkod pa na sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgra dbyangs bstod pa dang /_lho nub na 'jig rten yon tan dpag tu med pa bkod pa na sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od dam pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba dang /_nub byang na 'jig rten ngan song spangs pa na sangs rgyas rnam pa mang po'i
[\[292b.7\]]gzi brjid kyi rgyal po dpal 'byung ba dang /_byang shar na 'jig rten mya ngan gyi gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba na sangs rgyas bskal pa bye ba grangs med par kun du 'byung ba dang /_steng na 'jig rten gzi brjid dpag tu med pa bkod pa na/_sangs rgyas dge ba
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]gser gyi nam mkha' nges par sgrogs pa dpal gyi gzi brjid 'byung ba dang /_'og na 'jig rten rdul thams cad 'dus pa na sangs rgyas chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzi brjid 'byung ba'o/_/dam pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
[\[293a.2\]]las/_dper na chu bo'i rgyun bar chad med par rtag tu 'bab pa bzhin du skyes bu de dag gnyid log gam/_myos sam rab tu myos pa'i 'jug pa na yang de bzhin no/_/de ltar na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs bstan du med pa thogs pa med par 'dod do/_/
[\[293a.3\]]gzugs de ji lta bu yin zhe na/_las kyi ngo bor yod pa nyid yin no/_/dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rab yang dag pa'i lam ston pa ni 'di lta ste/_'dod chags la mi sdug pa'o/_/zhe sdang la byams pa'o/_/gti mug la rten cing 'brel bar
[\[293a.4\]]'byung ba'o/_/'di ltar sa chen po'i chos bcu ni tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_sems pa dang /_reg pa dang /_yid la byed pa dang /_'dun pa dang /_mos pa dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab ste/_dmigs pa gcig la mtshan nyid gzhan dang
[\[293a.5\]]gzhan du 'dod pa de dang 'dra'o/_/mchod rten nam dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang gi skyong nul nyi ma'am/_char pas zad pa slar 'chos na lha phyi bang gsum pa lus dkar gyi nang du skye/_de nas shi 'phos na yang de dang rgyu mthun dkar sham pad+ma'i rtsa lag lta bu'i mdog stong
[\[293a.6\]]phyogs dang rgya yul la sogs par skye bar 'gyur/_rgyal chen bzhi rnams ni ri rab kyi ngos la 'khor ro/_/gzhal med khang dang ldan pa de dag la mu stegs can rnams gza' dang skar ma dang /_rgyu skar yin par sems te/_de rnams kyi rags pa bgrangs na bye ba phrag drug yod do/_/
[\[293a.7\]]ri rab kyi ngos gang la nyi ma 'khor ba'i ngos de dang de'i mi'i gnas gang du ri rab kyi grib ma 'bab pa de ltar mtshan mor 'gyur ro/_/byang phyogs na rlung 'khor lo'i gzugs zhes bya ba yod do/_/byang phyogs kyi skar ma de dag 'char du yang mi ster/_nub tu yang mi ster na mu stegs can de
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]dag gis de mthong nas drang srong bdun gyis 'jig rten 'dzin to/_/brgya byin gyi khang pa brtsegs ma la brgya byin snga rabs shi ste na rag la sogs par song ba'i ming gi dkar chag bris ba ni legs 'byor pa dang /_kun dga' dang mi 'chi zhes bya ba la sogs sum cu ste/_de mthong
[\[293b.2\]]nas brgya byin skyo ba skye'o/_/dkon mchog sprin las/_ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa mang ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gcig pur dben par 'dug ste/_nang du yang dag par bzhag nas rab tu dben pa la mngon du phyogs
[\[293b.3\]]te/_shin tu skyo ba'i sems kyis lus drang po dang /_lus bags kyis klod pas skyil mo krung bcas nas dran pa mngon du gzhag ste/_phyi rol du ma byung ba'i sems kyis 'di snyam du sems so/_/sems can gang dag khro ba gnod sems mang ba mi dge ba'i las byed pa rnams
[\[293b.4\]]dang /_gang dag bdag la rgol ba dang /_dgra bo gcugs med par shar gnyer ba rnams byung ngam 'byung ngam 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang rung ste/_bdag gis de dag thams cad kyi khro ba dang /_gnod sems rab tu zhi bar bya ste/_byang chub kyi snying po la bkod par
[\[293b.5\]]bya'o snyam mo/_/de yang gang tsam gyis ma yin gyi bsam pa thag pas sems te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgom pa mang ba yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang dag par
[\[293b.6\]]'grub pa ma lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul bsgrub par bya ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_de bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par sgrub par mi nus kyis/_nam byang chub
[\[293b.7\]]sems dpas chos mnyam pa nyid du zhugs par gyur pa de'i tshe nas brtsams te bskal pa bgrang bar bya'o/_/thog ma'i sems nas brtsams te ni ma yin no/_/theg pa chen po chos mngon pa'i mdo las 'byung ba byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/_
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]rnam par rig pa thams cad kyi don med par khong du chud par 'gyur te/_rnam par shes pa mi mthun pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid shes pa ni/_'di lta ste/_yi dgas dang /_dud 'gro dang /_mi dang lha rnams kyi dngos po gcig la rnam par rig pa tha dad par mthong
[\[294a.2\]]ba lta bu dang /_dmigs pa med pa'i rnam par rig pa dmigs pa ni/_'di lta ste/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_rmi lam dang /_gzugs brnyan dmigs pa lta bu dang /_phrad pa med par phyin ci log med par 'gyur ba shes pas ni bden pa'i don la dmigs pa'i
[\[294a.3\]]rnam par shes pa 'bad pa med par bden par shes pa'i phyir phyin ci log med par 'gyur ba dang /_shes pa rnam pa gsum pa rjes su mthun pa'i shes pas ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dang /_bsam gtan pa sems la dbang thob pa rnams mos pa'i dbang gis de
[\[294a.4\]]ltar don de dag snang ba dang /_zhi gnas thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa chos la lhag mthong la brtson pa rnams la yid la byed pa tsam du don snang ba dang /_rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob ste/_de la gnas pa rnams la don thams cad mi snang ngo /_/dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las/_
[\[294a.5\]]'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa nges pa'i don du bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das rnam par lta ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs brnyan gang lags pa de/_sems las tha dad pa zhes bgyi'am tha dad pa ma lags
[\[294a.6\]]zhes bgyi byams pa tha dad pa ma yin zhes bya'o/_/ci'i phyir tha dad pa ma yin zhe na/_gzugs brnyan de rnam par rig pa tsam du zad pa'i phyir te/_byams pa rnam par shes pa ni dmigs pa rnam par rig pa tsam gyis phye ba ma yin no zhes ngas bshad do/_/bcom
[\[294a.7\]]ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gzugs brnyan de sems las tha dad pa ma lags na sems de nyid kyis sems de nyid la ji ltar rtog par bgyid/_bka' stsal pa/_byams pa chos gang la yang rtog par mi byed mod kyi/_'on kyang de ltar skyes pa'i sems
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]de ni de ltar snang ngo /_/byams pa 'di lta ste/_me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu dag pa la gzugs kyis rkyen byas te gzugs nyid mthong yang gzugs brnyan mthong ngo snyam du sems te/_de la ni gzugs de dang gzugs brnyan snang ba de don tha dad par snang ngo /_/de bzhin du de
[\[294b.2\]]ltar skyes pa'i sems de yang ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba dang don tha dad par snang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams kyi gzugs brnyan rang bzhin du gnas pa gzugs la sogs pa gang lags pa de yang /_sems dang tha dad pa ma lags pa
[\[294b.3\]]zhes bgyi'am/_byams pa tha dad pa ni ma yin te/_byis pa phyin ci log gi blo can rnams kyis gzugs brnyan de dag la rnam par rig pa tsam de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pas phyin ci log tu sems so/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/_bka'
[\[294b.4\]]stsal pa/_byams pa 'du byed kyi mtshan ma'i dngos po la 'di ltar gzugs zhes bya ba nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams zhes bya ba'i bar du ming du glo bur du btags pa de rnam par rtog pa tsam du ma zad dam/_gsol pa/_rnam par rtog pa tsam nyid do/_/yi ge med pa'i za
[\[294b.5\]]ma tog rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po las/_rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba'i chos ni gcig ste gang zhe na/_gang bdag mi 'dod pa de gzhan la mi bya'o/_/chos gcig pu de bsrungs na byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad
[\[294b.6\]]bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang bdag gi srog phangs par 'dzin pa des srog mi gcod do/_/gang bdag gis nor phangs pa de ma byin par mi len te/_gang bdag gi chung ma phangs par 'dzin pa de gzhan gyi chung ma'i gan du mi 'gro ba'o/_/
[\[294b.7\]]rigs kyi bu de la sogs pa gang la la zhig 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin du bya'o snyam du sems pa des chos gcig pu 'di bsrung bar bya'o zhes bshad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu gang la la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don du
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]gnyer ba de thams cad ni rang gi bde ba'i rgyur don du gnyer gyi/_su yang bdag sdug bsngal bar mi 'dod/_'gro ba rnams ni bde ba 'dod/_/ces bya ba'i tha tshig ste/_gang khyed cag mi 'dod pa de gzhan dag lam byed cig ces nga smra'o/_/rigs
[\[295a.2\]]kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gang rtag tu bsrung bar bya ba'i chos gcig go/_/gang mdo 'di nyan pa de 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag nyid dang /_thabs cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po la gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang de
[\[295a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos gcig pu de gang zhes zer ba ni chos gcig pu de gang yang med do/_/gang la chos gang yang rtog pa med pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang de
[\[295a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ma skyes par thugs su chud do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri pa las/_de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong
[\[295a.5\]]pa nyid de/_de ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rang gi mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa ste/_de ni rnam
[\[295a.6\]]par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa med par so sor rtog pa'i sems gnas pa'o/_/de la mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po gang zhan/_gang zag slob
[\[295a.7\]]pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dran pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po gang yin pa'o/_/kun shes pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag slob pa mngon par rtogs par ma gyur pa rnams kyi gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po gang zhe na/_gang zag mi slob pa 'di lta ste/_dgra bcom pa rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dad pa'i dbang po la sogs pa gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[295b.2\]]de la rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/_bsam gtan dang po dang /_bsam gtan gnyis pa'i bar gang yin pa'o/_/de dag ni zad par gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya ste/_thams cad sa'i khams su mos par byed de/_thams cad kyang sa'i khams kho nar khams
[\[295b.3\]]gcig tu 'gyur ro/_/thams cad chud nas rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du mos par byed de/_rnam par shes pa kho nar khams gcig pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/de la thams cad shes pa nyid gang zhe na/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams skye mched bcu gnyis po dag la gang
[\[295b.4\]]zag la bdag med par phyogs gcig shes pa gang yin pa ste/_de ni thams cad shes pa zhes bya'o/_/de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' theg pa gsum gyi lam shes kyang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas dag par mi sems
[\[295b.5\]]kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba gang yin pa'o/_/de la n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa nyid ni 'di yin te/_chur ji srid pa zheng yang de srid la zheng du ji srid par chur yang de srid yin no/_/ro bro ba'i mchog ni/_de'i mgur drang por mid pa drang
[\[295b.6\]]zhing ma yo la thogs pa med par mid du rung bar 'gyur pa yin no/_/bka' stsal pa/_shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs nas/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung snyam mam/_gsol pa/_
[\[295b.7\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu lags shing /_de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu lags la/_rnam par shes pa gang
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]lags pa de ni dbang po drug po lags la/_dbang po drug gang lags pa de ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga rnams lags pa'i slad du'o/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba dang /_the tshom dang /_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ste/_/
[\[296a.2\]]kun du sbyor ba gsum po de dag spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/des bsgom pa'i lam thob nas 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems gnyis srab mor byed par 'gyur te/_de ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba yin no/_/des bsgom pa'i lam bsgoms pa
[\[296a.3\]]de nyid kyis 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang /_gnod sems gnyis ma lus par spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de de gnyis spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba yin no/_/des bsgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga po 'di lta ste/_gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang /_
[\[296a.4\]]gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang /_ma rig pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgod pa spangs pas dgra bcom par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_'du byed thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'o zhes rang sangs rgyas kyi lam bsgom par bya'o/_/gang dag yang dag pa'i skyon med pa la zhugs
[\[296a.5\]]pa de dag ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gis 'khor ba'i sa mtshams bcad pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe zad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa mgo mnyam du zad pa'i gang zag ces bya bar mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
[\[296a.6\]]dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rab 'byor gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing de bzhin du rgyang ring du byed pa'i rnam grangs yod do/_/rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' chen po byams pa shes rab kyi pha
[\[296a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_'di snyam du/_kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gsob bo/_/gsog go/_/snying po med pa'o/_/kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ya ma brla'o snyam du sems na/_'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spong zhing rgyang ring du
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]]byed pa yin no/_/rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston par 'gyur ro/_/bskal
[\[296b.2\]]pa bzang po 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang byang phyogs 'di nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor 'di lta ste 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i nang na lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis 'dus pa de bzhin
[\[296b.3\]]du/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad 'dus so/_/kun 'byung ba'i chos gang ci yang rung ba de thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pa ni rang byang chub yin no/_/sku dang dbu las skyes pa'i dbu skra dang spu
[\[296b.4\]]rnams ni kha gyen du bltas shing mthon mthing la kun nas lcang lor 'khyil ba 'jam zhing snum la g.yas su 'khyil pa mdzes par skyes pa yin no/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlab pa ma mdzad du zin na zla ba dang /_nyi ma 'di gnyis kyang
[\[296b.5\]]'jig rten na yod par mi 'gyur/_zla ba gcig dang /_zla phyed dang /_dus dang lo khyud kor rnams kyang 'jig rten na snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba phyin ci log bzhi las skyes pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa las
[\[296b.6\]]yongs su zin pa yin na/_'di la khyed dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la dngos por 'du shes pa'i rgyu gzhan gang yin zhes ston par byed/_byang chub sems dpas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags mthong na/_'di snyam du bdag gi sbyin gnas ni yang dag par
[\[296b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin gyi/_dud 'gro'i skye gnas ma yin no snyam du sems pa'i sems bskyed na byang chub sems dpa'i chos ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rang gi sems yongs su dag na byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin gnas yongs su dag pa'i phyir te/_byang chub sems
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni bdag gis sems can dbul po 'di dag sbyin pas bsdus nas/_gzhan gyi rdzas la rku bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la sogs par sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gzugs kyang chos kyi dbyings ma yin la/_gzugs las
[\[297a.2\]]gud na yang chos kyi dbyings med do/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpas stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa la ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par mi bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dir
[\[297a.3\]]dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad mtshan ma ma mchis pa lags te/_mtshan ma ni btags pa tsam kun du rtog pa las 'byung ba lags na/_
[\[297a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar dge ba'i chos rnams kyis khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ci dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges pa zhes bgyi'am/_'on te srid pa tha ma pa lags/_bcom
[\[297a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang nges pa yin no/_/phyir mi ldog pa dang /_srid pa tha ma pa yang nges pa yin no/_/yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i sar ni sems can dmyal ba rnams
[\[297a.6\]]su mi skye'o/_/'phags pa chos thams cad shin tu rgyas par bsdu ba las/_'jam dpal dam pa'i chos spong ba las kyi sgrib pa ni phra ba'o/_/'jam dpal gang la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la la la ni bzang bar 'du shes/_la la ni ngan par 'du shes pa de ni dam pa'i
[\[297a.7\]]chos spong ba'o/_/gang chos spangs pa des de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba yin no/_/gnas 'jog las/_bka' stsal pa/_gnas 'jog yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i bsnyen gnas la gnas par 'dod pas/_nang par langs nas dge slong ngam/_bram ze'am/_gzhan gang
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]yang rung pa zhig gi drung du song ste/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o/_/bdag ming che ge mo zhes bgyi ba 'di dus 'di nas bzung ste/_gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang /_sang
[\[297b.2\]]nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/_dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/_ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la/_sems can dang srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur
[\[297b.3\]]yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog nas dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/_sems can srog
[\[297b.4\]]chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog gcod pa spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa de bzhin du bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang /_sang nyi ma ma shar gyi bar du srog
[\[297b.5\]]gcod pa spangs shing srog gcod pa las slar ldog ste/_dbyug pa spangs shing mtshon cha spangs te/_ngo tsha dang ldan zhing snying rje dang ldan par bgyis la/_sems can dang /_srog chags 'byung po thams cad las chung ngu na srog chags phra mo grog sbur yan chad kyi srog
[\[297b.6\]]gcod pa yang spangs te/_srog gcod pa las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/yan lag dang po 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob po/_/rjes su sgrub po/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/ji ltar srog gcod pa las slar ldog pa de bzhin du ma byin par len pa dang /_
[\[297b.7\]]mi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_'bru'i chang dang /_bcos pa'i chang myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas dang /_glu gar dang rol mo'i sgra dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos nyug pa dang /_rgyan dang /_kha dog 'chang ba dang /_khri stan mthon po dang /_khri stan
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]chen po dang /_dus ma yin pa'i zas spangs te/_dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa de dag ji srid 'tsho'i bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/_dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog pa
[\[298a.2\]]de bzhin du/_bdag che ge mo yang dus 'di nas bzung ste/_gang do nub kyi mtshan mo 'di dang sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du dus ma yin pa'i kha zas spangs te/_dus ma yin pa'i kha zas las slar ldog par bgyi'o/_/yan lag brgyad pa 'dis bdag 'phags pa dgra bcom pa
[\[298a.3\]]de dag gi bslab pa la rjes su slob bo/_/rjes su sgrub po/_/rjes su bgyid do/_/de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o/_/'di lta ste/_yul chen po bcu drug la/_ang ga dang /_ma ga d+hA dang /_ka shi dang /_bri dzi dang /_mal la dang /_pun tra dang /_srag pa dang /_ka ma dang /_
[\[298a.4\]]a ban ti dang /_ku ru dang /_pad tsa la dang /_bad sa dang /_dpa' sde dang /_ya ba na dang /_kam po rnams so/_/shes rab 'bum pa las/_ma rig pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ste/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa yang ma rig pa'o/_/lha'i bu dag bdag zab pa'i phyir/_
[\[298a.5\]]chos 'di zab po/_/sems can dang /_srog dang /_'gro ba dang /_gso ba dang skyes bu la sogs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/_/gzugs zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/_/de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po/_/rab 'byor gyis
[\[298a.6\]]smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gang phyin ci log las byung ba'i las lus dang ngag dang yid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'di lta bu'i skye mched mngon par bsgrubs te/_las kyi rnam par smin pa phung po'i gzhi can rnam par rtog pa las byung ba yongs su bzung zhing
[\[298a.7\]]sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang lha dang mi'i 'gro ba mngon par grub po/_/'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag thams cad kyang
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' zhing rnam par rtog pa spangs par gyur to/_/ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba yang de bzhin no/_/dga' bo de bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khyod la gtad de/_dga' bo gal te khyod kyis ngas gang chos ji snyed bshad pa
[\[298b.2\]]las/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs pa ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/_kun chub par byas nas de'i 'og tu chud gsan te bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du mi gzung ngo /_/dga' bo khyod kyis gal te
[\[298b.3\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/_kun chub par byas nas/_de'i 'og tu chud gsan tam/_bor bar gyur na ni des ni dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du gzung ngo /_/bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sems can dang /_srog
[\[298b.4\]]dang /_skyes bu dang /_gang zag dang /_shed can dang /_shed bdag dang /_byed pa po la sogs pa stong pa nyid yin par rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/_/'dod pa'i 'dod
[\[298b.5\]]chags dang /_gnod sems bsrabs pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/'og ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/_/bla ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do/_/gang ci yang rung ste/_kun
[\[298b.6\]]'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub po/_/bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par gyur
[\[298b.7\]]pa'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/_de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs su rtog pa las byung ba yin gyi/_yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]pa nyid la khyed chags par ma byed cig/_chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa ni chags par mi byed do zhes 'doms par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci gzugs kyi dngos po gang la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen par gyur pa de lta bu
[\[299a.2\]]yod dam/_yod par gyur tam/_yod par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_phyin ci log ma gtogs par de ni ma lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_lha'i mig mngon par sgrub ste/_lha'i mig des chos thams
[\[299a.3\]]cad stong pa nyid du mthong ste/_des chos de dag la gnas shing lam mngon par sgrub po/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad bdag cag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de sems can yongs su smin par byas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas te/_de
[\[299a.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o snyam du sems sam/_
[\[299a.5\]]gsol pa/_de ltar sems pa ma mchis so/_/bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' ni de ltar sems so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor rmi lam dang /_sgyu ma dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang /_chu zla dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de
[\[299a.6\]]dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar rmi lam nas sprul pa'i bar dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang
[\[299a.7\]]bzhin te/_dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs sum mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/_tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/_'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/_'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/_rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang pho drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs pa nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar ni sgyu ma dang /_sgra brnyan dang /_mig yor dang
[\[299b.2\]]chu zla dang /_smig rgyu dang /_sprul pa lta bu ste/_rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/_/de ni phung po lnga'o/_/de dag ni nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar lags na/_byang chub
[\[299b.3\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thag pa la gsar du zhugs pas 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang ba dang /_skrag par mi 'gyur lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yin la/_thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/_mi dge ba'i
[\[299b.4\]]bshes gnyen gyi lag tu 'ongs na de ltar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang la skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad pa'i thabs la mkhas pa de gang lags/_bka'
[\[299b.5\]]stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so/_/tshor ba nas rnam par shes pa'i bar mi rtag ces bya
[\[299b.6\]]bar rtogs te de mi dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/gzugs nas rnam par shes pa'i bar sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa dang /_zhi ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba la sogs te mi
[\[299b.7\]]dmigs so/_/rab 'byor de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang /_gzugs
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]kyi khams dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams dang /_gzhan yang de ma yin pa de 'dus byas kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar te/_de dag gis 'dus byas kyi chos shes pas
[\[300a.2\]]chos zhes bya'o/_/gsol pa/_'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya ba'i gzhi gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/_'dod chags zad pa/_zhe sdang zad pa/_gti
[\[300a.3\]]mug zad pa/_de bzhin nyid ma nor ba/_de bzhin nyid gzhan ma yin pa/_de bzhin nyid chos kyi dbyings chos skyon med pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/_de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i zang zing med par chos
[\[300a.4\]]sbyin pa rnam par 'byed pa gang zhe na/_chos ston pa'i tshe chos kyi sbyin pa des chung ngu na byang chub tu yang re ba med pa ste/_'di ni zang zing med par chos sbyin pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[300a.5\]]bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba gang zhe na/_dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing /_bdag dang gzhan gyi sems kyis zhing yongs su sbyong ba'i tshe/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
[\[300a.6\]]su dag par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spangs pa gang zhe na/_dge slong ma dang se gol gtogs pa tsam du lhan cig mi gnas shing /_de'i rgyus yongs su skom
[\[300a.7\]]pa'i sems mi skyed/_de'i rgyus gos thob par mi byed pa 'di ni dge slong ma dang bsten pa yongs su spong ba'o/_/shes par bya ba lnga gang zhe na/_'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba dang /_brjod du med pa dang 'dus ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i lta ba rnam
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]par bzlog pa gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis rnam par spong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong ba bzhin du yongs su grub pa gang zhe na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
[\[300b.2\]]khams kyi dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i sa la gnas te/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su mthong zhing des rlom sems su mi byed do/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba gang
[\[300b.3\]]zhe na/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi sems su sbyong ba'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba rnam par
[\[300b.4\]]dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu ba la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_stobs bcu nas sangs
[\[300b.5\]]rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /_bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa dag
[\[300b.6\]]ste/_rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sa bcu ba la gnas pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ces bya'o/_/chos gang yang mi dmigs mod kyi theg pa gsum du rnam par bkod pa ni yod do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las theg pa gsum
[\[300b.7\]]rgya cher bstan te/_gsum gang zhe na/_'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bshad do/_/ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas/_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can tshad med grangs med pa/_bla na med pa'i byang chub la spyod kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa dang mi ldan pas de las gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur gyi
[\[301a.2\]]phal cher nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar mthong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kau shi ka bla na med pa'i byang chub ni le lo can brtson 'grus med pa bsam pa zhan pa/_mos pa dma' ba/_shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyis bsgrub
[\[301a.3\]]dka'o/_/lho phyogs la sogs pa bcur yang de dang 'dra bar gzigs so/_/rab 'byor skyes bu glen pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la skyon gdags par sems shing /_phyir spong bar sems pa de dag kyang chos 'dul ba 'di nyid la rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[301a.4\]]rab 'byor dper na khyi la la zhig jo bo'i zan nar ma bor te las mi las zan btsal bar sems pa dang 'dra bar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo sangs rgyas kyi
[\[301a.5\]]chos thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur pa 'di bor te yal ga dang lo ma dang 'dab ma lta bu'i mdo sde nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dag la brten par sems pa 'byung ste/_rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
[\[301a.6\]]bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o/_/rab 'byor gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa khe dang bkur sti'i phyir nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde kun chub par bya ba'i sems pa 'byung ste/_de yang bdud kyi las so/_/
[\[301a.7\]]de bzhin du glang po che rnyed la rjes btsal bar sems pa dang /_rgya mtsho chen po lta bar 'dod pa la ba glang gi rjes btsal bar sems la/_de mthong nas 'di dang rgya mtsho mnyam mam mi mnyam snyam na mkhas pa yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa ma lags so/_/
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa yang bdud kyi las su 'byung /_de bzhin du rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang pa brtsig par 'dod la tshad nyi zla'i gzhal med khang las len pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong bar 'dod la/_khams kyi rgyal
[\[301b.2\]]phran mthong nas snyom pa dang zas ro brgya dang ldan pa spangs nas drug cu pa tshol ba dang /_nor bu rin thang med pa rnyed nas mching bu dang bsgrun par sems pa de dag mi mkhas pa bzhin du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing theg pa dman pa dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa yang
[\[301b.3\]]bdud kyi las su 'byung /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyis yongs su ma bzung na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag bar ma dor nye zhor 'gyur bar shes par bya'o/_/rab 'byor de dag nye zhor 'byung ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas
[\[301b.4\]]kyi sa'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/_/nyan thos gang
[\[301b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa drug brjod cing ston pa dang 'chad cing 'grel pa dang /_rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed pa dang /_yang dag par ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/_/
[\[301b.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags/_rab 'byor nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/_
[\[301b.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mtshan nyid gang yang med do/_/gsol pa/_mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs de lta bu mchis sam/_bka' stsal pa/_
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]rab 'byor de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis chos thams cad yod do/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa ste/_chos thams
[\[302a.2\]]cad ni chos thams cad kyis dben pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis stong pa'o/_/rab 'byor rnam grangs des ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /_dben pa'i mtshan nyid gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod pa'i mtshan nyid des chos thams cad
[\[302a.3\]]yod do/_/bka' stsal pa/_dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las gang la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas bslab par bya ba dang /_gang la ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du bslabs pas rang rang gis
[\[302a.4\]]la gnas par 'gyur ba'i chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/_dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni yi ge thams cad la 'jug pa'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bag chags kyis mtshams sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_
[\[302a.5\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi lus kyi rnam pa dang /_ngag gi rnam pa yod do/_/de dag gi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba de ni byis pa so so'i skye bo kun dang thun mong du yang gnod par 'gyur ba ni ma
[\[302a.6\]]yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de rnam pa thams cad du mi mnga' zhing mi dmigs so/_/gsol ba/_ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[302a.7\]]pa dam pa thob pa yin te/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/chos 'di dag thams cad ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba phyin ci log las skyes pa las kyi rnam par smin pas bzung ba yin na/_khyed rnams ci'i phyir chos thams cad dngos po med pa la
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]dngos po'i 'du shes su byed ces te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/_thabs mkhas pas sems can ser sna can dag ser sna las rnam par bzlog nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor te/_sbyin pa yongs
[\[302b.2\]]su gtong ba de yang longs spyod chen po'i rgyur 'gyur ro/_/stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ni stong pa'i rnam pa dang /_dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa ni zhi ba'i rnam pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/smon pa med
[\[302b.3\]]pa ni mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa'o/_/ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_
[\[302b.4\]]don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa de ltar shes pa yin no/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pa'i rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin
[\[302b.5\]]ba gang la yang spyod dam/_gsol pa/_dgra bcom pa la yod yang nyal ba ma mchis na/_de ni rmi lam gyi blo 'dzin pa'am mi 'dzin pa la spyod par 'gyur ba lta ga la mchis/_bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor chos thams cad ni sprul pa ste/_la la ni nyan thos
[\[302b.6\]]kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyis sprul pa'o/_/la la ni byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni nyon mongs pas sprul pa'o/_/la la ni las kyis sprul pa'o/_/skyes bu glen pa de dag
[\[302b.7\]]rnam pa bzhis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_bzhi gang lags/_bka' stsal pa/_skyes bu glen pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di spong ba de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]te/_rab 'byor rgyu dang po des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/chos zab mo rnams la yid ches pa dang /_dad cing mos pa med pa yin te/_rgyu gnyis pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di
[\[303a.2\]]la phyir spong bar 'gyur ro/_/rab 'byor skyes bu glen pa de dag ni sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba yin te/_brtson 'grus med cing phung po lnga la mngon par zhen pas/_rgyu gsum pa des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di phyir spong bar 'gyur
[\[303a.3\]]ro/_/zhe sdang gi spyod pa can yin te/_bdag bstod cing gzhan smod par gyur pas rgyu bzhi pa des na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la phyir spong bar 'gyur zhes 'byung /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa las bka' stsal
[\[303a.4\]]pa/_'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos dben par gnas bca' bar bya ste/_'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar bya'o/_/mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la/_der mi
[\[303a.5\]]dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i mtshan nas kyang smos te/_mtshan de yang thos te dmigs nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa de ga la bar bzhugs pa'i phyogs de mngon du byas nas 'dug par
[\[303a.6\]]bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yid la byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de ni gcig go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dpag
[\[303a.7\]]tu med pa dang /_spobs pa dpag tu med pa de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas/_mi skye ba gcig las chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag dpag tu med pa gang de la 'byung bar rig par bya'o/_/gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]phyin pa zab mo ma skyes pa ma byung ba nas dngos po med pa'i bar 'di thos nas yid dga' zhing rangs par 'gyur ba de dag ni nga'i 'khor 'di nyid na 'dug pa yin par 'od srungs khyod kyis rtogs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan
[\[303b.2\]]'das gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das gang chos ci la yang mi sems shing rnam par mi sems pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par blta'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab kyi rtsal
[\[303b.3\]]gyis rnam par gnon pas zhus pa las bka' stsal pa/_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa chos thams cad ni phyin ci log las byung bas smig rgyu dang 'dra'o/_/rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa 'du ba zhes bya ba ni rtag pa'o/_/'bral ba zhes bya ba
[\[303b.4\]]ni chad pa'o/_/rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa chos thams cad ni phyin ci log las byung ba ste/_phyin ci log de la yang 'du ba dang /_'bral ba gang yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa phyin ci log gi dngos
[\[303b.5\]]po dmigs su med de/_de'i 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/_/rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/_phyin ci log ni med pa/_yang dag pa ma yin par brdzun pa slu ba gsog gi chos can te/_de la chos gang yang mi dmigs pas de ni phyin ci log ces bya'o/_/
[\[303b.6\]]phyin ci log ces bya ba 'di ni sems can rnams la slu ba'o/_/'di ni sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa ma yin pa la yongs su rtog pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu chos 'di dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa
[\[303b.7\]]ma yin no/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/_de ltar yod pa ma yin pas/_de'i phyir med ces bya'o/_/gsol pa/_ci'i
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]slad du ma mchis pa ma lags pa la mchis zhes bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_gzugs stong pa bco brgyad kyi phyir yod pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin du bsgre'o/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di snyam du gyur te/_'di ltar lha rnams kyis mngon
[\[304a.2\]]par gtor ba'i me tog 'di rnams ni bdag gis sngon chad lha'i gnas thams cad na yang yod par ma mthong ste/_me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o/_/'di ltar lha'i bu rnams kyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di rnams ni ldum bu las skyes pa ma yin/_chu las skyes pa
[\[304a.3\]]ma yin/_thang las skyes pa ma yin no/_/'di ltar me tog 'di dag ni yid las byung ba ste/_me tog 'di dag ni ldum bu las byung ba ma yin no snyam mo/_/kau shi kas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gnyis po 'di dag ni chos nyid de gang lags she na/_'dus byas kyi chos thams cad
[\[304a.4\]]kyi chos nyid dang /_'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid do/_/de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/_nang stong pa nyid kyi ye shes nas 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams kyi ye shes kyi bar lags so/_/
[\[304a.5\]]de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang lags she na/_de ni gang la skye bam mchis pa dang /_'gag pa dang /_gnas pa dang /_gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_'phel ba dang /_'grib pa ma mchis pa ste/_de
[\[304a.6\]]ni chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i rmi lam na byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang /_bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug pa dang /_brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang /_
[\[304a.7\]]bzod pa sgrub pa dang /_tshul khrims srung ba dang /_sbyin pa sbyin pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsnyen par rig par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dngos su shes rab
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la sogs pa bsnyen pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_stug po bkod pa las/_lus can rnams kyi lus kyi yul/_/stug na gnas la stug na med/_/zhing de dri med bsod nams te/_/stug po snying po shin tu mdzes/_/de bzhin thar pa thar shes
[\[304b.2\]]la/_/zhing gi nang na zhing gi mchog_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhing rab ste/_/stug po de ni yul du brtag_/mnga' rnams bcu po de dag dang /_/stobs dang mngon mkhyen ting nge 'dzin/_/yid kyi rgyu las byung ba'i skus/_/sangs rgyas de ni rnam par mdzes/_/stug po thar
[\[304b.3\]]mchog ye shes te/_/chos kyi dbyings dang rdzu 'phrul yang /_/stug ste rnal 'byor can gyi gnas/_/mun pa'i rgya las rab 'das nas/_/stug po'i zhing ni rnam par mdzes/_/phyogs 'di bka' las grub pa ste/_/rgyu can rnams kyi spyod yul min/_/rdul phran rnam par gzhig
[\[304b.4\]]pa dang /_/rdul gyi dngos po mi gnas te/_/rang bzhin kun gyi mchog yin pas/_/rdul phran mchog ces de phyir brjod/_/dbang gi yon tan brgyad po rnams/_/phra sogs che ba'i yon tan dang /_/'thob dang 'dod 'byor bsgrags pa dang /_/bdag po dbang dang ldan pa dang /_/
[\[304b.5\]]ji ltar 'dod par rung ba rnams/_/thob nas stug po'i dbus yul na/_/rnam par gnas shing rab tu rtse/_/de ltar kun gzhi rnam shes kyang /_/rtag tu bag chags ldan gyur pa/_/rnam par shes pa rnam bdun po/_/'grogs kyang 'dre ba med pa ste/_/lha dang lha min
[\[304b.6\]]'bar ba dang /_/lam rgyud kun kyang de yi dbang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing mdzes pa'ang /_/de nyid rgyur ni gyur ba ste/_/tshe dang drod dang rnam shes 'dis/_/gang tshe lus 'di bor gyur pa/_/de tshe lus 'di bor ba ste/_/shes bzhin tshor ba med pa'o/_/de ni kun gzhi rnam shes te/_/
[\[304b.7\]]yid ni dro bar rab tu brtags/_/yid kyi rnam shes de na ste/_/lhag ma dbang po lngar yang gnas/_/yid ches lung dang mi ldan par/_/chos rnams ston par byed pa ni/_/mtshan nyid rnam par rtog pa yis/_/bdag kyang chud gzon gzhan chud gzon/_/'jig rten rdul phran
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]bsags pa min/_/phyogs dang gnas su mi 'gro'o/_/de dag sor gnyis sor gsum du/_/ci yang rtsom par mi byed do/_/lha yul gnas nas gnas pa la/_/sna tshogs sar yang de bzhin rtogs/_/phung po gang zag bdag med par/_/rab tu rnam phye mthong gyur
[\[305a.2\]]cing /_/chos kyi dngos po yong ma shig_/nyan thos de dag mngon rtogs 'gyur/_/ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/_/sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa/_'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung /_ston pa bde bar gshegs pas bshad pa ltar/_/nges don mdo sde dag ni bye brag
[\[305a.3\]]shes/_/gang las sems can gang zag skyes bu bstan/_/chos de thams cad drang ba'i don du shes/_/'jig rten dag na ting 'dzin sgom byed kyang /_/de ni bdag tu 'du shes 'jig mi byed/_/de yi nyon mongs phyir yang rab tu 'byung /_/lhag spyod kyis ni ting 'dzin 'dir bsgom bzhin/_/
[\[305a.4\]]mkhas pa byis pa dag dang rtsod mi byed/_/byis pa dag ni ri mor byas nas spong /_/zhe sdang sems kyis bdag gi drung 'ong zhes/_/byis pa chos la sten par yongs mi byed/_/byis pa dag gi rang bzhin rgyud rig nas/_/mkhas pa byis pa dag dang mi 'grogs te/_/ji srid du ni byis pa
[\[305a.5\]]legs bsnyen kyang /_/de dag phyir yang dgra dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/byis pa dang ni byis pa mthun 'byor ba/_/ji ltar mi gtsang ba dang mi gtsang bzhin/_/mkhas pa dang ni mkhas pa'i skye bo dang /_/mthun zhing 'byor pa mar dang snying khu bzhin/_/byis pa la ni gang phan snying brtse ba/_/de
[\[305a.6\]]la gnod pa byung ba byis pa dga'/_/de lta'i nyes phyir byis pa rnams spangs te/_/ri dgas bzhin du gcig pu dgon par gnas/_/mkhas pa 'di 'dra'i nyes pa rig nas ni/_/shes rab dman bsten bdag gi mtho ris nyams/_/byang chub 'thob par ga la 'gyur snyam ste/_/
[\[305a.7\]]byis pa rnams dang nam yang yangs mi bsten/_/bla med mi 'jigs sbyin pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gzhan phan sems can gnyen brtse khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/stobs bcu bden pa'i rtsal mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bde gshegs mi mnyam mnyam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]lo/_/mgon po shin tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo dgra bzhi rnam par btul la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rtsod pa dam pa'i don rnams mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos kyi sku mchog mnga' pa'i lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/snying rje byams 'od rgyal ba'i nyi ma mun sel ba/_/
[\[305b.2\]]shes rab shin tu yangs pa nam mkha'i dkyil du shar/_/don dam shin tu zab pa'i chos rnams ston mdzad pa/_/lha khyod la ni rtag tu bdag kyang skyabs su mchi/_/'gro ba 'di dag thams cad sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'di na snod min sems can 'ga' yang med/_/bde gshegs yon tan
[\[305b.3\]]de dag dpag med de/_/mi mchog yon tan rab kyi pha rol phyin/_/yon tan khyad par kun gyi pha rol son/_/sangs rgyas bsod nams zhing la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs par rig nas/_mchod yon chen
[\[305b.4\]]po rim gyis gsol te/_zhal zas gsol zhing bdar to/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dag_/bag chags rab tu spangs gyur pa/_/de dag gzugs kyis mi 'phrogs te/_/sangs rgyas rigs la de dag gnas/_/bka' stsal pa/_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid kyis/_/
[\[305b.5\]]sngon yang rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'dir/_/sangs rgyas dag kyang bye ba phrag stong mthong /_/sku ni byang chub mtshan nyid de/_/sangs rgyas zhing yang de 'dra zhing /_/stobs dang rnam thar bsam gtan yang /_/de dag thams cad mtshan nyid gcig_/de ltar sangs rgyas 'byung 'gyur
[\[305b.6\]]te/_/'jig rten mgon po de 'dra bas/_/sus kyang sha yi mig gis ni/_/nam yang mthong bar mi nus so/_/dpa' bo chen po chos kyi sku/_/sku ni chos las byung ba ste/_/gzugs kyi sku ni nam du yang /_/sangs rgyas gdags par nus ma yin/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni
[\[305b.7\]]sku mthong nas/_/'dren pa mthong zhes smra mod kyi/_/nga ni gzugs kyi sku lus su/_/sus kyang blta bar mi nus so/_/gang gis 'khrul pa ci mthong yang /_/de dag gi ni nyes mi brjod/_/ci 'dra ba yi las byas pa/_/'bras bu de 'dra 'thob par 'gyur/_/dgon
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i phan yon ni bcu ste/_bya ba nyung bar gnas pa dang /_'du ba ring ba bas kyang ring du spong ba dang /_de la rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_gnod pa med par gnas pa dang /_zag pa 'phel bar mi byed pa dang /_rtsod pa'i gzhir
[\[306a.2\]]mi byed pa dang /_shin tu zhi bar spyod pa dang /_shin tu bsdams par gnas pa dang /_sems thar pa dang mthun pa'i rgyun du 'gyur ba dang /_myur du rnam par grol ba mngon du byed pa'o/_/lha'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi bde ba spangs te rab tu 'byung ngo zhes gzhon nu khyod kyis de
[\[306a.3\]]ltar bslab par bya'o/_/rab tu byung nas kyang sbyangs pa'i yon tan yo byad bsnyungs pa la gnas shing /_bden par gnas pa dang /_bzod pa dang des pa phun sum tshogs par bya'o/_/sngon sangs rgyas gzi brjid tshogs rgyal gyis chos bshad nas/_rgyal po brtan
[\[306a.4\]]byin rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rim gyis rab tu byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'bras ma rmos ma btab par 'khrung ba dang /_chos gos kyang rang byung /_g.yog kyang lha rnams kyis byas so/_/'jig rten khams ni stong dag tu/_/ngas ni mdo sde gang bshad
[\[306a.5\]]pa/_/tshig 'bru tha dad don gcig ste/_/thams cad brjod par nus ma yin/_/tshig gcig rnam par bsgoms na ni/_/de dag thams cad bsgom par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas ji snyed thams cad kyis/_/chos rnams mang po rab bshad pa/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid/_/
[\[306a.6\]]chos kyi rang bzhin shes pas na/_/de phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ste/_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab cing /_/dpag tu med pa byang chub 'dul/_/chos rnams mig yor lta bu yang /_/gang gis ngo bo nyid shes pa/_/de dag gzugs kyi lus su ni/_/sangs rgyas sku la mi lta'o/_/chos
[\[306a.7\]]'di lus gzugs med pa ste/_/'di la lus gzugs gang yang med/_/chos 'ga' lus gzugs med pa ni/_/de ni sangs rgyas sku lus so/_/gang dag chos kyi skur lta ba/_/de dag gis ni 'dren pa mthong /_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/de ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]mthong /_/'khor ba dag ni 'phel byed cing /_/so so'i skye bo de dag 'khor/_/so so tha dad 'gro bas na/_/so so'i skye bor brjod pa yin/_/'du shes 'di ni spang snyam du/_/gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/_/'du shes spros la spyod pa ste/_/'du shes las ni de mi thar/_/su yis 'du shes
[\[306b.2\]]'di dag 'byung /_/su yis 'du shes 'di bskyed byas/_/sus ni 'du shes reg par byas/_/sus ni 'du shes 'gag par 'gyur/_/gang gi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis kyang chos ma brnyes/_/'dir ni don de bsam par gyis/_/de bas 'du shes med par 'gyur/_/
[\[306b.3\]]bsam pa'i sa la gnas nas ni/_/mthar gyis rnam par bsam bya ste/_/bsam pa thams cad rnam spangs na/_/de nas bsam du med par 'gyur/_/'di ni dkar chos rnam smin te/_/'du byed med pas mthong bar 'gyur/_/sems can kun gyis rnam bsam pa/_/skad cig gcig la rab tu
[\[306b.4\]]shes/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'di thams cad kyang /_/rin chen shing gis legs brgyan te/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang la/_/rdzing bu dag ni rnam par sprul/_/rdzing bu'i 'gram na gnas pa rnams/_/de dag de las chu 'thungs nas/_/thams cad sred pa bsal nas ni/_/'jig
[\[306b.5\]]rten gyi yang mchod rten 'byung /_/de bzhin du pad+ma la sogs pa sprul nas/_de'i dri tshor ba dang de las sgra grag pa mnyan pas kyang dug gsum spong ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'byung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bde byin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa dbyangs byin la mchod par lag pa g.yas pa
[\[306b.6\]]ras bcos bus dkris te/_mar me btang nas ting nge 'dzin rgyal po'i mdo yang skad che zhing 'jam pas bsgrags pa dang /_sa yang g.yos/_lha rnams kyang dad pa skyes nas mchod pa byed do/_/de nas lha phal mo ches byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la sogs pa sems can gyi don mang du byas par
[\[306b.7\]]'byung /_chos dang zang zing sbyin pa ni bsngo ba bzhin byas te/_thabs mkhas pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i thabs de thob pa dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub myur du thob pa ston par 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang /_longs spyod gang gis sems can
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]thams cad 'tsho bar 'gyur ba'i longs spyod de dag dang phrad pa dang /_bdag gi lus gang gis sems can thams cad la chos dang zang zing gis phan 'dogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba'i lus 'dzin par bsngo ba'o/_/gcig la gcig kyang gnod sems byas
[\[307a.2\]]nas ni/_/de la tshul khrims thos pas skyob mi nus/_/bsam gtan mi skyob dgon gnas skyob mi nus/_/sbyin pas mi skyob sangs rgyas mchod pas min/_/skyes bu chu mchog gis ni dam pa'i chos/_/'jig par 'gyur tshe gang dag btang snyoms sgom/_/de yis rgyal ba
[\[307a.3\]]bkur sti byas ma yin/_/'dren pa dag la ri mor des ma byas/_/rgyal po dpa' bas byin gyis dge slong me tog zla mdzes bsad/_/nyan thos sar ni nam yang ma slob cig_/de yi spyod la'ang dga' bar ma byed cig_/sangs rgyas yon tan dag las sems ma
[\[307a.4\]]btang /_/myur du sangs rgyas rgyal po'i dbang por 'gyur/_/mi gtsang bas ni rtag tu 'dod chags tshar gcad do/_/byams pa yis kyang zhe sdang khor mor ma lus bcom/_/shes rab kyis ni gti mug nyon mongs dra ba bsal/_/ting 'dzin thob pa 'jig rten
[\[307a.5\]]kun na rab tu mdzes/_/rdzu 'phrul gang zhe na/_gang 'grub pa dang smon pa dang 'byor pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'di ni rdzu 'phrul zhes bya ba'o/_/de la thos pa yongs su tshol ba gang zhe na/_nyan thos kyi sde snod dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sde snod dang /_byang chub sems
[\[307a.6\]]dpa'i sde snod kun 'dzin cing sgom pa'o/_/sbyangs pa mthong ba gang zhe na/_yi dam la brten pa'o/_/khrel yod pa gang zhe na/_mur cor mi smra ba'o/_/skyes bu dam pa dang bsten pa gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la
[\[307a.7\]]brten pa'o/_/skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa rnam par spong ba gang zhe na/_dmigs pa can dang /_le lo can rnams spong ba'o/_/rnyed pa med kyang sems mi 'gong ba gang zhe na/_bdag gis byas pa la so sor rtog pa'o/_/khyim pa dang mi bsten pa gang zhe na/_zang zing ci yang
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]rnam par spong ba'o/_/rab tu byung ba la brten pa gang zhe na/_mi rigs pa spong ba dang /_rigs pa tshol ba'o/_/de la rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa gang zhe na/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa'o/_/sangs rgyas chos ni rgya che ste/_/tshul yang rgya chen
[\[307b.2\]]bstan pa yin/_/chos rnams rgya cher bstan pas na/_/yon tan rgya cher thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che ba/_/chos kyi mtshan nyid de bzhin te/_/rin chen 'od zer rgya che gang /_/de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya/_/sems can spyod pa rgya che ste/_
[\[307b.3\]]de dag bstan pa'am rgya che'o/_/lung gi don yang rgya che bas/_/de phyir shin tu rgyas shes bya/_/klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa las/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rgyal po brgya byin/_'thab bral gyi rab 'thab bral/_dga' ldan gyi yongs su dga' ldan/_'phrul dga'i rab 'phrul dga'/_
[\[307b.4\]]gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi dbang byed/_bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i rgyal po ded dpon/_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don ni mdun gyi rab tshangs pa/_tshangs ris kyi mi mjed kyi bdag po/_'od gsal gyi 'od gsal/_dge rgyas kyi dge rgyas/_'bras bu che ba'i 'bras bu che/_gnas gtsang ma'i
[\[307b.5\]]dbang phyug chen po/_/'og min gyi dri med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos mnyan 'dod kyi/_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin na/_chos 'dod pa yin no/_/byang chub kyi sems kyi gtam la dga'i/_theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin no/_/chos kyi kun dga'
[\[307b.6\]]la dga' bas gnas pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i don gyi dbang lnga mthong ba'i phyir thos pa tshol bas chog mi shes te/_lnga ni thos pa las shes rab 'byung ba dang /_'gyod pa dang the tshom med par 'gyur ba dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba rtogs par
[\[307b.7\]]'gyur ba dang /_sems can gyi nyon mongs pa spong ba dang /_mi 'jigs pas sems can gyi the tshom gcod pa'o/_/yang gnyis kyi phyir te/_yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pa dang /_chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'thob pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' phan yon lnga mthong nas
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]rab tu 'byung ba la mos par 'gyur te/_lnga ni bdag gis las byas pa chud mi za ba dang /_bdag gis las byas pa bag chags kyis bsgos pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad las sems gtang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyis mi smad pa dang /_bdag
[\[308a.2\]]grol nas gzhan grol bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par 'gyur ba'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i dad pa rab tu thob nas phyin ci log las byung bar mthong ba dang /_chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur rab tu shes na chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa yin no/_/chos gnyis
[\[308a.3\]]dang ldan na/_byang chub sems dpa' chad par lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur te/_las kyi bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par sgrub shes pa'o/_/gnyis dang ldan na rtag pa'i lta bar mi ltung ste/_mi rtag pa'i chos la 'jug pa dang /_skyes
[\[308a.4\]]nas zhig cing zhu ste mi gnas par rnam par dbye ba shes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi gnas la gnas pa'i bsam gtan gang zhe na/_lus dang sems kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag dang /_bsam pa dang sbyor ba de dag sgrub par mi byed pa dang /_ci nas de
[\[308a.5\]]bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyis snyoms par 'jug pa de lta bus snyoms par 'jug ste/_de ni dmigs pa can gyis snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_bsam gtan de dag kyang shes
[\[308a.6\]]rab kyi shas che ba dang /_lta ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral ba yin no/_/byang chub tu bsngos pa dang /_sems can smin par byed pa yang grub pa yin te/_de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa gcig gis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du thug par mdzad do/_/
[\[308a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gyi nang du 'ongs te 'dug la/_chos zab mo'i gtam gyi bar chad byed de gtam sna tshogs gleng ba gang yin pa de dam pa'i chos nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin no/_/gzhan yang mi chos 'dod de nyan pa ni nyung gi ma yin pa'i chos nyan pa ni mang
[\[308b\]]
[\[308b.1\]]ste/_chos smra ba btang ste/_gtam sna tshogs gleng na der zab mo'i chos la mos pa'i lha rnams ma rangs te/_'di skad du 'jig rten pa'i gtam gleng zhing 'dug ste/_kye re ngan 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mi grag go zhes tshig ngan bton nas 'khor de nas 'dong ngo /_/rgyal po
[\[308b.2\]]ma skyes dgras gsol ba/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bgyi'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin te chos thams cad ni yid la byed pa las 'byung ste/_chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir/_de dag ni ji ltar
[\[308b.3\]]'dod pa bzhin rnam par grub po/_/rgyal po ma skyes dgras gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho chen por gshegs na chab kyi tshogs mchis pa de gang du mchis lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe dge slong me'i khams kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa
[\[308b.4\]]de'i tshe/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i mes yongs su gang bar mthong na der chu'i phung po de gang du song /_gsol pa/_de ni ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i sems de ltar las su rung ba las gyur lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_khyod nyan thos kyi sems las su rung ba las/_de ltar gyur
[\[308b.5\]]par 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad la mnga' ba de ltar mi 'dod dam/_nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni bdag nyid chu na gnas so snyam du sems so/_/skam na gnas pa rnams kyis ni rgya mtsho chen po skam par mthong ngo /_/lha rnams sdug
[\[308b.6\]]bsngal 'chi 'pho'i chos gcig pa/_/mi rnams kyis ni sdug bsngal tshol khro lags/_/dmyal ba dag gi sdug bsngal gnod ba lags/_/gcig la gcig 'tshal dud 'gro rnams kyi lags/_/yi dgas sdug bsngal 'di ni bkres dang skom/_/sangs rgyas 'gro ba las/_de nas rgyal
[\[308b.7\]]po gsal rgyal spyan sngar 'dug cing rin po che'i gos lag na thogs pa dang gyon pa phud de/_bcom ldan 'das la phul nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gos rin po che 'di ni sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa las grub pa lags na bzhes su gsol/_bka'
[\[309a\]]
[\[309a.1\]]stsal ba/_rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po 'di dag la brtson par bya ste/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i thad du 'gro zhing dri bar bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i
[\[309a.2\]]phyir sgrub pa dang /_zab mo las mos pa btsal ba'i phyir spro bar bya ba dang /_log par lta ba dang bral bas yang dag pa nyid du nges par bya ba'i phyir spro bar bya'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa las/_rigs kyi bu mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni chos
[\[309a.3\]]yongs su tshol ba la rag las pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang nye ba'i sems pa yin pa des na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/byang chub ces bya ba ni stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub po/_/stong pa nyid ces bya ba cis stong zhe na/_chos thams
[\[309a.4\]]cad kyis stong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni gnas gsum du rig par bya ste/_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang po ni dngos po thams cad yongs su mthong ba'i las can no/_/gnyis pa ni chos yongs su tshol ba dang /_len pa dang 'dzin par byed la bdag tu zhen pa med pa nyid do/_/
[\[309a.5\]]gsum pa ni chos zab mo mi spong ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la 'jug cing sgyid lug pa med pa'o/_/bzhi po 'di dag ni bde ba'i rgyu yin te/_bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pa rnyed pa yin/_
[\[309a.6\]]lta ba drang po phun sum tshogs pa yin/_khyim bdag rnam par rgyal bsrung ba/_chung ma gzugs ldan ma/_shAkya'i bu gnag sbyin no/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe brjes na yang dran pa brjed par mi 'gyur te/_bzhi ni chos tshol ba dang /_sbyin pas chog mi shes pa yin/_sems can
[\[309a.7\]]gzhan bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dzin du 'jug cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan sgrogs pa yin/_chos zab mo la bzod pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bya ba'i phyir yang mi g.yeng zhing /_chos yid la bya ba'i phyir dran pa dang shes bzhin can yin la/
[\[309b\]]
[\[309b.1\]]chos zab mo la bzod cing 'chi ba'i 'du byed pa yin no/_/chos bzhi ni theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'i mchog sgrub pa yin te/_bzhi ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rnam par 'jig cing dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba na dam pa'i chos tshol ba la brtson pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[309b.2\]]pa'i mchod rten rnam par 'jig na phyis 'tshes shing lus dang srog la bab kyang chos mi gtong ba yin/_sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong na/_snying rje bskyed pa yin/_snying rje thob nas/_brtson 'grus rtsom zhing /_nam zhig bdag sangs rgyas nas/_sems
[\[309b.3\]]can de dag gi sdug bsngal gzhil ba'i phyir/_chos bstan par bya snyam pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos kyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni zag pa med pa'i bde ba sgrub pa yin la/_sems can gyi gos la sogs pas lan glan pa ni zag
[\[309b.4\]]pa dang bcas pa yin na/_ji ltar des de la lan lon par 'gyur/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/_bdag cag gis ni deng slan chad la lar chos bstan na ches thog mar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa las brtsams nas bstan par bgyi zhing /_nyan thos kyi theg pa ni
[\[309b.5\]]slar gyis bstan par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_sems can 'ga' zhig byang chub chen po la bzhag na bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo ba lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod de ltar go gyon pa legs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_theg pa de lta bu
