[\[309b.6\]]de la 'phya ba dang /_bsting bar byed pa dang /_mdo sde de lta bu spong bar byed pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na/_bdag nyid kyis bdag dbugs phyung zhing bde bar gnas pa yin no/_/bzhi ni theg pa chen po la zhugs nas longs spyod kyi bdog pa thams cad gtong ba yin/_tshul khrims kyi phung
[\[309b.7\]]po la gnas pa yin/_chos zab mo'i ye shes 'phags shing lus dang srog gi phyir yang chos mi gtong ba yin/_dge slong dam pa'i chos smra ba dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis stobs pa yin no/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub chen po las nyams par mi 'gyur la/_
[\[310a\]]
[\[310a.1\]]tshe brjes nas kyang 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yang ji ltar smos pas 'jug par 'gyur/_'khor los sgyur ba thob nas rab tu 'byung bar yang 'gyur zhing /_tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi yang 'thob bar 'gyur/_de nas shi 'phos nas kyang tshangs pa'i
[\[310a.2\]]'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten zhig pa mthong nas bcos pa'i phyir spro zhing tha na 'jim pa'i gong bu gcig tsam yang rtsig par byed pa yin/_mchod rten brtsigs pas skye bo mang po 'du ba'i sa lam gyi bzhi mdo lta bu mchod rten dang khang pa brtsegs pa_
[\[310a.3\]]'am/_rdo rings sam de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rjes su dran pa gang yang rung ba byed pa 'di lta ste/_mngon par 'byung ba nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyis mchod rten brtsigs pa yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun bye zhing 'thab pa dang /_
[\[310a.4\]]rtsod pa byung ba mthong nas mi 'byed pa dang mthun par bsdum pa'i phyir brtson pa yin/_bstan pa'i chos rab tu 'jig pa ni tha na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang bsrung ba dang /_mi nyams par bya ba'i phyir brtson ba yin no/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na tshe brjes nas
[\[310a.5\]]dge slong tshur shog ces byas pa'i rab tu 'byung ba 'thob ste/_bzhi ni bdag nyid rab tu 'byung ba la dga' zhing gzhan yang rab tu 'byung ba 'dzin du 'jug la/_rnam pa thams cad du rab tu 'byung ba la rton par byed de/_rab tu byung nas chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis
[\[310a.6\]]yang dag par dga' bar byed cing 'dzin du 'jug pa yin no/_/chos btsal ba'i phyir bdag nyid kyang brtson zhing gzhan yang brtson par 'jug pa yin/_bdag nyid bzod pa dang nges pa dang ldan zhing gzhan yang de la 'god/_bdag nyid yo byad bsnyungs shing shes pa phun sum tshogs la
[\[310a.7\]]gzhan yang de dag la 'god pa yin/_bdag nyid thabs la mkhas shing smon lam gyi stobs can yin la/_gzhan yang de la 'god pa yin no/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na/_byang chub chen po las mi nyams pa yin te/_bzhi ni lhag pa'i sems kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de
[\[310b\]]
[\[310b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dga' ba yin/_chos nyan pas ngoms mi shes pa yin/_mi slu bas bden par smra ba yin no/_/gang dag dge slong bsten byed pa/_/de dag mang du thos par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rgyal pos bkur ba yin/_/de dag 'di ni nga rjes 'brang /_/ji ltar na byang chub
[\[310b.2\]]sems dpa' chos las nyams pa yin zhe na/_chos stong pa nyid bstan kyang zang zing sngon du btang ste ston par byed pa yin/_chos de dag ston kyang de de bzhin du zhugs pa ma yin te/_de ltar na chos las nyams pa yin no/_/yab dang sras mjal ba las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon
[\[310b.3\]]tan gzugs can zhig yin na ni/_sems bskyed pa re re'i bsod nams dang yon tan gyi tshogs kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pa de snyed du brjod par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
[\[310b.4\]]sems bskyed pa yang rung sems can ji snyed pa thams cad la phan ba dang /_bde ba'i don du ma skyes pa gcig kyang med do/_/sems can gyi khams tshad med pa dang zad mi shes pa bsod nams kyang de snyed du 'gyur ro/_/sems de ltar bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyis mchod pas kyang lan mi
[\[310b.5\]]lon to/_/'jig rten pa'i mchod pa ni zang zing yin la/_sems bskyed pa ni sems can 'khor ba la gzhol ba rnams mya ngan las 'das par gzhol bar byed pas zang zing med pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di nyid sngon bgrang du med pa'i sngon rol na/_de bzhin gshegs
[\[310b.6\]]pa dbang po'i tog ces bya bar gyur to/_/chos rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med/_rnam par rtog pa chos 'byung kun kyang stong /_/rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur/_/de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra/_/sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te/_/de bzhin stobs
[\[310b.7\]]dang ye shes dang /_/mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du/_/kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs/_/dkon mchog sprin las/_de de ltar sems mi mkhas pas/_chos 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/_/chos 'di dag ni rmi lam lta bu'o/_/chos 'di dag ni dge ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mi dge
[\[311a\]]
[\[311a.1\]]ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni 'byung ba'o/_/chos 'di dag ni mi 'byung ba'o zhes chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/_de 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni sems la gnas pa/_sems las byung ba/_sems rkyen du 'gro ba ste/_sems shin tu bcil/_shin tu
[\[311a.2\]]btul/_shin tu khong du chud par byas nas/_chos de dag thams cad kyang shin tu bcil ba dang /_shin tu btul ba dang /_shin tu khong du chud par 'gyur te/_des chos rnams de ltar mthong bas/_rgyu de dang rkyen des sems zhi bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de de sems nyid la mi gtod
[\[311a.3\]]do/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsngo ba'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/_gang 'di me tog gi rnam pa'am/_'bras bu'i rnam pa nga yir bya ba med pa yongs su bzung ba med pa de rnams nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
[\[311a.4\]]'bul lo/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/de bzhin du me tog gi shing la sogs pa yang bsngo'o/_/mdo sde dag mchod pa'i rnam pa rgya chen po dag nyan cing bsam pa thag pa nas yongs su bsngo'o/_/ji ltar na byang chub sems
[\[311a.5\]]dpa' gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin zhe na sems can gang dag bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus shing lcogs pa zhig la de yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thog mar rtsol zhing 'bad de/_brtson 'grus brtsam
[\[311a.6\]]pa mthong na/_de gnas de nas bslangs te de na 'khor dbye ba yang byas nas theg pa chen po la 'jog ste/_de ltar na gnas nas gnas su slong ba'i thabs la mkhas pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' snod du ma gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos mi ston to/_/
[\[311a.7\]]zhe 'gras pa rnams la ma yin/_klan ka tshol ba dang /_mu stegs can dang /_ri mo med pa dang /_ma dad pa mang ba dang /_g.yo dang sgyus glags pa dang /_'tsho ba'i bsam pa can dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser snas glags ba dang /_
[\[311b\]]
[\[311b.1\]]glen pa rmongs pa lug ltar lkugs pa rnams la ma yin/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos la ser sna yang med sems can gyi don la rgyab kyis phyogs pa yang ma yin mod kyi/_sems can 'di dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos 'dul ba'i snod du ma gyur to zhes btang snyoms
[\[311b.2\]]su 'jug go/_/sems can ci 'dra ba la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpas chos ston zhe na/_sems can dang ba can dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba smin pa dang /_snod du gyur ba dang /_g.yo med pa dang /_spyod lam mi 'chos pa dang /_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti la ma chags
[\[311b.3\]]pa dang /_tshul bzang po dang /_legs par ston nus pa dang /_dbang po rno ba dang /_ji skad bshad pa bzhin byed pa rnams la ston to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_de yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la chos mtshungs pa'i 'du shes kyis
[\[311b.4\]]zhe sa dang /_ri mo dang bcas pa dang /_theg pa chen po la gzhol/_'bab/_bab pa yin te/_des na byang chub kyi sems ma snad pa yin no/_/skyon yang gang zhe na/_rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa dang /_rigs dang rus dang /_lta ba la chags pa dang /_sdig pa chung ngus/_
[\[311b.5\]]'jigs par mi lta ba dang /_shi bas mi skrag pa dang /_mi bsam pa sems pa dang /_lam ma yin ba la lam du 'du shes pa dang /_'phral gyi bya ba la chags pa dang /_theg pa chen po dang /_de ston pa'i gang zag gi mi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa dang /_
[\[311b.6\]]de ston pa'i gang zag gi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_rtsod pa lhur len ba dang /_brlang ba dang /_rtsub ba dang /_spyi brtol che ba dang /_gtugs pa dang /_dag mi snyan pa dang /_mur cor smra ba dang /_mi gtsigs par smra ba dang /_ngag tu smra ba ste/_de de ltar skyon la mkhas pas
[\[311b.7\]]spros pa thams cad dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/_stong pa nyid bsgoms pa la rnal 'byor du byed do/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dul ba'o/_/lang kar gshegs pa las/_lang ka'i bdag po/_sa bon gcig las byung yang /_myu gu dang /_ljang bu dang /_
[\[312a\]]
[\[312a.1\]]sog ma dang /_tshigs dang /_yal ga dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_gra ma'i bye brag yod pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos skye ba'i chos ma rig ba las rab tu byung ba phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched la sogs pa thams cad dang khams gsum
[\[312a.2\]]du skyes pa'i chos thams cad la bde ba'i dbyings dang /_brjod pa dang 'gro ba'i khyad par dag snang ste/_mtshan nyid gcig pa'i rnam par shes pa yul na mngon par 'dzin par rab tu 'jug pa'i khyad par rab dang 'bring dang /_tha ma'i khyad par dang /_rnam par byang ba dang /_
[\[312a.3\]]dge ba dang mi dge bar yang snang ngo /_/lang ka'i bdag po de dag gi tha dad pa'i khyad par du yang ma zad de/_rnal 'byor ba rnal 'byor bsgom pa rnams kyi lam la yang so so rang gis rig pa'i mtshan nyid snang na/_so so'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ba'i chos dang /_chos med pa'i khyad par
[\[312a.4\]]lta ci ste med de yod do/_/blo gros chen po 'jim pa'i gong bu rdul phra rab las tha dad pa zhig yin na ni/_de dag las brtsams pa ma yin par 'gyur ba zhig na brtsams pas tha dad pa ma yin no/_/tha mi dad pa ni khyad med par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'jig pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams kun
[\[312a.5\]]gzhi'i rnam par shes pa'i rigs kyi mtshan nyid dang tha dad na ni de las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/tha mi dad na ni 'jig pa'i rnam par shes pa 'gags na kun gzhi yang 'gag par 'gyur na/_rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid ni 'gag par mi 'gyur te/_de'i phyir rnam par shes pa
[\[312a.6\]]rnams kyi rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid mi 'gag gi las kyi mtshan nyid 'gag go/_/rang gi rigs kyi mtshan nyid 'gags na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa yang 'gag par 'gyur te/_blo gros chen po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa 'gags na ni smra ba 'di yang mu stegs byed pa'i chad par
[\[312a.7\]]smra ba dang khyad par 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs byed rnams kyi smra ba ni 'di lta ste/_yul 'dzin pa rgyun chad pas rnam par shes pa rgyun chad par 'gyur te/_rnam par shes pa'i rgyun chad pas thog ma med pa'i dus kyi rgyun yang chad par 'gyur ro/_/mu stegs byed pa rnams ni rgyu las
[\[312b\]]
[\[312b.1\]]rgyun 'byung bar smra ba'i rgyu ma gtogs par mig gi rnam par shes pa gzugs dang snang ba 'dus pa las 'byung bar mi smra ste/_rgyu ni gtso bo dang /_skyes bu dang /_dbang phyug dang /_dus dang /_rdul phra mor smra ba'o/_/blo gros chen po snying rje chen po dang thabs la mkhas pa lhun gyis grub
[\[312b.2\]]par 'gyur ba'i sbyor ba dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_rkyen gyis ma brtsams pa dang /_nang dang phyi'i las rnam pa dben pa dang /_phyi rol sems su lta bas mtshan ma med pa'i gnas dang ldan pa rnams/_rim
[\[312b.3\]]gyis sa'i rim pa ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul la rjes su 'jug pa dang /_khams gsum pa dag gi sems sgyu mar shin tu mos pas rab tu sgom pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi sems snang ba tsam la 'jug pas/_shes rab kyi pha rol
[\[312b.4\]]tu phyin pa gnas pa rjes su 'thob pa skye ba bya ba dang ldan pa med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rdo rje'i gzugs lta bu/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i rjes su song song ba/_de nyid kyi sprul pa dang ldan pa/_stobs dang mngon par shes pa dang /_snying rje dang thabs
[\[312b.5\]]kyis brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mu stegs kyi gnas thams cad du nye bar song ba sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/_rim gyis gnas 'phos pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar sgyu ma sna tshogs dag_/snang yang yod pa ma
[\[312b.6\]]yin te/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sna tshogs kyang /_/bshad pa rnam par 'khrul pa yin/_/gzhan la gang zhig bstan pa de/_/gzhan la bshad par mi rung ste/_/ji ltar nad pa so so la/_/sman pa sman rnams btang ba ltar/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas sems can la/_/sems
[\[312b.7\]]tsam du yang rab tu gsungs/_/mgon po rnams ni gang gsungs pa'i/_/so so rang rig spyod yul ni/_rtog ge can gyi spyod yul min/_/nyan thos rnams kyi 'ang de bzhin min/_/blo gros chen po gnas yang byang chub sems dpa' rang gi sems snang ba'i gzung ba dang /_
[\[313a\]]
[\[313a.1\]]'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa'i spyod yul yongs su shes par 'dod pas 'du ba dang /_'du 'dzi dang /_gnyid dang sgrib pa med par bya'o/_/srod dang tho rangs dang nam gyi gung thun la mi nyal ba'i sbyor ba la brtson par bya'o/_/mu stegs can ngan pa'i gtsug lag
[\[313a.2\]]dang /_gtam dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral bar bya zhing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rang gi sems snang ba la rnam par rtog pa'i mtshan nyid khong du chud par rtogs par bya'o/_/sna tshogs snang ba yod ma yin/_/snang
[\[313a.3\]]ba las ni sems 'byung ste/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bur/_/kun gzhi mi la snang ba yin/_/blo gros chen pos rang sems snang ba'i rgyur rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang gsol ba btab pa/_bcom ldan 'das rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyu cig car ram rim gyis 'jug
[\[313a.4\]]pas sam/_ji ltar rnam par dag par 'gyur/_/bka' stsal pa/_rim gyis te cig car ma yin pa'i dpe a mra'i 'bras bu smin pa dang /_rdza mkhan snod byed pa dang /_sa las rtsi shing skye ba dang /_rol mo la mkhas pa rim gyis 'byung ba gsungs/_me long du gzugs brnyan snang
[\[313a.5\]]ba rtog pa med pa cig car 'byung ba'i dpes/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can gyi rang gi sems snang ba'i rgyud rnam par mi rtog cing snang ba med pa'i spyod yul cig car rnam par spyod do zhes bstan/_blo gros chen po yang nyan thos kyi dngos po rnam par rtog
[\[313a.6\]]pa'i rang bzhin la mngon par zhen pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dro ba dang /_gsher ba dang /_g.yo ba dang /_sra ba'i 'byung ba chen po rnams byed pa med par 'byung ba rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid dang /_rigs pa dang /_lung gi tshad
[\[313a.7\]]ma dang /_shin tu 'grel pa rnams mthong nas/_de'i rang bzhin la mngon par zhen pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'byung ngo /_/blo gros chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpas khong du chud nas bzlog par bya'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la blo gros chen pos gsol ba/_ji ltar
[\[313b\]]
[\[313b.1\]]bdag dang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan sgro 'dogs pa dang /_skur pa'i lta ba ngan pa spangs pa'i blo can rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya zhing /_sangs rgyas nas kyang rtag pa dang sgro 'dogs pa dang chad pa dang /_skur pa 'debs pa'i lta ba rnam par spangs te/_khyod kyis sangs rgyas
[\[313b.2\]]kyi tshul la mi skur par 'gyur ba sgro 'dogs pa dang /_skur pa'i mtshan nyid bdag la bshad du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_sgro 'dogs pa dang skur pa dag_/sems tsam po la yod pa min/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas lta bus/_/sems ni su dag mi shes pa/_/sgro 'dogs pa dang skur ba
[\[313b.3\]]la/_/mi mkhas de dag rab tu spyod/_/rang bzhin med pa ni rang bzhin thar pa med pa la dgongs te/_dngos po thams cad rang bzhin med pa zhes bya'o/_/blo gros chen po thams cad kyi rten nas rgyu dang 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te/_'di ltar phyi'i dang nang gi
[\[313b.4\]]gi'o/_/de ltar phyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni 'jim pa'i gong bu dang /_lag zungs dang /_'khor lo dang /_srad bu dang /_chu dang /_mi'i nan tan la sogs pa'i rkyen gyis rdza ma 'byung ba dang /_de bzhin du thags las snam bu dang /_rtsi skyong las re lde dang /_sa bon las
[\[313b.5\]]myu gu dang /_srub ma la sogs pa mi'i nan tan dang /_zho las mar 'byung ba 'di ni phyi'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba snga ma las phyi ma 'byung ba'o/_/nang gi ni 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa dang /_srid pa dang /_las dang /_chos 'di dag la sogs pa ni rten cing 'brel
[\[313b.6\]]par 'byung ba'i ming 'thob po/_/blo gros chen po 'di dag las skyes pa'i phung po dang /_khams dang skye mched ces bya ba'i chos de dag kyang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste/_de dag ni khyad par med pa las byis pa rnams kyis brtags pa'o/_/blo
[\[313b.7\]]gros chen pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bshad pas/_rgyu rnam par brjod pa nyid bgyis kyi/_rang gi tshul gyis slar gzhil ba'i tshul ma gsungs na/_bcom ldan 'das mu stegs byed rnams kyang gang las dngos po rnams 'byung
[\[314a\]]
[\[314a.1\]]ba 'di lta ste/_gtso bo dang dbang po dang /_skyes bu dang dus dang /_rdul phra mo 'jug pas/_rgyu las byung bar brjod de/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni rnam grangs gzhan gyis dngos po rnams skye bar bka' stsal mod kyi/_grub pa'i mtha' la bye brag tu dbye ba ni
[\[314a.2\]]ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das mu stegs can rnams kyang ma mchis pa dang /_ma mchis pa las skye bar brjod/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang ma mchis pa las rkyen rnams kyis 'byung ba dang /_byung nas kyang 'jig par gsungs te/_gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ma rig
[\[314a.3\]]pa'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar gsungs pa 'di yang rgyu med par smra ba rnams brjod pa gsungs kyi rgyur smra ba ni ma lags so/_/'di yod na 'di yod do zhes bgyi ba 'di ni cig car gnas pa rnams la rung gi/_rim gyis 'byung ba la ltos bar gnas pa rnams la ma yin te/_mu stegs kyi brjod
[\[314a.4\]]pa nyid bzang gi khyod kyi bzang po ma lags so/_/ci'i slad du zhe na/_mu stegs kyi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma lags pa'i rgyus 'bras bu mngon par sgrub po/_/bcom ldan 'das khyod kyis rgyu yang 'bras bu la ltos/_'bras bu yang rgyu la ltos pas/_rgyu rkyen yang 'dre ste/_de bzhin phan tshun thug
[\[314a.5\]]pa ma mchis par yang 'gyur ro/_/'di yod na 'di yod do zhes brjod pa ni 'jig rten rgyu ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/bka' stsal pa/_blo gros chen po gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa med pa dang /_rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa'i phyir 'di yod do zhes brjod kyang rgyu dang byed par smra ba dang /_rgyu
[\[314a.6\]]rkyen 'dres par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gzung ba dang /_'dzin pa la mngon par zhen cing /_phyi rol gyi rang gi yul gyi dngos po med par rang gi sems snang ba tsam du khong du chud pa de dag la ni 'di lta bu nyes par 'gyur gyi/_nga'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba brjod pa la nyes
[\[314a.7\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/blo gros chen po sgyu ma ni skyes bu gzhan gyi rig sngags kyi mthus 'byung ste/_rang gi rnam par rtog pa'i gnas ngan len gyi bag chags kyi mthu las ni ma yin no/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo lta ba ngan pa'i mtshan nyid du ltung ba'i bsam pa can/_rang gi sems snang
[\[314b\]]
[\[314b.1\]]ba tsam du ma rtogs pa rgyu dang rkyen gyi byed pa las skye ba'i mtshan nyid du mngon par chags pa rnams la phan pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid du bstan to/_/blo gros chen po chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid med pa ste/_
[\[314b.2\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros chen po 'di ltar rang gi blos rnam par dpyad na/_rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi dngos po mi rigs pas na/_de'i phyir chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med ces bya'o/_/srog dang lus gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa la sogs pa dris na 'jog
[\[314b.3\]]pa ni mu stegs can sems tsam mi shes pa yin gyi/_sangs rgyas kyi ma yin gyi bud+d+ha'i ni gzhag par lung bstan pa ye shes med de snod la ltos nas re zhig lung mi bstan par bya bar 'gyur/_log pa la bden par chags pas ni phung po lnga 'dus pa dang /_'byung
[\[314b.4\]]ba las gyur pa rnams skye'o/_/blo gros chen po rnam par shes pa yang gnas kyi yul sna tshogs la mngon par chags shing 'dod pa'i rgyus 'gro ba gzhan du mtshams sbyor bar 'byung ngo /_/sa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa rnams la ni rgyu 'byung ba chen po rnams yod mod
[\[314b.5\]]kyi/_'byung ba chen po rnams la ni med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros chen po dngos po dang /_rtags dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_dbyings dang /_bya ba'i bdag nyid dang /_sbyor ba med pas 'byung ba rnams mi skye'o/_/dngos po la sogs pa'i bya ba 'dus pa las skye bar
[\[314b.6\]]'gyur gyi/_rtags dang mi ldan pa las ma yin no/_/de lta bas na blo gros chen po 'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni/_mu stegs byed rnams kyis rnam par brtags pa yin te/_ngas ni ma yin no/_/brtags pa sna tshogs snang ba
[\[314b.7\]]ni/_/gzhan gyi dbang zhes brjod pa ste/_/rnam pa gzhan du brtags na ni/_/mu stegs smra la gnas par 'gyur/_/rtog pa rtogs zhes bya ba ste/_/mthong ba'i phyir ni rgyu las byung /_/rnam rtog gnyis las grol ba ni/_/de nyid yongs su grub pa yin/_/
[\[315a\]]
[\[315a.1\]]blo gros chen po nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni shes bya'i sgrib ba dang /_las kyi bag chags ma spangs pa'i phyir chos la bdag med pa ma rtogs shing bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba'i 'chi 'pho ba ma thob pas nyan thos rnams la theg pa
[\[315a.2\]]gsum du bstan te gcig tu ma bstan to/_/blo gros chen po de dag nam nyes pa'i bag chags thams cad spangs shing chos la bdag med pa rtogs pa de ni/_de dag bag chags kyi nyes pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyis myos par gyur nas/_zag pa med pa'i dbyings nas slar sad de 'jig
[\[315a.3\]]rten gyi dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa zag pa med pa'i dbyings su gtogs pa'i tshogs rnams yongs su bskang nas/_chos kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dbang byed pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/theg pa rnam par gzhag med kyang /_/sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir/_/theg
[\[315a.4\]]pa tha dad ngas bshad do/_/theg pa gcig tu ngas bshad do/_/sems kyi gnas shin tu gyur te/_sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gzhan dag rab tu thob pa dang /_mtshan dang /_dbang dang /_mngon par shes pa du ma'i me tog rgyas shing yid kyi mgyogs pa dang mtshungs
[\[315a.5\]]pa sgyu ma dang /_rmi lam gzugs brnyan lta bu 'byung ba las gyur pa ma yin pa la 'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa 'dra ba gzugs thams cad kyi yan lag sna tshogs 'dus pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rjes su song ba'i lus de ni chos kyi ngo bo nyid
[\[315a.6\]]rtogs pa yin gyis lus zhes bya'o/_/lta ba thams cad rnam bzlog cing /_/rtog dang brtags pa spangs pa ste/_/dmigs med skye ba med pa na/_/sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/_/dngos min dngos po med min pa/_/dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs/_/de
[\[315a.7\]]bzhin sems las grol ba ni/_/sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/_/de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'/_/mya ngan 'das dang chos kyi dbyings/_/sna tshogs yid kyi lus rnams ni/_/sems tsam du yang ngas bshad do/_/rnam rtog bag chags 'brel ba yin/_/
[\[315b\]]
[\[315b.1\]]sna tshogs sems las byung ba ste/_/mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang /_/'jig rten pa yi sems tsam mo/_/phyi rol snang ba yongs med de/_/sems ni sna tshogs rnams su snang /_/lus dang longs spyod gnas 'dra ba/_/sems tsam du nangs
[\[315b.2\]]bshad do/_/bud+d+ha'i drung du bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pa zhig gis thams cad byas pa'am ma byas pa'am/_rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'am/_gcig pa'am tha dad pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa mang po zhig zhus pa las/_bud+d+has lan du de skad ces zer
[\[315b.3\]]ba thams cad ni 'jig rten rgyang pan pa yin te/_kye bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pa 'di ni khyod kyi ste de'i ma yin no/_/bram ze nga ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas spros pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags gnas ngan len gyi rgyu las srid pa gsum skyes par ston te/_bram ze
[\[315b.4\]]de yang rang gi sems snang ba tsam khong du ma chud pas rnam par rtog pa 'byung gi_/phyi rol gyi dngos po dmigs pa las ni ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_mu stegs byed rnams kyi bdag dang /_dbang po dang /_don gsum phrad pa lta bu nga'i ma yin no/_/kye bram ze nga ni rgyur smra ba
[\[315b.5\]]yang ma yin/_rgyu med par smra ba yang ma yin te/_gzhan du na rnam par rtog pa nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po rab tu bshig ste/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar ston to/_/khyod lta bu dang bdag tu 'dzin par ltung ba'i rgyud can gzhan dag gis mi rig go/_/
[\[315b.6\]]gzhan yang blo gros chen po bram ze 'jig rten rgyang pan pas nga la 'di skad ces zer ro/_/kye gau ta ma srid pa gsum po 'di mi shes pa dang /_sred pa dang /_las kyi rgyu las byung ngam/_de ste rgyu las ma byung /_bram ze 'di gnyis ka yang 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'o/_/kye gau ta ma
[\[315b.7\]]dngos po thams cad rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid ltung ba'am/_kye bram ze de yang 'jig rten rgyang phan pa nyid yin te/_bram ze ji tsam du yid las rnam par g.yos pa dang /_phyi rol gyi don la mngon par chags shing rnam par rtog pa de tsam du 'jig rten rgyang pan no/_/me long
[\[316a\]]
[\[316a.1\]]la ni ji ltar gzugs/_/snang yang yod pa ma yin ltar/_/bag chags dag ni me long la/_/byis pas sems ni rnam gnyis mthong /_/sems kyi snang ba ma shes pas/_/rnam par rtog pa rnam gnyis skye/_/sems kyi snang ba yongs shes nas/_/rnam par
[\[316a.2\]]rtog pa mi 'byung ngo /_/sems ni sna tshogs 'gyur ba ste/_/mtshan dang mtshan gyi gzhi yang spangs/_/ji ltar byis pas brtags pa bzhin/_/snang ba'i rnam pa snang ba med/_/srid gsum rnam par rtog tsam pas/_/phyi rol gyi ni don med do/_/rnam rtog sna tshogs snang ba ni/_/
[\[316a.3\]]byis pa dag gis mi rtogs so/_/ji srid du yang dam bca' ba_//de srid thams cad 'dres ba can/_/rang sems tsam du blta bya ste/_/rtsod pa btsal bar mi bya'o/_/blo gros chen po gal te kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
[\[316a.4\]]med du zin na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bsgrags pa med pas 'jug pa'ang med/_ldog pa'ang med par 'gyur na/_blo gros chen po byas pa dang /_'phags pa rnams la 'jug pa dang /_ldog pa yang yod de rnal 'byor can brtson pa mi
[\[316a.5\]]'dod pa rnams bdag gi so so rang gis rig pa tshe 'di'i bde bar spyod pas gnas so/_/dro dang gsher dang sra g.yo bar/_/chos rnams byis pas rnam par brtags/_/yang dag ma yin sgro 'dogs te/_/mtshan nyid med cing mtshan gzhi med/_/rgyun rnams kyi ni lus 'di
[\[316a.6\]]la/_/'di ni rdzas brgyad gzugs yin te/_/lus kyi dbyibs dang dbang por ni/_/byis pa nor ba rnam rtog go/_/lus dang longs spyod gnas dag ni/_/gzung ba'i rnam par rig gsum ste/_/yid dang yid kyi rnam rig dang /_/rnam par rtog ni 'dzin pa gsum/_/
[\[316a.7\]]rang gi sems la mngon chags pas/_/sems ni shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/phyi rol snang ba yongs med de/_/de yi phyir na sems tsam mo/_/dbang po rnams ni sgyu ma bzhin/_/yul rnams kyang ni rmi lam 'dra/_/byed dang las dang bya ba nyid/_/rnam
[\[316b\]]
[\[316b.1\]]pa kun du g.yo ba min/_/kun rdzob tu ni thams cad yod/_/dam pa'i don du yod pa min/_/gang 'di sna tshogs snang ba ni/_/gnas ngan len gyis bsgos pa'i sems/_gzugs su snang ba 'dzin pa ste/_/phyi rol dag na sems 'khrul pa/_/snang ba ri bong rwa
[\[316b.2\]]bzhin te/_/mi rnams kyi ni rnam rtog yod/_/smig rgyu la ni ri dgas bzhin/_/gang rnams rtogs pa de dag nor/_/rnam rtog mngon par chags pa yis/_/rnam par rtog pa shin tu 'byung /_/phyi rol brtags pa'i rang bzhin te/_/gzhan dbang rang gi gzhi las
[\[316b.3\]]skyes/_/bdag la skyes pa'i 'khrul ma mthong /_/de yi sems rnams rab tu 'jig_/de yi rgyu can de la dmigs/_/yid mi 'jug pa'i gnas yin te/_/sems kyi rgyu yang 'byin par byed/_/rnam par shes kyang de la gnas/_/dngos po mtshan nyid ldan pa ni/_/phyi rol
[\[316b.4\]]ji srid rnam rtog cing /_/rang gi nor ba ma mthong na/_/de srid du ni sems rgyas byed/_/bag chags dag las sems mi byed/_/sems dang bag chags gcig ma yin/_/sems ni tha dad ma yin mtshan/_/bag chags rnams kyis yongs su dkris/_/yid kyi
[\[316b.5\]]shes las byung ba yi/_/bag chags dri ma bzhin du ltos/_/sems ni ras yug dkar po 'dra/_/bag chags rnams kyis mi mdzes so/_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i skabs nas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa brgyad du gzhag gam/_gzhog
[\[316b.6\]]go/_/bzhag na ji ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa log la ma bzhag lags/_bka' stsal pa/_de'i rgyu dang dmigs pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'dus pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_/blo gros chen po yid kyi rnam par shes pa yul bye brag 'byed pa la mngon par chags
[\[316b.7\]]shing 'byung bas/_bag chags kyi kun gzhi rnam par shes pa shin tu rgyas par byed do/_/yid dang lhan cig tu bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la mngon par chags pas/_rang sems pa lta bu rjes su 'jug ste/_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa rgyur gyur cing /_de la dmigs pa
[\[317a\]]
[\[317a.1\]]lus tha dad pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rang gi sems snang ba'i yul la mngon par chags pas/_gcig gi rgyur gcig gyur pa'i sems 'das pa 'byung ste/_blo gros chen po rgya mtsho chen po ltar rang gi sems snang ba'i yul gyi rlung gis bskyod
[\[317a.2\]]pas 'jug cing ldog go/_/de lta bas na yid kyi rnam par shes pa bzlog pas bdun po rnams kyang ldog par 'gyur ro/_/kun gzhi la ni rten bcas nas/_/yid kyang shin tu 'jug par 'gyur/_/sems dang yid la rten bcas nas/_/rnam par shes pa 'jug par 'gyur/_/dkar po la ni dri
[\[317a.3\]]ma snang /_/dri ma la ni sems mi snang /_nam mkha' la ni sprin bzhin du/_/de bzhin sems kyang mi snang ngo /_/thams cad 'byung 'gyur gzugs med de/_/'byung las ma gyur gzugs yod do/_/dri za'i grong khyer rmi lam dang /_/sgyu ma smig rgyu 'byung 'gyur min/_/ji ltar gser
[\[317a.4\]]ni dag pa dang /_/chu yang rnyog pa dwangs pa dang /_/nam mkha' la ni sprin med ltar/_/rnam rtog dag pa de bzhin no/_/dbus ma 'jigs pa dang sems tsam/_/dbu ma yin pa rgyun chags 'byung /_/yon tan rdul phran rdzas 'dus par/_/byis pa rnams ni gzugs la rtog_/
[\[317a.5\]]rdul phran re rer yod pa min/_/de yi phyir yang don med do/_/rang gi sems ni snang ba'i dbyibs/_/mi rnams la ni phyi rol snang /_/phyi rol snang ba yod min te/_/de yi phyir yang don med do/_/skra shad 'dzings dang sgyu ma dang /_/rmi lam dri za'i grong khyer dang /_/mgal me
[\[317a.6\]]smig rgyu sna tshogs dag_/med kyang mi la rab tu snang /_/sems dang rnam rtog rnam rig dang /_/yid dang rnam shes nyid kyang ste/_/kun gzhi srid gsum g.yo ba rnams/_/de dag sems kyi rnam grangs yin/_/gang dag 'jungs pa'i nyan thos dang /_/mu stegs can gyis byas pa ni/_/
[\[317a.7\]]gang phyir rtog ges bshad pas na/_/de dag don la 'khrul pa'o/_/chos yang dag par sdud pa las/_/chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi 'grogs pa khong du chud par bya ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dman pa la sems pa dang /_dman pa
[\[317b\]]
[\[317b.1\]]la smon pa'i sems can dman pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_sems can mi brtson pa mi 'grus pa le lo can brtson 'grus med pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_nga rgyal bdun dang nga rgyal gyis khengs pa'i sems can rnams
[\[317b.2\]]dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_ser sna dang /_'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems dang /_le lo dang /_rnam par g.yeng ba dang /_'chal pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin can gyi sems can rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_'dod pa la 'dun pa
[\[317b.3\]]dang /_gnod sems dang /_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_rtog pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa dang /_kun du rtog pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_sgrib pa dang /_chod pa dang /_kun nas dkris pa thams cad dang
[\[317b.4\]]lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la byed pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par dga' ba'i yid la byed pa thams cad dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_ngar
[\[317b.5\]]'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa rnams dang lhan cig mi 'grogs pa dang /_'ja' la kha dog skya bo dang /_sngon po dang /_dmar po rnams ni rim bzhin sa chu me'i dbang po/_/gzhu'i dbyibs ni rlung gi dbang po zhes 'byung /_rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong dge ba
[\[317b.6\]]med pa'i tshogs rnam par dag pa/_dbang rab tu thob pas zad par nam mkhar bsams tsam gyis de bzhin du 'gyur te/_sra ba dang /_gsher ba dang /_tsha ba dang /_g.yo ba rnams dang /_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po rnams kyi sgrib pa med
[\[317b.7\]]par 'gyur yang /_sems kyi sgrib pa med pa nam mkha'i sgrib pa med par 'pho ba yang ma yin/_bsams pa tsam gyis sgrib pa med pa dang mi ldan par srab la sogs pa med par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin du rkyen las byung ba'i las dge ba dang /_mi dge ba thams
[\[318a\]]
[\[318a.1\]]cad kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang nyid khong du chud par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba brgyad la/_gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_stong pa dang g.yo ba med par lta ste/_des 'grol bas
[\[318a.2\]]rnam par thar pa zhes bya'o/_/nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas/_phyi'i gzugs rnams la lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang /_g.yo ba med par lta bas so/_/sdug par mos pa ni stong pa'o/_/mi sdug pa ni lta bar gyur pa'o/_/sdug par mos pas so/_/
[\[318a.3\]]gzugs kyi 'du shes las 'das nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam pa ni stong pa ste rnam shes mtha' yas so snyam pa ni rnam par shes pa thog ma med pa can du bshad la/_gang thog ma med ba de ni stong pa yin te/_de ltar mthong bas so/_/ci yang med do snyam pa ni ci yang zhes bya ba ni dus gsum ste/_de dag med pas
[\[318a.4\]]mthong ngo /_/'du shes med 'du shes med min rdzogs par bya ste/_gnas pa ni 'du shes med ces bya ba ni stong pa'o/_/'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ni/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste/_de ltar mthong bas so/_/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni de 'di snyam
[\[318a.5\]]du 'du shes ni smig rgyu lta bu'o/_/tshor ba ni chu'i chu bur lta bu ste/_'du shes nyid tshor ba/_tshor ba nyid 'du shes pas/_'di la shes pa po med/_tshor ba po med nas/_de ltar mthong bas so/_/'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i zad par gyi skye mched
[\[318a.6\]]bcu la/_zad par sa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar du mos na yang de kho na bzhin du 'gyur te/_zad par gyi skye mched ces bya'o/_/re re la yang skye mched thams cad du 'gyur bas de'i phyir zad par skye mched ces bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i dbang bcu la/_mi 'chi ba thob
[\[318a.7\]]pas tshe la dbang ba'o/_/sems tsam du yongs su shes pa'i phyir sems la dbang ba'o/_/lag na rin po che dang /_nam mkha'i mdzod rab tu brnyes pa'i phyir yo byad do/_/bag chags dang bcas pa'i las kyi lam bcad pas las so/_/ting nge 'dzin bzlog pa'i bsam
[\[318b\]]
[\[318b.1\]]gtan rnyed pas skye ba'o/_/lhun gyis grub par bya ba la 'jug pa thob pas rdzu 'phrul lo/_/zad par gyi skye mched thob pas mos pa'o/_/bsams pa tsam gyis don 'thob pas smon lam mo/_/ye shes sngon du 'gro ba'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las thob pas ye shes so/_/de
[\[318b.2\]]bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'i ye shes dri ma med pa'i phyir chos so/_/dbang bcu po dag mi mthun pa gang gi gnyen po yin pa dang /_de dag gi rgyu yang d+harma 'di las bshad/_byang chub sems dpa' ni gang so sor thar ba'i
[\[318b.3\]]sdom pas bsdams pa yang lags la/_so sor thar pa tsam gyis dag par yang mi sems te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa la rton pa lags so/_/d+harma 'di las sangs rgyas bcu 'byung /_cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa las/_'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
[\[318b.4\]]lus yongs su dag pa yin/_smras pa/_lha'i bu gang gi tshe yid las byung ba'i lus kyis sems can thams cad kyi lus dang mthun par ston pa yin/_ji ltar ngag yongs su dag pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyi sgra yongs su rdzogs pas 'bras bu yod pas chos ston pa yin/_
[\[318b.5\]]ji ltar na sems yongs su dag pa yin/_sems gcig gis sems can thams cad kyi sems yongs su shes pa yin no/_/bud+d+ha'i spyan snga na 'phags pa 'jam dpal dang /_lha'i bu ded dpon chos gleng ba las/_ded dpon gyis chos zab mo mang du smras pa dang /_shA ri'i
[\[318b.6\]]bus bud+d+ha la ded dpon 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba can no zhes gsol pa dang /_sngon yang dge ba spel ba yin pa las gleng ba bskal ba grangs med pa'i sngon rol na 'jig rten gyi khams bde bar bud+d+ha ri rab lta bur 'byung ba de'i tshe/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dge bas bkod pa byung /_
[\[318b.7\]]de la bud+d+has chos bshad nas bu dang bcas pas chos dang mthun pa'i bzod pa thob/_de nas 'khor de ni chos smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba zhig yod pas rgyal po la chos zab mo bshad pa dang rgyal po rangs nas gos dang /_rgyan ci yod pa de la yon du byin no/_/
[\[319a\]]
[\[319a.1\]]de nas dge slong des gos la sogs pa ni mchod pa chen po ma yin gyi/_rab tu byung zhing chos spyod mchod pa'i bar/_/gang dag stong chen sems can de dag kun/_/byang chub phyir ni rab tu zhugs gyur cing /_/ma zhum sems kyis bskal pa rdzogs
[\[319a.2\]]par ni/_/bu dang chung ma sbyin pa byas pa las/_/gang gis byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed nas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su bslab ched du/_/rab 'byor sems kyis gom pa gcig bor ba/_/de ni de bas bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/gang dag sngon chad byung
[\[319a.3\]]ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_/gang dag ma byon byung dang bzhugs pa rnams/_/de dag skyon mang khyim ni ma spangs par/_/bla med byang chub zhi ba thob pa med/_/rab byung de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/_/rab tu ston cing bsngags la bkur ba ste/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas kun la mchod
[\[319a.4\]]'dod pa/_/rgyal ba'i bstan la rab byung gzung bar gyis/_/gang zhig khyim gnas rin chen khyim brgyan pa'i/_/gang gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing byin dang /_/gang zhig rab byung nyid dang mtshan gcig tu/_/mi rtag sdug bsngal bdag med sems byed na/_/gang zhig rab byung bag yod gyur ba
[\[319a.5\]]yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub nye ba dang /_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor shin tu bcom byas shing /_/dge ba'i phyogs kyang mi 'grib 'phel ba yin/_/rab byung de ni lam ngan spangs pa dang /_/lam gyi rjes mthun 'phags pa'i skye bos bstod/_/de ni dge ba cung zad ma yin zhing /_/de ni yongs
[\[319a.6\]]su 'dzin pa spangs ba yin/_/khyim las grol ba nyon mongs mi 'phel zhing /_/nyon mongs rnam grol bdud kyi 'ching ba med/_/rnam grol sems ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/spyod pa dag pas byang chub rnyed mi dka'/_/de nas rgyal po de rab tu byung bar 'dod nas/_bud+d+ha la gsol te gnad
[\[319a.7\]]nas bu stong la smras pa/_khyed las rgyal srid 'dzin cing sems can chos bzhin skyong bar spro ba su yod/_/de dag thams cad kyis bdag kyang rab tu 'byung gis mi 'dor bar gsol zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_'di rab tu byung na gling bzhi ba'i 'gro ba chud zos su 'ong gis/_khyod
[\[319b\]]
[\[319b.1\]]pas gang snying rje brtan pa des rgyal srid zung la 'gro ba chos la tshud cig/_de nas rgyal bu snying rje can sems kyis khas blangs nas/_gzhan ril rab tu byung ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i ded dpon chos smra ba'i dge slong de 'jam dpal lo/_/rgyal bu rgyal srid 'dzin pa ni bcom ldan 'das
[\[319b.2\]]shAkya thub pa'o/_/rgyal bu gzhan ni bskal ba bzang po'i sangs rgyas gzhan no/_/ye shes snang ba'i rgyan las/_dper na sa chen po 'di bai DUr+ya'i rang bzhin du gyur te/_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas brgya byin longs spyod dang bcas par snang la de ni lha rnams kyis 'dzam bu'i
[\[319b.3\]]gling gi mi rnams la/_kye lha'i dbang po la ltos khyed kyang bsod nams kyis las 'di 'dra bar 'gyur bar gyis shig ces smras pa dang /_de dag bsod nams dag byed smon lam yang 'debs so/_/de na brgya byin la sogs pa med kyang sa gzhi dag pas de ltar snang ba
[\[319b.4\]]de bzhin du bsgom pa la shin tu goms shing sems dag pa'i phyir sems can gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong bar 'gyur zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sku mthong ste/_de yang ma skyes ma 'gags snang ba yang ma yin mi snang ba yang ma yin mod
[\[319b.5\]]kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs brnyan la dmigs nas/_bsod nams byed cing yongs su bsngo'o/_/brgya byin gyi gzugs brnyan mi g.yo mi sems mi rtog pa de bzhin gshegs pa yang mi skye mi rtog mod kyi gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar 'jig rten
[\[319b.6\]]ni snang ste/_sems can rnams kyi mthong ba'i rims tha dad pas che ba'i rim pa tha dad par ston to/_/yongs su smin pa dang dad pa'i stobs bskyed pas chos thos bar 'gyur zhing bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin theg pa gsum du yang shes rab rnam par grol bar yang 'gyur
[\[319b.7\]]ro/_/las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul ba rnams kyi sngon gyi rnam par smin pas/_gzugs brnyan ltar mi snang bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das
[\[320a\]]
[\[320a.1\]]zhes de snyam du sems so/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor sa'i mthon dman rim par 'char ba bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang byang chub sems dpa' nas tha na log par zhugs pa yan chad la rim
[\[320a.2\]]gyis 'char ro/_/mdor na mi dge ba yid la byed pa thams cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu'o/_/dge ba yid la byed pa thams cad ni rnam par byang ba'i rgyu'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas rtsa ba med cing rten med pa'i byang chub brnyes
[\[320a.3\]]so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol ba/_rtsa ba dang rten gang lags/_rtsa ba ni 'jig tshogs so/_/rten ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun brtags so/_/gang brjod du med pa'i don de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don to/_/gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
[\[320a.4\]]don de chos kyi don to/_/gang chos kyi don de sangs rgyas kyi don to/_/de'i phyir gang gis rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mthong ba des chos mthong ngo /_/gang gis chos mthong ba des sangs rgyas mthong ste/_ji ltar btsal na ci yang mi mthong ba de ltar
[\[320a.5\]]mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal ci yang zhes bya ba gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems dang dmigs pa'o/_/de nas sems dang dmigs pa mi mthong ba de na yang dag pa mthong ba'o/_/de ltar na chos de dag de bzhin gshegs pas mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par
[\[320a.6\]]mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dge chos zag med kyis/_/gzugs brnyan lta bu yin te 'di la ni/_/de bzhin gshegs med de bzhin nyid kyang med/_/'jig rten dag na gzugs brnyan snang bar zad/_/chos yang dag par bsdus
[\[320a.7\]]pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la/_'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa/_rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas
[\[320b\]]
[\[320b.1\]]te gnas so/_/de la 'dod pa rnams ni bsam gtan dang po'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs te/_gang sred pa de dag las dben pa'o/_/sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams ni chags pa dang /_zhe sdang dang gti mug ste/_gzhi de las mi dge ba bcu 'byung ngo /_/'di ni sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos
[\[320b.2\]]rnams zhes bya ste/_de dag la dben pa ni bsam gtan dang po'o/_/rtog pa dang lhan cig pa ni rtog pa dang bcas pa ste/_rtog pa de dag gang zhe na/_gang dag bsam gtan dang po dang mthun pa'i rtog pa ste/_de cho ga bzhin du rtog cing de dag kyang dul bas na/_de dag ni rtog pa
[\[320b.3\]]zhes bya ste/_shes pa dang khong du chud pa dang /_dpyod pa dang rab tu rtog pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin du byed pa ni rtog pa'o/_/dpyod pa gang zhe na/_bsam gtan dang po dang mthun pa'i rtog pa de dag nyid la dpyod pa dang /_rnam par dpyod pa dang /_nye bar dpyod pa dang /_kun
[\[320b.4\]]du longs spyod pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin du byed pa dang /_sems rjes su 'gro ba ni dpyod pa zhes bya ste/_de dag dang lhan cig pa ni rtog pa dang bcas/_dpyod pa dang bcas pa bsam gtan dang po'o/_/dga' ba dang bde ba dben pa las skyes pas de'i phyir dben pa las skyes pa'i
[\[320b.5\]]dga' ba dang bde ba zhes bya'o/_/rdzogs par byas te gnas zhes bya ba la/_rdzogs par byas zhes bya ba ni/_sdom pa dang /_sdom par byed pa dang /_sbed pa dang /_sbed par byed pa dang /_ro myang ba dang mngon par dga' ba ste/_bsam gtan de la gnas pa'i byang chub
[\[320b.6\]]sems dpa' ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par bya ba'i 'dun pa dang /_'dod pa 'thob ste/_'dun pa dang 'dod pa des bsam gtan dang po la snying po 'du shes pa ma yin no/_/de bsam gtan gnyis pa rtsom te/_de bsam gtan dang po'i
[\[320b.7\]]rtog pa dang /_dpyod pa de dag zhi bar byed/_de dag las sems rab tu zhi bar byed cing /_bsam gtan gnyis pa yongs su 'grub pa'i rgyu tshol te/_de rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral nas/_nang yongs su dang ste/_sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/_rtog pa dang dpyod
[\[321a\]]
[\[321a.1\]]pa med par dga' ba dang ldan pa/_bsam gtan gnyis pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de la nang yongs su dang ba ni de'i bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi chos gang yin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa yin te/_
[\[321a.2\]]de'i phyir nang yongs su dang ba zhes bya'o/_/rgyud gcig tu gyur zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag thams cad rab tu zhi nas/_rgya mtsho'i chu ltar ro gcig tu 'gyur bar 'thob pa'o/_/'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen por chu 'bab pa rnams
[\[321a.3\]]lan tshwar ro gcig par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bsam gtan dang po'i rtog pa dang dpyod pa de dag thams cad zhi nas ro gcig tu gyur te/_de ni ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin de las sangs
[\[321a.4\]]rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la dga' ba skyes te/_de dkon mchog la dga' bas dge ba'i chos rnams rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i 'dun pa shin tu 'bar ba dang /_shin tu 'od gsal ba dang /_shin tu 'od ba 'thob po/_/
[\[321a.5\]]de 'dus pa des bsam gtan gnyis pa la mi chags te/_bsam gtan gsum pa kun du tshol lo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te dga' ba ni bsam gtan gsum pa'i sgrib pa yin no snyam nas/_de dga' ba de las 'dod chags dang btang snyoms dran pa yongs su dag
[\[321a.6\]]pa/_'phags pa rnams kyis gang dag dga' ba med pa bde ba la gnas pa zhes brjod pa/_bsam gtan gsum pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba la 'dod chags dang bral bar thob pa de gang de dga' ba med pa'i
[\[321a.7\]]gtan du bde ba ma yin gyi zad pa dang 'jig pa'i chos can te/_de mi rtag cing mi brtan la ther zug ma yin zhing de yid brtan du mi rung ngo snyam pa'i sems de lta bu 'thob po/_/de ltar shes nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod par rab tu 'thob pa'i 'dun pa drag po chen
[\[321b\]]
[\[321b.1\]]po 'thob po/_/'dun pa drag po des bde ba dang sdug bsngal la mngon par chags pa mi skye'o/_/de bde ba yang spangs te snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing /_yid bde ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang nub pas/_bde ba yang ma yin/_/sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa/_
[\[321b.2\]]btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de bsam gtan bzhi ba la snyoms par zhugs pas gnyen po'i sems so/_/yid du 'ong ba'i sems so/_/las su rung ba'i sems so/_/'od gsal ba'i sems so/_/
[\[321b.3\]]dran pa'i sems so/_/bde ba de sems can thams cad kyis mngon par smon te/_de sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba la mngon du phyogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa snang ba skye'o/_/de snang ba skyes pa des bsam gtan bzhi pa sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin/_bde
[\[321b.4\]]pa yang ma yin pa mang ba de la dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bde ba las yang chags par mi byed do/_/de la mi chags pas de nam mkha' nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de thams cad kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag
[\[321b.5\]]par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing /_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_mdor na 'di la gzugs ni rnam pa gnyis te/_
[\[321b.6\]]'byung ba dang /_'byung ba las gyur pa'o/_/'byung ba'i gzugs ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o/_/'byung ba las gyur pa ni kha dog dri ro reg pa ste/_de ltar gzugs rnam pa brgyad do/_/gzugs de dag gis 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas/_thogs pa'i 'du shes mi 'byung ste nub par 'gyur ro/_/gang
[\[321b.7\]]na gzugs su 'du shes pa de na thogs pa'i 'du shes pa ste/_de bas na gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das nas thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par 'gyur ro/_/thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub na/_sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam
[\[322a\]]
[\[322a.1\]]mkha' mtha' yas so snyam du 'jug go/_/de nas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas/_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par zhugs pa 'di snyam du
[\[322a.2\]]sems te/_nam mkha' ni mtha' med pas so/_/gang la mtha' med pa de'i thog ma yod par ga la 'gyur dbus yod par ga la 'gyur te/_de ltar chos thams cad ni thog ma dang tha ma dang /_dbus med do snyam mo/_/de ltar snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
[\[322a.3\]]sems can rnams la ni snying rje chen po bskyed/_chos rnams la ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid kyi shes pa 'jug ste/_de ni de'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa'i brtson pa'o/_/de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_rnam par shes
[\[322a.4\]]pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_nam mkhar 'du shes pa ni rnam par shes par 'gyur ba'o snyam nas/_'di snyam du 'di thams cad ni rnam par shes pa tsam ste/_rnam shes mtha'
[\[322a.5\]]yas de yang yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin no snyam du sems so/_/de de ltar snyoms par zhugs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yin te/_yongs su grub pa ni ma yin no/_/de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
[\[322a.6\]]te/_ci yang med do snyam nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/ci yang med ces bya ba la/_ci yang zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa dang /_'dus byas kyi chos thams cad dang /_
[\[322a.7\]]yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa las byung ba rnams ni ci yang zhes bya'o/_/ci yang med pa ni ji skad du brjod pa de dag las chung ngur 'gyur/_phra bar gyur pa ni ci yang med pa zhes bya'o/_/de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
[\[322b\]]
[\[322b.1\]]shin tu 'bar ba shin tu 'od gsal ba yin no/_/de rgyu de dang rkyen de dang gzhi de dang de thob pa de'i phyir/_ci yang med pa'i skye mched la mi chags te gong du tshol lo/_/de gong du tshol ba ni 'di snyam du sems te/_'di ni gang du 'du shes rnams kyi phra ba la ci yang med par
[\[322b.2\]]yongs su brtags te/_de ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min ma yin no snyam mo/_/de la 'du shes med pa ni stong_ pa'i phyir ro/_/'du shes med pa yang ma yin pa de rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched mngon du
[\[322b.3\]]gyur te/_de rnam pa thams cad du ci yang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas so/_/de de la gnas nas 'di snyam du sems te/_gang 'du shes med 'du shes med min de la dga' ba ci zhig yod snyam nas/_
[\[322b.4\]]blo de las gong du bskyed do/_/blo de las gong du bskyed nas/_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i chos mngon du gyur to/_/de chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags par mthong ngo /_/de chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'gags par mthong nas yang mi 'jig mi rtag go/_/de'i
[\[322b.5\]]phyir mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de de las gong du lhun gyis grub pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug ste/_'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/_/dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/_li ts+tsha bI gzhon nu dkon
[\[322b.6\]]mchog 'byung gnas kyis/_bud+d+ha la sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa zhus pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_dge ba bcu dang /_byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing yin par bshad pa'i rjes la/_rigs kyi bu de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar
[\[322b.7\]]'dod na byang chub sems dpas rang gi sems yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' sems yongs su dag pa de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'ong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di snyam du sems
[\[323a\]]
[\[323a.1\]]so/_/ji ltar rang gi sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_sems yongs su dag gam/_ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di lta bur yongs su ma dag
[\[323a.2\]]par snang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shA ri'i bu'i bsam pa mkhyen nas bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu ji snyam du sems/_nyi ma dang zla ba dag ci na dmus long gis ma mthong ba/_dmus long gis nongs kyi nyi zlas ma nongs so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sems can bsod nams med cing ma rig
[\[323a.3\]]pa'i mig gis nyes kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi rgyan mang po sems can gang gis kyang mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas ma nyes so/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag na khyod kyis ma mthong ngo /_/de nas tshangs pa ral pa can gyis shA ri'i bu la smras
[\[323a.4\]]pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma dag go zhes ma zer cig_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gnas brgyan pa bzhin du/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang yon tan gyis brgyan par bdag cag gis mthong ngo /_/
[\[323a.5\]]de nas shA ri'i bus tshangs pa ral pa can la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa kho bos ni sa chen po 'di mthon dman dang /_tsher ma dang /_gad pa dang /_rong dang /_ri rtse dang /_ngam grog dang /_mi gtsang ba dang /_bong bas rab tu gang bar mthong ngo /_/tshangs pas smras pa/_btsun
[\[323a.6\]]pa shA ri'i bu sems yongs su ma dag cing mthon dman du rtog pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su ma dag pas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de lta bur mthong /_shA ri'i bu sems can de dag thams cad kyi sems kyi bsams pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas
[\[323a.7\]]kyi ye shes la bsam pa yongs su dag pa de dag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yongs su dag par mthong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi 'khor de rnams 'di lta bu ji zhig yin snyam du sems pa mkhyen nas sa chen po 'di la zhabs kyi mthe bos rig par mdzad pa dang /_de'i tshe stong gsum
[\[323b\]]
[\[323b.1\]]gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che du ma dang /_yon tan gyi tshogs kyis brgyan par snang ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen rgyan gyi zhing ltar snang ngo /_/'khor thams cad kyang bdag kyang rin po che'i pad mo la 'khod par shes so/_/de nas shA ri'i
[\[323b.2\]]bu la bka' stsal pa/_mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_sngon ma mthong ba 'di lta bu mthong ngo /_/bka' stsal pa/_nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rtag tu yang 'di bzhin dag ste/_sems can ngan pa smin par bya bar gnod pa dang nyes pa mang por ston to/_/dper na lha'i bu rnams snod
[\[323b.3\]]gcig nas za ba za mod kyi/_bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin myong ngo /_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu skyes kyang sems can gyi bsam pa ji ltar dag pa bzhin sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan gyi bsngags pa yang de bzhin mthong ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas
[\[323b.4\]]kyi zhing de ltar snang ba'i tshe/_srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/snang ba bsam du med pa las/_rgyal po sde rab tu 'pham byed kyis sangs rgyas la zhus pa dang /_bka' stsal pa/_bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi sngon logs su
[\[323b.5\]]sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs byung ba'i tshe/_de'i gsung rab la byang chub sems dpa' bzang ba'i lha dang sa zhes bya ba gnyis shig byung ba las/_bzang ba'i lha ni 'dod pa chung bya ba nyung bsam gtan dang mngon par shes pa bya ba la phyir mi ldog pa zhig go/_/sa ni de tsam
[\[323b.6\]]gyi chos chen po dang ldan pa ma yin te/_bzang bas lha'i g.yog byed pa na/_de ha cang grong dang yul dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du 'gro zhing der phyin nas kyang bya ba mang ba dang /_bzang ba'i lha khyod ha cang bya ba mang ches so/_/spyad pas spang ba la cung zad sgrims
[\[323b.7\]]shig ces byas te yang bskul yang bskul ba dang /_khros tshig mi dga' nas/_tshig rtsub mos nal bu sbyar ma'i bu khyod kyi pha ma yang byi bo byed na/_khyod la tshul khrims dang /_shes rab ga la yod ces smra zhing slar yang mi 'chags bag la nyal ston to/_/bzang ba'i
[\[324a\]]
[\[324a.1\]]lhas kyang de snod ma yin pa tsam du rig nas bcos te btang ba dang /_de tshig pa za nas phrad dgu la bzang ba'i lha la kha phyar btang ngo /_/de shi nas bskal pa drug cur nal bur skyes shing skyes ma thag tu srang gi rdog lam du bor nas wa khyi la sogs pas
[\[324a.2\]]za ba dang /_'gro ba mang pos nal bu sbyar ma'i bu zhes kha phya bar gyur to/_/byang chub kyi sems kyis bzung bas sems can dmyal bar ma skyes so/_/bzang ba'i lha ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi sgul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na tshangs bar spyad pa spyod de/_byang chub sems
[\[324a.3\]]dpa' dpal 'byung zhes bya'o/_/snang ba bsam du med pas kyang sngon sangs rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi'i drung du tshangs bar spyad cing mnyes par byas pas/_de lta bu'i bdag nyid chen por gyur to/_/de bas na srog dang yang bsngos te/_sdig pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las
[\[324a.4\]]bsdam mo/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan par bya ste/_de las yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bud+d+ha dze tan bzhugs/_bud+d+ha bsod snyoms la gshegs pa'i tshe/_khye'u yang dze ta'i tshong 'dus kyi srang gi khang stong zhig na gzhag pa gzigs so/_/
[\[324a.5\]]khye'u yang bskal pa grangs med pa brgya na snang ba bsam du med pa'i bud+d+har 'gyur bar lung bstan to/_/rin po che'i phung po las/_dge sbyong gi dri ma ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/_gang zhe na/_'dod pa'i lha rnam par rtog pa dang /_gnod sems dang /_'tshe ba dang /_bdag bstod pa
[\[324a.6\]]dang /_pha rol la brnyas pa dang /_ya nga ba'i rnyed pa tshol ba dang dri ma ni rnyed pas rnyed pa 'dod pa dang /_dad pas byin pa chung gzon pa dang /_ltung pa 'chab ba dang /_khyim pa la brten pa dang /_rab tu byung ba dang brten pa dang /_'du 'dzi la dga' ba dang /_rnyed pa yongs su ma rdzogs par
[\[324a.7\]]rtog pa dang /_pha rol gyi rnyed pa la 'dod pa dang /_bdag gi rnyed pas chog mi shes pa dang /_pha rol bsod nams rnyed pa la phrag dog dang /_ser sna byed pa dang /_pha rol gyi 'khrul pa tshol ba dang /_bdag gi 'khrul pa la so sor thar pa dang /_'dul bas ma bsdams pa dang /_
[\[324b\]]
[\[324b.1\]]bya rog ltar mur cor smra ba dang /_ma gus pa dang /_rgod pa dang /_g.yeng ba dang /_lta ba kun nas ldang ba dang /_rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te byung ba dang /_'gal ba dang mthar lta ba la chags pa dang /_'khor ba la mngon par dga' ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par mi dga' ba
[\[324b.2\]]dang /_'jig rten gyi 'du mched pa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa dang /_sgrib pas kun du bskor ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa 'gal ba dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyis skrag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo spong ba dang /_chos dang 'gal ba gnas pa dang /_dkon mchog
[\[324b.3\]]gsum la ma gus pa'o/_/'od srungs sdig pa'i dge slong mang pos nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed do/_/'od srungs mur 'dug dgu bcu rtsa lnga dang /_pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis ni nga'i bstan pa nub par byed mi nus so/_/gzhan du na nga'i bstan pa 'di nyid las
[\[324b.4\]]skyes bu gti mug pa 'byung ste/_des nga'i bstan pa 'di nub par byed do/_/'di lta ste/_'od srungs ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang /_ri dgas dang bya gag gis kyang de'i sha za bar mi nus kyi/_'di ltar seng ge'i ro de nyid las srin bu
[\[324b.5\]]byung ste/_gang ri dgas kyi rgyal po seng ge'i sha la za ba dang 'dra'o/_/'od srungs chos bzhi dang ldan pa ni sdig pa'i dge slong du rig par bya ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_khengs pa/_ca co can/_bya rgod lta bu/_'chal ba'i tshig yin no/_/yang bzhi ste/_'phyar ba/_'gying ba/_
[\[324b.6\]]rnyed pa 'dod pa/_chos ma yin pa 'dod pa'o/_/'od srungs dge slong gnyis kyis zhal te bya bar ngas rjes su gnang ste/_gnyis gang zhe na/_yongs su dag pa'i dge slong 'jig rten pha rol gyi kha na ma tho bas 'jigs par lta ba las kyi rnam par smin pa'i
[\[324b.7\]]rjes su 'brang bas ngo tsha zhing 'gyod pa dang ldan zhing /_dgra bcom par gyur pa'o/_/dkon mchog gi za ma tog las/_klu'i rgyal po mthu dang ldan pa sa sems pa'i dbang gis sprin gyi phung po gcig las tsha ba'i bdag nyid glog gi phreng ba yang
[\[325a\]]
[\[325a.1\]]gtong ngo /_/skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid rgyu'i rgyun kyang gtong ngo /_/kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe/_nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher sham thabs dang bla gos legs par ma bgos pa btul te
[\[325a.2\]]byon pa lhung bzed chag pa/_shes bzhin med pa/_spyod lam mi sdug pa/_lag na 'khar ba thogs pa/_sna leb dang zhar ba dang /_theng po dang /_zha bo dang /_lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa nad sna tshogs kyis btab ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_de'i tshe dge slong dag
[\[325a.3\]]phal cher bsnyen bkur dang rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti 'dod pa bya ba sna tshogs kyis 'brel ba/_'dul ba por so sor thar pa dral ba yin/_tshe 'dir lhur len pa tshe phyi ma la mi lta bar 'gyur te/_de dag chos kyi phyir ma yin gyi/_bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhar ba dang /_sha tshugs ma legs
[\[325a.4\]]pa'i bar rab tu 'byin pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i de lta bus nga'i bstan pa bltar mi rung ba dang /_mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha rnams ni yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/bdud rnams ni dga' ba dang btang snyoms su 'gyur ro/_/chos gnyis
[\[325a.5\]]kyis ni bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_brtson 'grus dang bag yod pa'o/_/mdor na byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa'i las ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ni brtson 'grus so/_/shes rab kyi las yod pa thams cad ni bag yod pa ste/_
[\[325a.6\]]de bas na thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa la bla na med pa'i byang chub las ldog pa med do/_/rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa las/_des pa'i don gyi mdo gang zhe na/_brjod du med pa'i phyir mdo sde thams cad ni nges pa'i don te/_de ltar na nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa yin
[\[325a.7\]]no/_/nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde 'di dag la gang dag mi rton pa de dag ni drang ba zhes bya ste/_ci'i phyir drang ba zhe bya na/_'di ltar nges pa'i don dang 'gal ba'i chos la gnas pa yin te/_de dag ni drang dgos pa yin no/_/gang gis drang zhe na/_sgras drang ngo /_/nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde
[\[325b\]]
[\[325b.1\]]dag la rton pa ni sgras drang ba yin no/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag gis don dam pa brjod du med pa rtogs shing /_de dag gis dus gsum gyi chos thams cad la lhag chad med par shes pa'i phyir te/_rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po don gyi rnam pa 'di la de ltar chos nyid 'di la
[\[325b.2\]]rton na mdo sde thams cad nges pa'i don du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mi rton na mdo sde thams cad drang ba'i don du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mi rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyang yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ngo /_/
[\[325b.3\]]drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas slong mo pa mthong na 'du shes gsum bskyed par bya ste/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen de tshe brjes nas longs spyod du 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub kyi lam nye bar bsten pa'o/_/yang gsum ste/_dug gsum dang
[\[325b.4\]]bral bar ro/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_dngos po gtong ba dang /_snying rje ba dang /_sbyin pa bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo bas so/_/khyim na gnas pa ni gdung ba dang /_bcings pa dang don chung ba dang ngan song gi them skas dang dam pa'i chos rgud pa dang /_zang zing dang bcas pa dang sdug
[\[325b.5\]]bsngal gyi gzhi'o//rab tu byung ba ni de dag las bzlog pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' khyim pas ni dge sbyong gi spyod pa la mkhas par bya'o/_/dge sbyong gi mi 'dum pa rnams kyi sdum bya'o/_dam pa'i chos 'jig pa na srog dang bsdos te bsrung bar bya'o/_/dge slong na ba
[\[325b.6\]]mthong na rang gi sha khrag gis kyang gso bar bya'o/_/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa bzhi ni 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi la gnas pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang /_khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang mi 'dre ba dang /_tshul 'chos pa med
[\[325b.7\]]par dgon par gnas pa'o/_/byams pa seng ges smras pa/_bzhi ni dge sbyong chom rkun pa ste/_dge slong gi rtags kha dog dang dbyibs la gang gnas shing sdig pa'i chos spyod pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal ba dang dben par song ba ste/_mi dge ba rnam par rtog pa dang 'bras
[\[326a\]]
[\[326a.1\]]bu ma thob par rnyed pa dang bkur sti'i phyir 'bras bu thob par khas 'che ba dang bdag bstod cing gzhan smod pa'o/_/dper na dug gso ba'i sngags dang sman la mkhas pa gnyis shig yod pa de las gcig gis mi mang po mang bar bya ba'i phyir dug zos nas lan cig thabs des gsos so/_/
[\[326a.2\]]yang de ltar bya zhes dug zos pa las bcos ma khom par shi ba dang /_cig shos na re kho bo ni mi dag mi mang yang bla'i dug kyang mi za sman yang mi gtang ngo zhes zer te/_bde blag tu 'dug nas tshe'i mthar phyin pa dang 'dra bar phyi ma'i dus na rab tu byung ba kha cig ni nyes pa byas pa las
[\[326a.3\]]spyod zhes zer ba dang /_kha cig snga nas sdom pa gnyis 'byung ba yang de dang 'dra'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'di la dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya ste/_bzhin rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa dang /_sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'du 'dzi las 'byol bar
[\[326a.4\]]bya/_gnas gang na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhig gnas la/_de la zhe sdang gi sems 'ga' tsam skye bar 'gyur ba lta na yang dpag tshad brgyar 'byol bar bya'o/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpas stong gsum gyi sems can thams cad spyos sam brgyad dam mtshon gyis
[\[326a.5\]]btab pas ni byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig la zhe sdang 'ga' bskyed pa de nyams par 'gyur te gal te zhe sdang bskyed na sems ji snyed kyi bskal bar go bgos so/_/dper na lcags ni lcags kyis chod kyi bong ba'am shing ngam rtswas gcod mi nus pa ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' dge
[\[326a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba yang zla la zhe sdang bskyed pa ma yin pa gzhan gyis zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bas na sems dang po bskyed pa la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/gang zhig khyim na gnas nas ni/_/stong gsum thams cad rin chen gyis/_/rab tu bkang ste 'jig rten gyi/_/mgon
[\[326a.7\]]la yon du 'bul byed na/_/mkhas pa gang zhig yid 'byung zhing /_/nyes pa shes nas khyim spangs te/_/sangs rgyas rjes su slob byed la/_/rab tu 'byung ba tshol byed cing /_/rab tu 'byung ba btsal nas kyang /_/g.yel ba med par 'dod rnams dang /_/khyim gyi gnas la mi lta bar/_/
[\[326b\]]
[\[326b.1\]]gom pa bdun ni 'dor byed na/_/bsod nams phung po de la ni/_/snga mas rin gyi char mi phod/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tog sna tshogs kyi tshe 'khor los sgyur ba mu khyud kyis sna drangs nas/_gling bzhi pa'i mi ril rab tu 'byung ba dang /_ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras dang dpag bsam gyi
[\[326b.2\]]shing yang byung /_g.yog kyang lhas byas so/_/chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa bstan pa las/_'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba bkod pa na/_mi rnams kyi bza' ba dang btung ba yid la bsams pa tsam gyis 'byor par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas rnams ni/_chos
[\[326b.3\]]kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin dbyer med pa nyid kyis chos ston par mdzad kyi/_skye ba med pa 'gag pa med pa nas/_mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par ni mi mdzad de/_bcom ldan 'das rnams ni de ltar chos ston par mdzad do/_/mar me dbul ba las de bzhin gshegs
[\[326b.4\]]pa la mchod pa'i bsam pas mar me tha na glog gi rgyun tsam mam/_tha na them skas kyi gzhi gcig tsam yang snang bar byed na/_de'i rnam par smin pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsam par mi nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mar me phul na 'chi
[\[326b.5\]]ba'i tshe snang ba bzhi 'thob ste/_gang zhe na mdun na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang /_zla ba 'char ba dang /_lha'i 'khor gnas pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/mchog tu rnyed par dkon pa ni lnga ste/_mir skye ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la
[\[326b.6\]]rab tu 'byung ba dang /_de la mngon par dga' ba dang /_tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_zag pa zad pa'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa lnga las/_byang chub sems dpa' nam yang 'gog pa'i snyom par 'jug pa la mi 'jug ste/_'jug par de bzhin gshegs pas kyang
[\[326b.7\]]ma gnang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa'i dus dang skabs de ni phyir 'ong bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe byang chub kyi snying po la 'dun par 'gyur ba de ni de'i dus dang skabs yin no/_/'du shes dang tshor ba thams cad las bzla ba'i phyir de la
[\[327a\]]
[\[327a.1\]]snyoms par zhugs te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis pa skor bar byed do/_/mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad la ni/_snyoms par yang 'jug pa 'byung
[\[327a.2\]]sems can gang dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir/_bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed du sems can rnams sam/_nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin la/_sbyin pa de la byang chub sems dpa' bsams te/_rjes su yi rangs nas
[\[327a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bsngo na/_de la bsod nams snga mas dpe dang char yang mi phod do/_/mi zhig chom rkun gyis ya nga ba las/_phyis de 'ongs pa ni bla'i bcom ste myur du
[\[327a.4\]]'ongs pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/de bzhin du ring mo zhig ste mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni bla'i/_nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/gang pos gsol pa/_mi shes pa ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lags te/_sus kyang ma bskyed lags so/_/rgyu
[\[327a.5\]]tshogs shing 'dus pa las 'byung la rgyu ma mchis par gyur pas ni 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/chos rnams ni rang gi ngang gis 'gags pas na sus kyang 'gag pa ma mchis so/_/dngos po 'di dag sgyu ma lta bur mi shes pas de dag las shas cher zhen par gyur te/_yongs su mi
[\[327a.6\]]gtong ba'i blor 'gyur/_yongs su mi gtong bas ser sna 'dzin to/_/ser sna des kyang ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/_dngos po de dang 'brel par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug tu ni gnad la gnas par
[\[327a.7\]]ni ma gnang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha tshe ring po rnams su skye bar dogs pas te/_'dod par skyes na myur du thams cad mkhyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyal po las/_bka' stsal pa/_rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod de/_de ni byang chub
[\[327b\]]
[\[327b.1\]]sems dpar gyur pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbyangs las blangs te thob pa'i mod la yang sa bcu thob par gyur la/_srog chags stong phrag du mas kyang chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol
[\[327b.2\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs mthu chen po bstan par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di bka' stsal pa/_tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya/_dza ya ba ha/_kha ba ha/_hu lu hu lu/_pad+ma b+he/_a ba ma ba me/_sa rA sa rA Ne/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_de ba tA a
[\[327b.3\]]nu pA la Na/_yut+tot+tA ra Ni/_pa ra tsa kra ni bar Ni/_pu ra ya b+ha ga bA na/_sarba A sha na/_ma ma sarba karma k+Sha pa ya/_bud+d+ha a ti sha ne Na swAhA/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni rgyal ba can zhes bya ba'i gzungs yin te/_sdig pa thams cad zad par byed pa nor dang 'bru rnam par 'phel bar byed pa/_pha
[\[327b.4\]]rol gyi dmag tshogs zlog par byed pa/_mu ge'i gnod pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa tshe nur bar byed pa ste/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yab yum dang 'dra ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes gzungs sngags kyi
[\[327b.5\]]tshig 'di dag smras so/_/na maH sarba ta thA ga tA nAM/_na mo a mi ta b+hA ya ta thA ga tA ya/_na maHsarba bo d+hi satwA nAn/_na maHsarba ma harte ke b+h+yaH/_tad+ya thA/_hu hu he he/_ma ti ma ti/_ma hA badzra ma ti/_dr-i D+ha pa ra badzra ma ti/_ta thA ga ta/_a nu pa ri ba le Ti/_sa ra sa
[\[327b.6\]]ra a yo khi/_b+h+r-i ku Ti/_b+h+r-i ku Ti mu khi/_kri pi kri pa lu ke_/sa t+ya pA tsa na/_ma nu sma ra b+ha ga bAn/_badzra pA Ni sarba karma/_A pa ra Ni k+Sha ba ya/_sarba ar+tha ma pa ri pU rA ya/_de hi me ba ram/_bud+d+ha sa t+yen/_bo d+hi satwa sa t+ye na swA hA/_gang la la bdag mthong bar 'tshal ba dang /_
[\[327b.7\]]stobs kyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_khams rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang /_lus mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang /_nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal ba des ni/_zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la/_nyin
[\[328a\]]
[\[328a.1\]]mtshan du smyung ba bgyis la/_gzugs bgyid du stsal te/_rdo rje 'chang gi gzugs 'od ma mda' rgyu'i mdog can dang /_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_zhi ba'i tshul can sku gdung dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/dbus su ni de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa
[\[328a.2\]]bzhugs par bgyi'o/_/g.yas logs su ni 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lag ba bzhi pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_sku gdung dang bcas pa gzhag go/_/g.yas g.yon dag tu ni rgyal po chen po bzhi mchod pa bgyid pa gzhag go/_/sgrub pa
[\[328a.3\]]po'i rigs kyi bu des kyang gtsang sbra bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /_dus lnga'i bar du zas su nas kyi 'o thug 'tshal zhing /_dus gsum bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/bdug pa ni a ka ru dang /_tsan+dan dang /_pog dang gu gul dbul lo/_/lan sum
[\[328a.4\]]'bum gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis te/_de ni 'di ltar gzugs brnyan bgyi ba lags so/_/sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten nam/_dgon pa'i gnas su spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog sna tshogs dang /_ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang mchod par bgyi'o/_/dkar
[\[328a.5\]]bag gi lha bshos kyang dbul bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi rnam pa 'di yang yi ger 'drir stsal zhing gos dang rgyan dang lhab lhub dang /_gdugs dang bzhon pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod par bgyi'o/_/de nas zla ba nya ba tshes bco lnga'i bar du sems can thams cad la
[\[328a.6\]]snying rje'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_dus gsum du khrus bgyi ba dang /_dus gsum du gos brje bar bgyi ste/_dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ba lang gi lci bas bskus la me tog sna tshogs kyis khebs par bgyis te/_bum pa gang ba bcu drug dang /_mar me bcu drug kyang gzhag
[\[328a.7\]]par bgyi'o/_/gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis kyang sa phyogs de brgyan par bgyi'o/_/ro sna tshogs sbyar ba'i lha bshos rgya chen po phab la spos chab kyis phyogs der chag chag btab nas/_nam sku gzugs dang sa gzhi 'gul ba dang /_bdag nyid kyang dga'
[\[328b\]]
[\[328b.1\]]bar gyur pa'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o/_/de nas nges 'di ni gcig tu nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam du shes par bgyi'o/_/de nas de'i 'og tu bdag gi rmi lam du bstan par bgyi zhing 'bel ba'i gtam bgyi'o/_/bsam pa thams cad kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/bu gcig pa
[\[328b.2\]]bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/_/dam pa ci 'tshal ba yang stsal bar bgyi ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ma dad cing spang bar bgyid pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das
[\[328b.3\]]spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bgyi ba/_ci'i slad du de skad ces bgyi lags/_bka' stsal pa/_gang gi phyir 'di ltar 'jig rten thams cad lta bar byed/_rtog par byed/_tshim par byed/_yongs su skyong bar byed/_yang dag par dbugs 'byin
[\[328b.4\]]par byed cing /_snying rje'i sems dang /_bde ba'i sems dang /_byams pa'i sems dang /_snying brtse ba'i sems dang ldan la/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas na/_de'i phyir spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces bya'o/_/nam mkha' mdzod las/_byang chub sems
[\[328b.5\]]dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa nges pa'i don blta dka' ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstan cing bsngags pa 'di kun chub
[\[328b.6\]]pa dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa de dag bsod nams ci tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/_de nas sangs rgyas kyis/_bsod nams dpag tu med par gsungs/_/rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/_/chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o/_/rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni
[\[328b.7\]]rab phyed sku mnyam yang /_/gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas/_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston/_/chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste/_/
[\[329a\]]
[\[329a.1\]]byed med ngo bo nyid med kun du rtog las skyes/_/bde bar gshegs pa de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su/_/byang chub mi 'gyur zhi ba bla na med pa brnyes/_/de la rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye
[\[329a.2\]]shes la mkhas shing /_mthar lta ba thams cad dang bral ba yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/_gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ci yang ma yin te/_gang rkyen la brten pa de dngos po med pa'o/_/gang rkyen la brten pa de
[\[329a.3\]]yongs su ma grub pa'o/_/gang rkyen la brten pa de/_bdag med/_sems can med/_srog med/_gso ba med/_skyes bu med/_gang zag med/_shed las skyes pa med/_shed bu med do/_/gang rkyen la brten pa de la yang dag par na gang yang skyes pa med do/_/chos
[\[329a.4\]]gang rkyen la brten pa de la spros pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir spros pa med pa ma spros pa ni/_skye ba ni yang chos nyid skye/_'gag pa ni yang chos nyid 'gag_/ces bya ste/_de la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_shed bu'i bar gang yang med do/_/chos gang rkyen las byung ba de dag
[\[329a.5\]]la bdag po med pa'i phyir skye ba gang yang med de/_de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang shing dang rtsig pa dang /_rmi lam dang mig yor lta bu zhes bya'o/_/ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba la yang bskyed pa med/_'gag pa la yang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du/_rkyen
[\[329a.6\]]rnams yod na skye ba dang /_ma tshang na 'gag par 'gyur ba ma gtogs par nang gi chos rnams kyang skye ba la bskyed pa med/_'gag pa la 'gog par byed pa med de/_/de ltar ye shes la rab tu sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo /_/de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/_mtha' zhes
[\[329a.7\]]bya ba ni rtag pa dang chad pa ste/_gang de la skye bar yang mi byed/_'jig par yang mi byed do/_/gang skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa de ni/_rtag pa dang chad pa med pa'o/_/de bas na dag pa ste/_mthar lta ba thams cad rnam par dag pa yin no/_/de ltar na rten cing 'brel par
[\[329b\]]
[\[329b.1\]]'byung ba dang /_'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas shing /_mthar lta ba thams cad dang 'brel ba yin no/_/theg pa chung ngu 'dod pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/byang chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis rab tu gnyer/_/byang chub spyod
[\[329b.2\]]mchog yin par spyod par bgyi/_/'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi/_/dper na nam mkha' la gnyen po med pa de bzhin du/_chos thams cad la yang gnyen po med do/_/gang dag gnyen pos mya ngan las 'das pa tshol ba de dag ni/_skye ba dang 'jig par lta ba
[\[329b.3\]]yin te/_chos 'di dag ni bskyed par bya zhes skye ba dang 'jig pa la spyod pas/_de dag mya ngan las 'das pa'i mnyam pa nyid mi shes so/_/de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad ces shes par gyis shig_/ma rtsod cig_/rtsod pa med pa ni dge sbyong gi yon tan gyi mchog
[\[329b.4\]]rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig ces gsungs so/_/dmigs pa dag la rab gnas pa/_/bdud kyi pho nya bdud kyi phyogs/_/dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i/_/dge slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/ngang tshul ngan pa sdig chos can/_/khyim pa dang ni rten cing gnas/_/bkur
[\[329b.5\]]sti dag dang rnyed la brkam/_/tshul 'di tshol bar mi byed do/_/'jig rten rgyang pan rnams dang 'dre/_/bdag la rab tu stod byed cing /_/rab tu nges pa rnams la smod/_/mi mkhas nga rgyal can dag 'byung /_/dgon pa'i gnas ri spangs nas su/_/rtag tu 'du 'dzi rnams la dga'/_/'jig
[\[329b.6\]]rten pa yi gsang tshig brtson/_/'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas/_/mi mkhas de dag dge 'dun la/_/zhal ta byed la rab tu brtson/_/mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du/_/mthun par dpyod par mi byed de/_/rang rang gis ni smra rnams la/_/de dag rtag tu mos par byed/_/dmigs pa
[\[329b.7\]]yis ni rab tu 'gying /_/lta ba tha dad kun du gnas/_/stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas/_/de dag g.yang sa bzhin du sems/_/'di 'dra ba yi dus 'di na/_/don bcas yi ge ldan pa yin/_/legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni/_/rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/chos rnams la
[\[330a\]]
[\[330a.1\]]ni gnas pa las/_/ded la 'dra ba'i chos rnams ni/_/ji lta bur na yod med ces/_/gshed ma dag kyang 'gyed par 'gyur/_bdag cag ming gi dge sbyong ste/_/dge sbyong yon tan med do zhes/_/yang dag bskul ba thob pa dang /_/mdo sde 'di la smon par
[\[330a.2\]]'gyur/_/rna ba dang ni sna chad rnams/_/me long bltas kyang mi sdug ces/_/yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang /_/de dag dam chos smon par 'gyur/_/dge sbyong gang dag dam pa'i chos/_/rab tu 'dzin pa 'byung 'gyur te/_/de dag gzhan du tshul 'chos kyang /_/gang yang chos 'di
[\[330a.3\]]mi nyan to/_/rgyal po rnams kyang slu bar bgyi/_/skye bo phal chen 'byed 'gyur yang /_/sangs rgyas kyi ni byin rlabs kyis/_/sems can de dag chos nyan 'gyur/_/dus de tshe na bdag cag rnams/_/sems can rnams la phan slad du/_/lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste/_/
[\[330a.4\]]dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi/_/byang chub sems dpa'i las ni bzhi ste/_bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar gcod pa dang /_pha rol rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun par zil gyis mnan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs
[\[330a.5\]]su bzung ba'o/_/las bzhi po de dag kyang las gcig gis yongs su bsdus te/_gang gis she na/_'di lta ste/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha' las chos zab mo ston pa'i
[\[330a.6\]]tshigs su bcad pa mang po zhig grag pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ngo mtshar dang ldan pas nam mkha' mdzod la smras pa/_sgra 'di dag ga las byung snyam bdag ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/_brag ca'i
