[\[330a.7\]]sgra ga las byung /_smras pa/_pha rol gyi sgra go bar byed pa las byung ngo /_/smras pa/_brag ca las lus sam sems sam/_gzugs sam kha dog dang /_dbyibs gang yang yod dam/_smras pa/_med pa de bzhin te/_brag ca ma grub kyang go bar byed pa de bzhin du nam mkha'
[\[330b\]]
[\[330b.1\]]ma grub ste/_sgra dang skad go bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_sgra 'di go bar byed pa su/_gang nas dbyangs 'di byung /_smras pa/_ye shes kyi go bar byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_ngas yid kyi sems pas bsams na/_bde bar snang ba 'di las byung yang
[\[330b.2\]]sems der 'gro ba yang med/_de 'di ltar 'ong ba yang med mod kyi/_sgra'i sgra brnyan yang 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji tsam du zab pa ltos/_gang rgyu las 'bras bu 'byung yang /_rgyu 'bras bu gru par mi 'pho la/_rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung
[\[330b.3\]]ba ma yin no/_/'di lta ste/_rgyu rkyen las 'bras bu 'grub pa'i chos 'di gnyis ka yang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do/_/gang de lta bu'i 'du ba shes pa de dag ni 'bral ba ste/_ci'i phyir zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang gang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba
[\[330b.4\]]zhes gsungs so/_/gtsug na rin po ches zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa brgyad de gang zhe na/_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis tshul mi 'chos pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor bas kha gsag
[\[330b.5\]]med pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis chog shes pas gzhogs slong mi byed pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pas 'phags pa'i rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_dgon pa la gnas pa rjes su mi gtong bas lus la mi lta ba
[\[330b.6\]]dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas srog la mi lta ba dang /_'du 'dzi spong bas gcig pur dga' ba dang /_khams gsum thams cad kyis 'jigs pas chos kyi dpa' ba mos pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/_pha rol tu 'gro bar gsungs
[\[330b.7\]]te/_de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma thams cad dang /_dmigs pa thams cad dang /_sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu song bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de'i shes rab yongs su dag pa gnyis te/_gang zhe na/_chags pa med
[\[331a\]]
[\[331a.1\]]pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid yongs su dag pa'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_rig sa kyi bu mngon par shes pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/_zag pa med pa'i ye shes kyi tshig bla dgas so/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni mngon par
[\[331a.2\]]shes pa lnga po 'di dag gis/_rnam par rol cing zag pa med pa'i ye shes la yang rab tu gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i chos bzhi dang ldan na/_sems can yongs su smin par byed nus te/_bzhi ni mi skyo ba dang /_bdag bde ba la mi chags pa dang /_dus dang dus
[\[331a.3\]]ma yin par bskul ba dang /_bsam pa yongs su shes pa'o/_/yang bzhi ste/_bka' blo bde ba dang /_snyan par smra ba dang /_ngang tshul mnyen pa dang /_bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/_rnam pa gnyis dang
[\[331a.4\]]ldan pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o/_/gnyis ni mi sdug pa dang /_sdug par so sor rtog pa'o/_/de la mi sdug pa ni kye ma lus 'di mi gtsang bas gang ba/_yun thung ba/_byis pa 'drid pa'o snyam mo/_/sdug pa ni lus 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku/_chos kyi sku/_
[\[331a.5\]]bsod nams kyi sku/_ye shes kyi sku/_rdo rje'i sku/_mi shigs pa'i sku/_zag pa med pa'i sku gzugs mthong na/_sems can thams cad tshim par 'gyur ba thob par bya'o snyam mo/_/yang rnam pa gnyis te/_mi rtag pa dang /_rtag pa'i rnam par ro/_/de la mi rtag pa'i
[\[331a.6\]]rnam par ni/_kye ma lus 'di mi rtag pa/_'jig pa'i chos can yin pas/_lus kyi phyir ya nga bas mi 'tshe'o/_/rtag pa ni lus kyi rjes su lta zhing gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad/_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdud mi 'chad pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs
[\[331a.7\]]su bskyab pa'i phyir/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'o/_/dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pas/_phyin ci log bzhi spong ste/_lus kyi gtsang ba spong /_tshor bas bde ba/_sems kyis rtag pa/_chos kyis bdag tu phyin ci log pa spong ba'o/_/
[\[331b\]]
[\[331b.1\]]gser 'od dam pa las/_sku la rus pa khrag med na/_/ring bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/thabs kyi ring bsrel gzhag pa mdzad/_/skabs gzhan dag tu mya ngan las 'das pa dang /_ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag
[\[331b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa ste/_sems can rnams kyis mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu yin par blta bar bya'o/_/de la gang zhig mchod pa dang rim gro byed pa
[\[331b.3\]]de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_mi khom pa brgyad yongs su spangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang phrad cing dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi stor ba dang /_bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel ba dang /_'khor ba las myur
[\[331b.4\]]du 'da' zhing 'khor ba'i 'ching bas glags par mi 'gyur ba'i spyod pa dam pa 'di yin pas khyed kyis nan tan du sgrub cing g.yel ba med par bya'o/_/de kho na nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid tsam du gnas pa de ni/_chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/_/sku snga ma gnyis
[\[331b.5\]]ni btags pa tsam mo/_/chos kyi sku ni yang dag pa ste/_sku de nyid kyi gzhi byed do/_/ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rnam par
[\[331b.6\]]rtog pa'i sems la brten nas/_nyon mongs pa dang las dang 'bras bu rnam pa mang po ston pa bzhin du/_chos kyi chos nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/_theg pa gsum gyi chos rnams sna tshogs ston to/_/dper na nyi ma dang zla ba
[\[331b.7\]]la yang rtog pa med/_chu dang me long la yang rtog pa med/_snang ba la yang rtog pa med mod kyi/_gsum 'dus pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la yang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/_smon lam
[\[332a\]]
[\[332a.1\]]gyi dbang gis sems can skal ba can dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_sprul pa'i sku yang nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan bzhin du rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na tshad med grangs med pa'i chu dang
[\[332a.2\]]me long dag ni snang ba la brten nas stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag snang ngo /_/stong pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/de bzhin du longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i skus ni 'khor rnams la chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par
[\[332a.3\]]smon lam gyi dbang gis sku de gnyis snang ste/_mtshan ma sna tshogs su snang yang chos kyi sku'i gnas pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu sku de nyid la gnas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya
[\[332a.4\]]ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs so/_/chos kyi sku la gnas te/_phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsungs so/_/sku 'di gsum la brten nas/_sangs rgyas rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu sangs
[\[332a.5\]]rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku ni so so'i skye bo'i yid dang mthun par rnam pa mang pos mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'i phyir mang po zhes bya'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa gcig pas mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir gcig ces bya'o/_/chos kyi sku ni mtshan
[\[332a.6\]]ma sna tshogs las yang dag par 'das pa mtshan mar gzung ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa ste/_de bas na gcig pa yang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sprul pa'i sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten te snang ngo /_/longs spyod rdzogs
[\[332a.7\]]pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku la brten te snang ngo /_/chos kyi sku yang dag pa ste ci la yang mi gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu sku de gsum ni rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod/_mi rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod do/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang
[\[332b\]]
[\[332b.1\]]so so yang dag par rig pa la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos brgyad cu/_gser dang chu dang nam mkha' dag dri ma dang rnyog pa dang sprin dang bral na gser la sogs pa med pa yin pa bzhin du/_chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'i phyir/_rnam par dag
[\[332b.2\]]pa zhes bya ba'i sku nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/rnam par rtog pa yod par snang yang ngo bo nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa yang med do/_/gsum du bgrang ba yod mod kyi/_dngos po gsum du yang med de 'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa de ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma
[\[332b.3\]]dang smig rgyu lta bu ste/_gzung ba yang med 'dzin pa yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do/_/lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/_/snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba ste/_/yang dag ma yin yongs su
[\[332b.4\]]rtog las byung /_/grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/_/chos rnams 'di dag thams cad stong pa ste/_/ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/_/'byung ba chen po 'di dag ches 'byung min/_/ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/_/gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi
[\[332b.5\]]'byung ba/_/de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/_/yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la/_/ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/_/ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/_/de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/_/rdo rje ri rab chen po'i rtse mo'i khang ba brtsegs
[\[332b.6\]]pa'i gzungs las/_yongs su brtags pa yin pa'i phyir brtags pa yang stong pa'o/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir/_gzhan gyi dbang nyid kyang stong pa'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang stong pa'o/_/glo bur du rgyu
[\[332b.7\]]dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa'i phyir/_'byung ba'i bdag nyid kyis stong ngo /_/de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/_rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo /_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa gang yin pa de mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/sku gsum rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba de
[\[333a\]]
[\[333a.1\]]ni tshogs gnyis kyis sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba las/_byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus gcig cing tha mi dad pas gzugs kyi lus mtha' yas pa'i
[\[333a.2\]]sgo kun du ston pa sha stag 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi lha'i bu mo bzang mo'i dbugs gcig
[\[333a.3\]]gis lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra yan lag brgya phrag stong dang ldan pa'i nga ro 'byung ste/_sgra de byung ba ni sgra rnam pa tha dad pa brgya phrag stong gi dbyangs su grag go/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gcig 'byung yang sems can gyi bsam pa
[\[333a.4\]]bzhin tshad med pa'i sgra rnam par grag go/_/dper na 'og gi chu'i phung po nye bar bzung ba yan chad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po thams cad nam mkha' la gnas te/_gzugs med pa la
[\[333a.5\]]spyod pa'i sems can gyi gnas dang /_'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can gyi gnas ji snyed pa de dag thams cad nam mkha' la gnas shing /_nam mkha'i dbyings las byung ba'o/_/dper na ri mo'i gzhi chen po stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam
[\[333a.6\]]zhig yod par gyur la/_gzhi de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po ril gyis rdzogs par bris te/_'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang gi tshad dang /_gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang dang /_gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha'i gzhal med khang gi
[\[333a.7\]]tshad la sogs pa de'i tshad du bris la/_ri mo'i gzhi de rdul phra rab gcig gi nang du chud par byas pa sems can gang gis kyang mthong ba'am/_shes par ma gyur la 'phrul gyi mig can 'ga' zhig gis mthong nas/_rdul de phye ste sems can la bstan te
[\[333b\]]
[\[333b.1\]]phan btags pa zhig yod na/_de dang 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba yang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ril gyis chud par gnas pa byis pas mi shes pas mi shes pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs
[\[333b.2\]]pas byis pa'i 'du shes kyi mdud pa bkrol nas/_ye shes khong du chud cing mnyam pa nyid rtogs par byed pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_dpe 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes 'byung ba shes par bya'o/_/dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po las/_byams ma'i bu gang po
[\[333b.3\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nang na song med/_bud med kyang med do/_/sems can de dag thams cad rdzus te skye bar tshangs par spyod pa yid las byung ba'i lus 'od rang la yod pa/_
[\[333b.4\]]rdzu 'phrul can nam mkha' la 'gro ba lus gser gyi mdog can skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par 'gyur ba'o/_/skyes bu dam pa bcu drug la/_bzang skyong /_dkon mchog 'byung gnas/_ded dpon bzang po/_/mis byin/_phug sbas/_chus byin/_dbang pos byin/_bla ma'i blo gros/_khyad
[\[333b.5\]]par blo gros/_'phel ba'i blo gros/_mthong ba don yod/_shin tu yang dag zhugs/_rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa/_dpe med blo gros/_nyi ma'i snying po/_sa 'dzin/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gi zham ring ba dang lhan cig tu bdag dang gcig gam bdag dang gnyis mi mjed kyi
[\[333b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs so/_/de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di rin po che'i shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur to/_/bai DUr+ya'i gzhi la rin po che sna bdun dang gser gyi dra bas bres/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/_me tog sna
[\[333b.7\]]tshogs bkram pa/_gser gyi skud pas mig mangs ris su bres par gyur te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor yang med par gyur/_ri nag po yang med par gyur/_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen
[\[334a\]]
[\[334a.1\]]po dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po dang /_ri rab kyang med par gyur/_ri rab chen po dang /_ri gzhan yang med par gyur/_rgya mtsho yang med par gyur/_'bab chu dang /_'bab chu chen po yang med par yongs su gnas par gyur to/_/lha
[\[334a.2\]]dang mi dang lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyang med par gyur/_sems can dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten yang med par gyur to/_/'di ltar de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'khor 'gro ba drug tu skyes pa'i sems can de dag thams cad
[\[334a.3\]]'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu bkod par gyur te/_gang dag 'khor der 'dus pa de dag ma gtogs so/_/'du shes phyin ci log las byung bar de ltar 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu chos thams cad la lta zhing gnas pa
[\[334a.4\]]'dis gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po spyod yul la gnas pa yin no/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'chad 'dod chos smra bas/_/g.yo dang nga rgyal de bzhin 'phya ba dag_/ma lus par ni yongs su spang bar bya/_/de bzhin mkhas pas phrag dog gzhan mi bya/_/
[\[334a.5\]]nam du su la 'ang mi snyan brjod mi bya/_/lta bas rtsod pa nam yang mi bya'o/_/bla med ye shes thob par mi 'gyur zhes/_/the tshom gnas ni nams kyang mi bya'o/_/'jam dpal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos bstan pa'i mchog ste/_chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtha'o/_/chos kyi
[\[334a.6\]]rnam grangs thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zab ste/_'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa'o/_/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas lhags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig gis chos kyi rnam grangs
[\[334a.7\]]'di de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa dang mi mjed 'dir bstan pa la sogs par bgyi bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gdams su gsol zhes bya ba dang /_bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis bya ci dgos/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na ngas
[\[334b\]]
[\[334b.1\]]smin par byas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag gang gA'i klung drug cu'i bye ma snyed yod de de dag ston pa la sogs pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/de skad gsungs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig sa rum nas 'thon te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
[\[334b.2\]]mang dang /_shAkya thub pa dang phyogs bcu nas gshegs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sa rum nas 'thon nas bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu rdzogs par 'das kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
[\[334b.3\]]la phyag 'tshal zhing byang chub sems dpa'i bstod pa rnam pa du mas bstod do/_/bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/'khor bzhi po de dag kyang bar gyi bskal pa lnga bcu po de dag la cang mi smra bar 'khod
[\[334b.4\]]par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad do/_/rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis phyi dro gcig kho na snyam du shes so/_/rtag tu nga byin rlabs de
[\[334b.5\]]'dra ste/_/bskal pa bsam yas bye ba stong du ni/_/bya rgod phung po 'di las mi 'pho yang /_/gud na 'ang bye ba snyed kyi mal cha yod/_/gang tshe 'jig rten khams 'di sems can gyi/_/bskal pas bsreg par mthong zhing rtog pa ni/_/de tshe nga yi sangs rgyas zhing 'di
[\[334b.6\]]ni/_/lha dang mi yis yongs su gang bar 'gyur/_/de dag rtse zhing dga' ba sna tshogs ldan/_/skyed mos khang bzangs gzhal med che ba yod/_/rin chen ri bo rnams dang de bzhin du/_/me tog 'bras ldan shing ljon rnams kyis brgyan/_/steng nas lha rnams rnga chen rab tu brdung /_/
[\[334b.7\]]man+dA ra yi char kyang rab tu 'bebs/_/mkhas pa gzhan gang byang chub 'dir zhugs dang /_/nga dang nyan thos rnams las mngon par 'thob/_/nga yi zhing 'di de ltar rtag gnas kyang /_/gzhan dag 'di la bskal pas bsreg par rtog_/mya ngan brgya yis gang zhing
[\[335a\]]
[\[335a.1\]]gtses pa dang /_/'jig rten khams ni shin tu 'jigs par mthong /_/lo mang bye bar de bzhin gshegs rnams dang /_/chos dang nga yi dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi/_/ming ni nams kyang thos par mi 'gyur te/_/sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu de
[\[335a.2\]]'dra'o/_/nam zhig sems can 'jam zhing mnyen pa rnams/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'dir ni skyes gyur te/_/dge ba'i las kyis de ltar skyes ma thag_/da ni chos rnams rab tu 'chad par mthong /_/de bzhin gshegs pa sku tshe dpag tu med/_/mya ngan las 'da' bar
[\[335a.3\]]bstan pa thams cad yin par bshad pa'i rjes la bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas mos par byed pa de'i tshe/_de'i lhag pa'i
[\[335a.4\]]bsam pa'i mtshan nyid 'di yin par rig par bya ste/_'di lta ste/_bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la 'dug ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis blta ba dang /_nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na 'dug
[\[335a.5\]]cing chos ston par mthong ba dang /_nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gzhi bai DUr+ya las grub cing mnyam par gnas la/_gser skud mig mangs ris su bres shing rin po che'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis rnam par bkra bar mthong ba dang /_
[\[335a.6\]]'di ni yongs su spyad pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' dag gnas par mthong ba ste/_ma pham pa 'di ni lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya'o/_/rigs
[\[335a.7\]]kyi bu dag mdor na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo'i gnas thams cad ngas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las bshad do/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag
[\[335b\]]
[\[335b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di 'dod pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la rkang pa'i mthe bong 'bar bar bya'o/_/lag pa'i sor mo'am/_rkang pa'i sor mo gcig gam/_yan lag gcig gam/_lag pa 'bar bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la
[\[335b.2\]]zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ni bsod nams 'du byed pa ches mang du bskyed kyi/_rgyal srid dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gtang ba ni de lta ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa'i
[\[335b.3\]]mdo sde thams cad kyi nang na dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchog tu gyur pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang pos gsol pa/_su chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de bsrung ba'i phyir/_bdag glang po che dkar po mche ba drug pa
[\[335b.4\]]'tshal te der mchi'o/_/de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_bsti stang du byas btsun par byas te/_nges par bstan pa chen po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa chen po byang chub
[\[335b.5\]]sems dpa' la gdams pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar bshad do/_/nam mkha'i spyan las/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gang de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la bslab pa'i
[\[335b.6\]]khrims su bca' ba 'cha' bar 'gyur ba'i rkyen de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_gang zag gnod mi bkur ba rnams tshar gcad pa'i phyir dang /_ngo tsha shes pa rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /_tshe 'di'i zag pa rnams spang ba'i phyir dang /_tshe phyi ma'i
[\[335b.7\]]zag pa rnams bsdams pa'i phyir dang /_nga'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gang zag lam gol bar zhugs pa kha cig la ni lus dub pa spyad pa'i chad pa bca'o/_/kha cig la ni yid du mi 'ong ba dang 'phrad pa'i chad pa'o/_/kha cig la ni mtshams
[\[336a\]]
[\[336a.1\]]kyi phyi rol du dbyung zhing tha dad du gnas par bya ba'i chad pa'o/_/kha cig la ni dge slong gi tha mar gzhag pa'i chad pa'o/_/kha cig la ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa thams cad la bsnyil zhing smad par 'os pa'i chad pa bcad de/_rgyal rigs da
[\[336a.2\]]ltar byung pa khyed dang ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi lag tu nyan thos kyi bslab pa khrims su bca' ba gtod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa la/_gang zag lam gol ba/_gdul dka' ba/_ngo tsha dang /_khrel spangs pa/_
[\[336a.3\]]spyod pa ma dag pa 'byung bar 'gyur la/_gang dag nye du'i stobs sam/_nor gyi stobs sam/_khyim pa'i dpung ngam/_mang du thos pa'i stobs sam/_kha stobs kyis bslab pa dag la skyon yod par spyod cing /_khyim na gnas pa'i rtags dang /_khyim gyi
[\[336a.4\]]longs spyod dag la snang la yongs su gzung ba bsdus pa de dag dge slong don nyung ngu rnams kyis myur du dge 'dun gyi nang nas bskrad pa dang /_bslab pa ji ltar bcad pa bzhin chad pas gcad par mi nus pas/_de dag bslab pa'i khrims su
[\[336a.5\]]bca' ba bzhin bya bar rgyal rigs kyi lag tu gtad de/rgyal rigs de dag gang zag de lta bu rnams la ji ltar khrims bcas pa bzhin chad pas gcod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus lnga brgya tha ma'i bar du de lta bu'i
[\[336a.6\]]brtson pa dang /_pha rol gnon pas nga'i bstan pa bsrung zhing yongs su skyong ba dang /_chos kyi tshul 'bar bar byed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba yin te/_lha rnams kyang bsrung
[\[336a.7\]]zhing yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs de dag ni rgyal srid kyang yun ring du byed du 'jug go/_/bsod nams kyang shin tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bskal pa brgyar byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs gang dag da ltar dang ma 'ongs
[\[336b\]]
[\[336b.1\]]pa'i dus na nga'i bstan pa yal bar 'dor zhing 'dug pa'i rgyal rigs de dag ni lha thams cad kyis bor ba yin/_nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba thams cad kyis kyang yongs su gtang ba yin te/_rgyal rigs de ni 'jig rten pha rol tu phyin pa lha dang mir skye ba yang med do/_/
[\[336b.2\]]gang nga'i bstan pa yal bar 'dor ba de ni dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gcod par zhugs pa yin/_chos kyi sgron ma gsad par zhugs pa yin/_chos kyi chu bskam par zhugs pa yin/_sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig 'byin par zhugs pa yin
[\[336b.3\]]no/_/rgyal po chen po de ji snyam du sems/_gang zag gang zhig sems can thams cad kyi mig 'byin par byed na/_gang zag de bsod nams ma yin pa ji tsam zhig dang ldan par 'gyur/_rgyal po gzugs can snying pos mchi ma blags te 'di skad ces gsol
[\[336b.4\]]to/_/gang zag de ni bsod nams ma lags pa zla ma mchis pa grangs ma mchis pa/_tshad ma mchis pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po de bas rgyal rigs gang dag da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_nga'i
[\[336b.5\]]bstan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa 'bar gyi bar du gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams mi srun zhing lam gol ba la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams chos bzhin mi slob pa de dag la bsod nams ma yin pa ches mang du
[\[336b.6\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_rgyal rigs des snga ma bskal ba brgyar sbyin pa byin/_tshul khrims bsrungs pa nas shes rab bsgoms pa'i bar du gyur la/_theg pa gsum las theg pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis zhugs par gyur na/_yang dam pa'i chos yal
[\[336b.7\]]bar 'dor ba'i rgyus de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bsags pa de dag thams cad yongs su zad cing gtugs par 'gyur ro/_/de'i yul du chos gsum du yang 'byung bar 'gyur te/_lo nyes dang /_'thab mo dang /_nad 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lhas kyang yal bar 'dor
[\[337a\]]
[\[337a.1\]]zhing btang bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i yul du bka' mi brtsan zhing g.yo dang slu ba dang /_brdzun sna tshogs kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan gyi dmag gis kyang de'i nor gyi phung po phrogs par 'gyur ro/_/yang na mes tshig par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[337a.2\]]yang na chus khyer bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs de ring por mi thogs par nad tshab po ches thebs nas/_sdug pa yid du 'ong ba dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/shi nas kyang dmyal ba dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/brgya la res 'ga' zhig ring mo zhig na/_legs par spyad pas
[\[337a.3\]]mi nyid thob na myur du mig med pa dang /_longs spyod dang /_nye bar spyod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/nyam nga bar gnas shing yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/shi nas yang dmyal ba dag gi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de gnas ma yin pa yongs su
[\[337a.4\]]brtags pas sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshe yang mi lus mi 'thob po/_/rgyal rigs ji ltar bram ze dang /_rje'u rigs dag kyang de bzhin te/_grong khyer gyi gtso bo'am/_yul gyi gtso bo'am/_ri khrod kyi gtso bo'am/_ljongs kyi gtso bo yang rung /_gang zhig bag med
[\[337a.5\]]pa'i rgyu'am/_nor gyi phyir nga'i bstan pa la chos kyis gnas pa'i gang zag rnams ci nus kyis mi slu zhing lam gol ba la gnas pa'i gang zag rnams chos bzhin dang 'dul ba bzhin tshar mi gcod pa de thams cad las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[337a.6\]]rgyal po gzugs can snying pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang ma mchis pa'i dus na/_rgyal rigs rnams kyis mi nyid 'thob pa ni dka' lags te/_gang dag myos shing bag ma mchis par mang du gnas la/_dam pa'i chos yun ring du
[\[337a.7\]]gnas pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi ba'i slad du chos la gnas pa tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_yon tan gyis phyug pa rnams mchod gnas su mi bgyid pa dang /_lam gol ba la gnas pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba rnams
[\[337b\]]
[\[337b.1\]]chos dang mthun pa'i chad pas mi 'gums pa de dag ni phung bar 'gyur lags so/_/lha'i bu skya rengs ni smon lam gyi dbang gis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du skyes te/_de nyi ma'i mdun dpag tshad khris bcad nas 'gro'o/_/de'i gzhal med khang ni
[\[337b.2\]]dpag tshad nyi shu pa'o/_/de nyin mtshan gcig la gling bzhi dang bar gyi gling brgyad khri dang /_klu'i gling drug khri dang /_lha ma yin gyi gling bzhi khri dang /_nam mkha' lding gi gling brgya dang /_mi'am ci'i gling lnga stong nyis brgya dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gling bzhi stong
[\[337b.3\]]drug brgya dang /_grul bum gyi gling brgyad brgya dang /_yi dgas kyi gling brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_sha za dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po'i gling sum stong dag tu gling re re zhing yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong mang po dag yongs su smin par byed do/_/
[\[337b.4\]]'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i nang shar phyogs kyi cha rgya mtsho chen po ni bai DUr+ya 'ba' zhig gi ri ar+Na pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni chu'i nang nas dpag tshad nyi shu gyen du 'phags so/_/ri de la ri phug shin tu bkra ba zhes bya ba sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas nas gnas/_
[\[337b.5\]]'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba zhig yod de/_phug de na dzan dur gnas so/_/de ni nyan thos dang thun mong gi byams pa legs par sbyang bar byas pa yin no/_/ri phug gnyis pa a ma ra zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad gcig yod de/_phug de na rta'i
[\[337b.6\]]gnas so/_/ri phug gsum pa rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba zhig yod de/_phug de na phyugs gnas so/_/ri de la shing gi lha rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang /_srin mo chen mo mgrin bzangs ma zhes bya ba gnas te/_gnyis ka
[\[337b.7\]]yang 'khor lnga stong lnga stong dang bcas par dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa de gsum gyi sbyin bdag byed cing nyin mtshan rtag tu bkur sti bya bar brtson no/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di na lho phyogs kyi cha rgya mtsho na shel 'ba' zhig gi ri skye bo'i dpal zhes bya ba yod do/_/
[\[338a\]]
[\[338a.1\]]de ni chu'i nang nas dpag tshad nyi shu gyen du 'phags so/_/ri de la ri phug mdog bzangs zhes bya ba rgya dang 'phang du dpag tshad re re la spre'u gnas/_ri phug gnyis pa spra ba'i han bzang po zhes bya ba rgya dang 'phang du dpag tshad
[\[338a.2\]]re re ba la khyim bya gnas/_ri phug gsum pa d+harma pa ha zhes bya brgya dang 'phang du dpag tshad re re ba la khyi gnas/_ri de la sbyin gnas srin mo snang ba dang /_nye snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor lnga stong dang gnas te sbyin bdag byed/_'dzam bu'i gling gi nub phyogs rgya mtsho'i
[\[338a.3\]]nang na gser 'ba' zhig gi ri byang chub kyi zla ba zhes bya ba yod de/_de nas dpag tshad nyi shu nas gyen du 'phags so/_/ri de la ri phug mi lan tra zhes bya ba la 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba la phag gnas so/_/phug gnyis pa dri dpal zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re
[\[338a.4\]]re ba la byi ba gnas/_phug gsum pa ud+ma shrI zhes bya ba 'phang dang rgyar dpag tshad re re ba la glang gnas/_ri de la srin mo chen mo legs srung zhes bya ba dang /_be'u su rA k+Sha zhes bya ba 'khor snga ma snyed dang /_ri de rlung lha g.yog pa zhes bya ba 'khor snga ma snyed dang bcas pa
[\[338a.5\]]snga ma bzhin sbyin bdag byed/_'dzam bu'i gling gi nang byang phyogs kyi cha rgya mtsho na 'dzam bu chu bo 'ba' zhig gi ri tog dpal gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba yod de/_de ni dpag tshad nyi shu chu nas gyen du 'phags so/_/ri de la ri phug a ru na gen go la zhes bya ba tshad snga ma tsam la seng ge
[\[338a.6\]]gnas/_phug gnyis pa laM ka ra zhes bya ba tshad snga ma tsam la ri bong gnas/_phug gsum pa dga' bar 'byung zhes bya ba tshad snga ma tsam la sbrul gnas/_ri de la srin mo dung can ma zhes bya ba dang /_sha ta drang srung zhes bya ba 'khor snga ma snyed dang /_chu lha 'bebs byed ces bya ba 'khor
[\[338a.7\]]snga ma snyed dang /_gnas snga ma bzhin yon bdag byed do/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba bcu gnyis po de dag ni bsod nams che bskal ba che ba yin no/_/smon lam gyi dbang gis nyin mtshan re re zhing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do/_/byi ba dang /_ga ba dang /_stag
[\[338b\]]
[\[338b.1\]]dang /_ri bong dang /_glang po dang /_dzan du dang /_rta dang /_pa shu dang /_spre'u dang /_khyim bya dang /_khyi dang /_phag ste/_de dag ni lha dang mi'i mchod pa yon tan thob pa yin no/_/skad cig ma dang po la ma'i mngal du sa bon gyi rnam par shes ba nur nur por gnas par 'gyur te/_
[\[338b.2\]]dper na yungs kar gyi 'bru'i tshad tsam gyi chung ngu'o/_/zhag bdun pa drug pa la/_nur nur por gyur nas/_mer mer por 'gyur te/_dper na rgya shug gi sa bon tsam du chung ba'i zhag bdun pa las mer mer por gyur nas nar nar bor 'gyur te star ga tsam mo/_/zhag bdun pa brgyad pa la nar
[\[338b.3\]]nar por gyur nas/_gor gor por 'gyur te bil ba'i 'bras bu tsam mo/_/de nas zhag bdun thal nas zhag bdun pa bcu gsum gyi bar du mgo'i mtshan ma dang /_lag pa dang brla dang gnas kyi mtshan ma dag dod par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun pa nyi shu pa la pho dang mo'i mtshan ma dod par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun pa nyi shu
[\[338b.4\]]rtsa gcig pa la rus pa rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/zhag bdun pa sum cu pa la yan lag thams cad dang /_khrag dang /_pags pa dang /_ba spu'i bu ga kun rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas ma'i lto na khrag dang dri mi zhim pa'i nang na gnas so/_/gang ma'i lto na gnas pa na tshe rabs
[\[338b.5\]]snga ma dran nas mchog tu skyo bar 'gyur te/_bdag ma'i lto 'di nas nam 'byung zhig gu/_phyis ma'i mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dge ba dag la brtson 'grus dang /_pha rol gnon pa brtan por bya'o snyam pa las bcas pa dang /_ma'i lus kyis gzir ba dang /_sa'i reg
[\[338b.6\]]pa dang /_lag pa'i reg pa dang /_dri ma bkru ba'i sdug bsngal lus dang sems la mchog tu gnas pa dag gis tshe rabs snga ma ril brjed do/_/de'i tshe lha'i dbang po nas/_sha za'i dbang po'i bar nam mkha' la rgyu ba dang /_sa la rgyu ba thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu
[\[338b.7\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ltar 'tshal te/_ma mchis pa'i dus na ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i chos kyi tshul 'bar shing ji srid du bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos rnams rnam pa thams cad du yongs
[\[339a\]]
[\[339a.1\]]su 'dzin pa ma mchis pas chos la mngon par dga' ba de srid du/_bdag cag gis rang gi sug las btang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsrung bar 'tshal lo/_/chos kyis gnas pa'i gang zag tshul khrims kyis phyug pa yon tan
[\[339a.2\]]phun sum tshogs pa dag dang /_de dag gi 'khor dang yongs su bzung ba thams cad kyang yongs su bsrung zhing bskyang bar 'tshal lo/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das ji srid du/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams rnam pa thams cad du yongs su 'dzin pa
[\[339a.3\]]ma mchis par chos la gnas shing chos dang mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa de sring sa'i mdangs dang /_sems can gyi mdangs dang /_chos kyi mdangs nub par mi 'gyur bar gnas lags so/_/de srid du lha dang /_klu da nga /_gnod sbyin rnams mi'i 'jig rten 'dir mngon par
[\[339a.4\]]dga' lags so/_/de srid du sems can rnams shi 'phos nas/_lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du dbang che bar grags pa dag tu skye bar 'gyur lags so/_/de srid du lha rnams kyi nang na sems can dbang che bar grags pa dag gis gang bar 'gyur lags so/_/de srid du byang
[\[339a.5\]]chub sems dpa' chos kyis gnas pa rnams gnas lags so/_/de srid du bdag cag gi stobs dang brtson pa 'di ltar chos ma lags pa'i phyogs tshar dgum par pha rol gnon par 'gyur lags so/_/de srid du sems can de bzhin gshegs pa'i
[\[339a.6\]]bstan pa la dad par bgyi bar rngo thogs lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa/_rnal 'byor yid la byed pa'i chos kyis gnas pa'i dgon pa dang /_
[\[339a.7\]]nags mtha' dang /_bas mtha'i gnas mal bor ba/_phrag dog can la sogs pa/_mang pos gnas pa/_bslab pa dang ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba/_khyim pa dang 'dre ba/_rnyed pa dang bkur sti la dga' ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags te/_de dag khyim pa'i dpung dang
[\[339b\]]
[\[339b.1\]]nor gyi phung po'i stobs kyis phan tshun snyems shing 'thab mo la dga' bas khyim pa rnams kyi mdun du yang rtsod cing tshig rtsub mo dang /_brdzun dag mi srung lags so/_/de'i tshe khyim pa rgyal rigs dang bram ze nas ljongs dang /_yul na gnas pa'i bar rnams bcom
[\[339b.2\]]ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la che thong du ma dad par 'gyur zhing /_gang dag bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa de dag kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur lags so/_/dkar po'i phyogs zad pa'i dus de lta bu nye bar gnas pan/_byang chub sems
[\[339b.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang thugs dgyes shing /_'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag tu gshegs so/_/lha dang gnod sbyin chos kyis gnas pa dbang che bar grags pa rnams kyang btang snyoms su gnas pa'am/_de nas 'ong bar 'gyur lags te/_
[\[339b.4\]]de'i tshe ni bdag cag gis sdig pa can gyi gnod sbyin dang /_lus srul po nas sdig pa can gyi mi rnams kyi bar bzlog pa'i rdo yang mi thogs la/_de'i tshe bdag cag gis dkar po'i phyogs zad pa dang /_'jigs pa sna tshogs kyang bzlog pa'i rngo mi thogs
[\[339b.5\]]lags so/_/dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa las/_sems can rnams ni gzhan gyi dbang du yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du sgro btags nas/_gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo
[\[339b.6\]]nyid rjes su tha snyad 'dogs te/_ji lta ji ltar rjes su tha snyad btags pas sems yongs su sgom zhing tha snyad btags pa'i rjes su 'brel pa'am/_tha snyad btags pa'i bag la nyal gyis gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags
[\[339b.7\]]pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen to/_/ji lta ji ltar mngon par zhen pa de lta de lta bur gzhan gyi ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu de dang rkyen des phyi ma la gzhan gyi dbang gis ngo bo nyid rab tu bskyed do/_/gzhi des na
[\[340a\]]
[\[340a.1\]]nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum gyis kun nas nyon mongs shing /_'gro ba ris ldar 'khor zhing kun du rgyu ste 'khor ba las mi 'da'o/_/gal te mig gi rnam par shes pa gcig lan cig 'byung bar gyur na rnam par rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa
[\[340a.2\]]mig gi rnam par shes pa dang spyod yul mthun pa gcig kyang lan cig 'byung ngo /_/gal te lan gcig gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang /_lan cig rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga rnams 'byung bar gyur na yang de la rnam par rtog pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa/_
[\[340a.3\]]rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang spyod yul mthun pa gcig kyang lan cig 'byung ngo /_/byams pa gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang /_yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid la rnam pa thams cad du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba'i kun brtags pa'i
[\[340a.4\]]mtshan nyid dang /_shin tu bral ba de la de yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/_theg pa chen po la stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/nyi ma'i snying po las/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di na mchod rten drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[340a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang rgyal ba dang /_nyan thos mang po gnas shing /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang gnas par 'gyur ba ste/_rjes su bstan pa chen po yun ring du gnas par mdzad pa'i phyir drang srong thub pa'i gnas kun rten 'di sngon gyi yang dag
[\[340a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chu lha'i lag tu yongs su gtad pa mdzad do/_/ngas kyang de nyid kyi lag tu yongs su gtad de/_'di yang spro bar 'gyur zhing gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnal 'byor yid la mngon par brtson pa dag yongs su smin par
[\[340a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/gang dag gang zag chos kyis gnas pa rnams la bsnyen bkur la mngon par brtson pa'i sbyin pa po dang /_sbyin bdag de dag kyang yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/klu'i rgyal po chu lhas gsol ba de lta lags so/_/ba long spyod kyi gling na rdul gyi ri la
[\[340b\]]
[\[340b.1\]]drang srong thub pa'i gnas bkra ba klu'i rgyal po rin po che'i 'phel bal chad khyir gtad/_lus 'phags kyi gling na ni ba lang gi na'i ri la drang srong 'byung ba klu'i rgyal po zla srung la gtad/_sgra mi snyan gyi gling na rgyal dga'i ri la spos brtsegs klu'i rgyal po lus 'bigs
[\[340b.2\]]pa'i khab la gtad/_ba lang spyod kyi gling na 'od zer 'byung ba klu'i rgyal po ba lang mgo la gtad/_shar phyogs gling na pad+ma shing n+ya gro d+ha lta bu klu'i rgyal po dbyibs stong la gtad/_sgra mi snyan gyi gling na spos brtsegs 'od zer klu'i rgyal po gnas na rgyu la gtad/_rgya mtsho
[\[340b.3\]]chen po'i nang na nor bu'i snying po'i 'od 'phro ba klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la gtad/_ri rab kyi rtse mo na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas na me tog rab tu rgyas pa'i snying po klu'i rgyal po sa srung gi bu la gtad/_'dzam bu'i gling na dga' 'phel zhes bya ba na gnas brtan gyi phug
[\[340b.4\]]klu'i rgyal po che sbyang la gtad/_yangs pa can na shin tu brtan klu'i rgyal po nor rgyas kyi bu la gtad/_ser skya'i gnas na gser sgron dri zhim klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la gtad/_yul ma ga d+hA na rgyal chen klu'i rgyal po ri bos byin la gtad/_bcom brlag
[\[340b.5\]]na sdug pa'i sprin klu'i rgyal po ce spyang rgyu ba la gtad/_yul 'khor ko sa la na rgyal ba dag pa klu'i rgyal po srin bu la gtad/_phug gi pha rol na btang bzung bden pa'i dri klu'i rgyal po btang bzung la gtad/_yul 'khor sa 'dzin na mthong ba'i lam rgyags
[\[340b.6\]]klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab las gtad/_kha che'i yul na gur gum gyi rtse mo klu'i rgyal po hu lu hu lu la gtad/_yul chu len na 'od zer bye ba'i snying po klu'i rgyal po 'phyang ba la gtad/_rgya yul na sred med kyi bu'i 'od kyi rgyal po rgya mtshos byin la gtad/_kha sha'i
[\[340b.7\]]yul na sa'i nu ma'i gnas ri glang ru'i drung chu bo go ma ti'i ngogs na/_go ma sA la gan d+ha ni klu'i rgyal po khyim bdag gis byin la gtad/_de gal te phyogs thams cad du lta bar byed na thams cad du nam mkha' thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur
[\[341a\]]
[\[341a.1\]]ro/_/chung ngur lta bar byed na de bzhin gshegs pa chung ngu nyid du mthong ngo /_/tshad med par lta bar byed na tshad med par mthong ngo /_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ga las gshegs snyam mo/_/de 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin
[\[341a.2\]]gshegs pa ni ga las kyang ma gshegs so/_/gang du yang mi bzhud do/_/de gang du yang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud pa mi dmigs byon pa mi dmigs so/_/yang de 'di snyam du sems te/_lus kyi rgyu khams gsum pa 'di ni sems tsam pas sus ji ltar rnam par brtags
[\[341a.3\]]pa de bzhin du mthong ngo /_/bdag gis rang gi sems kyis sangs rgyas su byed do/_/bdag gi sems kyis sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/bdag gi sems nyid sangs rgyas so/_/bdag gi sems nyid lus so/_/sems nyid kyang nam mkha'o/_/bdag gi sems kyi rnam par rtog pas sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/sems
[\[341a.4\]]kyis sems mi mthong ngo /_/sems su 'du shes pa rnams ni shes pa med pa'o/_/sems su 'du shes pa rnams ni ldan pa'o/_/ldog pa ni snying po med pa'o/_/chos de dag ni shes pa med pa'i phyir yang dag par ma byung ba'o/_/sus sngon byang chub tu sems bskyed cing shes rab gang
[\[341a.5\]]gis stong pa rtogs pa de yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o snyam nas/_dmigs pa yid la byed pa des da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo/_/'on kyang yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yin te/_de ltar mtshan ma med pa'i gzugs thams cad rnam par
[\[341a.6\]]bsgoms pas nges par 'byed pa yongs su dag pa yin/_'dod chags dang bral ba yongs su dag pa yin/_ma rig pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/mdo sde rab tu rnam par 'byed pa las/_shA ri'i bu skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa'i 'tsho ba'i lam dang bying ba 'thab mo 'dzin pas bdag
[\[341a.7\]]dang gzhan yang phung bar byed pa de lta bus 'dzam bu'i gling 'di gang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das 'od srungs kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i gsung rab ni rnyed pa dang bkur stis myur du nub par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'di lung bstan te/_shA ri'i
[\[341b\]]
[\[341b.1\]]bu rnyed pa dang bkur stis ni chos 'dul ba 'di myur du nub par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu dge slong chos yongs su ma dag pa ston pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs te gsungs pa mi shes par gzhan dag las chos ston par byed do/_/de de bzhin gshegs pas sems can med pa
[\[341b.2\]]dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i chos bstan pa de dag la bdag go zhe'am/_sems can no zhe'am/_gso ba'o zhe'am/_gang zag go zhes chos ston par byed do/_/des ni nga la yang skur pa btab pa yin/_chos kyang spangs pa yin/_dge 'dun
[\[341b.3\]]la yang mi snyan par brjod pa yin te/_de'i rnam par smin pa gang yin pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs pa lha'i dbang po dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis shes par nus pa ma yin no/_/shA ri'i bu khyod mos par bya/_khong du chud par bya/_chos yongs su ma dag par
[\[341b.4\]]ston pa'i dge slong de/_mi dge ba'i brtson pa ji tsam dang ldan pa de'i bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'ga' zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling
[\[341b.5\]]gi sems can rnams bsad na de gzhi des mi dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas par mi 'gyur ram/_gsol pa mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mi shes par gzhan dag la chos yongs su ma dag par ston
[\[341b.6\]]pa de ni de bas kyang chos mi dge ba mang du mngon par 'dus byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi byang chub spong ba des ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skur pa btab pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon dang ma
[\[341b.7\]]'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang don dam pa stong pa nyid kho na ston cing bdag med pa dang /_sems can med pa dang /_srog med pa dang /_gso ba med pa dang /_gang zag med pa'i chos ston to/_/shA ri'i bu
[\[342a\]]
[\[342a.1\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi chos bstan pa 'di ni yang dag phul yin te/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rang gi ngang gis 'jig pa ngo bo nyid med pa dmigs pa med pa stong pa nyid do/_/
[\[342a.2\]]sngon de bzhin gshegs pa bkod pa chen po byung ste/_de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sku gdung ni rgyas par byas te/_dper na ma 'ongs pa'i dus na nga ji lta ba bzhin no/_/dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgyar gnas par gyur te/_dper na ma 'ongs pa'i dus
[\[342a.3\]]na nga'i ji lta ba bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa na ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog gcig_/chos dkon mchog gcig_/dge 'dun dkon mchog gcig go/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas ni bstan pa rnam pa lngar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[342a.4\]]shA ri'i bu gang yang bstan pa 'di la bdud sdig can dge slong gi gzugs su sprul nas/_log par 'dzin pa rnam pa du mar rab tu ston cing skye bo mang po de la 'god pa'i dus de dang de yod do/_/de la 'di lta bu'i log par 'dzin pa yang dag par rab tu ston
[\[342a.5\]]to/_/'di lta ste/_yid kyi gzhi dang lnga cha mthun pa'i gzhi dang skad cig ma dang cha mthun pa'i gzhi dang /_thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhi dang /_gang zag gi gzhi dang /_dmigs pa'i gzhi'o/_/shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos rnams kyis rab tu ma bstan pa
[\[342a.6\]]log par 'dzin pa de lta bu rab tu ston par 'gyur ro/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu nga ni sbrul ro myags pa'am/_khyi ro myags pa'am/_mi ro myags pas gang ba'i sa phyogs spyod lam gang yang rung bas gnas par spro'i/_shA ri'i bu dge slong tshul khrims 'chal
[\[342a.7\]]pa/_cho ga nyams pa/_'tsho ba nyams pa/_lta ba nyams pa ni mtshan gcig gam/_nyin gcig gam/_skad cig gam/_tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam yang gnas par mi spro'o/_/shA ri'i bu blun po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo
[\[342b\]]
[\[342b.1\]]sde 'di lta bu thos nas skrag par 'gyur/_kun du skrag par 'gyur/_kun du dngang bar 'gyur/_g.yang sa'i 'du shes su 'gyur/_g.yangs sa chen po'i 'du shes su 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mdo sde 'di las tshul khrims 'chal pa'i skyon ma lus par bshad pas so/_/shA ri'i bu rgyu gang dang rkyen gang
[\[342b.2\]]gis tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya zhe na/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims spyod pas na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya'o/_/tshig ngag gi spyod pa dang /_dus gsum gyi spyod pa dang /_las kyi mtha' mang po'i spyod pa dang /_smra ba mang po'i spyod pa dang /_gnyid la dga' ba dang /_'du 'dzi
[\[342b.3\]]la dga' ba dang /_spros pa la dga' ba dang /_rigs pa ma yin pa'i gtam ma yin pa zer ba dang /_bdag tu 'dzin pa dang /_sems can dang /_srog dang /_gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang /_pha dang /_ma dang /_dge slong dang /_bram zer mi 'dzin pa dang /_sman dpyad kyi tha snyad byed pa dang /_
[\[342b.4\]]khyim sun 'byin pa dang /_pho nyar 'gro ba dang /_khyim gyi las kyi mtha' la dga' ba dang /_khyim pa dang 'dre ba dang /_khyim pa'i g.yog byed pa dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu 'joms pa dang /_lo nyi shur ma lon pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /_yan lag
[\[342b.5\]]ma tshang ba bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /_'bru rjen len pa dang /_sha rjen len pa dang /_gser dngul len pa dang /_brdzun du smra ba dang /_spyod lam lhod pa dang /_sran chung ba dang /_byas pa mi gzo ba dang /_dad pa chung ba dang /_rmugs pa dang /_gnyid mang ba dang /_
[\[342b.6\]]'gyod pa mang ba dang /_khro ba dang /_g.yo sgyu mang ba dang /_phrag dog che ba dang /_ngo tsha ba dang /_khrel med pa dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_'gying ba dang /_kha zas rgyags pa dang /_sems mi zhum pas rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal bdun dang /_ngan g.yo dang /_
[\[342b.7\]]kha gsag dang /_gzhogs slong dang /_thob kyis 'jal ba dang /_rnyed pas rnyed par byed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi mnga' ba dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa la yid mi ches pa dang /_tshe 'di ched cher 'dzin pa dang /_tshe phyi ma la ched cher mi 'dzin pa dang /_the tshom dang
[\[343a\]]
[\[343a.1\]]yid gnyis mang bas na/_tshul khrims 'chal ba zhes bya ste/_shA ri'i bu lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las mi gtsang ba dang /_'tsho ba mi gtsang ba dang ldan pa de dag ni phyis dang 'dra 'o/_/de dag ni lus zhig ste/_shi nas sems can dmyal ba dag tu
[\[343a.2\]]skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag ni sangs rgyas dang /_sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dang /_dge ba don du gnyer ba rnams kyis spang bar bya ste/_dper na mi gtsang ba'i snod kyi nang du tsan+dan dmar po bcug na/_de yang mi gtsang bar 'gyur ba bzhin no/_/'bum pa las/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar
[\[343a.3\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa la zhugs nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa yang yod do/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[343a.4\]]chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mngon par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas/_phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
[\[343a.5\]]'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das zhing /_de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_dam pa'i chos bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do/_/'bum pa'i TI ka las/_bcu gnyis pa ni yon tan de dag nyid dang ldan
[\[343a.6\]]zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi stobs bskyed pa dang /_bdag nyid yon tan rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su dag par byas shing /_rtsol ba chung ngus sa dang po thob par byas nas 'phral kho nar chen po 'bad mi dgos par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
[\[343a.7\]]te/_dus ji srid kyi bar du bstan pa gnas par byed do/_/shan+ta de bas bshad pa/_gal te gnyen por byar yod na/_/de la ci phyir yid mi bde/_/ci ste gnyen por byar med na'ang /_/de la ci phyir yid mi bde/_/yid mi bde dang khros rgyal ba/_/gnyen po la ni rmongs par 'gyur/_/
[\[343b\]]
[\[343b.1\]]zhum pa'i phyir ni spro ba med/_/rgud pa chen pos zin par 'gyur/_/de sems pas na yud la'ang /_/tshe ni thung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de lta bas na don med pa/_/gnod pa bzhin du goms par spang /_/yid mi bde ba spang ba ji ltar 'thob ce na/_yang ba dang /_shin tu
[\[343b.2\]]mnyen pa'i sems bor ba ste/_drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_shing bal gyi 'dab ma lta bu'i sems bor ba zhes gsungs pa dang /_sdong po bkod pa las/_nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir thub par dka' ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o zhes
[\[343b.3\]]gsungs pa lta bu'o/_/goms na dka' bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med de/_dper na nyon mongs pa'i dbang gis sems can thams cad sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa bzhin du sdug bsngal 'byung ba thams cad la bde bar 'du shes nye bar gzhag
[\[343b.4\]]pa goms par bde ba'i 'du shes nyid du gnas so/_/des na chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/_sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyis bab kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/_yab dang sras mjal ba'i
[\[343b.5\]]mdo las byung ba bzhin no/_/dga' bo rab tu byung ba'i mdo las/_bskal pa bye ba stong dang ni/_/brgya dang khrag khrig dag tu yang /_/sangs rgyas sgra yang mi thos na/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba gal zhig_/u dum bA ra'i me tog ni/_/shing las shin tu rnyed dka' ltar/_/
[\[343b.6\]]de bzhin sangs rgyas rnyed dka' ste/_/khyod kyis de ni rnyed gyur na/_/dga' bo khyod kyis rab tu 'byung /_/dal ba shin tu rnyed dka' rnyed/_/dga' bo ston par mthong gyur ba/_/nga la mi mnyes ma byed cig_/gnya' shing bug can de yang /_rlung gis bskyod nas phyogs phyogs su
[\[343b.7\]]rgyug par byed pa na/_dga' bo brgya la rkyen zhig gis rus sbal zhar ba de'i mgrin pa gnya' shing gi bu ga der 'jug par 'gyur gyi dga' bo mi nyid thob pa ni ma yin no/_/dal ba phun sum tshogs pa yang de bzhin no/_/phyogs bcu'i mun pa rnam par sel ba las/_nub byang gi mtshams
[\[344a\]]
[\[344a.1\]]na bud+d+ha yid gnyis kun 'joms rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba bzhugs te/_de byang chub kyi shing drung du bzhugs pa stong gsum gyi bdud kyi ris kyi lha ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par mdzad de/_skyes bu'i rtsal de lta
[\[344a.2\]]bu byung ba yin no/_/bya ba kun la nyin mtshan du/_/sangs rgyas de ni dran bya zhing /_/byang chub sems kyang ma btang dang /_/khyod la 'jigs pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/byams pa seng ge'i sgra chen po las/_dge sbyong chom rkun bzhi la/_dge slong dge sbyong gi kha dog dang /_rtags dang
[\[344a.3\]]dbyibs la gnas shing tshul khrims 'chal cing sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang /_dben gnas su song ba ste/_mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa dag la gnas pa dang 'bras bu ma thob pa bzhin rnyed pa la sogs pa la chags pas 'bras bu thob par las 'chi ba dang /bdag
[\[344a.4\]]bstod cing gzhan smod pa'o/_/bka' stsal pa/_'od srungs de bzhin gshegs pa ring por mi thogs par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i slad du bskal pa bas lhag par bzhugs su gsol/_/bka'
[\[344a.5\]]stsal pa/_gal te sangs rgyas stong snyed kyis cho 'phrul dang bcas pa'i chos ston du zin kyang /_skyes bu dam pa ma yin pa de dag sdig pa 'dzin pa de dag las phyir gzung ba'am bzlog par mi spyod do/_/bka' stsal pa/_byams pa phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la/_byang
[\[344a.6\]]chub sems dpar khas 'che ba khyi'i chos kun du spyod pa 'byung ste/_des sngon phyin pa'i khyim der dge slong gzhan 'ong bar mthong na/_khro bas lta ba dang nyes pa 'di yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pa rjod par byed de/_de dag ni skyugs pa'i rgyur gyur pa ring du mi gnas pa
[\[344a.7\]]smad par bya ba'i zas kham 'ga'i phyir bsod nams ma yin pa mang du skyed do/_/de dag yi dgas kyi chos kun du spyod de/_snog pa dang /_sems dman pa dang ldan pa yin te/_ming gis byang chub sems dpar khas 'che zhing /_bdag nyid sdig pa can gyi
[\[344b\]]
[\[344b.1\]]bsam pa dang ldan bzhin du/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod nas/_zas dang skom sgrub par byed do/_/byams pa dper na/_seng ge'i sgra sgrogs shing wa'i las byed pa ltar de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i bsngags pa brjod cing /_
[\[344b.2\]]sems can 'ga' la yang sbyin pa la sogs pa mi spyod pas/_tshig tsam du 'gyur gyi yon tan yang dag pa blang ba dang 'brel pa'i spyod pas brtson pa ni ma yin no/_/de dag ni ji ltar gzhan dag gis ma rnyed pas yi rang ba de ltar bdag nyid kyis rnyed pas ni de lta ma
[\[344b.3\]]yin no/_/ji ltar gzhan gyi rnyed pas yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba ltar bdag nyid kyis bde ba'i yo byad thams cad la mi lta bar gzhan la sbyin dgos na/_de dag ji tsam du phyin ci log tu 'gyur pa ltos/_dge slong khyim rnams su 'gro bas chos kyi skyes ma gtogs pa
[\[344b.4\]]zang zing gi yo byad 'du 'dzi'i gtam mi bya ste/_de dag ni phan 'dogs pa ma yin no/_/de las dgongs nas/_gang zhig gang gA'i bye snyed kyi/_/'jig rten khams mchog rin chen gang byas te/_/dga' mchog sems kyis rgyal la phul ba dang /_/gang gis
[\[344b.5\]]sems can gcig la tshigs bcad byin/_/rin chen sbyin pa shin tu rgya chen des/_/tshigs bcad sbyin pa snying rjes bsgrubs de la/_/char yang mi phod grangs su'ang ma yin na/_/gnyis sam gsum la bsam du ga la yod/_/ces bstan to/_/byang chub
[\[344b.6\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams ni las yongs su bsal ba byas pas na/_mi dge ba'i las chung ngus ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur mod kyi/_bdag grol bas gzhan grol bar 'dod pas 'dzem dogs dang ldan pa dang /_myur du bsal zhing 'jig rten pha rol la
[\[344b.7\]]'jigs par blta bar bya'o/_/'di la bdag dang sems can dang /_/srog dang gang zag ma mchis par/_/bzod pa bla med gang lags pa/_/sbyin pa de ni sbyin chen lags/_/zhi ba'i tshul las mi g.yo ba'i/_/tshul khrims yongs su sbyang bar bya/_/
[\[345a\]]
[\[345a.1\]]gang zhig zhi tshul mdzes rtogs pa/_/de ni tshul khrims mchog yin gsungs/_/brtson 'grus brtan pa'ang brtson par byos/_/'dus byas kun kyang spang bar gyis/_/dben par lta ba gang yin pa/_/de ni sangs rgyas brtson 'grus
[\[345a.2\]]gsungs/_/dngos po'i dngos po med pas na/_/dngos po thams cad bsreg par bya/_/nyon mongs med pa gang yin pa/_/de ni rtogs med bsam gtan yin/_/tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/_/dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste/_/dus gsum mnyam lta gang yin
[\[345a.3\]]pa/_/de ni shes rab dam pa yin/_/gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos ni/_/tshu rol ma yin pha rol min/_/dbus su'ang gnas par mi bya ste/_/dus gsum mnyam lta gang yin pa/_/de ni shes rab dam pa yin/_/gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/_skye
[\[345a.4\]]bo mang po la sman par bgyi ba'i slad du/_byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba/_tshul 'chos pa lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba'i gnas de bshad du gsol/_bka' stsal pa/_phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la byang chub sems dpa' sdig
[\[345a.5\]]pa'i grogs kyis zin cing lhag pa'i bsam pa nyam chung ba de dag ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rnams la me tog nas/_mar me'i bar gyi mchod pa'i las la brtson par 'gyur ro/_/'od srungs ngas ni shes pa dang mi ldan pa rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba
[\[345a.6\]]yang dag par sgrub pa'i mchod pa bshad pa yin na/_mi blun po de dag ni de las brtson par gyur te/_ngas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyed cag ni bdag nyid dul ba dang /_zhi bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pas gnas par gyis shig_/bram ze dang khyim
[\[345a.7\]]bdag dad pa dang ldan pa dag yod na/_nga'i sku gdung rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes de skad gsungs na/_mi blun po de dag rnal 'byor dang /_spong ba dang /_lung nod pa dang /_kha ton spangs nas sku gdung gi mchod pa la brten nas 'tsho bar byed pa la ltos/_
[\[345b\]]
[\[345b.1\]]gang gis chu'i phung po nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar 'bru mar gyis bkang ste/_snying po ri rab tsam gyi mar me btsugs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa can tshul khrims la gnas pa cig gis mkhan po
[\[345b.2\]]'am/_slob dpon las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig lung nod de/_kha don byed cing gom pa bdun bor ba gang yin pa de ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa la sangs rgyas mthong ba yang med na mchod pa'i las lta ci smos te
[\[345b.3\]]de ni gnas med do/_/gang 'du shes dang mtshan mar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa yin no/_/grogs po dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni mi skye ba yin pas mchod par sla ba ma yin no/_/'od srungs dus phyi ma lnga brgya tha ma la/_byang chub sems
[\[345b.4\]]dpa'i theg pa pa thabs la mi mkhas pa brkam pa 'dod pas zil gyis non pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag ras bcos bu'am rtsig ngos la bris pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs gzhan dag la mchod pa byas pas/_dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul
[\[345b.5\]]'thob par sems shing sems su yang 'gyur te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba cung zad tsam po des bdag bstod gzhan la smod par byed cing /_gzhi des 'tsho bar yang sems so/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /_mchod pa la ma gtogs pa lung nod
[\[345b.6\]]pa dang /_kha ton dang /_bsam gtan gces su mi byed do/_/de dag de'i tshe khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dag gis mchod pa dang /_ri mor bya bar shes nas/_bsod snyoms dang /_sman dang /_yo byad kyi bar dag kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/ngas ni byang chub sems
[\[345b.7\]]dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims la gnas te mang du thos pa btsal bar bya'o zhes bstan na de dag de'i tshe na/_tshul khrims 'chal par gnas shing chos tshol ba spangs te/_mchod rten dag la mchod pa'i las bya bar brtson zhing gzhi des
[\[346a\]]
[\[346a.1\]]'tsho bar 'gyur bar sems pa la ltos/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen po las/_gzhan yang de'i rgyal po ma skyes dgra ma gtogs pa/_yangs pa can gyi rgyal po zla ba dri ma med pa'i snying po grong khyer gyi nang na gnas pa dang /_phyi rol na gnas pa'i
[\[346a.2\]]g.yog 'khor dang bcas pa la sogs pa 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi grong khyer dang /_ri khrod kyi grong dang /_yul po che dang /_kha lungs kyi rgyal po gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig lhags so/_/gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i btsun mo ma gtogs
[\[346a.3\]]pa yangs pa can gyi rgyal po'i btsun mo 'jig rten gsum na mdzes ma la sogs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag gi chung ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang lhan cig lhags so/_/de la bdag ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i don to/_/
[\[346a.4\]]rtag ces bya ba ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i don to/_/bde zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i don to/_/sug ces bya ba ni chos kyi tshig bla dgas so/_/'di ltar rtag pa thams cad kyi nang na ni nam mkha' mchog tu rtag pa yin la/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang nam mkha' bzhin du
[\[346a.5\]]rtag go/_/ngas ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas kyang dgra bcom pa'i mthar gtugs zin mod kyi/_byang chub kyi shing drung du rtswa bting ba la 'dug pa dang /_bdud btul bar bstan pa la 'di ni 'jig rten nges par bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir bdud pham par byas te sangs
[\[346a.6\]]rgyas so zhes bya bar sems can rnams kyis shes so/_/ngas ni bskal pa grangs med pa nas bdud pham par byas te bdud rtsi rtogs so/_/bla ma bla ma zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyogs thams cad kyi nang na byang phyogs mchog yin pa de bzhin du/_thar pa yang de dang
[\[346a.7\]]'dra ste/_thar pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/bla na med pa bla na med pa zhes bya ba ni ji ltar yul thams cad kyi nang na byang phyogs pa la yul bla na med pa zhes bya ba de bzhin du thar pa yang de dang 'dra ste/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o/_/chu klung
[\[346b\]]
[\[346b.1\]]zhes bya ba ni rgya mtsho la bya ste/_chu klung thams cad kyi nang na rgya mtsho 'ba' zhig chu klung yin pas/_rgya mtsho ni chu klung zhes bya ba'i grangs su gtogs pa'o/_/sems can yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de dag ni theg pa chen po thos nas dad par 'gyur te/_
[\[346b.2\]]dam pa'i chos 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis ni sdig pa'i las grangs med par byas pa rnams klad pa na ba dang /_rims kyis gdungs pa dang /_zug rngu dang /_skur pa tsam gyis 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu rnam bzhi lta
[\[346b.3\]]bu'i mdo las gsungs pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /_tshul khrims 'chal pa de ji ltar rtogs par bgyi lags/_chos nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa brtan pa ther zug ces bya'o/_/gal te gang zag tshul khrims 'chal pa zang zing la brkam pa rnams
[\[346b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi rtag go zhes zer na/_gang zag de dag ni tshad ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to/_/nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde ni theg pa chen po pa rnams yin no/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa pa rnams ni drang po'i don gyi rnam grangs su gtogs so/_/ye shes
[\[346b.5\]]zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul bla dgas te/_chos kyi sku ni tshad ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sha'i sku'o zhes bya ba ni/_rnam par shes pa brtags pa las brten te/_rnam par shes pa ni tshad ma ma yin no/_/don zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa
[\[346b.6\]]rtag ces bya ba ni chos rtag pa'i don to/_/chos rtag ces bya ba ni dge 'dun rtag ces bya ba'i don to/_/yi ge zhes bya ba ni rang bzo'i yi ge dang tshig sna tshogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin pa rnams so/_/bdag ces bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i
[\[346b.7\]]don to/_/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa shin tu rgyas pa'i mchog tu cha phra ste bdud rtsi'i mchog kyang yin no/_/dug gi mchog kyang yin no/_/sangs rgyas nyid chos kyang yin dge 'dun kyang yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzhi gsum pa yin no/_/nyan thos kyi theg pa las
[\[347a\]]
[\[347a.1\]]ni byis pa rnams kyis 'jig rten pa'i lta ba bsal ba'i phyir gzhi gsum pa gzhag go/_/bag yod pa ni 'chi ba med pa'i gnas so/_/bag med pa ni 'chi ba'i gnas so/_/'jig rten pa rnams ni bag med pa dang ldan pa yin te shi ba dang 'dra'o/_/
[\[347a.2\]]'jig rten las 'das pa ni rga ba dang 'chi ba med do/_/bag yod pa rnams ni mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu bde ba 'thob pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang dgongs pa'i tshig ni shes par dka' ste/_dper na rgyal po la las blon po la sin+d+ha pa 'on cig ces byas
[\[347a.3\]]na/_zas za ba'i dus su ni lan tshwa khyer te 'ong /_/zos zin pa'i tshe ni skom nod/_/skyed mos tshal du 'gro ba'i tshe ni rta/_g.yul ngor 'gro ba'i tshe ni ral gri khyer te 'ong ste/_rgyal po'i dgongs pa'i tshig rnams shes par byed de/_de bzhin du theg pa chen po 'di la
[\[347a.4\]]yang /_mi rtag pa rnam pa bzhi yod par theg pa chen po'i blon po rnams kyis shes par bya ste/_gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa de'i tshe ni mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom mo/_/chos nub pa dang zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/
[\[347a.5\]]zhes ston pa de'i tshe ni sdug bsngal bsgom par bya'o/_/nam nga'i lus nad mtha' yas pas gzir to/_/dge 'dun 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes ston pa de'i tshe bdag med pa bsgom mo/_/nam de bzhin gshegs pa'i thar pa mtshan ma med pa dang ci yang med pa'o zhes ston
[\[347a.6\]]pa de'i tshe ni stong pa bsgom par bya'o/_/gang gi phyir sdug bsngal ci yang med pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang mi brtan pa dang ther zug ma yin pa dang /_zhi ba ma yin pa med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni bde ba dang /_rtag pa dang /_brtan pa dang /_ther zug dang zhib ste/_
[\[347a.7\]]nam de bzhin gshegs pas sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yod do zhes bshad pa de'i tshe ni yang dag par rtag pa bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgoms pa ni nga'i nyan thos yin/_dgongs pa'i tshig la mkhas pa yin no/_/mdo 'di ni skyes
[\[347b\]]
[\[347b.1\]]pa'i rang bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ston pa ste/_skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni mi zhes bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ni skyes pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang pham pa byed byad pas ji ltar bya ba nyon cig_/pham pa byed byed pas ni chos kyi de kho na nyid de
[\[347b.2\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po khong du chud par byas nas/_dam pa'i chos 'byung bar bya'o snyam du bsams na/_de la byin pa yang ches khyad par can du 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos 'byin pa'i 'bras bu ni de ltar che'o/_/drag shul can gyis zhus pa las/_
[\[347b.3\]]khyim zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'joms pa dang /_dge ba'i sdong po sgyel bar byed pas khyim zhes bya'o/_/khyim na gnas pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba la rnam par rtog pa sngon goms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyams par byed pas khyim na gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[347b.4\]]khyim na gnas pa ni rgya mtsho la chu bran ltar dgang dka' ba'o/_/me la shing ltar chog mi shes pa'o/_/rlung dmar ltar thug pa med par rtog pa'o/_/kha zas [(]bzad [,]bzang [)]po dang dug ltar 'dres pa'o/_/phan tshun gyi rkyen gyis 'thab pa'o/_/las kyi mthar thug pa
[\[347b.5\]]med pa'o/_/ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur pa'o/_/dngos po tshol zhing srung bas sdug bsngal myur du phan tshun 'gyes pas mthar rgud cing 'gyur ba'o/_/slong ba mthong na dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang /_longs spyod kyi rgyus dang byang chub ston pa yin par 'du shes pa
[\[347b.6\]]bskyed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i khyim pas chung ma la/_rgya dang khog tshe dang rnyir 'du shes pa'o/_/yang gsum ste/_khri mon dang 'ching ba dang gsod pa'o/_/gang zag gis gang zag la tshod gzung bar mi bya ste/_bzung na nyams par 'gyur ro/_/dgon
[\[347b.7\]]pa la gnas pa ni chos kun 'dzin pa'o/_/'phags pas bkur ba'o/_/byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'o/_/dgon pa la gnas pa ni tshegs chung ngus pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar zhe na/_lus dang srog la mi lta
[\[348a\]]
[\[348a.1\]]pas sbyin pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyis tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems med pas byams shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bzod pas bzod pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa las phyir mi ldog pa las brtson 'grus
[\[348a.2\]]dang /_sems can yal bar mi 'dor zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba sdud pas bsam gtan dang /_de bzhin nyid kyis mi rtogs pas shes rab po/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba chos bzhi dang ldan na dgon par gnas pa gnang ste gang zhe na/_mang du thos pa yin
[\[348a.3\]]te/_thos pa 'dzin pa chos gtan la dbab pa la mkhas pa/_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson zhing chos sgrub pa dang /_nyon mongs pa shas chen po zhi bar bya ba dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa yin te lha dang klu la sogs pa smin par bya ba'i ched dang /_dge ba'i
[\[348a.4\]]rtsa ba brtan nas phyis grong la sogs par chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa de bzhi dang ldan par bya'o/_/mi rtag pa nyid kyi mdo las/_nad med mi rtag lang tsho rtag ma yin/_/'byor pa mi rtag srog kyang rtag ma yin/_/skye bo mi rtag nyid kyis nyan gyur pa/_/'dod
[\[348a.5\]]pa'i yon tan dga' ba ji ltar skye/_/za ma tog bkod pa las/_yul 'khor mo 'jig gi grong khyer chen po na bshad pa dang gci ba'i gnas de na srin bu'i rigs brgya stong du ma gnas pa/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bung ba'i gzugs su sprul nas/_sangs
[\[348a.6\]]rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes byas pa dang /_de dag sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba rjes su dran nas/_'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu byung ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom nas/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kha na spos kyi dri zhes bya bar
[\[348a.7\]]gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skyes so/_/oM ma Ni pad+me hUM/_na maH sap+tA nAM/_sa myak+saM bud+d+ha ko TI nAM/_tad+ya thA/_tsa le tsu le tsun+de swAhA/_gang gtsug lag khang la khyim gyi 'du shes 'dzin pa de dag ni bu dang bu mo dag gis yongs su bskor bar
[\[348b\]]
[\[348b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de dag dge 'dun gyi khri dang /_khri'u dang /_tshang thur dang /_sngas dang /_mal stan dag la spyod par ma 'os pa las spyod par byed/_dge 'dun gyi nye bar spyod pa la bshang ba dang gci bar byed do/_/mchil ma dag kyang 'dor zhing las kyi rnam par smin pa mi
[\[348b.2\]]shes so/_/dge 'dun gyi nye bar spyod pa la mchil ma 'dor ba de dag ni/_lo bcu gnyis su sA la'i tshal du kha khab mig tsam gyi srog chags su skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi so shing la spyod par mi 'os pa las spyod pa ni rus sbal dang chu srin dang nya'i nang du skye'o/_/dge 'dun
[\[348b.3\]]gyi til dang 'bras la sogs pa mi 'os par spyad na yi dgas su skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi zas kyis khyi gso bar byed pa de dag ni rigs dman pa dang /_dbang po nyams pa dang sgur po dang sprang por skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyis la mi 'os par spyad na/_bskal pa bcu gnyis
[\[348b.4\]]su dmyal ba 'o dod 'bod par skye'o/_/dge 'dun gyi ni me'i 'obs lta bu'o/_/dug lta bu'o/_/rdo rje lta bu 'o/_/khur lta bu'o/_/dug la ni gnyen po bya nus kyi dge 'dun gyi la ni gnyen po bya mi nus so/_/rmi lam bstan pa las/_bka' stsal pa/_rnam pa dang /_mtshan ma dang /_
[\[348b.5\]]rtags gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par ngas khyod la bshad do/_/mtshan ma brgya rtsa brgyad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa yin par shes par bya ste/_rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_sku gdung rnyed pa dang /_/de bzhin
[\[348b.6\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten la mchod pa dang /_chos thos pa dang /_dge slong la chos smra ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs mthong ba dang /_bdag gcer bur 'dug pa dang /_sngon ma mthong ba'i yul du phyin pa dang /_chu'i nang na 'dug par shes pa dang /_sprin
[\[348b.7\]]las char 'bab par shes pa dang /_sa g.yos pa dang /_bdag bsad pa las shor ba dang /_bdag nam mkha' las 'gro ba dang /_glegs bam rnyed pa dang /_chos smra ba dge slong che ge mo zhes bya ba'i ming thos pa dang /_rin po che thu ba dang /_nyi ma dang zla ba gzas
[\[349a\]]
[\[349a.1\]]zin pa dang /_gtsug lag khang na 'dug par shes pa dang /_sprin las 'brug grag pa dang /_glog 'byung ba dang /_go mtshon rnyed par mthong ba la sogs pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang gi rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa cang mi gsung ba
[\[349a.2\]]mthong na/_des ni chos la sgrib par 'gyur ba'i las bsags pa yin pas/_des chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug cing kha don la brtson pa'i gang zag rnams la yang bsnyen bkur sgrub po/_/des ni sgrib pa de dag par 'gyur te/_gang zag de ni sa
[\[349a.3\]]dang po bdun pa dag las byung bar blta'o/_/de'i tshe sa dang po la gnas pa zhig na ni des sbyang ba'i phyir/_lo bdun du phung po gsum pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum gdon par bya'o/_/sa gnyis pas ni lo drug_/sa gsum
[\[349a.4\]]pas ni lo lnga/_sa bzhi pas ni lo bzhi/_sa lnga pas ni lo gsum/_sa drug pas ni lo gnyis/_sa bdun pas ni lo gcig gdon par bya'o/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'jim pa las byas pa mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa'
[\[349a.5\]]da ni sa dang po par blta'o/_/sa bdun po dag la mthong ba gang yin pa de sa bdun gyi las kyang rig par bya'o/_/sa dgu pa dang bcu pa dag la ni rmi lam log par mthong ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor bar mthong nas
[\[349a.6\]]bcu par blta ste/_bdud kyi las ni ma gtogs so/_/nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams/_/sangs rgyas byang chub de bzhin byang chub sems/_/chos bzhi gang yin de dag dpag med do/_/de dag 'jig rten kun gyis rtogs mi
[\[349a.7\]]nus/_/mdog ngan glen nam yang na rnyed med dam/_/brnyas shing dman par bya ba yin na yang /_/mi yi khams dang spyod pa shes dka' bas/_/de la gya tshom dag tu skyon mi gdags/_/dgra bcom kun gyis rang sems mi shes na/_/sems can
[\[349b\]]
[\[349b.1\]]spyod pa shes pa smos ci dgos/_/ma skyes dgra yis pha ni bsad gyur cing /_/de bzhin gshegs pa bkrongs par sbyor byas kyang /_/de sems gcig gis ngan 'gro rnams grol na/_/gang zag dag pa gang yin smos ci dgos/_/gser ni mi
[\[349b.2\]]gtsang nang du bcug gyur kyang /_/'bar ba'i rang bzhin nam yang mi 'bri ltar/_/nges pa gang zhig 'jig rten chos spyod kyang /_/nam yang bsam pa'i rang bzhin de mi spong /_/gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjed pa/_/de dag rnyed par ba rnyed legs
[\[349b.3\]]'tsho ba/_/nor 'dod pa dag rgya mtsho chen po ltar/_/de bzhin de dag rnyed pa phun sum tshogs/_/dgon par dga' zhing rtag tu dbang bsdams la/_/brtson 'grus brtsams zhing nye du thag bsrings la/_/byams la gnas shing don dam mkhas gyur ba/_/des ni de
[\[349b.4\]]'dra'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/rin po che'i mtha' las/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas nyid ces bya ba de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi tshig bla dgas so/_/stobs dang mi 'jigs pa nas ma 'dres pa la thug pa de dag kyang chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par bya'o/_/chos kyi dbyings
[\[349b.5\]]la ni so so'i skye bo nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi bar dag tha dad par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/chu bo gang gA la sogs pa rgya mtshor bab pa 'di'o zhes tha dad par gdags par mi nus pa ltar chos kyi dbyings la so so'i skye bo'i chos la sogs pa tha dad par
[\[349b.6\]]gdags par mi nus so/_/'phags pa sgra chen po las/_gling bzhi pa gser la sogs pas gang bar byas pa'am/_rnam par rgyal byed kyi khang pa lta bus stong gsum gyi stong chen po bkang ste/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun la phul ba bas/_gang gis
[\[349b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung yungs 'bru tsam mchod rten gyi bum pa skyu ru ra tsam gyi nang du bcug ste/_srog shing khab tsam btsugs nas rgya shug gi lo ma tsam gyi gdugs 'dogs par byed dam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs mtshon gang ba byed na ches bsod
[\[350a\]]
[\[350a.1\]]nams che'o/_/ma skyes dgras pha rgyun du zhugs pa bsad nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung brgyad cha la mchod pa dang ri mor bya ba'i las byas pas/_sems can dmyal bar lan cig song nas/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis bskal pa nyi shur log
[\[350a.2\]]par ltung bar mi 'gyur zhing rab tu byung nas/_rang rgyal ba mngon du byed par 'gyur te/_rnam par rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa 'jug pa las bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yang dag par zhugs te/_bskal pa brgyad khri
[\[350a.3\]]bzhi stong lon nas/_de'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/byams pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa gser bzangs zhes bya ba'i spyan sngar 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog ces bya bar gyur bas byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_bka'
[\[350a.4\]]stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas sam/_ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa de dag byas sam/_mi dge ba'i las kyi lam bcu blangs te 'dug gam/_mtshams
[\[350a.5\]]med pa lnga byas su zin kyang de byang chub kyi sems ma spangs ma btang ste/_byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba la dmigs pa can gyi sems dang mngon par zhen pa'i sems kyang mi bskyed na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa kho na yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de
[\[350a.6\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir te/_sdig pa'i las byas srid par skyes kyang ji tsam du srid par skyes pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan pa yi/_/bsod nams
[\[350a.7\]]de la gal te gzugs yod na/_/zhing rnams gang ba'i bye snyed gang byas kyang /_/de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa med/_/rgya mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can ji snyed pa/_/bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas gyur/_/bskal pa mang por
[\[350b\]]
[\[350b.1\]]las gzhan mi byed par/_/bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug med pa/_/de dag byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan/_/gang gis stong gsum rin chen bkang byas la/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la dbul byed pa/_/de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/_/bsod nams shin tu
[\[350b.2\]]mang po 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gal te sems can mtha' dag sangs rgyas te/_/spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid 'gyur la/_/ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i bar/_/sems can gcig pus mchod pa byas pa dang /_/mkhas pa'i mi ni gang yang rung ba yis/_/byang
[\[350b.3\]]chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang /_/me tog gcig pu phul ba'i bsod nams 'di/_/de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/_/gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur/_/ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la/_/bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag
[\[350b.4\]]la la zhig_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bar mchod byed/_/gang gis snying rje bskyed nas byang chub tu/_/rgya chen sems ni skyed par byed gyur te/_/sems kyi gtso bo bskyed pa byas nas kyang /_/gom pa bdun ni bor ba'i bsod nams 'di/_/de bas khyad par
[\[350b.5\]]'phags par 'gyur ba yin/_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la byams pa zhes bgyi/_ming 'di ga las rnyed lags/_bka' stsal pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs byung ba'i tshe/_dge
[\[350b.6\]]slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya bas sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug la ci nas byams pa bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos ston cing /_dge slong de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba de'i tshe/_byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te 'gro'o/_/grong
[\[350b.7\]]la sogs pa'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag ma thag tu sems can byams pa la gnas pa de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs par gyur te/_de ni lha rnams kyis a la la sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur ro zhes bsgrags nas/_ming
[\[351a\]]
[\[351a.1\]]de la de bzhin gshegs pa de yang yi rang bas ni byams pa zhes bya'o/_/gang gA'i mchog la bka' stsal pa/_gang gA'i mchog dper na bdag ces 'dogs kyang bdag gang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du ngas gzugs nas mya ngan las
[\[351a.2\]]'das pa'i bar brtags kyang don dam pa na de dag thams cad med cing mi dmigs so/_/tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa las ni/_de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te/_/bsam mi khyab la dad pa yin/_/rnam
[\[351a.3\]]par smin pa'ang de bzhin no/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pa las/_bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal sgrib pa zhes bya ba 'dod chags ni sgrib pa'o/_/zhe sdang dang gti mug ni sgrib pa'o/_/sbyin pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/tshul khrims dang /_bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus
[\[351a.4\]]dang /_bsam gtan dang /_shes rab ni sgrib pa'o/_/sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/chos dang dge 'dun dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med par 'du shes pa ni sgrib pa'o/_/gsol pa/_ji ltar sbyin pa nas shes rab kyi bar sgrib pa
[\[351a.5\]]lags/_bka' stsal pa/_chos thams cad la sgrib pa med mod kyi/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams rang gi rtog pas/_sbyin pa la sogs pa yang sgrib par byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byis pa rnams kyis sbyin pa byed pa na sems can ser sna can rnams la ma dad do/_/
[\[351a.6\]]ma dad pa des khong khro ba dang /_tha ba'i nyes pa bskyed de/_nyes pa des sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims srung ba/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la smad par byed de/_smad pas skye bo mang po dag bsngags pa ma yin pa thob pas/_de dag la ma
[\[351a.7\]]dad pa des ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bzod pa bsgom pa ni 'di dag gnod sems kyi gzhi dang ldan zhes bya ba dang /_brtson 'grus brtsam pa ni 'di dag le lo can des dad pas sbyin pa chu ra'i chu yang spyad par mi 'os so snyam pa dang /_bsam gtan la mnyam par
[\[351b\]]
[\[351b.1\]]'jog na 'di dag ni sems g.yengs pa'o snyom pas brnyas par byed de/_de dag ji tsam du brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa de tsam du 'khor ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/phyis de dag gis gong du byang chub tu spyod pa na mang du thos kyang chos thams cad yi ge med pa la rnam par shes pa
[\[351b.2\]]yod par brtags te/_shes rab tu dmigs nas/_pha rol du son par byed pa de dag ni mi shes pa zhes nga smra'o/_/gal te theg pa chen po la zhugs na yang /_bdag cag ni 'jig rten na gtso bo snyam nas/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa la smon cing bsam pa ngan pa dang nyes par brjod pa des na ngan
