[\[351b.3\]]'gror 'gro ba 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal sgyu ma lta bu'i sems la gnas pa la ni chos gang yang sgrib pa med do/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_nyon mongs pa spong ba'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la dmigs pa de ni phongs par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bka' stsal
[\[351b.4\]]pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams su mos pa des ni las kyi sgrib pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/khye'u bzhi pa'i ting nge 'dzin las/_gang gis de 'drar rang bzhin stong shes nas/_/dngos po kun la mi gnas sgom byed pa/_/de ni
[\[351b.5\]]nyon mongs dra ba kun spangs shing /_/srid pa'i 'dod chags bcom pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/gang gis stong pa stong shes shing /_/stong pa la yang mi sems la/_/gang dag stong nyid mi 'thob bo/_/de dag stong nyid shes pa yin/_/'khor lo bcu pa las bka'
[\[351b.6\]]stsal pa/_'di lta ste/_'ga' zhig gis byams pa'am 'jam dpal lam/_kun du spyan ras gzigs sam/_kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la bskal pa brgya'i bar du sems rtse gcig tu skyabs su
[\[351b.7\]]song nas/_de dag gi mtshan nas brjod cing dmigs pas mchod cing smon lam btab pa bas/_'ga' zhig gis skad cig yud tsam byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la de ltar byas na/_myur du re ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu yang dag pa yi snying po ni/_/yon tan mang po phun
[\[352a\]]
[\[352a.1\]]sum tshogs par ldan/_/dge sbyong cha lugs 'dzin cing ston byed pa/_/ston pa chen po la ni phyag 'tshal lhags/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni snod du gyur pa'i sems can lha dang mi'i theg pa la rgyab kyis phyogs shing ngan song du gzhol bar
[\[352a.2\]]mi mdzad do/_/bka' stsal pa/_rnal 'byor pas mi'i chos 'di bcu byas na/_'dod pa'i khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tsam yang mi 'grub na/_gong ma lta ci smos/_sngar grub pa yang nyams shing ston par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'tsho ba'i yo byad kyis
[\[352a.3\]]dpa' yang thang ba dang tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_log pa la zhen cing 'jig rten gyi ltas la chags pa dang /_'phags pa la mi gzhol zhing sems rgod pa dang /_phra ma dang dbyen byed pa dang 'phags pa la smod cing dbang za ba dang /_log par lta bas rgyu
[\[352a.4\]]'bras la skur pa 'debs pa'o/_/yang rnal 'byor pa chos 'di bcu dang ldan na ting nge 'dzin mi 'grub cing grub na yang nyams par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_las su bya ba'i dngos po la dga' zhing chags pa dang /_bre mo'i gtam la dga' ba dang /_
[\[352a.5\]]gnyid la dga' ba dang /_gang zag tshol ba la dga' ba dang /_gzugs la dga' ba dang /_sgra la dga' ba dang /_dri la dga' ba dang /_ro la dga' ba dang /_reg la dga' ba dang /_rtog pa dang dpyod pa la dga' ba'o/_/u tra ka dang /_ar ka dang /_de sha ku
[\[352a.6\]]pa li ka dang /_lha sbyin la sogs pa dang 'dra bar bsam gtan las nyams nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/u pA lis gsol pa/_tshul khrims kyi rtsa ba bzhi srungs/_kun la sems mnyam par bzhag ste/_mi brnyas mi smad glo bur
[\[352a.7\]]du nyes pa mi gleng ngo zhes gsungs na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa dag la dge 'dun gyis ji lta bu'i thabs bgyi/_bka' stsal pa/_ngas ni mu stegs can dang /_khyim pas dge slong gi nyes pa gleng du gnang ba'i skabs ni med do/_/dge 'dun gyis kyang ma rtogs pa dang /_chos bzhin
[\[352b\]]
[\[352b.1\]]ma yin par gleng du ma gnang na bskrad pa lta ci smos/_ma rtogs pa dang chos bzhin ma yin par gleng na/_kha na ma tho ba chen po'i sdig pa 'thob po/_/u pA li ma rtogs pa dang /_chos bzhin ma yin pa 'di bcus gleng na sdig pa chen po 'thob ste/_gang zhe na/_dge
[\[352b.2\]]'dun ma dad pa rgyal po'i spyan sngar gleng ba dang ma dad par kun du rgyu'i nang dang /_ma dad par blon po'i mdun dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_bud med mang po dang ma rung bar byed pa mang po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma'i mdun dang /_sha khon yod
[\[352b.3\]]pa'i mdun dang /_khro bo zhe 'gras pa'i mdun du'o/_/de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin te/_'phags pa'i chos nyams pas yongs su dag pa'i dge 'dun sme bar byed cing /_dge sbyong gi las thams cad mi rung bar byed pa yin te/_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun
[\[352b.4\]]gyi longs spyod la spyod du mi gnang mod kyi/_'on kyang yid mthun pa'i dge 'dun la bsnyen par rdzogs te/_sdom pa thob pa ma btang bas khyim pa skye bo thams cad pas mchog go/_/rtsa ba'i sdig nyams kyang de lta bu yin na bcas pa'i sdig phra mo gzhan nyams pa lta
[\[352b.5\]]ci smos te/_de bas na/_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_khyim pa rnams kyis brnyas pa'am/_chad pas gcad du mi gnang ngo /_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_rgyal rigs khyim bdag gdol pas bstan pa la skyabs su song zhing rab tu byung ba chos kyi snod du gyur kyang rung ba rnams la 'tshe bar
[\[352b.6\]]byed de gshe ba nas srog dang bral ba'i bar du byed de de dag ni mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo /_/mar 'tshir gnas sdig bcu po dag_/smad 'tshong gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/_/smad 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag_/chang 'tshong gnas sdig gcig
[\[352b.7\]]dang mnyam/_/chang 'tshong gnas sdig bcu po dag_/shan pa'i gnas sdig gcig dang mnyam/_/shan pa'i gnas sdig bcu gnas pas/_/rgyal po gdol can sdig gcig mnyam/_/theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos la thams cad kyis dad cing bkur sti bya'i de la 'phya zhing skur pa
[\[353a\]]
[\[353a.1\]]'debs pa dang /_bar chad dang gegs mi bya ste/_theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos las tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam med par byas na gdon mi za bar mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/theg pa gsum las gcig la
[\[353a.2\]]'phya zhing skur na de dag lhan cig mi gnas/_chung ngu na skad cig tsam yang bsnyen bkur dang /_chos mnyan par mi bya'o/_/de lta bu la 'dri zhing mnyan par byas na/_de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe
[\[353a.3\]]na/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_theg pa gsum char gyi tshigs su bcad pa 'ga'i phyir yang gleng ba las thos na/_bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/_/byams pa la gnas te zhe sdang dang /_khong khro ba spong ba dang /_snying rje la gnas te sems
[\[353a.4\]]can nyam thag pa sgrol ba dang /_dga' ba la gnas te ngag gi las mi dge ba bzhi spong ba dang /_btang snyoms la gnas te 'dod chags dang /_ser sna dang /_phrag dog thams cad spong ngo /_/theg pa gnyis kyi chos la dad nas/_theg pa chen po la ni dad par mi
[\[353a.5\]]'gyur/_theg pa chen po chos la dad pa theg pa'i tshig tu smra bas don du mi 'gyur/_nang ni yang dag chad par lta zhing /_theg pa chen po can zhes khas 'che/_mi dge gsum gyi las mi srung ba/_nga yi dam chos ma rung 'jig byed/_gang zag de ni 'chi 'phos gyur nas/_sems
[\[353a.6\]]can dmyal ba'i mtshams med ltung nges/_lus rul pa la dri zhim pos byugs kyang zhim por mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sems can theg pa gnyis kyi chos la brtson par ma dad pa mi dge ba bcu ma spangs pas theg pa chen po'i chos zab mo rtogs par mi nus te/_rgyu
[\[353a.7\]]med par smra ba la theg pa chen po bstan kyang bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i don du mi 'gyur ro/_/rten cing 'brel pa nyid stong pa yin/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i chos las gzhan pa stong pa ma yin no/_/tshul khrims nyams par dga' la sdig pa can/_/theg
[\[353b\]]
[\[353b.1\]]pa chen po'i yon tan mchog thob nas/_/khe dang grags phyir theg chen khas 'che ba/_/bong bu seng ge'i pags pa gyon pa bzhin/_/deng 'dir 'khor rnams kun la bka' stsal pa/_/gang zhig myur du byang chub mchog 'dir ni/_/dge bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan
[\[353b.2\]]byos/_/nga yi chos la mi smad shin tu bsrung /_/ngas sngon mdo sde gzhan dag las gsungs pa/_/byang chub chen po 'dod pa theg chen spyad/_/nyan thos rang rgyal theg pa spongs shig pa/_/de ni rnam dag 'khor la bstan pa'i chos/_/la la nyan thos theg pa'i chos
[\[353b.3\]]dang ldan/_/la la bden par dga' zhing rang byang chub/_/la la ye shes mchog la dga' 'os pa/_/de bas mos pa bzhin du theg gsum shod/_/sbyangs pa'i yon tan tsam gyis grol 'dod pa/_/theg chen bshad pa thos na ngan song ltung /_/bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas
[\[353b.4\]]stong gi tha ma snang mdzad ces bya/_gal te dge bcu'i las yang dag par ma bsgrubs par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'am/_dge ba bcu'i las 'ga' tsam yang mi srung bar ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhes sam/_bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub pa'o zhes zer na brdzun
[\[353b.5\]]du smra ba ste/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'jig rten slu ba ngo tsha med par stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba yin pas tshe 'phos nas ngan song du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_dge ba bcu'i las ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa ba yin te/_byang chub kyi rgyud dang mya ngan
[\[353b.6\]]las 'das pa'i them skas lta bu yin no/_/dper na spos bsregs na/_spos nyid tshig ste med par song yang dri bsung gis gzhan la bro bar byed do/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims nyams pa'i dge slong yang bsod nams kyi zhing gshin pa ma yin te/_nyin mtshan du dad pas byin
[\[353b.7\]]pas bsregs te ngan song du 'gro mod kyi sems can dpag tu med pa'i phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du 'gyur te mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i bsung bro bar byed do/_/de ltar dge slong de chos kyi snod ma yin mod kyi skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon pas
[\[354a\]]
[\[354a.1\]]cha lugs dang /_spyod lam 'phags pa rnams dang mthun te de mthong ba tsam gyis sems can tshad med pa dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa sna tshogs 'phel zhing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de bas na rgyal po la sogs pas gang yang chad pas gcod pa mi dbang ngo /_/rgyal po la
[\[354a.2\]]gdams pa las/_nor ni btang gis lus ni bsrung bar bya/_/yan lag btang gis srog ni bsrung bar bya/_/nor dang yan lag rnams dang de bzhin srog_/thams cad btang gis 'dir ni chos srung ngo /_/chos spyod pa ni chos kun srung bar byed/_/dper na dbyar dus gtugs ches
[\[354a.3\]]srung ba bzhin/_/chos spyod pa yi phan yon 'di yin te/_/chos spyod pa ni ngan 'gror mi 'gro'o/_/chos ma yin pa spyod cing bag med pa/_/'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gro mi bzad 'gro/_/gang du gnas na shi bas mi tshugs pa/_/sa phyogs de ni yod pa ma yin te/_/
[\[354a.4\]]bar snang ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang ma yin/_/ri yi phug tu zhugs kyang mi phan no/_/mya ngan las 'das pa thob phyin chad 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa las/_yi ge ma mchis zhes bgyi ba ni brjod du ma mchis pa lags la/_yi ge ni brjod pa kho
[\[354a.5\]]na lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_ma pham pa 'di lta ste/_dper na mar med pas mar gyi snying khu'i rgyun chad par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam du spros pa de ni byang chub
[\[354a.6\]]yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni spros pa med pa'i phyir te/_'di ni tshul yin no/_/gang na ji tsam du spros pa de tsam du byang chub po/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_spros pa thams cad ni dben pa'i phyir te/_byang chub de yang dben pa yin no/_/mtha' gnyis zil
[\[354a.7\]]gyis mnan nas su/_/khams rnams dbu mas spyod par byed/_/de'i phyir bzod pa bstan par bya/_/ngo bo nyid kyis chos stong pa/_/de ni byang chub lam yin te/_/ngas kyang de ni bstan pa yin/_/yang dag pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba ni gang lta ba med pa'o/_/lta ba thams cad ni log
[\[354b\]]
[\[354b.1\]]par lta ba'o/_/gang zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dgra bcom pas gang ba srog dang phral ba de bas ni/_'ga' zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems las mos pa bzlog na/_bsod nams ma yin pa'i phung po ches che
[\[354b.2\]]bar nga smra'o/_/shA ri'i bu mdor na byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la bar chad bya ba'i phyir sems 'jug pa de la mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba med cing dal ba phun sum tshogs pa med do/_/chos bzhi dang ldan pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ste/_gang zhe na/_tshar gcod
[\[354b.3\]]pa'i tshig dang ldan pa yin/_chos zab mo dang ldan pa yin/_chos zab mo la sbyor bar byed pa yin/_dus dus su gdams ngag gi tshig dang ldan pa yin/_dus dus su yal bar 'jog pa yin no/_/mngon par shes pa myur ba nyid du bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
[\[354b.4\]]rten mchod pa dang /_phyir bcos pa dang /_byi dor bya ba lhur blang bar bya ste/_gang zhig byi dor byed pa de ni gzugs kyi smon lam gyi mchog dang /_dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yang dag par blang ba brtan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i lta ba'i smon lam gyi mchog
[\[354b.5\]]'thob po/_/'jam dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u las/_rnal 'byor pa rnam par grol bar 'dod cing 'khor bas skrag pa rnams la brten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so/_/stong pa nyid la rtog cing sems can yal bar 'dor ba ni bdud kyi las so/_/
[\[354b.6\]]'dus ma byas pa la rtog cing 'dus byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas skyo ba yang bdud kyi las so/_/nyon mongs pa ma lus pa zad par tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun gyis nyon mongs pa rnams la smod pa yang bdud kyi las so/_/nam dge slong 'jig tshogs la lta ba ngo bo nyid kyi
[\[354b.7\]]bgrod pa gcig pa'i las su bsgoms te/_gnyis su med par 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de bgrod pa gcig pa'i las kyi ngo bo nyid du mnyam par shes shing ma rig pa dang srid pa dang sred pa las byung ba yang tshol lam rig pa dang /_sred
[\[355a\]]
[\[355a.1\]]pa dang /_srid pa las byung ba la so sor rtog pas nam rig pa dang /_srid pa dang sred pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang rig pa dang rnam par grol bar shes na lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no/_/chos bzhis rdzu 'phrul 'thob ste/_lus yang ba dang /_sems
[\[355a.2\]]yang pa dang /_chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_khams bzhi nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis rlob pa'o/_/chos bzhis rdzus te skye bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs pad ma'i steng na bzhugs pa byed du
[\[355a.3\]]'jug cing /_pad ma la sogs pas lag pa bkang ste/_sku gzugs dang mchod rten la 'thor ba dang /_phan pa'i dngos po mang zhing dga' bar byed pa'i ngang tshul dang /_gzhan gyi skyon mi 'dzin pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can gyi don du sangs rgyas su
[\[355a.4\]]bsngo ba'o/_/chos bzhis shes rab chen por 'gyur te/_chos la ser sna mi byed pa dang /_mi mthun par 'jug pas 'gyod pa sel ba dang /_gsol ba 'debs pa la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gdams ngag ston pa dang /_stong pa nyid bsgom pa la mang du gnas pa'o/_/chos
[\[355a.5\]]bzhis sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa 'thob ste/_srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos mi spong ba dang /_srog gi phyir yang sdig pa'i grogs po mi bsten pa dang /_srog gi phyir yang chos smra ba la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'o/_/
[\[355a.6\]]chos bzhis skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis 'thob ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rin po che spar gyis 'thor ba dang /_'bru mar gyi dri zhim pos de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la 'khru ba dang /_mchod rten la spos dang me tog dang sil snyan
[\[355a.7\]]la sogs pas mchod pa dang /_yid du 'ong ba'i g.yog 'khor gyis mkhan po dang /_slob dpon la bsnyen bkur byas pas rim gro byed pa'o/_/chos bzhis dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu 'thob ste/_stan rgyu sna tshogs kyi stan 'dul ba dang /_gzhan la bsti stang byed
[\[355b\]]
[\[355b.1\]]pas mi skyo ba dang /_chos smra ba la 'thab mo mi rgol ba dang /_sems can rnams byang chub la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o/_/chos bzhis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gar sems bskyed pa der skye ste/_gzhan dag gis shes pa'i khe dang rnyed pa la phrag dog mi byed pa dang /_
[\[355b.2\]]lhag pa'i bsam pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su dag pa tshol ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed pa dang /_shes kyi khe'i phyir tshul 'chos pa med do/_/kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa bstan pa las/_sha'i mig
[\[355b.3\]]gis sems can thams cad dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong ngo /_/lha'i mig gis sems can gyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba mthong ngo /_/shes rab kyi mig gis sems can gyi sems kyi spyod pa dang g.yo ba shes so/_/chos kyi mig gis sems can yang dag pa
[\[355b.4\]]ji lta ba bzhin mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad byed do/_/mi dge ba'i grogs po dang brten pa ni mi dge ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang brten pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/byang chub
[\[355b.5\]]kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sgo'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin las/_bka' stsal pa/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag sum cu po 'di dag gi nang nas brgyad stong ni dam pa'i chos 'dzin
[\[355b.6\]]cing yongs su 'dzin par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' lhag ma ni dmu rgod dmigs par 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pa dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur te/_de dag phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tham pa'i tshe/_nga'i byang chub bskal pa
[\[355b.7\]]grangs med pa du mar bsgrubs pa 'di spong bar 'gyur/_'gal bar byed par 'gyur/_mi ston pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa rnam pa bdun gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/bdun gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
[\[356a\]]
[\[356a.1\]]kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa'i dus na/_dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis yongs su
[\[356a.2\]]gzir ba'i sems can gyi khams mthong nas snying rje chen po skyes te/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa bzang po yid du 'ong ba byin nas/_byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_gzhan
[\[356a.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mthong nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid dang dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan sna tshogs kyi yon tan bsngags pa rdzogs pa thos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub tu sems
[\[356a.4\]]bskyed pa gong ma gsum ni/_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub srung ba yin te/_myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/lhag ma bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa ma yin par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[356a.5\]]chos lnga dang ldan na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos su rig par bya ste/_lnga ni sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang /_pha rol gyi rnyed pa dang bkur sti la phrag dog med pa dang /_srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i dge slong gi bsngags pa ma yin
[\[356a.6\]]pa brjod pa dang /_shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang grags pa la mi chags pa dang /_chos zab mo la mos pa'o/_/chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' dmu rgod yin te/_lnga ni gzi brjid chung zhing bka' blo mi bde ba yin/_dman pa
[\[356a.7\]]la mos shing thams cad la dman pa'i chos ston pa yin/_shes kyi khe dang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags nas slong mo ster ba'i khyim la ser sna byed pa yin/_g.yo sgyu dang ldan pa yin/_stong pa nyid la ngag gi las lhur len pas mi 'dra ba yin no/_/byams pa phyi
[\[356b\]]
[\[356b.1\]]ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' sgyid lug par mi 'gyur zhing /_yang dag par blangs pa ston la bsam ba thag pa nas byang chub la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sangs rgyas grangs med pa mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no/_/de dag gis ngan
[\[356b.2\]]song du 'gyur ba'i las gang mngon par 'dus byas pa de yang mdog ngan par 'gyur ba tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur/_nad mang ba tsam dang /_dman pa'i rigs su skyes pa dang /_dbul po dang mtha' 'khob pa dang /_log par lta ba'i rigs su skyes pa dang /_sems can la
[\[356b.3\]]mya ngan mang ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba dang /_rgyun du chos mnyan pa mi 'thob pa dang /_bsam gtan la sems g.yeng ba dang /_tha na rmi lam na sdig pa mthong ba rmis pas kyang las kyi sgrib pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig stong sems de ni rigs
[\[356b.4\]]min te/_/ji ltar de yis skye med brtags phyir ro/_/rnam rtog thams cad bdud kyi zhugs pa ste/_/'gyur med chos kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o/_/skye ba med pa bden pa gcig yin na/_/de la kha cig bden pa bzhi zhes zer/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas bden cig kyang /_/grub
[\[356b.5\]]par ma mthong zhi lta ga la zhig_/sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin las/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mya ngan las 'das nas/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du dam pa'i chos gnas par 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos nub ma thag pa'i mtshan
[\[356b.6\]]mo skya rengs 'char ba'i dus kyi tshe/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/_'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams de ni rin chen kun nas bsags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'og tu byang chub sems
[\[356b.7\]]dpa' mthu chen thob der 'tshang rgya ste/_yon tan shin tu gnas pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bud med sus thos ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po las thar bar 'gyur te/_rgyu gnyis po ser sna dang phrag dog ni ma gtogs so/_/rab tu zhi ba
[\[357a\]]
[\[357a.1\]]rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin las/_byang chub sems dpa' gang gis snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed na dge ba'i rtsa ba des gal te sangs rgyas ma byung bar 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes na yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur/_/lha rnams kyis yongs su gzung
[\[357a.2\]]bar 'gyur te/_nam bag med par gyur pa de'i tshe/_yang gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis bskul bar 'gyur/_de ni dran pa chud mi za bar 'gyur ro/_/rnam par dag pa'i chos lnga yang yongs su 'dzin te/_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa dang /_lus rnam par dag pa
[\[357a.3\]]dang /_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa rnam par dag pa dang dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa rnam par dag pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la brten pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub kyi sems la brten pa rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/bka' stsal pa/_
[\[357a.4\]]gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad srog gcod de bdog pa thams cad phrog pa las/_gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba tha na byol song la zan kham gcig byin pa'i bar chad byas na ches sdig grangs med par che'o/_/gang chos
[\[357a.5\]]thams cad mi mthong ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'o/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed na/_/bskal pa bye ba rnams su yang /_/nam du'ang long theng mi 'gyur te/_ston pa bla na med par 'gyur/_/bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal ngas ni ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' la khong khro
[\[357a.6\]]ba'i sems cig bskyed pa las/_kha na ma tho ba che ba'i chos de lta bu gcig kyang ma mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' la khro ba'am/_brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa snyed pa skal bar sems can dmyal ba rnams su gnas par go cha bgo
[\[357a.7\]]bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' la skur ba btab pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' las gzhan gang gis kyang log pa'i ltung bar byed mi nus so/_/rin chen zla bas zhus pa las/_rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i bu rin chen zla bas gsol pa/_gang
[\[357b\]]
[\[357b.1\]]gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcu'i mtshan bzung na bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog bar 'gyur ba de lta bu bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol zhes sogs kyi lan du bka' stsal pa/_shar na 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar mnyam pa na sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa bzhugs/_
[\[357b.2\]]lho na 'jig rten gyi khams dga' ba na sangs rgyas tsan+dan dpal bzhugs/_nub na 'jig rten gyi khams bzang po na sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs/_byang na 'jig rten gyi khams 'khrugs med na sangs rgyas tog gi dpal bzhugs/_shar lho na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba snang ba na
[\[357b.3\]]sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal bzhugs/_lho nub na 'jig rten gyi khams tog dang ldan pa na sangs rgyas rin po che'i mchod sdong bzhugs/_nub byang na 'jig rten gyi khams sgra ldan na sangs rgyas me tog dpal bzhugs/_byang shar na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ldan na sangs rgyas mngon par shes pa
[\[357b.4\]]chung ngu dang chen pos rnam par rol pa bzhugs so/_/'og na 'jig rten gyi khams yangs pa dang ldan pa na sangs rgyas snang ba'i dpal bzhugs/_steng na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba can na sangs rgyas nor dpal bzhugs so/_/dkon mchog ta la la'i gzungs las/_dad pa med pa'i mi dag la/_/
[\[357b.5\]]dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste/_/sa bon me yis tshig pa las/_/myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no/_/sdong po bkod pa las/_byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sa bon lta bu'o/_/dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/_'jig tshogs la lta ba ri rab dang mnyam pa bskyed
[\[357b.6\]]kyang /_byang chub kyi sems skye zhing de las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams skye'o/_/dkon mchog za ma tog las/_byang chub sems dpa' ma rig pa'i sbubs kyi nang na 'dug pa bdag tu lta ba ma brtol zhing khams gsum las ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi sgra nyid du rnam par thar pa'i sgo
[\[357b.7\]]gsum gyi sgra 'byin to/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i mdo las g.yo byas te byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa la yang sangs rgyas kyi rgyur gsungs na/_dge ba sna 'ga' byas te sems bskyed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_bskal pa bzang po'i mdo las de bzhin gshegs pa skar ma'i rgyal po ba lang rdzir gyur
[\[358a\]]
[\[358a.1\]]pas so rtsi'i 'dab ma phul te/_dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grags pa thag par gyur pas ras kyi kha tshar phul 'od 'phro can grong gi sprang por gyur pas rtsa'i me sgron phul/_gdul dka' shing thun du gyur pas so shing phul te/_dang po byang chub tu
[\[358a.2\]]sems bskyed do/_/spyod pa dang mi yang byang chub kyi sems ni bde ba mtha' yas pa bskyed pa yin te/_ci mngon zhe na/_byams pa'i rnam par thar ba las/_rigs kyi bu dper na rdo rje rin po che ni chag kyang gser rgyan thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /_rdo rje rin po che'i ming yang mi
[\[358a.3\]]'dor la dbul ba thams cad kyang rnam par bzlog go/_/de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen par sems bskyed pa'i rdo rje rin po che nan tan dang bral yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad zil gyis gnon cing /_byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang mi 'dor la/_'khor ba'i dbul ba
[\[358a.4\]]thams cad rnam par bzlog go/_/sdong po bkod pa'i mdo las/_'phags pa dpal 'byung gis bstan pa lta bu ste/_rigs kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yang dag par zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gror mi ltung ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa dang 'gal bar mi byed
[\[358a.5\]]do/_/spyod pa thams cad brjed ngas pa med par spyod pa yin no/_/las dang nyon mongs pas thub par dka' ba yin no/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni bag med pa'i gnas nas zlog pa'o/_/'khor ba'i grong nas 'dor ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na yid la bya ba rgyun ma chad pas dge
[\[358a.6\]]ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du 'gro bar bya'o/_/khur thams cad kyis mi skyo bas sa lta bu'i sems dang /_mi phyed pas rdo rje lta bu dang /_las thams cad nyams su len pas bran lta bu dang /_brgyal bcom pas phyag dar ba lta bu dang /_mi khro bas khyi lta bu dang /_dge ba'i bshes
[\[358a.7\]]gnyen gyi ngor lta bas bu mdzangs pa lta bu'i sems kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bdag la ni nad pa'i 'du shes/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sman pa/_rjes su bstan pa la ni sman/_nan tan la ni nad 'tsho ba'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/seng
[\[358b\]]
[\[358b.1\]]ges zhus pa las/_skye ba kun du byang chub sems/_/rmi lam na yang sems de ni/_/'dor mi 'gyur na ma nyal tshe/_/smos ci 'tshal bar gang gis 'gyur/_/bka' stsal pa/_grong dang grong khyer rnams su'am/_/gang du gnas pa'i yul rnams su/_/byang chub la ni yang dag 'dzud/_/des na
[\[358b.2\]]sems 'dor mi 'gyur ro/_/rin po che'i phung po las/_mchod rten la gos phul ba gang yin pa de ni mchod rten de nyid du rlung dang nyi ma dang char bas dengs kyang bla'i/_mchod rten la phul ba'i gos zong gser du bsgyur du mi rung ste/_mchod rten la ni mchod rten gyi zong cis kyang brel phongs pa
[\[358b.3\]]med pa'o/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las gang zag gis gang zag la drod bzung na smas par 'gyur bar shes par gyis shig_/chos thams cad shin tu rgyas pa'i bsdus pa'i mdo las/_gang chos smra ba la mi gus pa de sangs rgyas mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin no/_/gang chos smra ba la mi snyan par brjod
[\[358b.4\]]pa de sangs rgyas yongs su gtong ba yin no/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa de la gti mug can de dag 'di skad du/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par bsgrubs pa byang chub sems
[\[358b.5\]]dpa' bslab par bya ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing de dag pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan la sun 'byin par sems na 'di snyam du sems/_nga ka shi ka'i rgyal por gyur pas phug ron gyi phyir khra la sha byin pa de shes rab 'chal ba can yin nam/_gsol ba/_de ni ma
[\[358b.6\]]lags so/_/ngas byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs pa de dag gis gnon par gyur tam/_de ni ma lags so/_/mi gti mug can de dag 'di skad du byang chub ni stong pa nyid kyi tshul gcig pa yin no zhes zer na/_de dag spyod pa yongs su dag pa ma yin
[\[358b.7\]]no/_/dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las/_chos bzhis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes pa rnams zad par 'gyur te/_nga rgyal gyis 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i gsang tshig tshol ba dang /_thos pa dang /_bkur sti la chags pas khyim pas lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la khro zhing skur
[\[359a\]]
[\[359a.1\]]pa 'debs pa dang /_ma zin cing ma thos pa'i mdo sde spong ba'o/_/thams cad yod par smra ba'i lung las/_bka' stsal pa/_dge slong 'dis mchod rten la phyag byas te sems dang ba la ltos/_btsun pa de lta lags so/_/dge slong 'dis sa ji tsam non pa'i 'od dpag tshad
[\[359a.2\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong na bye ma ji snyed yod pa de snyed du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid stong 'gyur du spyod par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa nye ba 'khor gyis gsol pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bur che ba gang du yongs su bas par 'gyur/_bka' stsal pa/_tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pas/_tshangs
[\[359a.3\]]pa mtshungs par spyod pa la rma phyung ba dang /_rmas pa byas pa de lta bu ni ngas ma mthong ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po 'di dag der yongs su zad par 'gyur ro/_/de bas na 'gal ba la yang sems kyis gnod par mi byan/_sems dang bcas pa'i lus ci smos/_sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya 'od kyi
[\[359a.4\]]mdo las/_gang dag byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'i gnas bzhi brgya 'dzin pa dang /_dge slong gi sdom pa bslab pa'i gnas nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_dge slong ma'i lnga brgya 'dzin pa las nyams te/_ngan 'gros 'jigs na sman gyi bla la mchod pa sna tshogs byas na ngan song
[\[359a.5\]]las thar ro/_/'phags pa byams pa'i rnam par thar pa las/_dper na mar me gcig khyim mam khang bur bcug ma thag tu lo stong du bsags pa'i mun pa yang sel ba de bzhin du/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems gcig bskyed ma thag tu bskal ba brjod du med par bsags
[\[359a.6\]]pa'i las dang nyon mongs pa sel to/_/zla ba sgron ma'i mdo las/_sems can don brtson byang chub sems dang ni/_/tshul bzhin yid kyis dben sems gang yin dang /_/rtag tu bag yod 'chi med rgyu yin te/_/yongs su 'dzin med bde ba kun gyi rgyu/_/
[\[359a.7\]]'od srungs kyi le'u las/_chos bzhis byang chub sems dpa' shes rab yongs su nyams par 'gyur te bzhi ni chos dang chos smra ba la mi gus pa yin/_chos la ser sna byed cing slob dpon gyis dpe mkhyud byed pa yin/_chos 'dod pa'i gang zag la chos kyi bar chad byed de
[\[359b\]]
[\[359b.1\]]'dun pa bzlog cing chos mi ston pa yin/_nga rgyal gyis bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa yin/_chos bzhis byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/_bzhi ni/_slob dpon dang /_bla ma dang /_sbyin gnas la slu ba dang /_gzhan 'gyod pa med pa la nye bar sgrub pa dang /_theg
[\[359b.2\]]pa chen po la zhugs pa'i gang zag la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra ba dang /_g.yo dang sgyus gzhan la spyod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pas ma yin no/_/chos bzhis byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du byang chub kyi sems brjed par mi 'gyur zhing skyes ma thag tu mngon du 'gyur te/_bzhi
[\[359b.3\]]ni/_srog gi phyir yang tha na bzhad gad du yang brdzun mi byed pa dang /_g.yo sgyu med par sems can thams cad la lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la ston par 'du shes shing de dag gi bsngags pa phyogs bzhir sgrogs pa
[\[359b.4\]]dang /_nyi tshe ba'i theg pa mi 'dod pa'i phyir sems can smin par byed pa de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dzin du 'jug go/_/bzhi po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan no/_/gang zhe na/_chos rnams stong pa nyid du rtag mod kyang /_/las kyi rnam par smin la'ang
[\[359b.5\]]yid ches so/_/bdag med bzod pas mnyam pa nyid gnas kyang /_/sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed/_/de yi bsam pa rtag tu mya ngan 'das la gnas/_/de yi sbyor ba 'khor bar gnas pa yin/_/yongs smin bya phyir sbyin pa sbyin byed kyang /_/las kyi rnam par
[\[359b.6\]]smin la re ba med/_/sngags dang sman gyis zin pa'i dug gis ni 'chi bar byed mi nus so/_/de bzhin du thabs dang shes rab kyis zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa'i dug gis kyang log par ltung bar byed mi nus so/_/dper na grong khyer rnams kyi mi gtsang lud/_/
[\[359b.7\]]de ni bu ram shing gi zhing la phan/_/de bzhin byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs lung /_/de ni rgyal ba'i chos la phan pa byed/_/lta bar gyur pa thams cad las byung ba'i stong pa yin no/_/'od srungs stong pa nyid kho nar lta ba de ni gsor mi rung ba'o zhes ngas bshad do/_/byang chub
[\[360a\]]
[\[360a.1\]]sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs na 'dug pa/_ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ling tog gis mig khebs pa dang yang 'di lta ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba'i sgra skad kyis nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/
[\[360a.2\]]log par zhugs pa'i 'du shes pa las 'byung ba ma gtogs pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma gzigs pa gang yin ba de ni rgyu ba 'dri ba lta zhe na/_'od srungs sems ni sgyu ma dang mtshungs so/_/ngan song bzhi gang zhe na/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin
[\[360a.3\]]rje'i 'jig rten dang lha ma yin no/_/rtsod pa med pa'i lhur len pa ni dge sbyong gi chos so/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos smra ba la rim gro byed pa des 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing lus kyi dge ba bcu ni tshor bas kun du ma zin par 'chi ba'i dus
[\[360a.4\]]mi byed pa dang /_mig 'khrul bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_lag pa g.yob par mi byed pa dang /_rkang pa 'phra bar mi byed pa dang /_gcin mi gtor ba dang /_phyi sa mi 'byung ba dang /_de'i snying gar rdul mi 'byung ba dang /_khu tshur mi 'chang ba dang /_nam mkha' la mi snyegs pa dang /_ji ltar
[\[360a.5\]]'dug pa de bzhin du tshe'i 'du byed 'dor bar 'gyur/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa las/_sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na ni 'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do/_/rin po che bdun ni/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_sbug dang /_mu tig
[\[360a.6\]]dmar po'o/_/rnam par 'thag pa thams cad bsdus pa las/_gang zag sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dag gis ni sangs rgyas yongs su gtang ba yin te/_ji snyed kyi khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa de/_de snyed kyi bskal bar
[\[360a.7\]]sems can dmyal bar go bgo dgos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gnod sems bskyed pas/_byang chub sems dpa' ngan song du 'gro bar log par ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu gzhan ni ngas ma mthong ngo /_/ma pham pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin
[\[360b\]]
[\[360b.1\]]pa drug sgrub pa 'di ni byang chub kyi phyir yin na/_de la mi blun po dag 'di skad ces shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho nas byang chub sems dpa' bslab par bya'o zhes zer zhing pha rol tu phyin pa lhag ma rnams sun 'byin to/_/'di ji snyam du sems/_ka shi'i rgyal po gang yin pa des mgo
[\[360b.2\]]byin pa de 'chal ba'i shes rab can yin nam/_gsol pa ma lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la la ni bzang bar 'du shes/_la la ni ngan par 'du shes na chos spong ba'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i ched du/_'di ni nyan thos kyi/_'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi
[\[360b.3\]]ched du gsungs pa'o zhes zer na chos spong ba'o/_/nga ni nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi spobs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu las byung bar smon lam btab pa yin na/_mi blun po de dag ngan song du 'gro bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir de la
[\[360b.4\]]skyon 'dogs par sems so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i chos smra ba la skyon 'dogs par sems so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bzung ma bklags par smra na chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba las/_ma smras par thar pa shin tu dka'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na ma smras par
[\[360b.5\]]'gyur te/_sems can la khong khro ba med pa dang /_chos smra ba rnams dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_pha rol mi spong ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa thams cad la gus pa'o/_/sprin chen po las/_bram ze chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ser po chen po byang chub sems
[\[360b.6\]]dpa'i 'khor gyis bskor ba la bzod par gsol cig_/gang la la lha sbyin gyi yon tan mi shes pa de dag ni sangs rgyas byung ba'i phyed thob pa tsam du zad pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/bram ze chen po lhas byin gyi yon tan gyi che ba la ltos/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang 'dra bar skyes bu chen po yin par blta ste/_'dul ba'i
[\[360b.7\]]dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang na snang ba der/_skyes bu chen po 'di yang phyi bzhin 'brang zhing snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i drug sde rnams kyis bskor ba la rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rtag tu de mngon par shes pa rnams kyis
[\[361a\]]
[\[361a.1\]]sems can dmyal ba na rtse bar byed de 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yul yin no/_/lha sbyin ni sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba yang ma yin no/_/lha mo slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Da n+yi 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya nyi shu lon pa na mau rgya'i rigs zhes bya ba byed kyi
[\[361a.2\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur te/_skyes nas yang phyed kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gsol pa/_de'i ming ji skad ces bgyi/_lha mo dge bsnyen gyi rgyal po mya ngan med ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'/_/chos kyang nub par mi
[\[361a.3\]]'gyur te/_/sems can rnams ni smin mdzad phyir/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston/_/sprin chen po 'di yang lo bzhi bcu'i bar du 'dzam bu'i gling na spyod par 'gyur te/_rgyas par yang 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su nyams pa'i dus na/_'od srungs chen po dang 'dra ba'i
[\[361a.4\]]dge slong du 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur te/_bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa'i bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu mang po dag gis gsol pa/_yun ji srid cig na 'od srungs chen po dang 'dra ba'i dge slong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/gang du ni skye/_de'i ming ni ji skad ces
[\[361a.5\]]bgyi bar gzung bar 'tshal/_bka' stsal pa/_nga 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya phrag mang po 'das pa na/_lho phyogs kyi rgyud du mkhar gyi rgyal po bde spyod ces bya ba 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de'i tshe lo brgyad cu na/_dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba'i lhag ma tsam lus pa'i dus la bab pa de'i tshe
[\[361a.6\]]nga'i nyan thos 'byung bar 'gyur te/_chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/_theg pa chen po yang gzhan la rgyas par 'chad par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi phyir dge slong des ni de bzhin gshegs pa klu rigs sgron ma'i thad du shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa bzung ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/_brtson 'grus
[\[361a.7\]]chen po'i gru de ni de ltar lits+tsha bI 'jig rten thams cad kyi mthong na dga' ba 'di yin no/_/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi mthun pa'i dge slong du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/gzhan yang /_nga'i nyan thos de bzhin gshegs pa dang mi mthun pa'i dge slong chos kyi sgra chen po lan gsum mngon par
[\[361b\]]
[\[361b.1\]]bsgrags nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i che ba nyid la ltos/_/de'i tshe nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshogs nub par 'gyur ro/_/de ni 'di nas 'chi 'phos nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_bskal pa bzang po 'di 'das nas/_bskal pa drug cu rtsa gnyis su sangs rgyas mi 'byung ste/_
[\[361b.2\]]rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug 'bum 'byung ngo /_/bskal pa de dag 'das nas sangs rgyas bdun 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bdun po yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i tshe/_'jig rten gyi khams 'di mngon par dang bzhes bya bar 'gyur te/_der 'di de bzhin gshegs pa ye
[\[361b.3\]]shes 'byung gnas 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag de kho na dang /_rtag pa dang /_bdag dang /_sems can du 'du shes pa yang dag par mthong ba ni/_shin tu yang dag pa'i lta ba can zhes nga smra'o/_/gsol ba/_ci las dgongs
[\[361b.4\]]te 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes brdzun pa rnams rdzogs par bshad cing /_de skad bka' stsal pa de kho na dang rtag pa dang bdag dang sems can du 'du shes pa zhes bya ba ni thar pa'i tshig bla dgas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa dang ther zug dang brtan pa zhes bya ba dam
[\[361b.5\]]pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ba'i tshig bla dgas so/_/sems can bsod nams chung ngu dag ni thar pa la zad pa'i 'du shes bskyed cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs bzhin yongs su mya ngan las 'das par sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi shin tu
[\[361b.6\]]lhag pa yang dag par mthong bar 'dod pas ni/_ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la rtag pa dang bdag dang sems can du 'du shes bskyed par bya zhing thar pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/'di ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can bye ba snyed dag lung
[\[361b.7\]]ston par sprin chen po'i mdo tsheg bar brgyad par sbyar ba'i le'u 'bum pa las lung bstan pa'i rgyud yin no/_/sgo mtha' yas pa rnam par sbyong ba las chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_mi shes pa las 'dus byas kyi chos thams cad 'byung bar rtogs pa dang /_ye shes
[\[362a\]]
[\[362a.1\]]mthong ba las 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad 'byung bar rtogs nas/_spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyis 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i chos rnams la yang dag par 'jug par bya zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la chos
[\[362a.2\]]nyid du rtogs na yang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa yang ma yin no/_/chos thams cad ni sems tsam ste sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin no/_/ngas sems
[\[362a.3\]]can chos zab mo la spyod pa ma byas pa rnams rmongs par gyur na mi rung zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rmongs phan chad yod pa med do zhes rnam grangs kyis bstan par bya ba yin zhes gsungs so/_/chos gang zhig skye ba yang med/_'gag pa yang med pa de ni shi phan chad pa'am
[\[362a.4\]]med pa zhes bya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yang skye ba yang med 'gag pa yang med do/_/chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o zhes bya ba ji ltar chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu yin zhe na/_ji ltar nam mkha' gang du yang ma gtogs pa de ltar chos thams
[\[362a.5\]]cad kyang gang du ma gtogs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa ma chags ma thogs pas/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam pa du ma ma lus pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin rab tu mkhyen to/_/lus ngan po yi bu thu bo/_/
[\[362a.6\]]gnod sbyin yang dag shes zhes bya/_/rtsod med khro ba med gnas te/_/pha dang bcas te rtag tu ni/_/chos 'di dag la dga' ba gang /_/de la srung ba byed par 'gyur/_/lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na shes rab kyi mun
[\[362a.7\]]pa dang bral ba yin te/_bzhi ni thos pas ngoms pa med cing /_tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang /_zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos ston pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs pa dang /_tshul gcig
[\[362b\]]
[\[362b.1\]]la 'jug pas tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug go/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na 'jig rten gyi tshul la rtog pa rnams yin te/_bzhi ni bre mo gtam byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang /_skye bo phal po che 'dus pa 'chib rjes su dran pa dang /_gtong ba chen po la rjes
[\[362b.2\]]su yi rang zhing byang chub tu bsngo ba dang /_'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gzhol ba'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs ba bzhin smra ba yin te/_bzhi ni byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_thos ba dam pa snying por byed pa dang /_ji skad smras pa de bzhin
[\[362b.3\]]du byed pa dang /_rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug pa'o/_/chos bzhi dang ldan na las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa yin te/_bzhi ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang /_mtho ris kyi rgyu tshul khrims mi spong ba dang shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa mi spong ba dang /_bral ba'i rgyu
[\[362b.4\]]sgom pa mi spong ba'o/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin par yang shes par byed la sems rnam par g.yeng ba rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du spyod par byed kyang bsam gtan la gnas pa
[\[362b.5\]]las g.yo bar ma gyur na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par lta zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi yul yang med par lta na/_de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang
[\[362b.6\]]po bsrungs pa yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad nyan par byed cing thos pa'i don yang rtogs par byed la/_ji ltar thos pa yang 'dzin cing ji ltar gzung ba yang gzhan la ston par byed na mang du thos pa yin no/_/'jam
[\[362b.7\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung la 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung ste/_'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/_'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal
[\[363a\]]
[\[363a.1\]]nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/_lha'i sku khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/_byang chub sems dpa' der nyon mongs par mi byed na nyan thos su 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas/_sbyin pa'i
[\[363a.2\]]pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang /_tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas tshul khrims dang /_gnod sems kyis bzod pa dang /_le los brtson 'grus dang /_brjed ngas pas bsam gtan dang /_bems po dang sems dang po lug ltar lkugs
[\[363a.3\]]pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa na de tsam gyis na lam la gnas pa yin no/_/'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad smra/_lha'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su mi gtong ba yin te/_
[\[363a.4\]]sems can dang chos dang /_byang chub kyi chos dge ba'i chos te bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do/_/tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' ba ni/_tshul khrims las yang dag par 'das pa yin te/_ting nge 'dzin dang
[\[363a.5\]]de las 'das pas shes rab dang /_de las 'das pas rnam par grol ba ste/_de lta bus tshul khrims sgrub pa yin no/_/gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la ldan zhing theg pa chen po la zhugs pa ste/_theg pa chen po la zhugs
[\[363a.6\]]pa ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/le lo'i lus dang ngag dang sems kyis rtul par mi byed pa ste/_chos la ltar brtson pa ni brtson 'grus so/_/rmi lam na yang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis dran pa med pas/_brjed ngas pa ste/_sa de lta bur ma ltung ba nyid theg
[\[363a.7\]]pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas bsam gtan no/_/chos thams cad bems po ste/_rtsa ba la sogs pa dang gnas lugs ji lta ba de bzhin du shes pa ni shes rab bo/_/gang tshe sems ni chags med pa/_/bla med byang chub sems yin te/_/
[\[363b\]]
[\[363b.1\]]sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa/_/de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do/_/sems bskyed pa ni thams cad na/_/byang chub tu ni yongs bsngo zhing /_/byang chub sems las rab brtag pa/_/de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do/_/thabs dang mi ldan shes rab kyis/_/ma byung 'byung
[\[363b.2\]]bar 'gyur ba med/_/shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni/_/mkhas pa rab tu zhi mi 'gyur/_/nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi 'di lta ste/_rlung las gyur pa brgya rtsa gcig dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa brgya rtsa gcig dang /_bad kan las gyur pa brgya rtsa gcig dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa
[\[363b.3\]]brgya rtsa gcig go/_/las rnam pa gsum ste/_tshe dang 'brel pa dang /_srid pa bar ma dang 'brel pa dang /_tshe gzhan dang 'brel pa'o/_/skyes pa gang zhig skyes pa la 'jug par byed na/_de lus dang bral nas sems can dmyal ba nyam nga bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lug mo'am bong
[\[363b.4\]]mo la 'jug par byed na sems can dmyal ba a tsa zer du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sring mo'am gzhan yang 'os ma yin pa la 'jug na sems can dmyal ba kyi hud zer du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ma tshul khrims ral zhing spyod pa ngan pa la 'jug na sems can dmyal ba 'chi ba'i rgyun med
[\[363b.5\]]lta bur skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gnyis rtsod pa na rgyal po'i blon po'am gzhan yid ches pa'i gnas su bya bas nor blangs pas mdza' bshes sam/_'dod chags la sogs pa'i dbang gis zhal che yon por bcad na/_sems can dmyal ba lce bcu gcig par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sdug bsngal
[\[363b.6\]]ba dang /_nad bu can dang ltogs pa dang mgon med pa dang /_bkren pa dag la nor rdzas sbyin par khas blangs pa las ma byin zhing bza' ba dang btung ba khas blangs pa las ma byin na/_sems can dmyal ba kun dga' la re ba med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/don med chos la dga' ba ni/_/bud
[\[363b.7\]]med g.yo dang phrag dog mang /_/'jig rten gnyis ni rnam 'jig pa/_/skyes pa rnams kyi mdun na gnas/_/de'i tshig shin tu mi brtan te/_/rtag tu 'dod chags skye la mkhas/_/de yi snying ni gzhan sems la/_/gzhan gyi tshul gyis spro bar byed/_/dang po mnyen zhing srun byed la/_/
[\[364a\]]
[\[364a.1\]]phyi nas sems ni rdo rje 'dra/_/sems ni yang zhing phan pa med/_/bkur sti dag ni dran med byed/_/legs pa brgya ni chud gsan la/_/ma legs gcig pu dran par byed/_/sdig pa'i sa gzhi bud med yin/_/snying ni glog gi ngo bo bzhin/_/skyes pa chags pa'i
[\[364a.2\]]sems yod na/_/'jigs pa'i rgyu ni bud med yin/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du/_/'jigs byed nang na bud med 'jigs/_/gal te bde ba'i mchog 'dod na/_/de ltar bud med rnam par spongs/_/bud med rtag tu spangs pa ni/_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol bde/_/gang zhig
[\[364a.3\]]dbul ba spong 'dod cing /_/gang zhig bdag ni 'byor 'dod dang /_/gang zhig mya ngan 'das 'gro 'dod/_/mi des bud med spong bar byed/_/ji ltar bram ze smra ba las/_/bud med gzhon nu 'dod langs la/_/bag mar ma blangs na mi srog gcad pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur zer zhes pa lta
[\[364a.4\]]bu'o/_/mtshams med pa lnga char byas na lus dpag tshad lnga par gyur ba nas/_gcig byas na gcig gi bar du 'gyur ro/_/mnar med pa de dag kha cig ni 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi lus nyid las mnar med pa'i me 'byung bar 'gyur/_kha cig ni 'chi ba'i dus byas nas srid pa par mar
[\[364a.5\]]skyes la/_de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gyur ro/_/bslab pa'i gzhi gcig gam gnyis sam gsum mam/_bzhi'am lnga'am gzhan blangs pa dang /_bu sring ngam bu sring dang 'dra ba'am/_grogs kyi chung ma 'os pa ma yin pa dag la slu bar byed na/_sems
[\[364a.6\]]can dmyal ba a la la zhes zer bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/yi dgas kyi rigs ni mdor bsdus na sum cu rtsa drug yod do/_/'di lta ste/_lto gug dang /_kha khab mig ltar phra ba dang /_bshang ba zab dang /_dri zab dang /_spos zab dang /_chu 'thung ba dang /_mchil ma za ba dang /_phreng
[\[364a.7\]]ba za ba dang /_sha za ba dang /_khrag zab dang /_dud pa za ba dang /_drag shul spyod pa dang /_glags lta ba dang mthu bo che dang /_mi la glags lta ba dang mtshan mo lus 'bar ba dang /_'dod pa'i gzugs can dang /_gshin rje'i dbyug pa dang /_tshangs pa'i srin po dang /_mi gtsang ba za ba dang /_bdud kyi sde
[\[364b\]]
[\[364b.1\]]dang /_yul dgon du chu dkon pa srog chags dang 'brel cing spyod pa 'tsho ba de la ltos pa de bcad na sems can dmyal bar bya dza ba b+ha sgra 'byin du skye'o/_/klan ka btsal ba'i phyir mkhas pa las chos mnyan nas/_chos 'dul ba de la mi 'jug mi snyan pas sun 'byin na sems can
[\[364b.2\]]dmyal ba mes sreg tu skye'o/_/gnod sems snying la yod pa ni/_/kun gyis bsrung bar mi nus te/_/bshes grogs gnyen gyi mis ma yin/_/chos dang don gyi tshogs kyis min/_/'khrugs med mi zad nor yin te/_/skye bo kun gyi rje bor che/_/bden pa mtho ris
[\[364b.3\]]skas yin te/_/de nyid mya ngan 'das pa'i sgo/_/mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni ji ltar mos pa de ltar 'gro ba yin te/_gal te sa'i khams su mos na nam mkha' yang sa'i khams su mthong nas 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rin chung dus nyos nas chen por
[\[364b.4\]]'tshe ba dang phrag dog dang /_ser snas nyams pa ni yi dgas tshangs pa'i srin por skye ste/_mi bram ze'i gzugs kyis rgyu ba yin no/_/yun rings ngan 'gror bcom pa yi/_/dge ba'i bag chags dga' byed de/_/me tog nyams kyang til dag la/_/bag chags snang
[\[364b.5\]]pa ji bzhin no/_/de dag gis las ngan pa byas pa des rgya mtsho yang thams cad du skams shing ri dang nags tshal dang rgya mtshor bcas pa de yang 'bar bar mthong ngo /_/'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lhas
[\[364b.6\]]btsas gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du tshigs su bcad pa gnyis thos nas/_de'i mtshan mo 'das nas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dong ste lhags nas bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan sngar byang chub tu sems bskyed de tshigs su bcad pa 'di
[\[364b.7\]]dag smras so/_/gzugs la brkam dang sgra la brten pa dang /_/dri dang ro dang reg la gnas pa dang /_/'dod la brkam dang bde la dga' ba yis/_/byang chub mchog 'di rtogs par mi nus so/_/yang de nyid las byung ba/_byang chub sems ni bdag gi rmi lam thos/_/chos rnams bdag
[\[365a\]]
[\[365a.1\]]ni byang chub mchog la zhugs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba bstan pa las byung ba'i/_zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /_sems can thams cad kyi
[\[365a.2\]]bsam pa yang dag par tshim par mdzad kyang /_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di snyam du/_mdo'i sde la sogs pa gsal bar 'chad cing ston kyang /_'di ltar yang dag par bsgrags par mdzad do snyam du mi dgongs so/_/de lta mod kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor
[\[365a.3\]]'dus pa dge slong la sogs pa de dag gi dbang po'i rim pa dang /_de dag ci 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thos pas dgongs par 'gyur ba de 'dra ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa thob pa de/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'byung bar shes kyang /_chos bstan pa de ni phan tshun nges pa'i tshig tha dad
[\[365a.4\]]pa la/_gnod pa med par thams cad kyang rang rang gi chos rnam par rig par kun du shes te/_zhi ba'i blo gros 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi gsang ba'o/_/yang de nyid las/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa ste/_yi ge'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad
[\[365a.5\]]kyi thams cad du rnam par rig par mi mdzad kyang /_sems can yi ger lhur len pa rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag cag la chos ston to/_/bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa kun shes so snyam mo/_/zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin
[\[365a.6\]]gshegs pa'i tshems dang /_sgros dang /_zhal gyi rkan dang /_ljags dang /_zhal gyi sgo nas sgra 'byung ba yang med la/_'byung ba yang grag go/_/zhi ba'i blo gros gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni phung bos rab tu phye ba ma yin/_khams kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/_
[\[365a.7\]]skye mched kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin/_las las byung ba ma yin/_nyon mongs pa las byung ba ma yin/_pha ma las byung ba ma yin/_'byung ba chen po'i nur nur po las byung ba ma yin/_sha dang khrag gi pags pas g.yogs pa ma yin/_rus pa dang chu ba'i 'og ris 'brel
[\[365b\]]
[\[365b.1\]]ba ma yin/_dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba ma yin/_srog dang 'brel ba ma yin te/_zhi ba'i blo gros de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni sku med pa ste/_chos kyi sku dang gzugs dang mtshan ma med pa'i sku dang /_spros pa med cing rgyu ba med pa'i rgyu yin yang /_gzugs dang mtshan ma gtso bor byed
[\[365b.2\]]pa'i sems can sku bstan pas 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi mig la snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gzugs las dben pa chos kyi mtshan nyid gtso bor byed pa'i sems can rnams la ni lha'i mig gis kyang thams cad du bltar snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'dul ba gzhi las/_bud+d+ha
[\[365b.3\]]'od srungs kyi ring la rgyal po kr-i kri byung ste/_bud+d+has kyang der smon lam btab nas dga' ldan du skyes so/_/kr-i kI'i rgyud kyis grong khyer po ta lar rgyal po'i rabs brgya rtsa gcig byas so/_/de dag gi tha mar rgyal po kar+Na zhes bya ba ste/_de las bu gau tam dang /_b+ha rad+h+wa dza zhes bya ba gnyis
[\[365b.4\]]yod pa las/_b+har d+h+wa dza ni rgyal po byed do/_/gau ta ma ni pha ma la gsol nas/_drang srong nag sbyin las rab tu byung ste/_drang srong gi gnas dgon pa ma bcas te/_grong po ta la dang nye ba zhig na spyil bu na 'dug pa las/_bzang mo gzugs kyis 'tsho ba mi g.yon chen/_mri na pa zhes bya ba dang mthun
[\[365b.5\]]te nyal bar byas pa las gzhan zhig dang khri ba'i gtam thos nas/_bzang mo mri na pa bsad pa dang /_bzang mo'i g.yog gis khus btab ste/_mi kun gyis bsnyags pa dang /_mri na las ral gri khrag can drang srong gau ta ma'i spyil po'i sgor bzhag nas bros so/_/mi kun gyis ral gri
[\[365b.6\]]mthong ba dang /_rab tu byung ba mi gsod ces de khrid ba dang /_rgyal po b+ha ra d+h+wa dzas ma brtags par gsal shing la btsugs so/_/de nas drang srong nag pos de mthong nas dris te gtam byas nas/_gau ta mas bdag gar skye zhes byas pa dang /_de na re bram ze dag na re rigs rgyud med pa
[\[365b.7\]]la 'gro ba med do zhe na/_bu lta yod dam med des smras pa med do/_/de nas drang srong gis byin gyis brlabs te/_char pa dang rlung bsil ba dag gis lus la phog par byas nas sngon gyi 'dod pa la spyod pa dran par gyis shig ces pa dang /_khu ba dang khrag 'dres pa'i thigs pa gnyis zags
[\[366a\]]
[\[366a.1\]]pa las sgo nga gnyis byung ste/_nyi mas smin par rgyas pa dang /_de brdol nas bu gnyis byung ste bu ram gyi tshal gyir ba zhig tu dong ngo /_/pha ni shi'o/_/de nas drang srong gis de gnyis blangs nas gsos ta/_nyi mas smin par byas pa dang /_bu ram
[\[366a.2\]]gyi tshal na gnas pa dang /_gau ta ma'i bu la ming gsum du grags par btags so/_/de nas b+ha ra d+h+wa dza rabs chad de/_shi nas blon pos pho bo gau ta ma rab tu byung ba rgyal por gzhug go zhes nas drang srong nag po la rmas ba las bsad par gyur to/_/bu gnyis de ni 'dug pa las phu bo rgyal por
[\[366a.3\]]bcug pa las rabs chad do/_/nu bo bcug ste bu ram shing pa zhes bya bar grags so/_/de'i 'phel rgyud las grong khyer po ta la'i rgyal po brgya rtsa gcig go/_/de dag gi tha ma bu ram shing pa rgyal po 'phags skyes po'o/_/de la bu bzhi ste/_ta la la gar ni dang /_ka ra kar ni dang /_ha sti ni
[\[366a.4\]]yangs pa dang /_nu bo ro ka'o/_/de nas 'phags skyes po'i chung ma shi bas rgyal po gzhan zhig gi bu mo blangs pa las/_rgyal po des rang gi tsha bo zhig yod na/_rgyal tshab tu gzhug par dam bcas nas byin no/_/phyis bu zhig byung ba dang /_rgyal tshab tu ma bcug pa dang /_rgyal po de
[\[366a.5\]]yang dag gam zhes bsdigs so/_/de nas 'phags skyes po bred nas/_ji ltar bya zhes pa dang blon pos bu gzhan skrod la de chug ces so/_/de nas rgyal po dang blon pos thabs byas nas bu kun bskrad pa dang /_de dag la kun dga' bas/_sring mo yan chad zhag bdun
[\[366a.6\]]gyi bar du grong ta la la'i sgo nas 'drul ma chad par dod pa dang /_phyis sgo bcad de lhag ma ma ba kye'o/_/de dag gangs ri dang nye ba chu bo b+ha go ra thi'i drung na drang srong ser skya'i gnas kyi nye 'khor du dong nas spyil po byas te ri dgas bshor zhing 'khod do/_/de nas 'dod
[\[366a.7\]]chags kyis gdungs nas kun ser po bseng bseng bor song nas/_drang srong gis khyod rgyal rigs rgyal thabs las nyams pas g.yas khyim gyi sring mo 'tsho zhing chos so/_/de nas mi 'phel nas kun chos drang srong la mnos nas/_gser gyi ril ba'i chus sa khor bris te/_grong khyer brtsigs
[\[366b\]]
[\[366b.1\]]nas der bzhag go/_/grong khyer gyi bzhi drang srong ser skyas bres pas/_ser skya'i grong khyer ro/_/de nas 'phags skyes kyis de dag gis nus phong bar thos nas shAkyar btags so/_/de nas 'phags skyes po shi nas rgyal tshab dang bu bskrad pa yan chad/_ri'i rgyal por
[\[366b.2\]]mthar gyis bcug pa las gzhan ni kun rabs chad do/_/nu pur ko la bu la ka zhes bya ba zhig yod pa'i 'phel rgyud kyis/_ser skya'i grong khyer gyi rgyal po stong lnga bcu rtsa lngar byas so/_/de dag gi tha ma gzhu brten la bu gnyis te/_seng ge man kal
[\[366b.3\]]dang /_seng ge'i sgra'o/_/seng ge'i man kal la bu bzhi ste/_zas gtsang ma dang /_zas dkar po dang /_dro no da na dang /_bdud rtsi zas so/_/bu mo ni gtsang ma dang /_dkar mo dang /_bre mo dang /_bdud rtsi ma'o/_/zas gtsang ma la bu gnyis te/_
[\[366b.4\]]don grub dang dga' bo'o/_/zas dkar po la bu gnyis te/_tshe dang ldan pa ti sh+ya dang /_byi ka'o/_/dro no dan la bu gnyis te/_tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang ma 'gags pa'o/_/bdud rtsi zas la bu gnyis te/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lhas byin no/_/gtsang ma'i bu ni rab tu tshor ba'o/_/
[\[366b.5\]]dkar mo'i bu ni pa tra ma li'o/_/dro no'i bu ni ta li'o/_/bdud rtsi ma'i bu ni she ba la'o/_/bud+d+he'i sras ni rAhu la'o/_/bud+d+ha'i yum sgyu 'phrul chen mo'o/_/yum yar mo sgyu ma ste/_gnyi ga rgyal po gnyi tshad kyi bu mo'o/_/yum ni gcen no/_/byang chub sems dpa'
[\[366b.6\]]dga' ldan gyi gnas nas gshegs pa chos nyid kyis gzigs pa lnga la gzigs te/_rigs dang yul dang rus dang dus dang bud med do/_/rigs ni rgyal rigs dang bram ze gang la btsan par 'dzin pa la gzigs te/_der skye ba ma blangs na 'jig rten la phan pa dang /_
[\[366b.7\]]sems can gyi don du mi 'gyur te/_gzhan yang de dang 'dra'o/_/yul ni gang na bu ram shing dang ba lang dang ma he dang slong mo ba mang ba 'gro ba yang rabs mang zhing mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo med pa'o/_/dus ni skye bo'i tshe lo brgyad khri las yar 'das na yang skyo ba chung zhing blun/_/brgya
[\[367a\]]
[\[367a.1\]]las mar 'gribs na yang snyigs ma lnga shas che/_rus dang bud med ni shAkya dang sgyu ma chen po lta bu go rims bzhin mang pos bkur ba tshun tshan che ba dang /_bdun rgyud tshun tshan la skyon med cing mdzangs dge la/_byang chub sems dpa' yang
[\[367a.2\]]mngal na zla ba bcur 'dzin nus pa'o/_/ston pa drug 'od srungs rdzogs byed la sogs pa rjes su ston pa drug bram ze ku ta til do la sogs pa drug ma rig pa'i bu u tra ka la sogs pa/_bud+d+ha lhums su zhugs tshun chad don kun grub pa'i phyir don kun grub/_
[\[367a.3\]]shAkya'i spyi lha sbyin shAkya spel ba la phyag 'tshal du khrid pa las/_des phyi rol du bsu ste/_phyag byas pas lha'i yang lha/_lha la phyag 'tshal du chas pa'i tshe/_grong khyer de na gnas pa'i shAkya mthong zur can mi srun pa kun thub pa bzhin 'khod pas na shAkya thub pa'o/_/
[\[367a.4\]]bdun mtho ba phyag gnyis dpung mgo gnyis lhag pa'o/_/rin po che bdun las 'khor la ni gser las byas pa lte ba zlum po rtsibs stong pa'o/_/nor bu ni be+e DUr+ya dgos 'dod 'byung ba'o/_/ba lang ni thal kar ro/_/rta ni mgrin sngon no/_/bud med ni reg na bde ba'o/_/blon po ni gser
[\[367a.5\]]la sogs pa nor 'bul ba'o/_/dmag dpon ni/_dmag thabs la mkhas pa'o/_/chos nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' bltams nas/_/zhag bdun na yum dus las 'das so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lo nyi shu rtsa dgu na khab
[\[367a.6\]]nas byung ste/_lo drug dka' ba spyad nas bdud rtsi chud par 'gyur bar drang srong mi dkar bas tshor/_drang srong mi dkar ba ri gis skin ngi la gnas te/_shi khar slob ma la/_bdud rtsi tshol du btang nas phyung ba ka t+ya ya chen po yin/_
[\[367a.7\]]ji ltar lam brgyags nyung ba dag/_/lam zhugs sdug bsngal 'gro ba ltar/_/de bzhin las bzang ma byas pa'o/_/sems can dag ni ngan 'gror 'gro/_/ji ltar lam brgyags gang bdog pa/_/lam zhugs bde bar 'gro ba ltar/_/de bzhin las bzang
[\[367b\]]
[\[367b.1\]]byas pa yi/_/sems can dag ni bde 'gror 'gro/_/rgyu lngas srog gcod pa byas kyang kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_lam du 'gro bar zhugs pa'i mi shes pas srog chags phra mo dang /_grog sbur la sogs pa srog dang bral bar byed pa dang /_gzhan la mtshon chas gzas
[\[367b.2\]]pa las bsam pa dang mi ldan par gzhan la phog ste/_de srog dang bral ba dang /_nad pa la sman pas phan par 'dod pas nyes par ma mthong ste/_sman byin pa las des shi ba dang /_de bzhin du mas bu 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir brdeg pa las de srog dang bral ba dang /_me sbar ba'i nang du srog chags
[\[367b.3\]]mi 'dod bzhin lhung ba ste/_rgyu rnam pa de lngas srog bcad bar gyur kyang /_kha na ma tho bas gos par mi 'gyur ro/_/ma byin par len pa'i sdom ba ma blangs par ma byin par len pa 'di ni rnam par smin pa chung ba yin no/_/glang po che bdun legs par gnas pa ni rkang lag bzhi dang mjug ma
[\[367b.4\]]legs pa dang /_rlig pa mdoms kyi nang na 'dug pa dang /_sna legs par gnas pa'o/_/ral gri nye ba'i rin po che ni/_yul 'khor gzhan du ral gri rang song ste mi 'debs par mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad rgyal po'i bka' nyan pa'o/_/pags pa ni rgya mtsho'i klu'i pags pa yin te/_zheng
[\[367b.5\]]dpag tshad lnga chur dpag tshad bcu ste/_klu rnams kyis rgyal po la 'bul/_grang na dro bar byed/_dro na bsil bar byed/_bud med mi sdug pa mthong bar mi byed do/_/mal cha ni mdor na der nyal na sems las su rung bar 'gyur ro/_/tshal ni rgyal po der zhugs pa na lha'i bya ba la sogs pa 'du ba'o/_
[\[367b.6\]]khyim ni grang dro ran thun tshod gang la dge ba bya ba de'i dus su sad par 'gyur ro/_/gos ni me la sogs pas mi rdzi du ba med pa'o/_/lham ni chu la yang mi 'bying dal gyis 'gro na yang dpag tshad brgyar phyin pa'o/_/gnyen pa dag la dga' med cing /_/mkhas pa dag la lta 'dod la/_/khyim gyi skyon
[\[367b.7\]]las nges 'byung ba/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/glu dang ga ra la mi lta zhing /_/nyes tshogs rnams la chags med pa/_/gang dag dur khong dga' byed pa/_/de lta bu ni dge slong yin/_/de la mi dge ba'i las kyis ni sems can dmyal ba rnams su'o/_/dge bas ni lha rnams su'o/_/'dren
[\[368a\]]
[\[368a.1\]]mas ni mi rnams su skye'o/_/rgyal po'i chad pas nyan pa dang /_bla ma dang pha ma dang /_'phags pa'i nad pa ltogs pa dag gi don du ma byin par len pa na 'bras bu chung ba yin/_dkon mchog gsum las ma byin par blangs pa de dag las kyang /_sangs rgyas dang
[\[368a.2\]]chos kyi ni ris mthun par slar phul na dag par 'gyur la/_dge 'dun gyis brkus pa ni tshor ba ma myong ba dag par 'gyur ba med do/_/ma byin par len pa'i sdom pa ma blangs pas ma byin par blangs pa 'di ni rnam par smin pa chung ba yin no/_/de yi las ni rnam gsum gyis/_/gnas skabs
[\[368a.3\]]dag tu 'tsho byed cing /_/rnam par smin pa bzhi bcu tham/_/drag po dag tu g.yos par 'gyur/_/don med gzhi ni chang yin no/_/sems can dmyal ba'i bzhad gad pa/_/dbang po thams cad rnam nyams shing /_/don med pa yi rgyur gyur to/_/tshig la shin tu dga' ba dang /_/chags pa
[\[368a.4\]]dang ni 'jig pa dang /_/ngag gi skyon dang rlom pa dang /_/tshig rtsub bzhi ni de bzhin no/_/chang gis kun du g.yengs pa'i yid/_/bya dang mi bya mi shes pa/_/mi de phyugs dang mtshungs pa yin/_/de lta bas na chang spongs shig_/chang gis g.yengs pa'i mi dag ni/_/gson yang shi ba dag dang
[\[368a.5\]]mtshungs/_/gang zhig rtag tu gson 'dod pas/_/rtag par chang ni rnam par spongs/_/chang ni nyes pa kun gyi gzhi/_/rtag par don kun med par byed/_/ngan song kun gyi them skas te/_/mun nag gnas ni chen po yin/_/chang gis sems can dmyal bar 'gro/_/de bzhin yi dgas
[\[368a.6\]]'jig rten dang /_/chang gis skyon gyis bslus pa yin/_/mi dag dud 'gro rnams su 'gro/_/dug gi nang na dug ni chang /_/de bzhin dmyal ba'i nang na dmyal/_/nad kyi nang na nad mchog ni/_/chos zhes mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/_/blo dang dbang po nyams byed cing /_/rin chen chos ni zad byed
[\[368a.7\]]la/_/tshangs par spyod pa 'jig byed pa/_/mi zad chang ni skye gnas gcig_/rgyal po dang ni bstan bcos mkhas/_/chang gis sdong par byed 'gyur na/_/tha mal mi dag chang 'thung ba/_bslus par 'gyur ba ci zhig smos/_/chang la brten pa'i mi dag ni/_/chos rnams kun gyi sta re yin/_
[\[368b\]]
[\[368b.1\]]ngo tsha med par byed pa'i mchog_/spong ba dag tu nye bar bstan/_/chang gis phrogs par gyur pa'i sems/_/bya ba dang ni mi bya ba/_/mi shes rnam par mi shes shing /_/thams cad mi yis mi shes so/_/gang zhig chang la brten byed pa/_/skye bo res 'ga' dga' byed cing /_/res 'ga' yongs
[\[368b.2\]]su gdung byed la/_/res 'ga' sdig pa byed la yin/_/blo ni shin tu rmongs bskyed cing /_/'jig rten gnyis ni rnam 'jig byed/_/thar ba'i chos la me lta bur/_/srog byed kho na chang yin no/_/mi gang dag ni chang spong ba/_/chos kyi ngang tshul mnyam par gzhag_/gang na 'chi ba med pa yin/_/
[\[368b.3\]]gnas mchog dag tu de 'gro'o/_/chang 'thung pa yis bslus pa dag_/de ni byed pa dman pa yin/_/mi bzod sems can dmyal bar ltung /_/don med ci zhig yongs su gdung /_/'thung ba'i tshe na chang zhim ste/_/rnam smin tshe na mchog tu tsha/_/kim pa ka nang kim pa ka_/chang zhes mkhas pa rnams
[\[368b.4\]]kyis bshad/_/bdag la 'di yis mi gnod ces/_/blo ldan chang la yid ma rton/_/myangs na bsil yang rnam smin tsha/_/chang ni dmyal bar 'gro bar byed/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams byed pa la/_/sems g.yeng ba dag dga' bar byed/_/phyi nas rnam smin tsha ba ru/_/blo ngan yongs su gdung bar
[\[368b.5\]]'gyur/_/'dod pa rnams la blo mi gtad/_/'dod pa mchog tu slu ba yin/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba drag po ste/_/sems can dmyal ba kun gyi rgyu/_/gang zhig 'dod pa rnams la dga'/_/de yi sdug bsngal mtha' med do/_/'dod pa'i sprul gyis zin pa la/_/bde ba nams kyang ga la
[\[368b.6\]]yod/_/khyed cag 'dod pa mi bzad cing /_/drag po sems can dmyal bar 'ongs/_/gnod pa shin tu mi bzad la/_/don med ci zhig yongs su gdung /_/gang tshe 'dod pas bslus pa yi/_/khyed cag gis ni sdig byas pa/_/de tshe ci phyir khro mi byed/_/de ring ci zhig yongs su gdung /_/
[\[368b.7\]]byas pa bsags pa brtan pa yi/_/las dag gi ni 'bras bu snang /_/sdig pa'i tshor ba mi bzad pas/_/de lta bas na sdig mi bya/_/sdig pa sdig pa'i rnam smin ni/_/rtag tu ngan song rnams su smin/_/sdig mi byed la sdig med do/_/de lta bas na sdig pa spongs/_/sdig pa yongs su spangs pa
[\[369a\]]
[\[369a.1\]]la/_/sdig pa'i rnam smin med pa yin/_/sdig pa rang gis byas pa gnod/_/gzhan gyis spyod par mi 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gso ba dang /_mchod rten rtsig par 'byung ba dang /_bcom
[\[369a.2\]]ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_nga mya ngan las 'das nas gnas kyi steng ngam/_mi'i 'jig rten na sems can gyis nga'i sku gdung lag tu thob ste/_mya ngan dang dga' ba dang bcas pa bas bsti stong du phyag 'tshal te/_dad pa'i sems kyis mchod pa byas na bsod nams
[\[369a.3\]]tshad med dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung mthong na des ni sangs rgyas mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos mthong ngo /_/chos mthong ba des ni dge 'dun mthong ngo /_/dge 'dun mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'das pa mthong
[\[369a.4\]]ngo /_/dga' bo de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa brten pa mi 'gyur mi 'pho ba ste/_sems can thams cad kyi mgon dang skyabs kyi gnas su 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/dga' bos bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bdag
[\[369a.5\]]cag gis cho ga gang dang sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na/_sku gdung thob cing dad pas mchod par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_nga mya ngan las 'das nas khyed kyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i thabs su sreg shig
[\[369a.6\]]dga' bos yang gsol ba/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sreg ba'i cho ga ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni shi nas zhag bdun gyi bar du 'jog ste/_gdod lcags kyi sgrom gyi nang du 'dzud do/_/sgrom du bcug
[\[369a.7\]]nas/_'bru mar bsung can gyis sgrom gyi nang bkang nas/_kha legs par bcad de yang zhag bdun du 'jog go/_/de nas sgrom nas phyung ste spos chus bkru'o/_/spos chus bkrus nas bdug spos kyis mchod cing gtams la/_shing bal gyis lus kun dkri'o/_/shing bal gyis dkris pa'i steng du
[\[369b\]]
[\[369b.1\]]ras dkar po bzang po yug stong gis mthar chags su dkri'o/_/de ltar dkris nas sgrom gyi nang 'bru mar bsung can gyis bkang ste/_rgyal po'i rus bu phyir sgrom du bcug la sgrom gyi kha legs par bcad do/_/shing bsung can gyi rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta'i steng du drangs te/_shing rta'i ngos
[\[369b.2\]]bzhi yang rgyan 'phyang zhing rin po che sna tshogs kyis kyang shing rta bkra'o/_/grangs med pa'i me tog dang /_ba dan dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang spos bzang po sna tshogs dang lha'i rol mos bskor cing mchod pa bya'o/_/de nas shing bsung can phyin ri mo dang
[\[369b.3\]]ldan pa dang /_mar bsung can gyis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rus bu bsreg go/_/de ltar bsregs nas ring bsrel bsdus te/_grong khyer chen po'i bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten sgo bzhi dod par byas te/_ring bsrel de'i nang du bzhag la/_'jig rten du bcas pa
[\[369b.4\]]thams cad kyis rjes su yi rang bas bltar gzhug go/_/dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams cung zad cig gis rgyal po'i thabs thob kyang srid pa las rnam par ma grol 'dod pa lnga dang bsten te/_btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas su bcas/_ngan par lta ba dang /_gdug
[\[369b.5\]]pa gsum du bcas/_nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa ba spu'i nyag ma tsam yang ma spangs pa/_shi nas 'jig rten du bcas pas de lta bu'i cho ga byed cing mchod rten brtsigs nas/_thams cad rjes su yi rang zhing lta na/_dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa la ci smos te/_
[\[369b.6\]]bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med pa nas/_btsun mo dang pho brang gi slas dang 'dod pa lnga yongs su spangs te/_'jig rten gyi chos la ba mo'am ser ba lta bur rtogs nas brtson dka' ba brgal te/_shin tu spyod dka' ba spyad nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
[\[369b.7\]]kyis 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i spyod dka' ba spyad de/_phyogs bcu na dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mdzad pa yongs su dag pa'i tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ston pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug
[\[370a\]]
[\[370a.1\]]ma bsgrubs pa gang yang med la/_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_snying rje chen po dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_stong pa bco brgyad dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_spyan lnga dang byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa
[\[370a.2\]]bdun dang /_ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang /_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku tshe dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyang ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_spyod dka' ba thams
[\[370a.3\]]cad dang /_dge ba bsdu ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sems can gyi don bya ba'i tshul khrims dang /_sdom pa'i khrims dang /_yon tan thams cad dang /_ye shes thams cad dang /_rgyan thams cad dang /_smon lam chen po thams cad dang /_thabs la mkhas pa thams cad dang /_de la sogs
[\[370a.4\]]te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams dang /_ye shes thams cad yongs su rdzogs par lhun gyis grub ste/_mi dge ba thams cad yongs su bcad/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su bcad/_nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad kyang yongs su bcad de/_
[\[370a.5\]]bden pa bzhi dang rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis shin tu rtogs nas/_byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud rnam bzhi btul te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su gyur nas/_de lta bu'i dam pa'i chos thams cad nan tan byas pas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung
[\[370a.6\]]mthun par legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal pas/_mthun par chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi chu chos kyi sku'i spyi bor dbang bskur te/_gdong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bsgrags so/_/de bas ni da
[\[370a.7\]]ltar lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa ste/_phyogs bcur rnam par sangs rgyas pa mthar phyin pa/_bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ste lha dang mi'i nang na dpe zla med pa sems can thams cad la sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang
[\[370b\]]
[\[370b.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa/_mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten rig pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul zhing kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ste/_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba'i mdzad pa kun mdzad
[\[370b.2\]]nas/_sems can gyi phyir mya ngan las 'das na/_'jig rten gyi chos bzhin du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/dga' bo nga mya ngan las 'das na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar zhag bdun gyi bar
[\[370b.3\]]du zhog la/_gdod lcags kyi sgrom bur chug cig_/lcags kyi sgrom bur bcug nas mar bsung can gyis khong la/_kha legs par chod cig_/sgrom yang rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu spras zhing brgyan la/_sgrom 'khor bar rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_spos dang me
[\[370b.4\]]tog gis mchod pa gyis shig_/de lta bur zhag bdun du mchod nas/_sgrom nas phyung la spos chus legs par khrus shig_/de ltar spos chus de bzhin gshegs pa sku legs par bkrus nas shing bal gyis sku legs par dkri zhing /_de'i steng du rin thang med
[\[370b.5\]]pa'i ras dkar po yug stong gis dkri zhing /_de ltar dkris nas phyis lcags kyi sgrom du chug la/_mar bsung can gyis bkang ste/_kha legs par chod cig_/de nas gor shi sha tsan+dan dang /_a ka ru dang /_shing bsung can thams cad dang bcas sku rin po che sna bdun gyi shing
[\[370b.6\]]rta'i steng du bzhag ste/_rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan te sreg pa'i gnas su drangs shig_/rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i gdugs grangs med pa dang /_rin po che'i gos grangs med pa dang /_grangs med pa'i rol mo dang /_grangs med pa'i me tog dang /_
[\[370b.7\]]spos kyis nam mkha' yang gang tsam du mchod pa gyis la dugs shig_/lha dang mi dang 'khor thams cad kyis ni spos kyi shing tsan+dan dang /_a ka ru dang /_mar bsung can gyis bsregs la dus shig_/de ltar bsregs nas lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus la/_rin po che
[\[371a\]]
[\[371a.1\]]sna bdun gyi bum par bcug ste/_grong khyer chen po'i lam gyi bzhi mdor rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten byas la ring bsrel la mchod na sems can dag bsod nams chen po thob cing /_srid pa gsum gyi sdug bsngal spangs nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba thob
[\[371a.2\]]par 'gyur ro/_/dga' bo 'khor rnam pa bzhi pos/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung gi rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten byas nas/_gzhan yang mchod rten gsum bya'o/_/gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten dang /_dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten dang /_'khor los sgyur
[\[371a.3\]]ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten te/_'jig rten du bcas pas skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas shes par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du gshegs pa na sems can la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/_stobs bcu dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_
[\[371a.4\]]mi bsnyengs pa bcu dang /_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis dang bden pa bzhi dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs rnam pa brgyad kyis khams gsum du bsgrags pa dang /_kha dog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i byams pa'i 'od kyis lam rgyud drug snang ba mdzad nas sems
[\[371a.5\]]can gyi bsam pa bzhin dul la ni 'bras bu bzhi dang /_theg pa gnyis la spyod par gyur/_la la ni zag pa med pa'i 'dus ma byas pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur/_la la ni 'gog pa mi skye ba'i byang chub kyi sa non par gyur/_la la ni tshad med pa'i gzungs rnams thob par
[\[371a.6\]]gyur/_la la ni spyan lnga dang mngon par shes pa drug thob par gyur/_la la ni ngan song gsum las thar bar gyur/_la la ni mi khom pa brgyad dang bral bar gyur/_la la ni lha dang mi'i 'jig rten gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang bral bar gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byams pa'i shugs rnam
[\[371a.7\]]par dag pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i chos kyi gzhung bsam gyis mi khyab pas mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du/_'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam bzhis rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten byas te ring bsrel la mchod na bsod nams chen po thob cing so
[\[371b\]]
[\[371b.1\]]so'i skye bo dag khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal las thar cing yang dag pa'i rnam par grol ba la 'jug par 'gyur te/_de bas na sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das na/_'jig rten du bcas pa lha dang mi dang 'khor thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mdzad pa'i drin chen po dang byams pa tshad ma
[\[371b.2\]]mchis pa rjes su gzung ba'i slad du rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten bgyid cing /_ring bsrel la mchod pa bgyid pa ni 'os na/_bcom ldan 'das mchod rten rnam pa gsum po bgyis pas sems can rnams la sman pa ci mchis na/_mchod rten bgyid cing mchod pa bgyid/_/
[\[371b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_rang sangs rgyas ni rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i chos shin tu zab mo rtogs nas/_srid pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/_nyes pa'i skyon thams cad dang bral nas/_lha dang mi'i bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te/_/de bas na
[\[371b.4\]]mchod rten byas te/_mchod na bsod nams thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'og tu 'gro ba mang po 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/dga' bo dgra bcom pa ni skye bo'i phyogs zad de srid pa phyi ma mi len la tshangs par spyod pa yongs su rdzogs pa 'jig rten
[\[371b.5\]]gyi bsod nams kyi zhing du gyur te/_de bas na mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams thob pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi 'og tu de mang ste/_des kyang 'gro ba rnam par grol bar byed do/_/dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang khams gsum gyi nyon mongs pa las rnam par
[\[371b.6\]]ma grol mod kyi/_bsod nams kyi shugs kyis gling bzhi la dbang ste dge ba bcu'i las kyis sems can ji srid byed pas sems can de dag gis bkur sti'i gnas yin te/_de bas na 'khor rnam bzhis mchod rten byas te mchod na bsod nams tshad med pa thob par 'gyur
[\[371b.7\]]ro/_/dga' bos yang gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/_bdag cag 'khor rnam bzhis gang du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhugs la bzhen na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel thob par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan du gsol/_
[\[372a\]]
