[\[372a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas/_'khor rnam bzhis gal te rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang du nga bsregs na/_grong khyer de'i mi dag rgyal po'i las kyi chad pa dang /_rtsod pa tshad med
[\[372a.2\]]pa 'byung ste/_thams cad kyis bsod nams mnyam par mi 'thob bo/_/dga' bo gal te 'khor rnam bzhis grong khyer gyi phyi rol na bsregs na/_'jig rten dag bsod nams mnyam par 'thob po/_/dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
[\[372a.3\]]mya ngan las 'das nas zhugs la bzhen pa'i 'og tu 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te/_rin po che'i bum par stsal nas/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten gang du brtsigs na thams cad dad pa'i sems skye zhing mchod par 'gyur ba bcom ldan 'das
[\[372a.4\]]kyis bstan du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te/_bsregs nas 'khor rnam bzhis ring bsrel bsdus te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi bum par chug la rtswa mchog gi grong khyer gyi nang lam gyi bzhi mdor rin
[\[372a.5\]]po che sna bdun gyis mchod rten bang rim gsum dang ldan pa 'phang lo dang bcas pa rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan cing spras pa/_'jig rten pa thams cad kyis mchog tu bya ba'i ba dan gyis shin tu brgyan pa/_ngos bzhi'i pu shu yang rin po che sna bdun las byas
[\[372a.6\]]pa thams cad du rgyan gyis rab tu spras pa/_mchod rten de'i rim pa gcig ni yang ngos bzhir sgo re rer btod pa/_skar khung thad kar 'bar ba'i nang du rin po che'i bum pa bcug ste/_'khor rnam bzhis mchod par bya'o/_/dga' bo rang sangs rgyas kyi mchod rten ni rim pa
[\[372a.7\]]bcu gcig dang ldan pa/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/_/dga' bo dgra bcom pa'i mchod rten ni rim pa bzhi dang ldan pa ste/_de yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'o/_/dga' bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i mchod rten yang rin po che sna bdun las byas te/_
[\[372b\]]
[\[372b.1\]]rim pa dang bcas pa ni ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khams gsum gyi srid pa'i sdug bsngal las ma grol ba'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshe ma 'gags pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das te zhugs la bzhin na/_lha dang mi dang 'khor rnam
[\[372b.2\]]bzhis de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel ji ltar bgos na thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma 'gags pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/mya ngan las 'das nas lha dang mi la sogs pas sangs rgyas kyi ring bsrel bsdus te/_shin tu mnyam
[\[372b.3\]]par sems kyis khams gsum dang rgyud drug pa thams cad la yang bgos te/_mchod pa byed par 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug gis/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa las de bzhin gshegs
[\[372b.4\]]pa'i ring bsrel gyi phyed gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad la sras sgra gcan 'dzin dang 'dra bar gzigs te/_de bas na khyed ring bsrel gyi phyed 'dod do zhes ma zer
[\[372b.5\]]cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don snyoms par mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba/_ngas khyod la 'gram pa g.yas pa'i tshems mche ba gcig sbyin gyis/_khyod kyis lha'i 'jig rten du mchod rten
[\[372b.6\]]byos la mchod cig dang /_khyod kyis bsod nams zad mi shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe na lha dang mi thams cad cho nges 'debs shing ngus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po la bka' stsal pa/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa la lha dang mi la sogs pa khyed mya ngan ma byed
[\[372b.7\]]cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das kyang ring bsrel dag mchod du yod la/_gzhan yang bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas dkon mchog mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang /_chos mngon pa yod do/_/de bas dkon mchog gsum dang bden pa bzhi rtag tu 'jig rten na yod do/_/sems
[\[373a\]]
[\[373a.1\]]can dag dad pas mchod pa'i gnas yod pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ring bsrel la mchod pa sangs rgyas dkon mchog yin no/_/sangs rgyas mthong ba des ni chos kyi sku mthong ngo /_/chos mthong ba des ni 'phags pa mthong ngo /_/
[\[373a.2\]]'phags pa mthong ba des ni bden pa bzhi mthong ngo /_/bden pa bzhi mthong ba des ni mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong ngo /_/de bas na dkon mchog gsum ni rtag pa/_gnas pa mi 'gyur ba mi 'pho ba ste/_'jig rten gyi gnas dang rten du 'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/bcom
[\[373a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed sdug bsngal gyis gdungs par gyur pa'i mya ngan chen po ma byed cig_/nga ni mya ngan las 'da' bar gshegs su nges tshul khrims sam/_gnas sam/_rtag pa'am/_mi rtag pa'am/_dkon mchog
[\[373a.4\]]gsum mam/_bden pa bzhi'am/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug gam/_rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba bcu gnyis las the tshom du gyur pa yod na myur du dris shig_/'dri ba 'di ni tha mar 'dri ba ste/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas 'gyod pa med par bya'o zhes lan gsum gyi
[\[373a.5\]]bar du bka' stsal to/_/de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi la sogs pa mya ngan gyis yid gdungs te/_skad brnangs nas yi chad pa tsam du yid la gcags te mya ngan gyis brgyal lo/_/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis mchi ma phyis nas cang mi smra ste zhu ba yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir
[\[373a.6\]]zhe na/_'khor bzhi po 'di dag thams cad ni tshul khrims dang /_gnas dang /_dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi mngon sum du rtogs te/_the tshom med par gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnam bzhi po la the tshom med par thugs kyis mkhyen nas/_
[\[373a.7\]]legs so legs so shin tu legs so/_/'khor bzhi po khyed dkon mchog gsum dang /_bden pa bzhi shin tu rtogs te/_the tshom med pa ni ji ltar chu dang bas dri ma bkrus pa dang 'dra ste/_khyed kyang brtson 'grus gyis shig dang /_myur du 'byung ba'i lam
[\[373b\]]
[\[373b.1\]]thob par 'gyur gyis brgyas pa tsam du mya ngan ma byed cig_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis seng ge'i khri la bzhugs bzhin du gser lta bu'i phyag gis na bza' sbyar ma bzhag nas gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu seng ge'i mthong ka dpal be'u phyung ste/_'khor mang po
[\[373b.2\]]rnams la bstan nas/_lha dang mi dang 'khor mang po rnams la nga'i sku kha dog gser btso ma lta bul ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i tshe 'khor rnam bzhi dang thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la mig mi 'dzums par bltas pas rab
[\[373b.3\]]tu bde ba ni ji ltar dge slong dag sdom pa gsum la rig pa dang 'dra bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po la bstan nas mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i 'od zer tshad med dpag tu med pa khrag khrig brgya stong snyed bkye nas/_
[\[373b.4\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas/_nyi zla'i 'od kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/de ltar 'od bkye nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni khyod kyi phyir bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du shin tu spyod dka' ba
[\[373b.5\]]spyad de/_lus kyi yan lag dang /_rkang pa yang gtubs nas shin tu spyod dka' ba thams cad spyad de/_snying rje chen po'i smon lam gyi dbang gis rnyog pa lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/_rdo rje lta bur mi
[\[373b.6\]]'jig pa gser btso ma'i kha dog gi sku mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa tshad med pa'i 'od zer gyis thams cad du snang bar byas pa thob ste/_'od zer gyis reg gam/_sku mthong ba tsam gyis kyang ma grol ba med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis
[\[373b.7\]]yang 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten du gshegs pa shin tu dka' ba ni me tog u dum bA ra dang 'dra ste/_shin tu mthong bar dka'o/_/khyod kyis nang gi tha mar nga'i sku mthong ba 'di la don med par mi bya'o/_/sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus
[\[374a\]]
[\[374a.1\]]rnyed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gshegs te/_de ni gdul bya'i don mdzad nas nga mya ngan las 'dar nye'o/_/khyed la sogs pa sems rtse gcig tu nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la shin tu ltos shig_/khyed kyang yongs su dag pa'i las la nan tan byas na/_/
[\[374a.2\]]'bras bu 'di thob par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du yang dang yang lan gsum gyi bar du bka' stsal nas/_gser btso ma lta bu'i sku 'khor mang po rnams la mngon du bstan to/_/de nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gser gyi khri las bzhengs te steng gi nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun
[\[374a.3\]]srid du 'phags nas yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye ya si/_khyed la sogs ba 'khor mang po rnams bsam pa shin tu dag pas/_nga'i sku kha dog gser btso ma lta bu la ltos shig ces lan bdun gyi bar du bka' stsal to/_/de nas nam mkha' las
[\[374a.4\]]babs te/_seng ge'i khri la bzhugs nas/_yang 'khor mang po rnams la nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye yis khyed la sogs pa bsam pa shin tu dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhengs nas
[\[374a.5\]]nam mkha' la shing ta la gcig srid du 'phags nas/_'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i khyed la sogs pa bsam pa dag pas nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig_/de bzhin du shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags
[\[374a.6\]]nas lan bdun gyi bar du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'dar nye'i/_/khyed la sogs pa 'khor mang po rnams nga'i sku gser btso ma'i kha dog lta bu la ltos shig ces bka' stsal to/_/dkon mchog gi za ma tog las/_gang dag sems bshus ngo tsha med cing khrel med dang /_/gang dag
[\[374a.7\]]'di 'dra'i yon tan med cing bden tshig med/_/de dag sgren mo bas kyang sgren mor 'jig rten rgyu/_/srog chags shi ba rjes blang ste/_/'tsho ba ngan pa de lta min/_/g.yul ngor shi ba legs pa ste/_/pham nas gson pa de lta min/_/snga ma'i dpung las mi rgyal te/_/dpa' bo'i
[\[374b\]]
[\[374b.1\]]dpung las rgyal bar 'gyur/_/zhes 'byung /_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong ba las bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams dngos po yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/_gang dag gi ched de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[374b.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir sems can rnams dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma
[\[374b.3\]]yin pas de'i phyir gang dag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
[\[374b.4\]]'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang /_yang rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
[\[374b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang /_sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang /_dpal gyis lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
[\[374b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dngos po med cing dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis lha dang mi dang /_lha
[\[374b.7\]]ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/_mdzes shing lha ma me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge zhes 'byung ba dang /_yang rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na
[\[375a\]]
[\[375a.1\]]ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_dge slong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
[\[375a.2\]]bskor bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi 'khor lo dngos po med cing /_dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
[\[375a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge slong ngam/_bram ze'am/_lha'am/_bdud dam/_tshangs pa'am/_/sus kyang 'jig rten du chos dang mthun par bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes 'byung ba dang /_yang rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'
[\[375a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po yin te/_dngos po med pa ma yin na ni/_theg pa chen po 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/_rnam pa
[\[375a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thob nas/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan te/_nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_rab 'byor gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
[\[375a.6\]]chen po'i rdo rje lta bu'i ye shes dngos po med cing /_dngos po yod pa ma yin pas/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bag chags dang /_mtshams sbyor ba dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad dngos po med par rtogs nas/_rnam pa thams cad
[\[375a.7\]]mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa 'thob ste/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/_nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung /_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di
[\[375b\]]
[\[375b.1\]]bshad pa na/_gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing /_rmongs pa med par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta bu ste/_sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs
[\[375b.2\]]su mi gtong ba'i phyir/_'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas pa yin par rig par bya ste/_de yang mi gnas ba'i tshul gyis gnas shing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i
[\[375b.3\]]bus smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/_snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang
[\[375b.4\]]chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus
[\[375b.5\]]yang dag pa'i tshig brjod nas/_don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i dmigs su phebs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o/_/sems can stong pa nyid kyi
[\[375b.6\]]phyir/_yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/sems can dben pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o/_/sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/_yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya zhing /_sems can mngon par rdzogs bar 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/_
[\[375b.7\]]yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung /_'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che sdong po brgyan pa las/_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan 'byung ba/_song shig nor bzangs dpal gyi chu rgyal
[\[376a\]]
[\[376a.1\]]dpung shig na/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi ri rgyal gru 'dzin mdzes pa yod/_/rin chen rgyus byas shing dang nags tshal me tog mang /_/bza' shing ra ba'i rdzing dang chu bran 'bab par ldan/_/dri mchog de la brten nas spyan ras
[\[376a.2\]]gzigs kyi dbang /_/'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnam par spyod/_/de gan song dang nor bzangs khyod la mgon po yi/_/yon tan rgya chen tshul 'jug bstod par byed/_/g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas te gus par skur ston nas/_/nor bzangs shin tu dul ba lho
[\[376a.3\]]phyogs rgyud du song /_/spyan ras gzigs dbang drang srong snying rje rnam spyod pa/_/rin chen ri yi sul na gnas par des kyang mthong /_/rin chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na/_/pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri la brten pa 'dug_/lha dang lha min klu dang
[\[376a.4\]]srin po mi'am ci/_/rgyal ba'i sras kyis bskor zhing de la chos kyang ston/_/mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par 'gyur/_/bsnyen te yon tan rgya mtsho'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/ci nas bzang po'i spyod pa bdag gis thob 'gyur bar/_/
[\[376a.5\]]'phags pa thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsol/_/bsod nams brgya pas brgyan pa dri med phyag brkyang ste/_/'od sprin dra brgya chen bzang po rab 'thon nas/_/nor bzang spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa/_/spyan ras gzigs kyi
[\[376a.6\]]dbang phyug mkhas pas tshig 'di smras/_/sangs rgyas sras po nga ni rnam thar gcig sgo shes/_/ye shes snying po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes sdug_/'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yongs su bsdu phyir 'byung /_/kun du bdag nyid rang la
[\[376a.7\]]byams pa bzhin du rgyu/_/'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal kun las skyob/_/gang rnams dam du bcings shing dgra lag phyin pa dang /_/lus la gzir cing de bzhin btson rar btsud pa yang /_/nga yi ming thos bcings shing bzung ba'ang
[\[376b\]]
[\[376b.1\]]thar bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po dag la nyes pa'i g.yor byas bsad spangs pa/_/de tshe de dag nga yi ming yang dran gyur na/_/mda' 'phangs de yi lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro/_/mtshon rnos btab kyang de dag mi 'jug rgal bar 'gyur/_/dbang po'i 'khor du
[\[376b.2\]]phyin dang gang rnams rtsod 'gyur pa/_/dgra rnams kun las rgyal 'gyur grags pa thob par 'gyur/_/grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gang gis nga yi ming ni rjes su dran byas pa/_/de dag rkun pos 'jigs dogs
[\[376b.3\]]dgras 'jigs nam phyin te/_/seng ge dom gzig gcan gzan g.yag rgod sbrul gang yang /_/dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhing 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/gang rnams la las nga yi ming zhig dran byas na/_/sdang ba'i sems rgyun sa chen ltongs su
[\[376b.4\]]thar gyur tam/_/sol dag lci me rab tu 'bar gyur kyang /_/gang ba chu yi gter du 'byung bar 'gyur/_/nga yi ming ni skad 'ga' yud tsam rjes dran na/_/rgya mtsho'i chur bor de ni nang du 'chi mi 'gyur/_/chu bos mi khyer me yi dbus su 'tshig mi 'gyur/_/
[\[376b.5\]]don med kun du mi 'gyur don rnams grub par 'gyur/_/shing sgrog dbyig bcings lcags sgrog de bzhin ltung rnams dang /_/brnyas shing khyad bsad de bzhin bred cing bslus pa dang /_/spyos shing bsdigs te gshe dang sma phab rnam pa las/_/nga
[\[376b.6\]]yi ming tsam dran par byas na thar pa thob/_/gang rnams shar gnyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang /_/gang rnams rtag tu zhe sdang mi snyan brjod pa rnams/_/nga yi ming thos dran byas snyan par brjod par 'gyur/_/mthong ba tsam gyi mod la byams
[\[376b.7\]]pa'i sems kyang bskyed/_/nga yi ming tsam la la gang gis dran byas na/_/gnod pa'i don du ro langs sngags dang byed pa yi/_/dgra rnams rtag tu de yis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_/ma lus dug gis de yi lus la mi tshugs so/_/la la gang gis nga yi ming
[\[377a\]]
[\[377a.1\]]tsam dran byas na/_/klu dbang sprin tshogs mkha' lding sha za thams cad dang /_/grul bum srin po 'tshe byed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang /_/mdangs 'phrog 'jigs byed rmi lam 'ong bzhi bar 'gyur/_/nga yi
[\[377a.2\]]ming ni skad cig yud tsam dran byas kyang /_/pha dang ma dang gnyen bshes mdza' ba kun dang yang /_/'bral bar mi 'gyur sdang dang 'grogs par de bzhin min/_/nor zad mi 'gyur phongs pa'i dngos su mi 'gyur ro/_/nga yi ming ni rjes su la
[\[377a.3\]]las dran byed na/_/'di nas shi 'phos mnar med sems dmyal mi 'gro ste/_/byol song skye gnas yi dgas mi khom gnas su min/_/sems can dag pa lha dang mi yi gnas su skye/_/nga yi ming ni la la dag gis dran byas na/_/
[\[377a.4\]]dmus long zhar ba 'on pa zha bor mi 'gyur te/_/theng po long bar mi 'gyur gsal smra blta sdug 'gyur/_/bskal ba bye ba mang por dbang po kun ldan 'gyur/_/la la gang gis nga'i rjes dran na/_/sems can dag pa 'di nas
[\[377a.5\]]shi 'phos phyogs bcu yi/_/'jig rten khams su sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthong 'gyur de dag chos kyang thos par 'gyur/_/'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis/_/'gro ba sems
[\[377a.6\]]can nges 'dul gzhan dang zad nus kyis/_/sangs rgyas sras po ngas ni rnam thar gcig bsgoms te/_/yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas mi shes/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon tan/_'phags pa mdo
[\[377a.7\]]sde sna tshogs kyi mdo btus/_gsung rab rin po che'i gtam rgyud/_'dus pa shAkya'i rabs rgyud/_mkhan po dpal brtsegs kyis mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho//_//
